Add half a tablespoon of olive oil and crush again.', 'Drain and add rice to the chopped onions and mix. Add sea salt, three cups water and bring to a boil. Cover and let it cook.', 'Clean the fish and make slits on both the sides. Apply the crushed spices on both sides and sprinkle lemon juice. Let it marinate for about thirty minutes.', 'Take refined flour in a plate and roll the fish in it. Heat olive oil in a grill pan and place the fish on it. Dribble some olive oil on top. Cook, turning sides so that both the sides are evenly done.', 'To serve place the rice on a plate, sprinkle some parsley over it. Place the fish on top and serve garnished with lemon twists.']

title: Pithori
method: ['Take gram flour in a bowl, add buttermilk, turmeric powder and salt and whisk well till smooth.', 'Heat 2 tsps ghee in a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds, fennel seeds, ginger,  1/4  tsp asafoetida, and green chillies, mix and saute for a few seconds.', 'Add the gram flour mixture and whisk well. Add fenugreek leaves and whisk well. Add salt and whisk and cook till the mixture leaves the sides of the pan.', 'Grease a thali with oil and add the gram flour mixture and spread it evenly. Let it cool down to room temperature.', 'Heat 1 tbsp ghee in another non-stick pan, mustard seeds, curry leaves, green chillies, sesame seeds,  1/4  tsp asafoetida and coriander leaves, mix well and saute for a few seconds. Pour this tempering over the gram flour mixture and spread it evenly.', 'Cut into squares, arrange them on a serving plate and serve with green chutney.']

title: Chilled Veg Rolls
method: ['Put cheese spread and pesto in a bowl and mix well.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Cut capsicum into thin strips and add to the pan. Add sea salt, crushed peppercorns and saute for 2-3 minutes. Add carrots and mix well. Cook on low heat for a few minutes. Remove from heat and cool down to room temperature.', 'Spread some of the cheese-pesto mixture on each tortilla.', 'Finely chop iceberg lettuce leaves.', 'Place a portion of vegetable mixture at one end of each tortilla, sprinkle lettuce leaves, 1 tbsp grated cheese, 2 rocket leaves and micro shoots on top and roll.', 'Wrap each roll in aluminum foil. Keep in the refrigerator overnight.', 'Unwrap the vegetable rolls, halve them, place on a serving plate, garnish with lollo rosso lettuce leaves and serve chilled.']

title: Dhaba Style Aloo Sabzi
method: ['Heat 3 tbsps mustard oil in a non-stick pan till it begins to smoke. Add potatoes and saute for 2 minutes.', 'Add quartered onions and green chillies, mix and saute for 2-3 minutes. Transfer them into a bowl.', 'Heat remaining mustard oil in the same non-stick pan till it begins to smoke. Add cumin seeds, mustard seeds, asafoetida, bay leaf, cinnamon stick, cloves and dried red chilli, mix and saute till fragrant.', 'Add chopped onion and garlic, mix well and saute till golden brown. Add tomato, mix and saute till pulpy.', 'Add salt,Turmeric Powder, coriander powder and red chilli powder, mix well and saute for 1 minute. Add  1/4  cup water, mix well, cover and cook for 3-4 minutes.', 'Add the potato-onion mixture, mix and cook for 1 minute. Add coriander leaves and mix well. Cover and cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander sprig and serve hot.']

title: Pizza Boat - SK Khazana
method: ['Preheat the oven at 180@C.', 'Dust flour on worktop, keep the dough on it and roll out into a 2 mm thick disc.', 'Grease a baking tray with some oil, place the rolled out disc on, fold it from two sides to shape like a boat.', 'Apply sauce in the middle of the dough boat, sprinkle  1/4  cup mozzarella cubes and grate the processed cheese over them. Spread chicken cubes, capsicums and cherry tomatoes. Sprinkle red chilli flakes, mixed herbs, hand torn basil leaves, black olive slices and the remaining mozzarella cheese on top. Sprinkle salt and drizzle 1 tbsp olive oil.', 'Brush the sides of the pizza boat with egg wash. Keep the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes.', 'Take it out of the oven and drizzle some olive oil. Garnish with basil leaves, halved cherry tomatoes and drizzle some olive oil. Serve hot.']

title: Spiced Chocolate Cookies
method: ['Preheat oven to 180deg C. Line a baking tray with a silicon mat.', 'Combine brown sugar, castor sugar and butter in a bowl and whisk well with an electric beater.', 'Break in eggs and whisk. Add melted dark chocolate and whisk well.', 'Sieve together flour, chilli powder, baking soda, cinnamon powder and cocoa powder into the mixture and whisk. Add chocolate chips and whisk well.', 'Fill a piping bag with this mixture and pipe out cookies on the lined baking tray.', 'Place the baking tray in preheated oven and bake for 10-12 minutes. Remove from oven and cool.', 'Dust some icing sugar on top and serve.']

title: Dhaba Style Aloo Palak
method: ['Heat sufficient water in a deep pan, add spinach leaves and blanch for 1-2 minutes. Drain them into ice cold water. Gently squeeze the excess water and set aside.', 'Transfer the spinach into a blender jar, add  1/4  cup water and blend to a fine paste.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds and let them change colour. Add green chillies, onion, ginger and garlic, mix and saute till onion turns translucent.', 'Add tomato and mix well. Add potatoes and mix well. Add salt and saute for 1 minute. Cover and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add turmeric powder, red chilli powder, cumin powder, coriander powder and garam masala and mix well.', 'Add the spinach paste. Rinse the blender jar with  1/2  cup water and add, mix well cover and cook for 4-5 minutes.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with ginger strips and serve hot with lachcha parantha.']

title: Spanish Chicken Croquetas
method: ['Heat butter in a nonstick pan, add flour and saute.', 'Add milk and stir continuously. Add nutmeg and mix well. Transfer into a bowl and keep in the refrigerator for half an hour.', 'Roughly chop chicken sausages and add this to the mixture.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Beat egg in a bowl.', 'Make a quenelle of the prepared mixture, dip in the egg and coat in breadcrumbs.', 'Deep-fry in hot oil till golden and crisp on both the sides.', 'Mix mayonnaise and grate lemon rind', 'Serve alongwith croquetas.']

title: Kheer Kadam
method: ['Remove excess of sugar syrup from the mini rasgullas. Grate the khoya finely and mix powdered sugar in it. Knead into a smooth dough. Add little milk if required to get the right consistency. Cook the mixture on high heat for two to three minutes.', 'Cool and add the rose essence and knead well. Divide the khoya mixture into sixteen equal balls. Lightly flatten the balls by pressing it in center using the thumb.', 'Thin the edges and place the mini rasgulla in it. Now cover the rasgulla with the khoya so that no part of the rasgulla is left exposed. Roll into balls. Powder the three tablespoons of khoya in a mixer.', 'Roll the balls in this to finish off the kheer kadam. Store refrigerated.']

title: Soya Burgers
method: ['Soak soya granules in milk for an hour. Crush a little in mixer. Chop one onion and cut the remaining two into roundels.', 'Heat two teaspoons of oil in a pan. Add chopped onions and green chillies and saute. Add soya granules, two tablespoons of tomato ketchup, one tablespoon of mustard paste, salt, coriander leaves and continue to saute till dry.', 'Remove from heat and transfer into a bowl. Set aside to cool slightly. Add boiled and grated potatoes and mix properly. Divide into four equal portions.', 'Take whole wheat flour in a bowl. Add salt, red chilli powder and a little water and mix to make a smooth batter. Take one portion of the soya-potato mixture, shape into a pattie. Dip in the flour batter and roll in brown breadcrumbs. Prepare three more patties.', 'Heat a little oil on a griddle plate. Place the patties on it and cook. Cut the burger buns. Separate onion roundels into rings. Heat two teaspoons of oil in a pan and saute the onion rings till golden brown. Drain and set aside.', 'Heat a tawa and roast the burger buns. Turn over the soya patties to cook on the other side. Apply the remaining tomato ketchup to the burger bases, place halved lettuce leaves and over it place some caramelized onion rings.', 'Place the soya pattie on top, cover it with a tomato slice and another halved lettuce leaf. Apply mustard paste to the top half of the burger bun and place over it.', 'Secure with a toothpick and serve.']

title: Batata Kaapa
method: ['Cut potatoes into half centimeter thick round slices and place them in a bowl. Add salt, red chilli powder, turmeric powder, sambhar powder and lemon juice, mix well and set aside.', 'Mix semolina and rice flour and spread on a plate.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan.', 'Roll potato slices in semolina-rice flour mixture and place them on the pan. Shallow-fry, turning sides, till potatoes are cooked and evenly done from both sides. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Gongura Chicken
method: ['Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan, add garlic and saute for a minute. Add green chillies and gongura leaves and mix well. Saute well.', 'Heat remaining oil in a non-stick kadai. Add ginger-garlic paste and saute. Add onion and saute for a minute.', 'Grind poppy seeds to a smooth paste with water as required.', 'Add cumin seeds and poppy seed paste to the onion and mix well. Add chicken and mix well.', 'Add salt, garam masala powder, cumin powder, coriander powder, red chilli powder and mix well. Sprinkle some water, cover and cook for 8-10 minutes.', 'Add sauteed gongura leaves and mix well. Cover and cook for 5 minutes or till chicken is fully cooked.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Apple and Goat Cheese Bruschetta
method: ['Lightly dry roast U.S. Pistachios in a pan. Cool slightly, transfer into a food processor. Add basil leaves, salt, garlic, parmesan cheese powder and 2 tbsps olive oil and process to a coarse mixture. This is pistachio pesto.', 'Diagonally slice the French baguette into 8 thick slices.', 'Heat 2 tsps olive oil in the same pan. Place the baguette slices and lightly toast them for 1-2 minutes. Flip the slices and drizzle remaining olive oil and continue to toast for 1-2 minutes.', 'Cut the Washington Apple into slices of medium thickness.', 'To make the bruschetta, spread a thick layer of pistachio pesto over each toast.', 'Horizontally halve the apple slices and arrange a few slices over each bruschetta. Place some goat cheese on top of each bruschetta and garnish with micro greens. Serve immediately.']

title: Amritsari Aloo Kulcha
method: ['Take refined flour in a bowl, add sugar, baking powder, salt, butter and milk, mix well and knead into soft dough. Cover with a damp cloth and set aside for 10-15 minutes.', 'Dust some flour on the worktop, place the dough and roll into a thick disc, apply a little butter and roll it. Roll the dough again and apply some more butter, roll it and pinch the edges to seal the dough.', 'Divide the dough into 4 equal portions and shape them into balls, set aside.', 'To make the stuffing, take potatoes in a bowl, add green chillies, chaat masala powder, crushed dried pomegranate seeds, coriander leaves, onion, salt, red chilli powder, garam masala powder, crushed coriander seeds and grated ginger and mix well.', 'Dust the worktop with flour, place each dough ball and roll it slightly, place some stuffing in the centre, bring the edges together and pinch to seal. Flatten the stuffed balls slightly and further roll into thick kulche.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa, place each kulcha, one at a time, on it. Brush a little water on top, sprinkle a little coriander leaves and dried fenugreek leaves and press lightly.', 'Turnover, drizzle a little ghee on top and turnover again and drizzle a little ghee on this side too. Cook on low heat, flipping sides till both sides are light golden.', 'Take it off the heat, place it on a worktop and crush each kulcha gently. Keep them on serving plate and serve hot with raita.']

title: Khau Swe
method: ['Heat oil in a pan. Add turmeric powder and onions and saute till onions soften.', 'Add garlic and ginger and saute for a minute.', 'Add cinnamon and bay leaf and continue to saute.', 'Add chicken, coriander powder, cumin powder and red chilli powder and mix.', 'Add chicken stock and salt and bring the mixture to a boil.', 'Cook till the chicken is almost done.', 'Meanwhile boil the noodles till just done.', 'Drain, refresh and drain again and set aside in a bowl.', 'Mix gram flour in quarter cup of water and add to the chicken.', 'Stir and cook till the gravy thickens.', 'Add fish sauce and mix. Add coconut milk and stir and let it heat through.', 'Pour the chicken gravy over the noodles.', 'Serve the condiments in separate bowls.', 'Each person then can add the condiments as per their choice and eat.']

title: Sindhi Mutton
method: ['Heat oil in anon-stick kadai, add cumin seeds, green cardamoms, black cardamom, cinnamon stick , cloves and bay leaves and saute for one to two minutes or till fragrant.', 'Add onions and saute till golden. Add green chillies and ginger-garlic paste for two to three minutes. Add mutton chops and sautefor one to two minutes.', 'Add red chilli powder, coriander powder and turmeric powder and mix well. Add three fourth cup water and mix well again.', 'Add tomatoes, yogurt and salt and mix well. Cover and cook on a low heat for fifteen to twenty minutes.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander sprigs and serve hot.']

title: Patra - SK Khazana
method: ['Take gram flour in a bowl, add jaggery, tamarind pulp, ginger paste, green chilli paste, garam masala powder, cumin powder, coriander powder, turmeric powder, red chilli powder and salt and mix well. Add sufficient water and mix well to make a smooth paste.', 'Place a leaf on the worktop, shiny side facing downwards. Apply the paste evenly all over. Place another leaf over it but with its tapering end in the opposite direction of the first one. Apply paste over this. Similarly place another leaf and apply the paste.', 'Fold in the four edges and gently roll into a cylinder. Apply paste to seal whenever required.', 'Heat sufficient water in a steamer. Place the rolls in the steamer container. Close the lid and steam for 10-15 minutes.', 'Take the rolls out of the steamer and place on the work top to cool. Cut into half inch thick slices.', 'Heat oil in a kadai, add mustard seeds. When they splutter, add sesame seeds and asafoetida. And the patra slices and toss gently.', 'Add coriander leaves and fresh coconut and mix again.', 'Arrange on a serving platter and serve hot.']

title: Strawberry and Bourbon Fool
method: ['Take whipped cream in a bowl. Add bourbon whiskey and fold in. Add sea salt, lemon juice and 3-4 tablespoons strawberry compote and fold in well.', 'Fill a piping bag with whipped cream mixture.', 'Put some strawberry compote on the side of individual tall glasses and swirl to create a pattern. Pipe in whipped cream mixture and top with some strawberry compote.', 'Serve immediately garnished with mint sprigs.']

title: Chocolate and Oats Lollipop
method: ['Grind together oats, walnuts and dates into a coarse mixture. Transfer in a bowl.', 'Divide the mixture into equal portions and shape them into medium size balls.', 'Melt dark chocolate in a double boiler. Remove from heat and whisk till smooth and tempered. Similarly, melt the white chocolate and temper it.', 'Insert small plastic sticks in the prepared balls to make lollipops. Dip the lollipops, one by one, in the melted dark and white chocolate and let the excess chocolate drip off. Refrigerate till set.', 'Serve.']

title: Corn Cakes
method: ['Grate sweet potatoes into a bowl, drain and add corn kernels with salt, red curry paste, scraped coconut, coriander leaves and rice flour and mix well. Divide this mixture into 8 equal portions, roll into balls and flatten them into cakes.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a non-stick pan.', 'Shallow-fry the cakes in hot oil, turning sides, till crisp and brown on both the sides. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Arrange the corn cakes on a serving plate, garnish with coriander sprig and serve hot.']

title: Boondi Sev ki Subzi
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick wok, add asafoetida, mustard seeds, cumin seeds and curry leaves.', 'When the seeds splutter add red chilli powder and onions and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add yogurt and mix. Add boondi and sev and mix.', 'Add green chilli, turmeric powder and salt and mix well.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.']

title: Pumpkin Halwa
ingredients: ['4 cups grated pumpkin', '1 1/2  tablespoons ghee', '2 cups full fat milk', ' 1/2  teaspoon green cardamom powder', 'A large pinch of saffron', 'A pinch of nutmeg powder', ' 3/4  cup granular sugar', ' 1/2  cup grated mawa', '2 tablespoons chopped cashewnuts', '1 1/2  tablespoons slivered almonds', '10-12 pistachios, blanched, peeled and slivered + for garnish', 'Silver warq for garnish', '5-6 cashewnuts, vertically halved and fried']
method: ['Heat ghee in a deep and wide non-stick pan. Add pumpkin, mix and saute for 4-5 minutes.', 'Add milk, green cardamom powder and saffron and mix. Add nutmeg powder and mix till well combined. Continue to cook, stirring in between, for 12-15 minutes or till the pumpkin softens and the mixture thickens.', 'Add sugar, mawa, cashewnuts, almonds and pistachios and mix. Cook, stirring, for 8-10 minutes or till the mixture thickens again.', 'Take the pan off the heat and transfer into serving bowls. Garnish with silver warq, fried cashewnuts and slivered pistachios.']
Main ingredients: Pumpkin, Ghee, Full fat milk, Green cardamom powder, Saffron, Nutmeg powder, Sugar, Mawa, Cashewnuts, Almonds, Pistachios

title: Fruity Muesli-Cook Smart
method: ['Take oats in a bowl, add apple juice and let it soak overnight in the refrigerator.', 'Grate apple, add to the soaked oats and mix well.', 'Cut almonds into slivers and roughly chop walnuts.', 'Reserve some of the nuts for garnishing and add the remaining to the oats. Add yogurt and honey and mix well.', 'Add pomegranate pears and mix well. Transfer into serving bowls and refrigerate to chill.', 'Serve chilled garnished with reserved nuts and pomegranate pearls.']

title: Fish Nuggets - SK Khazana
method: ['Take the fish pieces in a large bowl, add crushed black peppercorns, salt and ginger-garlic paste. Squeeze the juice of  1/2  lemon into it and mix well. Set aside to marinate for 15-20 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, break 2 eggs into another bowl. Add salt and crushed black peppercorns and whisk well with a fork.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Spread refined flour on one plate and dried breadcrumbs on another plate.', 'Coat each fish piece with flour, dip in the egg mixture and roll in the breadcrumbs.', 'Slide the fish pieces, a few at a time, into hot oil and deep-fry till golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Transfer onto a serving plate, garnish with parsley and serve hot with tartar sauce.']

title: Homemade Bread Rolls
method: ['Take yeast in a small bowl. Add castor sugar and 2-3 tablespoons warm water, mix and set aside for 5 minutes to activate.', 'Take flour in a mixing bowl. Make a wall in the center, add activated yeast, milk powder and salt and mix. Add some water and knead into a soft dough.', 'Add butter and knead again. Cover with damp muslin cloth and set aside to prove for 10-15 minutes.', 'Grease a baking tray with some oil.', 'Dust the worktop with some flour, place the dough and knock back to release excess air.', 'Divide the dough into equal portions, shape into balls and place on the greased baking tray.', 'Cover with damp muslin cloth and set aside to prove for 10-15 minutes.', 'Preheat oven to 180deg C.', 'Brush some milk on top of the doughballs and sprinkle some dried mixed herbs. Place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes, basting with some butter.', 'Serve hot with tomato basil soup.']

title: Seafood Moilee Spaghetti
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick kadai, add mustard seeds and when they splutter, add ginger, green chillies and mix. Add curry leaves and mix. Add onions and saute for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add approximately 1 cup water, turmeric powder and mix well.', 'Add coconut milk, spaghetti and cook for half a minute. Add salt and 1 cup water. Cook, stirring continuously, till the spaghetti is cooked.', 'Add prawns and fish and mix well. Cook for 5-6 minutes and switch off the heat.', 'Transfer the spaghetti into a serving bowl. Sprinkle lemon juice, garnish with thin strips of tomato, basil leaves and lemon wedge and serve hot.']

title: Mahi Tikka Achari
method: ['Grind fennel seeds, fenugreek seeds, mustard seeds and onion seeds coarsely in a mixer and transfer into a bowl. Take yogurt in another bowl, add the ground spices, red chilli powder, turmeric powder, salt, garlic paste and ginger paste and mix well. Heat mustard oil in a small non stick pan. When it begins to smoke switch off the heat.', 'Cut fish fillets into large chunks, sprinkle a little salt on them. Add to the spiced yogurt. Squeeze the juice of a lemon and add and mix. Add gram flour to the mustard oil and stir till the raw smell disappears. Add it to the fish in yogurt and mix well. Set aside for a while. Preheat oven to 250degC/475degF.', 'Line a baking tray with a silicon sheet. Place the fish pieces over it and keep the tray in the preheated oven. Cook for 10-15 minutes. Baste with a little oil and cook for 1-2 minutes more. You can also pan fry the fish pieces. Serve hot.']

title: Kumara Salad
method: ['Preheat oven to 180degC.', 'Put sweet potato cubes in a baking dish and pour one tablespoon oil on top. Sprinkle a pinch of salt and crushed peppercorns and roast in the preheated oven for twenty-five minutes or until soft. Remove from oven and cool down to room temperature.', 'Put lettuce, cherry tomatoes and radishes in a serving bowl. Add the roasted sweet potato and mix. Sprinkle feta cheese and pinenuts on top.', 'Drizzle olive oil and balsamic vinegar and serve immediately.']

title: Mango Mazaa
method: ['Mix all the ingredients and blend in a blender till smooth. Pour into a glass bowl and set in the freezer to freeze till properly set. Scoop out with a scooper and serve.']

title: Hearty Bites
method: ['Grate the boiled eggs into a bowl. Add the onion, French beans, carrot, spinach, cornflour, salt, pepper powder, mustard paste and tomato ketchup.', 'Add the breadcrumbs and mix well.', 'Divide the mixture into eight equal portions and shape each portion into a heart shaped tikki.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan and shallow fry the tikkis on medium heat till golden brown on both the sides.', 'Drain on absorbent paper. Serve hot.']

title: Jain Paneer Rice Cutlet
method: ['Combine rice, cottage cheese, bell peppers, green chillies, chopped mint, torn parsley sprigs, salt and wheat flour in a bowl and mix well.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan.', 'Divide the prepared mixture into equal portions. Take each portion, shape it into tikkis and coat with semolina.', 'Shallow-fry tikkis in hot oil till golden and crisp from both sides. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot topped with tomato ketchup and garnished with parsley sprigs.']

title: Quick Pressure Cooker Chicken Curry
method: ['Heat ghee in a pressure cooker. Add green cardamoms, cloves and cinnamon and saute. You can add oil if required.', 'Squeeze water from grated onion and add. Mix and saute till onions are well browned.', 'Add garlic paste, ginger paste. Mix and saute well.', 'Add turmeric powder, red chilli powder, coriander powder, cumin powder. Mix well and saute well.', 'Add tomato puree and salt. Mix well and cook for 2 minutes.', 'Add chicken and mix well. Cook for about 3-4 minutes, mixing at intervals.', 'Add chopped coriander and mix well. Add 1 1/2  cups water and stir to mix. Cover and pressure cook till 3 whistles.', 'Switch off heat and let the pressure reduce completely. Remove lid and add garam masala powder. Mix well.', 'Serve hot garnished with chopped coriander leaves.']

title: Zoph Loaf
method: ['Mix yeast with a pinch castor sugar and some water in a bowl. Heat in a microwave for 10 seconds. Remove from heat, whisk and set aside to activate.', 'Sieve refined flour and multigrain flour one after the other into a bowl and mix well. Add salt and 1 tablespoon castor sugar and mix well. Make a well in the center, add activated yeast and mix well. Add some water and knead into soft dough.', 'Dust the worktop with some refined flour, place the dough and knead till it can be stretched without breaking. Add butter and knead again till well incorporated.', 'Dust the worktop with some refined flour, divide the dough into 2 portions and roll them into a thin log.', 'Grease a baking tray with some butter and dust some refined flour.', 'Place one log horizontally on the worktop and place the other log vertically on it in the centre. Fold the edges of the two logs overlapping each other, till both logs are fully used and seal the open ends.', 'Place the loaf on the greased baking tray, cover with damp muslin cloth and prove for 20-25 minutes.', 'Preheat oven at 180o C. Break egg into a bowl, whisk and brush it on top of proven loaf. Place the baking tray in preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes. Remove from oven and brush some melted butter on top.', 'Cool and serve.']

title: Masaledar Machchli
method: ['Place fish slices in a bowl and marinate with turmeric powder,  3/4  tsp red chilli powder, salt, garam masala powder and tamarind paste for about 15 minutes.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a non stick pan.', 'Apply rice flour to the marinated fish slices, place them on the pan, cover and shallow fry, turning sides till they turn golden on both sides.', 'Place the onion slices on a serving plate, sprinkle some of the remaining red chilli powder and a little chaat masala over them. Arrange lemon slices over them.', 'Drain the fish slices on absorbent paper. Transfer the slices onto the plate. Sprinkle some chaat masala and red chilli powder over them and serve hot.']

title: Lemon Strawberry Tart
method: ['Preheat oven to 180degC. To make crust, combine refined flour, almond flour, salt and powdered sugar in a bowl. Place it in the cake batter mixer and add butter. Start mixing on a low speed till well blended or it reached a breadcrumb consistency.', 'Add egg and blend further on very low speed for about a minute.Remove from the powder and mix the dough using your hands.', 'Place dough on a cling film, spread evenly, wrap and seal it. Refrigerate for 2-3 hours or till firm.Take a portion of the dough and roll it on a worktop dusted with flour. Place the rolled dough on a tray lined with butter paper and refrigerate for 10 mi', 'Flatten the refrigerated dough and cut out roundels from it using a cookie cutter. Line empty tart shells with the roundels. Trim the edges and prick with a fork.Place the tart shells on a baking tray, put in the preheated oven and bake for 12 minutes.', 'Remove from heat and take the crust out of the tart shells. Brush them with little cocoa butter. Put spoonful of strawberry marmalade into each shell and place them on a tray lined with butter paper.To make filling, mix gelatin with 1 teaspoon water and a', 'Combine lemon juice and lemon zest in a deep non-stick pan and put it on heat. Mix well and add sugar. Mix again till well blended and bring it to a boil. Remove the pan from heat.Add eggs to egg yolks and whisk well.', 'Add some of the cooked lemon mixture to whisked eggs and mix well. Add this to the pan with remaining lemon mixture and whisk well.Put the pan back on heat and cook on low heat. Keep whisking to ensure that the mixture does not curdle.', 'Remove from heat and add the butter and bloomed gelatin. Whisk till smooth.Add chocolate and keep whisking till the chocolate melts. Transfer in a bowl and let it cool.', 'Pour the cooked lemon mixture in a piping bag and pipe out portions in the tart shells with strawberry marmalade. Refrigerate for 15-20 minutes.', 'Garnish with strawberry slices and serve chilled.']

title: Pesto Pizza
method: ['Place the pizza bases on table top.', 'Spread two tablespoons of pesto sauce on each. Sprinkle sundried tomatoes and black olives.', 'Top it up with mozzarella cheese slices.', 'Heat a non stick pan. Place the pizza in it, drizzle one tablespoon olive oil over. Cover and cook till the cheese melts.', 'Cut into wedges and serve.']

title: Sabudana Papad
ingredients: ['1 cup sago', 'Salt to taste', '1 teaspoon cumin seeds', 'Oil to deep fry']
method: ['Transfer the sago in bowl and wash it thoroughly.  Add 1 cup water and soak for 6-8 hours.', 'Transfer in a nonstick pan and add salt, cumin seeds and 5 cups water.', 'Cook on medium heat till sago mixture is transparent and the sago is cooked.', 'Spread spoonful of mixture on a plastic sheet and spread lightly. Sundry for 2 days.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai and deep fry the papads till crisp.', 'Drain on absorbent paper and serve.']

title: Rose Ice Cream
method: ['Whip cream in a bowl. Add honey, rose syrup and whip again. Add gulkand, dried rose petals and mix well.', 'Place vanilla ice cream in a big bowl and add the above mixture to it and mix well.', 'Pour into a plastic ice cream box and close the lid. Keep it in the freezer to set completely. Scoop out into individual bowls and serve.']

title: Dal Gujiya
method: ['Knead wheat flour with sufficient water into a stiff dough. Cover with a damp cloth and let it rest for some time.', 'Boil urad dal and chana dal with turmeric powder, salt and sufficient water till just done. Drain and grind coarsely.', 'Heat 2 tbsps oil in a non stick pan. Add asafoetida, cumin seeds and garlic paste and saute lightly. Add the ground dal and mix.', 'Add red chilli powder, amchur, salt and coriander leaves and mix well. Transfer the mixture into a bowl.', 'Divide dough into equal portions and roll into balls. Apply a little oil on the balls and roll them into small puris.', 'Place a portion of the dal mixture on one side of each puri, fold the other side over to make the gujiyas.', 'Heat sufficient water in a boiler, add the gujiyas and poach them.', 'Heat the remaining oil in a non stick pan. Place the gujiyas in the pan and cook, turning sides, till evenly golden on all sides. Sprinkle red chilli powder and amchur over them.', 'Transfer on to a serving plate, garnish with a mint sprig and serve hot.']

title: Blueberry Yogurt Smoothie
method: ['Take yogurt in a blender jar, add blueberries, honey and blend. Add milk and mixed nuts and blend into a smooth mixture.', 'Put 1 tablespoon basil seeds in each tall glass, pour the smoothie into them and serve immediately.']

title: Korean Street Toast
ingredients: ['1 medium cabbage, shredded', '1 large carrot, peeled and cut into thin strips', '8 white bread slices', '5-6 spring onion bulbs, sliced', '5-6 tablespoons chopped spring onion greens', 'Salt to taste', 'A pinch of black pepper powder', '8 eggs', 'Butter as required', 'Castor sugar for sprinkling', 'Tomato ketchup for drizzling']
method: ['Take cabbage in a bowl, add carrot, spring onion bulbs, spring onion greens, salt and black pepper powder. Break eggs directly into the bowl and mix well.', 'Heat some butter on a non-stick tawa, add  1/4  cabbage-egg mixture. Cook for 1-2 minutes on medium heat.', 'Shape into a square with the help of spatula. Add butter and cook for 3-4 minutes. Baste with butter in between and continue to cook till golden brown.', 'Flip and cook the other side for 3-4 minutes as well.', 'Push the omelette onto one side of the tawa. Apply some butter on the other side and place 2 white bread slices and apply some butter on top. Toast for 2-3 minutes on both sides.', 'Apply some butter on the omelette and cook till golden brown and the cabbage caramelizes.', 'To make the sandwich, place the omelette on a toasted bread slice and sprinkle some castor sugar. Drizzle some tomato ketchup and place the remaining bread slice on top.', 'Make more omelette sandwiches with the remaining mixture and bread slices.', 'Diagonally halve each sandwich, place on a serving plate and serve immediately.']
Main ingredients: Cabbage, Carrot, White bread slices, Spring onions with greens, Eggs, Butter, Castor sugar

title: Baked Oats and Fruits
method: ['Preheat oven to 180o C.', 'Take oats, walnut kernels, baking powder, cinnamon powder and sugar into a mixing bowl and mix well.', 'Break eggs into another mixing bowl and beat with an electric beater. Add milk and maple syrup and continue to beat. Add vanilla essence and butter and beat again.', 'Peel and diagonally slice the bananas. Make a layer of bananas in a glass baking dish. Sprinkle raisins over them.', 'Spread the oats mixture over the raisins. Pour the egg-milk mixture and ensure that it reaches the bottom of the dish. Drizzle strawberry jam all over the top.', 'Place the dish in the preheated oven and bake for 40-45 minutes. Remove the dish from the oven.', 'Scoop out ladleful of baked oats and fruits onto serving plates and serve immediately.']

title: Gujarati Dal-SK Khazana
method: ['Put the pigeon peas in a pressure cooker, add 3 cups of water, fenugreek seeds, peanuts, turmeric powder, salt and  1/2  teaspoon ghee, close the cooker with the lid and cook under pressure till 2-3 whistles are given out. Reduce heat and simmer for 5 minutes.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon ghee in a non-stick pan, add mustard seeds and let them splutter.', 'Add cumin seeds and saute for a few seconds. Add asafoetida and saute for 30 seconds.', 'Add curry leaves, green chillies and red chillies and saute for a minute. Add cooked pigeon peas and little water, mix and simmer for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add kokum petals and jaggery, mix well and bring to a boil. Add some more water, mix and boil for 5-10 minutes.', 'Add lemon juice and mix well.', 'Garnish with coriander leaves, drizzle  1/2  teaspoon ghee on top and serve hot with steamed rice.']

title: Bharwan Til Aloo - SK Khazana
method: ['Mix together cottage cheese, coriander leaves, mint leaves, cashewnuts, ginger, chilli powder, dried mango powder, cumin powder and salt in a bowl.', 'Stuff the potatoes with the prepared mixture and cut into thick slices.', 'Mix together sesame seeds and salt in another bowl.', 'Coat the slices with the sesame mixture.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a non-stick pan. Place the slices in it and shallow-fry, turning sides, till golden brown and crisp.', 'Garnish with coriander leaves and serve immediately.']

title: Spicy Green Olives
ingredients: ['250 grams green olives with seeds', '1 tablespoon fennel seeds (saunf)', '2 teaspoons black peppercorns', '3-4 sprigs of fresh rosemary', '3-4 sprigs of fresh thyme', '3-4 sprigs of fresh oregano', '15-16 garlic cloves', '1 teaspoon crushed red chillies', '1 teaspoon dried mixed herbs', '4 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', 'Sea salt to taste']
method: ['Give a small slit on the olives. Dry roast fennel seeds and peppercorns in a non-stick pan till fragrant. Cool slightly, crush them in a mortar with a pestle and put into a bowl.', 'Chop fresh rosemary, thyme and oregano finely and put into the bowl.  Add the olives.', 'Crush garlic cloves and add. Add crushed red chillies and dried mixed herbs and mix.', 'Heat extra virgin olive oil slightly.', 'Add sea salt to the olives and mix well. Pour the warm olive oil over them and mix well.', 'Transfer the mixture into a bottle and let them marinate for 3-4 days before serving.']

title: Mawa Til ke Laddoo
method: ['Dry roast sesame seeds in a non-stick pantill light brown in color.Cool, put in a mixer jar and grind coarsely.', 'Add khoya to the same pan and sautefor a minute. Add ghee and saute till khoya turns golden.', 'Transfer the mixture into a bowl, add ground sesame seeds, powdered sugar, pistachios, cashewnuts, almonds and cardamom powder and mix well.', 'Divide the mixture into equal medium sized portions and roll them into laddooswhile the mixture is warm.', 'Arrange them on a serving plate and serve.']

title: Angel Food Cake with Creme Anglaise
method: ['Preheat oven to 180deg C. Grease a baking tin with some butter and dust with some flour.', 'Take egg whites in a bowl. Add cream of tartar and whisk well using an electric beater. Add half the castor sugar and whisk well till soft peaks appear. Refrigerate.', 'Sift together flour, salt, baking soda and remaining castor sugar in another bowl.', 'Add flour mixture gradually to egg white mixture and fold in well. Transfer into the greased baking tin and tap.', 'Place the tin in the preheated oven and bake for 25 minutes. Remove from heat, cool and demould.', 'To prepare creme anglaise, heat cream in a non-stick pan. Slit the vanilla pod, add to pan and whisk.', 'Take egg yolks in another bowl. Add castor sugar and whisk. Add some vanilla cream mixture and whisk well.', 'Add yolk-cream mixture to remaining vanilla cream mixture in the pan, switch on heat, whisk and cook for 30 seconds.', 'Strain the mixture into another bowl and chill in the refrigerator.', 'Halve the cake horizontally and cut them into roundels with a medium sized cookie cutter.', 'Put 3 tablespoons creme anglaise into individual martini glasses and place one cake roundel on top. Spread some blueberry compote over and put whipped cream quenelles on top.', 'Garnish with mint sprigs and serve immediately.']

title: Tropical Cream Pie
method: ['Take cornflour in a bowl. Add milk and whisk. Add yolks and whisk well.', 'Pour this mixture into a small deep non-stick pan and heat. Add castor sugar, whisk and cook till it melts. Add 1/2  teaspoon vanilla essence, whisk and cook till the mixture thickens. Transfer into a bowl, cover with cling film and refrigerate to chill.', 'Take half the whipped cream, half the pineapple and half the bloomed gelatin in another bowl and mix. Add  1/4  teaspoon vanilla essence and mix well.', 'Transfer  1/2  cornflour mixture into another bowl. Add half the coconut and mix well.', 'Fill the pie shells with this coconut mixture and spread whipped cream mixture on top. Refrigerate prepared pies for 2-3 hours.', 'Make another pie similarly.', 'Top with some pineapple, cut into wedges and serve.']

title: Pesto Mozzarella Sandwich - SK Khazana
method: ['Preheat the oven to 180deg C.', 'To make pesto sauce put garlic cloves, parmesan cheese powder and pinenuts in a blender jar and grind.', 'Add basil leaves, olive oil, salt and crushed black pepper and grind again into not too smooth paste. Transfer the pesto into a bowl.', 'Slice the brown pavs without cutting through and place them on a baking tray. Cut fresh mozzarella into round slices.', 'Spread pesto paste between each slice. Insert a cheese slice and a tomato slice alternately in between the slices. Keep the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 8-10 minutes.', 'Transfer them onto a serving platter, garnish with micro green and serve immediately.']

title: Simple Sesame Noodles
method: ['Roast sesame seeds in a non-stick pan till fragrant and light brown. Transfer into a bowl.', 'Heat sesame oil in the same pan. Add ginger and garlic and saute for a minute.', 'Add noodles and salt and toss. Add soy sauce and toss.', 'Add toasted sesame seeds, reserving some for garnishing, and toss lightly.', 'Add vinegar and toss.', 'Garnish with spring onion greens and reserved sesame seeds and serve hot.']

title: Margarita Pops
method: ['Put sugar and lemon juice in a jar and mix well. Add orange juice and mix well.', 'Fill each cavity of a silicone popsicle mould with a few fresh pomegranate pearls, orange segments and mint leaves.', 'Pour the prepared mixture into each mould and mix gently. Cover the moulds and freeze for 6-8 hours.', 'Take the moulds out of the refrigerator, de-mould and serve immediately.']

title: Soya Galouti Parantha
method: ['Mix together the wheat flour, salt and 1 tablespoon ghee in a bowl. Add sufficient water and knead into a soft dough.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon ghee in a non-stick pan. Add ginger-garlic paste and saute for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add gram flour, mix and saute till fragrant. Add soya granules, mix and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add chilli powder, garam masala powder, mace powder and cardamom powder, mix well and saute for 4-5 minutes. Remove from heat and cool down to room temperature.', 'Blend together soya mixture, browned onion paste and kewra essence to a smooth mixture. Transfer into a bowl, add salt and saffron along with the water and mix well.', 'Divide the dough into 8 equal portions and stuff each with a portion of the soya mixture, seal the edges and shape into balls. Roll out into thick paranthas.', 'Heat some ghee on a non-stick tawa and shallow-fry the paranthas, turning sides, till evenly done on both the sides.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Jain Cheese Balls
method: ['Mix cheese, banana, capsicum, pepper powder, chilli flakes, oregano, salt in a bowl. Add coriander and cornflour and mix well.', 'Divide the mixture into equal portions, shape them into balls.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'To make slurry, mix refined flour and some water in a bowl.', 'Spread breadcrumbs on a plate.', 'Dip the balls in slurry, coat them in breadcrumbs and deep-fry in hot oil till brown and crisp. Drain on an absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot with cheese and coriander.']

title: Andhra Chilli Chicken
method: ['Deseed dried red chillies and put into a mixer jar. Add garlic, ginger, rice, 2 tbsps lemon juice, salt and grind. Add 10-12 curry leaves and continue to grind to a smooth paste.', 'Put the paste into a large bowl, add chicken pieces and yogurt and mix well. Add remaining lemon juice and mix till the masala coats all the chicken pieces well.', 'Chop remaining curry leaves and add to the chicken and mix and set aside to marinate for 2-3 hours. Heat oil in a non stick pan. Roll the chicken pieces in refined flour, shake off extra flour and place in the pan and cook on medium heat till the underside is lightly browned.', 'Turn over and cook till the other side is similarly cooked. Chop coriander leaves and add to the chicken. Sprinkle a little water, reduce heat, cover and cook for 7-8 minutes.', 'Serve hot garnished with onion rings, thin strips of green, red and yellow capsicums.']

title: Cake
method: ['Preheat oven to 180deg C. Grease a loaf tin with some butter and dust with some flour.', 'Cream together butter and castor sugar in a bowl with an electric beater. Break in eggs, one by one, and whisk well.', 'Sieve together flour and baking powder into another bowl. Add almond slivers, pistachios and raisins and mix. Add oats and mix well.', 'Fold mixed fruit pulp and flour mixture gradually into the egg mixture. Add mixed fruit juice and mix well.', 'Pour the batter into the greased loaf tin and tap.', 'Place the tin in the preheated oven and bake for 30-35 minutes. Remove from oven, cool and demould.', 'Slice and serve.']

title: Panchakhadya
method: ['Dry roast coconut and poppy seeds separately on low heat till golden brown and crisp. Remove from heat and set aside to cool.', 'Mix together roasted coconut, poppy seeds, almonds, pistachios, cashewnuts and dates in a bowl.', 'Add powdered sugar, cardamom powder and nutmeg powder and mix well.', 'Serve.']

title: Thandai Tuile Cigars
method: ['To make roasted almonds, heat butter in a non-stick pan. Add almonds and roast on low heat for 3-4 minutes. Set aside.', 'To make fennel tuile, Preheat oven at 180degC. Mix together icing sugar, refined flour, butter, fennel seeds and crushed black peppercorns in a bowl. Add 25 ml water and mix well into a smooth batter.', 'Place a silicon mat on a baking tray and pour the batter using a tablespoon so that we get same sized tuiles. Leave sufficient distance between each. Place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 5-6 minutes or till the edges turn golden.', 'Remove the tray from the oven and let it cool for 1 minute. Carefully lift the biscuits and roll them on the handle of a wooden spoon, one at a time, to get a cylindrical shape. Remove them gently after they are cooled. Repeat the same process with rest of the batter.', 'To make rose mascarpone cream, mix mascarpone cheese, icing sugar, whipped cream, candied rose petals, rose extract, dried rose petals and mix well. Fill the mixture into a piping bag.', 'Crush roasted almonds in a garlic chopper and put in a bowl.', 'Pipe the filling into the tuile biscuits from both sides and coat the edges with crushed roasted almonds.', 'Arrange them on a serving plate and serve immediately.']

title: Grilled Chicken And Mushroom Salad
method: ['Marinate the chicken breasts in salt, pepper powder, mustard paste and garlic paste for twenty minutes. Mix together all the ingredients for the dressing. Grill the chicken breasts for ten to twelve minutes. Cool, slice and set aside.', 'Brush the mushrooms with oil and grill for two minutes. Cut into quarters and set aside. Brush the yellow and red capsicums with oil and grill for ten minutes, turning them once or twice to cook evenly.', 'Cut in half, remove the seeds, slice and set aside. Place the chicken, mushrooms, capsicums, olives and lettuce in a large bowl. Pour the dressing over the salad and toss well to mix. Serve immediately.']

title: Gulab Jamun
method: ['Cook the sugar with four cups of water till the sugar dissolves. Add green cardamom power and mix. Keep the syrup warm.', 'Mix the milk powder, refined flour and soda bicarbonate well together. Add two teaspoons oil and enough yogurt and knead lightly into a soft dough. Take care not to knead the dough too much.', 'Divide the dough into marble sized balls.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai and deep fry the balls over medium heat, stirring occasionally, till golden brown. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Add the gulab jamuns to the warm syrup and let it soak for about fifteen minutes to half an hour before serving.']

title: Soya Granules Biryani
method: ['Heat ghee in a thick-bottomed pan, add cinnamon, cardamoms, cloves, caraway seeds, and cumin seeds. When they begin to change colour, add chopped onions and continue to saute.', 'Add ginger paste, garlic paste and a little water to onions and continue to saute. Add coriander powder, turmeric powder, red chilli powder and tomatoes. Mix and saute.', 'Add salt and mix. Add soaked soya granules, green peas and green chillies. Cover and cook.', 'Boil soaked rice till three fourth done. Drain. Add chopped coriander leaves and half a teaspoon of garam masala powder to the soya granules gravy and mix well.', 'Preheat the oven to 175degC. Take an earthenware pot (mitti ki handi). Put a layer of half the parboiled rice over which layer half the fried onions, mint leaves, rose petals and saffron dissolved in milk.', 'Sprinkle some garam masala powder and pour the soya granules in gravy.', 'Again put layers of the remaining rice, fried onions, mint leaves, rose petals, saffron milk and garam masala powder.', 'Place the lid on the pot and seal the edges with dough. Cook in the oven at 175degC for fifteen minutes.', 'Break open the dough seal and serve hot with a raita of your choice.']

title: Honey Chilli Potatoes
ingredients: [' 1/2  teaspoon honey', ' 1/2  teaspoon dried red chilli flakes', ' 1/2  teaspoon chilli powder', ' 1/2  teaspoon red chilli sauce', '200 grams frozen potato wedges', '2 teaspoons oil + for deep frying', '1 teaspoon finely chopped garlic', ' 1/2  teaspoon finely chopped ginger', '2-3 spring onion bulbs, finely chopped', '2 tablespoons chopped spring onion greens + for garnish', '2 teaspoons chopped fresh coriander leaves + for garnish']
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a kadai, deep fry the potato wedges till golden brown and crisp. Drain on an absorbent paper.', 'Cut the bigger pieces of the potato wedges in half.', 'Heat 2 teaspoons oil in a wok, add garlic, ginger, spring onion bulbs and saute for a minute.', 'Add the fried potato wedges and toss well.', 'Add dried red chilli flakes and chilli powder and mix well.', 'Add red chilli sauce and mix well. Add spring onion greens, chopped coriander, honey and salt and toss till well combined.', 'Transfer the prepared mixture on a serving plate, garnish with spring onion greens and chopped coriander and serve hot.']

title: Chicken Gold Coin - SK Khazana
method: ['Put chicken mince in a blender jar and grind to fine paste. Transfer into a bowl. Add cornflour, garlic, ginger, salt, white pepper powder, green chillies, dark soy sauce and egg white, and mix well. ,Add onion and mix well.', 'Cut the bread slices into 8 roundels with a medium sized round cookie cutter. Break an egg in another bowl and whisk well.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai', 'Brush all the bread roundels on one side with the egg and place some chicken mixture over them. Brush some more egg over the chicken mixture and sprinkle sesame seeds.', 'Slide in these coins, chicken side downwards, into hot oil and deep-fry turning sides till both sides are evenly golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Arrange them on a serving platter, sprinkle some spring onion slices and serve hot with Schezwan sauce.']

title: Coffee
method: ['Boil milk in a deep non-stick pan.', 'Place sugar and coffee powder in an individual coffee mug. Add  1/2  tablespoon milk in it and beat well for 12 minutes or till creamy. Add  1/2  tablespoon milk and continue beating.', 'Add boiled milk and stir lightly. Serve hot.']

title: Quinoa and Vegetable Pulao
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan.', 'Slice spring onion bulbs. Reserve the stems.', 'Add cumin seeds, cloves and garlic cloves to the pan.', 'Slit green chillies without cutting through and add alongwith spring onion bulbs and saute well.', 'Chop spring onion stems and add.', 'Quarter mushrooms and add. Toss and saute well.', 'Add quinoa and mix well. Add vegetable stock and salt, mix and cook till the mixture come to a boil.', 'Add green peas and mix well. Add milk, mix, cover and cook on medium heat till fully done.', 'Garnish with micro greens and serve hot.']

title: Chicken Stew- Sk Khazana
method: ['Heat coconut oil in an earthen pot, add cinnamon, clove, black peppercorns, curry leaves, green chillies and onion, mix well and saute till onion is translucent.', 'Add chicken and saute for 2-3 minutes. Add salt, mix well, cover and cook for 8-10 minutes or till chicken is almost done.', 'Add coconut milk and mix well. Cover and cook for 5-6 minutes or till the chicken is cooked completely.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot with steamed rice.']

title: Bhurji Pav - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a non-stick pan, add onions and saute till translucent. Add green chillies\nand saute till onions turn a light golden.', 'Break eggs into a bowl and beat well.', 'Add tomatoes to sauteed onions and saute till soft. Add chilli powder, cumin powder, coriander powder, turmeric powder and salt and saute till tomatoes become soft.', 'Add milk to beaten eggs and beat well. Pour the egg mixture into the pan, mix continuously till they get scrambled and are done. Add coriander leaves and mix well.', 'Heat butter and remaining oil in another non-stick pan.', 'Slit the pavs keeping one side intact, place them in the pan, with cut side downwards, and toast turning sides till both sides are light golden brown.', 'Transfer bhurji into a serving bowl, garnish with a coriander sprig and serve hot with toasted pavs.']

title: Strawberry Yogurt Icecream
method: ['Take yogurt in a bowl, add strawberry compote and condensed milk and mix well.', 'Fill the mixture equally into paper cups and insert popsicle sticks in the middle. Freeze for 7-8 hours.', 'Tear off the sides of the paper cups gently and remove the popsicles. Serve immediately.']

title: Cake Pops
method: ['Take dark chocolate in a bowl and melt it in the microwave for 30 seconds.', 'Tear the cake into pieces, put it in a chopper jar and process to make crumbs.', 'Transfer the crumbs into a bowl, add sugar syrup and mix. Divide the mixture into small equal portions and shape them into balls. Put them into individual paper cups, arrange them on a plate, prick a toothpick into each ball and keep the plate in the refrigerator to chill.', 'Put some colourful candied vermicelli into empty paper cups. Dip each cake ball in the melted chocolate and keep each of them in a paper cup with the vermicelli.', 'Sprinkle some more vermicelli over the pops, keep them in the refrigerator to set.', 'Arrange them on a serving platter and serve chilled.']

title: Chicken and Cheese Enchiladas
method: ['Preheat oven at 180o C.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan, add  3/4  cup onions and garlic and saute till lightly browned.', 'Finely chop green chilli and add to the pan.', 'Cut chicken into thin strips and add to the pan. Add salt,  1/2  teaspoon crushed peppercorns and mix well. Add  1/2  teaspoon mixed herbs, chilli flakes, fresh cream and cheddar cheese and mix well. Cook for 2-3 minutes. Transfer this on a plate.', 'Heat remaining oil in another non-stick pan, add remaining onions and saute till translucent. Add baked beans and mix well. Mash lightly with the back of the ladle. Add  1/4  cup water and mix well. Add salt, remaining mixed herbs, chilli flakes, crushed peppercorns and mix well.', 'Spread prepared chicken on each tortilla and roll. Similarly prepare the rest.', 'Place the rolled tortillas in a baking tray, pour the prepared baked bean mixture over it. Grate mozzarella cheese over it. Put the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 8-10 minutes.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Cheese and Paneer Tarlets
method: ['Preheat oven to 180degC.', 'Trim edges of bread slices and flatten them with rolling pin. Place in muffin tray and put a glass bowl on each cavity. Remove bowls after few minutes.', 'Drizzle little oil on slices and place bowls again and bake in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes.', 'Mix cheese cubes, paneer cubes, jalapenos, black olives, cherry tomatoes, salt, pepper powder and torn basil leaves in a bowl.', 'Remove muffin tray from the oven and remove the glass bowls. Fill the bread cups with a spoonful of cheese mixture and put it back in oven and bake for 3-4 minutes more.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Mexican Cheesy Chicken
method: ['Preheat oven to 180degC. Heat oil in a non stick pan, add garlic and chicken and saute till lightly coloured. Sprinkle salt.', 'Grind rajma with a little of the water in which it was boiled, salt, paprika, coriander leaves, juice of  1/2  lemon and grind till smooth. Pour this into a baking dish.', 'Add onion to chicken along with tomatoes, red capsicum, jalapenos, cumin powder, red chilli powder and mix.', 'Transfer this into the baking dish over the rajma sauce. Place corn chips all around the edges of the dish.', 'Sprinkle cheese and bake in the preheated oven for 10-15 minutes or till chicken gets cooked and cheese bubbles.Serve hot.']

title: Srilankan Mud Crab Curry -SK Khazana
method: ['Heat a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds and black peppercorns and dry roast for 1 minute or till fragrant. Add coconut, mix and saute till golden brown.', 'Transfer the mixture into a blender jar, add a little water and blend to a smooth paste.', 'Heat oil in a deep earthen pot, add mustard seeds and let them splutter. Add fennel seeds, green chillies, curry leaves and onions, mix and saute till golden brown.', 'Add turmeric powder, red chilli powder and curry powder, mix well and saute on medium heat for 1 minute.', 'Add the coconut paste, mix well and saute for 2-3 minutes. Add  1/2  cup water, mix well and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add crabs and salt and mix well. Add 3 cups water and mix well. Let the mixture come to a boil, cover and cook till the crabs are cooked completely.', 'Add coconut milk and mix well. Add tamarind pulp, mix well and ook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add moringa leaves, squeeze the juice of  1/2  lemon and mix well. Take the pan off the heat.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with moringa leaves and serve hot.']

title: Chilli Mushroom Fried Rice
method: ['Heat the oil in a wok; add the ginger, garlic and green chillies and stir-fry for two minutes. Add the spring onions, mushrooms, white pepper powder and salt, and stir-fry over high heat for two minutes.', 'Add the rice, soy sauce and spring onion greens. Stir-fry over high heat for three minutes.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Drunk Chicken-SK Khazana
method: ['Put chicken drumsticks in a bowl. Add ginger-garlic paste, crushed peppercorns, salt, thyme and 1 teaspoon paprika, mix well and set aside to marinate for 30 minutes.', 'Heat brown sugar in a non-stick pan. Add rum, remaining paprika and butter, mix and let the butter melt.', 'Add salt, stir to mix and bring to a boil. Cook till the sauce thickens. Remove from heat and set aside.', 'Heat oil in another non-stick pan. Add marinated chicken drumsticks and cook, rotating the drumsticks till they get seared all around. Cover and cook till chicken is browned.', 'Add rum sauce, mix, cover and cook till the chicken is fully done.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Cream and Onion Chakli Sticks
method: ['Heat 1 cup water in a non-stick pan, add salt and butter andmix till butter melts.Add semolina, mix well and cook till mixture thickens. Transfer into a bowl and cool down.', 'Dry roast split black gram in another non-stick pan for 5-6 minutes. Cool and grind to fine powder.', 'Add rice flour and black gram flour to the semolina mixture, along with 1 cup water, spring onion greens and knead into stiff dough.', 'Take milk powder in small bowl, add parmesan cheese powder, salt, onion powder and powdered sugar in another bowl.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Grease a chakli press with some oil. Divide the dough into equal portions and put one portion at a time into the chakli press and press outsticks on a butter paper. Slide in a few chakli sticks at a time, into hot oil, deep-fry on medium heat till light golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Sprinkle milk powder mixture over the sticks, toss well and let them cool down to room temperature.', 'Serve or store in an airtight container.']

title: Kerala Style Chicken Curry
method: ['Roughly chop onions.', 'Heat coconut oil in a non-stick pan, add onions, cloves, cinnamon, curry leaves, ginger and garlic and saute for 2 minutes.', 'Add tomatoes and saute further for 3-4 minutes.', 'Add coriander powder, turmeric powder, red chilli powder and pepper powder and mix well. Add chicken pieces and salt and mix well.', 'Add 1 cup water and mix well. Cover and cook on medium heat till the chicken is almost done.', 'Add coconut milk and mix well. Cook on low heat till the chicken is done.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot.']

title: Mixture
method: ['Heat a deep non-stick pan, add split Bengal gram and dry roast, on medium heat, for 8-10 minutes. Cool completely, transfer into a grinder jar and grind into a fine powder.', 'To make sev, take 1 cup of this ground flour in a mixing bowl, add red chilli powder, turmeric powder, carom seeds, salt, 1 tbsp oil and sufficient water and knead into stiff dough. Cover the dough with a damp cloth and rest for 30 minutes.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Grease a sev mould with some oil. Divide the dough into equal portions and fill the mould with a portion. Press sev directly into hot oil and deep-fry till golden brown. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'To make boondi, take 2 cups the ground flour in another mixing bowl, add turmeric powder, red chilli powder and salt and mix well. Add 1 cup water, a little at a time, and whisk to a smooth batter. Add 1 tsp oil, whisk well and rest the batter for 10 minutes.', 'Reheat the oil, place a small perforated spoon on top of the kadai, pour some prepared batter on it and tap gently so that the boondi fall directly into hot oil. Deep-fry till crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Deep fry cashewnuts, curry leaves, roasted chana dal and peanuts, one after the other in same hot oil till lightly browned. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Transfer all the fried ingredients into a large mixing bowl, add roasted pumpkin seeds, roasted melon seeds, roasted flax seeds, red chilli powder and salt and mix well.\nCool and serve or store in an airtight container.']

title: Pumpkin Cake
method: ['Preheat oven to 180degC. Grease an aluminium baking tin and dust with flour.', 'Mix oats and buttermilk with milk in a bowl. Add pumpkin puree and mix well. Add brown sugar and sugar and mix again. Break eggs and add and whisk well.', 'Sieve together flour, baking powder, baking soda, nutmeg powder and salt into the bowl and mix everything well.', 'Add vanilla essence and olive oil and mix well.', 'Pour batter into the baking tin and place in preheated oven. Bake for 30 minutes.', 'Slice and serve.']

title: Grilled Lemongrass Chicken Satay
method: ['Grind together lemongrass, onions, green chilli, garlic cloves and oil to a smooth paste. Add soy sauce, oyster sauce, fish sauce, honey, sugar, salt, sesame oil and crushed peppercorns and grind. Transfer into a bowl.', 'Add chicken cubes and mix well and keep it in the refrigerator to marinate for an hour.', 'Thread the marinated chicken cubes onto skewers.', 'Heat sesame oil in a non-stick grill pan, place the chicken skewers and cook, turning the skewers a couple of times, for ten to twelve minutes or till done.', 'Arrange the skewers on a serving plate and serve hot.']

title: Dum ka Tinda
method: ['Peel the apple gourds. Cut off a thin slice from the top and reserve them. Scoop out the inner pulp with a scooper.', 'Take ginger, green chillies, cottage cheese, 1 tsp red chilli powder and salt in a bowl.', 'Blend the scooped portion of apple gourds to a fine paste and add to the cottage cheese mixture. Chop coriander leaves and add and mix well.', 'Stuff the apple gourds with this mixture.', 'Heat a non-stick grill pan, place the stuffed apple gourds on it with the reserved sliced off tops. Add 2 tbsps sunflower oil and grill, turning sides, till golden on all sides and till grill marks appear.', 'Heat remaining oil in a non-stick kadai, add cumin seeds and saute till it changes colour. Add onions and saute till it turns golden brown.', 'Add ginger-garlic paste and saute for a minute. Add tomatoes and salt. Cook till tomatoes turn pulpy.', 'Sprinkle a little salt over the grilled apple gourds.', 'Add coriander powder, 1 tsp red chilli powder, cumin powder, garam masala powder, 1 tsp dried mango powder in the kadai and saute for 2-3 minutes. Add 10-12 cashewnuts and saute till oil separates. Switch off heat. Let the mixture cool down.Transfer the mixture into blender jar and blend to a fine paste.', 'In same kadai, add ginger strips, green chilli strips, onion and halved big green chillies and saute for 1-2 minutes. Add the apple gourds and cook on medium heat for 4-5 minutes.', 'Add remaining red chilli powder, turmeric powder and remaining dried mango powder. Add sufficient water. Cover and cook on medium heat for 4-5 minutes.', 'Add sufficient water and add the ground paste. Add khoya, remaining cashewnuts, remaining ginger strips and juice of  1/2  lemon. Cover and cook on medium heat for 4-5 minutes.', 'Transfer the apple gourds into a serving bowl along with the chillies and gravy.', 'Serve hot garnished with cashewnuts and mint sprig.']

title: Egg Chilli Toast - SK Khazana
method: ['Take eggs in a mixing bowl, add mozzarella cheese, chilli powder, chilli flakes, green chillies, salt, egg white, coriander leaves and milk and mix well mashing the eggs lightly.', 'Spread the mixture on bread slices.', 'Heat some butter in a non-stick pan. Place the bread slices in it, one at a time, cover and cook till the cheese melts. Brush some butter on top.', 'Cut into triangles, arrange on a serving platter and serve immediately.']

title: Mughlai Parantha
method: ['Mix refined flour, whole-wheat flour and semolina. Add salt, two tablespoons of ghee, milk and knead into a stiff dough.', 'Cover and keep aside for thirty minutes. Divide dough into eight equal portions, roll in refined flour and rest for ten minutes. Roll out each portion into a thin chapatti and apply ghee.', 'Dust with some flour and fold into half. Apply some more ghee, dust with flour and fold further into half lengthwise. Stretch and roll in a spiral and make a ball.', 'Press lightly with hand and roll out into a parantha.']

title: Whisky Cake
method: ['Preheat oven to 180deg C. Grease a cake tin with some butter and dust with some flour.', 'Sift together refined flour, baking powder, salt, nutmeg powder and cinnamon powder into a bowl. Add walnuts, raisins and cranberries and mix well.', 'Cream butter and sugar in another bowl till light and creamy. Add egg yolks and continue to beat.', 'Beat egg whites separately in a third bowl till light and fluffy.', 'Fold the flour mixture into the egg yolk mixture, add whisky and mix. Add egg whites and mix lightly.', 'Pour the batter into the prepared tin, tap lightly and place it in the preheated oven. Bake for thirty-five to forty minutes.', 'Remove from heat and cool. Remove the cake from the mould and cut into wedges. Serve.']

title: Mexican Rice
method: ['Heat stock in a deep non-stick pan.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add rice, onion, garlic and saute till lightly browned.', 'Add chipotle in adobo sauce and tomato puree and mix well.', 'Add carrot, green peas, salt and boiling vegetable stock.', 'Place coriander on top and cover and cook till the rice is done.', 'Discard coriander leaves and add lemon juice and mix well.']

title: Thai Pani Puri- SK Khazana
method: ['To make the filling, put brown sugar, sea salt, choppedfresh red chilli, tamarind paste, soy sauce and roasted peanuts in a mortar, squeeze the juice of  1/2  lemon juice in it and pound the mixture coarsely.', 'Add raw papaya, tomato, spring onion and bean sprouts and mix well. Add l tbsp lemon juice and mix well.', 'To make the Thai flavored water, put coriander leaves, coriander roots, kaffir lime leaves, galangal, green chillies, roasted cumin seeds, coriander seeds, white peppercorns, sea salt, black salt, palm sugar zest of kaffir lime, lemon juice, some ice cubes and 1 1/2  cups water in a blender jar and blend finely. Strain the mixture into a bowl. Add ice cubes, mix and transfer it into a jug.', 'To serve, make a hole in the centre of the puri, put a little filling mixture in it, pour some pani and serve immediately. Make more pani puris similarly.']

title: Kairi Poha
method: ['Heat oil in non stick pan. Roughly chop onion.', 'Add asafoetida, mustard seeds, cumin seeds, curry leaves and onion to the pan and saute till the onion is well browned.', 'Peel and roughly chop raw mango', 'Add raw peanuts and green chillies to the pan. Roughly chop boiled potato and add alongwith turmeric powder and red chilli powder and mix well.', 'Add green peas, raw mango, salt and sugar. Mix well and add poha. Sprinkle a little water and toss to mix.', 'Cook for 2-3 minutes. Serve hot garnished with coriander sprig.']

title: Chole Bhature
method: ['Pressure cook the chickpeas with 5-6 cups water, salt and 2-3 tea bags till 6-7 whistles are given out.', 'Reduce heat and simmer till chickpeas are soft and completely cooked. Discard the tea bags, drain the chickpeas and reserve the stock.', 'Dry-roast dried pomegranate seeds and cumin seeds in a non-stick pan on low heat till dark golden brown and fragrant.', 'Meanwhile, heat oil in a deep non-stick pan. Add ginger-garlic-green chilli paste and saute for 30 seconds. Add onion, mix and saute till golden brown.', 'Put the roasted dried pomegranate seeds and cumin seeds in a mortar, add some salt and coarsely crush with a pestle.', 'Add chilli powder, coriander powder, chole masala, dried mango powder, green chillies, ginger strips, tomatoes and salt, mix well, cover and cook on low heat till tomatoes turn soft.', 'To prepare bhature, take flour in a mixing bowl, add baking soda, baking powder, salt, sugar, yogurt and 1 tablespoon oil in a bowl.', 'Add chickpeas, 1 1/2  cups reserved chickpea stock and ground pomegranate-cumin seed mixture and, mix well. Cover and cook on low heat for 4-5 minutes.', 'Add sufficient water to the flour mixture and knead into a soft dough.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Heat ghee in a tempering pan. Add it to chole, cover and continue to cook on low heat for 5 minutes.', 'Grease your palms and divide the dough into equal portions and shape them into balls. Lightly flatten each ball, apply some oil and roll out into thick oval bhatura.', 'Slide in each bhatura into hot oil and deep-fry on medium heat till they puff up and turn light golden brown. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Open the lid of the chole pan and mix well. Switch the heat off.', 'Arrange the bhature on a serving plate, put chole into a serving bowl, garnish with a coriander sprig and serve hot with bhature.']

title: Fatafat Mutton Biryani
method: ['Take 4 cups water in a large microwave safe bowl. Add 2 cardamoms, 3 cloves and salt and heat in the microwave for 10 minutes or till the water boils.', 'Combine remaining cardamoms, remaining cloves and cinnamon in a mortar. Grind them coarsely with a pestle. Discard the cardamom skins and add garlic and ginger. Grind further.', 'Heat 5 tablespoons ghee in a pressure cooker. Add onion and saute till lightly browned.', 'Add rice to the boiled water and heat in the microwave for 12 minutes or till  3/4  done, stirring once after every 2-3 minutes.', 'Add ground masala in the cooker, mix and saute for 10-15 seconds. Add mutton, salt and stemmed green chillies. Mix well and sear the mutton on high heat for 5-10 minutes.', 'Add yogurt, mix well and cook further. Add milk and 2-3 cups water and stir to mix. Add some mint leaves, some coriander leaves and 1 tablespoon kewra water. Mix well and bring to a boil. Cover and pressure cook on simmer for 2-3 minutes and then on high heat for 15 minutes.', 'Strain the rice in a colander and transfer the rice in another bowl. Add 1 tablespoon ghee, some mint leaves and some coriander leaves. Cover with an aluminium foil and set aside.', 'Transfer cooked mutton in a deep non-stick pan and put on heat. Add saffron, remaining kewra water, some mint leaves, some coriander leaves and mix well. Adjust salt if required and bring to a boil.', 'Add rice and spread evenly on the mutton. Reduce heat to low, drizzle remaining ghee on top, cover with aluminium foil and cook on dum for 8-10 minutes.', 'Remove aluminum foil and mix the biryani from the sides. Transfer into a serving dish and serve hot garnished with a coriander sprig.']

title: Achari Aloo in Dahi
method: ['Grind onion seeds, mustard seeds, fennel seeds, cumin seeds and fenugreek seeds into a coarse powder.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add ground powder, turmeric powder, curry leaves, green chillies and asafoetida. Saute till fragrant.', 'Add yogurt, mix well and cook on low heat. Add potatoes, mix well and cook.', 'Add salt, mix well and add  1/4  cup water. Mix well and simmer for 5 minutes.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Butter Pepper Garlic Crabs
method: ['Cut capsicum into diamond shaped pieces. Cut crab sticks into diagonal pieces.', 'Heat 2 tbsps butter in a non-stick wok, add garlic and saute for  1/2  minute.', 'Add crab stick pieces, capsicum, salt and crushed peppercorns and mix well.', 'Add  1/4  cup water and mix. Add cornstarch slurry and mix well. Add remaining butter, mix well and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Transfer onto a serving dish and serve hot.']

title: Chicken Souvlaki
method: ['Take the chicken pieces in a bowl. Add the garlic, lemon juice, yogurt, olive oil, oregano, salt and crushed peppercorns. Mix well and set aside to marinate for thirty to forty minutes.', 'Thread the marinated chicken pieces onto skewers', 'Heat some oil in a non-stick grill pan. Place the skewers on the pan and grill for three to four minutes on both sides.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Sahlab
method: ['Take cornflour in a bowl and add sufficient water and whisk till you get a smooth mixture.', 'Heat milk in a deep non-stick pan, add cornflour mixture and cook stirring continuously.', 'Add rose water and sugar, mix well and cook till the custard thickens. Switch off the heat, pour into silicon moulds and set aside to cool down to room temperature. Then keep the moulds in the refrigerator to set.', 'Remove the moulds from the refrigerator, place each on a separate serving plates upside down and demould.', 'Sprinkle cinnamon powder over them, top with almonds, pistachios and desiccated coconut. Drizzle honey on top and serve chilled.']

title: Egg Biryani
method: ['Heat 2 tbsps ghee in a non stick handi. Add green cardamoms, cinnamon, black peppercorns, cloves and bay leaves and saute till fragrant.', 'Add onions and saute till golden. Add tomatoes, ginger-garlic paste and saute till the tomatoes are pulpy.', 'Add red chilli powder, turmeric powder, ginger, green chillies and salt and saute.', 'Add yogurt, half the fried onion, 25-30 mint leaves, 1 tbsp coriander leaves, lemon juice and eggs. Add  1/2  cup water and mix well.', 'For the omelette, heat oil in a non stick pan. Break eggs in a bowl, add red chilli powder, turmeric powder, salt and whisk well.', 'Pour into the pan, rotate it to spread the mixture evenly and cook till done.', 'Spread a layer of rice over the egg curry in the handi, place the omelette over it, sprinkle remaining coriander leaves and mint leaves over it. Spread the remaining deep fried onion and rice over it.', 'Sprinkle green cardamom powder and garam masala powder and drizzle the remaining ghee all around.', 'Cover and cook on high heat for 5 minutes. Lower the heat and cook for 4-5 minutes.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with mint leaves and serve hot.']

title: Instant Malpua Cake
method: ['To make sugar syrup, heat a non-stick pan. Add sugar and 1 cup water and mix well till sugar dissolves. Cook till the sugar melts.', 'To make malpua batter, combine khoya, refined flour and baking soda in a bowl. Add milk and whisk to make a smooth batter. Set aside for 5-10 minutes. Add eggs and whisk again.', 'Add saffron to the sugar syrup.', 'Heat some ghee in a non-stick pan. Pour a ladleful of batter into it and spread into a large malpua. Shallow-fry till golden from both sides. Similarly make remaining malpuas.', 'Soak the malpuas in the sugar syrup and drain.', 'Add boondi to the remaining sugar syrup and mix well. Let the boondi soak all the syrup.', 'Place a malpua on a large serving plate. Spread generous amount of rabri on top. Add some sweetened boondi on top and place second malpua on top. Spread some more generous amount of rabri and put 12-15 gulab jamun on top. Cover with the third malpua and top with some more generous amount of rabri.', 'Cut remaining gulab jamun into halves and place on top. Garnish with remaining sweetened boondi and saffron. Serve immediately.']

title: Almond Cake
method: ['Preheat oven to 180@C. Grease a cake tin with butter and dust with almond flour.', 'Take butter and sugar in a bowl and cream together with an electric beater till fluffy.', 'Break the eggs one at a time and add and continue to beat till well combined. Add almond flour, cornflour, baking powder and vanilla essence and mix well.', 'Fold in the walnuts into the mixture. Pour the mixture into the greased cake tin, place the tin in the preheated oven and bake for 40-45 minutes.', 'Remove the cake tin from the oven and let it cool before demoulding.', 'Cut into wedges and place them on a serving plate, dust with icing sugar and garnish with mint sprig. Serve with mixed berries.']

title: Moong Dal Halwa Premix - SK Khazana
method: ['Grind the moong dal to a coarse powder.', 'Heat a non-stick pan, add the coarse powder and roast till fragrant and golden brown. Make a well in the center and add ghee and add almond and cashew nuts and roast for a few seconds. Mix well and take the pan off the heat.', 'Transfer into a bowl and allow to cool completely. Add milk powder, green cardamom powder and powdered sugar. Add saffron and mix well.', 'Transfer into an airtight jar and use up to 15 days.', 'For making the moong dal, take  1/2  cup premix in a microwave safe bowl, add  3/4  cup hot water, cover with a lid and microwave on high for 2 minutes, mix and microwave again for 2-3 minutes.', 'Garnish with pistachios and serve.']

title: Mirchi ke Tipore
method: ['Heat oil in non-stick pan, add mustard seeds and let them splutter.', 'Add garlic, mix and saute till golden. Add green chillies, salt and turmeric powder, mix and saute for a minute.', 'Add butter and coriander powder, mix and saute for 2-3 minutes. Cover and cook for 2 minutes.', 'Squeeze the juice of lemon juice on top, mix well and transfer into a porcelain jar and cool down to room temperature. Serve as required.']

title: Wood Apple Chutney
method: ['Break open the wood apple and scoop out the flesh and place it in a mortar.', 'Add salt, cumin seeds and red chilli powder and pound till everything is well blended. Add the jaggery and a little water and pound some more till you get a chutney consistency.', 'Serve with matlo undhiyo.']

title: Vegetarian Shepherd's Pie
method: ['Preheat the oven to 200degC.', 'Heat olive oil and oil in a non stick pan. Add garlic and shallots and saute for one minute. Add carrot and saute for two minutes. Add mushrooms, corn niblets, salt and pepper powder and stir.', 'Mix the flour with one tablespoon of butter and divide into small portions. Add the milk to the vegetables in the pan and stir. Add the flour-butter mixture portion by portion, and stir till the mixture thickens.', 'Transfer the vegetables into a pie dish. Place the mashed potatoes in a bowl. Add cream and remaining butter and mix well. Add salt and mix well.', 'Spread this over the vegetables evenly so that all the vegetables are completely covered. Dip a fork in oil and press along the edge of the pie dish.', 'This will seal the edges and also make a nice design. Keep the pie dish in the preheated oven and bake till the potatoes become light golden.', 'Cut into wedges and serve hot with garlic bread.']

title: Kale Chane
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add 2 tablespoons punjabi chhole masala, Bengal gram and mix well.', 'Add salt and remaining Tata Sampann Punjabi Chhole Masala and mix well. Add  1/4  cup water, mix well and cook 2-3 minutes.', 'Garnish with coriander sprig and serve hot.']

title: Kosha Mangsho
method: ['Heat mustard oil in a deep non-stick pan till it smokes, add potatoes and fry till they turn a light brown.', 'Add onion, mix and saute for a minute. Cover and cook till onion turns golden brown.', 'Take mutton pieces in a large bowl, add salt, cumin powder, red chilli powder, coriander powder, ginger-garlic paste and turmeric powder, mix well and keep the bowl in the refrigerator to marinate for 1 hour if you have the time.', 'Add the marinated mutton to the pan and mix well.Add green chillies,mix, cover and cook on low heat for 8-10 minutes.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Add tomato puree and mix well. Add salt, cover and cook on low heat for 50-60 minutes or till mutton is fully done.', 'Divide the dough into small portions. Grease a worktop with some oil and roll out each portion into small luchis.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Slide in the luchis, one at a time, and deep-fry till golden brown. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Add coriander leaves to the mutton and mix well.', 'Transfer the mutton into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot with luchis.']

title: Boondi ki Kadhi
method: ['Put gram flour, turmeric powder, salt and yogurt in a bowl and whisk till smooth and ensuring that there are no lumps.
