Add 3 cups water and keep whisking till a thin mixture is formed.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add cumin seeds and when the seeds change colour, add asafoetida, green chillies, yogurt mixture, mix and cook till it comes to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes.', 'Add boondi, mix and cook for  1/2  a minute.', 'Serve hot with steamed rice.']

title: Cornmeal Fritters
method: ['Mix refined flour and cornmeal in a bowl.', 'Add margarine, salt, baking powder and rub in till the mixture resembles bread crumbs. Add sugar, vanilla essence and milk and mix. Add egg and mix.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a non-stick kadai. Drop spoons full of batter into the hot oil and deep fry until golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Kothimbir Wadi
method: ['Heat four cups water in a steamer. Mix together the coriander leaves, green chillies, gram flour, yogurt, salt, turmeric powder and jaggery in a bowl.', 'Add sufficient water to make a thick batter, ensuring that the consistency is not too thin. Adjust salt.', 'Pour the batter into a greased plate that is at least one and half inches deep or a tray measuring approximately six inch x six inch x one and a half inch.', 'Place it in the steamer and steam on high heat for fifteen to twenty minutes or till firm and cooked.', 'Check by inserting a skewer into the wadi and if it comes out clean, then it is cooked. Remove, cool and cut into one-inch diamonds.', 'Heat the oil in a small non stick pan and add the sesame seeds, asafoetida and mustard seeds. When they splutter add the wadi and fresh coconut. Toss well. Serve immediately.']

title: Kiwi Lemon Gingerale
Main ingredients: Green kiwi, Golden kiwi, Lemon juice, Ginger ale, Fresh mint leaves, Sugar syrup, Ice cubes

title: Achari Pomfret
method: ['Heat a barbeque pit with sufficient coal.', 'Take pickle in a bowl, add gram flour and mix well. Add yogurt and a little salt and mix well. Add smoked mustard oil and mix well.', 'Place the pomfrets on a plate, sprinkle a little salt on them and brush a little pickle on both sides of the fish. Apply some of the pickle-gram flour paste, with your hand, on both sides of the fish. Reserve the remaining marinade.', 'Pass a skewer through each fish and place them on the barbeque pit. Brush some of the reserved marinade and baste with a little butter a few times while the fish are getting cooked. Cook, rotating the skewers, for 12-15 minutes or till the fish are cooked evenly on both sides.', 'Slide the fish gently onto a serving plate and baste with a little more butter. Serve hot with cherry tomatoes, lemon wedges, onion rings and green chutney.']

title: Veg Bhakarwadi
ingredients: ['1 cup refined flour (maida)', '1 tablespoon semolina (suji / rawa)', ' 1/4  teaspoon black pepper powder', 'Salt to taste', '2 tablespoons oil + for deep frying', '100 grams French beans, chopped roughly and boiled', '100 grams green peas, boiled', ' 1/2  cup scraped coconut', '2-3 medium potatoes, boiled, peeled and mashed', '1 teaspoon ginger-green chilli paste', '1 teaspoon garam masala powder', ' 1/2  cup chopped fresh coriander leaves']

title: Fruit Custard
method: ['Take custard powder in a bowl. Add 1 cup milk and mix well. Ensure that there are no lumps.', 'Boil 3 cups milk in a deep non-stick pan. Add dissolved custard powder and stir to mix. Cook till thick and add  1/2  cup milk. Keep whisking, and add the remaining milk. Mix well to ensure that there are no lumps.', 'Add sugar and keep whisking. Cook till thick. Remove from heat and set aside to cool.', 'Cut chickoos into medium pieces and place in a bowl. Peel banana and cut into medium pieces and put in bowl. Add both grapes. Peel apple, cut into medium pieces and add. Reserve one strawberry for garnishing, chop remaining and add.', 'Blend custard with an electric beater and add to fruits. Mix well.', 'Crumble velvet cakes and place in a circular glass dish. Press lightly, pour custard on top and spread evenly.', 'Halve the strawberry and make a fan out of it. Place it on the centre of the dish. Halve black grapes and place on the circular side of the dish.', 'Serve.']

title: Brownie Cheesecake
method: ['Preheat oven to 180 C. Grease a round spring form cake tin.', 'Sift flour and baking powder together into a bowl.', 'Combine the chocolate and butter in a large microwave-safe bowl and soften, uncovered, for a minute in a microwave on HIGH.', 'Beat in sugar, eggs and vanilla essence and blend well. Add sifted flour and walnuts and mix well.', 'Transfer batter into prepared cake tin and bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes. Remove from oven and allow the brownie to cool.', 'To make filling, take gelatine in a bowl, add 5 tablespoons water and set aside for 2-3 minutes. Stand the bowl over a pan of simmering water and stir until the gelatine is completely dissolved. Set aside to cool slightly.', 'Whisk the egg whites in a clean bowl till stiff.', 'Beat cheese spread, yogurt, sugar and vanilla essence together in another bowl till well blended. Add the dissolved gelatine and mix.', 'Fold whisked egg whites into the cheese mixture and spoon it over the brownie base in the tin and level the surface. Chill in a refrigerator for at least 4 hours or until set.', 'Release the cheesecake carefully from the spring form tin and transfer onto a serving plate.', 'Cut into wedges and serve.']

title: Tisrya Masala
Main ingredients: Clams, Coriander seeds, Cumin seeds, Onions, Tomatoes, Red chilli powder, Crushed ginger-garlic-green chillies, Kokum, Curry leaves

title: Chicken Stroganoff
method: ['Cut the chicken breasts into long strips. Melt the butter in a pan, add mushrooms and onions and saute for five minutes. Mix tomato puree, mustard powder and white wine.', 'Add this mixture to the mushrooms and onions and cook for five minutes. In a separate pan heat oil, add the chicken strips and saute for two minutes stirring constantly till evenly browned.', 'Add salt and black pepper powder. Add the onion-mushroom mixture, stir and cook for another two minutes. Add sour cream and paprika and cook on low heat for a few minutes.', 'Serve hot with rice.']

title: Arbi Ke Khaje
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Put the colocassia roots in a bowl, add salt and rice powder and mix well. Slide into hot oil, one by one, and deep-fry till golden and crisp.', 'Slit and finely chop green chillies. Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a non-stick wok, add curry leaves and onions and saute.', 'Drain colocassia roots on absorbent paper, fold the paper and press lightly.', 'When onion turns golden, add green chillies, colocassia roots, coriander powder, cumin powder, chaat masala, red chilli powder and salt and mix well.', 'Add coriander-mint chutney and mix well. Serve hot.']

title: Garlic Knots - SK Khazana
method: ['Mix together flour and milk powder in a large mixing bowl. Add yeast, castor sugar and some water and let the yeast activate.', 'Add salt and sufficient water and knead into a soft dough. Add 2 tablespoons butter and knead again. Set aside to prove for 30-40 minutes.', 'Knock back the dough, divide into 8 equal portions and shape into balls.', 'Mix together parmesan cheese, garlic, garlic powder, parsley and 2 teaspoons butter in a bowl.', 'Roll out dough balls into medium sized thick discs, place a spoonful of cheese mixture in the centre, roll into cylinders and shape into knots.', 'Preheat oven to 180deg C.', 'Grease a baking tray with some oil and place the prepared garlic knots on it. Set aside to prove for 10-15 minutes.', 'Brush the knots with some milk, put the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes.', 'Brush with some butter and serve hot.']

title: Garam Masala Powder
method: ['Lightly dry roast the ingredients one by one. Cool and grind to a fine powder.']

title: Date And Walnut Laddoo
method: ['Heat apple juice in a pan, add dates and cook. Add pear and mix. Add the cinnamon stick.', 'Mix and cook till the pear and dates and soft and the mixture is a little dry.', 'Remove the cinnamon stick and transfer the mixture into a bowl. Add walnuts and mix. Add sponge cake crumbs and mix well.', 'Let the mixture cool in the refrigerator.', 'Shape into laddoos, roll in cocoa powder and serve.']

title: Middle Eastern Cheese Parcels
method: ['Put butter, olive oil and  1/4  cup hot water in a bowl. Add salt and flour gradually, mix and knead to an oily dough. Cover with cling film and set aside for 10-15 minutes.', 'Preheat oven to 180deg C.', 'To prepare the filling, mix feta cheese, capsicum, parsley and crushed peppercorns in another bowl.', 'Divide the dough into 2 equal portions, roll each portion to a  1/2  cm thick sheet and cut into squares.', 'Put some cheese mixture in the center of each square, fold into triangle and press the edges to seal. Place them on a baking tray, press the edges of each parcel with the back of the fork to create texture, brush some milk and sprinkle some sesame seeds on top.', 'Place the baking tray in the preheated oven and bake for 20-25 minutes or till the crust is golden.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Pineapple Upside Down Cake
method: ['Preheat oven to 180deg C.', 'Break eggs into a bowl and beatwith an electric beater till light and fluffy. Add powdered sugar gradually and continue to beat. Add butter and beat well.', 'Sift together flour and baking powder into the bowl and fold in well. Add milk and mix well to make a semi-thick batter.', 'Grease a loaf tin with some butter and dust with some flour. Sprinkle some brown sugar on the base, place pineapple roundels over it and place one cherry in the center of each roundel. Sprinkle some brown sugar over the pineapple slices and pour the batter over them, level it out and tap the tin gently.', 'Keep the tin on a baking tray, place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 25-30 minutes. Remove from oven, cool and demould.', 'Keep the cake on a serving platter, slice and serve.']

title: Hare Chane Methi
method: ['Heat oil in a non stick kadai. Add cumin seeds and saute till fragrant. Cut green chillies lengthwise and add to the kadai.', 'Add garlic and ginger and saute.Add onion and saute for 3-4 minutes or till light golden. Dry roast kasoori methi in another non stick pan and grind to a powder.', 'Add fresh fenugreek leaves to the kadai and saute for 1-2 minutes. Add red chilli powder, coriander powder, turmeric powder, amchur, garam masala powder and mix.', 'Add tomato puree and mix well. Add the boiled chane along with the water and salt and mix well.', 'Cover and cook for 6-8 minutes.Add coriander leaves, kasoori methi powder and mix. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot.']

title: Valtande Kosamalli
method: ['Clean banana stems, remove fibres carefully. Peel and chop them finely.', 'Place them in a bowl, add turmeric powder, salt, buttermilk and mix well.', 'Set aside for 10 minutes.', 'Drain and wash them in fresh water. Squeeze excess water and place them in another bowl.', 'Add coconut, coriander leaves, salt and lemon juice.', 'Heat oil in a small non stick pan, add mustard seeds.', 'When they splutter, add urad dal, red chillies, green chilli, curry leaves and asafoetida and saute till fragrant.', 'Add to it banana stems and mix well. Serve.']

title: Peach Party
method: ['Heat some water in a large non stick pan. Put the marsh mellows in a bowl and place it in the hot water in the pan. Add cream and let the two melt together, stirring frequently.', 'Cut the fruit cake into small cubes and put some of them in each of 4 martini glasses.Moisten them with the syrup of the tinned peaches. Cut each peach into 8 vertical slices.\nCool the marsh mellow mixture and add whipped cream.', 'Add a few drops of vanilla essence and almond essence and mix.Spread some almonds over the cake pieces, pour the marsh mellow-cream mixture over.', 'Arrange the peach slices along the rim of the glass, put a dollop of whipped cream in the centre, sprinkle some almonds over, chill in the refrigerator and serve.']

title: Aloo Gadbad
method: ['Place gram flour, salt, red chilli powder in a bowl, add sufficient water and mix well to make a soft dough. Heat sufficient oil in a kadai, drop spoonsful of the dough and deep fry till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper and cool slightly.', 'Chop onion finely. Place potatoes in a bowl. Heat 2 tbsps oil in a non stick pan, add onion and saute till soft. Add garlic paste, ginger paste and turmeric powder and saute. Add this to the potatoes. Chop mint leaves and add. Add salt and mix everything well.', 'Crush the fried gram flour balls and add to the potatoes. Add 1 tbsp cornflour and mix well. Heat 4 tbsps oil in the non stick pan. Divide the potato mixture into lemon sized portions. Dust your palms with a little cornflour and roll each portion into a ball and press slightly. Shallow-fry these in the pan, turning sides, till golden and crisp on both sides. Drain on absorbent paper and serve hot.']

title: Kurkure Chicken - SK Khazana
method: ['Take chicken strips in a bowl, add red chilli flakes, garlic powder, salt, crushed black peppercorns, onion powder and parsley. Break an egg into the bowl and mix well.', 'Put the savoury krispies in a zip lock bag, lock it and crush the crispies, with a rolling pin, into a coarse powder. Spread them on a plate.', 'Roll each chicken strip in the crushed savory crispies till they are well coated. Refrigerate for 15-20 minutes.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a wok, slide the chicken into hot oil and deep-fry till golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Sprinkle chaat masala over them and mix carefully.', 'Transfer them onto a serving plate and serve hot with mayonnaise.']

title: Shaan E Raan
method: ['Clean the leg of lamb and make slashes. Combine papaya paste, garlic paste, ginger paste and salt and apply it on the leg. Keep in a refrigerator to marinate for a few hours.', 'Heat oil in a pan. Preheat the oven to 180degC. Add onions to the hot oil and saute on medium heat till light golden. Add ginger paste and garlic paste and continue to saute. Add tomatoes and saute.', 'Grease an oven tray and place the marinated leg of lamb on it. Add turmeric powder, coriander powder, roasted cumin powder, red chilli powder to the masala in the pan and continue to saute.Add green cardamom powder, garam masala powder and mix.', 'Add yogurt and mix. Add coriander leaves and salt and mix. Pour this masala over the leg.', 'Cover with aluminium foil and keep the tray in the preheated oven. Cook at 180degC for forty to forty five minutes. Then lower the temperature to 140degC and cook for an hour.', 'Serve hot garnished with onion rings and a sprig of mint leaves.']

title: Murgh Angaar Bedgi
method:
['Crush lemon grass root and add it to chicken pieces.
Add salt, 1 tbsp red chilli paste, 2 tbsps lemon juice and mix well. Let it marinate for  1/2  hour.', 'For marinade mix together yogurt, garlic paste, ginger paste, remaining red chilli paste, turmeric powder, garam masala powder, carom seeds, black salt, crushed red chillies and salt in a bowl.', 'Add chicken pieces and mix well.
Add 1 tbsp oil and mix well and let it marinate for 3-4 hours in a refrigerator.', 'Heat an electric super tandoor, drizzle 1 tbsp oil and place the chicken pieces on it.
Drizzle 1 tbsp oil over them, close the lid and cook till the underside is well cooked.', 'Turn them over, close the lid again and cook till both sides are evenly cooked.
Sprinkle chaat masala, butter and 1 tbsp lemon juice and mix well.
Arrange them on a serving plate and serve hot.']

title: Chicken Satay
method: ['Grind garlic, tamarind paste, lemon juice, 1 tablespoon soy sauce, coriander powder, cumin powder, lemongrass,  1/2  teaspoon brown sugar and salt with sufficient water to a fine paste.', 'Place chicken strips in a bowl and add this paste and mix. Add 1 tablespoon peanut butter and mix well.', 'Cover with a cling film and keep in the refrigerator for 30-45 minutes to marinate.', 'To prepare peanut sauce, heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan. Add red curry paste and saute for 1minute. Add coconut cream, remaining peanut butter and mix well.', 'Add remaining brown sugar, remaining soy sauce and pinch of salt. Adjust consistency by adding a little water.', 'Thread the marinated chicken pieces on satay sticks.', 'Heat remaining oil in a non-stick grill pan. Place the satay sticks on the grill pan and cook on high heat for 2-3 minutes.', 'Rotate the satay sticks, cover and cook on low heat for 2-3 minutes.', 'Remove the lid, rotate the satay sticks again, brush chicken with oil, cover and cook for 2-3 minutes more.', 'Serve hot with peanut sauce.']

title: Guacamole Salsa
method: ['Boil sufficient water in the deep vessel and blanch the tomatoes for three minutes.', 'Peel, deseed and chop the tomatoes finely. Cut the avocado in half, remove the pit, scoop the flesh and place them in food processor and process until smooth.', 'Transfer the process avocado into a bowl, add in chopped tomatoes, lemon juice, onion, garlic, coriander leaves, green chillies and salt and mix. Serve cold with tortilla chips']

title: Paneer Khurchan
method: ['Heat the oil in a thick-bottomed kadai; add the cumin seeds. When they begin to change colour, add the garlic paste, capsicums, tomatoes and onions and saute for five or six minutes.', 'Add the paneer, tomato puree, salt and chilli powder. Saute for a while till the paneer begins to stick to the pan.', 'Scrape the paneer off the bottom of the pan and saute for a while longer till the paneer is dark brown and mashed.', 'Stir in the lemon juice and kasuri methi and serve immediately.']

title: Shrikhand With Stewed Apricots
method: ['Slice the golden apricots. Put them in a pan, add one and half cups of water and two tablespoons of sugar and mix. Cook on low heat for fifteen to twenty minutes.', 'Take hung yogurt in another bowl. Add the remaining sugar and mix. Squeeze this mixture through a muslin cloth.', 'Put the shrikhand in stemmed glasses. Remove the stewed apricots from heat and put them on top of the shrikhand.\nGarnish with pistachios and serve.']

title: Cottage Cheese in Burnt Garlic Sauce
method: ['Heat oil in a deep non-stick wok, add garlic and saute till it turns golden brown. Add celery, green chillies and vegetable stock and mix well.', 'Add red chilli sauce, soy sauce, tomato ketchup, salt crushed peppercorns, sugar and chopped coriander and mix well.', 'Combine water and cornflour in a bowl to make a smooth paste. Add this slurry to the pan.', 'Add cottage cheese batons and mix well. Add vinegar and mix lightly. Cook for 3-4 minutes.', 'Serve hot garnished with chopped coriander.']

title: Lemon Coriander Prawns
method: ['Blend together garlic cloves, ginger, 15-20 coriander sprigs, lemon juice and 1 tablespoon oil to a fine paste.', 'Take prawns in a bowl and add salt, crushed peppercorns, lemon rind and prepared paste. Mix well and set aside to marinate for 30 minutes.', 'Heat remaining oil in a non-stick pan. Add the marinated prawns and toss on high heat. Add some water, mix well and cook for 2 minutes.', 'Dissolve cornstarch in some water to make a smooth slurry.', 'Chop remaining coriander sprigs.', 'Add slurry to the pan, mix well and let the sauce thicken. Add chopped coriander and mix well.', 'Add crushed peppercorns and mix well.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Baked Vanilla Yogurt
method: ['Preheat oven to 200degC/ 400degF. Whisk together yogurt and condensed milk.', 'Add cream and whisk again.', 'Place shot glasses in a baking tray.', 'Fill them upto  3/4  with the yogurt mixture. Drop a dollop of red currant jam into each glass.', 'Keep the tray in the preheated oven and pour some water in it. Bake for 15-20 minutes.', 'Cool down to room temperature and then chill in a refrigerator. Serve chilled.']

title: Nutriwale Chawal - SK Khazana
method: ['Take the soya granules in a bowl, add milk and let them soak for 15-20 minutes.', 'Heat ghee in a thick bottomed pan and add cinnamon, cardamoms, cloves and cumin seeds, saute till colour changes.', 'Add onions and saute till golden brown. Add ginger paste and garlic paste, mix well and saute for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add green chillies, turmeric powder, coriander powder, red chilli powder, mix well and saute. Add tomatoes and salt, mix well and saute till tomatoes turn pulpy.', 'Add soaked soya granules and mix well. Cover and cook till dry.', 'Drain and add rice, mix and saute for 2 minutes. Add 1 1/2  cups water and mix well. Add garam masala powder and coriander leaves and mix well.', 'Cover and cook on low heat till rice is done. Stir once or twice while rice is cooking.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot.']

title: Masaledaar Parantha
method: ['Mix together wheat flour and gram flour in a bowl. Add red chilli powder, coriander powder, garam masala powder, dried mango powder, turmeric powder and salt. Add sufficient water and knead into dough.', 'Heat a non stick tawa. Divide the dough into equal portions and shape them into balls. Dust each ball with a little dry flour and roll into a roti.', 'Apply  1/2  tsp ghee over the roti, sprinkle some chopped green chilles, a pinch of carom seeds, a pinch of cumin seeds, some red chilli powder, some dried mango powder and some dry flour.', 'Fold each roti into half. Apply  1/2  tsp ghee and sprinkle some dry flour. Fold once again to form a triangle. Dust with a little dry flour and roll out into a parantha.', 'Place each parantha on the hot tawa and cook, turning sides. Apply a little ghee on both sides and cook till evenly golden.', 'Transfer onto a serving plate and serve hot.']

title: Badshahi Pear Gola
method: ['Discard stem and bottom of pear. Peel, finely chop and put into aluminium tin. Add lemon juice and some water and freeze till set.', 'Heat orange juice in a non-stick pan and cook till reduced. Switch off heat, cool and transfer in a bowl.', 'Remove the frozen pear-lemon mixture from the freezer and crush it using the back of an ice-cream scooper. Scoop out into a serving bowl.', 'Drizzle some orange reduction, pineapple reduction and rose syrup on top and serve immediately.']

title: Ajwaini Murg
method: ['Mix chicken pieces with carom seeds, yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, red chilli flakes and salt in a bowl and set aside to marinate for thirty minutes.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add chicken pieces and sear on high heat for eight to ten minutes. Add cream and coriander leaves and mix well. Cook for five to six minutes.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot.']

title: Raw Banana Halwa- Sk Khazana
method: ['Heat ghee in a non-stick pan, add raw bananas and saute till they turn soft. Add 1 cup milk and mix well. Cover and cook for 4-5 minutes or till the raw bananas are completely cooked.', 'Mash the mixture with a masher till soft and pulpy. Add remaining milk and sugar and mix well. Cover and cook till the sugar melts.', 'Remove the lid and mix well. Add slivered cashewnuts, slivered pistachios and blanched, peeled and slivered almonds and khoya and mix well. Cook till the mixture reaches halwa consistency. Add green cardamom powder and mix well.', 'Transfer into serving bowls and garnish with slivered cashewnuts, pistachios and almonds. Serve warm.']

title: Madgane
method: ['Cook chana dal and cashewnuts with 1 1/2  cups water in a deep non stick pan till just done. You can even pressure cook them.\nCook jaggery with 1 cup water till it dissolves. Mix rice flour with  1/4  cup water to a smooth paste.', 'Add thin coconut milk to the jaggery water and mix well. Add the rice flour mixture and cook on medium heat, stirring continuously. Add green cardamom powder and cook till the flour gets cooked and the mixture thickens.', 'Add chana dal and cashewnuts and mix well. Reduce heat and add thick coconut milk. Mix well and switch off heat.Serve warm.']

title: Bean Sprout Kadhi
method: ['Whisk yogurt, a little water, gram flour, red chilli powder, salt, turmeric powder in a bowl till smooth.', 'Grind ginger and green chilli with a little water and add and mix.', 'Heat oil in a non stick pan, add cloves, cumin seeds, coriander seeds, black peppercorns, dried red chillies and asafoetida and saute till fragrant.', 'Pour in the yogurt mixture and cook, stirring continuously, till it comes to a boil.', 'Reduce heat and let it simmer till the kadhi thickens.', 'Add moong and moth sprouts and mix well.', 'Serve hot with steamed rice or parantha.']

title: Bullet Kabab
method: ['Heat 2 tbsps oil in a non stick kadai. Add ginger-garlic-green chilli paste and saute. Add carrot and saute.', 'Add green capsicum, French beans, green peas and saute. Lightly mash the peas.Add red chilli powder, turmeric powder, salt and saute.', 'Transfer into a bowl. Add potatoes, breadcrumbs, coriander leaves and mix well.', 'Divide the mixture into equal portions and shape them like bullets. Coat the bullets with cornflour. Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Deep fry the bullets till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'To make the sauce, heat oil in a non stick pan, add garlic and saute. Mix Kashmiri red chilli powder with 2 tbsps water and add to the pan.', 'Add red chilli flakes, honey, chaat masala, lemon juice and mix well. Add the fried bullets to the sauce and mix lightly.', 'Transfer onto a serving plate and serve hot.']

title: Methi Thepla-SK Khazana
method: ['Mix together wheat flour, gram flour, salt, ginger-green chilli paste, turmeric powder, chilli powder and fenugreek leaves in a bowl. Add sesame seeds and sufficient milk, mix and knead to a soft dough. Add oil and knead again.', 'Divide the dough into equal portions, dust each portion with some wheat flour and roll out into thin discs or theplas.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa. Place theplas on it, one by one, drizzle some oil and cook, turning sides, till evenly done on both sides.', 'Serve hot with chhunda.']

title: Mini Pepperoni Pizza
method: ['Preheat oven to180o C.', 'Divide the dough into equal portions. Dust the worktop with some flour, transfer the dough and roll out each portion to a thin sheet. .Cut the sheet into roundels witha medium sized cookie cutter.', 'Dust a baking tray with some flour and arrange the roundels on it.', 'Spread some pizza sauce on each roundel. Put some onion, yellow capsicum, capsicum and red capsicum on top. Grate some cheese on top, place some pepperonis and sprinkle some dried oregano, crushed peppercorns and salt. Grate some more cheese on top.', 'Place the baking tray in the preheated oven and bake till the base gets cooked and cheese turns golden.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Spinach & Corn Sandwich
method: ['Heat 1 tablespoon butter in a non-stick pan, add garlic and saute till fragrant.', 'Add corn kernels and refined flour, mix well and saute for 2 minutes. Add milk and cook till the mixture thickens slightly. Mash corns with a potato masher.', 'Add spinach, salt and crushed black pepper And mix well.', 'Add processed cheese and mix till it melts. Transfer the mixture into a bowl and set aside to cool down to room temperature.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa.', 'For each sandwich, apply butter on a bread slice and place it buttered side down on the tawa.', 'Spread some spinach-corn mixture on it and cover with another bread slice. Spread some butter on the top side of the sandwich. When the underside turns golden, turn it over and cook till the other side is equally golden.', 'Cut each sandwich into 2 triangles, place them on a serving plate and serve warm with potato chips.']

title: Wadi Vegetable Pulao
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add wadis and saute on medium heat till golden brown. Drain and soak in warm water.', 'Heat ghee in a deep non-stick pan, add cloves, black peppercorns, cinnamon and bay leaves and onion, mix and saute till onion turns golden.', 'Add ginger-green chilli paste, mix well and saute for 1 minute on medium heat.', 'Add tomato, mix and saute till tomato turns pulpy. Add French beans, cauliflower florets and carrot, mix well and saute for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add rice and mix well. Add turmeric powder and salt and mix well. Break and add wadis and mix well. Add 3 cups water and green peas. Cover and cook on medium heat for 10-12 minutes or till the rice is cooked.', 'Transfer into a serving plate, garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot.']

title: Ginger Fudge
method: ['Crush walnuts and almonds coarsely and transfer into a bowl.', 'Break biscuits and add to the crusher. Crush finely and transfer in the same bowl. Mix well.', 'Melt butter in a non-stick pan. Add cream and honey and mix well. Add chocolate and mix till the chocolate melts.', 'Add chocolate mixture to the biscuit mixture and mix well.', 'Place a cling wrap in an aluminium tray, spread the fudge mixture on it and level it out. Refrigerate till set.', 'Cut into small pieces and serve.']

title: Dal Gosht
method: ['Heat oil in a pressure cooker. Slice 2 onions.', 'Add cumin seeds to the cooker and when they begin to change colour, add onions and saute for 2 minutes.', 'Add mutton and saute on high heat till well browned.', 'Chop coriander leaves and mint leaves.', 'Add ginger paste, garlic paste, coriander powder, turmeric powder, cumin powder, red chilli powder, green chillies, crushed black peppercorns and tomato to the cooker and saute for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add chana dal and sabut urad and mix well.', 'Chop the remaining onion and add along with salt and garam masala powder.', 'Mix well and add 4 cups water.Add coriander leaves and mint leaves and mix.', 'Cover the cooker with the lid and cook under pressure till 5-6 whistles are given out.', 'Open the lid when the pressure reduces completely.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot with phulkas or rotis.']

title: Amritsari Fish Fingers - SK Khazana
method: ['Take fish fingers in a large bowl, squeeze the juice of  1/2  lemon, add salt and mix well. Set aside to marinate for 10 minutes.', 'Take Fine Besan in another large bowl, add, carom seeds, salt, red chilli powder and turmeric powder and mix well.', 'Add ginger-garlic paste, yogurt and break eggs into the same bowl. Whisk to make a smooth mixture.', 'Add sufficient water and continue to whisk to make a thick and smooth batter.', 'Add the fish fingers, mix till well coated. Set aside for 10-15 minutes.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai, slide in the fish fingers and deep-fry till golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper and sprinkle a little chaat masala over them.', 'Transfer them into a serving bowl and serve hot with onion rings, lemon wedges and green chutney.']

title: Saimese Mixed Meat Salad with Rose Petals
method: ['Heat one tablespoon olive oil in a non-stick pan. Add sausages and stir-fry for one minute. Transfer into a bowl and keep aside.', 'Heat one tablespoon oil in the same non-stick pan. Add garlic and onion and stir-fry till they turn golden brown in colour.', 'To make dressing, put remaining olive oil, sugar, red chillies, lemon juice and fish sauce in a small bowl and mix well.', 'Put fried sausages, shrimp and boiled chicken in a large bowl along with the dressing and mix well.', 'Add half the rose petals, peanuts, fried onion and garlic, reserving some for garnish, and mix well.', 'Transfer into a serving plate. Garnish with remaining rose petals, fried onion and garlic and peanuts and serve immediately.']

title: Mawa Modak - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat a non-stick pan, add mawa and sugar and mix well. Continue to cook, stirring continuously on a low heat, till sugar dissolves completely.', 'Add liquid glucose, green cardamom powder and saffron, mix and cook, stirring continuously on low heat for 5-7 minutes or till thick.', 'Transfer the mixture onto a plate and set aside to cool completely.', 'Transfer a generous portion of mixture into a modak mould. Demould, arrange the modaks on a serving platter and serve.']

title: Sichuan Chicken with Red Wine
method: ['Put chicken pieces in a bowl. Add  1/2  cup red wine, salt, Tata Sampann Chicken Masala and flour and mix well.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Deep-fry chicken pieces till crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon oil in non-stick wok.', 'Slice spring onion bulbs and add to the wok along with garlic and saute well.', 'Add chilli paste and mix well. Add red chillies, fried chicken pieces, crushed Sichuan peppers and mix well.', 'Add remaining red wine and mix well. Add salt and mix. Add fried peanuts and mix well.', 'Sprinkle sesame seeds and serve hot.']

title: Apricot Layered Milkshake
method: ['Boil the apricot juice in a deep non-stick pan till it reduces  3/4  in quantity. Remove the scum with a spoon.', 'Blend together the ice cream and milk in a blender jar. Pour into a bowl.', 'Reserve some of the reduced apricot juice and divide the remaining into four individual serving glasses. Add the milkshake on top of it.', 'Drizzle the reserved apricot juice on top and serve chilled.']

title: Dal Dhokli
method: ['Boil dal with 2 cups water, salt and  1/4  teaspoon turmeric powder. Remove from heat and set aside.', 'Combine wheat flour, gram flour, salt, remaining turmeric powder, a pinch asafoetida, 1 teaspoon red chilli powder, 1 teaspoon ginger-green chilli paste, 1 tsp chopped coriander and 2 tablespoons oil in a bowl.', 'Mix well and knead into a stiff dough using sufficient water.', 'Heat 2 tablespoons ghee in a non-stick pan.', 'Add mustard seeds, fenugreek seeds, curry leaves, dried red chillies, remaining asafoetida and saute till the seeds splutter.', 'Add cooked dal, stir to mix, cover and cook till it boils.', 'Divide dough into equal portions. Grease worktop with little oil and roll out portions into thin large rotis.', 'Apply little oil on top and set aside. Similarly make other rotis.', 'Add peanuts, remaining red chilli powder, remaining ginger-green chilli paste to the dal and cook.', 'Cut diamonds from rotis, add to the dal and keep stirring once a while.', 'Add jaggery, stir to mix, cover and cook for 5 minutes. Transfer into a serving dish.', 'Drizzle 1 1/4  teaspoons ghee on top, garnish with chopped onion, remaining chopped coriander and squeeze lemon juice on it. Serve hot.']

title: Dahi Bhaat
method: ['Place yogurt in a bowl and whisk well. Add rice and mash while mixing. Add milk and mix well. Keep the mixture aside for 4 hours.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add asafoetida, mustard seeds, curry leaves, dried red chilies, ginger, and saute till fragrant.', 'Pour it over the rice mixture. Add carrot, cucumber and salt and mix well. Serve cold.']

title: Anda Dal Tadka
method: ['Heat ghee in a stainless steel pan, add cumin seeds, ginger, garlic and green chillies and saute for 1 minute. Add onion and saute on medium heat till it turns light brown.', 'Add tomatoes and saute till pulpy. Add salt and dal tadka masala, mix well and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add red chilli powder and garam masala powder and mix well. Break eggs into the pan and add the dal and mix well.', 'Pluck the coriander leaves off the stems, finely chop the leaves and add to the dal mixture. Cover and cook for 5-6 minutes on medium heat.', 'Crush and add dried fenugreek leaves. Mix well and transfer into a serving bowl. Serve hot, garnished with butter and coriander sprigs.']

title: Quick Jeera Chicken -SK Khazana
method: ['Cut chicken into 1 inch cubes and set aside.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds and let them change colour. Add green chillies and saute for a minute.', 'Add onion and saute till translucent. Add chicken pieces and saute on high heat for 3-4 minutes.', 'Cover and cook on medium heat for 8-10 minutes. Add red chilli powder, turmeric powder and salt and mix. Cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add lemon juice and coriander leaves and mix. Take the pan off the heat and transfer jeera chicken into a serving bowl.\nGarnish with coriander sprig and serve hot.']

title: Eggs Benedict
method: ['To make English muffins, put yeast in a bowl. Add sugar and milk and mix well.', 'Add flour and mix. Add egg white, mix and knead into a soft dough. Set aside till the dough doubles in volume.', 'Divide the dough into 4 equal portions and roll out into balls. Dust the balls with dry flour and pat into thick discs with your fingers.', 'Heat some oil on a non-stick tawa. Place the discs on it and cook, turning sides, for 7-8 minutes or till evenly done on both sides.', 'Heat sufficient water in a non-stick pan. Break eggs, one by one, into it and let them poach. Drain on an absorbent paper.', 'Place the English muffins on a serving platter. Place a poached egg on each and top with a spoonful of hollandaise sauce. Sprinkle crushed peppercorns, paprika and parsley and serve immediately.']

title: Gajrela
method: ['Heat three tablespoons ghee in a thick-bottomed pan, add carrots and saute for three to four minutes.', 'Add milk and cook on medium heat for six to seven minutes or until the milk evaporates and carrot is cooked.', 'Meanwhile heat remaining ghee in a separate pan and shallow fry cashewnuts and raisins till cashewnuts turn golden brown. Drain and set aside.', 'Add sugar to cooked carrots and cook, stirring continuously, for two to three minutes or till the sugar melts.', 'Add khoya and green cardamom powder. Stir and cook for three to four minutes.', 'Add cashewnuts and raisins and continue to cook for two minutes more. Serve hot or at room temperature.']

title: Peanut Chaat
method: ['Pressure cook peanuts with salt and4 cups water till 5 whistles are given out. Remove from heat, drain and transfer in a bowl.', 'Combine peanuts, green chillies, chopped coriander, onion, tomato, salt, chaat masala, roasted cumin powder and lemon juice and mix.', 'Put in individual serving bowls and sprinkle some chilli powder, chaat masala and roasted cumin powder on top.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Masala Anda Pav - SK Khazana
method: ['Slit in the centre of the pav on one side to make a pocket, making sure that the other three sides are affected.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan. For each portion, take 1 tbsp tomato, 1 tbsp onion, 1 tsp green chillies, 1 tsp coriander leaves  1/4  tsp garam masala and salt in a bowl. Break 1 egg and add and mix together.', 'Carefully pour this mixture into the prepared pav pocket.', 'Place the pav upright on the hot pan with the pocket side upwards and cook. When the egg sets, gently turn it and cook on all sides till golden brown and crisp. . To check if the egg is cooked inside the pav, gently lower the tip of a knife on the open side. If it comes out clean it means the egg is cooked.', 'Take the pavs off the pan and place on the worktop. Cut the pavs in half and place them back on the pan with the cut side facing downwards. Add a little butter and cook, rotating the pav so that all the sides are coated with the butter. Transfer onto a serving plate.', 'Sprinkle a little chaat masala and coriander leaves on top and serve hot with tomato ketchup.']

title: Chicken Salami Roll
method: ['Place a tortilla on a worktop. Apply  1/2  tablespoon tomato ketchup all over. Spread  1/2  tablespoon mayonnaise and  1/4  tablespoon mustard paste on top.', 'Place 3 salami slices, 2-3 tomato slices, 1-2 onion slices, torn lettuce leaves, 2 roughly chopped olives and some gherkins on one side. Sprinkle crushed peppercorns and salt on top and rolls tightly. Wrap in an aluminum foil and similarly prepare the remaining rolls.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Sambousek
method: ['Take carom seeds, ginger, cottage cheese, onion, black salt, dried mango powder, garam masala powder, turmeric powder and spinach in a bowl and mix well. Add salt and mix well.', 'Divide the dough into equal portions and roll each portion into a disc.  Spread a spoonful of cottage cheese-spinach mixture on each disc and roll into a cylinder. Roll into a spiral, dust some flour and roll out into medium size discs.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa. Place the discs on it, one at a time, and cook, basting with oil and turning sides, till evenly browned on both sides.', 'Cut each disc into 4 pieces, arrange them on a serving platter and serve with your choice of pickle.']

title: Paneer Canapes
method: ['Cut cottage cheese into 2 inch cubes. Scoop out a little from the centre of these cubes to make small canapes. Crumble the scooped cottage cheese and set aside.', 'Heat 2 tbsps oil in a non-stick pan. Add green chillies and saute for half a minute.', 'Add yellow capsicum, red capsicum, green capsicum and mix well.', 'Add  1/2  tsp red chilli powder, turmeric powder, garam masala powder,  1/2  tsp chaat masala and saute for 3-4 minutes.', 'Add lemon juice and mix well. Add crumbled paneer, bhuna masala and mix well. Transfer the filling into a bowl.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a non-stick pan.', 'Stuff the canapes with the filling and place in the pan. Cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Sprinkle remaining red chilli powder, remaining chaat masala and little salt on the canapes. Cook turning sides till evenly golden.', 'Transfer onto a serving plate. Garnish with grated cheese and serve.']

title: Apple And Sausage Fritters
method: ['Peel, deseed and finely chop apple and place in a bowl.', 'Roughly chop sausages and add in the bowl. Add salt, baking soda, cinnamon powder, maple syrup, refined flour, cornflour, cheddar cheese, little water and mix well.', 'Divide the mixture into 8 equal portions shaped into medium size balls or fritters. Refrigerate the balls for 15 minutes.', 'Spread breadcrumbs on a plate. Coat the balls in the breadcrumbs and dust off the excess.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Deep-fry the balls till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'To make mayo-mustard dip, combine mayonnaise and mustard sauce in a bowl. Mix well.', 'Garnish fritters with parsley and serve hot with mayo-mustard dip.']

title: Homestyle Pizza-SK Khazana
method: ['For making pizza sauce, heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add garlic and saute till golden.', 'Add onion and saute till golden brown. Add tomatoes, mix and cook for a minute. Add salt, red chilli powder and sugar and mix well.', 'Preheat the oven to 180o C.', 'Set aside to cool slightly, then transfer into a grinder jar and puree it roughly.', 'Spread the sauce evenly on 2 white pizza bases. Spread 2 tablespoons mozzarella cheese over the sauce on each pizza base.', 'Slice the chicken sausage and cut the ham into thin strips.', 'Arrange some sausage and ham on 1 white base and some coloured capsicums, mushroom and onion on the other white base. Sprinkle some chilli flakes and spread a few corn kernels on top of both.', 'Spread some more mozzarella cheese over both the bases.', 'Grease a baking pan with some oil. Keep the pizzas in it and place the pan in the preheated oven and cook till the cheese melts.', 'Similarly make the pizzas with the brown pizza bases.', 'Serve them hot.']

title: Chicken Mayo Roll
method: ['Mix together chicken, onion, purple cabbage, green capsicum, carrot, red capsicum, garlic powder, onion powder, crushed peppercorns, salt, cheese and mayonnaise in a bowl.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Put some chicken mixture on one side of each spring roll sheet, apply some slurry on the edges, fold two opposite sides, roll and seal applying some slurry on the ends.', 'Put the rolls in hot oil and deep-fry till golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot with sweet-chilli sauce.']

title: Jaljeera - SK Khazana
method: ['Dry roast cumin seeds till fragrant and crush coarsely in a mortar with a pestle.', 'Add salt, asafoetida, black salt and sugar and crush. Add ginger, mint leaves, coriander leaves and tamarind pulp and crush again.', 'Halve 2 lemons and cut 1 lemon into thin slices.', 'Put some cumin seed mixture into each of 4 tall glasses. Squeeze in juice of  1/2  lemon into each glass. Add 2-3 lemon slices and some ice cubes.', 'Top with drinking soda, stir and serve immediately.']

title: Cheese and Olive Sandwich
method: ['Preheat oven to 200degC. Place bread slices on baking tray. Brush with oil and place in oven bake for 2-3 minutes.', 'Mix olives, processed cheese, grated mozzarella cheese, mozzarella cheese cubes, green olives and parsley in a bowl.', 'Remove tray from oven. Flip slices and spread a spoonful of cheese-olive mixture evenly on 4 slices. Cover with remaining slices and place tray again in oven, bake till cheese melts and bread is crisp and golden. Cut into rectangles and serve immediately.']

title: Adrak Navratan
method: ['Peel, wash and cut ginger into julienne. Wash and pat dry raisins. Deseed and finely slice dried dates lengthwise.', 'Remove stems, wash and cut each green chilli into two. Combine all the ingredients and pour into wide mouthed glass jar.', 'Shake well.Serve when the juice turns pink. It makes a tasty digestive ade.']

title: Mango Chicken Wings - SK Khazana
method: ['Make slits on all the chicken wings and put them in a bowl. Add salt, curry powder, red chillies, chhunda, 1 tbsp olive oil and mango puree, mix well and set aside to marinate for around 25-30 minutes.', 'Preheat the oven to 200deg C.', 'Grease a baking tray with 1 tsp oil. Place the marinated chicken wings in it. Drizzle remaining oil over chicken wings. Keep the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 10-12 minutes.', 'Arrange the wings in a serving platter and serve hot garnished with coriander sprigs.']

title: Achari Aloo Ki Tahiri
method: ['Heat ghee in a deep non stick pan, add cinnamon, cloves, bay leaves, black peppercorns, green cardamoms, black cardamom, cumin seeds and saute till fragrant.', 'Halve baby potatoes. Add onionsto the pan and saute till lightly coloured. Add baby potatoes and potato cubes and saute.', 'Add mixed vegetable pickle and mix well. Add rice and mix well.', 'Add 3 cups water and salt and mix well.When the water comes to a boil, reduce heat, cover and cook till both potatoes and rice are cooked.']

title: Herb Cheese Bread
method: ['Preheat oven at 180o C. Line a baking tray with a parchment paper.', 'Heat milk in a non-stick pan and bring to a boil. Add the oil and heat till large bubbles start to form, whisking occasionally.', 'Remove from heat, add the tapioca flour and salt, mix and knead to a gummy dough. Knead further till the dough becomes smooth.', 'Add the mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, thyme and rosemary and mix. Add the eggs, one at a time, and knead to a sticky and stretchy dough.', 'Divide the dough into eight equal portions and shape them into medium size balls. Flatten them lightly and place on the lined tray.', 'Put the tray in the preheated oven and bake for twenty-five to thirty minutes. Remove from oven and cool.', 'Serve.']

title: Squid Koliwada
method: ['Place the squid in a bowl. Add the salt, ginger-garlic paste, red chilli powder, cumin powder and lemon juice and mix well.', 'Add the gram flour and mix. Add the yogurt and mix.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Add the squids, one by one, ensuring that the kadai is not crowded. Deep fry till crisp and golden. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Arrange them in a serving platter and sprinkle chaat masala on top. Serve hot with green mint and coriander chutney.']

title: Ukdiche Modak
method: ['To make the stuffing, heat 4 1/2 teaspoons ghee in a non-stick pan, add poppy seeds, coconut and mix well. Cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add jaggery and mix well and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Grate nutmeg directly into the mixture. Add green cardamom powder and mix well.', 'Take the pan off the heat and set aside to cool down to room temepratuer.', 'To make the covering, heat 2 cups water in a deep non-stick pan. Add salt and 1 teaspoon ghee. Once the water comes to a boil, add the rice flour and mix well. Cover and cook on low heat for 5 minutes. Take the pan off the heat and set aside for 10 minutes.', 'Place a piece of muslin cloth on a steel parat and transfer the rice mixture on it. Gather the edges of the muslin cloth and knead the mixture for 2-3 minutes.', "Open the muslin cloth, transfer the dough in parat, dip your palms in water and ghee alternately and knead to smooth and shiny dough. Make sure it doesn't stick to your hands.", 'Divide the dough into twelve equal portions and shape them into balls. Wet the palms of your hands with water and spread each ball to form a 3 inch bowl. Press the edges of the bowls to reduce the thickness.', 'Place a portion of the stuffing in the centre of the bowl, pleat the edges of the dough and gather them together to form a bundle. Pinch to seal the edges at the top.', 'Heat sufficient water in the lower deck of a steamer.', 'Dip the base of the modak in water and place them in the upper deck of the steamer. Place some saffron strands on each modak. Cover the steamer and steam for 10-12 minutes.', 'Open the lid of the steamer and let the modaks cool a little. Arrange them on a serving plate and serve them warm.']

title: Jain Malai Kofta
method: ['Dry roast cinnamon, cloves, cumin seeds, coriander seeds and cardamoms in a non-stick pan till fragrant. Transfer into a grinder jar, cool and grind into a fine powder.', 'Mix together raw bananas, cottage cheese, capsicum, green chillies, coriander leaves, salt, one teaspoon ground powder, one teaspoon red chilli powder, one-fourth teaspoon turmeric powder and cornflour in a bowl.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Divide the raw banana mixture into equal portions and shape them into small balls or koftas.', 'Deep-fry the koftas in hot oil till golden. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'To make the gravy, heat half tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan, add tomato puree and mix. Add salt, remaining turmeric powder, red chilli powder and sugar, mix well and cook for two to three minutes.', 'Add remaining ground powder and mix well. Add cream, mix well and cook till the oil leaves the masala.', 'Place the koftas on a serving platter. Pour the gravy on them, garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot.']

title: Bangdyache Humman
method: ['Grind coconut, red chillies, half the turmeric powder and tamarind pulp to a fine paste with sufficient water.', 'Grind the trifal with one cup of water and strain. Use only the water.', 'Cut the fish into four pieces each.', 'Apply salt and the remaining turmeric powder and keep aside for fifteen minutes.', 'Heat a kadai, put the trifal water, green chillies, ground paste and mix. Bring it to a boil.']

title: Eggplant Cutlets-Cook Smart
method: ['Cut the eggplants into  1/4  inch thick roundels, place them on a plate, sprinkle salt and set aside.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a non-stick pan.', 'Mix onion, Schezwan chutney and minced chicken in a bowl.', 'Take 1 cup water in a bowl. Spread refined flour and sesame seeds on two separate plates.', 'Coat each eggplant roundel with refined flour. Dampen your hands in water and spread a portion of minced chicken mixture on each eggplant roundel. Roll the chicken covered side in sesame seeds.', 'Place these eggplant roundels, chicken covered side facing down, in the hot oil and shallow-fry on medium heat till the underside is golden. Turn them over, cover and cook till the chicken is fully done. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Arrange them on a serving plate and serve hot garnished with coriander sprigs.']

title: Chakli Sticks-SK Khazana
method: ['Dry roast rice and black gram separately. Remove from heat, cool and grind together to a fine powder. Transfer into a mixing bowl.', 'Add chilli powder, cumin powder, salt and butter and knead well. Add  1/2  cup water and knead to a soft dough.', 'Grease a chakli press with some oil and fill in the dough.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Press in chakli strips directly into hot oil and deep-fry till golden brown. Drain on absorbent paper and cool.', 'Serve or store in airtight container.']

title: Cuban Potatoes
method: ['Preheat oven to 180degC. Halve the potatoes. Chop spring onion bulbs and the greens.Press potato halves lightly and put them in a baking dish.', 'Put the spring onions with the greens over them. Sprinkle salt and pepper powder. Grate cheese on top, sprinkle crushed red chillies. Bake in the preheated oven for 10 minutes. Serve hot.']

title: Rajgira Puri Aloo Sabzi Canapes
method: ['Grate potatoes in a bowl. Add ginger-green chilli paste, chopped coriander and rock salt and mix well. Add rajgira flour, little by little, mix and knead into stiff dough. Add ghee and knead again. Set aside for 10-15 minutes.', 'Heat sufficient ghee in a kadai.', 'Divide the dough into equal portions and place them on a greased plastic sheet. Spread into small puris.', 'Deep-fry puris in hot oil till puffed up and golden. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'For the sabzi, heat ghee in a non-stick pan.', 'Chop green chillies and cut potatoes into cubes.', 'Add cumin seeds to hot ghee and saute till fragrant. Add chopped chillies and saute for 30 seconds.', 'Add cubed potatoes and toss to mix. Add peanuts, salt and coconut, toss to mix, cover and cook for 4-5 minutes on low heat.', 'Arrange the puris on a serving plate and place a portion of the sabzi on it.', 'Sprinkle the salli, red chilli powder and roasted peanuts.', 'Serve garnished with coriander sprigs.']

title: Braided Pesto Bread
method: ['Mix together yeast, milk and castor sugar in a mixing bowl. Set aside for 5-10 minutes.', 'Sift together flour and salt into the yeast mixture. Add oil and knead into a soft dough with enough water. Cover and set aside till it rises and doubles in volume.', 'Preheat oven to 180degC.', 'Place the proved dough on the worktop and knock back to release the excess air. Roll out into a rectangle.', 'Spread pesto on top, leaving a thin border along the edges. Sprinkle cheese on top. Roll lengthwise and cut into half lengthwise. Turn both with the cut side up and start braiding.', 'Place the braided bread on a baking tray. Put the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 30minutes. Remove from heat and cool.', 'Serve.']

title: Madurai Kazhangu Pottalum
ingredients: ['3 medium potatoes (kazhangu), boiled, peeled and mashed', '2-3 banana leaves, cut into 6 x 4 inches rectangles', '1 1/2  tablespoons sesame oil', '1 1/2  teaspoons fennel seeds (saunf)', '10-12 curry leaves', '2 teaspoons finely chopped ginger', '2 teaspoons finely chopped garlic', '1 large onion, roughly chopped', '2 green chillies, finely chopped', 'Salt to taste', ' 1/2  teaspoon turmeric powder', ' 1/2  teaspoon red chilli powder', '1 tablespoon gram flour (besan)', '1 teaspoon sugar', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh coriander leaves', 'Curd rice to serve']
method: ['Heat sesame oil in a kadai, add fennel seeds, curry leaves, ginger and garlic, mix and saute on medium heat for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add onion, mix and saute till translucent. Add green chillies, salt, turmeric powder and red chilli powder, mix and saute for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add gram flour, mix and continue to saute for 2-3 minutes.  Add 2-3 tablespoons water and mix well.', 'Add potatoes and mix till well combined. Add sugar, mix and cook for 1 minute.', 'Add coriander leaves and mix well. Switch the heat off.', 'Place a portion of the potato mixture on individual banana leaves and wrap it into a parcel. This is a pottalum.', 'Serve with curd rice. Open the banana leaves before serving.']
Main ingredients: Potatoes, Banana leaves, Sesame oil, Fennel seeds, Curry leaves, Ginger, Garlic, Onion, Green chillies, Gram flour, Sugar, Fresh coriander leaves

title: Methi Chicken
method: ['Mix together the yogurt and salt in a large bowl. Mix in the chicken and leave to marinate for about half an hour. Chop half the ginger and cut the rest into thin strips.', 'Heat the oil in a pressure cooker. Add the green cardamoms, black cardamom, cloves, cinnamon, bay leaf and mace and saute for one minute. Add the onions and saute till golden brown. Add the garlic, chopped ginger and green chillies and saute for two minutes. Stir in the turmeric powder, coriander powder, chilli powder and one-fourth cup of water. Add the tomatoes and cook till soft and pulpy.', 'Add the marinated chicken and fenugreek leaves and mix well. Seal the cooker with the lid and cook over medium heat till the pressure is released twice (two whistles). Remove the lid when the pressure has reduced completely . Sprinkle kasoori methi, ginger strips and coriander leaves over the shicken.', 'Cover and leave to stand for about five minutes before serving.']

title: Pulihara (Tamarind Rice)
method: ['Soak the tamarind in some water and set aside.', 'Heat 1 teaspoon sesame oil in a non-stick pan. Add Bengal gram, fenugreek seeds, black gram, sesame seeds and coriander seeds, mix and saute till seeds crackle. Break 4 red chillies and add, saute for a minute. Remove from heat, cool and grind into a fine powder.', 'Take the rice in a bowl. Squeeze the tamarind pulp in it and mix well. Set aside.', 'Heat remaining sesame oil in a non-stick pan. Add mustard seeds and let the seeds splutter.', 'Add turmeric powder, asafoetida, curry leaves, remaining red chillies and peanuts, mix well and saute on high heat.', 'Add prepared powder, mix well and cook on low heat for a minute. Add the tamarind rice, mix well and cook for a minute.', 'Add salt, mix well and cook on low heat for 2-3 minutes.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Hare Pyaaz ke Paranthe - SK Khazana
method: ['Mix together wheat flour, ghee, yogurt, carom seeds and salt in a bowl. Add water as required and knead to a soft dough.', 'Mix together potatoes, green chillies, chilli powder, chaat masala, dried mango powder, salt, spring onion bulbs and greens in another bowl.', 'Divide the dough into equal balls, roll out each ball into thick discs and apply some ghee on each of them. Place a spoonful of potato mixture in the centre, bring the edges together and seal and roll into balls.', 'Dust the balls with flour and roll out each into thick paranthas.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa. Place the paranthas on it, one by one, and cook, turning sides and applying a little ghee, till evenly done on both the sides.', 'Serve hot with your choice of pickle.']

title: Rusk
method: ['Take yeast in a bowl. Add a pinch castor sugar and 2 tablespoons warm water, mix and set aside to activate.', 'Take flour in another bowl. Add  1/4  cup castor sugar and salt and mix. Make a well in the center, add activated yeast and whisk well with an electric beater.', 'Add olive oil and whisk to form a soft dough. Cover with cling film and set aside to prove for 15-20 minutes.', 'Grease a baking tin with some butter and dust with some flour.', 'Transfer the dough onto worktop and knock back to release excess air.', 'Transfer the dough into the greased baking tin and level it out. Cover with cling film and set aside to prove for 15-20 minutes.', 'Preheat oven to 180deg C.', 'Brush some milk on top. Place the tin in the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes. Remove from oven, cool and demould.', 'Slice and bake again at 120deg C for at least for 30 minutes. Serve.']

title: Russian Salad Sandwich
method: ['Chop French beans, cut potato and apple into small cubes. Transfer these into a large bowl. Add green peas and carrot.', 'Add lemon juice, crushed black peppercorns, mayonnaise, yogurt and cream and mix well. Add mustard sauce and mix well.', 'Heat some butter in a grill pan. Halve the bagels horizontally, place them in the grill pan and toast, turning sides, till grill marks appear.', 'Transfer the bagels onto the worktop. Place torn lettuce leaves over the base half of all the buns. Spread the Russian salad over the lettuce leaves and top them with the top halves of all the buns.', 'Keep them on a serving plate and serve immediately with an accompaniment of your choice.']

title: Masoor Keema Pulao - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat ghee in a non-stick pan. Add cumin seeds and saute till seeds change colour. Add peppercorns, cinnamon, ginger-garlic paste and onions, mix and saute till onions turn golden brown.', 'Add tomatoes, mix well, cover and cook till soft and pulpy. Add mutton mince and mix well. Add lentils, mix, cover and cook for 2 minutes.', 'Add turmeric powder, coriander powder, chilli powder and garam masala powder and mix well.', 'Add yogurt, mix well, cover and cook till oil separates. Add rice, salt, coriander leaves and 3 cups water, mix, cover and cook till fully done.', 'Garnish with some coriander leaves and serve hot.']

title: Eggless Vanilla Cake - SK Khazana
method: ['Preheat the oven at 180@C. Grease a cake tin with butter and dust with refined flour, keep aside.', 'Take butter in a bowl, add condensed milk and vanilla essence and beat with an electric beater till the colour changes slightly.', 'Sift refined flour, baking soda and baking powder directly into the butter mixture and gently fold in till well combined. Add milk and fold in again.', 'Pour into the greased cake tin, spread the batter evenly and gently tap the tin to remove air bubbles if any.', 'Keep the tin in the preheated tin and bake for 35-40 minutes. Remove from the oven and let it cool.', 'De-mould and cut into squares and serve.']

title: Pear Salad
method: ['To make the dressing whisk together chopped garlic, salt, pepper powder, yogurt, Dijon mustard, raspberry jam and balsamic vinegar. While whisking slowly add the extra virgin olive oil.', 'Break the lettuce leaves with hand and arrange in a salad bowl. Add baby carrots, cherry tomatoes, diced pears and toss lightly. Add the dressing and toss well. Serve chilled.']

title: Raw Jackfruit Ghassi
method: ['Heat one tablespoon oil in a small non-stick bowl, add red chillies and saute for twenty seconds.', 'Put them into a mixer jar, add coconut, half the mustard seeds and tamarind pulp. Add sufficient water and grind to a smooth paste.', 'Heat two tablespoons oil in another non-stick pan, add jackfruit, green peas, ground paste and half cup of water and mix well.', 'Simmer the mixture for about three to four minutes. Add salt and mix well.', 'For tempering, heat remaining oil in the small non-stick pan, add mustard seeds and curry leaves. Once the mustard seeds splutter, add it to the mixture in the other pan. Mix well and simmer for a minute.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot.']

title: Spaghetti Prawn Recheado - SK Khazana
method: ['Put red chillies in a blender jar, add garlic, ginger, black peppercorns, cumin seeds, sea salt, tamarind paste, malt vinegar and  1/4  cup water and blend to a fine paste.', 'Take prawns in a bowl, add salt and turmeric powder and mix well.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick wok , add garlic and saute for 30 seconds. Add the ground recheado masala, mix well and saute till oil separates.', 'Add prawns, mix well and cook till prawns are almost done. Add spaghetti and salt, toss well and cook for 3-4 minutes. Grate cheese on top. Add coriander leaves and toss well.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, grate parmesan cheese on top, garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot.']

title: Spicy Prawn Empanadas
method: ['Sift together the refined flour and salt into a bowl. Add butter and rub till the mixture resembles breadcrumbs.', 'Mix together vinegar and 3 tablespoons water and add. Mix well and knead into a dough. Cover the dough with cling wrap and refrigerate for 30 minutes.', 'Preheat oven to 180oC.', 'Heat olive oil in a non-stick pan. Add garlic and onion and saute well. Add capsicum and saute for 2 minutes.', 'Add tomatoes and tomato puree and mix well. Add salt, red chilli powder, prawns, olives and raisins, mix well and saute for 2-3 minutes.Add coriander leaves and mix well.', 'Dissolve saffron in milk and add to the pan. Mix well, remove from heat and cool down to room temperature.', 'Roll out the dough into a large disc and cut out smaller discs with a cookie cutter.', 'Place a portion of the prawn filling on one side of each disc, brush the edges with milk and fold into a crescent shape. Prick with a fork.', 'Place the empanadas on a baking tray and brush them with some milk. Place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 20-25 minutes.', 'Brush with butter and serve hot.']

title: Black Forest in a Cup-SK Khazana
method: ['Using a medium sized cookie cutter and a slightly smaller sized cookie cutter to cut out 4 discs of each size from the cake slabs.', 'Put whipped cream in a piping bag fitted with a star nozzle and pipe some whipped cream into each serving glasses. Place the smaller disc in each, brush with some sugar syrup, spread 1 tablespoon cherry compote and pipe some more whipped cream.', 'Top with the bigger cake disc and spread 1 tablespoon cherry compote in the centre. Pipe some whipped cream rosettes around the compote and sprinkle some chocolate shavings on top.', 'Garnish with chocolate stick and serve immediately.']

title: Aloo Gobhi Adraki
method: ['Heat oil in a kadai and add cumin seeds. When they begin to change colour, add green chillies and ginger paste. Saute for half a minute.', 'Add potatoes and cauliflower and stir. Saute for two to four minutes.', 'Add turmeric powder, red chilli powder and salt and mix. Add yogurt and mix again, cover and cook on medium heat till done.', 'Add ginger strips and stir well. Add tomato and stir. Garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot.']

title: Sarson ka Saag with Gajar and Shalgam
method: ['Heat ghee in a non-stick pan, add onions and saute till lightly browned.', 'Roughly chop mustard leaves.', 'Add ginger, garlic and green chillies to the pan, mix and saute till the raw smells disappear.', 'Add mustard leaves and bathua. Roughly chop spinach and add.', 'Roughly chop turnip and carrot and add. Mix everything well.', 'Add salt and 1 cup water and mix well. Cover and cook on medium heat till all the vegetables are tender.', 'Blend with a hand blender. Add  1/2  cup water and mix.', 'Add corn meal and mix well. Add home-made butter and mix well.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, put a blob of home-made butter and serve hot with makki ki roti.']

title: Safed Aloo
method: ['Cut potatoes into  1/2  inch pieces and set aside.', 'Put almonds and poppy seeds in a blender jar and blind to a fine powder.', 'Take yogurt in a bowl, add almond-poppy seed powder, mawa, salt and green cardamom powder and mix well.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add button red chillies and ginger, mix and saute for 1 minute. Add the potatoes, mix well and saute for 2-3 minutes on medium heat.', 'Add the yogurt mixture and mix well. Cook for 4-5 minutes on medium heat.', 'Add lemon juice and mix well.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander sprigs and serve hot.']

title: Mixed Fruit Custard
method: ['Whisk custard powder and milk well and cook.', 'Add Sugar Free and cook till thick. Set aside to cool. Chill in the refrigerator.', 'Peel bananas and cut into pieces. Mix bananas, musk melon and plums. Place a portion of the mixed fruits in a stemmed glass. Pour some chilled custard on top. Halve the strawberries and place them decoratively along the rim of the glass.', 'Put some pomegranate pearls in the centre and serve chilled.']

title: Baigan ka Bharta
method: ['Brush some oil over the brinjal. Place it on direct flame and roast on low heat from all sides till the skin gets charred. Transfer onto a plate and let cool.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add onions and saute till golden. Add tomatoes, mix and cook for 3-4 minutes or till oil separates.', 'Peel and mash the brinjal.', 'Add chilli powder and salt to the pan and mix well. Add mashed brinjal, mix and cook for 3-4 minutes. Add coriander leaves and mix well.', 'Serve hot garnished with crushed peppercorns and a fresh coriander sprig.']

title: Peppy Prawns
method: ['Put salt, a  1/4  teaspoon pepper powder, half the crushed peppercorns, 1 tablespoon cornflour and 1 tablespoon soy sauce in a bowl and mix. Add prawns, mix well and set aside to marinate for fifteen minutes. Mix remaining cornflour with 2 tablespoons water in a small bowl.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a non-stick wok and deep-fry prawns for two minutes. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Heat 1 1/2  tablespoons oil in a non-stick pan, add garlic, ginger and spring onions and saute for two minutes on high heat.', 'Add prawns, salt, remaining pepper powder, half the remaining crushed black peppercorns, remaining soy sauce, cornflour mixture and spring onion greens. Stir-fry on high heat for four minutes, or until the prawns are cooked through.', 'Sprinkle the remaining crushed black peppercorns and serve hot.']

title: Lemon Baked Chicken
method: ['Preheat oven to 180oC. Grease a baking dish with some olive oil.', 'Slice potatoes and place in the greased dish. Sprinkle salt and drizzle 2 teaspoons olive oil on top. Put dish in the oven and bake for 15 minutes.', 'Roughly chop red and green capsicums and place these in a bowl.', 'Cut lemons into thin wedges.', 'Add lemon juice, garlic cloves, chicken, green chilli sauce, ginger-garlic paste, salt, pepper powder and lemon wedges to the bowl. Mix well. Add 2 tablespoons olive oil, mix well and set aside to marinate for 2 hours.', 'Take the baking dish with potatoes out of the oven and put the marinated chicken along with lemon and vegetables on top. Place the dish back in the oven and bake at 180oC for 1 hour 15 minutes.', 'Serve hot on a bed of salad leaves.']

title: Rajasthani Panchmel Dal - SK Khazana
method: ['Put whole green gram, whole red lentils, split pigeon peas, split black gram and split Bengal gram in a pressure cooker. Add turmeric powder, salt and 4 cups water and mix. Put the lid on and cook under pressure for 1-2 whistles.', 'Heat oil in a deep non-stick pan, add cumin seeds and saute till it changes colour. Add cloves, break dried red chillies and add. Add asafoetida, ginger paste and tomato and mix well. Saute till the tomato turns pulpy.', 'Add cumin powder, coriander powder and red chilli powder. Add  1/2  cup water and saute till oil separates.', 'Add the cooked grams and sufficient water and mix well. Add garam masala powder, a little salt and coriander leaves and mix well. Cook for 3-4 minutes on medium heat.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot with steamed rice.']

title: Brun Pav - SK Khazana
method: ['Sieve refined flour into a bowl. Add salt and castor sugar and mix well.', 'Make a well in the middle, add activated yeast and mix well. Add sufficient water and knead into soft dough. Add oil and knead again till smooth. Cover with a damp cloth and set aside to prove for 10-15 minutes.', 'Dust flour on the worktop and place the prepared dough on it. Knock back the dough and divide into 6 equal portions. Grease your hands with a little oil and shape each portion into a ball. Place them on a greased baking tray and cover with a damp muslin cloth. Set aside to prove for 20-25 minutes.', 'Preheat the oven to 180o C.', 'Gently remove the muslin cloth and spray water over the dough balls. Keep the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 20-25 minutes.', 'Serve with butter and masala tea.']

title: Chocolate Cupcakes with Peppermint Frosting
method: ['Preheat oven to 180deg C. Line a small cupcake mould tray with mini paper cupcakes.', 'Cream together butter and castor sugar in a bowl with an electric beater. Add eggs gradually and whisk well. Add vanilla essence and whisk.', 'Sieve in flour, baking powder and cocoa powder and fold in well. Add milk and mix well.', 'Fill a piping bag with this batter and pipe out into the lined tray. Place it on a baking tray.', 'Place the baking tray in the preheated oven and bake for 5-8 minutes. Take them out of the oven and set aside to cool.', 'To prepare peppermint frosting, cream together butter and icing sugar in another bowl. Add peppermint essence and edible green colour and mix well.', 'Fill a piping bag fitted with a star nozzle with frosting and pipe out rosettes on top of baked cupcakes. Sprinkle edible colourful sprinklers on top.\nServe.']

title: Aam Ka Sheera
method: ['Heat ghee in a non stick pan, add semolina and saute on medium heat, stirring continuously, till golden brown.', 'Add one cup water, mix and cook for five minutes.', 'Add milk, mango pulp and sugar, mix well and cook for ten minutes.', 'Add the chopped nuts and mix well.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Dahiwala Cake
method: ['Preheat the oven at 180degC. Grease a cake tin.Sieve together maida, baking powder and baking soda into a bowl.', 'Break eggs, separate the whites and yolks.', 'Whisk together butter and sugar in a bowl, add 1 egg yolk at a time and keep whisking.', 'Add vanilla essence, lemon rind and yogurt and mix well. Fold maida into this batter.', 'Whisk egg whites separately and add to the maida mixture.', 'Pour the batter into the greased cake tin and bake in the preheated oven for 35 minutes.', 'Remove from the mould and cut into wedges. Arrange the wedges on a serving plate and serve.']

title: Ambe Sasam
method: ['Peel the mangoes, remove the seed and cut into one-inch cubes.', 'Grind together the coconut, red chillies, mustard seeds, tamarind pulp with one-fourth cup of water into a coarse paste.', 'Add jaggery and blend once again. Place the mango cubes and grapes in a bowl.', 'Add the salt and the ground masala. Mix well and serve cold.']

title: Kiri Hodi
method: ['Heat coconut milk in a non-stick pan.', 'Slice onion and add with fenugreek seeds, turmeric powder, green chillies and half the curry leaves. Roughly chop the remaining curry leaves and add with salt and cinnamon stick and mix well.', 'Add dried Maldives fish and mix well. Bring this to a boil. Add lemon juice and mix well.', 'Pour the kiri hodi into a serving bowl and serve piping hot.']

title: Chicken Laksa
method: ['To make laksa paste, combine peanuts, red chillies, coriander stems, tamarind paste, turmeric powder, shallots, chopped lemon grass, chopped ginger, chopped garlic, salt and little water in a grinder jar. Grind into a paste.', 'Heat oil in a non stick pan. Cut the chicken into thin strips.', 'Add sliced onions to the pan and saute till golden brown.', 'Add laksa paste and chicken stock. Stir to mix and add chicken strips. Stir to mix and cook till the chicken is done.', 'Add salt, stir to mix and bring it to a boil. Add coconut milk and stir again. Cook for a minute.', 'Place the noodles in a serving bowl. Pour the chicken laksa on top and add bean sprouts, cucumber slices, torn mint leaves and lemon juice on top. Serve hot.']

title: Desi Sloppy Joes -SK Khazana
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add onion and saute till translucent. Add garlic paste and ginger paste, mix well and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add tomato puree, mix well and saute till the oil separates.', 'Add cumin powder, coriander powder, red chilli powder, garam masala powder and green chillies, mix well. Mix well.', 'Add mutton mince, mix well. Add salt, mix well and saute on high heat for 5-6 minutes. Add coriander leaves and  3/4  cup water, mix well, cover and cook for 15-20 minutes.', 'Preheat the oven to 180@C.', 'Halve the burger buns, apply butter on both sides, place them on a baking tray, keep the tray in the preheated oven and toast it for 5-7 minutes.', 'Keep the top of the buns aside. Place a generous portion of the mutton mixture on each bun base. Place a cheese slice over the mutton mixture. Keep the tray back in the hot oven and bake for 5 minutes or till the cheese melts. Take it out of the oven and place the top half of the buns over the cheese.', 'Transfer the buns on a serving plate and serve hot with French fries, onion rings and lemon wedge.']

title: Roasted Garlic Bread
method: ['Preheat the oven to 180degC.', 'Cut off a thin slice from the bottom side of 2 garlic bulbs, place them cut side upwards on a baking tray, drizzle 1 tsp olive oil on each bulb, sprinkle crushed black peppercorns and paprika powder. Keep the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 20-25 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, finely chop a few sprigs of parsley and rosemary leaves.', 'Slice the baguette into thick slices without cutting through.', 'Take butter in a bowl, add parsley, rosemary and crushed black peppercorns. Squeeze the pulp of the roasted garlic and add it to the butter and mix well.', 'Apply the butter mixture between each slice of the baguette. Place it on the baking tray, keep the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes.', 'Separate the slices and place on a serving platter and serve hot.']

title: Blueberry Mascarpone Pies
method: ['To make the filling, combine together the castor sugar and cornstarch in a bowl and mix well. Add one-fourth cup of water and one cup of blueberries and mix by mashing.', 'Transfer in a non-stick pan. Place the pan on heat and cook till the mixture thickens, stirring frequently.', 'Remove from heat, add the remaining blueberries, mix well and cool. Add lemon juice and mix well. Add mascarpone cheese and mix well.', 'To make the crust, combine together the flour and butter in a bowl and mix till it resembles breadcrumbs. Add milk and two tablespoons water, mix and knead into a stiff dough. Refrigerate for fifteen minutes.', 'Preheat oven at 180o C.', 'Roll out the dough into a thin sheet and line a pie dish with it. Discard the edges, place a butter paper in it and fill with kidney beans. Place the dish in the preheated oven and blind bake till half done.', 'Remove from the oven and spread the prepared filling in the crust. Put the dish back in the preheated oven and bake for ten to fifteen minutes.', 'Cut into wedges and serve.']

title: Easy Mutton Pulao - SK khazana
method: ['Heat 1 tbsp ghee in a pressure cooker, add cinnamon, green cardamoms, black peppercorns and cloves and saute till fragrant.', 'Add mutton and saute on high heat till the mutton turns golden brown.', 'Thinly slice onion and add. Add salt and mix well.', 'Add turmeric powder and mix well. Add 2 cups water, mix well and let the mixture come to a boil.', 'Cover the pressure cooker and cook on medium heat under pressure till 6 whistles are released. Allow the pressure to reduce completely.', 'Open the pressure cooker and strain the mixture into a large bowl. Take the mutton pieces out and transfer them into another bowl.', 'Heat remaining ghee in a deep heavy bottom pan, add sliced onion, mix well and saute till golden brown. Add ginger-garlic paste, mix and saute for 1 minute. Add rice and mix gently.', 'Add the mutton stock and mix well. Add Tata Sampann Meat Masala and mix well.', 'Add ginger strips, green chillies, coriander leaves and the mutton pieces and mix gently. Cover and cook on low heat till the rice is cooked completely. Switch the heat off and let it sit covered for 10 minutes.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with boiled egg and serve hot with salad and papad.']

title: Goan Sausage Chilli Fry
method: ['Heat water in a non-stick, add sausages and boil for 2-3 minutes. Drain.', 'Peel the outer layer of the drained sausages and cut them into large pieces.', 'Heat butter in a non-stick pan, add onions and saute till translucent. Add capsicum and mix well. Add tomatoes and saute on high heat for 1-2 minutes. Add tomato puree and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add salt, red chilli powder and vinegar and cook for 2-3 minutes. Add sugar and mix well. Add chopped sausage pieces and mix well. Cook for 2 minutes.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Hush Puppies Oatmeal and Corn Popcorn
method: ['Take Saffola Masala Curry and Pepper Oats in a bowl. Add corn kernels, refined flour, polenta, 1 tsp red chilli powder and sea salt. Grate cheese into it and mix well.', 'Add beer and mix well.', 'Roughly chop spring onion green stalks and add. Mix well and set aside for 20-25 minutes.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Drop very small portions of the oats-corn mixture in the oil and deep-fry till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Sprinkle red chilli powder and sea salt on top and serve hot.']

title: Saagwala Chicken - SK Khazana
