method: ['Cut 150 grams feta cheese into medium sized cubes and transfer into a mixing bowl. Set aside remaining cheese.', 'Cut 150 grams cottage into cubes and add to the feta cheese cubes and mix lightly. Set aside remaining cottage cheese.', 'Add the 7 red grapes and watermelon balls. Cut  1/2  kiwi into cubes and add into bowl.', 'To make the dressing, take honey in another bowl, add salt, black pepper, juice of 2 lemons and olive oil and mix well.', 'Pour 2 ladles of dressing over salad ingredients in the other bowl and mix gently till all the ingredients are well coated. Tear 2-3 basil leaves and add.', 'Cut  1/4  watermelon into thin semi-circular slices. Arrange these slices on the outer edge of a circular serving plate with the curved part facing outwards. Transfer half the salad in the centre of the plate. Garnish with 3 basil leaves and remaining halved and seeded red grapes and serve.', 'Add the remaining cottage cheese and feta cheese cubes to the remaining dressing, crumble them and mix well.', 'Arrange the canape shells on the worktop, put some of the cheese-dressing mixture in each and keep these on a serving plate.', 'Cut a few triangular slices from the remaining watermelon and arrange them all around the canapes. Garnish each canape with 1-2 watermelon cubes and mint leaves. Keep one whole red grape between the watermelon triangles. Serve immediately.']

title: Chicken Cuppa Noodles
method: ['Heat oil in a deep non-stick pan. Add garlic and saute for 30 seconds. Add red chili and onion and saute till onion turns translucent.', 'Add chicken, mix and cook for 1-2 minutes. Add salt and mix. Add mushrooms and corn kernels, mix and cook for 1 minute.', 'Break noodles and add along with chicken stock and light soy sauce, mix and cook till noodles are done.', 'Add spring onion greens and mix.', 'Serve hot garnished with some spring onion greens.']

title: Noodle Wrapped Chicken
method: ['Preheat the oven at 180o C.', 'Take chicken pieces in a bowl. Add garlic, ginger, green chillies, chilli sauce, soy sauce, crushed peppercorns, sesame seeds and salt and mix well. Set aside to marinate for 10-15 minutes.', 'Take noodles in another bowl. Add salt, crushed peppercorns and cornstarch and mix well.', 'Take pieces of marinated chicken and wrap them in the noodles covering the pieces fully. Place them on a baking tray, put tray in preheated oven and bake till the chicken is cooked.', 'Remove from heat and brush the noodle wrapped chicken with some oil.', 'Serve hot with sweet red chilli sauce.']

title: Rayalseema Pesarettu
method: ['Drain and coarsely grind moong daal and parboiled rice with dried red chillies, green chillies, onions, ginger and salt.', 'Transfer the mixture into a bowl. Add curry leaves, coriander leaves and white sesame seeds and mix.', 'Coarsely grind peanuts, black peppercorns and cumin seeds and add to the bowl and mix well.', 'Add a little water to get the required consistency and mix.', 'Heat a non stick tawa and drizzle a little oil on it.', 'Put a ladle full of batter on it and spread into a thin pancake.', 'Drizzle a little all around and cook, turning sides, till both sides become golden brown and crisp. Serve hot.']

title: Tea Smoothie-SK Khazana
method: ['Blend together ice cream, milk, tea and tea masala till smooth.', 'Pour into individual glasses and top with some whipped cream.', 'Garnish with cookie pieces, sprinkle some tea masala on top and serve immediately.']

title: Chana Dal Parantha
method: ['Take Tata Sampann Chana Dal in a large bowl, add sufficient water and wash the dal thoroughly. Drain and transfer into another bowl, add sufficient water and soak for 3-4 hours. Drain.', 'Heat a non-stick wok, add the soaked dal, 2 cups water, salt and turmeric powder and mix well. Cover and cook for 15-20 minutes.', 'Transfer the mixture into a puran yantra (masher), add green chilli, ginger and cumin seeds and mince the mixture finely.', 'Add red chilli powder, garam masala powder and coriander leaves and mix well.', 'Divide the dough into equal portions. Divide the chana dal mixture into same number of equal portions.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa.', 'Take one portion of dough, shape it into a ball, dust with flour and shape it into a katori, stuff it with a portion of dal mixture, bring the edges together and press to seal. Roll out each stuffed ball into a small parantha.', 'Place the parantha on hot tawa and roast for 1-2 minutes. Flip and cook the other side for 1-2 minutes. Apply a little ghee on each side and cook for 1-2 minutes on each side till golden and brown specks appear on both sides.', 'Take it off the tawa and place on a serving plate. Similarly make the remaining paranthe and serve hot with yogurt.']

title: Christmas Chocolate Bark
method: ['Melt all three chocolates in 3 different bowls in a microwave for 30 seconds.', 'Grease 2 different aluminum trays, one shallow and one deep, with butter.', 'Bring the three chocolate bowls out of the microwave. Whisk the white chocolate well till it is smooth and lump free. Add the pistachios. Chop a few cranberries and add a few whole cranberries and mix well.', 'Pour this mixture into the shallow tray and give the surface a bark like effect with the back of a spoon.', 'Add whole walnuts, cashewnuts, almonds and cranberries to the melted dark chocolate and mix well. Set aside at a room temperature.', 'Pour the dark chocolate into the deep aluminum tray and spread unevenly. Put the melted milk chocolate over it and give it a marble effect.', 'Let both the chocolates set at room temperature.', 'Remove from the aluminum tray and cut them at a slant into uneven pieces. Arrange them on a serving plate and serve.']

title: Imarti
method: ['Take Tata Sampann Urad Dal in a bowl, add sufficient water and soak for 6-7 hours.', 'Heat a deep non-stick pan, add sugar and 4 cups water and mix well. Stir till all the sugar dissolves. Add milk and mix well. When the scum rises to the surface, collect it and discard. Lower the heat and continue to cook the sugar syrup till it reaches one string consistency.', 'Add green cardamom powder, mix and take the pan off the heat. Keep the syrup warm.', 'Drain Tata Sampann Urad Dal and put it into a blender jar, add 1 cup water and blend to a smooth mixture. Transfer the mixture into a parat. Add cornflour and food colour, mix with your hand till well combined.', 'Heat sufficient ghee in a kadai. Transfer the ground mixture into a jalebi cloth and gather the edges to make a potli.', 'Pipe out the batter into medium hot ghee in the shape of imartis. Deep-fry on medium heat till golden and crisp. Drain and immerse into the sugar syrup and let it soak for 4-5 minutes.', 'Drain the imartis from the sugar syrup and arrange them on a serving plate. Garnish with pistachios and serve.']

title: Fried Prawns in Mushroom Ginger Sauce
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Take cornflour on a plate, coat the prawns in it and deep-fry in hot oil. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Heat one tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan, add garlic, ginger and onions and saute till the onions turn brown.', 'Add capsicum, salt, crushed peppercorns, sugar, vinegar and soy sauce and mix well. Add one cup vegetable stock and stir well.', 'Add mushrooms and cook for a minute or till the mushrooms turn soft.', 'Take 4 tablespoons cornflour in a bowl, add remaining vegetable stock and mix well to make a smooth slurry. Add the slurry to the mushroom mixture and mix well.', 'Add fried prawns to the mushroom sauce and toss lightly.', 'Serve hot garnished with coriander leaves.']

title: Falafel
method: ['Blend chickpeas in a blender. Add garlic and blend again. Add onion and little water and blend. Add coriander, parsley and a little water and blend again into a coarse mixture.', 'Transfer mixture into a bowl. Add breadcrumbs, sesame seeds, cumin powder, black pepper powder, coriander powder, salt and baking soda and mix well.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Spread flour on a plate.', 'Divide chickpea mixture into equal portions shaped into small patties. Dust them with flour and deep-fry falafels on medium heat till golden. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot on a bed of lettuce.']

title: Crispy Fried Chicken
method: ['Make incisions all around the chicken drumsticks and place them in a bowl. Add salt, crushed black peppercorns and ginger-garlic paste, mix well and set aside to marinate for 15-20 minutes.', 'Take yogurt in a large bowl, add 1 1/2  cups water and whisk till well combined. Add this mixture to the chicken, mix well and set aside to marinate for 25-30 minutes more.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Take refined flour on a plate, add rice flour, salt, crushed black peppercorns, dried herbs and red chilli flakes and mix well. Crush and add cornflakes and mix well.', 'Roll each chicken drumstick in the flour mixture till they are well coated on all sides. Slide them into hot oil and deep-fry till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Arrange them on a serving plate and serve hot with tomato ketchup.']

title: Reshmi Paneer
ingredients: ['250 gms cottage cheese (paneer)', '3 tbsps oil', ' 1/2  tsp cumin seeds', '2 medium onions, thickly sliced', '2 tsps ginger paste', '2 tsps garlic paste', ' 1/4  tsp turmeric powder', '1 tsp coriander powder', ' 1/2  tsp red chilli powder', '2 tbsps cashewnuts paste', ' 1/4  cup yogurt', '3 tbsps tomato puree', '1 large green capsicum, cut into thick strips', '1 large yellow capsicum, cut into thick strips', '1 large red capsicum, cut into thick strips', '2 medium tomatoes, cut into thick strips', 'Salt to taste', 'A pinch of garam masala powder', 'A pinch of green cardamom powder', '2 tbsps crumbled mawa / khoya', '2 tbsps cream', 'A few sprigs fresh coriander leaves']
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick wok, add cumin seeds and onions and saute.', 'Cut cottage cheese into thick fingers.', 'When onions soften, add ginger paste and garlic paste and saute for 1 minute. Add turmeric powder, coriander powder and red chilli powder, mix and saute.', 'Add cashewnuts paste and mix. Add yogurt and mix. Add tomato puree and mix.', 'Add green, yellow and red capsicums, tomatoes and mix. Saute for1 minute.', 'Add salt, cottage cheese fingers, garam masala powder, green cardamom powder, crumbled mawa and cream and mix.', 'Simmer for 2 minutes. Chop coriander leaves and add.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot.']

title: Fruit and Nut Smoothie
method: ['Blend together almonds, walnuts, lychee flesh, yogurt, castor sugar and milk to a smooth mixture.', 'Serve.']

title: Jhatphat Poha Kheer
method: ['Heat the milk in a deep non stick pan. Place the poha in a sieve and pour water over it to moisten the poha. Slice the almonds and pistachios finely.', 'Mix the saffron with a little hot milk in a small bowl. Heat ghee in a non stick frying pan, add almonds and pistachios and fry till golden. Set them aside in a small bowl.', 'When the milk begins to boil, add the poha and stir well. Add green cardamom powder and mix. Add condensed milk and mix well. Add the saffron milk and mix well.', 'When the kheer comes to a boil again, add the fried almonds and pistachios. Serve hot or chill and serve.']

title: Fish Cutlet
method: ['Heat 1 tbsp oil in a non stick pan, add ginger and saute till light golden.', 'Add fish fillets and cook, turning sides, till evenly cooked on both the sides.Add green chillies, mix and transfer it into a bowl.', 'Add potato, soya granules, nutmeg powder, coriander leaves, salt and egg white and mix well.Heat oil in a non stick pan. Divide the mixture into equal portions and shape them into cutlets.', 'Shallow fry the cutlets, a few at a time, till golden and crisp on both the sides. Drain on absorbent paper.Transfer onto a serving plate and serve hot.']

title: Curried Mushroom Khari
method: ['Heat olive oil in a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds and let their colour change.', 'Add green chillies, mix and saute for 30 seconds. Add garlic, mix and saute till it turns light brown.', 'Add onion, mix and saute till it turns translucent. Add curry powder and dried fenugreek leaves and mix well.', 'Add mushrooms, mix and cook for a minute. Add salt, mix and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add processed cheese and mix. Add cream and coriander leaves and mix well.', 'Break a little portion on top of each khari to make a cavity and place them on a serving platter. Fill the mushroom mixture into the cavities and garnish with coriander sprigs. Serve immediately.']

title: Grilled Fish Crispy Noodles Salad
method: ['Cut fish fillet into halves and place on a plate. Add salt, pepper powder,  1/2  tablespoon sesame oil and  1/2  tablespoon minced garlic. Rub well on both sides and set aside to marinate for 5 minutes.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon sesame oil in a non-stick grill pan. Place marinated fish on it and grill till evenly done from both sides.', 'To make dressing, combine remaining garlic, remaining sesame oil, salt, soy sauce, chilli sauce, vinegar and pepper powder in a small jar. Cover and shake well.', 'Combine cabbage, carrot, spring onion greens and sesame seeds in a bowl. Cut grilled fish into small pieces and add. Toss well.', 'Add dressing and mix gently. Crush noodles and add. Toss to mix.', 'Add dressing and mix gently. Crush noodles and add. Toss to mix.\nServe immediately garnished with sesame seeds.']

title: Jhuri Aloo Bhaja
method: ['Take a bowl of water, grate potatoes into the bowl and wash them well. Squeeze the grated potatoes and spread on a kitchen towel to dry.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai, add the grated potatoes and deep- fry on low heat till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Add peanuts to the same hot oil and deep-fry till crisp. Drain on absorbent paper. Deep fry the curry leaves in the same oil and drain on absorbent paper.', 'Put the fried potatoes, peanuts and curry leaves in a bowl, add salt, crushed black peppercorns and chaat masala and mix well.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.']

title: Ragi Biscuits
method: ['Roast millet flour on low heat till fragrant. Remove from heat and cool.', 'Sieve together millet flour, wheat flour and baking powder into a bowl.', 'Cut butter into small pieces, add to the sieved flour mixture and rub with your fingertips till the mixture resembles breadcrumbs. Add powdered sugar and mix well.', 'Add some milk and vanilla essence, mix and knead into a smooth dough. Refrigerate for 20 minutes.', 'Preheat oven to 180oC. Grease a baking tray with some oil.', 'Dust the worktop with some flour and roll out the dough. The rolled out dough should not be too thin or too thick. Cut into round biscuits with a small cookie cutter. Poke with a fork in a striped pattern.', 'Place the biscuits on the greased tray, put the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes. Remove from oven and cool.', 'Serve or store it in an airtight container.']

title: Matka Kulfi
method: ['Heat milk in a saucepan and bring it to boil. Simmer and reduce to one third the original quantity, stirring constantly.', 'Add sugar and stir till it dissolves. Soak saffron in a tablespoon of warm milk and add it to the reduced milk.', 'Chop the toasted almonds and add it to the milk. Add green cardamom powder and mix.', 'Pour the above mixture into four small matkas and freeze it for four to five hours. Serve chilled.']

title: BABY METHI BHAJI
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add green chillies and garlic and saute till golden brown in color.', 'Add onions, mix and saute on high heat till the onions soften. Add fenugreek leaves and mix well. Add pigeon peas and mix well.', 'Add turmeric powder,  1/2  cup water, mix well, cover and cook on medium heat for 5 minutes or till the pigeon peas soften.', 'Add salt and jaggery, mix well and saute for 1-2 minutes on a medium heat. Add coconut and mix well. Increase heat and cook, stirring, till most of the moisture dries up.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot.']

title: Rasmalai Mousse in Orange Cups
method: ['Take white chocolate ganache in a bowl, add whipped cream and mix well.', 'Add chopped rasmalai and flavored milk and mix well. Add almonds and pistachios and mix well.', 'Fill this mixture into a piping bag fitted with a nozzle and pipe it into each orange cup.', 'Quarter a rasmalai and place a slice over each cup. Drizzle some flavoured milk on each, garnish with pistachios and almonds and serve chilled.']

title: Choco Coconut Macaroons-Cook Smart
method: ['Preheat oven to 180o C.', 'Break eggs, separate the yolks from the whites and put them into two separate bowls. Use the whites for this recipe. Beat the whites well with an electric beater. Add cream of tartar and continue to beat.', 'Add sugar little by little and beat well.', 'Add coconut and mix well. Add vanilla essence and cocoa powder and continue to mix. Add almond powder and chocolate chips and mix again lightly.', 'Place a silicon sheet on a baking tray. Place spoonsful of mixture on the sheet keeping enough space between each.', 'Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes.', 'Remove the tray from the oven, cool down the macaroons to room temperature, arrange on a serving plate and serve. Or store in an airtight container.']

title: Farali Chiwda
method: ['Peel and grate the potatoes in a bowl filled with water. Set aside for five minutes. Drain excess water and pat dry on a paper towel.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Deep-fry on low heat till golden and crisp. Drain on an absorbent paper.', 'Deep-fry the peanuts and the green chillies in the same oil. Drain on an absorbent paper.', 'Mix together the fried potatoes, peanuts, chillies, powdered sugar and rock salt in a bowl.', 'Serve.']

title: Deconstructed Vada Pav
ingredients: ['8 slices of French baguette, toasted with butter till golden', '1 teaspoon oil', ' 1/2  teaspoon mustard seeds', '5 curry leaves', '1 1/2  tablespoons ginger-garlic-green chilli-coriander leaves paste', ' 1/2  teaspoon turmeric powder', '5-6 medium sweet potatoes, boiled, peeled and roughly chopped', 'Salt to taste', 'Green chutney as required', 'Vada pav chutney as required', '1 cup salted boondi', 'Chives, halved for garnish']
method: ['Heat oil in a deep non-stick pan, add mustard seeds and curry leaves. Once the mustard seeds splutter, add ginger-garlic-green chilli-coriander leaves paste. Saute on medium heat till oil separates.', 'Add turmeric powder and mix well. Add sweet potatoes and mix well.  Add salt and saute for a minute. Switch off heat.', 'Place 2 baguette slices on a worktop. Spread some green chutney over them.', 'Sprinkle vada pav chutney on top. Spread some cooked mixture in a dome shape on top.', 'Take boondis in a bowl and roll the prepared bread slices, upside down, in it till well coated with boondi. Make more deconstructed vada pavs in the same way.', 'Transfer deconstructed vada pavs on a serving platter.', 'Serve immediately, garnished with chives.']

title: Sweet Momo Curry
method: ['Take refined flour in a bowl. Add 1 tbsp ghee, salt, 1 tbsp sugar, 3 tbsps coconut milk and a pinch of green cardamom powder and mix well. Add sufficient water and knead to medium stiff dough. Apply ghee on the dough, cover with muslin cloth and set aside to rest.', 'To make filling, heat remaining ghee in a stainless steel pan, add mixed nuts and coconut and saute lightly. Add jaggery and switch off heat. Stir till the jaggery melts, add a pinch of green cardamom powder. Switch on heat and cook on low heat till pan is hot and switch off heat again. Transfer into a bowl and set aside to cool.', 'Divide the dough into equal portions. Take water in a bowl. Dust flour on the worktop, roll each portion into a thin disc. Apply water on the edges. Place some filling in the centre, fold in the sides and seal the edges to make momos.', 'Heat  3/4  cup water in a copper based stainless steel pan, add remaining coconut milk and stir well. Add the momos, remaining green cardamom powder and remaining sugar and mix well. Keep stirring continuously gently. Cook for 10-12 minutes on low heat.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with mixed nuts and serve immediately.']

title: Basundi Pannacotta
method: ['Heat milk in a deep non-stick pan and bring to a boil. Add saffron and pistachios and stir to mix, boil further.', 'Add cardamom powder and mix well. Add almond powder and mix well. Boil for  1/2  an hour or till the milk is reduced.', 'Add Milkmaid and mix well. Add sugar and mix well. Boil further till the milk gets reduced.', 'Bring 4 tbsps water to a boil in another non-stick pan. Add gelatin and let it bloom. Add this to the reducing milk and mix well. Cook for a minute.', 'Pour the reduced milk mixture into 4 individual shot glasses filling  3/4  and refrigerate for 2 hours or till set.', 'Peel kiwi. Deseed red grapes and finely chop. Finely chop kiwi. Mix both fruits and place portions into the shot glasses.', 'Dip a fresh mint leaf in castor sugar and place on the fruits in each glass. Serve immediately.']

title: Poha Laddoo - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat a non-stick pan, add pressed rice and roast until light golden brown. Allow it cool, transfer into a grinder jar and grind into a fine powder.', 'Transfer the powdered pressed rice into a bowl, add jaggery, almonds, cashewnuts and hot melted ghee and mix well.', 'Add green cardamom powder and mix well. Divide the mixture into equal portions and shape them into laddoos.', 'Garnish each laddoo with an almond sliver and serve.']

title: Quinoa Vegetable Biryani
method: ['Heat ghee in a deep non-stick deep pan, add cumin seeds and saute till the seeds change colour. Add onion and saute till translucent.', 'Add ginger-garlic paste, mix well and saute for 1-2 minutes or till the raw smells disappear. Add tomatoes, mix well and saute till they become pulpy. Add salt, red chilli powder, turmeric powder, cumin powder, coriander powder and  1/4  tsp green cardamom powder, mix well and saute for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add biryani masala, mix well and saute till oil separates.', 'Add cauliflower, carrot, French beans, potato, green peas, fenugreek leaves, fried onion, a little salt and yogurt, mix well and cook for 8-10 minutes.', 'Add quinoa, spread it evenly, then add brown rice and spread it evenly. Sprinkle saffron milk, remaining fried onion, coriander leaves, mint leaves, green chillies, ginger strips, remaining green cardamom powder, rose water and screwpine water. Cover with aluminium foil and place the lid over it. Cook on low heat for 10-15 minutes.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander sprig and serve hot with raita.']

title: Breakfast Pancake
method: ['Sift flour, baking soda, baking powder and salt into a bowl. Add buttermilk and salt and whisk.', 'Add egg and whisk. Add 3 tbsps oil and whisk. Add a little water to adjust consistency and whisk to a smooth batter.', 'Thickly slice onion.', 'Heat 4 tbsps oil in one non-stick pan and 1 tsp oil in another non-stick pan.', 'Spread a ladle full of batter thickly in the second pan and cook.', 'Add onions to the 1st pan and saute. Diagonally slice the chilli chicken sausages and add to this pan. Add mixed herbs and salt and mix and saute for 2-3 minutes.', 'Turn the pancake when the underside is golden and cook the other side similarly. Similarly cook the remaining pancakes.', 'Spread the sausage mixture equally over each pancake.', 'Garnish with a sprig of curly parsley and serve immediately.']

title: Watermelon and Crumbled Cheese Salad
method: ['To make dressing, roughly chop bottled jalapenos and place in a blender jar. Add chopped coriander, 2 tablespoons oil and salt and blend into a smooth paste. Transfer in a bowl, add remaining oil and whisk well.', 'Combine watermelon, pineapple, green, yellow and red peppers, sliced fresh jalapenos, green and black olives and corn kernels in another bowl and toss lightly.', 'Tear lollo rosso and place on a serving plate. Put the salad on one side and add the dressing on it. Garnish with carrot juliennes and sprinkle feta cheese on top. Serve immediately with lemon slices.']

title: Chidambaram Gothsu
method: ['Heat 2 tbsps oil in a small non-stick pan. Add cumin seeds, coriander seeds, fenugreek seeds, split Bengal gram and saute.', 'Add dried red chillies, asafoetida and mix well. Cool and coarsely grind to a paste with a little water.', 'Heat 4 tbsps oil in another non stick kadai. Add curry leaves and shallots and saute till golden brown.', 'Cut the brinjals into long slices and add. Add tamarind paste and mix well.', 'Add red chilli powder, turmeric powder, salt and mix well.', 'Add approximately  1/2  cup water and cook for 2-3 minutes on low heat till brinjals become soft.', 'Add the ground masala and mix well. Cook for 1-2 minutes. Serve hot.']

title: Aloo Sabzi Sandwich
method: ['Thinly slice onion and tomatoes.', 'Preheat a non-stick griller.', 'Place bread slices on a worktop, spread some butter and green chutney on half the slices. Evently spread some aloo sabzi over each of them.', 'Place some tomato slices over the sabzi and sprinkle some chaat masala and salt. Place some onion slices on top and again sprinkle some more salt and chaat masala.', 'Cover these slices with remaining slices, apply some butter on top. Place the sandwiches in hot grill toaster and grill till golden from both sides.', 'Cut into triangles and serve hot.']

title: Lemon Coconut Tofu Squares
method: ['Preheat the oven to 250degC. Grease a square baking tin with some butter and dust with some flour.', 'Combine wheat flour, castor sugar, sea salt, vanilla essence and coconut oil in a bowl and mix till well combined.', 'Spread the prepared mixture evenly in the baking tin, put the tin in the preheated oven and bake for fifteen to twenty minutes. Remove from heat and cool.', 'To make the filling, process together the tofu, castor sugar, flour and baking powder. Zest the lemon in it and add the juice of the lemon and process till smooth.', 'Spread the filling evenly in the baked crust, put it in the preheated oven and bake for twenty to twenty five minutes. Remove from oven and cool.', 'Cut into squares, dust icing sugar on top and serve.']

title: Baked Gajar Halwa with Gulab Jamun
method: ['To make gajar halwa, heat ghee in a non-stick pan, add carrots and saute for 8-10 minutes. Add sugar, green cardamom powder and mix well. Add milk and cook till the mixture thickens.', 'Preheat oven to 180o C.', 'Put mini gulab jaamuns in a baking dish, spread gajar halwa over it, sprinkle cardamom powder on top, drizzle rose syrup and spread khoya evenly. Place the dish in the preheated oven and bake for 10-15 minutes.', 'Remove the dish from the oven and serve hot.']

title: Lamb Cutlets
method: ['Soak bread slices in  1/2  cup water and squeeze out extra water.', 'Blend together mutton mince, drained bread slices, onions, mint leaves, chillies, garam masala powder, salt in a food processor till smooth. Transfer this mixture into a bowl.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Break eggs in another bowl, add salt and whisk well.', 'Spread breadcrumbs on a plate.', 'Dampen palms with water, take a portion of mince mixture and shape into cutlet. Similarly prepare the rest. Dip the prepared cutlets in egg mixture, coat them in breadcrumbs and deep-fry in hot oil till golden and crisp on both the sides. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot with tomato ketchup.']

title: Til Matarwale Aloo
method: ['Dry-roast cumin seeds, coriander seeds, fennel seeds, onion seeds, pomegranate seeds and dried red chillies in a non-stick pan till fragrant.', 'Cut boiled potatoes into medium pieces.', 'Coarsely grind the roasted seed mixture.', 'Heat oil in the same non-stick pan. Add ginger, garlic and black sesame seeds and saute till garlic turns golden.', 'Add onion and chopped potatoes, mix and cook till they turn golden. Add white sesame seeds, toss to mix and cook for a minute.', 'Add chilli powder, turmeric powder, garam masala powder, dried mango powder and green chillies and toss to mix. Add salt and toss to mix. Add green peas, mix and cook for a minute.', 'Add ground powder, mix and cook for a minute.', 'Serve hot with paranthas.']

title: Spiced Nuts - Diwali Special
method: ['Preheat oven to 50degC. Roast the nuts in the preheated oven for twenty to twenty-five minutes or till crunchy. Remove from oven and set aside.', 'Melt the sugar in a non-stick pan with few drops of water till it turns golden. Add paprika and chilli powder and mix well.', 'Add the roasted nuts and mix till well coated. Remove from heat and cool.', 'Serve or store in an airtight container.']

title: Dum Methi Murgh
method: ['Heat ghee in a deep non-stick pan, add black peppercorns, green cardamoms, cloves, star anise, cinnamon stick, and black cardamom and saute till fragrant.', 'Add green chillies and saute for a minute. Add onion, mix and saute till translucent. Add garlic paste and ginger paste and saute for 1-2 minutes.', 'Take chicken in a bowl, add yogurt, turmeric powder and salt and mix well. Transfer this into the pan and saute for 3-4 minutes on high heat.', 'Reduce the heat, add almond paste and kasuri methi and mix well. Add  1/2  cup water and mix.', 'Seal the rim of the pan with the dough and cover with a lid. Cook for 15-20 minutes, switch the heat off and transfer the gravy into a serving bowl. Serve hot.']

title: Saijan Phalli Tadkewali
method: ['Heat 2 1/2  cups water with  1/2  tsp turmeric powder and a little salt in a deep non-stick pan. Add drumsticks, cover and cook for 10-15 minutes or till the drumsticks are cooked. Strain and keep aside in a bowl.', 'Heat oil in another non-stick pan. Add coriander seeds and red chillies and saute for half a minute.', 'Add curry leaves, drumsticks, red chilli powder, remaining turmeric powder, black pepper powder, dried mango powder and salt and toss well.', 'Add coconut and mix well.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot.']

title: Superpowder laddoos
method: ['Dry roast green gram in a non-stick pan, on low heat, till golden brown. Transfer into a bowl. Dry roast walnuts in the same pan, on low heat, till golden. Transfer into same bowl. Dry roast rice in the same pan, on low heat, till light brown. Transfer into the same bowl.', 'Dry roast wheat grains in the same pan, on low heat, till light golden. Transfer into the same bowl. Dry roast dried coconut, on low heat, till light brown. Transfer into same bowl. Mix everything and set aside to cool.', 'Put the roasted mixture into a grinder jar and grind to a fine powder.', 'Heat a non-stick pan, add jaggery and  1/4  cup water and cook, on low heat, till jaggery melts completely. Add ghee and mix well. Add the powdered mixture and green cardamom powder and mix well. Cook on low heat for 8-10 minutes or till the mixture leaves the sides of the pan. Transfer into a plate and spread it.', 'When mixture is slightly warm, grease your palms with ghee, take small portions of the mixture and shape into small sized laddoos and keep on a plate and let them cool down to room temperature.', 'Keep the laddoos in mini paper cups, arrange on a serving plate and serve.']

title: Mexican Pizza
method: ['To prepare the dough, take cornmeal in a bowl, add refined flour, turmeric powder, carom seeds, salt, red chilli powder and 1 tbsp oil in a bowl. Add water gradually and knead into medium soft dough like that for roti. Add remaining oil and mix well. Set aside for 10-15 minutes.', 'and saute on medium heat till lightly browned.', 'Mash the boiled rajma with a masher, add to the onion in the pan and mix well. Add turmeric powder, garlic, red chilli powder, salt and  1/4  cup tomato ketchup and mix well. Add 3 tbsps water, mix well and cook on medium heat for 2-3 minutes. Set aside to cool.', 'Divide dough into 2 equal portions and shape them into balls. Dust each ball with dry flour, place on the worktop and roll into thin rotis.', 'Heat a shallow non-stick pan, place one roti at a time in it, apply some butter on it and flip. Apply some butter on the other side too and cook, turning sides till light golden brown specs appear on both sides.', 'Spread a thick layer of stuffing on one roti, place the other roti on top. Apply pizza sauce evenly on top and top it with mozzarella cheese. Cover and cook on low heat till base become hard and the cheese melts.', 'Transfer pizza on the worktop and cut into wedges with a pizza slicer. Transfer the wedges on a serving plate and serve hot with tomato ketchup.']

title: Ratatouille Kachori - SK Khazana
method: ['To make the dough, take refined flour in a large bowl, add salt, baking soda and1 tbspoil and mix well. Add water and knead into a stiff dough. Cover with a damp muslin cloth and set aside for 10-15 minutes.', 'To make the stuffing, heat olive oil in a non-stick pan, add garlic and saute till raw smells disappear.', 'Add onion, mix well and saute till light golden. Add tomato, mix well and saute for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add yellow capsicum, red capsicumand green zucchini, mix and saute for 1-2 minutes. .', 'Add brinjal , mix and saute for 1-2 minute. Add tomato puree and mix well.', 'Add salt and mix. Add crushed black peppercorns and mix well. Add basil, mix, cover the pan and cook for 2-3 minutes. Take the pan off the heat and transfer the mixture into a bowl and let it cool down to room temperature.', 'To make the kachoris, divide the dough into equal portions and shape them into balls.', 'Roll out each ball into a small disc, place some stuffing mixture in the centre, place 2 mozzarella cube in the centre, gather the edges together and press to seal. Flatten them slightly.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai, slide in the kachoris and deep-fry on low heat till golden and crisp.Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Transfer the kachoris on a serving plate, garnish with basil sprigs and serve hot.']

title: Berry Ginger Ale
method: ['Roughly chop two gooseberries and three strawberries. Halve the remaining gooseberries and strawberries.', 'Place the halved strawberries and gooseberries in a blender jar with honey, cinnamon powder, two to three mint leaves and ginger ale. Blend well.', 'Place the chopped berries with some mint leaves in four serving glass. Pour the drink over them and top with drinking soda.', 'Serve chilled garnished with a strawberry.']

title: Chicken Masala Pav
method: ['Place yeast and sugar in a bowl. Add two tablespoons water, mix well and set aside to activate.', 'Put flour on a worktop and make a well in the centre. Sprinkle salt all over.', 'Heat two tablespoons oil in a non-stick pan, add onion and saute till it turns golden. Add ginger-garlic paste and saute for a minute.', 'Add tomato and mix well. Add salt, mix well and cook till tomato turns pulpy.', 'Add turmeric powder, red chilli powder and coriander powder, mix well and saute.', 'Add chicken, mix well and cook for five to six minutes.', 'Add garam masala powder and lemon juice, mix well and cook for two minutes. Switch off the heat and set aside to cool.', 'Pour the activated yeast mixture into the well in the flour, mix and knead into a soft dough with sufficient water. Cover with a damp muslin cloth and set aside to ferment for twenty to twenty-five minutes.', 'Preheat oven at 180degC. Grease a baking tray with little oil.', 'Dust worktop with some flour and place the dough on it and roll. Divide dough into eight equal portions and shape them into balls.', 'Dust the worktop again with flour and roll out the balls into medium sized discs. Place chicken mixture in the centre of each disc.', 'Break egg into a bowl and whisk well. Brush the edges of the discs with whisked egg and fold the edges over to make a crescent shape. Seal the edges.', 'Brush stuffed pavs with remaining egg and sprinkle some sesame seeds on top. Place the pavs on the greased baking tray, keep the tray in the preheated oven and bake for twenty-twenty five minutes.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Calzone
method: ['Place the refined flour in the dough maker bowl. Heat a little water. Take the fresh yeast in a bowl, add the hot water and mix. Add this mixture to the flour.', 'Start the equipment. Add one teaspoon sugar and salt. Add a little water from time to time till all the ingredients are well mixed and form a dough. Add one tablespoon of olive oil and mix.', 'Put the dough into a bowl, cover with a damp cloth and set aside to rise and double its volume. Knock back the dough, cover with the damp cloth again and set aside to rise once more.', 'Preheat oven to 180 degC/350 degF. Heat the remaining oil in a pan, add the onions and saute. Add garlic and stir. Add tomatoes and continue to saute. Add tomato puree and let it cook.', 'Add mixed herbs, crushed red chillies, salt and jalapeno, stir and cook. Add green capsicum and continue to cook. Add the remaining sugar and cook till the mixture is almost dry. Set aside to cool.', 'Roll out the dough into four inch round discs. Spread the cooked mixture over, leaving half inch space all around. Grate mozzarella cheese over and fold the discs to form half moon shape.', 'Seal the edges by pressing with a fork. Place these calzones on a greased baking tray. Brush with a little butter and bake in the preheated oven for about forty five minutes.', 'Cut into halves and serve hot.']

title: Fried Sausage Stir Fry
method: ['Combine half the refined flour and 2 tablespoons rice flour in a bowl. Add salt, crushed peppercorns and mix well. Add sufficient water and mix well into a thick batter. Add2 tablespoons semolina and mix well.', 'Combine remaining refined flour, rice flour and semolina on a plate. Add salt andcrushed black peppercorns and mix well.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Roll the sausages in the flour mixture, dip in the batter and deep-fry till golden and crisp.Drain on an absorbent paper.', 'Chop garlic and ginger.', 'Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a non-stick pan. Add chopped garlic and ginger and saute well.Add onions and saute till golden.', 'Slit green chillies and add, continue to saute.', 'Add capsicum and toss well. Add salt, red chilli powder, cumin-coriander powder and tomato ketchup. Sprinkle little water and mix well.', 'Add fried sausages and mix well. Switch off heat and add vinegar and crushed black peppercorns.', 'Chop some coriander sprigs and add. Mix well.', 'Serve hot garnished with a coriander sprig.']

title: Fudge Brownie Pops
method: ['Preheat oven to 180o C. Grease an eight inch baking tin with some butter and dust with some flour.', 'Put half the chocolate and butter in a bowl and melt in the microwave for thirty seconds. Remove from oven and mix till smooth.', 'Add castor sugar, vanilla essence, egg and egg white and mix till well combined.', 'Mix together flour, cocoa powder, baking powder, baking soda and salt in another bowl. Add chocolate mixture and mix well into a smooth batter.', 'Pour the batter in the prepared tin, place the tin in the preheated oven and bake for twenty minutes. Remove from oven, cool down to room temperature, demould and crumble the brownie.', 'Process the crumbled brownie into fine crumbs. Add corn syrup and process again. Transfer into a clean bowl.', 'Divide the brownie mixture into equal portions and shape them into balls. Insert a lollypop stick into each ball and set aside.', 'Melt the remaining chocolate in another bowl in the microwave for thirty seconds. Remove from heat and mix till smooth.', 'Dip the brownie lollypops in melted chocolate, coat with almonds and set in the refrigerator for twenty minutes.', 'Serve.']

title: Fluffy Omelette- SK Khazana
method: ['For each portion break 3 eggs, separate the yolks from the whites and put them in 2 different bowls.', 'Add some green chillies, 1 tbsp coriander leaves, black pepper powder, a pinch of turmeric powder and salt and mix well.', 'Beat the egg whites with an electric hand blender till stiff. Add a little salt and beat again. Add the egg whites to the yolks, little by little, and mix with a light hand.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan, add the egg mixture and spread it lightly.', 'Drizzle oil all around the omelette, cover the pan and cook for 2-3 minutes. Make more omelettes in the same way.', 'Transfer the omelette onto a serving plate and serve hot with tomato ketchup.']

title: Tricolour Sandwiches
method: ['For the orange layer mix together the carrots, eggless mayonnaise and salt.', 'For the green layer mix the cottage cheese with green chutney and salt. Place a brown bread slice on the work top.', 'Spread the green layer evenly over it. Place a white bread slice over it.Spread the orange layer over the white bread slice evenly and top with a brown bread slice. Press gently.', 'Cut each sandwich into three fingers and serve immediately.']

title: Prawn On Toast
method: ['Grind ginger, garlic, prawns, salt, coriander leaves and egg coarsely. Transfer into a bowl. Apply this mixture on all the bread slices. Cut each slices into 3 strips.', 'Sprinkle white and black sesame seeds on top and press lightly so that they stick. Heat sufficient oil in a kadai and deep fry till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'You can also bake them in preheated oven at 220degC. Serve hot.']

title: Dal Khichdi
method: ['Heat ghee to the pressure cooker. Add cumin seeds and when their colour changes, add asafoetida and mix.', 'Add garlic, ginger and green chillies, mix and saute for 1 minute. Add onion and saute till golden brown. Add tomato and salt, mix and saute for 2 minutes. Add turmeric powder and red chilli powder and Tata turmeric powder, mix and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add cup rice and split green gram and mix well. Add 4 cups water, mix well adjust the salt. Cover the cooker and cook under pressure till 3-4 whistles are given out.', 'Open the cooker when the pressure reduces completely. Add coriander leaves and mix well.', 'Transfer the khichdi into a serving bowl, drizzle some ghee on top and garnish with a coriander sprig. Serve hot with pickle and papad.']

title: Baked Carrot Chips - SK Khazana
method: ['Preheat oven to 180o C.', 'Peel the carrots and cut into strips and put into a bowl. Add salt, mixed herbs, chilli flakes, ginger powder, chaat masala, parmesan cheese powder and oil in a bowl.', 'Spread the carrots on a baking tray, keep the tray in the preheated oven and bake at for 20-22 minutes.', 'Take mayonnaise, mixed herbs, basil leaves and garlic in a small bowl and mix well.', 'Serve the baked carrot chips with the prepared dip.']

title: Surati Falafel
method: ['In a blender blend soaked chickpea and boiled chickpea and then take it out in a bowl.', 'Now add and mix sesame seeds, chopped onions, chopped garlic, chopped green chilli, salt, red chilli powder, cumin seeds and chopped coriander leaves.', "Make tikki's out of this mixture\nHeat the oil and fry the tikki after which take them out on the tissue paper.", 'To prepare the sauce take Tahini paste, squeeze a lemon and mix it with red chilli powder.', 'Now put the prepared sauce on the plate with the fried tikki and sugar cooked plum.', 'Drizzle the dish with the plum sauce and garnish it with dil leaves.']

title: Makai Halwa
method: ['Coarsely grind corn without using water.Heat ghee in a non stick kadai.', 'Add cashewnuts and raisins and saute lightly.', 'Add corn and saute for 10-15 minutes.', 'Add green cardamom powder, sugar and mix.', 'Add khoya and saute for 5-6 minutes.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot.']

title: Ragi Papdi Chaat- Sk Khazana
method: ['Take ragi flour in a bowl, add , refined flour, salt and carom seeds, and mix well. Add ghee and rub it in with your fingertips.', 'Add sufficient water and knead to semi-stiff dough. Cover with a damp muslin cloth and set aside for 5-10 minutes.', 'Mash the potatoes into another bowl, add salt, red chilli powder, roasted cumin powder, chaat masala and mixed sprouts and mix well.', 'To make the papdi, heat sufficient oil in a kadai.Divide the dough into equal balls. .', 'Grease a plastic sheet with a little oil and place the dough ball on one side and fold the other side over it. Roll it into a thin sheet. Prick all over with a fork and then cut out roundels with a small round cookie cutter. Similarly make more roundels with the remaining dough.', 'Gently lift up the roundels and slide them into hot oil. Deep-fry till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper and let them cool down to room temperature.', 'For serving, place the papdis on a serving plate, place a little potato mixture on each, top it with a little onion, a little green chutney and red chilli-garlic chutney. Drizzle a little Date And Tamarind Chutney on each papdi. Top it with a little a little carrot,a little beetroot, sprinkle a little chaat masala, yellow chilli powder, roasted cumin powder, a little sev, a little coriander leaves, a little masala dal and some pomegranate pearls. Serve immediately.']

title: Classic Roast Chicken
method: ['Preheat oven to 200degC.', 'Combine rice, chopped onion, leeks, chopped carrots, celery, chopped eggs, salt and pepper powder in a bowl. Mix well. Add parsley and mix well.', 'Cut 4 carrots into thick slices and quarter 3 onions. Place these in a baking dish. Clean chicken and cut neck keeping the skin intact. Rub salt all over the outside and the inside of the chicken.', 'Fold the front wings and skin at the neck towards the back.', 'Break egg into the rice mixture and mix well. Stuff chicken with this mixture, pressing nicely. Tie the two drumsticks together to seal and place the stuffed chicken on the bed of vegetables in the baking dish.', 'Drizzle oil all over chicken and sprinkle a little salt and pepper powder. Place the tray in preheated oven and cook for 10-15 minutes.Reduce temperature to 170degC and cook for 1 1/4  hours.', 'Brush butter on chicken and serve with brown sauce.']

title: Paneer Tikka Masala Bunny Chow
method: ['Heat ghee in a deep non-stick pan, add cumin seeds and saute till colour changes.', 'Add onion and saute till it turns golden brown.', 'Add salt, red chilli powder, coriander powder, kasuri methi powder, garam masala powder and ginger-garlic paste. Saute for a minute and add tomato. Cook till tomato turns pulpy.', 'Cut paneer tikka pieces into triangles', 'Add tomato puree to the pan and mix well. Cover and cook for 4-5 minutes or till oil separates. Add sufficient water to make gravy. Cover and cook till oil separates. Add lemon juice and mix well. Beat the cream lightly and add to the pan. Cook for a few seconds. Add paneer triangles and coriander leaves. Mix well and switch off heat.', 'Cut off a thin slice from the top of each multigrain bun and scoop out from the centre to  create a deep cavity. Fill up the cavity with paneer tikka masala.', 'Garnish with thin ginger strips and serve hot.']

title: Potato Chips Frittata
Main ingredients: Potato chips, Eggs, Onion, Spring onions with greens, Fresh red chillies, Fresh cream, Feta cheese

title: Dimer Dalna
method: ['Heat a non-stick pan and add 3 tbsps oil.', 'Cut potato into 8 pieces, add to the pan and shallow-fry on high heat till golden brown.', 'Meanwhile make small slits on the eggs without cutting through.', 'Drain potato pieces into a bowl. Add eggs to the oil remaining in the pan, sprinkle a little salt and shallow-fry till golden brown. Drain into the same bowl.', 'Heat remaining oil in the same pan, add bay leaves, cinnamon, green cardamoms, peppercorns and cloves, mix and saute on medium heat till fragrant.', 'Add cumin seeds, mix and saute till their colour changes. Add ginger garlic paste, mix and saute for 2 minutes or till raw smells disappear. Add onion paste, mix and saute on high heat for 2-3 minutes or till oil separates from mixture.', 'Add cumin powder, coriander powder, turmeric powder and red chilli powder, mix well and saute on low heat for 2 minutes.', 'Add tomato puree, mix well and saute till 2-3 minutes. Add  1/2  cup water and cook on medium heat for 2 minutes.', 'Add salt and sugar, mix well and cook for 3-4 minutes on medium heat. Add fried eggs and potatoes, mix well and cook for 3-4 minutes or till the potatoes or eggs are fully cooked. Add green chillies and cook on high heat for 2 minutes.', 'Transfer egg gravy into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot.']

title: Quick Healthy Chicken Salad
method: ['Marinate chicken breasts with salt, crushed garlic, 1 tsp olive oil, 1 tsp Balsamic vinegar,  1/2  tsp crushed peppercorns, rosemary and thyme. Mix and set aside for 10-15 minutes.', 'Combine mushrooms, red pepper, capsicum, yellow pepper,  1/2  tsp crushed peppercorns, salt, chopped garlic, remaining Balsamic vinegar, remaining olive oil and remaining crushed peppercorns in a bowl. Mix well and set aside to marinate for 5-10 minutes.', 'Heat 1 tsp oil in a non-stick grill pan. Place marinated chicken on it and grill till evenly done from both sides and chicken is cooked.', 'Heat remaining oil in another non-stick pan. Add marinated vegetables and saute well.', 'To make dressing, combine Balsamic vinegar, olive oil, salt and crushed peppercorns in a bowl and mix well into a homogenous mixture.', 'Transfer sauteed vegetables in a bowl. Add 3-4 torn basil leaves and toss well. Cool to room temperature. Add torn Iceberg lettuce leaves, Lollorosso leaves and arugula leaves and mix well. Add some dressing and toss well.', 'Place the vegetable salad on a serving plate. Cut the grilled chicken into thick slices and place along the salad. Drizzle remaining dressing on top, garnish with some basil leaves and serve immediately.']

title: Gobhi Aloo Chaat Pakoda
ingredients: ['1 large cauliflower (gobhi)', '4 medium potatoes (aloo), boiled and peeled', '1 tablespoon red chilli sauce', ' 1/2  tablespoon tomato ketchup', '1 teaspoon red chilli powder', '2 teaspoons dried mango powder (amchur)', '2 teaspoons chaat masala', 'Salt to taste', '1 tablespoon chopped ginger', '2-3 green chillies, chopped', '1 medium onion, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon green chilli sauce', '1 tablespoon green chutney + for topping', 'Oil for deep-frying', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh coriander leaves', 'Grated radish (mooli) for topping', 'Green capsicum strips for topping', 'Red capsicum strips for topping Batter', '1 cup gram flour', '1 teaspoon carom seeds (ajwain)', ' 1/4  teaspoon turmeric powder', ' 1/2  teaspoon red chilli powder', '1 teaspoon ginger-garlic paste', 'Salt to tasteSauce', '1 tablespoon grated radish (mooli)', '1 tablespoon finely chopped onion', '1 tablespoon finely chopped fresh coriander leaves', '2 tablespoons oil', '1 teaspoon finely chopped ginger', '2 green chillies, finely chopped', '3 tablespoons green chilli sauce', '2 tablespoons red chilli sauce', '2 tablespoons tomato ketchup', '2 tablespoons sugar', 'Juice of  1/2  lemon']
method: ['Take cauliflower florets in a bowl, add red chilli sauce, tomato ketchup, red chilli powder, 1 teaspoon dried mango powder, 1 teaspoon chaat masala and salt and mix well.', 'Mash potatoes in another bowl. Add ginger, green chillies, onion, green chilli sauce, green chutney, remaining dried mango powder, remaining chaat masala and salt and mix well.', 'To make batter, take gram flour in a bowl, add carom seeds, turmeric powder, chilli powder, ginger-garlic paste, salt and water as required and whisk well to make a lump free batter of coating consistency.', 'Divide the potato mixture into equal portions, stuff each portion with a cauliflower floret and shape into balls.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'To make sauce, heat oil in a non-stick pan, add ginger and green chillies and saute till fragrant. Add green chilli sauce, red chilli sauce, tomato ketchup and sugar, mix and saute for 2-3 minutes. Transfer into a bowl.', 'Add lemon juice, radish, onion and coriander leaves and mix well.', 'Dip the balls in the batter and deep-fry in hot oil for a minute. Drain on absorbent paper and flatten a little. Deep-fry once again till golden brown. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Halve the pakodas and place them on a serving platter. Serve them topped with green chutney, sauce, coriander leaves, radish, green and red capsicum strips.']

title: Tuna Salad
method: ['Toast bread slices lightly. Slice garlic thinly reserving one.', 'Heat 1 teaspoon olive oil in a non-stick pan. Add sliced garlic and fry till light brown. Transfer the fried garlic in a bowl and set aside. Reserve the oil.', 'To make the salad, halve cherry tomatoes and place in another bowl. Tear lettuce and rocket leaves and add.', 'Reheat the reserved garlic oil and add the tuna, stir and saute for a minute. Switch off heat and let it cool.', 'Quarter black and green olives and add to the salad. Halve capers and add.', 'To make the dressing, combine olive oil, salt, crushed peppercorns, paprika powder, honey and lemon juice. Mix well.', 'Rub the toasted bread slices with the reserved garlic and cut into small pieces to get croutons. Add the croutons to the salad.', 'Add sauteed tuna to the salad alongwith salt and crushed peppercorns and toss well.', 'Add the dressing and toss well. Add fried garlic and torn parsley and toss again.', 'Serve garnished with lemon wedges.']

title: Chocolate Yogurt
method: ['Tie up yogurt in a muslin cloth and hang it in the refrigerator with a bowl beneath it to collect the whey. Once all the excess water has drained away, squeeze the residue through the cloth into a bowl to get smooth hung yogurt.', 'Melt chocolate in the microwave for one minute. You can also use a double boiler to melt the chocolate. Whisk it well, add cream and mix well.', 'Keep aside a little of this mixture for garnish. Add Sugar Free Natura to the yogurt and mix well. Add melted chocolate and mix it with a fork to get a marbled effect. Keep aside a tablespoon of walnuts and add the rest to the yogurt mixture and mix lightly.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, sprinkle the remaining walnuts on top.', 'Drizzle the remaining melted chocolate on top and serve.']

title: Rabdi - SK Khazana
method: ['Boil milk in a deep non-stick pan on medium high heat, stirring occasionally. Reduce heat and cook, stirring occasionally, till reduced to  1/4  the original volume. Scrape the sides of the pan and add it to the milk. This may take upto 40 minutes.', 'Add sugar and cardamom powder and mix well. Cook, stirring till the sugar dissolves.', 'Remove from heat and cool.', 'Put rabdi in a serving bowls and serve garnished with some silver warq, pistachio slivers and almond slivers.']

title: Keema Pulao
method: ['Heat oil in a pan, add green cardamoms, black cardamom, cloves,cinnamon, pepper corns, cumin seeds. Saute for a minute, add chopped garlic, chopped onion and chopped green chillies.', 'Saute till onions turn golden. Add mutton mince and cook on high heat for five minutes.', 'Add garlic paste, ginger paste, red chilli powder, chopped tomatoes and continue to saute for two to three minutes. Add rice and saute for a minute or two.', 'Add three and a half cups of hot water, torn mint leaves, chopped coriander leaves and salt. Mix lightly. Add garam masala powder.', 'Stir and bring the mixture to a boil. Cover the pan and further cook on low heat for ten to twelve minutes or till the rice and kheema are cooked. Serve hot.']

title: Peri Peri Chicken Burger
method: ['Take chicken legs in a bowl, add garlic paste, Peri Peri spice mix, salt and lemon juice, and rub them well over the chicken. Refrigerate for 1 hour to marinate.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Dust flour over the marinated chicken legs ensuring that they are well coated. Break in egg and mix well.', 'Roll the chicken legs in crushed cornflakes, pressing lightly so that they are well coated on either sides and set aside on a plate.', 'To make coleslaw take cabbage, carrot, green capsicum, yellow capsicum, salt, pepper powder and mayonnaise in another bowl and mix well.', 'Halve the burger buns horizontally. Heat a non-stick tawa. Spread some butter on the cut side of each half, place them on the tawa and toast them turning sides till crisp. Remove from heat and set aside.', 'Gently slide in the chicken legs, one at a time, into hot oil and deep-fry on medium heat, turning sides, till evenly golden brown and crisp on both sides. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Tear a few lettuce leaves and place them on the base half of each bun. Top with some coleslaw, fried chicken and a cheese slice. Sprinkle some Peri Peri spice mix over the cheese slice, cover with the top half of the buns and serve immediately with tomato ketchup and coke.']

title: Chinese Stir-Fried Vegetables
method: ['Heat a wok. Add oil and heat. Add garlic and saute till lightly browned. Add spring onions and stir. Add carrots, green capsicum, red capsicum, yellow capsicums and salt and toss.', 'Add cashewnuts, mushrooms, soy sauce and one cup of vegetable stock and stir. Chop off the stems and roughly chop spinach.', 'Dissolve cornflour in the remaining vegetable stock and add to the wok. Stir and cook. When most of the moisture has evaporated add spinach, cabbage, bean sprouts and a little salt.', 'Stir. Cook for two minutes. Serve hot.']

title: Pepper Rawas Tikka
method: ['Cut the fish into 2 inch cubes and put in a bowl. Add salt, lemon juice, ginger paste, garlic paste, carom seeds and gram flour and mix well. Add  1/4  cup hung yogurt and mix well.', 'Add garam masala powder, black pepper powder and mix well. Set aside to marinate for 2 hours.', 'Add 1 tablespoon olive oil and mix well.', 'Heat a Gas Oven Tandoor (GOT) and brush with some olive oil.', 'Spread black pepper powder on a plate. Coat the marinated fish in it, place in the Gas Oven Tandoor (GOT), cover and cook. Once it is half done, uncover, spray some olive oil, cover and cook till fully done. Switch off heat and let the fish remain in the Gas Oven Tandoor (GOT) for a few minutes.', 'To make salad, diagonally slice spring onion bulbs and put into a bowl. Add salt, 1 tablespoon hung yogurt and mix well. Set aside.', 'Prepare a bed of salad on a serving platter, put the fish tikka on it, drizzle lemon juice on top and serve hot.']

title: Berries and Oat Walnut Muffins
method: ['Preheat oven at 180deg C. Line individual silicon muffin moulds with paper cupcake moulds.', 'Cream together butter, castor sugar and brown sugar in a bowl. Add eggs and mix. Add vanilla essence, mixed berries, walnuts and oats and mix well.', 'Sieve in flour, baking powder and baking soda and fold well.', 'Fill in  3/4  of each lined silicon muffin moulds with prepared berries-oats mixture and tap.', 'Put the prepared silicon muffin moulds on a baking tray. Place the baking tray in preheated oven and bake for 25-30 minutes.', 'Demould and serve.']

title: Apricot Icecream
method: ['Puree apricots and put into a non-stick pan. Add sugar and cook, stirring, for five minutes.', 'Put egg yolks in a bowl and beat well, add apricot puree and whisk till thick.', 'Cool and add cream and mix well.', 'Pour into an icecream box, close with the lid and freeze, beating at regular intervals (so as to prevent formation of ice crystals) until set.', 'Serve with praline.', 'To make praline, melt sugar in a heavy non-stick pan. Add almonds, mix and cook over a low heat for about ten minutes. Pour into an oiled tray and let it set.', 'Crush with a rolling pin and sprinkle over ice cream before serving.']

title: Chicken Quesadilla
method: ['Deseed and cut the bell peppers and capsicum into juliennes. Slice onion.', 'Heat 1 tbsp oil in anon-stick pan. Add all bell peppers, capsicum, onion, pepper powder, Cajun spice and salt. Toss to mix and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add shredded chicken, toss and cook for 1 minute. Switch off heat.', 'To make mango salsa, combine mango, tomato, green chillies, Cajun spice, crushed peppercorns, salt, cumin powder, mango juice and lemon juice in a bowl. Mix well.', 'Halve the avocado and discard the seed. Clean it from centre, peel, roughly chop and add in the bowl. Mix well and set aside.', 'Heat tortillas lightly. Place a tortilla on a worktop and put generous amount of cooked chicken mixture on one side. Grate 10 grams processed cheese on top and fold into a half moon. Similarly assemble the remaining quesadillas.']

title: Eggs Benedict
method: ['To make each portion, halve 1 burger bun, drizzle a little extra virgin olive oil on each half, place them in the air fryer basket and cook at 180o C for 4-5 minutes.', 'Heat 2 cups water in a deep non-stick pan, add salt and bring it to a boil. Add  1/2  tsp vinegar and mix well. Break 1 egg and drop in center of the pan and let it poach. Similarly poach another egg. Transfer the prepared poached eggs on a plate.', 'Take the bun halves out of the air fryer and place on the work top.', 'Halve the avocado, scoop out the flesh of  1/2  avocado and put into a bowl. Add  1/2  tablespoon lemon juice and mash with a fork.', 'To make a salad, take onion, tomato, cucumber, coriander leaves, salt, 1 tsp lemon juice and crushed peppercorns in another bowl and mix well.', 'Keep the bun halves on a serving platter, spread some avocado mixture over each half, place a poached egg on each half, put  1/4  salad mixture on one side and serve immediately.', 'Make more portions in the same way.']

title: Summer Vegetable Burrito
method: ['Warm tortillas on a hot tawa, and brush butter on them.', 'Spread some 3 tablespoons Mexican rice, 1 tablespoon grated mozzarella, 2 tablespoons refried beans, 2 tablespoons summer vegetable mix, 1 1/2  tablespoons Pico De Gallo and sour cream on each of them.', 'Bring the sides of each tortilla toward the center of the filling. Fold the bottom of the tortilla up over the filling and continue to roll until it becomes a tight cylinder.', 'Serve immediately with roasted tomato salsa and mango crumbled cheese salad.']

title: Molagapodi Crusted Fish with Vegetable Spaghetti
method: ['To make spaghetti, pass the carrot, yellow zucchini and green zucchini through a spiralizer.', 'Heat 1 tbsp oil in a non-stick pan, add garlic and saute well. Add the prepared vegetable spaghetti and salt and toss well. Cook for 3-4 minutes.', 'Spread molagapodi on a plate, add salt and mix well. Roll the fish pieces in it so that they are well coated on all sides.', 'Heat remaining oil in a non-stick grill pan, and place the fish pieces on it. Grill for 3-4 minutes. Flip and cook the other side for 3-4 minutes or till completely cooked.', 'For serving, place a portion of the spaghetti on one side of a serving plate, arrange the fish pieces by its side and serve hot.']

title: Chicken Wrapped Prawns
method: ['Insert a toothpick through each prawn. Wrap the prawns with the chicken strips. Set aside.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a pan.', 'Combine cornstarch, salt, crushed peppercorns, ginger-garlic paste, chilli powder and egg in a bowl. Whisk well with a little water to make a smooth batter.', 'Dip the chicken wrapped prawns in the batter and deep-fry in hot oil till golden. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan. Add garlic and saute till light golden.', 'Add green chillies, mix and saute. Add chilli sauce, tomato ketchup and soy sauce, mix well and cook for 2 minutes.', 'Add little water and mix well. Add salt, crushed peppercorns, torn basil leaves and fried wrapped prawns. Mix well and cook for a minute.', 'Garnish with basil leaves and serve hot with salad leaves.']

title: Bhugha Chawar
method: ['Heat ghee in a non-stick pan, add cloves, green cardamom, cumin seeds, cinnamon and bay leaves and saute for a few seconds.', 'Add onions and saute till golden brown. Add turmeric powder and red chilli powder and mix well.', 'Add tomato, mix well and cook for two to three minutes.', 'Drain and add soaked rice, mix well. Add three cups water and salt, cover and cook for five to ten minutes or till the rice is done.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot garnished with coriander sprigs.']

title: Quick Bhature
method: ['Mix refined flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt and sugar in a bowl and mix well.', 'Add yogurt and enough water and knead into a soft dough. Apply a little oil, cover with a damp cloth and rest for  1/2  hour.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Divide the dough into lemon sized portions with greased hands and roll into balls.', 'Place paneer in a bowl, add salt and red chilli powder and mix well. Spread some of the dough balls slightly, place a bit of paneer in the centre, gather the edges and seal.', 'The rest of the balls can be made into bhaturas without the stuffing.', 'Spread the stuffed and the unstuffed balls into small puris, slide into hot oil and deep fry on high heat till lightly coloured.', 'Drain on absorbent paper. Serve hot with kale chholay .']

title: Desi Onion Rings - SK Khazana
method: ['Peel onions and cut into thick rings, separate the layers, and keep the rings in iced water.', 'Take gram flour in a bowl, add rice flour, coriander powder, cumin powder, red chili powder, turmeric, chaat masala powder, salt, baking soda and sufficient water and whisk well to make a thick and smooth batter.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Dry soaked onion rings on an absorbent paper.', 'Spread refined flour on a plate, coat onion rings with it and keep on a plate. Dip the onion rings in the gram flour batter, slide into hot oil and deep-fry till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Arrange them in a serving basket and serve hot with dry vada pav chutney.']

title: Lavang Latika
method: ['To make the syrup cook sugar with  1/2  cup water, stirring, till sugar dissolves. Add milk and when the scum rises to the top, collect it with a ladle and discard. Further cook the syrup till it reaches one-string consistency. Remove from heat and keep warm. For the covering, place flour in a bowl and rub in ghee. Add sufficient water and knead into a stiff dough. Cover with a damp cloth and let it rest for a while. Divide the dough into 12 equal portions and roll into pedas.', 'For filling mix khoya, cashewnuts, almonds, sugar, green cardamom powder and saffron well. If it is too dry sprinkle milk and mix well. Heat sufficient ghee in a kadai on medium heat. Roll out dough pedas into small puris. Dampen their edges, place stuffing in the centre, fold in the four ends to make a square envelope, and secure with a clove.', 'Slide them into medium hot ghee and deep fry on low heat till golden and crisp. If you feel the ghee is too hot, remove the kadai from the heat and set aside till the temperature comes down a little. Drain the lavang latikas and soak them in the syrup for a few minutes. Drain and serve warm.']

title: Mojito Pops
method: ['Cut one lemon into thin slices and deseed.', 'Cut the other lemon into half.', 'Quarter one half and put into a glass. Keep the other half aside.', 'Add mint leaves and muddle well.', 'Transfer it into a large jar, add salt, sugar syrup and juice of remaining half lemon and sufficient water and stir well.', 'Cut the sliced lemon into half and put each half in a popsicle mould.', 'Add crushed ice and the mojito mixture and top with more crushed ice.', 'Set in the freezer for 1-2 hours or till set.', 'Serve chilled.']

title: Banana Walnut Lassi
method: ['For each portion put 1 cup yogurt in a blender jar. Peel and roughly chop 1 banana and add to the jar. Add 8-10 walnuts,  1/4  cup powdered sugar, saffron and  1/2  teaspoon green cardamom powder and blend to a smooth mixture. Pour into a tall serving glass. Make more portions in the same way.', 'Sprinkle some cardamom powder and crushed walnuts on top. Garnish with a few saffron strands and serve immediately.']

title: Dabeli Bruschetta
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add onions and saute till golden.', 'Add tomatoes, mix and saute. Add tomato puree, mix well and cook till tomatoes turn pulpy.', 'Add dabeli masala and mix. Add potatoes and mix. Add  1/2  cup water and mix well. Add salt and mix. Switch off heat, add lemon juice and mix well.', 'Place the bread slices on a baking tray, put the tray in the preheated oven and toast till lightly browned.', 'Spread some red-chili garlic chutney and green chutney on each toasted slice. Top with a generous amount of the cooked mixture.', 'Drizzle date-tamarind chutney and top with cheese. Put the tray back in the preheated oven and gratinate the cheese.', 'Top with masala peanuts, sev, coriander leaves and pomegranate pearls and serve immediately.']

title: Apple and Cranberry Compote
method: ['Put sugar in a non-stick pan, add star anise and cardamoms and cook till the sugar caramelizes.', 'Add cranberries and mix well and cook till soft.', 'Add apples, mix well and cook for two to three minutes. Add salt and pepper powder and mix well.', 'Add port wine, mix well and cook for five to ten minutes.', 'Grate rind of entire orange into the pan. Add orange juice, mix well and cook till the mixture thickens.', 'Transfer the compote into an airtight container and use as required within seven days.']

title: Mangodi Ki Sabzi
method: ['Heat two tablespoons of oil in a kadai and saute mangodi until crisp and slightly browned. Drain.', 'Beat the yogurt, add the gram flour, salt, chilli powder, coriander powder and turmeric powder and mix well.', 'Heat the remaining oil in a kadai; add the bay leaf, cumin seeds, whole red chillies and saute for a while.', 'Add the mangodi, ginger paste, tomato puree and yogurt mixture.', 'Add one cup of water and mix well. Add the garam masala powder and chopped coriander leaves.', 'Add one cup of water and mix well. Add the garam masala powder and chopped coriander leaves.', 'Cook for a few minutes and serve hot.']

title: Spiced Peach Iced Tea
ingredients: ['2-3 medium peaches, peeled and chopped', '1 small peach, thinly sliced', '1 inch cinnamon', '5-6 tea bags', '6-8 tablespoons sugar', '1 1/2  teaspoons lemon juice', 'Ice cubes as required', '5-6 lemon slices + to serve', '6-8 fresh mint leaves + to serve']
method: ['To make peach jam, heat a non-stick pan, add chopped peaches, 2-3 tablespoons sugar and  1/2  teaspoon lemon juice, mix well and cook till sugar melts.', 'Add  1/4  cup water, mix and cook till the peach turns soft and pulpy. Take the pan off the heat and allow the jam to cool down to room temperature.', 'Bring 4 cups water to a boil in a deep pan. Break cinnamon and add to the water.', 'Add remaining sugar and cook till it melts. Take the pan off the heat and strain the mixture into a jar.', 'Dip the tea bags for a few times or till the flavour is infused well. Discard the tea bag and add ice cubes.', 'Add peach jam, some lemon slices, mint leaves and remaining lemon juice and mix well.', 'Put ice cubes in serving glasses, add some lemon slices, some mint leaves, a few peach slices, and pour the peach tea over. Serve immediately.']
Main ingredients: Peaches, Cinnamon, Tea bags, Sugar, Lemon juice, Ice cubes, Lemon slices, Fresh mint leaves

title: Lemony Chicken Bites
method: ['Mix together chicken cubes, salt, pepper powder, onion powder, garlic powder, chilli flakes, dried mixed herbs, citric acid and lemon juice in a bowl. Set aside for 10-15 minutes.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Coat the marinated chicken cube with some flour, dip in beaten egg and coat with cornflakes. Again dip in beaten eggs and coat with cornflakes.', 'Put the prepared chicken cubes in hot oil and deep-fry till golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot with mustard mayonnaise.']

title: Rajasthani Lehsun Chutney with Apple
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add fenugreek seeds, garlic cloves and yellow mustard seeds and saute for a minute.', 'Add dried red chillies and saute on high heat till garlic turns golden. Switch off heat, add dried mango powder, castor sugar and salt and mix well. Set aside to cool.', 'Deseed and cut Washington Apple into small pieces.', 'Grind together chopped apple and roasted garlic-spice powder along with some water to make a smooth paste.', 'Serve.']

title: Honey Chilli Chicken Rice
method: ['Cut chicken into thick strips and put them into a bowl. Add salt, some of the crushed black peppercorns and cornstarch and rub over the chicken.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon groundnut oil in a non-stick wok, add marinated chicken strips, green chilli sauce,  1/2  teaspoon red chilli flakes, soy sauce and mix well. Add honey and cook till the chicken is fully done.', 'Heat remaining oil in another non-stick pan.', 'Slice spring onion bulbs and add to the pan and saute till translucent. Add green and red capsicum and broccoli florets and mix well.', 'Break egg into another bowl and beat well.', 'Make some space in center of the vegetables and add the beaten egg and mix well. Cook till the egg is done. Add rice, remaining black peppercorns, salt, soy sauce and remaining chilli flakes and mix well. Add stock and cook for 5-7 minutes.', 'Arrange the cooked chicken strips around a serving plate, place cooked rice in the center of the plate, garnish with spring onion greens and serve immediately.']

title: Rasam
method: ['Pressure cook the pigeon peas in 4 cups water with half the turmeric powder till 4-5 whistles.', 'Heat some water in a non-stick pan. Add remaining turmeric powder, rasam masala powder, asafoetida, pepper powder, tamarind pulp and tomatoes, mix well and bring to a boil.', 'Reduce heat and cook till the liquid becomes half the volume. Mash the cooked dal and strain the water.', 'Add the strained dal water to the tamarind mixture along with salt and chopped coriander and mix well.', 'For tempering, heat ghee in a non-stick tempering pan. Add mustard seeds and let them splutter. Add asafoetida and curry leaves and switch off heat.', 'Add the tempering to the rasam, mix well and cook on medium heat for 4-5 minutes.', 'Serve hot with steamed rice.']

title: Walnut Chocolate Fudge
method: ['1. Grease a seven-inch square baking tray.', '2. Heat a pan, add the butter and allow it to melt. Add the chocolate and stir till it melts. Stir in the condensed milk and cook for two to three minutes.', '3. Add the walnuts to the pan and mix. Add the grated khoya, vanilla essence and mix well.', '4. Transfer the mixture to the greased tray and spread evenly. Cool in the refrigerator before cutting into pieces. Serve chilled.']

title: Scallion Cheesy Chicken
method: ['Place chicken breasts on the worktop. Sprinkle some crushed peppercorns and salt on top and rub in well.', 'Mix together spring onion with greens, garlic, soy sauce, chilli flakes, coriander leaves, salt and crushed peppercorns in a bowl.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan till it smokes. Pour it into the bowl and mix well.', 'Add chicken breasts and mix well. Set aside for ten to fifteen minutes.', 'Preheat oven to 200o C.', 'Place mozzarella cheese on each chicken breast and roll tightly folding the edges.', 'Break eggs in another bowl. Spread flour and panko in two different plates.', 'Dust the chicken with the flour, dip in the beaten eggs and coat with the panko.', 'Place the chicken on a baking tray, place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for fifteen to twenty minutes.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Gajar aur Tofu ki Barfi
method: ['Heat a non-stick pan, add carrots and soya milk and cook for 10-15 minutes. Add dried ginger powder and mix.', 'Grate tofu, add to the pan and mix well.', 'Add green cardamom powder and jaggery, mix well and cook till the jaggery melts or for 2-3 minutes.', 'Cover an aluminium tray with a cling film. Spread the mixture in the tray and allow to cool. Let it set for 4-5 hours and cut into pieces.', 'Transfer into a serving plate and serve.']

title: Chicken Sub Sandwich
ingredients: ['4 boneless chicken breasts', '2 foot-long loaves', 'Salt to taste', 'Crushed black peppercorns', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '2 eggs', ' 1/4  cup refined flour (maida)', 'Breadcrumbs for coating', 'Oil for shallow frying', 'Butter for applying', 'Mixed lettuce leaves as required', 'Mayonnaise for drizzling', 'Mustard sauce for drizzling', '2 medium tomatoes, thinly sliced', '1 large avocado, halved and sliced', '4-5 pickled gherkins, vertically sliced', 'Pickled jalapenos slices as required', 'Chips or wafers of your choice to serve']
method: ['Lightly pound each chicken breast with a steak hammer. Sprinkle salt and crushed black peppercorns. Drizzle olive oil and rub the mixture well on all the sides of the chicken breasts. Transfer them into a shallow bowl, break the eggs into the bowl and mix. Sprinkle refined flour and rub well.', 'Spread breadcrumbs on a large plate, coat each chicken breast well on both sides with the breadcrumbs.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick shallow pan. Slide in 2 chicken breasts at a time and shallow fry on each side till evenly golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper. Cook the remaining two in the same way.', 'Place one foot long loaf on the worktop and slit it horizontally in half.', 'Apply butter on the bottom half of the loaf. Arrange a few mixed lettuce leaves over it. Sprinkle crushed black peppercorns, salt and place two chicken breasts one next to the other, on the sandwich.', 'Drizzle some mayonnaise and some mustard sauce. Arrange some tomato slices, sprinkle salt and crushed black peppercorns over it.', 'Place  1/2  of the avocado slices. Drizzle some and some mustard sauce. Place some gherkins and randomly arrange some of the pickled jalapenos.', 'Apply some butter on the top half of the loaf and place it over the sandwich with the butter side facing down. Cut the sandwich in half. Make one more sandwich similarly.', 'Place the sandwich halves on a serving platter and serve with chips or wafers of your choice.']
Main ingredients: Boneless chicken breasts, Footlong loaves, Olive oil, Refined flour, Breadcrumbs, Mixed lettuce, Mayonnaise, Mustard sauce, Avacado

title: Hare Moong Ki Khichdi With Palak
method: ['Heat 1 teaspoon ghee in a pressure cooker.', 'Add cloves and cumin seeds and let seeds crackle.', 'Add whole gram, rice, turmeric powder, salt and spinach.', 'Mix well and cook for 3-4 minutes.', 'Add moong sprouts and 3 tablespoons ghee. Slit green chillies and add, mix well.', 'Add buttermilk, stir to mix, cover and pressure cook on high heat for 2 whistles.', 'Lower heat and cook further for 2 whistles.', 'Switch off heat, remove lid and mix well.', 'Heat 2 tablespoons ghee in a non-stick pan.', 'Add garlic and ginger and saute till garlic is well browned.', 'Add this to cooked khichdi and mix well. Serve hot.']

title: Hariyali Pav Bhaji
method: ['Heat oil and butter in a non-stick pan till butter melts. Add green chillies and onions, mix and saute till translucent.', 'Add green tomatoes and salt, mix and saute till tomatoes turn pulpy.', 'Add cauliflower, mix well, cover and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add potatoes and mix. Add turmeric powder, pav bhaji masala and spinach puree and mix well.', 'Add some water and mix well. Add capsicum, green peas, salt and some water. Mash everything with a masher. Cover and cook for 5-6 minutes.', 'Heat some butter on a non-stick tawa. Slit the pavs without cutting through, place them on the tawa and toast till golden and crisp.', 'For each portion, put some green bhaji on a serving plate, garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot with onions and lemon wedges.']

title: Pineapple Curry
method: ['Heat oil in a deep non stick pan, add cinnamon, cloves, star anise and shallots and saute.', 'Crush peanuts.', 'Add garlic to the pan and saute till browned.', 'Cut pineapple into medium cubes and add to the pan', 'Grind together fresh red chillies and coconut with a little water to a paste.', 'Add turmeric powder, ground coconut, cucumber and a little water to the pan and mix. Add peanuts and salt and mix well. Add tamarind pulp and thick coconut milk and mix.
