Cover and cook, on medium heat, for 15 minutes or till both pineapple and cucumber soften and the gravy thickens.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Chinese Samosa
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Take potatoes in a bowl. Add cornstarch and mix well. Deep-fry potatoes in hot oil till golden. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Cut spring onion greens.', 'Heat a non-stick pan. Add fried potatoes and Sichuan sauce and toss to mix.Add chopped spring onion greens and peanuts and mix well. Switch off heat.', 'Dissolve refined flour in some water to make a smoothslurry.', 'Fold samosa pattis into cones. Fill with prepared potato mixture and fold the remaining side, using the slurry, to make samosas.', 'Deep-fry the prepared samosas into hot oil till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot garnished with spring onion green curls and red bell pepper curls.']

title: Meen Pollichathu
method: ['Clean the fish. Make gashes on both the sides. Mix salt, black pepper powder, turmeric powder and lemon juice in a bowl.', 'Apply this mixture on the fish and set aside for half an hour. Grease the banana leaves with a little oil. Grind together dry red chillies, ginger, garlic and black peppercorns to a fine paste.', 'Heat oil in a pan. Add mustard seeds, curry leaves and onions and saute for two to three minutes. Add green chillies and ground paste and saute on high heat. Add tomatoes and continue to saute. Add thick coconut milk and salt to the masala and mix.', 'Remove from heat and spread on a plate to cool. Take a banana leaf, spread some masala on it. Place the fish over the masala and spread some more masala over the fish.', 'Fold the edges and secure with toothpicks. Similarly prepare the other fish.', 'Heat some oil in a pan and place the wrapped fish on it. Cook turning the parcels a few times for eight to ten minutes.', 'Serve hot in banana leaves itself.']

title: Chicken And Garlic Steak With Red Peppers
method: ['Slit the chicken horizontally, taking care not to cut through. Open it out, beat with a steak hammer to flatten evenly and marinate with salt, half the crushed black peppercorns, half the garlic and two tablespoon of oil.', 'Set aside for fifteen minutes. Meanwhile boil the potato wedges and broccoli separately in salted water and remove. Refresh the broccoli in cold water and drain. Preheat oven to 180oC.', 'Dredge the chicken in refined flour, dip in egg and dredge again in refined flour. Heat remaining oil in a non stick pan or a skillet, place the chicken and cook on both the sides till golden brown. Drain and finish in the preheated oven at 180oC for about five minutes or till done. Keep warm. To make the sauce saute onions and remaining garlic in the same pan till light brown. Add red capsicum and saute for two minutes.', 'Add stock and bring to a boil. Mix cornflour in one fourth cup of water and add. Add salt and the remaining crushed black peppercorns. Cook till the sauce reaches the desired consistency. Heat butter in a pan and toss the potatoes and broccoli with parsley. Place the potatoes and broccoli in the centre of a serving plate. Place the chicken on top of it.', 'Drizzle half the sauce over the chicken and half around the plate, garnish with a sprig of parsley and serve immediately.']

title: Palak Pakoda - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat sufficient in a kadai.', 'Take gram flour in a large bowl, add carom seeds, turmeric powder, red chilli powder, asafoetida, salt and sufficient water and whiskwell to make a smooth batter of coating consistency.', 'Dip each spinach leaf in the batter, shake off excess batter and slide into the hot oil. Deep fry till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Arrange them on a serving platter and serve hot with date and tamarind chutney and lasoon chutney.']

title: Chiwda Soya Tikki
method: ['Heat 1 tbsp oil in a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds, ginger, green chillies and saute till fragrant.', 'Finely chop onion, add to the pan and saute till translucent.', 'Add red chilli powder, turmeric powder, dried mango powder, chaat masala and saute for a minute.', 'Add the pressed rice, soya granules, a little water and mix well. Add salt and lemon juice and mix. Add potatoes and cornflour and mix well.', 'Heat the remaining oil in another non-stick pan.', 'Divide the mixture into equal portions and shape them into tikkis.', 'Place the tikkis in the pan and cook, flipping sides, till evenly golden on both sides. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Place thin long strips of red capsicum and green capsicum on a serving plate. Place the tikkis on the plate and serve hot.']

title: Aam ki Kheer
method: ['Pour milk into a non-stick pan. Drain and add rice and let it come to a boil. Cook, stirring for 12-15 minutes till the rice gets cooked and the kheer thickens.', 'Reduce heat and add sugar and mix well. Cook till sugar melts. Switch off heat.', 'Add green cardamom powder and mix well. Add mango pulp and mix. Switch on the heat and cook till mango gets heated through.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, cool down to room temperature and chill in the refrigerator for about2 hours.', 'Garnish with chopped pistachios and almonds and serve chilled.']

title: Dark Chocolate Sponge
method: ['Preheat oven to 180oC. Grease a baking tin.', 'Sift refined flour, baking powder and cocoa powder together into a bowl and set side.', 'Mix coffee powder andone fourth cup waterin another bowl to make a decoction and set aside.', 'Put butter and sugar in a large bowl beatwith an electric beater forone minute. Add vanilla essence and eggs one by one and beat till light and fluffy.', 'Add flour mixture to the butter and sugar mixture and fold in well. Add coffee decoction and mix well. Check the consistency of batter and add a little milk to get the required consistency.', 'Pour the batter into the baking tin and bake in the preheated oven for thirty to thirty five minutes.', 'Remove from the oven and transfer on a wire rack to cool.', 'Use as required.']

title: Green Prawn Pulao - SK Khazana
method: ['To make paste, take mint leaves, coriander leaves, garlic, ginger, green chillies in a blender jar, add a little water and blend into a smooth paste. Transfer into a bowl.', 'Heat ghee in a non-stick pan, add black peppercorns, cloves, bay leaf, cinnamon, green cardamoms and onion, mix and saute till golden.', 'Add prawns and saute for 1 minute. Add ground paste and mix well.', 'Add rice saute for 2-3 minutes on medium heat. Add salt and mix well. Add 3 cups hot water, mix well and bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover and cook for 10 minutes.', 'Midway through add green garlic, mix well, cover and cook for 5 minutes.', 'Transfer on to a serving plate, garnish with a mint sprig and serve hot.']

title: Crunchy Vegetable Salad
method: ['Mix oil, orange juice, mustard paste, lemon juice, salt and white pepper powder thoroughly.', 'Keep aside in the refrigerator. In a serving bowl arrange red cabbage at the bottom then layer with green cabbage, carrots, radish, capsicum topped with bean sprouts.', 'Chill in the refrigerator. Just before serving sprinkle roasted crushed peanuts. Shake the dressing thoroughly and lace the salad with the dressing uniformly. Serve immediately.']

title: Chicken Stuffed Parantha
method: ['Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan. Add ginger-garlic paste and saute for  1/2  a minute.', 'Add carom seeds, garam masala powder, mix well and add chicken mince. Mix well and cook for 2 minutes.', 'Add chopped mint leaves and mix well. Add salt and mix well. Cook till fully done and remove from heat and set aside to cool.', 'Combine refined flour, 1 1/2  cups water, 1 tablespoon oil and salt in a bowl. Mix well and knead into a soft dough.', 'Divide dough into 8 equal portions and roll out each into a medium size disc dusting with flour.', 'Heat oil on non-stick tawa.', 'Place a disc on a worktop. Put spoonful of chicken mixture on it and spread all over. Apply little oil on another disc and place on it. Press the corners and seal. Make other paranthas in a similar way.', 'Place parantha on the tawa and shallow-fry till evenly golden from both the sides.', 'Cut into triangles and place on a serving plate. Garnish with chopped mint leaves and serve hot.']

title: Chocolate Coated Mango
method: ['Melt chocolate in the microwave oven. Peel mangoes.', 'Cut slices from either side of the seed. Take the chocolate out of the oven and whisk well.', 'Keep a silicon sheet on a refrigerator shelf.', 'Keep the mango pieces flat on a work top and make slits vertically at an even distance but keep them joined at one end.', 'Arrange the slices on the silicon sheet and press lightly to spread out like a fan.', 'Pour the melted chocolate over them and spread gently to cover the entire surface.', 'Pat the tray gently and keep it in the refrigerator to set completely.', 'Serve chilled.']

title: Coconut Rawas
method: ['Sprinkle salt and half the lemon juice on the fish pieces and set aside for fifteen minutes. Grind onion, ginger, garlic, two fresh red chillies and lemon grass to a paste.', 'Diagonally slice the remaining fresh red chilli. Heat oil in a pan and saute the fish pieces for a couple for minutes. Add the ground paste and stir.', 'Saute for a couple of minutes more or till the fish is cooked over high heat. Add coconut milk and cook for a minute. Add honey and coriander leaves and mix. Add the remaining lemon juice and mix.', 'Serve hot, garnished with red chilli slices.']

title: Bajra na Dhebra
method: ['Put bajra flour, wheat flour, fenugreek leaves, yogurt, green chillies, sesame seeds, red chilli powder, turmeric powder and salt in a bowl. Mix well and knead into a soft dough. Add 1 teaspoon oil and knead again.', 'Divide dough into equal portions and shape them into balls. Flatten the balls, dust with wheat flour and roll out into medium sized rotis. These are dhebras.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa. Place each dhebra and cook for 2 minutes or till the underside is done. Flip, drizzle oil all around and cook till evenly done from both the sides.', 'Serve hot with yogurt and dollops of ghee.']

title: Jalapeno and Pimento Stuffed Mushrooms
method: ['Discard the stalks of the mushrooms.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a non-stick pan. Add half the garlic and half the onion and saute well. Add chipotle in adobo sauce and mushrooms and toss well.', 'Add salt, crushed peppercorns and some water, toss well for 2-3 minutes. Transfer the sauteed mushrooms onto a baking tray.', 'Cut jalapenos into small pieces.', 'To make the filling, heat remaining olive oil in another non-stick pan. Add remaining garlic, remaining onion and jalapeno pieces.', 'Add yellow, green and red peppers, celery, salt and crushed peppercorns. Toss well and cook for 2 minutes. Transfer into a bowl.', 'Stuff the mushrooms with the prepared filling. Top each with cheese and bake in the oven at 200oC till the cheese melts.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan.', 'Roughly chop spinach leaves and add alongwith crushed peppercorns and salt. Toss well for a minute.', 'Divide the sauteed spinach onto individual serving dishes. Place the stuffed mushrooms on top and serve immediately.']

title: Vegetable Biryani
method: ['Boil rice in four cups of salted boiling water with two green cardamoms, one black cardamom, five cloves, half inch stick of cinnamon, until three-fourth done. Drain excess water and set aside. Heat a non-stick pan. Add the remaining green cardamoms, cloves, black cardamom and cinnamon along with bay leaf and caraway seeds and roast. Add onions, carrot, French beans, cauliflower florets and green peas.', 'Sprinkle salt, cover and cook on medium heat for two minutes. Add ginger-garlic paste mixed with a little water and stir. Cover and cook for two minutes. Add turmeric powder, red chilli powder and coriander powder and cook.Whisk yogurt with rose water and saffron. Add a little water or milk and whisk well. Add tomato puree to the vegetables along with half teaspoon garam masala powder and mix well. Simmer for two minutes. Take a microwave safe deep bowl.', 'Arrange a layer of rice at the bottom. Over that arrange half the cooked vegetables followed by another layer of rice. Sprinkle half of the remaining garam masala powder, half the coriander leaves, half the mint leaves and half the yogurt mixture. Arrange the remaining vegetables followed by the remaining rice.Sprinkle the remaining garam masala powder, remaining coriander leaves, remaining mint leaves and the remaining yogurt mixture. Cover with a silicon lid and cook in the microwave oven for four to five minutes on HIGH (100%). Let it stand for five minutes. Serve hot.']

title: Quinoa Pomegranate and Spinach Salad
method: ['Combine baby spinach, cucumber, apples, quinoa, onion and pomegranate in a bowl and mix well.', 'To make dressing, combine olive oil, vinegar, salt, pepper powder and Italian seasoning in another bowl and mix well.', 'Pour the dressing over the salad and serve.']

title: Raspberry Smoothie- Sk Khazana
method: ['Put yogurt in a blender jar, add raspberry crush, vanilla essence, honey, fresh raspberries, mint leaves, ice cubes and milk and blend to a smooth smoothie.', 'Pour smoothie into 4 serving glasses. Garnish with fresh frozen raspberries, mint sprigs and chia seeds.']

title: Noodle Tadka
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add mustard seeds when they splutter, add curry leaves and onions and saute till the onions are translucent. Add potatoes, peas, turmeric powder, green chilies and salt. Mix well and cook till potatoes are soft.', 'Add noodles and peanuts and saute for two minutes. Remove from heat and add lemon juice and coconut and mix well. Serve hot garnished with coriander leaves.']

title: Dry Fruit Lassi Chuski
method: ['Put lots of ice, yogurt, condensed milk, cashewnuts, almonds, raisins and ragi cookies in a blender jar and blend till smooth.', 'Pour into serving glasses, garnish with crumbled ragi cookies. Serve chilled.']

title: French Egg Toast
method: ['Break eggs into a deep bowl and beat with a fork.', 'Add sugar and beat till well blended. Add milk and continue beating.', 'Cut bread slices into triangles.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Dip bread slices in egg mixture and coat well in the mixture. Shallow-fry till both sides are evenly browned.', 'Sprinkle icing sugar on top and serve hot.']

title: Rajma Masala
method: ['Grind together onion, ginger and garlic with some water into a fine paste.', 'Heat oil in a pressure cooker. Add the prepared paste, mix well and saute for 5-6 minutes.', 'Add tomato puree and mix well. Add salt, mix and cook on low heat till oil separates.', 'Add turmeric powder, coriander powder, cumin powder, chilli powder and salt and mix well.', 'Add kidney beans and some water and mix well. Cover and pressure cook on high heat for 5-6 whistles. Reduce heat and cook till 3-4 whistles.', 'Serve hot garnished with a coriander sprig.']

title: Bhopla Gharge
method: ['Heat ghee in a non-stick pan. Add pumpkin and saute on a high heat for 2-3 minutes.', 'Transfer into a bowl, add jaggery and mix well. Add rice flour and mix well.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.Make small balls of this mixture and place on one half of a plastic sheet.', 'Cover it with the other half and press with hand and shape it like a gharge.', 'Deep fry the gharges in hot oil till golden brown. Drain on absorbent paper and serve hot.']

title: Kasuri Methi Chicken Tikka
method: ['Combine ginger-garlic paste, Kashmiri red chilli paste, red chilli powder, lemon juice, black salt, salt, red chilli flakes and garam masala powder in a bowl and mix well. Add dried fenugreek leaves, yogurt and mix well. Set aside.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan. Add carom seeds, gram flour and mix well. Roast till the flour turns brown.', 'Remove from heat, add the gram flour mixture to the marinade and mix well. Add turmeric powder and chicken pieces and mix well. Set aside to marinate for an hour.', 'Heat some oil in a non-stick grill pan and place chicken pieces on it. Flip the pieces once they are grilled on one side. Reduce the heat and cook till the chicken is done. Baste butter on the top of chicken pieces.', 'Transfer the chicken tikka on a serving platter. Sprinkle chaat masala and serve hot with lemon wedges.']

title: Breadfruit Chips
ingredients: ['1 breadfruit', 'Oil for deep frying', 'Salt to taste']
method: ['Trim the breadfruit, quarter it, remove the hard centre and peel them.  Further cut them thinly into strips and put them into salted water.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a deep pan.', 'Drain the chips from the water and deep fry the chips till golden and crisp.', 'Drain on absorbent paper. Sprinkle a little salt over them if you wish and serve hot.']

title: Tandoori Fish Wrap
ingredients: ['300 gms rawas fish fillets, cut into 1 inch pieces', '4 medium whole wheat tortillas', '1 cup hung yogurt', 'Salt to taste', ' 1/2  teaspoon chaat masala', '1 teaspoon garam masala powder', ' 1/2  teaspoon roasted and powdered dried fenugreek leaves (kasuri methi)', '1 1/2  teaspoons red chilli powder', '1 teaspoon ginger garlic paste', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 tablespoon mustard oil', ' 1/2  teaspoon turmeric powder', 'Oil to drizzle', 'Butter for basting', 'Mint mayo to drizzle', 'Iceberg lettuce leaves as required', ' 1/2  medium carrot, peeled and cut into thin strips, soaked in cold water', ' 1/2  medium cucumber, cut into thin strips, soaked in cold water']
method: ['To make the marinade, take yogurt, salt, chaat masala, garam masala powder, kasuri methi, red chilli powder, ginger garlic paste,  1/2  tablespoon lemon juice and mustard oil in a bowl and mix well.', 'Take fish fillets in another bowl. Add salt, turmeric powder, remaining lemon juice and mix well.', 'Add the fish to marinate and coat well. Cover and set aside to marinate in refrigerator for 1 hour.', 'Heat a non-stick grill pan. Insert 3 fish pieces on each skewer, keeping a little gap between each piece.', 'Drizzle oil on the grill pan, and place the fish skewers on it and cook, rotating the skewers, on medium heat till golden brown grill marks appear on both sides. Occasionally baste fish fillets with butter.', 'Spread mint mayo sauce on each tortilla.  Tear and place lettuce leaves, carrot and cucumber over them.', 'Place grilled fish pieces in center.  Roll the tortillas. Place each roll on a paper and roll tightly covering only the bottom of the rolls and tie with a thread.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Hare Pyaaz , Neem aur Imli ki Chutney
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add garlic, ginger and white sesame seeds. Saute for a minute on medium heat, stirring continuously. Add green chillies and saute for a minute.', 'Add asafoetida and mix well. Add neem leaves and saute for a minute.', 'Roughly chop spring onions greens and add to the pan. Squeeze tamarind pulp and add to the pan and cook for 2-3 minutes. Add salt and mix well. Cook for 1-2 minutes on medium heat. Add black salt and roasted cumin powder and mix well. Cook for 1-2 minutes and switch off heat. Let the mixture cool slightly.', 'Transfer the mixture into a blender jar and grind into fine paste. Transfer into a small serving bowl and set aside to cool.', 'Serve with missi roti.']

title: Cheesy Onion and Pepper Sandwich
method: ['Heat a non-stick tawa. Place bread slices on top and toast till evenly done from both sides.', 'Heat butter in a non-stick pan. Add onion and saute for a minute.', 'Add yellow pepper, red pepper and capsicum. Toss well and saute on high heat for 3-4 minutes.', 'Add salt, herbs, crushed peppercorns and red chilli flakes and toss to mix. Switch off heat.', 'Spread a portion of cooked mixture on 4 toasted bread slices and place a cheese slice on each of them.', 'Put the prepared slices on a non-stick tawa and let the cheese melt.', 'Remove from heat and cover with the remaining toasted bread slices.', 'Cut into triangles and serve immediately.']

title: Semolina Halvash
method: ['Heat butter in a pan. Add pine nuts and saute till light brown. Add semolina and continue to saute till lightly coloured.', 'Add two cups of water and cook stirring continuously till the mixture thickens. Add milk and continue to cook till the milk gets absorbed. Add sugar and cook till the sugar melts and gets absorbed.', 'Add lemon rind and orange rind and mix. Add raisins, almonds, pistachios and mix.', 'Continue to cook till the halwa thickens.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Kadai Kala Chana
method: ['To make the kadai masala, dry roast coriander seeds, fennel seeds, 2 dried chillies and 1 tsp cumin seeds till fragrant. Remove from heat, cool and grind to a coarse powder.', 'Heat mustard oil in a non-stick kadai till it begins to smoke. Cool it slightly, add bay leaves and remaining dried chillies and saute for 10 seconds.', 'Add green chillies and remaining cumin seeds, mix and saute for 2-3 minutes. Add tomato puree, mix well and cook for 2 minutes.', 'Add red chilli powder, dried mango powder, turmeric powder, coriander powder and chaat masala and mix well. Add salt and mix.', 'Roughly chop tomatoes, add, mix and cook till they turn soft and pulpy. Add ginger strips and mix well.', 'Add brown Bengal gram and mix. Add water as required, mix and cook for 5-6 minutes.', 'Chop some coriander sprigs, add and mix. Add the kadai masala and lemon juice and mix well.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with ginger strips and coriander sprigs and serve hot.']

title: Mutte Sadam
ingredients: ['4-6 eggs (mutte)', '3 cups cooked rice (sadam)', '4-5 tablespoons oil', '2 medium onions, chopped', 'Salt to taste', '1 tablespoon ginger-garlic paste', '2 medium tomatoes, chopped', '1 teaspoon mustard seeds', '4-5 dried red chillies', '15-20 curry leaves', ' 1/2  teaspoon turmeric powder', '1 teaspoon red chilli powder', '1 teaspoon coriander powder', ' 1/4  teaspoon garam masala powder', 'Crushed black peppercorns to taste', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh coriander leaves + for garnish']
method: ['Heat 2-3 tbsps oil in a pan, add onions and salt and saute till translucent. Add ginger-garlic paste and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add tomatoes, mix well and saute for 3-4 minutes.', 'Break the eggs into the pan and mix well. Cook till most of the moisture evaporates. Transfer onto a plate.', 'Heat remaining oil in the same pan, add mustard seeds and let them splutter. Add dried red chillies and curry leaves and saute for a few seconds.', 'Add cooked eggs mixture and mix. Add turmeric powder, red chilli powder, coriander powder and garam masala powder and mix well.', 'Add cooked rice and salt and mix well. Add crushed black peppercorns and coriander leaves and mix well.', 'Transfer onto a serving platter and serve hot garnished with coriander leaves.']
Main ingredients: Eggs, Cooked rice, Onions, Ginger-garlic paste, Tomatoes, Mustard seeds, Dried red chillies, Curry leaves, Garam masala powder, Fresh coriander leaves

title: Quick Moong Dal Halwa
method: ['Heat a non-stick pan, add moong dal and dry roast till golden brown. Transfer it into a bowl and let it cool.', 'Put the roasted dal in a mixer jar and grind to a coarse powder.', 'Heat ghee in the same non-stick pan, add the dal powder, mix and saute, stirring continuously, for 3-4 minutes. Meanwhile, heat 1 cup water in another pan and let it come to a boil.', 'Add milk powder to the moong dal mixture and mix well. Add the boiling water, mix and cook stirring continuously till smooth .', 'Add sugar and mix well. Add cashewnuts, almonds and pistachios and mix well.Cook, stirring continuously, for 10 minutes or till ghee separates. Take the pan off the heat.', 'Pack the halwa tightly into a bowl and upturn it on a serving plate. Garnish with almonds, pistachios slivers and cashewnuts. Sprinkle green cardamom powder and crushed dried rose petals. Serve hot.']

title: Baked Egg And Bacon Spinach
method: ['Preheat the oven to 160degC.', 'Halve the pavs. Place one half in each ramekin. Tear the spinach leaves and place over the pavs.', 'Cook the bacon rashers in a grill pan and then cut them into small pieces. Place these bacon pieces over the spinach. Drizzle two tablespoons cream over the ingredients in each ramekin and sprinkle salt.', 'Break one egg into each ramekin. Place the ramekins in the preheated oven and bake for fifteen minutes.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Fresh Turmeric Chicken Tikka - SK Khazana
method: ['Take 400 grams chicken pieces in a large bowl, add ginger-garlic paste, green chilli paste and salt and mix well. Set aside to marinate for 15 minutes.', 'Put fresh turmeric in a blender jar, add 2 tbsp water and blend to a fine paste.', 'Take gram flour in another bowladd yogurt, turmeric paste, carom seeds, fresh cream, mustard oil and salt and whisk well. Add this mixture to the marinated chicken and mix well.', 'Add Kasuri Methi and mix well. Set aside to marinate for 25-30 minutes.', 'Preheat the oven to 180@C.', 'Transfer the chicken onto a baking tray, keep the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 20-25 minutes, basting with butter in between.', 'Arrange the tikka on a serving plate and sprinkle chaat masala on top. Serve hot with onion rings, lemon wedge and green chutney.']

title: Paneer Bhature-SK Khazana
method: ['Mix together flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, castor sugar, 1 tablespoon oil and yogurt in a parat. Add sufficient water and knead into a soft dough. Cover with a damp muslin cloth and set aside for 1 hour.', 'Mix together cottage cheese, coriander leaves, green chillies and salt in a bowl.', 'Divide the dough into equal portions and stuff with a portion of cottage cheese mixture and shape into a ball.', 'Grease the worktop with some oil and roll out each stuffed ball into a bhatura.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Deep-fry each bhatura till golden brown. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot with chole, onion rings and green chilli.']

title: Molten Chocolate and Peanut Butter Lava Cake
method: ['Preheat oven to 180degC.', 'Take chocolate pieces in a bowl. Add butter and melt in a microwave oven on high for one minute. Remove from heat and mix well. Cool down to room temperature.', 'Break eggs into another bowl. Add powdered sugar and blend with a hand blender till light and fluffy.', 'Sieve together cocoa powder, baking powder and flour into it. Add melted chocolate mixture and mix well to a smooth batter.', 'Pour the batter into eight individual silicon cupcake moulds till half. Put one tablespoon peanut butter in the centre of each and top with some more chocolate batter, taking care not to fill up to the top.', 'Place the moulds in the preheated oven and bake for eight to ten minutes. Remove from oven, cool and demould.', 'Serve.']

title: Tea Cookies
method: ['Preheat oven at 220o C.', 'Sift sugar into a bowl, add butter and cream them together with an electric beater till smooth.', 'Break egg into the bowl and continue to beat with the beater.', 'Sift flour into the same bowl and mix well.', 'Divide dough into small equal portions and shape them into balls. Flatten the balls and place them on a baking tray keeping sufficient space between each. Place a candied cherry half on top of each cookie.', 'Place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 7-8 minutes. Remove from oven and cool them on a wire rack.', 'Serve or store in an airtight container.']

title: Bacon Chicken Bites
method: ['Take chicken cubes in a bowl. Add 2 tablespoons sweet chilli sauce, lemon juice, salt and crushed peppercorns and mix well. Set aside to marinate for 10-15 minutes.', 'Halve bacon strips. Place a marinated chicken cube on a bacon strip half, roll and secure with a toothpick.', 'Place the bacon wrapped chicken in a bowl. Add brown sugar and remaining sweet chilli sauce and mix well.', 'Heat a non-stick griller. Place the bacon wrapped chicken on it and grill till fully cooked and golden from all sides.', 'Serve hot garnished with micro greens.']

title: German Pretzels
method: ['Reheat oven at 190degC. Place a silicon sheet on a baking tray.', 'Dissolve yeast and sugar in  1/2  cup lukewarm water and set aside for 10-15 minutes.', 'Combine butter and egg in another bowl and mix well. Add refined flour, little water and dissolved yeast mixture. Mix well and knead into a soft dough. Rest for 15 minutes.', 'Divide dough into 8 equal portions and roll out each portion into a long cylinder keeping the centre thick and ends thin, like a spindle. Bring the two ends together and tie a knot to give a shape of pretzel. Rest for 10-15 minutes.', 'Boil 4-5 cups water in a deep non-stick pan. Add soda bicarbonate and boil.', 'Add pretzels and soak for 10 seconds. Remove and sprinkle rock salt on top of pretzels.', 'Place pretzels on the baking tray and put it in the preheated oven. Bake for 12-15 minutes.', 'Remove from heat and cool to room temperature. Serve']

title: Masala Doodh Freak Shake
method: ['Boil milk in a deep non-stick pan, add castor sugar, green cardamom powder, nutmeg powder and saffron strands and mix well.', 'Put melon seeds in a grinder jar, add black peppercorns, almonds, cashewnuts, pistachios and walnuts and grind to a coarse powder.', 'Add this mixture to the milk and cook for 5-6 minutes.', 'Dip the rims of mason jars in white chocolate-saffron mixture and pour the prepared milk mixture into them.', 'Stick the sutarfeni on the rims.', 'Break the marshmallows and put into each jar. Break sandesh into small pieces and put into each jar. Crush and sprinkle dried rose petals on top. Put a chocolate stick in each jar and serve immediately.']

title: Mango and Chickpea Salad - SK Khazana
method: ['Cut the mangoes into 1 inch cubes. Thinly slice cucumber and further halve the slices. Transfer both into a large bowl.', 'Add carrot, onion, cherry tomatoes, black olives, green olives and chickpeas. Gently tear romaine lettuce leaves, iceberg lettuce leaves and rocket leaves and add. Add the chopped mangoes and set aside.', 'To make the dressing, squeeze the juice of the lemons into a small bottle. Add olive oil, salt, black salt, chaat masala, Tata Sampann Red Chilli Powder and crushed black peppercorns. Screw the lid on and shake vigorously till well combined.', 'Pour the dressing over the salad and toss gently.', 'Transfer the salad into a serving bowl, garnish with a few red radish slices, black olives, a little crumbled feta cheese and micro greens and serve immediately.']

title: Ananas Ka Meetha
method: ['Peel, wash and finely chop pineapple. Grate khoya and keep aside. Heat milk and keep aside. On a griddle roast cashewnuts and sunflower seeds. Cool and roughly chop cashewnuts.', 'Heat ghee in a kadai, add chopped pineapple and saute for five to seven minutes or till all the water is absorbed. Add khoya and continue sauteing for five minutes till it emits a fragrant aroma.', 'Add milk and sugar and cook stirring continuously till the mixture is almost dry. Add cardamom powder and stir well. Serve hot garnished with chopped cashewnuts and sunflower seeds and serve hot.']

title: Attu Kari Kozambu
Main ingredients: Mutton on the bone, Coriander seeds, Dried red chillies, Fennel seeds, Shallots, Curry leaves

title: VEGAN DAL FRY-SK Khazana
method: ['Preheat the oven at 150@C.', 'Take cashew nuts on a baking tray and bake for 15 minutes. Set aside.', 'Finely chop onion, green chillies, tomato and ginger piece. Roughly chop garlic cloves and set aside.', 'For the cashew butter, transfer the roasted cashew nuts in a blender jar and blend to a fine paste.', 'Heat a pressure cooker, add pigeon peas and 2 cups water and cook for 2-3 whistles. Allow the pressure to reduce completely.', 'Heat a pan, add mustard seeds and cumin seeds and roast till the seeds splutter. Add curry leaves and saute for a few seconds.', 'Add the chopped onion, chopped ginger, rock salt and garlic and mix well. Cook till the onion turns golden brown. Pour  1/4  cup water and mix.', 'Add green chillies and tomato and saute well. Add  1/4  cup water, mix and cook till the tomato turns pulpy.', 'Add turmeric powder and saute for a minute. Add the cooked gram mixture and stir well. Add rock salt, mix and cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Switch the heat off and add chopped coriander, lemon juice and 1 tsp of the prepared cashew butter. Mix well and transfer into a serving bowl.', 'Serve hot with steamed brown rice.']

title: Moongphali Ki Chutney
method: ['Roughly chop capsicum, green chillies and coriander leaves and put them in a mixer jar.', 'Add roasted peanuts, sugar, salt and lemon juice and grind coarsely. Add a little water and grind again. Serve']

title: Ragi Walnut Laddoo
method: ['Heat ghee in a non-stick pan, add finger millet flour and cook, stirring continuously, on medium heat, till fragrant.', 'Side by side, heat 2-3 tbsps water in another pan, add jaggery and let it melt.', 'Take the California Walnuts in a large bowl. Add the finger millet flour and green cardamom powder and mix well. Pour the jaggery syrup and mix till well combined. Once the temperature of this reduces slightly then grease your palms with some ghee and mix it with your hand. Take small portions of the mixture and shape them into laddoos.', 'Arrange the laddoos on a serving plate and serve.']

title: Jain Osaman
method: ['Cook moong in 6 cups water with salt till it is completely cooked and soft.', 'Strain the stock and use it for this dish. Use the moong for some other dish.Heat ghee in a deep non stick wok. Add asafoetida, cumin seeds, cinnamon, cloves, mustard seeds, curry leaves, ginger-green chilli paste and a little water and saute for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add turmeric powder, red chilli powder and coriander powder and mix. Add moong stock, jaggery and mix well. Adjust salt and simmer for 3-4 minutes.Add yogurt and mix well. While serving pour over hot steamed rice and drizzle a few drops of lemon juice.You can also serve it as a soup.']

title: Chicken Sweet Soy Sauce
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a deep pan.', 'Cut chicken into medium sized cubes and transfer into a bowl. Add 1 tablespoon garlic, green chillies, salt and 2 tablespoons cornstarch and mix well. Add a little chicken stock and mix well.', 'Deep-fry chicken in hot oil till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'To prepare sauce, heat sesame oil in a non-stick pan. Add ginger and saute for 30 seconds. Add remaining garlic and saute for a minute. Add remaining chicken stock, chilli flakes, brown sugar, soy sauce and honey and mix well.', 'Mix remaining cornstarch with some water to make a smooth slurry. Add to the sauce and mix well. Add salt and mix again.', 'Add fried chicken and mix well. Add spring onion greens and sesame seeds and toss.', 'Serve hot garnished with toasted sesame seeds and spring onion greens.']

title: Coffee Cake - SK Khazana
method: ['Preheat the oven to 180o C.', 'Take butter in a bowl, add castor sugar and beat with an electric hand blender till the mixture is pale and fluffy.', 'Add eggs, one at a time, and beat well till light peaks are formed.', 'Add vanilla essence and mix well. Add ground biscuits, cocoa powder and baking powder. Gently cut and fold the mixture till well mixed.', 'Add coffee decoction and fold into the mixture. Transfer the batter into cups.', 'Put cream in a piping bag and pipe out cream on top of the batter and spread it with a toothpick to create a design.', 'Keep the cups in the preheated oven and bake for 20-25 minutes.', 'Bring the cups out of the oven, let them cool slightly. Sift icing sugar on top and serve immediately.']

title: Chatpata Raw Mango Chutney - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat a non-stick pan. Add mangoes, castor sugar and jaggery, mix well and cook till the mangoes turn pulpy.', 'Add chilli powder, dried mango powder and cumin powder, mix well and cook till fully done.', 'Cool and serve or store in an airtight container.']

title: Stuffed Naan Bombs
method: ['Take refined flour in a large bowl, add baking powder, baking soda, salt and sugar and mix. Add yogurt and mix. Add sufficient water and oil and knead into a soft dough. Cover with a damp muslin cloth and keep aside to prove for 15-20 minutes.', 'Break the mutton seekh kababs into small pieces and shred roughly with a fork. Shape the seekh kabab mixture into 6 small balls and stuff each with a cube of mozzarella cheese.', 'Divide the dough into 6 equal portions and shape each into a small ball. Dust a work top with some refined flour and roll each ball into a small roti. Place a seekh kabab ball in the centre of each roti, gather the edges together and seal, shape into ball.', 'Grease a baking tray with some oil, place the stuffed balls in it, cover them with a damp muslin cloth and set aside to prove for 12-15 minutes.', 'Preheat the oven at 180deg C. Keep the tray in the oven and bake for 12-15 minutes.', 'Take butter in a bowl. Add parsley and mix well. Bring the tray out of the oven and brush the butter-parsley over them.', 'Keep the naan bombs in a serving bowl and serve hot.']

title: Mixed Vegetable Parantha
method: ['Mash potatoes in a parat. Add cabbage, bottle gourd, carrot, capsicum, coriander leaves, red chilli powder, cumin powder, asafoetida, carom seeds, salt and 2 teaspoons oil. Mix well and add flour, little by little, and knead into a soft dough. Add few drops oil and rub on dough.', 'Divide dough into equal portions shaped into small balls. Roll out into thin paranthas dusting with flour.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa. Place parantha on it and cook basting with ghee, till golden from both sides.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Caramalized Onion Bread
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add garlic and saute till golden. Add onion and saute till golden. Remove from heat and transfer into a bowl.', 'Dissolve yeast in 2 tablespoons warm water in a bowl. Add a pinch castor sugar, mix and set aside to activate.', 'Put flour, 1 teaspoon castor sugar and salt in another bowl and mix. Make a well in the center, add activated yeast and mix. Add some water and mix till well combined.Transfer onto the worktop and knead into soft dough. Spread butter over the dough and knead till it is well incorporated.', 'Dust some flour in a bowl, transfer the dough into it, cover with damp muslin cloth and set aside to prove for 10-15 minutes.', 'Grease a loaf tin with some butter and dust with some flour.', 'Transfer the dough onto the worktop and knock back to release excess air. Put the garlic-onion mixture over it and knead well.', 'Transfer the dough into the greased loaf tin, flatten lightly, cover with damp muslin cloth and set aside to prove for 10-15 minutes.', 'Preheat oven to 180o C.', 'Put the loaf tin on the baking tray. Place the baking tray in preheated oven and bake for 20 minutes.', 'Slice and serve.']

title: Peach Milk Shake
method: ['Drain peaches and pout into a blender jar. Add  1/2  cup milk and blend.', 'Add vanilla ice cream, remaining milk and a few ice cubes and blend again.', 'Decorate serving glasses from inside with chocolate sauce. Keep in the refrigerator till it sets.', 'Pour peach milk shake into the glasses and serve chilled.']

title: Broccoli and Almond Salad
method: ['For dressing, take lemon juice in a bowl. Add salt and crushed peppercorns. Add olive oil slowly and keep whisking.', 'Cut almonds into halves.', 'Heat a non-stick pan. Add almonds and roast till light golden. Remove from heat and cool to room temperature.', 'Add dressing to broccoli florets and toss. Transfer in a serving bowl.', 'Add roasted almonds on top and serve immediately.']

title: Dahi Bhindi
method: ['Wipe ladyfingers dry with a clean kitchen towel. Cut into large pieces.', 'Heat oil in a non stick pan, add ladyfingers and salt. Toss and cook on medium heat for 3-4 minutes.', 'Roast besan in another non stick pan till fragrant.', 'Place yogurt in a bowl. Add turmeric powder and salt and whisk till smooth.', 'Cut red chillies into pieces and add to ladyfingers along with coriander powder. Toss again.', 'Add roasted besan, mix well and cook for another 2-3 minutes.', 'Add yogurt mixture. Mix well, lower heat, cover and cook for 10-15 minutes, stirring once a while.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Red Pumpkin Ka Halwa Lal Kaddu Ka Halwa
method: ['Heat 4 tbsps ghee in a non-stick pan. Add red pumpkin to it and saute.', 'Add khoya and sugar and mix well cook till pumpkin gets cooked and the mixture reaches halwa consistency. Reduce heat, add green cardamom powder and mix well.', 'Heat remaining ghee in another non-stick pan, add almonds and cashewnuts and saute on low heat.', 'Transfer halwa into a serving bowl, garnish with sauteed nuts and serve.']

title: Bharwan Karela
method: ['Scrape the bitter gourds; make a slit on one side and remove the seeds. Rub the salt over and inside the karele and set aside for one hour. Wash under running water and set aside.', 'o prepare the stuffing, dry-roast the gram flour in a non-stick pan over low heat till fragrant. Remove from heat, transfer to a plate and set aside to cool.', 'Add the onion, coriander leaves, salt, chilli powder, garam masala powder and carom seeds and mix well. Stuff the masala mixture into each karela and set aside.', 'Heat the oil in a kadai; add the onion and saute till light golden brown. Add the ginger paste, and garlic paste and saute for two minutes. Add the coriander powder, chilli powder, cumin powder and turmeric powder and mix well.', 'Saute the masala till fragrant. Add the stuffed karele, half a cup of water and salt. Cover and cook over high heat for three or four minutes. Lower heat and cook for ten to twelve minutes, stirring gently at regular intervals. Add the tamarind juice and', 'Cover once again and cook for another ten to fifteen minutes, till the bitter gourds are cooked.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Broccoli Bake
method: ['Preheat oven at 180degC.', 'Heat 1 teaspoon butter in a non-stick pan. Add 2 teaspoons chopped garlic and saute well.', 'Add onion, mix and saute till onion turns light brown. Add broccoli, mix well and saute for a minute.', 'Add mushrooms, mix and saute for a minute. Add salt, crushed peppercorns, mix well and cook for 2 minutes.', 'Add macaroni, 1 teaspoon red chilli flakes, mix well and cook for 2 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside.', 'Heat remaining butter in another non-stick pan. Add remaining garlic and saute well.', 'Add refined flour, whisk well and cook on low heat for a minute.', 'Add milk and cook further, stirring continuously, till the sauce thickens.', 'Add salt, 1 tablespoon processed cheese and crushed peppercorns and mix well. Cook for a minute and switch off heat.', 'Spread half the cooked macaroni, broccoli and mushroom in a casserole dish. Top with 2 tablespoons processed cheese and 2 tablespoons mozzarella cheese and pour some of the sauce over and spread evenly.', 'Spread remaining cooked macaroni, broccoli and mushrooms on top, pour the remaining sauce over and spread evenly. Tap slightly and top with remaining processed cheese and mozzarella cheese and Parmesan cheese powder. Sprinkle crushed peppercorns and remaining red chilli flakes on top.', 'Put the dish in preheated oven and bake for 12-15 minutes.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Madras Lamb Curry
method: ['To make curry powder, dry roast coriander seeds, fenugreek seeds, mustard seeds, poppy seeds, cumin seeds,black peppercorns, fennel seeds, cinnamon, cloves and red chillies in a non-stick pan till fragrant. Cool and grind with turmeric powder to a fine powder.', 'Grind together the green chillies, garlic and ginger with sufficient water to make a fine paste.', 'Put the lamb in a large bowl, add the ground curry powder, yogurt and salt and mix well. Set aside in a refrigerator to marinate for two hours.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add mustard seeds. Once they start to splutter, add the curry leaves and onions and saute till lightly browned. Add the ground paste and saute for two to three minutes.', 'Add salt, tomato puree, tamarind paste, red chilli powder and two cups water. Bring to a boil and add the marinated lamb and mix well. Cover and cook for an hour, on low heat, till the lamb is completely done. Keep stirring occasionally.', 'Transfer into a serving plate, garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot.']

title: French Toast
method: ['Peel bananas and cut into  1/2  inch thick slices. Quarter strawberries and slice them.', 'Heat 2 tbsps butter in a non stick pan, add bananas and strawberries. Break eggs into a bowl and beat them. Add cream and 4 tbsps honey and mix well.', 'Add 4 tbsps to honey strawberries and bananas and mix.', 'Heat butter in another non stick pan.Soak bread slices in egg and cook on the second pan. Cook, turning sides. Remove onto a plate.', 'Place a French toast on a serving plate, put some strawberry-banana mixture over it. Place another slice over the fruits at an angle. Put some strawberry-banana mixture over the top slice and serve.']

title: Bazlama
method: ['Put yeast in a bowl. Add sugar and some warm water and set aside to activate.', 'Put flour in another bowl. Add salt and mix. Add activated yeast, yogurt and three-fourth cup water, mix and knead into soft dough. Cover with a damp muslin cloth and set aside for thirty minutes to prove.', 'Divide the dough into four equal large portions and shape them into balls. Flatten into discs, cover with a damp muslin cloth and set aside for fifteen minutes to prove.', 'Heat a non-stick pan. Place the prepared discs, one after the other, and roast till golden specks appear on both sides.', 'Serve.']

title: Steamed Pomfret with Lemongrass
method: ['Sprinkle some salt and drizzle 1 tablespoon lemon juice on the pomfret and rub well on both sides. Set aside.', 'Roughly chop lemongrass, celery, spring onion bulbs, green chillies and ginger. Place them in a blender jar alongwith chopped coriander, bay leaf, garlic, soy sauce,  1/2  tablespoon lemon juice, lemon zest and salt. Add water as required and blend into a smooth paste.', 'Apply the paste evenly on both sides of the pomfret. Set aside for half an hour.', 'Steam the pomfret in a Chinese bamboo steamer for 7-8 minutes or till the fish is cooked.', 'To make the salad, place carrot in a bowl. Add remaining lemon juice, salt, honey and sesame seeds and mix well.', 'Place the prepared salad on a serving plate. Put the steamed fish on other side and serve immediately.']

title: Sevaiyaan Caramel Custard
method: ['Preheat the oven at 180deg C.', 'Heat a non-stick pan. Add sugar and 2 tbsps water and cook till the sugar caramelizes.', 'Break eggs into a bowl and whisk for a minute. Add powdered sugar and vanilla essence and whisk well.', 'Pour the caramelized sugar into ramekin moulds.', 'Heat ghee in another non-stick pan. Crush the sevaiyaan, add to the pan and saute for a minute. Add milk and mix well and cook only till the milk becomes a little warm.', 'Whisk the egg mixture, add the milk mixture to it and whisk again.', 'Strain the sevaiyaan from the mixture and place them in the moulds over the sugar caramel. Pour the remaining egg mixture over it.', 'Pour some water in a baking tray. Place the moulds in the tray and bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes.', 'Take the moulds out of the oven and let them cool down to room temperature. Chill it in the refrigerator for 4-5 hours and serve chilled.']

title: Patrani Machchi - SK Khazana
method: ['Put coconut, coriander leaves, mint leaves, garlic, green chillies, cumin seeds, lemon juice, sugar and salt in a blender jar. Add sufficient water and raw mango and grind to a fine paste.', 'Spread some chutney on each piece of banana leaf, place a fish fillet over and spread some more chutney over it. Fold the leaf over to make a parcel and tie it up with a string.', 'Heat sufficient water in a steamer, keep the fish parcels on the perforated plate, cover and steam the fish parcels for 8-10 minutes.', 'Keep each parcel on a separate serving plate, open the parcels, garnish with lemon slices and serve hot.']

title: Anjeer Milkshake - SK Khazana
method: ['Put dried figs in a blender jar, add vanilla ice cream, fresh cream, milk powder, green cardamom powder, milk and vanilla essence and blend till smooth.', 'Pour into serving glasses, garnish with chopped dried fig and slivered pistachios. Chill and serve.']

title: Lachchedar Mathri
ingredients: ['2 cups refined flour (maida) + for dusting', '1 teaspoon carom seeds (ajwain)', '1 teaspoon crushed black peppercorns', 'Salt to taste', '6 tablespoons ghee + as required', 'Green Thai curry paste as required', 'Red Thai curry paste as required', 'Oil for greasing and brushing']
method: ['Preheat oven to 180@ C.', 'Mix together refined flour, carom seeds, crushed peppercorns, salt and 6 tablespoons ghee in a bowl. Add water as required and knead into a stiff dough.', 'Divide the dough into two equal portions and roll out each into a thin sheet.', 'Spread some green Thai curry paste on one sheet, top with some ghee, dust some flour and roll into a cylinder. Spread some red Thai curry paste on the other sheet, top with some ghee, dust some flour and roll into a cylinder. Cut both cylinders into 1 inch pieces and flatten out each piece into small discs or mathris.', 'Grease a baking tray with some oil and place the mathris on it. Brush the mathris with ghee on top. Place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes. Remove from oven, brush some ghee, flip and brush some more ghee on mathris. Put the tray back in the preheated oven and bake for 5-6 minutes. Remove from oven and cool.', 'Arrange the mathris on a serving platter and serve or store in an airtight container to serve when required.']

title: Anjeer and Boondi Pancakes
ingredients: ['8-10 dried figs, soaked and chopped', ' 1/4  cup sweet boondi', '2 cups refined flour (maida)', ' 1/2  teaspoon baking soda', ' 1/4  teaspoon vanilla essence', '1 3/4  cups milk', '2 tablespoons chopped jaggery', '15-20 walnuts', 'Butter for shallow frying', '8 whole dried figs, soaked', 'Rabri for garnish']
method: ['Take refined flour in a bowl, add baking soda and vanilla essence.', 'Heat 1 1/2  cups milk in a deep non-stick pan stirring continuously till the milk comes to a boil.  Add jaggery, switch off heat and mix well till jaggery melts.', 'Pour the milk mixture into the refined flour mixture. Add chopped figs, boondi and remaining milk. Add little water and mix well to make a medium thick and smooth batter. Chop and add walnuts and mix well. Set aside to rest for 10 minutes.', 'Heat butter in a non-stick tawa, pour a ladle of batter and spread into a medium sized pancake. Place a whole fig in centre of and cook on medium heat for 2-3 minutes, turnover and cook on other side till golden brown on both sides.', 'Transfer onto a serving plate and garnish with rabri. Serve immediately.']

title: Rasgulla Chaat
method: ['To make sweet chutney, heat together 1 cup water and 1 cup sugar syrup of the rasgullas.', 'Add carom seeds, 1 1/2  tsps red chilli powder, dried ginger powder, dried mango powder, asafoetida,  1/2  tsp black salt, roasted cumin powder, fennel powder and salt and cook for 3-4 minutes till the chutney thickens. Switch off the heat, strain the chutney and keep aside.', 'To make green chutney, grind together coriander leaves, mint leaves, green chillies, ginger and lemon juice. Transfer into a bowl. Add  1/4  tsp black salt, 1 tsp chaat masala, pinch of red chilli powder, little salt and yogurt, mix well and set aside.', 'Slice potatoes thickly.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add remaining roasted cumin powder, sprouted grams, potato slices, remaining red chilli powder, remaining chaat masala, turmeric powder, remaining black salt and salt. Mix well and cook for a minute. Transfer into a bowl and set aside.', 'Place sev pooris in a serving plate. Place 1 potato slice on each poori. Top it with the grams. Halve the rasgullas and place it on the grams. Pour sweet chutney and green chutney over them.', 'Garnish with sev, salted peanuts, roasted cumin powder, fresh pomegranate pearls and serve immediately.']

title: Breakfast Bread Cheese Balls
method: ['Put mozzarella cheese, processed cheese, 2 teaspoons coriander leaves, green chillies, crushed peppercorns, garlic and onion in a bowl and mix well.', 'Divide the mixture into equal portions, shape them into small balls and refrigerate for 10-15 minutes.', 'Take bread slices in a bowl and add water to it. Soak them for a while and squeeze out the water and place in another bowl. Mash them.', 'Add potatoes and mix well. Add 1 tablespoon coriander leaves, salt and mix well.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Divide the bread-potato mixture into equal portions. Make a dent in them and place the cheese balls in them. Shape them again into larger balls.', 'Spread breadcrumbs on a plate. Coat the balls in it, dust off the excess and deep-fry in hot oil till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Combine lemon juice, cherry tomatoes, some lettuce leaves, olive oil and salt in a bowl. Toss well.', 'Place the lettuce salad on a serving dish. Halve the fried cheese balls and put them on the dish. Serve immediately.']

title: Chokha
method: ['Roast brinjal on direct heat till the brinjal gets cooked and the skin charred.', 'Finely chop onions, garlic and green chillies. Put potatoes in a bowl and mash with your fingers.', 'Peel the roasted brinjal and mash along with the potatoes.', 'Add onion, garlic, green chillies, salt and mustard oil and mix well.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve with litti.']

title: Mexican Magic Cups
ingredients: ['1 cup cooked red kidney beans (rajma)', ' 1/2  cup polenta', '3 tablespoons oil', '1 cup chopped onions', '1 tablespoon crushed garlic', '2 medium tomatoes', 'Salt to taste', '5-6 pickled jalapenos, chopped', '2 cups milk', ' 1/4  teaspoon grated lemon zest', '200 grams processed cheese', 'A few fresh coriander leaves', 'Olive oil as required']
method: ['Preheat oven to 180deg C.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add onions and saute for 1-2 minutes.   Add garlic and saute till lightly browned.', 'Add red kidney beans and mix. Add 1 cup water, cover and cook.', 'Roughly chop tomatoes, puree them in a mixer and add to the pan. Rinse the mixer jar with a little water and add to the pan and mix. Add salt and cook.  Add pickled jalapenos and mix.', 'Heat milk in another pan. Add polenta and cook till thick and creamy. Add salt and lemon zest and mix well.', 'Put kidney beans mixture in tall cups. Cut cheese into big pieces and put them over the beans.', 'Put a few coriander leaves and top with polenta. Press lightly and drizzle a little olive oil over each. Cook in the preheated oven for 15 minutes.', 'Serve hot in the cups.']

title: One Pot Pasta with Chicken
method: ['Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a small non-stick deep pan. Add  1/2  tablespoon garlic and saute till golden. Add chicken mince, salt and crushed peppercorns, mix and cook till chicken is done. Transfer into a bowl.', 'Heat remaining olive oil in the same small non-stick deep pan. Add remaining garlic and saute till golden. Add onion and saute till translucent.', 'Add carrot, red capsicum, yellow capsicum, green capsicum, salt, crushed peppercorns and dried oregano, mix and cook for 1 minute.', 'Add pasta and mix. Add chicken stock and mix. Cover and cook for 1 minute.', 'Add cooked chicken and tomato ketchup, mix, cover and cook for 1 minute.', 'Serve hot.']

title: The Princess Cake - SK Khazana
method: ['Take refined flour in a bowl, add salt and 1 cup castor sugar and mix well. Make a well in the center, break in the eggs, add activated yeast and milk, mix well and knead into soft dough. Add butter and knead till well combined.', 'Put  3/4  cup castor sugar in another bowl, add cinnamon powder and mix well.', 'Dust the worktop with flour, keep the dough on it and roll into a rectangular sheet. Brush butter on it evenly and sprinkle the sugar-cinnamon mixture on it.', 'Roll the sheet from one end to the other, apply a little water on the open edge and seal. Cut into 8 half-inch pieces and press them lightly.', 'Place them on a greased baking tray and set aside to prove for 10-15 minutes.']

title: Creamy Basil Chicken
method: ['Take chicken in a bowl. Add garlic, salt, crushed peppercorns and pesto sauce and mix well. Set aside to marinate for 30-45 minutes.', 'Take breadcrumbs in a shallow plate. Add chili flakes, crushed peppercorns and salt and mix well.', 'Break an egg into the marinated chicken and mix well.', 'Coat each chicken breast with breadcrumbs.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a pan.', 'To prepare creamy pesto sauce, heat butter in a non-stick pan. Add flour and saute for 30 seconds. Add milk, mix and cook till it thickens.', 'Add chili flake and salt and mix. Add parmesan cheese and mix. Switch off heat, add pesto sauce and mix well.', 'Deep-fry the chicken breasts in hot oil till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Put some cherry tomatoes on one side of a serving platter and garnish it with a coriander leaf.', 'Slice and serve hot with creamy pesto sauce.']

title: Matar Samosa
method: ['Heat ghee in a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds, saute till the colour changes. Add green chillies and ginger, mix and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add onion, mix and saute onion is till translucent. Add fresh green peas and mix well. Add 3-4 tbsps water and mix well. Add salt and garam masala powder, mix well, cover and cook for 5 minutes or till the peas are cooked.', 'Mash the cooked mixture with a masher and cook for a minute. Take it off the heat and set aside to cool.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Apply a little water on the straight edge, shape it into a cone and press lightly to seal. Stuff the cone with some pea mixture and seal the top with a little more water to shape it like a samosa. Make more samosas similarly.', 'Slide the samosas into hot oil and deep-fry till golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Pour some green chutney and sweet tamarind chutney in each of serving plates and place a samosa over the chutneys. Garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot.']

title: Ghavan
method: ['Place rice flour in a bowl. Add 1 1/2  tbsps oil and salt and mix well. Add 2 cups water slowly and stir continuously to make a smooth batter. Set aside for 10-15 minutes.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa and spread a little oil with a tissue paper. Pour a ladleful of batter and spread it to a thin round shape.', 'Drizzle a little oil all around and cook till the underside is light brown. Flip over, drizzle a little oil again and cook till the other side is light brown. Similarly make more ghavan.', 'Transfer the ghavan on a serving plate and serve hot.']

title: Arrabiata Sauce
method: ['Heat olive oil in a non-stick pan, add celery and saute for a minute.', 'Add canned tomato puree and fresh tomato puree and mix well. Add chilli flakes, saltand sugar, mix well and cook for 5-10 minutes or till the sauce reduces.', 'Tear the basil leaves and add. Mix and cook for a minute.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, drizzle some olive oil, garnish with basil leaves and useas required.']

title: Poha Egg Fried Rice
method: ['Divide chicken mince into approximately 10 portions and shape into quennels. Sprinkle salt on top and refrigerate for 10-12 minutes.', 'Heat 2 tbsps oil in non stick pan.', 'Whisk eggs in a bowl with salt and green chillies. Pour this into the pan and cook, stirring, till eggs are scrambled.', 'Remove from heat and set aside in a bowl.', 'Heat 3 tbsps oil in same pan, add spring onion bulbs and onions and saute till they are lightly coloured.', 'Heat the remaining oil in another non stick pan. Add chicken quennels and cook till done.', 'Add red and yellow capsicums and poha to onions. Mix well and cook for 1 minute.', 'Add soya sauce, salt and scrambled eggs, reserving 1 tbsp for garnishing, and mix well. Add vinegar and spring onion greens. Mix well.', 'Place poha mixture on a serving dish, put the reserved scrambled eggs on top and arrange cooked chicken quennels over the eggs. Serve immediately.']

title: Tawa Aloo Sandwich
method: ['Take mashed potatoes in a bowl, add onion, coriander leaves, salt, green chillies, chaat masala powder, red chilli powder and Schezwan sauce and mix well.', 'Apply butter on 4 slices of bread, place some potato stuffing on each of them and spread evenly. Place cheese slices on top of potato mixture.', 'Place the remaining slices of bread over the cheese slices, apply butter on top of each sandwich.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa, place the prepared sandwiches with the buttered side facing the tawa, apply butter on top and cook the sandwiches, turning sides till evenly golden brown on both sides.', 'Cut the sandwiches in half diagonally, arrange them on serving platter and serve hot with green chutney and tomato ketchup.']

title: Double Layer Brownie - SK Khazana
method: ['Preheat the oven at 180oC. Grease a cake tin with butter and dust with flour.', 'Take dark chocolate in a bowl, add butter and melt in the microwave for 1 minute. Mix till well blended.', 'Break the eggs into another bowl, add sugar and beat with a hand mixer till light and fluffy.', 'Add the melted butter-dark chocolate mixture to the eggs-sugar mixture and beat with the hand blender till well mixed. Sift refined flour and cocoa powder directly into the egg mixture and fold in gently.', 'Take cream cheese in yet another bowl, add vanilla essence, cornflour, milk and egg yolk and whisk well. Transfer this mixture into a piping bag.', 'Put the cake batter in the greased cake tin. Pipe out the cream cheese mixture on top. Make desired shapes with a toothpick. Cover the top with an aluminum foil.', 'Keep the cake tin in the preheated oven and bake for 20-25 minutes. Remove and let it cool slightly. Cut the cake into wedges.', 'Transfer one wedge on each serving plate, place a scoop of vanilla ice cream over it, drizzle caramel sauce and garnish with mint sprig. Serve immediately.']

title: Bitter Gourd Chips (Karele ke Pakode)
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Combine gram flour, rice flour, salt, dried mango powder, red chilli powder, turmeric powder, coriander powder and carom seeds in a bowl and mix well. Add water as required and mix well to make a thick batter. Add 1 teaspoon hot oil and mix again.', 'Add bitter gourd slices, mix well and deep-fry in hot oil till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Sprinkle dried mango powder and red chilli powder and serve immediately.']

title: Bread Bonda
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds. When they begin to change colour, add green chilli paste, ginger paste and saute for a minute.', 'Add green peas, potatoes, turmeric powder, salt, coriander leaves, red chilli powder and chaat masala. Mix well and cook for two to three minutes. Remove from heat and keep aside to cool.', 'Trim the edges of the bread slices and dip in water. Squeeze out excess water by pressing between your palms.', 'Place a portion of the potato mixture on the bread slice and shape into a ball ensuring the filling is entirely enclosed. Heat sufficient oil in a kadai and deep-fry the balls till golden brown.', 'Drain on absorbent paper. Serve hot.']

title: Prawn Vangi Bhaji - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat oil in a deep non-stick pan, add green chillies, ginger and garlic, mix and saute for 1-2 minutes. Add onions and saute for 2-4 minutes or till they turn a light golden brown.', 'Add prawns and mix well. Add potatoes and mix well. Saute for 2-3 minutes on medium heat. Add red chilli powder, turmeric powder and kanda lasun masala and mix well. Add salt and  1/2  cup water, mix well, cover and cook on medium heat for 5 minutes or till potatoes are half done.', 'Add brinjals and tomatoes and mix well. Add a little salt, mix well, cover and cook on medium heat for about 5 minutes.', 'Add coriander leaves and coconut, mix well and cook for 1 minute.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander sprig and serve hot with bhakri or chapatti.']

title: Kaju Khoya aur Besan ke Laddoo
method: ['Melt the ghee in a non-stick kadai and add the gram flour. Cook on low heat, stirring, for about fifteen to twenty minutes till the gram flour is light brown and fragrant.', 'Add the cardamom powder, stir and take the pan off the heat. Let the mixture cool for a while.', 'Add half a cup of powdered sugar and mix well with your hands. Cool again and divide into twelve equal portions. Shape each portion into a laddoo.', 'Saute the khoya in another non-stick kadai for four to five minutes. Add the remaining powdered sugar and cashew nut powder. Divide into twelve equal portions.', 'Take each portion of the khoya mixture and spread it thickly on your palm. Place a gram flour laddoo in the centre, gather the edges of the khoya together and roll, making sure that the gram flour laddoo is completely covered with the khoya mixture.', 'Set aside to cool completely and store in an airtight container.']

title: Paneer Urad Methi
method: ['Heat 1 tsp oil in one non-stick pan and 2 tbsps oil in another non-stick pan.', 'Add split skinless black gram, fenugreek seeds, coriander seeds, black peppercorns and dried chillies to the first pan and saute.', 'Roughly slice  1/2  onion and add and continue to saute.', 'Chop the remaining  1/2  onion and add to the second pan.', 'Add coconut to the first pan and saute till fragrant.', 'Cut cottage cheese into medium cubes.', 'Transfer the coconut mixture into a mixer jar, add soaked rice and a little water and grind to a fine paste.', 'When the onion in the second pan softens, add most of the cottage cheese cubes and mix gently. Add the ground masala. Rinse the mixer jar with  1/2  cup water and add to the pan. Add salt and mix gently.', 'Add kokum petals and mix. Add a little more water if the gravy is too thick and bring the mixture to a boil.', 'Transfer into a serving dish, garnish with the remaining cottage cheese cubes and serve hot.']

title: Smoked Chicken with Citrus Salad
method: ['Heat a piece of coal on direct flame and place in a small steel bowl.', 'Take chicken breasts in a bowl. Add garlic, salt, crushed peppercorns, chilli flakes, 1 tablespoon olive oil and mustard paste and mix well.', 'Place the steel bowl on one side of the bowl andpour1 tablespoon olive oil on the coal to create smoke. Cover the entire bowl immediately with aluminum foil and keep for 3-4 minutes.', 'To prepare dressing, take maple syrup vinaigrette, lemon juice, salt and crushed peppercorns in another bowl and whisk. Add  1/4  cup olive oil gradually and whisk well.', 'Heat an electric griller and grease with some olive oil. Place the marinated chicken breasts on it and grill from all sides basting with some olive oil till golden and cooked. Transfer onto a plate.', 'Place few arugula leaves on one side of a serving platter. Place few pomelo slices, orange segments, pine nuts and feta cheese on top.', 'Place grilled chicken breasts on the other side. Drizzle some dressing, sprinkle some crushed peppercorns and sprinkle a few coriander sprigs on top of the fruit mixture.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Cabbage Toran (Keto Friendly)
method: ['Put coconut in a blender jar, add green chillies, 5-6 curry leaves and ginger and grind to a', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add mustard seeds and let them splutter. Add split skinless black gram and red chillies, remaining curry leaves and ground mixture and mix well.', 'Add cabbage and mix well. Add salt and turmeric powder and mix well. Add 1-2 tbsps of water, mix well, cover and cook for 5-6 minutes or till cabbage is done.', 'Garnish with coconut and serve hot.']

title: Cucumber Lemon and Mint Ice Tea
method: ['Combine sugar syrup and tea decoction in a jar and squeeze one lemon in it. Stir to mix.', 'Take lots of ice cubes in a jug. Thinly slice the cucumber vertically with a peeler into it. Tear fresh mint sprigs and add. Slice the lemons and add.', 'Add the tea decoction mixture and mix well.', 'Pour the drink into 4 individual tall glasses and serve chilled.']

title: Saffron and Basil Breadsticks
method: ['Preheat the oven to 180o C. Grease a baking tray with oil.', 'Add saffron to three-fourth cup of water and set aside.', 'Put yeast in a bowl, add one tablespoon warm water and set aside for two minutes to activate.', 'Put flour in a bowl, add salt, dissolved yeast and water as required and knead into a soft dough. Add one teaspoon oil and knead again. Divide the dough into small equal portions.', 'Grease your palms with a little oil and roll the portions into thin long sticks. Place them on the baking tray and set aside for ten to fifteen minutes to prove.', 'Place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for twenty minutes or till golden.', 'Remove, cool and serve as an accompaniment with soups.']

title: Kesar Pista Chai - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat milk in a deep non-stick pan till it come to a boil. Remove and set aside.', 'Boil 1 1/2  cups water in another deep non-stick pan. Crush green cardamoms and add. Add tea leaves, sugar and saffron, mix and let the mixture boil for a minute.', 'Add some of the boiled milk and boil the tea till it becomes frothy.', 'Strain the tea into 4 serving glasses. Add the froth on top.', 'Garnish with pistachios and saffron strands and serve hot.']

title: Begun Bhaja
method: ['Heat sufficient oil a non-stick pan.', 'Cut half the brinjal into thick roundels. Halve the remaining brinjal and slice thickly. Place all of them in a bowl.', 'Add salt, turmeric powder and chilli powder and mix well.', 'Shallow-fry in hot oil, a few at a time,turning sides, till golden on both sides. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Aam Ka Achar
method:
['Wash and wipe the mangoes dry.
Cut them into half, remove seed and then cut into one inch sized cubes.', 'Put the pieces in a bowl, add turmeric powder and three tablespoons of salt, mix well and allow to rest for two hours.
Drain out excess moisture.', 'Grind fenugreek seeds, fennel seeds, mustard seeds, half the onion seeds, coriander seeds and cumin seeds to a coarse powder.', 'Add asafoetida, red chilli powder and the remaining salt and mix well.
Heat mustard oil in a pan to smoking point, remove and let it cool thoroughly.', 'Mix half of the oil with the coarsely ground powder.
Add this to the mango pieces.
Mix well to coat the mango pieces.', 'Sprinkle the remaining onion seeds on top and mix.
Allow it to stand for three days.', 'On the fourth day transfer it into a porcelain jar, add the remaining oil and mix well.
Cover the jar with muslin cloth, tie with a string and let the pickle', 'mature for eight to ten days in sun.
Remember to mix the contents at least once a day.
You can start using the pickle now.
It lasts for one year.']

title: Murgh Dumdar
method: ['Preheat oven to 180degC. Grind ginger and garlic. Heat oil in a non stick pan, add green cardamoms, cloves, cinnamon and black peppercorns and saute till fragrant.', 'Add onions and saute till lightly coloured. Grind almonds with  1/4  cup water. Take chicken in a bowl, add salt,  1/2  tsp garam masala powder,  3/4  tsp red chilli powder, half the ginger-garlic paste, juice of  1/2  lemon and mix. Keep the bowl in the refrigerator to marinate.', 'Add remaining ginger-garlic paste to the onions in the pan and saute. Add turmeric powder, coriander powder, cumin powder and remaining red chilli powder and mix. And tomato puree and saute. Add yogurt and mix well. Add almond paste and mix. Add chicken and mix well. Adjust salt. Add fresh mint leaves and mix. Pour into an ovenproof dish. Sprinkle remaining garam masala powder and drizzle cream. Cover the dish with aluminium foil and bake in the preheated oven for 40-45 minutes. Serve hot with roti, naan or parantha.']

title: Mutton Vindaloo - SK Khazana
method: ['Take dried red chillies, garlic paste, cumin seeds, cinnamon, black peppercorns, cloves and malt vinegar in a blender. Add sufficient water and blend to a fine paste.', 'Take mutton in a large bowl, add ginger-garlic paste, turmeric powder and salt and mix well. .', 'Heat oil in a deep non-stick pan, add onions and saute till onions turn golden brown. Add the blended paste and mix well. Saute for 1 minute on high heat.', 'Add tomato puree and saute for 1 minute on high heat. Add the marinated mutton and saute on high heat for 1-2 minutes. Adjust salt, add sugar and mix well. Rinse the blender jar with  3/4  cup water and add to the mutton mixture. Mix well, cover and cook on medium heat for 20-25 minutes.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with fried potato wedges and serve hot with pavs.']

title: Green Onion Roll - SK Khazna
method: ['Sieve flour into a bowl, add baking powder, castor sugar and salt and mix well. Add milk powder and mix well.', 'Make a well in the center, add yeast, Sriracha sauce and sufficient water, mix well and knead into soft dough.', 'Add butter and knead till it is well incorporated. Dust a bowl with some dry flour, put the dough in it, cover with a cling wrap and set aside for 10 minutes to prove.', 'Knock back the dough, and divide into 3 equal portions. Dust flour on the worktop, and roll each portion into an oblong shape.', 'Brush water on the oblong, spread some spring onion greens, sprinkle some red chillies and some black sesame seeds lengthwise and roll it tightly. Brush some water on the open edge and press lightly to seal.', 'Cut each roll into half, place them on a plate, cover with a bowl and set aside to prove for 15-20 minutes.', 'Heat sufficient water in a steamer, grease the steamer pan with some oil, place 2 pieces of the rolls on it, cover the steamer and steam for 12-15 minutes.', 'Cut into slices, arrange them on a serving plate and serve with soy dip.']

title: Methi Wale Namak Paare
method: ['Put refined flour, salt and three tablespoon oil in a bowl and mix well.', 'Add quarter cup water gradually and knead to make medium stiff dough. Cover and rest for fifteen minutes.c', 'Knead the dough again with a little oil.Divide into equal balls and roll each to a thick chapatti.', 'Cut into diamond shaped pieces.', 'Heat a non-stick pan, add dried fenugreek leaves and dry roast for two minutes.Cool and rub between your palms to a powder.', 'Add red chilli powder and dried mango powder and mix well.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai, gently slide in the dough diamonds and deep-fry till they turn light golden.', 'Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Transfer them on a serving plate, sprinkle mixed spice powder and serve hot.']

title: Vanilla Sauce
method: ['Break eggs and separate the egg yolks from the whites.', 'Bring sufficient water to a boil in a deep non-stick pan. Place a glass bowl on top of it and put egg yolks and castor sugar in it. Cook till well blended and the sugar dissolves, whisking continuously.', 'Add vanilla essence and whisk well.', 'Add milk and mix well. Cook till the sauce thickens. You can transfer this sauce now in a non-stick pan and cook on direct heat as well.', 'Remove from heat and cool to room temperature.', 'Serve with your choice of dessert.']

title: Palak Khichdi - cook smart
method: ['Heat butter in a non-stick pan. Add half the Tata Sampann Dal Tadka Masala, garlic and saute well.', 'Add onion and saute for 2 minutes. Add remaining Tata Sampann Dal Tadka Masala, mix and saute for 4-5 minutes.', 'Heat sufficient water in a deep non-stick pan. Add spinach leaves and salt and blanch for a minute.', 'Transfer in chilled water, put in a blender jar, add little water and blend to a fine puree.', 'Add green chillies to the onion and saute. Add spinach puree and mix well. Add rice and mix well. Add salt and mix well.', 'Add garam masala powder and cream, mix well and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Drizzle some cream, garnish with yellow and red capsicum strips and serve hot.']

title: Rangbirangi Squash
method: ['Take khus syrup, rose syrup and orange squash into three different bowls. Add a little water to each and dilute slightly.', 'Pour into three separate ice trays and set in the freezer. Heat equal quantities of sugar and water in a pan and make a syrup. Set aside to cool.', 'Pour some lemon juice in serving glasses. Add a little sugar syrup to each. Place some of the coloured ice cubes and top up with a little water.', 'Place a spring of mint leaves and serve immediately.']

title: Fruit Srikhand
method: ['Peel and chop the apple. Peel and chop the elaichi bananas. Hull and chop the strawberries.', 'Take the hung yogurt in a bowl. Add powdered sugar and mango pulp and whisk well. Add the fruits and mix.', 'Add the green cardamom powder and almond slivers and mix. Chill and serve.']

title: Cranberry Shrikhand Trifle
method: ['Take hung curd in a large bowl and loosen it slightly. Add sugar and whisk till sugar dissolves. Set aside for 10-15 minutes.', 'Meanwhile roughly chop U.S. Cranberries.', 'Strain the hung curd-sugar mixture through a sieve into another bowl. Add green cardamom powder, nutmeg powder and soaked saffron and whisk well. Reserve some of the mixture for topping and add chopped cranberries to the remaining mixture and mix well and transfer this mixture into a piping bag. Snip the end.', 'To assemble, pipe out a portion of the cranberry shrikhand into serving glasses, place a few vanilla sponge pieces over it and drizzle cranberry syrup. Pipe out some more cranberry shrikhand.', 'Transfer the reserved hung curd mixture into another piping bag fitted with a star nozzle and pipe it out into the prepared serving glasses. Garnish with a few U.S. Cranberries, pistachio slivers and mint sprig and serve immediately.']

title: Cottage Cheese in Barbeque Sauce
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Grate cottage cheese in a bowl. Add salt, 1 teaspoon crushed peppercorns, green chillies reserving some, some onions, 1 tablespoon garlic, parsley,  1/2  tablespoon barbeque sauce and mix well. Knead into a soft dough and divide into medium-sized balls.', 'Slide the cottage cheese balls in hot oil and deep-fry till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon oil in another non-stick pan, add remaining garlic and saute for a minute. Add remaining onions and saute till golden. Add reserved green chillies, remaining barbeque sauce and mix well. Add yellow and red bell peppers, capsicum and mix well. Add little water to adjust consistency. Add salt and crushed peppercorns and mix well.', 'Arrange cottage cheese balls on a serving platter. Pour over the barbeque sauce and garnish with chopped parsley and serve immediately.']

title: Sheer Kurma
method: ['Boil milk till reduced to three fourths its volume. Heat ghee in a kadai. Add the vermicelli and stir gently. Add reduced milk and mix.', 'Add saffron, sunflower seeds, green cardamom powder, nutmeg powder and cook for about five minutes.', 'Add Sugar Free, almonds and pistachios and mix. Taste for sweetness and serve hot.']

title: Gebna Makleyah (Egyptian Oven-Fried Cheese)
method: ['Preheat oven to 180degC.', 'Combine feta cheese, flour, egg, salt, crushed peppercorns, parsley and breadcrumbs in a bowl and mix well.', 'Divide the mixture into twelve equal portions and shape them into balls.', 'Place the prepared balls on a baking tray. Drizzle olive oil on top and lightly mix.', 'Put the baking tray in preheated oven and bake for fifteen to twenty minutes. Transfer on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Protein Rich Poha
ingredients: ['1 1/2  cups pressed rice', ' 1/2  cup sprouted moth beans', ' 1/2  cup sprouted green gram (moong)', 'Salt to taste', ' 1/2  large onion, peeled', '1 tablespoon oil', '10-15 curry leaves', ' 1/2  teaspoon cumin seeds', '1 inch ginger', '1 green chilli', ' 1/2  teaspoon turmeric powder', ' 1/2  lemon', 'Red radish slices for garnish', 'Fresh coriander sprig for garnish']
