ingredients: ['3 tablespoons grated mozzarella cheese', '30 grams processed cheese, cut into  1/2  cm small cubes', '1 cup + 1 tablespoon refined flour + for coating', 'Salt to taste', ' 1/4  teaspoon baking soda', '2 tablespoons yogurt', '1 tablespoon oil + for deep-frying', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', ' 1/2  teaspoon red chilli flakes', 'Crushed black peppercorns to taste', 'Tomato ketchup as required']
method: ['Take 1 cup flour in a bowl. Add salt, baking soda, yogurt and some water and knead into a soft dough. Add oil and knead well. Set aside for 5-10 minutes.', 'Take mozzarella cheese in a bowl. Add processed cheese, dried oregano, chilli flakes, crushed peppercorns and salt and lightly mix.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a pan.', 'Divide the dough into equal portions, coat with some flour and roll them out to make thin discs. Cut each disc into rectangles.', 'Take 1 tablespoon flour in another bowl. Add 2-3 tablespoons water to make a thick slurry.', 'Apply some slurry on 2 sides of each rectangle. Put some cheese mixture in the center, and fold, applying some slurry on the edges to make thick rolls.', 'Deep-fry the prepared rolls in hot oil till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Line a serving platter with individual shot glasses and put some tomato ketchup in each glass.', 'Place one fried roll in each glass and serve hot.']

title: Buttermilk Sambhar - Cook Smart
method: ['Put dried red chillies, cumin seeds, coriander seeds, peppercorns, poppy seeds, garlic cloves and coconut into a grinder jar. Add a little water and grind into a smooth paste.', 'Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a non-stick pan. Add 1 teaspoon mustard seeds, 10-15 curry leaves and shallots and saute well. Cover and cook for 2 minutes', 'Transfer ground paste into a bowl, add buttermilk and mix well. Add salt and turmeric powder and mix well.', 'Add buttermilk mixture to the pan, mix well and simmer till it comes to a boil.', 'Add boondi, mix and simmer for 2 minutes.', 'Heat remaining oil in another non-stick pan. Add remaining mustard seeds and remaining curry leaves, let the seeds splutter and add this tempering to the sambhar.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Skewered Chicken with Brown Rice
method: ['Cut chicken into strips and transfer into a bowl. Add 1 tablespoon chopped garlic, 1 teaspoon chilli flakes, 1 tablespoon oil and salt and mix well. Add1 tablespoon soy sauce, mix and set aside to marinate for 10-15 minutes.', 'Heat orange juice in a non-stick pan and cook till reduced.', 'Halve shallots.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan. Add 1 tablespoon chopped garlic, mix and saute till golden. Add rice, salt,  1/2  teaspoon chilli flakes, 1 tablespoon chopped spring onion greens and remaining soy sauce, toss to mix and cook for a minute.', 'Insert marinated chicken onto satay sticks.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick grill pan. Place lemon and carrots and cook on both sides till grill marks appear on them. Transfer on a plate.', 'Place the prepared satay sticks in the same grill pan and cook equally till chicken is done. Sprinkle some water over, cover and cook for a minute. Transfer onto another plate.', 'To prepare the sauce, heat remaining oil in a non-stick pan. Add ginger, mix and saute for 30 seconds. Add remaining garlic, mix and saute till garlic turns golden. Add halved shallots and toss to mix.', 'Add the reduced orange juice, adjust some water and mix well. Add honey and mix well. Add salt and remaining chilli flakes, mix and cook for a minute.', 'Add remaining spring onion greens, mix and switch off the heat.', 'Place a ring mould on a serving platter. Fill in some prepared rice and press to flatten it. Top with grilled lemon and carrot, demould and place the skewered chicken on side. Drizzle some prepared orange sauce over and serve hot.']

title: Torrone
method: ['Heat together the sugar, liquid glucose and one cups of water in a non-stick pan. Bring to a boil and cook till it reaches 150o C on a sugar thermometer.', 'Cook the honey in another non-stick pan till it reaches 120o C on the thermometer.', 'Beat the egg whites till soft peaks. Add the honey and keep beating. Add the sugar syrup and beat for another five minutes.', 'Add the almonds, pistachios and cranberries and fold well.', 'Pour the mixture on a tray and spread evenly. Cover with a baking paper and roll out with a rolling pin to smoothen the top.', 'Place a rectangular tray on top and put a heavy object in it. Leave overnight to set.', 'Melt the chocolate in a microwave. Remove from heat and mix till smooth.', 'Remove the baking paper and spread the melted chocolate over the set nougat. Cover with another baking paper and press. Set aside till chocolate hardens.', 'Cut into bars and serve.']

title: Teriyaki Rolls
method: ['To make teriyaki sauce heat butter in a pan. Add ginger and onion and saute till golden. Add white wine and cook till the mixture reduces a little.', 'Add hand crushed black grapes and continue to cook stirring for five to seven minutes till the grapes become soft. Add soy sauce, black pepper powder, salt, molasses and honey.', 'Mix well and strain the sauce. Set it aside.', 'Heat olive oil in a pan, add green capsicum, mushrooms, onion and tofu and toss for two minutes. Add teriyaki sauce and mix. Cook for two minutes.', 'Divide the mixture into four portions. Halve the crusty rolls and spread one portion of the vegetable and tofu mixture on one half of each roll and cover it with the other half. Serve immediately.']

title: Prawn Cocktail
method: ['Wash and cook prawns with shells in sufficient salted boiling water for two minutes. Drain, refresh, peel and devien the prawns.', 'Boil egg in sufficient boiling water for eight to ten minutes. Drain, cool, peel and cut into thick wedges.', 'Combine the mayonnaise, tomato ketchup, Tabasco sauce and brandy in a bowl. Add the prawns to the mayonnaise and mix gently.', 'Divide this mixture into four portions. Divide the shredded lettuce into four individual cocktail glasses and top it up with a portion of the prawn mixture each.', 'Place a wedge of boiled egg on top of the prawn mixture resting it on the rim. Garnish with a sprig of parsley and a lemon wedge and serve chilled.']

title: Chicken with Banana Flower - SK Khazana
method: ['Drain the banana flower, squeeze excess water and put into a bowl.', 'Heat mustard oil in a deep non-stick pan, add onion, ginger-garlic paste, bay leaves and broken red chillies. Mix and saute till the mixture is browned and fragrant.', 'Add turmeric powder and chicken, mix well and saute for a minute. Add cumin powder and salt, mix well and saute on low heat for 10 minutes or till chicken gets cooked.', 'Add banana flower and mix well, cover and cook for 10 minutes on medium heat. Add black pepper and add little water and mix well. Cover and cook for 5-7 minutes on medium heat. Switch off heat.', 'Transfer into a serving plate and serve hot, garnished with coriander sprigs with steamed rice.']

title: Waffles
method: ['Heat a waffle iron.Break eggs into a bowl and beat well with an electric beater. Sieve together refined flour, baking powder, baking soda, cocoa powder and salt into the beaten eggs.', 'Add half the buttermilk and mix. Add the remaining buttermilk and whisk well ensuring that there are no lumps.', 'Add honey and whisk again to mix. Add 1 tbsp olive oil and mix again to make a smooth batter.', 'Grease the waffle iron with oil. Pour the batter on it, cover and cook, checking in between, till golden brown on both sides.', 'Cut into triangles and serve immediately drizzled with honey.']

title: Lemon Chicken Soup
ingredients: ['1 boneless chicken breast', 'zest of 2 lemons', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 medium onion sliced', '8 cups chicken stock', ' 1/2  teaspoon red chilli flakes', ' 1/4  cup couscous', 'Salt to taste', 'Crushed black peppercorns to taste', ' 1/4  cup chopped chives']
method: ['Heat olive oil in a non-stick pan. Add onion and saute for three to four minutes.', 'Add chicken stock, chicken breast, lemon zest and chilli flakes and mix well. Increase heat, cover and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for five minutes.', 'Add the couscous, salt and crushed peppercorns, mix well and simmer for five minutes. Switch off the heat.', 'Remove the chicken and shred using a fork. Put the shredded chicken back in the pan, add feta cheese and chives and mix well.', 'Serve warm.']

title: Chicken Popcorn
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a pan.', 'Take chicken in a bowl. Add turmeric powder, salt, red chili flakes, soy sauce and egg and mix. Add cornflour and mix well.', 'Take breadcrumbs in another bowl. Coat chicken pieces with the crumbs.', 'Deep-fry the prepared chicken pieces in hot oil till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Herbed Chicken Footlong
method: ['Preheat oven at 180oC.', 'Slit the footlong breads length ways without cutting through. Place on a baking tray and toast in the preheated oven for 2-3 minutes.', 'For each footlong heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a non-stick pan. Add 1 tablespoon garlic and saute till light brown.', 'Add 1 cup chicken, toss and cook for a minute. Add salt, 1 teaspoon crushed peppercorns,  3/4  teaspoon chilli flakes and  3/4  teaspoon herbs and toss to mix. Switch off heat and cool to room temperature.', 'Apply 2 tablespoons mayonnaise on the base of the breads. Apply 2 tablespoons ketchup on the upper inner side of the breads. Apply 1 tablespoon mustard on the base of the breads.', 'Tear 4 lettuce leaves and spread on the base. Place 3 cheese slices over the lettuce and top it up with the chicken mixture. Bake in the preheated oven till the cheese melts.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Chicken Bharwan Mirch
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Put gram flour,  1/4  teaspoon turmeric powder and salt in a bowl. Add some water and whisk well to make a smooth batter.', 'Put chicken mince, onion, remaining turmeric powder, cumin powder, chili powder, coriander powder, green chilies, coriander leaves and salt in another bowl and mix well.', 'Slit each mirch without cutting through and remove the seeds.', 'Stuff each mirch with some chicken mixture. Dip each stuffed mirch in the gram flour batter and deep-fry in hot oil till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot.']

title: 5 SEEDS CHOCOLATE MAGAZ
method: ['Heat ghee in a kadai. Add the gram flour and mix well. Continue to roast on low heat for 10-15 minutes or till the gram flour turns golden brown and fragrant.', 'Transfer the roasted mixture on to a large plate and allow to cool slightly.', 'Meanwhile, dry roast flax seeds, pumpkin seeds, white sesame seeds, melon seeds and black sesame seeds for 2-3 minutes in a non-stick pan. Take the pan off the heat.', 'Add powdered sugar, green cardamom powder and nutmeg powder into the roasted gram flour mixture and mix till well combined. Transfer this mixture into a greased burfi tin and spread it evenly. Smoothen the top and sprinkle the roasted seeds and lightly press. Keep it aside till it sets.', 'Cut the magaz into squares and gently demould. Dip half of each square alternatively in melted dark chocolate and melted milk chocolate. Set aside to set.', 'Arrange the magaz on a serving plate. Serve.']

title: Chicken Xec Xec
method: ['Take chicken pieces in a bowl, add ginger-garlic paste, lemon juice and turmeric powder and mix. Add salt, mix and set aside to marinate for 15 minutes.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan, break red chillies and add along with cinnamon, coriander seeds, cumin seeds, peppercorns and cloves, mix and saute till fragrant.', 'Add coconut, mix and saute till it turns light brown. Cool and transfer into a mixer jar. Add  1/2  cup water and grind into a fine paste.', 'Heat remaining oil in a non-stick pan, add tomato and saute for a minute. Add salt, mix, cover and cook till tomato softens. Add the ground paste and  1/2  cup water, mix and bring to a boil.', 'Add the marinated chicken pieces and mix. Cover and cook till the chicken is fully done.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot.']

title: Rawa Dhokla - SK Khazana
method: ['Take semolina in a bowl, add yogurt and mix well. Add 1 cup water, mix well and rest the mixture for 10-15 minutes.', 'Heat sufficient water in a steamer. Grease a thali.', 'Add 1 cup water and mix well. Add ginger-green chilli paste, salt, fruit salt and 1 tbsp water, mix well. Pour the mixture into the greased thali.', 'Place the thali in the steamer and steam on medium heat for 10-15 minutes. Take the thali out of the steamer and let it cool slightly.', 'For the tempering, heat oil in a non-stick pan, add 1 tsp mustard seeds and let them splutter. Add asafoetida, curry leaves, broken red chilli and saute for 30 seconds.', 'Pour the prepared tempering on the dhokla and spread it evenly and cut into squares.', 'Arrange them on a serving platter and serve with green chutney.']

title: Mushroom Methi Malai
method: ['Put 10-12 cashew nuts in a blender jar, add onion, ginger-garlic paste, green chillies and  1/4  cup water blend to a fine paste.', 'Heat 1 1/2  tbsps ghee in a non-stick pan, add caraway seeds, cloves, cinnamon and black peppercorns and saute till fragrant.', 'Add the cashew nut-onion paste and mix well. Cook on low heat for 4-5 minutes, stirring occasionally.', 'Meanwhile, heat remaining ghee in another non-stick pan, add button mushrooms, sprinkle a little salt and saute till all the moisture in the mushrooms evaporate.', 'Break the remaining cashew nuts and add into the pan with mushrooms and mix well.', 'When oil begins to leave the cashew nut mixture, add yogurt, mix well and cook, stirring continuously, for 3-4 minutes.', 'Add Kasuri Methi to the mushrooms and mix well.', 'Discard the cinnamon from the gravy and add it to the mushroom-methi mixture and mix well.', 'Add salt and mix well. Add fresh cream, switch the heat off and mix well.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot with roti.']

title: Punjabi Lemon Chicken
method: ['Place chicken pieces in a bowl, add 2 tbsps lemon juice and salt and mix. Set aside to marinate for 2-4 hours.', 'Heat oil in a non stick pan, add cumin seeds and ginger and saute. Add onions to the pan and saute till lightly coloured.', 'Add turmeric powder and coriander powder and mix well. Make small slits on green chillies and add to the pan. Add chicken and mix well.', 'Halve the lemon, remove seeds and add to the pan. Add 1 cup water and mix.', 'Roughly chop 10-12 fresh coriander sprigs and add and mix well. When the water comes to a boil, cover and cook on low heat for 15-20 minutes.', 'You can also cook it in an oven at 160deg C for 20-25 minutes.', 'Serve hot with rice or bread.']

title: Baked Chicken Cordon Bleu
method: ['Preheat oven at 180degC. Place a silicon sheet on a baking tray.', 'Slit chicken breasts horizontally without cutting through. Open the flaps to get a butterfly shape.', 'Place them in between two sheets of cling wrap and cover them. Pound with a meat mallet.', 'Open the wrap, sprinkle little salt and pepper powder on top. Place ham slice and cheese slices on top and roll along with the cling wrap tightly into a cylinder. Remove the cling wrap after rolling into the cylinder.', 'Break egg in a bowl. Add salt, 1 tsp pepper powder, refined flour and 1 1/2  tbsps breadcrumbs and whisk well.', 'Combine Parmesan cheese powder,  1/2  cup breadcrumbs, salt, pepper powder and roughly chopped parsley sprigs in another bowl and mix well.', 'Dip the chicken cylinder in the egg mixture and coat evenly in the cheese-crumb mixture. Place on the baking tray, drizzle little oil all around and put it in the preheated oven. Bake for 18-20 minutes.', 'Remove from oven, slice and serve hot.']

title: Vegan Kulfi - SK Khazana
method: ['Take cashew nuts in a small bowl. Add sufficient water and let them soak for 3-4 hours and then drain.', 'Soak dates in sufficient water in another bowl for 30 minutes and then drain.', 'Put oats and green cardamom seeds in a blender jar and blend to a fine powder.', 'Transfer the soaked cashew nuts in another blender jar, add soaked dates and blend well.', 'Add the oats-green cardamom powder and coconut milk and blend till smooth and thick.', 'Pour the mixture into kulfi moulds, screw on the lids and and keep in the refrigerator for 1 hour. Further keep them in the freezer to set for 7-8 hours or till set.', 'De-mould and serve immediately.']

title: Pizza in a Jar - SK Khazana
method: ['Preheat the oven at 180oC.', 'For each portion, break a pizza base and put into a glass jar. Top it with some pizza sauce, some cheese sauce, red, green and yellow capsicum, baby corns, button mushrooms, chicken, green olives, black olives, processed cheese and mozzarella cheese.', 'Sprinkle mixed herbs, red chilli flakes and crushed black peppercorns on top.', 'Keep the jars in the preheated oven and bake for 7-8 minutes. Serve hot.']

title: Lychee Ice Cream With Dates And Walnuts
method: ['Heat the syrup from the lychee can in a non stick pan. Add dates and honey and cook till dates become soft.\nRoughly chop 6-8 lychees and blend the rest to a smooth puree.', 'Soften the ice cream and put into a large bowl. Add lychee puree and mix well. Add the cooked dates and mix. Add chopped lychees and walnuts and mix well.', 'Pour into silicon mould, sprinkle brown sugar on top, cover the mould and keep in deep freezer to set for 3-4 hours', 'Scoop out and serve chilled.']

title: Double Dhamaka Chicken Chaat
method: ['Cut the chicken breasts in thin strips and put them in a bowl. Add ginger-garlic paste,  1/2  teaspoon red chilli powder, red chilli sauce, salt and yogurt and mix well. Keep the bowl in the refrigerator to marinate for about  1/2  hour.', 'Take refined flour on a plate, add salt and  1/2  teaspoon red chilli powder, mix well and set aside.', 'Chop the spring onion with greens finely. Chop green chilli finely. Put these two in another bowl and mix.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Bring the bowl of chicken out of the refrigerator. Roll each chicken strip in the spiced refined flour and keep on another plate.', 'Add a little water to the marinade remaining in the bowl and mix well. Dip the coated chicken strips in it and roll them once again in the spiced refined flour. Slide them gently into the hot oil and deep-fry till golden. Drain them on absorbent paper and let them cool slightly.', 'Cut the chicken into small pieces and add them to the bowl with spring onions and green chillies.', 'Halve the lemon and squeeze its juice directly into this bowl and mix well.', 'Arrange soup spoons on a serving platter, put some chicken chaat on each spoon and serve.']

title: Baked Koraishutir Kochuri with Cholar Dal
method: ['For making stuffing put green peas into a grinder jar and grind into fine paste and transfer into a bowl.', 'Heat oil in non-stick pan, add onion seeds, green chillies, ginger-garlic paste and saute for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add ground green peas and saute for 5-6 minutes on medium heat.', 'Add cumin powder, coriander powder, salt and sugar and saute for 3-4 minutes and set aside to cool.', 'For making dough take refined flour, sugar, salt and oil in a bowl and mix. Add sufficient water and knead into semi-hard dough. Cover with damp muslin cloth and set aside for 10 minutes.', 'To make cholar dal, heat ghee in a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds, cloves, dried red chilli, bay leaf, cinnamon stick, green chilli and coconut slices and saute till the coconut turns golden brown.', 'Add split Bengal gram, turmeric powder, raisins, salt and sugar and mix well. Add 2 cups water, mix, cover and cook on low heat for 10-15 minutes.', 'Preheat air-fryer to 180o C.', 'Divide the dough into equal balls, apply oil on your palm, shape each ball into a katori. Place some green pea mixture in it, bring the edges together and seal. Further roll each stuffed ball into a kochuri.', 'Brush oil on air-fryer tray and place a kochuri in it and bake for 8-10 minutes.', 'Garnish the cholar dal with coriander sprig and serve hot with kochuri.']

title: Brownie Cupcakes
method: ['Preheat oven at 180degC.', 'Sift together refined flour, cocoa powder, baking soda and baking powder into a bowl and mix well. Set aside.', 'Cream together butter and condensed milk in another bowl with an electric beater till light. Add vanilla essence and beat well.', 'Add walnuts and chocolate chips to the flour mixture and mix well.', 'Add the flour mixture to the butter-condensed milk mixture and fold till well blended. Add buttermilk and mix well.', 'Put the batter into a piping bag and pipe out into individual silicon cupcake moulds. Garnish with chopped walnuts and chocolate chips.', 'Place the moulds on a baking tray and put in the preheated oven. Bake for 30 minutes.', 'Remove from oven, cool and demould. Serve warm.']

title: Lotus Root Leaf Rice
method: ['Peel and wash the lotus roots thoroughly under running water and slice thinly.', 'Parboil in two cups of salted water and cook till half done. Drain. Wash and wipe the lotus leaves dry. Drain and boil the rice in four cups of water till three-fourth done. Drain thoroughly.', 'Soak the oyster mushrooms in one cup of hot water for five minutes. Drain and slice. Mix together the rice, lotus roots, mushrooms, capsicums, ginger, soy sauce, pepper powder, salt, sugar, rice wine and MSG.', 'Place the leaves on a flat worktop, place the rice mixture in the centre of each leaf and fold in the edges to enclose the rice. Secure with a string. Heat some water in a steamer, place the rice parcels in it and steam for fifteen to twenty minutes.', 'Open the parcels and serve hot.']

title: Pan Roasted Sambar Flavored Basa With Onions
method: ['Combine the sambar masala, sugar, crushed red chillies and salt in a bowl. Add the fish cubes and mix well and set aside for 15 minutes.', 'Heat oil in non-stick pan, add the mustard seeds, button chillies, curry leaves, asafoetida and shallots.', 'Saute for two to three minutes or till the shallots are soft.', 'Add the marinated fish and mix gently. Cook on medium heat for seven to eight minutes.', 'Serve hot with steamed rice.']

title: Chicken Seekh Kabab
method: ['In a bowl, mix together the minced chicken, green chillies, onion, ginger, garlic, cashew nuts, chaat masala, garam masala powder, white pepper powder, fresh coriander, lemon juice and salt. Alternatively, you can use boneless chicken and grind it together with the green chillies, onion, ginger and garlic.', 'Add the remaining ingredients and mix. Heat a tawa and drizzle some oil on it. Wet your hands, take a little chicken mixture and spread it around a satay stick. Press firmly and place the seekh kababs on the tawa.', 'Cook, turning from time to time, so that they cook evenly all around. Baste with butter at regular intervals. Serve hot.']

title: Fresh and Nutritious Juice
method: ['Quarter apples.', 'Pass carrots, orange segments, beetroots, ginger, apples and mint leaves through a juicer and collect the juice in a jar.', 'Pour the juice into 8 shot glasses and serve.']

title: Kurkure Momos
method: ['Take chicken mince in a bowl, add onion, carrot, celery, dried mixed herbs, black peppercorns, salt, red chilli flakes and garlic and mix well.', 'Place some chicken mixture in the centre of each dough roundel, apply water on the edges, shape into momos and seal the edges.', 'Take egg wash in a bowl, add salt and mix. Spread crushed cornflakes in a plate, add salt and crushed black peppercorns and mix.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a deep pan.', 'Dip each momo in egg and roll in the spiced cornflakes. Dip again in the egg and roll in the spiced cornflakes. Slide the momos into hot oil and deep-fry till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Arrange them on a serving plate, drizzle cheese sauce over them, sprinkle fried garlic Serve hot with cheese sauce, sprinkle fried garlic, red chilli flakes and coriander leaves and serve hot.']

title: Lalla Mussa Dal - SK Khazana
method: ['Pour 2 cups water in a jar, add salt and mix well. Put black gram and green gram in a bowl, add the salted water, wash the pulses and drain well.', 'Heat a deep non-stick pan, add the pulses and sufficient water and cook on medium heat for 8-10 minutes. Remove the scum as it rises to the surface.', 'Drain the pulses and put into a pressure cooker. Add ginger strips, green chillies and salt. Add 6 cups water and mix. Cover the cooker with its lid and cook under pressure till 6-7 whistles are given out.', 'Heat 3 tbsps butter in a deep non-stick pan, add tomato puree and saute till fat separates. Add coriander powder and red chilli powder, mix well and saute for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add dried fenugreek powder and mix well. Add cooked grams and mix well. Add sufficient water and mix well. Cook for 2-3 minutes. Add remaining butter and cream, mix well. Cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Heat ghee in a non-stick pan, add garlic and saute till golden brown. Add this in the grams, mix well and cook for a minute.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, drizzle melted ghee, garnish with ginger strips and serve hot.']

title: Pink Blush
method: ['Pour kokum sherbet into a glass. Put a few ice cubes. Add cranberry juice, rock salt, lemon slice and stir, crushing the lemon slightly.', 'Strain into stemmed glasses. Top it up with soda.', 'Decorate the rim of each glass with a lemon slice and serve immediately.']

title: Lemonade Granita
method: ['Blend together ice cubes, lemon juice, sugar syrup, mint leaves and lemon zest with 1 1/2  cups water to a smooth mixture.', 'Pour the mixture into a glass baking dish and freeze for 8-10 hours.', 'Scrape out and serve chilled.']

title: Chocolate Cookie Cheese Cake
method: ['Butter a nine-inch spring form tin. Crush the chocolate biscuits and put them in a bowl. Add the remaining butter and mix. Line the spring form tin with this mixture and press well.', 'Keep it in the refrigerator for fifteen minutes. Mix gelatin with two tablespoons of water and melt it in the microwave oven for forty five seconds.', 'Take fresh cream in a bowl. Add castor sugar and mix. Add vanilla essence and cream cheese and continue to mix.', 'Melt white chocolate in the microwave oven at 60% for one minute. Whisk well and add it to the cream and cheese mixture. Mix well.', 'Pour the melted gelatin through a strainer into the above mixture and mix well. Pour this mixture over the biscuit base in the spring form tin.', 'Let it set in the refrigerator for one and a half to two hours. Just before serving gently slide in the dark chocolate biscuits all round the outer edge of the cheese cake. Sprinkle some grated white chocolate over the top.', 'Cut into wedges and serve.']

title: Quick Jeera Chicken
method: ['Cut the chicken into medium sized pieces. Wash and drain. Add lemon juice and salt and mix well. Remove stems, wash green chillies and gently break them with hand. Clean, wash and chop coriander leaves. Clean, wash and drain mint leaves.', 'Heat oil in a pan, add cumin seeds. When they begin to change colour add broken green chillies and saute for a minute. Add chicken pieces and roast for a while. Add yogurt and chopped coriander leaves. Cover and cook till the chicken is done.', 'Add hand broken mint leaves, stir and serve hot.']

title: Kada Parshad
method: ['Heat ghee in a kadai and add the flour.', 'Roast, stirring continuously for eight to ten minutes or till it turns red. Add three and a half cups of water, stir and cook for five minutes or till it is a little thick.', 'Add more water if required. Add sugar and mix. Cook for five more minutes or till it leaves the sides of the pan.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Turkish Eggs
ingredients: ['4 eggs', '1 cup thick yogurt', '2-3 garlic cloves', 'Salt to taste', '6-8 fresh dill sprigs', '3-4 tablespoons butter', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 1/2  teaspoons red chilli flakes', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', 'Toasted bread slices for serving']
method: ['Take yogurt in a bowl.  Grate garlic cloves directly in the bowl, add salt and whisk well.', 'Chop dill sprigs.', 'Heat butter in a pan. Once it starts to turn brown, add olive oil, red chilli flakes and mix.', 'Break one egg into a strainer so as to drain excess moisture and slide into a bowl.', 'Boil water in a deep non-stick pan. Add lemon juice, slide the broken egg into the hot water and cook for 2-3 minutes. Gently lift the poached egg with a perforated spoon.', 'Drop a dollop of yogurt sauce at the base of each serving plate and spread lightly. Place a poached egg over it.', 'Drizzle some butter sauce on top of the egg, sprinkle dill leaves and salt on top.', 'Make more Turkish eggs similarly.', 'Serve immediately with toasted bread slices.']
Main ingredients: Eggs, Thick yogurt, Garlic, Fresh dil, Butter, Olive oil, Red chilli flakes, Lemon juice

title: Khooba Roti - SK Khazana
method: ['Mix together wheat flour, salt, ghee and carom seeds in a bowl. Add sufficient water and knead into semi-soft dough. Add oil and knead again till absorbed. Set aside to rest.', 'Divide the dough into 4 equal portions, dust with flour and roll out into large thick rotis.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa. Place the rotis on it, one by one, and roast for 1-2 minutes on each side.', 'Pinch to make impressions starting from the edges to the centre and roast for 1-2 minutes on each side. Put the roti on direct heat, the pinched side downwards, and roast for a few seconds.', 'Drizzle some ghee on top and serve hot.']

title: Corn Pancakes
method: ['Sift flour, baking powder, salt and black pepper powder into a bowl.', 'Whisk the egg in a mixer and add to the flour and mix well. Heat a non stick frying pan.', 'Grind  1/2  cup corn with milk coarsely and add to the batter and mix. Add the remaining corn kernels and mix well.', 'Drizzle a little oil in the pan, drop spoonsful of batter on it, keeping a little distance between each, and cook.', 'When the underside is golden, turn them over and cook till both sides are evenly done.', 'Serve hot topped with tomato relish or salsa or olives.']

title: Chicken Rendang
method: ['Place chicken pieces in a large bowl, add salt and black pepper powder and mix well.', 'Heat oil in a non stick pan, add chicken and saute on high heat till lightly browned.', 'Cut lemon grass stem roughly and put half of it in a mortar and crush. Add galangal and continue to crush. Grind shallots, onion, dried red chillies, fresh red chillies, garlic, ginger, fresh turmeric, remaining lemon grass and a little water to a smooth paste.Drain the chicken from the pan and place in a bowl. Add the crushed lemon grass and galangal to the pan and saute for a minute.', 'Add ground paste and continue to saute for 2-3 minutes. Add  1/2  cup coconut milk and stir and saute for a minute. Cover and simmer till oil begins to separate.', 'Add chicken pieces and mix well. Add the remaining coconut milk and mix. Cook till the chicken is done.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Caramel Latte
method: ['For each portion, heat 1 cup milk in a non-stick pan, add 2-3 tablespoons sugar and 1 tablespoon caramel sauce, mix and bring the mixture to boil.', 'Pour the milk mixture into a jar and blend with an electric hand blender to create some foam.', 'Pour 2 tablespoons coffee decoction into a serving glass. Pour the milk mixture and put a layer of foam on top.', 'Crush a chocolate stick and put on top of foam. Put another chocolate stick into the glass and serve hot.']

title: Caramel Walnut Fudge
method: ['Grease a shallow bowl with some ghee.', 'Heat ghee in a non-stick pan, add butter and walnuts, mix and saute till the walnuts are roasted.', 'Reduce heat, add khoya and condensed milk, mix and cook till the mixture thickens, stirring continuously.', 'Remove from heat, add caramel syrup and mix well. Place the pan back on heat and mix till well combined. Add chocolate and mix till it melts.', 'Transfer the mixture onto a greased bowl and spread evenly. Drizzle some caramel syrup on top and refrigerate till set.', 'Cut into pieces, arrange them on a serving platter and serve.']

title: Chicken Parcels
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Heat 2 tbsps oil in a non-stick pan, add onions, garlic and ginger and saute.', 'Add chicken, salt and crushed black peppercorns and saute for 2 minutes. Cover and cook.', 'Crush peanuts. Add green chillies to the pan and mix. Cover and cook till done. Transfer into a bowl.', 'Add crushed peanuts and lemon juice and mix well.', 'Pour water into another bowl. Trim the edges of the bread slices and dampen them in the water. Squeeze extra water by pressing between your palms.', 'Place chicken mixture in the centre of each slice, bring in the edges and shape into oval croquette.', 'Slide into hot oil and deep-fry till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve garnished with onion roundels, thin strips of green capsicums and a fresh red chilli flower.']

title: Chocolate Truffle Cake-SK Khazana
method: ['To make the crust, grind together biscuits, almonds, pistachios, butter, cocoa powder and chocolate into a coarse mixture. Spread the crust in a spring form tin and refrigerate for 10-15 minutes.', 'To make the filling, heat cream in a non-stick pan. Add chilli flakes, stir and heat for a minute.', 'Add the cream mixture to chocolate along with butter and mix till it melts and becomes smooth.', 'Pour the filling over the crust, spread evenly and refrigerate till set.', 'Demould, sprinkle some almonds and pistachios, cut into wedges and serve.']

title: Prawn Bruschetta With Lemony Fennel Salad
method: ['Boil sufficient water in a deep non-stick pan. Add fennel and cook till tender. Remove from heat, drain and put into a bowl.', 'Add lemon zest, dill leaves, salt and white pepper and mix well.', 'Add prawns and mayonnaise and mix well.', 'Slice French bread and apply butter on them. Toast them in a hot non-stick pan till both sides are lightly browned.', 'Rub one side of each toasted slice with garlic.', 'Spoon the prawn-fennel mixture on top of the toasted bread slices, garnish with dill leaves and serve immediately.']

title: Ma Chole Di Dal
method: ['Drain and pressure-cook, on low heat, both the grams in four cups of water with salt and turmeric powder till the pressure is released four times (four whistles).', 'Heat the ghee in a pan. Add the onion, ginger, garlic and asafoetida and saute till golden.', 'Add the tomato and saute till it turns pulpy.', 'Add the red chilli powder and garam masala powder and saute till the ghee surfaces.', 'Add the cooked grams and mix. Add one cup of water, adjust the salt and simmer for half an hour or till completely soft.', 'Garnish with the fresh coriander and serve hot with paranthas or rice.']

title: Cinnamon Crumb Banana Loaf
method: ['Preheat oven to 180deg C. Grease a loaf tin with some butter and dust with some flour.', 'Cream together butter and castor sugar in a bowl using an electric beater. Add egg and whisk well.', 'Peel and chop bananas and add. Add vanilla essence and whisk. Add buttermilk and whisk well.', 'Sieve together flour, baking soda and baking powder into the banana mixture. Add cinnamon powder and salt and fold in well.', 'Transfer this mixture into the greased loaf tin and tap.', 'To make crumb, combine butter and flour in a bowl and mix well with fingertips. Add cinnamon powder and mix. Add powdered sugar and mix well with fingertips till the mixture resembles breadcrumbs.', 'Spread the crumb mixture on top of banana mixture. Place the tin in preheated oven and bake for 40-45 minutes. Remove from oven, cool and demould.', 'Slice and serve.']

title: American Chopsuey
method: ['Boil noodles until almost cooked, drain and cool. Heat sufficient oil in a wok and deep-fry noodles till crisp and golden brown in colour. Drain on absorbent paper. Divide the fried noodles into four equal portions and keep warm in separate shallow plates or serving platter.', 'Mix cornflour in half a cup of water. Heat half tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan, break an egg, cook for half a minute on both sides.', 'Repeat this to make four such double fried eggs. Heat four tablespoons of oil in a wok or a pan, add garlic and ginger and stir-fry for half a minute. Add chicken strips and cook for half a minute.', 'Add onion, carrot, French beans and cabbage and continue to stir-fry for a minute. Add tomato sauce, soy sauce, white pepper powder, MSG, salt, capsicum and stir in the chicken stock.', 'Cook for two minutes and stir in the cornflour mixture. Continue to cook for a minute or until the sauce thickens. Add vinegar and bean sprouts, stir well and pour over the fried noodles.', 'Serve hot with each portion of American Chopsuey topped with a double fried egg.']

title: Double Berry Smoothie
method: ['Blend together blueberries,  1/2  cup yogurt, honey and 2-3 tablespoons milk till smooth. Pour equally into 2 glasses.', 'Blend together remaining yogurt, remaining honey, remaining milk, chopped strawberries and cranberry juice till smooth. Pour equally on top of blueberry mixture.', 'Chill and serve garnished with strawberries and mint sprigs.']

title: Masala Mashed Potatoes
method: ['Heat extra virgin olive oil in a non stick pan. Add butter and let it melt. Chop onion.', 'Add asafoetida and mustard seeds to the pan and let the seeds splutter. Add cumin seeds, curry leaves and onion and saute for 1 minute. Add mashed potatoes and switch off the heat.', 'Add green chilli, salt and mix well. Grease a stainless steel ring lightly and place it in the centre of the serving plate.', 'Put the potato mixture into the ring but do not press it or level the surface. Garnish with fried curry leaves, fried red chilli, slowly remove the ring and serve.']

title: Pineapple Apple and Sweet Lime Juice
method: ['For each portion put 6-8 green apple wedges into a juicer, extract juice and collect in a jar.', 'Similarly extract juice of 6-8 pineapple chunks and 10-12 sweet lime segments and collect their juice in the same jar. Add black salt and mix well.', 'Put few ice cubes in a serving glass, pour in the juice, garnish with a mint sprig and serve chilled.', 'Prepare 3 more portions in the same way.']

title: Sookhi Dal Amritsari - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds and saute till they change colour. Add green chillies, mix and saute for 30 seconds. Add ginger, mix and saute for 30 seconds. Add asafoetida, mix and saute for 30 seconds.', 'Add onion, mix and saute till golden brown. Add red chilli powder, turmeric powder and garam masala powder, mix well and saute for 30 seconds.', 'Add tomato and mix well. Add salt, mix well and saute till the tomato turns pulpy.', 'Add coriander leaves and split black gram and mix well. Add 1 cup water and mix well. Cover and cook till the gram is completely cooked and all the moisture is absorbed.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander sprig and serve hot.']

title: Pedas
method: ['Mix khoya with the sugar in a kadai or wok. Heat on low heat, stirring continuously. Cook till mixture thickens. It should form a very soft lump.', 'Cool for ten minutes. Add cardamom powder and food colour. Mix well.', 'Take a small fistful of mixture and press into the cookie mould. Turn out carefully. Press two to three slices of pistachio in the center. Repeat for remaining mixture.', 'Serve.']

title: Fruit Kebabs
method: ['For marinade mix brown sugar, honey, lemon juice and salt in a large bowl.', 'Add apple, kiwi, pineapple, plum and banana pieces and mix well so that all the fruits are well covered with the marinade.', 'Thread the fruits onto the skewers in the following order: pineapple, plum, kiwi, apple and banana.', 'Heat a little oil in a grill pan. Place the skewers in the grill pan, cover and cook till golden.', 'While serving place the fruit skewers on serving plates, drizzle some honey over and serve immediately.']

title: Oats with dried fruits
method: ['Put the oats in a pan and roast for 2 minutes.', 'Add the milk and bring to the boil.', 'Stir in the almonds and cook for about 10 minutes, or until the oat mixture becomes thick.', 'Add the apricots and prunes, mix well, and serve hot.']

title: Aloo Tuk
method: ['Lightly press the potatoes. Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Deep fry the potatoes on medium heat till they become crisp and golden. Drain and place them in a bowl.', 'Sprinkle salt, coriander powder, red chilli powder and dried mango powder and mix well so that all the potatoes get covered with the masalas. Serve hot.']

title: Thecha - SK Khazana
method: ['Put chillies, peanuts, garlic, sugar and salt in a mortar and coarsely crush with pestle till well blended.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and use as required.']

title: Lasooni Palak Pulao- Sk Khazana
method: ['Heat ghee in a deep non-stick pan, add black peppercorns, cinnamon, cloves, green cardamoms and garlic, mix well and saute till it turns golden brown.', 'Add rice and mix well. Add salt and 2 1/2  cups water and mix well. Cover and cook till rice is almost cooked.', 'Add spinach and mix with a light hand. . Cook for 1-2 minutes and take it off the heat.', 'Transfer the rice into a serving bowl, garnish with fried garlic and fried spinach and serve hot with boondi raita.']

title: Fruit Bread Pudding for Christmas
method: ['Preheat oven at 180degC.', 'Break eggs in a bowl. Add castor sugar, vanilla essence and whisk well till nicely mixed. Set aside.', 'Heat milk in a non-stick pan till warm. Add warm milk to egg mixture and whisk well.', 'Strain the egg mixture into another bowl and cool the mixture for  1/2  an hour.', 'Cut bread slices into medium pieces.', 'Arrange some of the bread pieces in a glass baking dish. Add some of the butter cubes on top and pour some of the egg mixture on top. Press well so that the bread pieces are soaked in the mixture. Add some of the fruits on top.', 'Repeat the order of layering with the remaining bread pieces, butter cubes, egg mixture and fruits. Cover with an aluminium foil.', 'Take a baking tray and fill it with water. Place the baking dish on it and put in the preheated oven and bake for 40-45 minutes.', 'Heat apricot jam in a non-stick pan. Add 1-2 tablespoons water, mix and cook till the jam melts.', 'Remove the pudding from oven and apply the jam glaze on top.', 'Serve warm.']

title: Matar Gobhi Masti
method: ['Heat ghee in a non-stick wok, add and cumin seeds and saute. When the seeds begin to change colour, add cauliflower florets, turmeric powder and salt and mix well.', 'Sprinkle a little water, mix, cover and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add green peas and mix. Cover and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add half the ginger strips, gram flour and coriander powder and mix well. Cover and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add crushed black peppercorns and mix. Cover and cook till done.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with the remaining ginger strips and serve hot.']

title: Leftover Roti Upma
method: ['Roughly chop onion.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add mustard seeds and let them splutter. Add chopped onion and saute till onion turns soft.', 'Tear leftover rotis and place in a crusher. Crush finely.', 'Add curry leaves and green chillies to the pan and mix. Add green peas and mix well.', 'Add crushed rotis and toss to mix. Add salt, little water and mix well. Add peanuts, toss to mix and cook for a minute.', 'Add lemon juice and toss. Let it get heated through.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Caramelized Pineapple Slush
method: ['Caramelize brown sugar in a non-stick pan. Add pineapple slices and coat well. Cook till pineapple slices turn soft. Remove from heat and cool to room temperature.', 'Reserve some caramelized pineapple slices and combine the remaining with ice cream and milk in a blender jar and blend well.', 'Pour the drink into individual martini glasses. Cut reserved caramelized pineapple slices into wedges.', 'Garnish the glasses with caramelized pineapple wedges and serve chilled.']

title: Crisp Penne and Pumpkin Chips
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Thinly slice pumpkin on a slicer and dip them to a bowl of cold water. Add salt and mix well.', 'Slide penne pasta into hot oil, one by one, and deep-fry till crisp and light brown. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Drain water from the pumpkin and deep-fry in same hot oil till crisp and light brown. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Transfer the fried penne into a bowl. Add salt, red chilli powder, black pepper powder, cumin powder and chaat masala to penne and mix well. Add sugar and mix well.', 'Sprinkle the same masalas on the pumpkin chips and mix well.', 'Transfer penne onto a serving platter, top with pumpkin chips and serve.']

title: Volcanic Lemon Vegetable Rice
method: ['Heat the oil in a non stick pan. Add the onion and saute till light golden. Add the garlic and saute till golden. Place the rice in individual bowls, drizzle the coconut milk and heat it in the microwave oven.', 'Add the red chillies, lemon pickle and two cups of water to the pan and stir. Add turmeric powder, salt and the stock cubes. Simmer for a minute and transfer into a bowl. Blend with a hand blender.', 'Add the white sauce to the pan and stir in the blended sauce. Mix well, adjust salt and simmer for two minutes.', 'Add carrot, cauliflower, French beans and green peas and mix.', 'Pour the vegetable gravy over the rice and serve immediately.']

title: Mushroom Cheese Curry
method: ['Heat 1 tbsp ghee in a non-stick pan, add black peppercorns, cloves, green cardamom, green chillies, onion, cashewnuts, ginger-garlic paste and salt and saute till onions become translucent.', 'Add yogurt and saute for 2-3 minutes and take the pan off the heat and allow to cool slightly.', 'Transfer the mixture into blender jar, add 1 cup water and grind into fine paste.', 'Heat remaining ghee in a non-stick pan, add button mushrooms and salt and saute for 5 minutes on medium heat. Add the ground paste and mix well, cover and cook for 3-4 minutes.', 'Add fresh cream and cheese and mix well. Cook till the cheese dissolves. Take the pan off the heat.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander sprig and serve hot with parantha.']

title: Prawns Stuffed Aubergine
method: ['Preheat oven at 180o C.', 'Cut aubergine vertically into halves. Scoop out the flesh to make a cavity. Brush the prepared aubergine with some oil.', 'Heat olive oil in a non-stick pan.', 'Chop the aubergine flesh into small pieces and halve cherry tomatoes.', 'Add ginger to the pan and saute. Add garlic and mix well. Add spring onions, mix and saute for a minute.', 'Slice red chillies and add. Mix well.', 'Add prawns and saute on high heat for a minute.', 'Add chopped aubergine flesh, mix and saute for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add halved cherry tomatoes and mix well. Switch off heat and add torn basil leaves, salt and crushed peppercorns. Mix well.', 'Sprinkle some salt and crushed peppercorns on the prepared aubergine. Fill the cavity with the prepared prawn mixture.', 'Place the stuffed aubergine on a baking tray, put the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes.', 'Transfer the stuffed aubergine on a serving plate. Garnish with spring onions, sliced red chillies and a few torn basil leaves.']

title: Basil Ice Cream
Main ingredients: Fresh basil leaves, Whipping cream, Milk, Fresh cream, Condensed milk, Powdered sugar

title: Paneer Frankie
method: ['Grate the cottage cheese into a bowl. Add potatoes, salt, lemon juice, turmeric powder, red chilli powder, roasted cumin powder, dried mango powder and chaat masala.', 'Chop the coriander leaves and add and mix well. Shape this mixture into even sized long kababs.', 'Heat a little oil in a non stick pan and cook these kababs in it. Turn from time to time.', 'Shred the cabbage finely and place in a bowl. Cut the carrot into thin slices and put in the same bowl.', 'Add salt and chaat masala and mix. Chill in the refrigerator.', 'When the kababs are fully done remove them onto a plate. Warm the chapattis lightly on a hot tawa.', 'Keep a kabab on each chapatti and put some salad over it.', 'Sprinkle a little chaat masala and a little roasted cumin powder. Roll them up and serve immediately.']

title: Lemon Sandwich Cookies
method: ['Preheat oven to 180@ C. Line a baking tray with parchment paper.', 'Break the egg into a bowl, add egg yolk and butter and beat together with an electric beater till light and fluffy.', 'Add castor sugar and beat again. Add lemon juice, lemon zest and icing sugar and beat again.', 'Add flour and cornflour and fold in till well combined.', 'Fill the batter into a piping bag fitted with a star nozzle and pipe out round rossetes on the prepared baking tray.', 'Keep the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 10-15 minutes. Remove the tray from the oven and set aside to cool down to room temperature.', 'To make the filling take butter in another bowl. Add icing sugar, cream cheese, lemon juice and lemon zest and whisk well. Fill this mixture into another piping bag and snip off its point.', 'Pipe this over the bottom side of half the cookies and cover them with the remaining cookies.', 'Place these cookies on a serving platter, dust icing sugar over them through a sieve and serve.']

title: Dry Fruit Lassi
method: ['Spread some chopped pistachios on a plate. Apply some honey on the rims of 4 tall serving glasses. Place each glass inverted in the plate to coat the rim.', 'For each portion put 1 1/2  cups yogurt,  1/4  cup powdered sugar, 1 tablespoon pistachios, 1 tablespoon raisins, 1 tablespoon almonds, 1 teaspoon saffron water,  1/4  teaspoon green cardamom powder, 2 tablespoons milk in a blender jar and blend into smooth mixture with an electric hand blender.', 'Pour the lassi into one glass, put 1 tablespoon cream on top and garnish with some almonds, raisins, pistachios and  1/4  teaspoon saffron strands. Make 3 more portions similarly.', 'Chill and serve.']

title: Jain Samosa
method: ['Combine raw bananas, green peas, turmeric powder, red chilli powder, garam masala, green chillies, salt, sugar, lemon juice and coriander leaves in a bowl and mix well.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Divide the dough into eight equal portions and shape them into balls. Roll out balls into oval shaped thin puris.', 'Halve the puris. Fold each half into a cone. Fill the cone with the raw bananas mixture and seal the edges with water to make samosa.', 'Deep-fry the samosas in hot oil till golden. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Arrange on a serving plate and serve hot.']

title: Lebanese Club Sandwich
method: ['Take the chicken breasts in a bowl. Add salt,  1/2  teaspoon crushed peppercorns, cumin powder,  1/2  teaspoon paprika powder, lemon juice, mix well and set aside to marinate for 5-10 minutes.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan. Place the marinated chicken on it and cook for 3-4 minutes on each side. Cover and cook till fully done.', 'Toast the bread slices in a toaster. Cut the cooked chicken into strips.', 'To assemble one sandwich, apply some garlic and sundried tomato hummus on 3 toasted slices. Place lettuce leaves, tomato slices on one slice and sprinkle some salt, crushed peppercorns, paprika powder and cumin powder on top.', 'Place avocado slices and put the second toasted bread on top, hummus side up. Place some more lettuce leaves and chicken strips on top and cover with the third toasted bread, hummus side down. Similarly prepare the remaining sandwiches.', 'Secure with toothpicks and serve.']

title: Farali Paniyaram
ingredients: [' 1/2  cup rajgira flour', ' 1/4  cup potato, peeled and grated', ' 1/4  cup chopped coriander leaves', ' 1/4  cup yogurt', ' 1/4  cup green chilli-ginger paste', ' 1/4  cup roasted and coarsely crushed peanuts', 'Rock salt to taste', '1 tablespoon ghee +  1/4  cup ghee']
method: ['Add rajgira flour, potato, coriander, yogurt, green paste, rock salt and ghee in a bowl. Add water as required and form a lump-free batter.', 'Add 1 teaspoon ghee in each paniyaram mould and let it melt. Once the ghee has melted, pour in the batter. Cover and cook for 5-7 minutes.', 'Toss the paniyarams upside down in the moulds itself cover and cook for another 5-7 minutes.', 'Transfer to a serving plate, serve warm with coconut chutney.']

title: Macaroni Cups - Cook Smart
method: ['Heat olive oil in a deep non-stick pan, add whole wheat flour and saute for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add  1/2  cup milk and mix well so that there are no lumps. Add 1 1/2  cups milk gradually and keep stirring while adding and cook till the mixture reaches a sauce consistency.', 'Finely chop 6-8 broccoli florets in a chopper and add to the sauce and mix well.', 'Add salt, pepper powder and dried mixed herbs and mix well. Add boiled macaroni and mix well.', 'Fill 4 glass cups with macaroni mixture till they are  3/4  full. Grate cheese and put some over the macaroni in each cup and top it with 1 tsp tomato ketchup.', 'Garnish each cup with a few small florets of broccoli and serve.']

title: Roasted Corn and Cheese Soup
ingredients: ['1 corn on cob', '25 grams processed cheese', 'Salt to taste', 'Black pepper powder to taste', '1 medium onion', '3-4 garlic cloves', '1 tablespoon oil', '1 tablespoon butter', '2  3/4  cups vegetable stock', '4-5 sprigs of fresh thyme']
method: ['Apply salt, pepper powder and butter on the corn.', 'Roast the corn on cob at 180deg C for 10-15 minutes. Cool down to room temperature.', 'Roughly chop onion and garlic.', 'Heat oil and butter in a non-stick pan, add onion and saute till translucent.', 'Remove corn kernels from corn on the cob.', 'Add chopped garlic and saute for a minute.', 'Add roasted corn kernels reserving some for garnishing.', 'Add 2 1/2  cups stock and mix well. Add salt, pepper powder and thyme and mix well. Bring to a boil. Cook on low heat for 5-8 minutes. Cool and blend till smooth.', 'Sieve and add to the same pan, add remaining stock and cook for 2 minutes. Grate cheese reserving some into the same pan.', 'Garnish with reserved grated cheese and roasted corn kernels and serve piping hot.']

title: Bhakri
method: ['Make a soft dough with flour and enough water. Divide it into eight equal portions.', 'Line a flat surface with a small plastic sheet. Take a portion of the dough, roll it into a ball and place it on the plastic sheet.', 'Wet your hands with water and pat the ball into a thick, flat disk. Heat a griddle and place the disk on it. Sprinkle some of the sesame seeds and apply water.', 'When the bottom is crisp, turn over and cook the other side. Remove when crisp and cooked. Smear pure ghee and serve hot.']

title: Phulka - SK Khazana
method: ['Mix together flour, salt and oil in a bowl. Add sufficient water, little by little and knead into soft dough. Cover with a damp cloth and rest for 10-15 minutes.', 'Divide the dough into equal portions, shape them into balls, coat in flour and roll out into a phulka.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa. Cook each phulka till brown specs are formed on the underside. Transfer to direct flame and let it puff. Remove from heat.', 'Place them on individual thalis and serve hot with achaar and bhaji.']

title: Mushroom Dhania Shorba
method: ['Heat oil in a deep non-stick pan, add onion and mix well. Add a pinch of salt, mix and saute till onion softens. Add ginger and garlic and saute for 1-2 minutes or till the raw smells disappear.', 'Add mushrooms and mix well. Add a pinch of salt, mix and saute for 2 minutes or till mushrooms soften. Add coriander stalks, mix and saute till they soften.', 'Add 1 3/4  cups water and mix well. Add crushed black peppercorns and 1 tbsp coriander leaves and mix well. Add  1/4  cup water and mix.', 'Add Coriander Powder and mix well. Cover and cook for 15 minutes.', 'Switch the heat off and blend the mixture with an electric hand blender till well blended.', 'Place the pan back on heat, add 1 cup water, mix and let the mixture come to a boil. Cook for 5 minutes.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander sprig and serve hot with croutons.']

title: Grilled Fish
method: ['To make coriander Nutralite, finely chop coriander and put into a bowl. Add crushed peppercorns and salt and mix well. Grate the rind of 1 lemon and add to the same bowl. Squeeze juice of the lemon and add. Add Nutralite and mix well. .', 'Place 2 sheets of aluminum foil, one over the other on table top. Place the prepared coriander mixture in center and spread it evenly, roll tightly to make a cylinder and seal its edges. Refrigerate till set', 'Place fish pieces in a bowl, add sea salt, crushed peppercorns, red chilli flakes and olive oil and rub well.', 'Place the prepared fish on an induction griller and cook till the grill marks appear on both the sides.', 'Make a bed of iceberg lettuce and arugula leaves on a serving platter.', 'Cut the coriander Nutralite into roundels and discard the foil paper.', 'Place the grilled fish on the bed of lettuce and arugula leaves, top with coriander Nutralite roundels and serve immediately.']

title: Oats With Dryfruits In Milk
method: ['Take oats in a pan and roast for two minutes. Add milk and bring it to a boil. Add almonds to the oats and cook for about ten minutes or till it reaches a thick consistency.', 'Add sugar to taste and stir to dissolve it. Add apricots and prunes and mix. Serve hot in big bowls.']

title: Caramel Custard
method: ['Preheat oven at 180degC.', 'Heat milk in a non-stick pan.', 'Break eggs in a bowl. Add vanilla essence, 90 grams castor sugar and whisk well.', 'Add heated milk, little by little and keep whisking. Strain the mixture into another bowl and set aside to cool.', 'To make caramel, heat a non-stick pan. Add  1/4  cup castor sugar and 1 tablespoon water and cook till the sugar caramelizes.', 'Pour caramel into individual ramekin moulds and set aside for 5-10 minutes.', 'Pour egg-milk mixture into the moulds and place them in a water bed on a baking tray.', 'Place baking tray in preheated oven and bake for 20-25 minutes.', 'Remove from heat, cool to room temperature and refrigerate for 4-5 hours and demould.', 'Serve.']

title: Steamed Semolina Cake with Lemon Syrup
method: ['Grease a round baking tin with butter and dust with some flour.', 'Heat sufficient water in a steamer.', 'Cream together butter and castor sugar in a bowl till light and fluffy. Add eggs and cream further. Add vanilla essence and blend well.', 'Sift refined flour, baking powder and baking soda into the bowl and fold lightly. Add semolina and fold lightly till well blended.', 'Grate a lemon into it to get the zest and mix well. Add milk and blend well into a smooth batter.', 'Pour the batter in the prepared tin, level it out and tap the tin. Put the tin in the steamer, cover and steam for 20-25 minutes or till fully done.', 'Slice remaining lemon and remove seeds. Place the slices onto a hot non-stick pan. Add granulated sugar and let it caramelize. Switch off heat and transfer the caramelized lemon slices on a plate.', 'To make lemon syrup, heat granulated sugar and lemon juice in a non-stick pan. Mix well till the sugar dissolves and the syrup thickens.', 'Demould the cake onto a serving plate. Drizzle lemon syrup on top, garnish with caramelized lemon slices and serve immediately.']

title: PUMPKIN BREAD
method: ['Preheat oven at 180oC. Grease a baking tray with some butter and dust with some refined flour.', 'Take yeast in a bowl. Add half teaspoon Sugar Free Gold and some warm water, mix and set aside for two minutes to activate.', 'Sift refined flour in a bowl. Add salt and remaining Sugar Free Gold and mix well. Add activated yeast and knead well using an electric whisker. Add pumpkin puree and knead again. Add some water and knead into soft dough.', 'Dust some refined flour on the worktop, transfer the dough on it and stretch well.', 'Transfer the dough onto the greased baking tray, create slits, cover and set aside to prove for fifteen to twenty minutes. Brush some milk and top with some pumpkin seeds.', 'Place the baking tray in preheated oven and bake for fifteen to twenty minutes. Remove from oven, brush some butter and cool.', 'Serve.']

title: Jujubes
method: ['Heat sugar and liquid glucose in a small deep non-stick pan. Add  1/2  cup water, mix and bring to boil.', 'Take gelatin in a bowl. Add 2 tablespoons water and set aside to bloom. Add to sugar-glucose mixture and mix till it dissolves.', 'Add vanilla essence, mix and cook for 1 minute.', 'Divide the mixture into 3 different bowls. Add edible orange colour to the1st bowl and mix well. Similarly, add edible yellow colour to the 2nd bowl and edible blue colour to the 3rd bowl.', 'Pour the mixtures in chocolate mould tray and refrigerate for 30 minutes. Remove from refrigerator and demould. These are jujubes.', 'Spread sugar on a plate. Coat the jujubes with sugar and serve.']

title: Special Chicken Sausage Samose
method: ['Mix together refined flour, ghee, salt, carom seeds and sufficient water and knead into stiff dough.', 'Divide the dough into 4 equal portions and roll into balls. Roll out each ball into a roti. Cut the 4 sides, to make a square. Cut each roti to make 4 small squares.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a non-stick kadai.', 'Cut each kabab into 2 pieces. Place 1 kabab piece at one end of each square. Roll twice to make a cylinder, dampen the edges and seal, leaving the remaining portion as it is.', 'Deep fry these samosas till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Transfer onto a serving dish, garnish with spring onion green flower and serve hot.']

title: Noodle Burger Bun
method: ['Take chicken mince in a bowl, add cornflour, ginger-garlic paste, spring onion greens, egg, turmeric powder, coriander powder, chilli powder, garam masala powder, cumin powder and salt and mix well.', 'Divide the mixture into 8 equal portions and shape into medium sized patties.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a non-stick pan, place the patties in it and shallow-fry, turning sides, till fully cooked and evenly golden brown on both sides. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Take the noodles in another bowl, add some cornflour and mix.', 'Heat sufficient oil in another non-stick pan and place a medium sized ring mould in it. Put some of the noodles in it to make a  1/2  inch thick bun. Drizzle some oil on top and cook for 1 minute. Remove the mould and let the noodles cook, turning sides till golden and crisp on both sides. Drain on absorbent paper. Make more noodle buns similarly.', 'For each portion, place one noodle burger on a serving plate, spread 1 teaspoon mayonnaise on it, top it with 1 teaspoon tomato ketchup, some green and purple cabbage. Keep a patty on it and drizzle some sriracha mayonnaise on top. Top with some more green and purple cabbage and keep another patty over it, drizzle some more sriracha mayonnaise on top. Cover with another noodle bun. Make more burgers similarly.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Chicken Wonton Soup
ingredients: ['200 grams chicken mince', '8 wonton sheets', '4-5 cups chicken stock', 'Black pepper powder to taste', 'Salt to taste', '1 tablespoon finely chopped fresh coriander leaves', ' 1/2  teaspoon chicken stock cube powder', ' 1/2  tablespoon fresh garlic paste', '1 teaspoon soy sauce', ' 1/2  tablespoon oyster sauce', '1 tablespoon chopped spring onion greens', '1 inch celery, cut into pieces', '8-10 fresh spinach leaves']
method: ['Mix together chicken mince, pepper powder, salt, coriander leaves, chicken stock cube powder, garlic paste, soy sauce, oyster sauce and spring onion greens in a bowl.', 'Apply some water on wonton sheets, place a portion of chicken mixture in the centre and shape into wontons.', 'Heat a deep non-stick pan. Add stock, celery and salt and simmer. Add prepared wontons and stir lightly. Cook for 8-10 minutes.', 'Add spinach leaves, mix well and simmer till the wontons are cooked and spinach wilts.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Lebanese Kibbeh
method: ['Strain the burghul pressing it through a strainer so that all the water is drained out. Set aside. Chop onion finely. Place keema in a mixer jar. Add onion, salt, cumin powder, pepper powder and red chilli powder.', 'Grind till fine and smooth. Heat sufficient oil in a wok. Transfer keema into a bowl. Add burghul and mix well. Keep it in a refrigerator to chill for a while. For the stuffing finely chop onion. Heat olive oil in a non stick pan.', 'Add onion and saute lightly. Add keema and salt. Saute for 5 minutes. Add pine nuts and mix. Dampen your palms, take a portion of keema-burghul mixture, stuff it with keema-pine nut mixture and roll so that the stuffing is completely enclosed. Shape into an oval. Slide the kibbehs into hot oil and deep fry, on medium heat, till cooked, golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper. Serve hot.']

title: Gulab Jamun Cupcakes with Buttercream Frosting
method: ['Preheat the oven at 180oC.', 'In a mixing bowl, add refined flour, castor sugar, cocoa powder, baking soda, gulab jamun, mix it well and keep aside.', 'In another bowl, add black coffee, break eggs, add butter milk, oil and whisk it nicely.', 'Mix the dry ingredients and wet ingredients together to make a batter.', 'Line the cupcake moulds with liners and fill the moulds with the prepared batter. Bang the mould once so there are no air pockets.', 'Bake it for fifteen to twenty minutes. Take out and let it come on a room temperature.', 'Take a mixing bowl, add the softened butter and blend it once. Now add the icing sugar in three parts beating till it gets fluffy.', 'Add the condensed milk and blend again. Take a piping bag with a nozzle and fill it with the prepared frosting.', 'Take the cupcakes and pipe out the butter icing over it.', 'Chop the chocolate bar and top the cupcakes with it. And serve.']

title: Tamatar Chutney Cheese Pakode
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Mix together gram flour, red chilli powder, turmeric powder, carom seeds, soda bi carbonate, ginger paste, garlic paste, salt and enough water to make a thick batter.', 'Cut tomatoes into thick slices and make pairs. Apply green chutney on one slice of each pair, top it with a cheese slice and cover with the other tomato slice.', 'Dip the tomato sandwiches in the gram flour batter, and deep-fry in hot till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper. Sprinkle chaat masala, arrange on a serving plate and serve hot.']

title: Kolhapuri Egg Curry
method: ['Heat 2 tbsps oil in a non stick pan. Slice ginger, crush garlic and slice onions.', 'Add cloves, peppercorns and onions to the oil. Add ginger and garlic and saute.Roughly chop tomato.', 'Add red chillies to the pan along with turmeric powder, poppy seeds, coconut and saute. Add tomato and continue to saute till fragrant.', 'Cool and grind to a smooth paste with a little water. Heat 2 tbsps oil in another non stick pan, add eggs and stir till the eggs get lightly browned and glazed.', 'Add the ground masala to the first pan along with  1/2  cup water and mix.', 'Pour  1/2  cup water in the mixer jar, rinse and pour into the pan with the masala and mix well.', 'Add eggs and salt and mix. Cover and simmer over low heat for a few minutes.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Mixed Fruit Gateaux
method: ['Peel kiwi, apple and pear. Keep a few strawberries, black grapes and one kiwi fruit for garnishing. Chop the remaining fruits.', 'Halve the sponge cake horizontally. Place the pieces on a flat surface with the cut surface facing upward. Pour a little orange juice over each of them. You can use any other fruit juice if you wish like pineapple juice or apple juice.', 'Take the chopped fruits in a bowl, add a little whipped cream and mix. Spread this on one half the cake. Cover this with the second half. Place this cake sandwich on a plate and place the plate on a turntable.', 'Spread whipped cream over the top and the sides, smoothening the surface all round with a knife dipped in hot water. Put the remaining cream in a piping bag with a star nozzle.', 'Pipe swirls over the top along the edge keeping a little gap between each swirl.', 'Halve the strawberries vertically and place them in front of each swirl. Halve the kiwi fruit vertically and further slice it horizontally. Place one slice between each swirl. Quarter the grapes vertically. Place these pieces in front of the strawberry pi', 'Chill and serve.']

title: Dal Noodle Pakoda - SK Khazana
method: ['Put split green gram in a blender jar, add a little water and blend to a smooth paste. Transfer the paste into a bowl, add cooked noodles, rice flour, coriander leaves, garlic, green chillies, crushed black peppercorns, salt and tandoori mayonnaise and mix well.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a non-stick pan. Dampen your hand and drop in small balls of the mixture into hot oil and deep fry till golden and crispy Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Arrange the pakodas on a serving platter and serve hot along with green chutney.']

title: Garlic Sauce
ingredients: ['1 cup garlic cloves', ' 1/4  cup lemon juice', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 egg white', 'Salt to taste', 'Fried pita bread sticks for serving']
method: ['Blend garlic cloves in an electric blender till finely chopped. Add lemon juice, pour oil and blend to a smooth paste.', 'Add egg white and salt, blend once again.', 'Transfer to a serving bowl and serve with fried pita bread sticks.']

title: Fish Finger Bhajiya
method: ['Take gram flour in a bowl, add carom seeds, salt and crushed black peppercorns and mix well. Add sufficient water and mix to make a lump-free batter. Rest the batter for 15 minutes.', 'Sandwich each fish finger between two green capsicum strips and secure with a toothpick.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Dip each bhajiya into gram flour batter and slide into hot oil and deep-fry till golden brown. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Arrange the bhajiyas on a serving platter and serve hot with tomato ketchup, green chutney and green chillies.']

title: Pithla
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add cumin seeds, green chillies, ginger and curry leaves and saute well. Add onions, mix and saute till they turn light brown.', 'Add gram flour, mix well and cook for 4-5 minutes. Add turmeric powder, chilli powder, mix and cook for another 5-6 minutes.', 'Add salt and lemon juice and mix. Add 1 cup water, mix till smooth, cover and cook for 5-6 minutes. Add coriander leaves and remove from heat.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot.']

title: Mansaf
method: ['Heat 8-9 cups water in a deep non-stick pan, add mutton pieces, bay leaf, salt and 1 sliced onion and mix well. Bring to a boil and cook for some time.', 'Heat  1/4  cup ghee in a non-stick pan, add almonds and saute till lightly brown. Add pinenuts and saute further for a minute. Strain the ghee into a bowl and place the nuts in another bowl.', 'Pour the strained ghee into the same non-stick pan, add remaining sliced onions and saute till translucent. Add a ladleful of stock from the mutton pan to the onion mixture and mix.', 'Switch off the heat under the pan with mutton and strain the stock into a 3rd bowl.', 'Take 5 tbsps hung yogurt in a 4th bowl, add salt and 1 tsp cornflour and whisk well. Add 4 ladleful of mutton stock and whisk well.', 'Add the mutton to the onions and mix well.', 'Add  1/4  tsp all spice powder, black pepper powder and yogurt mixture to the mutton and mix well. Cook till the mutton becomes soft.', 'Take  1/2  cup hung yogurt in the same bowl, add remaining cornflour, salt, remaining all spice powder and 2 ladleful of mutton stock and whisk well.', 'Heat 1 tbsp ghee in the same deep non-stick pan, add cinnamon, yogurt-allspice mixture and mix well and cook till a little thick.', 'Place roomali roti on a serving platter, pour some mutton gravy on top, place pulao in the center, top with cooked mutton pieces and sprinkle the fried nuts on top. Serve hot with the cooked yogurt-all spice mixture.']

title: Highway Chicken Curry - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat a pan. Meanwhile, slice onions.', 'Add oil and ghee in the hot pan, add cumin seeds, black peppercorns, green cardamom, and cloves and break the black cardamom and add into the pan. Saute till fragrant.', 'Add the sliced onions and mix well. Cook till golden brown, sauteing in between.', 'Meanwhile, roughly tomatoes and transfer into a blender jar. Blend till smooth and set aside.\nAdd ginger-garlic paste and saute for 1-2 minutes. Add chopped tomato and pureed tomato, mix well. Cook till the tomato is pulpy.', 'Take chicken in a large bowl, add yogurt, salt,  1/2  tsp turmeric powder and mix well. Set aside.\nAdd  1/4  cup water in the pan and mix well. Add coriander powder, red chilli powder, cumin powder and garam masala and mix well. Add  1/4  cup water and mix and cook for 2-3 minutes or till the oil is separated.', 'Add the chicken mixture and saute for 2-3 minutes. Adjust salt, add ginger strips and slit the green chillies and add into the pan and mix well.', 'Add  3/4  cup water and mix well. Cover and cook for 20 minutes.', 'Add dried fenugreek leaves powder and mix well. Cook for 1-2 minutes. Take the pan off the heat.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with ginger strips and coriander sprig. Serve hot with onion quarters, lemon wedges, green chilli and tandoori roti.']

title: Podi Upma-SK Khazana
method: ['Dry roast semolina in a non-stick pan till fragrant. Transfer onto a plate and set aside.', 'Heat oil in the same pan. Add mustard seeds and saute till seeds splutter. Add black gram, green chillies and asafoetida, mix and saute well.', 'Add onion and saute till translucent. Add roasted semolina and mix well. Add 1 1/2  cups hot water, mix and bring to a boil.', 'Add salt, mix well, cover and cook till the water is absorbed.', 'To make coconut chutney, blend together coconut, green chillies, salt, ginger, some water and coriander leaves to a smooth paste.', 'Heat coconut oil in a non-stick pan. Add mustard seeds and saute till the seeds splutter.', 'Add curry leaves and red chillies, mix and saute well. Add coconut paste, mix well and cook for a minute.', 'Add coriander leaves to upma and mix well.', 'Grease a bowl with a little oil, fill it up with the upma, press lightly and turn it upside down in the centre of the serving plate.', 'Pour chutney around the upma, sprinkle molaga podi and some coriander leaves on top of the upma and serve immediately.']

title: Fried Rice With Tofu And Edamame
method: ['Heat two tablespoons oil in a non-stick wok. Break eggs into the pan, add salt andhalf the crushed black peppercorns and cook, stirring, till the eggs are scrambled.', 'Add two tablespoons oil to the same wok, add garlic and ginger and saute. Add corn and saute for minute.', 'Add tofu and saute. Add half the spring onion greensand shelled edamame beans and toss.', 'Add rice and toss well. Add scrambled eggs, salt, remaining crushed black peppercorns, soy sauce and red capsicum and toss well. Cook for a minute.', 'Add the remaining spring onion greens and mix well. Slit open the edamame beans without cutting through.', 'Heat remaining oil in a non-stick pan saute the edamame beans for one to two minutes.', 'Garnish the rice with the edamame beans and serve hot.']

title: Chicken Lettuce Cups
method: ['To prepare marinade, put sesame oil, soy sauce, corn syrup, salt, chilli flakes, garlic, ginger, crushed peppercorns, shallots and mirin in a bowl and mix well.', 'Make slits on chicken legs, add to the marinade and mix well. Set aside for 3-4 hours.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add marinated chicken with the marinade and cook for 1 minute, flipping, till equally done on both sides.', 'Reduce heat, cover and cook for 8-10 minutes or till chicken is fully done. Transfer the cooked chicken onto a plate reserving the cooked marinade.', 'Roughly slice the chicken legs.', 'Place each lettuce cup in separate bowls. Put some cooked rice in each of them.', 'Finely chop red chillies.', 'Pour some cooked marinade and chilli sauce on top of rice. Put some sliced chicken, chopped red chillies, some spring onion greens on the rice and top with sesame seeds.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Crispy Chicken Sticks
method: ['Take chicken mince in a bowl and press with a fork to flatten the mince. Add garlic, coriander leaves, crushed black peppercorns, red chilli powder, turmeric powder, onion, potato and salt and mix well.', 'Grease palms with oil, take a portion of chicken mixture and wrap around a soaked skewer. Similarly use up the remaining chicken mixture.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Spread rice flour on one plate and breadcrumbs-panko mixture on another plate. Take beaten eggs in an oval shallow bowl.', 'Roll each chicken stick in rice flour, dust off excess, dip in egg mixture and roll in breadcrumbs and panko mixture. Press slightly to secure the coating evenly.', 'Slide the chicken sticks into hot oil and deep-fry till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Transfer chicken sticks onto a serving plate and drizzle mustard mayo over them. Serve hot garnished with onion rings, mint sprigs and lemon wedges.']

title: Muthia
method: ['Heat sufficient water in the lower section of a steamer.', 'Take whole wheat flour, sorghum flour and gram flour in a large bowl, add salt, turmeric powder, red chilli powder, coriander-cumin powder, ginger-garlic paste, green chilli paste, spring onion greens, bottle gourd, baking soda, sugar and oil.', 'Add yogurt and mix well. Add a little water and knead into semi-stiff dough. Grease your hands with oil, divide the dough into equal portions and shape them into cylinders.', 'Place them in the perforated plate, cover and steam for 15-20 minutes or till completely done.', 'Remove from heat and let them cool slightly. Cut them into small pieces.', 'For tempering, heat oil in a non-stick pan, add mustard seeds and let them splutter. Add sesame seeds, asafoetida, curry leaves, red chillies and muthia slices and toss till lightly browned and crisp on both sides. Add coriander leaves and toss again.', 'Transfer them into serving platter and serve hot with green chutney.']

title: Mawa Kaju Cakes
method: ['Preheat oven to 180deg C.', 'Keep a sieve on a bowl. Put refined flour, baking soda and baking powder in it and sift into the bowl.', 'Add milk powder, cashewnut powder, butter and mawa and beat with a hand blender.', 'Add condensed milk and continue to beat with the hand blender till well blended.', 'Add vanilla essence and roasted cashewnuts and mix well.', 'Put the batter into silicon muffin moulds and tap lightly on the table top so that the batter settles down well into the dents.', 'Place the mould in the preheated oven and bake for 20 minutes.', 'Remove them from mould and dredge them lightly with icing sugar. Decorate each cake with a glazed cherry and serve.']

title: Marble Swiss Roll
method: ['Preheat oven at 180oC.Line a baking tray with parchment paper and grease with some butter.', 'Separate egg whites and yolks in separate bowls. Refrigerate the egg whites till further use.', 'Add vanilla essence to the yolks alongwith  1/2  cup castor sugar and beat well with an electric beater till ribbon consistency is achieved. Divide the mixture equally into two bowls.', 'Sieve  1/4  cup flour each into the two bowls with the yolk mixture. Add cocoa powder in one bowl and fold well. Fold the other flour mixture as well till well combined.', 'Beat the chilled egg whites. Add 2 tablespoons castor sugar and beat till soft peaks are formed.', 'Add half the beaten egg whites to the plain flour mixture and the remaining to the cocoa powder-flour mixture. Fold both the mixtures well.', 'Fill a piping bag with the cocoa batter and pipe out some of it roughly on the parchment paper. Pour the plain batter on top and spread lightly.
