Put some desiccated coconut and some cake crumbs on top.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Spicy Caribbean Chicken Skewers
method: ["Take orange juice, lemon juice, rum, soy sauce, ginger, bird's eye chillies, crushed peppercorns, salt, garlic, fennel seeds and vinegar in a bowl and mix. Add chicken and mix well. Refrigerate to marinate for 2 hours.", 'Preheat an electric griller and grease with some oil.', 'Skew marinated chicken cubes onto the satay sticks and reserve the leftover marinade for basting.', 'Place the skewers on preheated griller and grill, rotating the sticks and basting with the reserved marinade and some oil, till golden from all sides and fully cooked.', 'Serve hot garnished with spring onion greens.']

title: Teesrya Koshimbir
method: ['Heat coconut oil in a deep non-stick pan, add green chillies and onions, mix and saute for 2 minutes or till onions soften.', 'Take clams in a bowl, add salt, turmeric powder, garam masala powder and ginger and mix well.', 'Add the marinated clams to the pan and mix well. Sprinkle a little water and mix well and cook on medium heat for 5-10 minutes.', 'Add black pepper powder, kokum pieces, coriander leaves and coconut and mix well. Cook on low heat for 2 minutes.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot.']

title: Anjeer Rabdi
method: ['Heat the reduced milk in a non-stick pan till further reduced and thick. Stir continuously, scraping the sides of the pan.', 'Add sugar, mix well and let it dissolve completely.', 'Add fig puree, stir well to avoid lumps. Switch off heat, add chopped pistachios and almonds and mix well.', 'Transfer the rabdi in a glass bowl and cool to room temperature. Refrigerate to chill.', 'Garnish with pistachio slivers and serve chilled.']

title: Keoti Dal
method: ['Drain and put toovar dal, chana dal, masoor dal, salt, turmeric powder and 3 cups water in a pressure cooker and cook under pressure till 3 whistles are given out. Meanwhile chop onions and garlic. Cut the red chillies and remove the seeds.', 'Heat ghee in a small non stick pan, add mustard seeds and let them splutter. Add cumin seeds, curry leaves, red chillies, onions and garlic and saute till fragrant. Open the lid of the cooker when the pressure has reduced completely, add the tempering and mix well. Serve hot with rice or roti or parantha.']

title: Gur ka Parantha - SKK
method: ['Mix together wheat flour and salt in a bowl. Add sufficient water and knead into a stiff dough.', 'Heat 2 tablespoons ghee in a non-stick pan, add coconut and saute for 2 minutes. Add sesame needs and saute for a few seconds. Transfer the mixture into a bowl.', 'Add jaggery and mix well. Set aside to cool down a little bit.', 'Divide the dough into equal portions, dust with flour and roll out into thick discs.', 'Add 2 tablespoons wheat flour to jaggery mixture and mix well.', 'Place a spoonful of jaggery mixture in the centre of each disc, gather the edges, seal and shape into balls. Dust with some flour, flatten and set aside to rest for 5 minutes.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa.', 'Dust the stuffed balls with some flour and roll out into thick paranthas', 'Place the paranthas, one by one, on the hot tawa and cook, basting with ghee, till evenly browned from both sides.', 'Cut into half and serve hot.']

title: Chicken Xacuti
method: ['Mix chicken pieces with salt and set aside.', 'To make powder masala, heat  1/2  teaspoon oil in a non-stick pan. Add cloves, peppercorns, star anise, cinnamon, fenugreek seeds, green cardamoms, cumin seeds, fennel seeds, nutmeg powder and ginger and saute till fragrant. Remove from heat, cool and grind into a fine powder.', 'To make coconut masala, heat 1 teaspoon oil in the same non-stick pan. Add half the onions and saute till they are brown.', 'Add poppy seeds and mix well. Add coconut and saute till coconut is light brown. Remove from heat, cool and grind into a fine paste with a little water.', 'Heat 2 tablespoons oil in another non-stick pan. Add remaining onions and saute till translucent.', 'Add chicken, mix well and cook on high heat for 1 minute. Add red chilli powder, turmeric powder, garam masala powder, coriander powder and mix well.', 'Add powdered masala and mix well. Add little water, mix well, cover and cook for 5 minutes.', 'Add coconut masala, mix well, cover and cook for 5 minutes.', 'Add tamarind pulp, mix well, cover and cook for 2 minutes.', 'Add coconut milk, mix and simmer for 5 minutes or till the gravy is thick.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Peas Potato Pattice in Tomato Gravy
method: ['Preheat the oven to 180degC.', 'Boil and peel tomatoes.', 'Take potatoes in a large bowl add corn flour, green chilli paste and salt. Knead into dough.', 'Roughly mash green peas in a bowl add green chillies, coconut, salt, one teaspoon sugar and one tablespoon fresh cream. Mix well.', 'Take a portion of the potato mixture and flatten it in your palms, place a portion of the green pea mixture in the centre and shape into a medium sized ball.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Take refined flour in a bowl add sufficient water to make thick slurry. Spread breadcrumbs in a plate.', 'Dip the pattice in the slurry and then coat with breadcrumbs and deep fry in hot oil till golden brown and crisp.', 'Drain on absorbent paper and keep aside.', 'Cool, peel and grind tomatoes into a smooth puree.', 'Heat one tablespoon oil in a pan. Add tomato puree and saute for two to three minutes or till the raw flavour is gone.', 'Add tomato ketchup, salt, remaining sugar, red chilli powder. Mix well and simmer for one to two minutes. Add lemon juice and mix well.', 'Add remaining tablespoon cream and mix well.', 'Arrange the fried pattice in a baking dish. Pour prepared tomato gravy over it. Spoon a dollop of fresh cream over each pattice and sprinkle with grated cheese.', 'Bake for 5 minutes or till the cheese melts.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Sichuan Kimchi Rice
method: ['To make kimchi, heat two tablespoons sesame oil in a pan, add cabbage, salt, soy sauce, brown sugar and crushed red chillies and toss.', 'Add vinegar and toss and cook till the cabbage softens slightly. Roast sesame seeds and add to the cabbage and mix.', 'Heat the remaining sesame oil in another pan. Add garlic and ginger and saute on high heat for a minute. Add rice, kimchi and crushed Sichuan peppers and mix well. Add salt and toss.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Dal Bukhara
method: ['Put black gram, kidney beans and split Bengal gram into a pressure cooker, add salt and 4 cups water, cover the cooker and cook under pressure till 7-8 whistles are released. Once the pressure settles completely uncover the cooker and mash the cooked ingredients slightly.', 'Heat butter and oil in a deep non-stick pan, add cumin seeds, green cardamoms, cloves, cinnamon stick and ginger paste, mix well and saute for a minute on medium heat.', 'Break and add green chillies, mix and saute for a minute. Add turmeric powder, coriander powder, cumin powder and nutmeg powder, mix and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add red chilli powder and mix well. Add tomato puree, mix well, cover and cook on medium heat, stirring occasionally, till oil separates.', 'Add the cooked grams and salt and mix well. Churn the mixture with a churner mashing the grams. Cook for 15-20 minutes on medium heat.', 'Add powdered dried fenugreek leaves and garam masala powder and mix well. Cook for 3-4 minutes on medium heat. Add cream and mix well and cook for a minute.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with cream, a dollop of butter and coriander sprig and serve hot with naan.']

title: Bread Sticks
method: ['Take yeast in a bowl. Add 1 tablespoon water and heat in microwave for 10 seconds.', 'Take refined flour in another bowl. Add salt, carom seeds, dissolved yeast and  3/4  cup water and knead well into a soft dough. Add 1 teaspoon oil and knead again.', 'Grease a baking tray with oil. Divide dough into small equal portions.', 'Grease your palms with little oil and roll the portions into thin long sticks. Place them on the baking tray and set aside for 10-15 minutes.', 'Preheat oven to 180degC.', 'Place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 20 minutes or till golden.', 'Remove from oven, cool and serve as an accompaniment with soups.']

title: Feta And Nuts Spring Rolls
Main ingredients: Feta cheese, Almonds, Pistachios, Cashewnuts, Spring roll sheets, Sugar, Malta orange, Khoya, Castor sugar, Raisins

title: Chocolate Modak
method: ['Heat butter in a non-stick pan, let it melt. Add chocolate and mix till it melts completely. Add condensed milk, mix and cook for a minute on low heat.', 'Add vanilla essence and mix well. Add khoya and walnuts and mix. Add desiccated coconut, mix and cook till the mixture starts to leave the side of the pan.', 'Take the pan off the heat and transfer into a bowl and allow the mixture to cool completely.', 'Divide the mixture into equal portions. Stuff each portion into a modak mould and press gently.', 'Demould and arrange the modaks on a serving plate. Garnish with walnuts and serve. Or transfer into an airtight container and refrigerator to serve when required.', 'Garnish the chocolate modaks with walnuts and serve.']

title: Chicken Bread Pizza
method: ['Preheat oven to 180deg C.', 'Take butter in a bowl. Add garlic, chili flakes and torn basil leaves and mix well.', 'Spread the butter mixture on each bread slice and place on a baking tray.', 'Place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 4-6 minutes or till crisp.', 'Spread some pizza sauce on top of each toast. Put some chicken, mixed capsicum strips, mozzarella cheese cubes and few torn oregano sprigs.', 'Place the tray back into the preheated oven and bake till cheese melts.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Sheermal-SK Khazana
method: ['Heat milk in a non-stick pan.', 'Take saffron strands in a small bowl, add 2-3 tablespoons warm milk from the pan and mix well.', 'Add castor sugar to the pan and mix till it dissolves.', 'Put flour in a bowl. Add sweetened milk and screwpine essence, mix and knead into a soft dough. Cover with muslin cloth and set aside for 10 minutes.', 'Preheat oven to 240o C.', 'Add ghee, knead again, cover with a muslin cloth and set aside for 10 minutes.', 'Divide the dough into equal portions, dust with some flour and roll out into discs. Prick the entire surface with a fork.', 'Grease a baking tray with some butter.', 'Arrange the discs on the greased tray, put the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 5 minutes.', 'Remove the tray from the oven and brush with some saffron milk. Put the tray back in the preheated oven and bake for 3-4 minutes.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Herbed Chicken Legs
method: ['Preheat oven at 180degC. Spread an aluminium foil on a baking tray.', 'Chop thyme and rosemary and place in a bowl. Add balsamic vinegar, salt, red chilli flakes, garlic and butter and mix well.', 'Add chicken legs, mix well and set aside to marinate for 10-15 minutes.', 'Place onion and carrot cubes on the baking tray and put the marinated chicken legs on it. Apply the left-over marinade on top, drizzle honey on the chicken legs. Place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes.', 'Remove from oven and place the chicken and vegetables on a serving platter.', 'To make sauce, heat butter in a non-stick pan. Add refined flour, mix and saute for 2-3 minutes, stirring continuously.', 'Add the left-over juices of the chicken and vegetables and mix well. Add chicken stock, stir well and cook till the sauce thickens. Remove from heat and strain the sauce.', 'Pour sauce over chicken and vegetables, garnish with parsley sprig and serve hot.']

title: Kung Pao Potatoes
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Cube the potatoes and add. Shallow fry till light golden. Drain on absorbent paper. Slice spring onion bulbs, finely chop ginger and garlic. Mix cornflour in  1/4  cup vegetable stock and set aside.', 'Heat chilli oil in another non-stick pan. Add red chillies and saute for  1/2  minute or till crisp. Add onion, ginger and garlic and saute till soft. Add soy sauce, red chilli sauce, sugar, salt and peanuts and mix.', 'Add the remaining vegetable stock and mix well. Chop spring onion greens. Add cornflour mixture to the pan and cook till the sauce thickens. Add potatoes and mix gently. Serve immediately garnished with spring onion.']

title: Couscous Feta Salad
method: ['Put couscous in a large bowl and pour one cup boiling water in it. Cover with cling film and set aside for five minutes or until the water is completely absorbed.', 'Fluff up the cous cous with a fork, add olive oil, mix and set aside to cool.', 'Add pomegranate pearls, spring onions with greens, coriander leaves, parsley, mint leaves, lemon juice, salt and crushed peppercorns and mix well.', 'Add feta cheese and mix well. Refrigerate to chill.', 'Serve chilled.']

title: Black Grape Sherbet
method: ['Dry-roast the cumin seeds, fennel seeds and carom seeds and grind with black salt to a fine powder. Place the crushed ice and tamarind pulp in a mixer.', 'Pour the grape juice and add the powdered spices. Blend all the ingredients together.', 'Place mint leaves in individual glasses. Pour the grape sherbet in the glasses and serve chilled.']

title: Almond and Coffee Cookie
method: ['Preheat oven at 180oC.', 'Cream butter and castor sugar in a bowl using an electric beater till light.', 'Add coffee powder and vanilla essence and beat again.', 'Add refined flour, rice flour and almonds. Mix well and knead into a dough.', 'Divide dough into equal portions and shape them into cookies.', 'Place cookies on a baking tray, put tray in preheated oven and bake for 10-15 minutes.', 'Remove from heat, cool and serve. You can also store them in an airtight container for about a week.']

title: Mawa Gujiya Tart
method: ['For the pastry, take refined flour in a large mixing bowl, add powdered sugar and ghee and rub the mixture with your fingertips till it resembles bread crumbs. Add 3-4 tbsps water and mix well to form stiff dough. Allow to rest for 30 minutes.', 'Preheat the oven to 180@C.', 'To make the filling, heat  1/2  tbsp ghee in a non-stick pan, add cashewnuts, almonds, walnuts and pistachios, mix and saute, stirring continuously, for 5 minutes or till fragrant. Transfer into a bowl.', 'Add  1/2  tbsp ghee to the same pan, add dates and figs, mix and saute, stirring continuously, for 3-4 minutes. Add  1/4  tsp green cardamom powder and mix well. Add the remaining cardamom powder to the sauteed nuts and mix well. Transfer the dates-fig mixture into the same bowl as the nuts.', 'Add khoya to the same pan and saute for a few seconds. Take it off the heat and transfer into the same bowl and mix till well combined. Let the mixture cool.', 'Dust the worktop with flour, place the dough on it and flatten it. Roll it evenly into a rectangular sheet, large enough to cover the base and the sides of the tart shell.', 'Lift the prepared sheet with a rolling pin and place it on the tart shell. Press it to the bottom and the sides to cover the entire tart shell. Roll the rolling pin on the rim of the tart shell so that extra dough gets cut off. Press the sides of the dough firmly so that once baked it takes the shape of the shell perfectly. Place a butter paper over the dough and spread some dried beans over it. This will prevent the dough from rising while baking.', 'Keep the tart shell in the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes. Bring it out of the oven. Discard the beans and de-mould the tart. Allow to cool slightly.', 'Spread the filling in tart shell evenly. Place the tart on a baking tray and place the tray back in the oven and bake for 5 minutes. Take it out of the oven.', 'Transfer the tart onto a serving plate, dust powdered sugar on top and garnish with silver warq. Serve.']

title: Chicken and Prawn Rice with Peppers
method: ['Heat butter and oil in a deep non-stick pan. Add garlic and saute for 30 seconds.', 'Add onion and saute till translucent. Add tomato and saute for 1 minute. Add salt and paprika and mix well.', 'Add chicken, mix and cook for 1 minute. Add rice and mix well. Add yellow capsicum, green capsicum, red capsicum, broccoli and chicken stock, mix and bring to a boil.', 'Add prawns, mix and cover and cook till rice is done.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Melting Moments
method: ['Preheat oven to 180deg C. Line a baking tray with a silicon mat.', 'Take butter in a bowl. Add icing sugar and mix well. Sieve together flour, cornflour and salt into the bowl and fold in well. Add vanilla essence and fold in well.', 'Transfer cornflakes into a plastic zip-lock bag, seal and crush with a rolling pin. Spread on a plate.', 'Divide the dough into equal portions and shape them into balls.', 'Coat each ball with crushed cornflakes and arrange them on the lined baking tray.', 'Place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes. Remove from oven and cool.', 'Serve.']

title: Langar ki Dal - SK Khazana
method: ['Put whole black gram, split Bengal gram, salt, 1 tsp turmeric powder and 5 cups water in a pressure cooker and mix well. Cover and cook under pressure till 4-5 whistles are given out.', 'Heat ghee in a deep non-stick pan, add cumin seeds and saute till they begin to change colour. Add ginger and onions and saute till light golden.', 'Add green chillies, mix and saute for 2 minutes. Add tomatoes and salt and saute till tomatoes are pulpy.', 'Add  1/4  cup coriander leaves, remaining turmeric powder, coriander powder and chilli powder, mix and saute for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add the cooked grams and mix well. Add garam masala powder and simmer for 5-10 minutes. Add remaining coriander leaves and mix well.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot garnished with coriander sprig.']

title: Rajma Pav Bhaji
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add garlic paste and saute for a minute.', 'Add tomatoes and saute for 4-5 minutes or till they become pulpy. Add 1 1/2  tsps red chilli powder, turmeric powder, pav bhaji masala, amchur, garam masala powder and saute for a minute.', 'Add green peas, green capsicum and cook further till the vegetables are soft and mashed.', 'Add potato and kidney beans and mix well. Add bhuna masala, 1 cup water and mix well.', 'Add 1 tbsp butter, juice of  1/2  lemon, salt and mix well.', 'Heat the remaining butter on a non-stick tawa. Sprinkle some red chilli powder. Halve the pavs horizontally, place them on the tawa and toast lightly.', 'Transfer the bhaji into a serving bowl, garnish with chopped onion and lemon wedges and serve hot with pavs.']

title: Brandy Snap Basket
method: ['Preheat oven to 180deg C. Line a baking tray with silicon mat.', 'Cream together butter, ginger and castor sugar in a bowl with an electric beater. Add golden syrup and whisk. Add flour and whisk well.', 'Divide the mixture into small equal portions and arrange them on the lined baking tray keeping a little distance between each.', 'Place the baking tray in the preheated oven and bake for 8-10 minutes. Remove from oven, place each baked portion on an inverted bowl, lightly press to shape into a bowl and set aside to cool. Demould the baskets.', 'Place the baskets on a serving platter and put some blueberries and strawberries. Place a scoop of vanilla ice cream on top and garnish with mint sprigs.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Beetroot Shots
method: ['Put the beetroots in a blender jar, add coconut, garlic, green chilli, lemon juice, salt and 2 1/2  cups water and blend to a smooth puree.', 'Place a muslin cloth in a strainer and strain the prepared mixture into a jar.', 'Pour the strained mixture in shot glasses and serve.']

title: Kachori Chaat
method: ['Mix refined flour, carom seeds, salt, soda bicarbonate and pure ghee in a bowl. Add cold water as required to knead into a stiff dough.', 'Heat oil in a pan. Add asafoetida and cumin seeds. When the cumin seeds begin to change colour, add ginger, green chillies, green peas and salt. Mix and cook for two to three minutes. Take off the heat and add garam masala powder. Mix and set aside to coo', 'When cool add coconut and peanuts and mix. Divide the dough into eight equal portions. Roll each portion and press to make round puris. Stuff each puri with the stuffing and further shape into a kachori.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai and deep-fry the kachoris in medium hot oil till crisp and golden. Drain and place them on an absorbent paper. To serve lightly crush two to three kachoris and place them in each serving bowl.', 'Pour some yogurt over it, sprinkle red chilli powder and cumin powder, drizzle both the chutneys and serve immediately.']

title: Aloo Bhujia Omelette
ingredients: ['1 cup aloo bhujia', '8 eggs', 'Salt to taste', '2 tablespoons oil', '4 teaspoons finely chopped ginger', '2-3 green chillies, chopped', '1 large onion, finely chopped', '1 large tomato, finely chopped', '4 pinches of turmeric powder', '2 tablespoons red chilli powder', '1 teaspoon cumin powder', '2 teaspoons coriander powder', '4 tablespoons chopped fresh coriander leaves', 'Toasted white bread slices to serve', 'Tomato ketchup to serve']
method: ['To make one portion, break in 2 eggs and put into a bowl. Add salt and whisk well.', 'Heat  1/2  tbsp oil in a non-stick shallow pan. Add 1 tsp ginger,  1/4  green chillies,  1/4  chopped onion,  1/4  chopped tomato and salt, mix well and saute for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add a pinch of turmeric powder,  1/2  tsp red chilli powder,  1/4  tsp cumin powder and  1/2  tsp coriander powder and mix well. Cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add  1/4  cup aloo bhujia and mix till well combined. Add 1 tbsp coriander leaves and mix.', 'Pour the whisked eggs over this mixture and spread the mixture evenly. Cook on medium heat for 2-3 minutes. Flip the omelette and cook the other side for 1-2 minutes. Fold in half and transfer onto a serving plate. Make more omelettes similarly.', 'Serve hot with toasted bread slices and tomato ketchup.']
Main ingredients: Aloo bhujia, Eggs, Ginger, Green chillies, Onion, Tomato, Red chilli powder, Coriander powder, Cumin powder

title: Sausages in Hot Dog
method: ['Cut chicken sausages into 1 inch pieces. Roughly chop onion and green capsicum.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add onion and saute till light brown. Add green capsicum and chicken sausages and saute for 4-5 minutes.', 'Add Schezwan chutney, mix well and switch off the heat.', 'Heat a non-stick grill pan. Slit the hot dog buns without cutting through, place them on the grill pan, one by one, and let them get heated through.', 'Apply 1 tsp mustard paste on the inner side of each bun. Place the chicken stuffing over the mustard paste, keep them on individual serving plates and serve.']

title: Pizza Tart-SK Khazana
method: ['Mix together yeast, castor sugar and 1-2 tablespoons water in a small bowl. Set aside to activate.', 'Mix together flour, milk powder, baking powder and salt in a bowl. Add activated yeast and sufficient water and knead to a soft dough. Add oil and knead again.', 'Grease a bowl with some oil, place dough in it, cover with a cling film and set aside to prove.', 'Preheat oven to 180o C.', 'Divide the dough into 4 equal portions, place on a dusted worktop and roll out into thin discs.', 'Line individual tart moulds with the discs and discard the excess dough. Fill each of them with chickpeas and keep them on a baking tray.', 'Put the tray in preheated oven and blind bake for 8-10 minutes. Remove from oven, cool, discard the chickpeas and demould.', 'Brush tart shells with some butter and spread 1 tablespoon pizza sauce in each. Top each with 1 1/2  tablespoons cheese and 2-3 basil leaves.', 'Transfer them on a baking tray, put the tray in preheated oven and bake till the cheese melts.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Crispy Chicken Wings with Cheesy Dip
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a pan.', 'Take chicken in a bowl. Break the egg into the bowl; add garlic paste, salt and crushed peppercorns and mix. Add cornflour and mix well.', 'To prepare cheesy dip, take cream cheese in another bowl. Add cheese spread, shallots, smoked paprika and chives and mix well. Refrigerate.', 'Deep-fry marinated chicken wings in hot oil till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Garnish with micro greens and serve hot with cheesy dip.']

title: Sev Khichia Papad - SK Khazana
method: ['Dry roast the papads on direct flame till well done on both the sides.', 'Mash the potatoes into a bowl, add chaat masala powder, dried mango powder and red chilli powder, and mix well.', 'For each portion place 1 papad on a serving plate, keep another plate on it and press slightly so that the papad is broken into pieces. Drizzle a little butter, sprinkle some onion, some tomato, some raw mango, some peanuts, masala chana dal and some potato mixture.', 'Drizzle some red chilli-garlic chutney, some sweet tamarind chutney, some green chutney, sprinkle some chaat masala powder, some red chilli powder and drizzle a little yogurt. Garnish with some coriander leaves, some sev and some chana dal and serve immediately.']

title: KAJU KHOYA BESAN LADDOO
method: ['Heat ghee in a wide non-stick pan. Add coarse gram flour and mix well. Continuously roast on low heat till it turns golden brown and fragrant.', 'Switch the heat off, add the grate khoya and mix it till well combined.', 'Add poppy seeds, green cardamom powder, and cashew nuts powder and saute on low heat for 1-2 minutes.', 'Transfer the roasted mixture on to a large bowl and allow to cool to room temperature.', 'Add the powdered sugar and mix well with your hand. Take small portions of the mixture and tightly roll it into a ball. This is a laddoo.', 'Arrange the laddoos on a serving plate. Serve.']

title: Warm Sweet Potato Salad - SK Khazana
method: ['Preheat oven to 180o C.', 'Thickly slice sweet potatoes and spread them on a baking tray. Add white onion cubes, garlic, walnuts, crushed peppercorns, salt and olive oil and mix well. Add thyme and mix again.', 'Keep the tray in the preheated oven and roast for 20-25 minutes.', 'To make dressing, take turmeric paste in a bowl, add tahini, lemon juice, salt, crushed peppercorns, grainy mustard and olive oil and mix well.', 'Transfer roasted vegetables on a serving plate. Drizzle the dressing on top and garnish with parsley. Serve warm.']

title: Palak Paneer Pakoda - SK Khazana
method: ['Grate cottage cheese into a bowl. Add mozzarella cheese, crushed red chillies, coriander leaves and salt and mix well.', 'Place some cheese mixture in the center of each spinach leaf, fold three sides and roll to make a compact parcel.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Take Pakoda Mix in a bowl, add sufficient water and whisk to make a smooth batter of coating consistency.', 'Dip each spinach roll in the batter, shake off excess batter and drop into the hot oil. Deep fry till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Arrange them on a serving platter and serve hot with tomato ketchup.']

title: Mangalorean Mango Curry - SK Khazana
method: ['Tap each mango on a worktop gently to soften tem, remove the eye and squeeze out the mango into a large bowl and discard the skin. Squeeze the pulp out and discard the pits.', 'Heat a shallow non-stick pan, add mustard seeds, fenugreek seeds, cumin seeds, black peppercorns, coriander seeds, break and add dried red chillies and dry roast till fragrant.', 'Transfer the spices into a blender jar, add onion, ginger, garlic and a little water and blend into a smooth paste.', 'Heat oil in a deep pan, add curry leaves and saue for 30 seconds. . Add the ground paste, mix and saute for 2 minutes.', 'Add turmeric powder and salt and mix well and saute, stirring continuously, till oil separates.', 'Add the mango pulp and mix well. Rinse the blender jar with 1 cup water and add, mix well, cover and cook till the mixture comes to a boil.', 'Add jaggery and tamarind pulp, mix well and cook till jaggery melts. .', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with fried curry leaves and serve hot.']

title: Moong Aur Hare Lasun Ki Dal
method: ['Finely chop fresh green garlic.', 'Mix together green gram, turmeric powder and salt in a pressure cooker and mix well. Cook till 2 whistles are released.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick deep pan, add cumin seeds and let them change colour. Add asafoetida, green chilli paste and ginger garlic paste and mix well', 'Add chopped green garlic and saute for 2 minutes. Add tomatoes and mix well. Cook for 2 minutes or till tomatoes turn soft and pulpy.', 'Open the cooker once the pressure has reduced completely and add gram mixture and mix well. Add  1/2  cup water and adjust salt and mix, Cover and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Sprinkle chopped coriander and take the pan off the heat. Transfer into a serving bowl and garnish with coriander sprig.', 'Serve hot with steamed rice.']

title: Farfalle In Lemon Cream Sauce
method: ['Heat the oil in a non stick pan.', 'Add the boiled pasta and toss. Add the red chillies, lemon zest, salt and cream and stir to mix well. Cook for two minutes. Add parmesan cheese, parsley and lemon juice and mix.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, sprinkle crushed black peppercorns and serve hot.']

title: Anda Malai Masala - SK Khazana
method: ['Quarter the onions, de-stem green chillies, transfer both into a blender jar and blend into a fine paste.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds and saute till their colour changes. Add the onion-chili paste, mix well and saute, stirring occasionally, till it turns golden brown.', 'Add ginger-garlic paste, mix well and saute for 1-2 minutes or till raw smells disappear.', 'Add crushed black peppercorns, garam masala powder, salt, turmeric powder and  1/4  cup water and mix well. Add  1/2  cup water, mix.', 'Halve eggs vertically and add them to the pan. Add milk and mix well. Cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Switch the heat off. Drizzle fresh cream and add coriander leaves.', 'Transfer the eggs into a serving plate, pour the gravy over them and drizzle a little cream on top. Garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot with pavs.']

title: Tzatziki
ingredients: ['1 cup yogurt', '1 medium cucumber, peeled and grated', '1 tablespoon chopped garlic', '2-3 fresh dill sprigs, chopped', 'Salt to taste', 'Crushed black peppercorns to taste', ' 1/4  teaspoon lemon juice', 'Fresh parsley sprig for garnish']
method: ['Take yogurt, cucumber, garlic, dill, salt, crushed peppercorns and lemon juice in a bowl and mix well.', 'Serve garnished with a parsley sprig.']

title: Breakfast Nacho Tortilla
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add onion and saute till translucent. Add tomato concasse, salt, paprika powder, cayenne pepper, cumin powder, half the crushed black peppercorns and sugar and mix. Cook for one to two minutes.', 'Add some water and mix, add red chilli sauce, remaining crushed black peppercorns and cook till it gets thick and the water has evaporated.', 'Chop the jalapenos.', 'Take one tortilla at a time, spread the prepared sauce evenly and grate some cheese over it. Place some capsicum, yellow bell pepper, jalapenos and boiled chicken on one side of the tortilla.', 'Mix cheese spread and sour cream in a bowl and drizzle on the tortilla. Arrange some nacho chips over it and fold it into half.', 'Place the folded tortilla in a sandwich griller and cook till there are grill marks over it and it is crisp.', 'Place them on a serving platter and serve hot.']

title: Tadkewali Chaas
method: ['Pour yogurt into a jar and churn with a mathni. Add ice cubes, coriander powder, cumin powder, salt, sugar and two cups of water and churn well. Add coriander leaves and roughly torn mint leaves.', 'Heat ghee in a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds and let them change colour. Add green chilli and curry leaves, pour this tempering into the jar and mix well.', 'Pour chaas into individual glasses, garnish with boondi, cumin powder, coriander leaves and mint leaves. Serve chilled.']

title: Creme Brulee - Eggless
method: ['Heat 1 cup milk in a non-stick pan, add cream, mix well and heat for 2 minutes.', 'Put custard powder in a bowl, add remaining milk and mix well. Add this to the milk-cream mixture, mix and cook till the mixture thickens.', 'Add sugar, mix well and cook till the sugar dissolves completely. Strain the mixture so that there are no lumps.', 'Pour the strained mixture into 4 individual ramekin moulds and refrigerate till set.', 'Add 1 tbsp brown sugar on each moulds and spread. Caramelize the sugar with a brulee torch and serve immediately.']

title: Paneer and Soya Wrap
method: ['Combine soya granules, potatoes, cottage cheese, green chilli, 1 teaspoon chaat masala, turmeric powder, red chilli powder, chopped coriander, salt and breadcrumbs in a bowl and mix well. Divide the mixture into equal portions and shape them into cylinders or patties.', 'Heat some oil in anon-stick pan. Place the prepared patties on it shallow-fry till golden from all the sides.', 'To make the salad, combine cabbage beetroot, onion and carrot in a bowl. Add  1/2  teaspoon chaat masala, salt, vinegar and lemon juice and mix well.', 'Spread 1 tablespoon chutney onto a roti. Place a patty on one side, sprinkle chaat masala on top and top with a portion of prepared salad. Roll tightly. Prepare the remaining wraps in the similar way.', 'Serve immediately with salad.']

title: Lemon Chicken with Couscous
method: ['Prick the chicken pieces with a fork.', 'Mix chicken with salt,  1/2  teaspoon crushed black peppercorns,  1/2  teaspoon red chilli powder,  1/2  teaspoon cumin powder,  1/2  teaspoon garam masala powder, 1 teaspoon olive oil, zest of  1/2  lemon and the juice of  1/2  lemon. Keep aside for 15-20 minutes to marinate.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a pan and place chicken pieces on it, skin side down.', 'Sear for 1-2 minutes on each side. Remove on a plate and keep aside.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in the same pan. Slice onions length wise and add to the pan.', 'Add chopped garlic and saute till onions turn a light brown.', 'Add remaining cumin powder, red chilli powder, garam masala powder, crushed black peppercorns and mix well.', 'Add  1/2  cup chicken stock and mix well. Add green chillies and salt and mix well.', 'Place the seared chicken pieces in the pan. Pour some of the gravy over it. Add  1/2  cup chicken stock and mix. Cover and cook for 8 - 10 minutes or till chicken is fully cooked.', 'Put couscous in a large bowl. Add a few strands of saffron to remaining chicken stock and heat it.', 'Pour the hot chicken stock over the couscous and cover it with cling film. Keep aside to bloom for 5-6 minutes.', 'Halve the green and black olives and add to the couscous. Add zest of  1/2  lemon, pickled jalapenos and coriander leaves. Roughly chop mint leaves and add and mix well.', 'Add juice of  1/2  lemon and a few saffron strands to the chicken and mix well. Cover and cook for a minute more.', 'Spread couscous on a serving plate. Arrange chicken pieces on it and pour some of the sauce over it.', 'Garnish with coriander leaves and a few strands of saffron and serve hot.']

title: Yakhni Pulao - Cook Smart
method: ['Heat 2 tablespoons ghee in a pressure cooker, add mutton and saute on high heat for 3-4 minutes', 'Place green cardamoms, black cardamom, cinnamon, mace, cloves, bay leaves and fennel seeds on a piece of muslin cloth, gather the edges and make a potli.', 'Add green chillies, 2 cups water, potli and salt to the cooker, mix, cover and pressure cook till the pressure is released for 5-6 times.', 'Slice onion.', 'Heat remaining ghee in a handi. Soak a white kitchen towel in water.', 'Add caraway seeds and onion to the handi, mix and saute till the onion turns golden brown. Add garlic paste and ginger paste, mix and saute well. Add Tata Sampann Meat Masala and saute for a few seconds. Add  1/2  cup mutton stock and mix.', 'Open the lid of the pressure cooker once the pressure is reduced completely. Discard potli and strain the stock into a bowl.', 'Add cooked mutton pieces to the handi and mix well. Add strained stock and yogurt and mix well.', 'Add rice and salt, mix well and bring to a boil. Cover and cook for 5 minutes. Add fried onions, cover and cook for 5-6 minutes.', 'Place the wet kitchen towel over the pulao, cover, place a heavy object on it and cook for 10 minutes.', 'Sprinkle some mint leaves and fried onions, garnish with mint sprig and serve hot.']

title: Pancake Pudding Bake
method: ['Preheat oven to 180o C.', 'To make pancake, sieve together refined flour, soda bicarbonate, baking powder, salt and  1/2  cup castor sugar into a bowl.', 'Melt one cup butter in another bowl in a microwave for 30 seconds. Cool down to room temperature.', 'Break two eggs in a third bowl and whisk well. Add buttermilk and mix well. Add melted butter and mix well. Add this to the dry ingredients and mix well to make a smooth batter.', 'Heat one teaspoon butter in a non-stick pan, pour a ladleful of the batter and cook on low heat till underside is golden, flip and cook till the other side is evenly done. Similarly prepare the rest.', 'To make strawberry stew, roughly chop strawberries reserving a few for garnishing.', 'Using a round cookie cutter, cut out discs from the prepared pancakes.', 'Heat chopped strawberries in another non-stick pan, add  1/4  cup sugar and a little water and mix well. Cook on low heat till the mixture thickens.', 'To make custard, break remaining eggs into a large bowl, add remaining sugar, vanilla essence, cinnamon powder and mix well. Add milk and mix well.', 'Heat thisprepared mixture in a deep non-stick pan and mix well. Bring this to a boil. Cook for 2-3 minutes', 'Grease the baking dish with butter, place the pancake roundels in it, pour the prepared custard. Put this dish in the preheated oven and bake for 10-15 minutes.', 'Remove the dish from oven, cut with a cookie cutter and place a portion of the pudding bake on a serving plate, top with stewed strawberries, drizzle maple syrup over it, garnish with the reserved strawberry and serve immediately.']

title: Almond Cranberry Muffins
method: ['Preheat oven to 180oC.', 'Cream together the butter and castor sugar in a bowl till light and fluffy.', 'Add the eggs, one at a time and the vanilla essence and beat well.', 'Sieve together the flour, baking powder and salt into the butter-sugar mixture and fold gently.', 'Fold in the almond meal and cranberries.', 'Scoop the mixture evenly into muffin moulds and sprinkle the slivered almonds on top.', 'Put the moulds on a baking tray, place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for fifteen to twenty minutes. Remove from oven and demould.', 'Serve warm.']

title: Prawns Puli Munchi
method: ['Soak the tamarind in water for about an hour and extract the pulp.', 'Dry roast the chilies, coriander seeds, cumin seeds, 4 cloves of garlic with turmeric with 1 table spoon of oil.', 'Use little water and grind the above to a fine thick paste with tamarind.', 'Heat oil in a pan. Add the mustard seeds, curry leaves, crushed garlic, when they splutter, add the paste, water as needed, salt and bring it to a boil.', 'Add the shrimps and simmer for 5 to 8 minutes.', 'Serve hot over rice.']

title: Jain Chinese Bhel
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in kadai.', 'Take noodles in a bowl, add cornflour and mix well. Set aside.', 'Heat 1 teaspoon oil in a non-stick pan, add French beans, capsicum, cabbage, corn kernels, black pepper powder, sugar, salt, soy sauce, chill sauce, tomato ketchup and mix well. Cook for 2-3 minutes and set aside.', 'Deep-fry noodles in hot oil till crisp and brown. Drain on absorbent paper. When cool lightly crush the fried noodles.', 'Add the fried noodles reserving some to the vegetable mixture. Mix well and cook for 2-3 mixture. Add chopped coriander reserving some and mix well.', 'Serve hot garnished with reserved fried noodles and chopped coriander.']

title: Prawns in Coconut Sauce Thai Style
method: ['Grind together red chillies, onion, galangal and lemon grass to a fine paste.', 'Heat a non-stick wok, add the paste and cook, stirring continuously. Sprinkle a little water and cook further for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add turmeric powder and  1/2  cup water. Stir to mix and bring the mixture to a boil, lower heat and simmer for 3-4 minutes.', 'Stir in coconut milk. Add prawns and simmer, stirring occasionally, for 2-3 minutes. Add basil leaves, fish sauce and lemon juice, mix well and simmer for a minute. Adjust salt and mix well.', 'Serve hot garnished with spring onion greens.']

title: Pepper Garlic Rice - SK Khazana
method: ['Take Basmati Rice in a bowl. Add water and set aside for 30-40 minutes. Drain the rice and set aside.', 'Heat sufficient water in a nonstick pan, add salt and rice, cook till  3/4  done. Strain and set aside.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add spring onion bulb and garlic saute for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add green capsicum, red capsicum, and yellow capsicum and saute for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add rice and mix well. Add salt, crushed pepper and soy sauce and mix well.', 'Add vinegar and spring onion greens mix well.', 'Serve hot garnished with fried garlic and spring onion greens.']

title: Chicken Meatball Pulav
method: ['Heat ghee in a deep non-stick pan, add cumin seeds, cloves, green cardamoms and bay leaves and saute for a minute. Add onions and saute till lightly browned.', 'Add some of the garlic and ginger and saute well. Add1 teaspoon garam masala powder and rice and mix well. Add chicken stock and salt and mix well. Cover and cook till the rice is done.', 'Grind chicken, remaining garlic, ginger, coriander leaves, mint leaves, fried onions, green chillies, salt and the remaining garam masala powder to a fine paste. Transfer this on a plate, dampen your palms in water and shape them into balls.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Break egg in a bowl, add salt and whisk well. Dip meatballs in it and deep-fry them in hot oil till golden and crisp on all the sides. Drain them on absorbent paper.', 'Add the fried meatballs to the rice and mix well. Add fried onions. Cover and cook for 2 minutes.']

title: Chutney Vegetable Pulao - SK Khazana
method: ['Put coriander leaves, green chillies, garlic, scraped coconut, lemon juice and salt in a blender jar, add sufficient water and blend to a fine paste.', 'Heat ghee in a deep non-stick pan, add bay leaves, cloves, black peppercorns and onions, mix and saute till onions turn golden brown.', 'Add carrot, French beans, cauliflower and green peas, mix well. Add ginger-garlic paste and saute for a minute.', 'Add the rice and saute well. Add the chutney, salt and 3 cups water and mix well.', 'Cover and cook for 12-15 minutes.']

title: Corn Sprouts Bhel
ingredients: ['1 cup sweet corn kernels, boiled', ' 1/2  cup mixed sprouts', '1 large potato, boiled and peeled', '1 small beetroot, boiled, peeled and cut into small cubes', '1 medium onion, chopped', '2 tablespoons date and tamarind chutney', '2 tablespoons green chutney', ' 1/2  small raw mango, chopped', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh coriander leaves', '3 tablespoons sev', '6-8 crisp papdi']
method: ['Boil water in a deep non-stick pan, add mixed sprouts and cook until the sprouts are cooked.', 'Cut potato in to small cubes. Drain sprouts and set aside to cool.', 'Mix corn, potato and sprouts in a bowl.', 'Add beetroot, onion, date and tamarind chutney and green chutney and mix well.', 'Add raw mango, lemon juice, coriander leaves and sev and mix well.', 'Break the papdi and add to the bhel and mix. Pack the bhel in tiffin box.']

title: Rabri
method: ['Blanch the almonds and pistachios, peel and slice them thinly.', 'Bring the milk to the boil then cook slowly on low heat for at least 30-40 minutes. Stir frequently and let the cream thicken at the edge of the pan.', 'Add the sugar and stir until the milk is less than quarter the original amount.', 'Scrape the cream formed on the sides back into the milk. When ready, stir in the rose water and pour into a glass dish.', 'Garnish with sliced almonds, pistachios and cardamom powder. Rabri may be served either hot or chilled.']

title: Prawn Cutlet
method: ['Shell, de-vein and wash the prawns thoroughly. Boil with a little salt, drain and chop them. Soak the bread in cold water for five minutes, squeeze out the water and blend in food processor until smooth.', 'Peel and finely chop the onion. Wash, peel and grate the ginger. Peel and finely chop garlic. Wash, remove the stem and finely chop the green chillies. Clean, wash and chop the coriander leaves.', 'Heat oil over medium heat, fry the chopped onions, chopped green chillies, chopped garlic and grated ginger for about 6-8 minutes.', 'Add coriander powder, turmeric powder and garam masala powder, stir fry for 1 minute. Add salt, pepper powder and chopped coriander cook for 30 seconds. Add the chopped prawns, bread mixture and lemon juice.', 'Remove from heat, mix thoroughly. Chill for atleast two hours. Divide the mixture into 12 equal portions and shape into cutlets.', 'Dust them with flour, then dip in beaten egg and roll in bread crumbs. Ensure that the cutlets are coated properly.', 'Heat oil and deep fry till golden brown.']

title: Solapuri Amti
ingredients: ['2 cups cooked split pigeon peas (toor dal)', '2 tablespoons oil', '1 teaspoon mustard seeds', '1 teaspoon cumin seeds', ' 1/4  teaspoon asafoetida (hing)', '10-12 curry leaves', '10-12 garlic cloves, crushed', '2 medium tomatoes, chopped', 'Salt to taste', ' 1/2  teaspoon red chilli powder', ' 1/4  teaspoon turmeric powder', '1 teaspoon kala masala', '2 teaspoons kanda-lasoon masala', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh coriander leaves + for garnish', '2 tablespoons scraped fresh coconut', 'Steamed rice to serve']
method: ['Heat oil in a deep non-stick pan. Add mustard seeds and cumin seeds and saute for a few seconds. Add asafoetida and curry leaves and mix well.', 'Add garlic and saute till brown. Add tomatoes and mix well. Add salt, mix and cook for 3-4 minutes.', 'Add red chilli powder, turmeric powder, kala masala and kanda-lasoon masala and mix well.', 'Add cooked toor dal and mix well. Add 1 cup water, mix and cook for 4-5 minutes.', 'Add coriander leaves and coconut and mix well. Switch the heat off.', 'Garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot with steamed rice.']
Main ingredients: Split pigeon peas (toor dal), Mustard seeds, Cumin seeds, Asafoetida, Garlic, Tomatoes, Kala masala, Kanda lasoon masala, Fresh coconut

title: Chocolate Macaroons
method: ['Preheat the oven to 110degC/225degF/Gas Mark  1/4 .', 'Sift the ground almonds and cocoa powder together in a bowl.', 'Beat the egg whites until stiff but not dry. Beat in the sugar, a little at a time, until the mixture becomes thick and glossy and form stiff peaks.', 'Fold in the almond-cocoa mixture, vanilla essence and edible chocolate colour, taking care to fold in one direction only.', 'Pour this mixture into a piping bag and pipe small rounds of three-fourth-inch diameter onto a baking tray lined with a silicon sheet.', 'Place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for forty to forty-five minutes or till crisp.', 'Remove the tray from the oven, cool the macaroons on a wire rack and serve.']

title: Broccoli Tart - SK Khazana
method: ['Preheat the oven at 180@C.', 'In a food processor, broccoli, garlic, salt, crushed black peppercorns, grate parmesan cheese, and olive oil, and process to a coarse paste.', 'Divide the mixture into equal portions and stuff each silicon cupcake mould with a portion of the mixture. Press on all sides to even out the thickness.', 'Place a piece of butter paper into each mould and add dried beans. Bake for 10-15 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, for the stuffing, take cream cheese in a large bowl. Add salt, crushed black peppercorns, chop chives and parsley and add them to the bowl.', 'Add garlic granules and dried red chilli flakes and whisk. Add milk and mix well.', 'Take the moulds out of the oven, discard the butter paper and beans. Place them back in the oven and bake for another 5-10 minutes.', 'Remove from the oven and allow to cool. Gently de-mould the tarts.', 'Pipe out the prepared mixture into each tart and top it with red and yellow cherry tomatoes.', 'Garnish with parsley sprigs and serve.']

title: Chocolate Yogurt Icecream
method: ['Take yogurt in a bowl, add chocolate ganache and condensed milk and mix well.', 'Transfer the mixture into an airtight container, spread chocolate chips on top. Close the container with its lid on and freeze for 8-12 hours.', 'Scoop out and put into serving glasses. Garnish with chocolate chips and serve immediately.']

title: Chicken Ala Kiev
method: ['Take butter in a bowl, add parsley, thyme and oregano and 1 teaspoon garlic and mix well.', 'Slit the chicken breasts without cutting them through and open them out.', 'Put the herbed butter into a piping bag and snip off a little bit of its pointed end, Place the chicken breasts on the worktop and sprinkle a little salt and a little crushed peppercorns over them.', 'Pipe a generous amount of butter in the centre of the chicken breasts. Bring one side of each breast over the butter and tuck it in and roll so that the butter is completely enclosed.', 'Keep the rolls on a plate and put it in the refrigerator for 5 minutes.', 'Spread the refined flour and breadcrumbs on two separate plates. Break the eggs into a bowl and whisk.', 'Roll the chicken rolls in flour and dip in the egg ensuring that the chicken rolls are completely coated with egg. Now roll them in the breadcrumbs ensuring that they are completely coated with the breadcrumbs.', 'Dip the rolls in the egg again and roll in the breadcrumbs thus giving the rolls a double coating. Keep the rolls on a plate and place them in the refrigerator for  1/2  hour.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a deep pan. Gently slide in one roll at a time and deep fry till golden. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Cut the rolls diagonally into two pieces each and serve hot.']

title: Green Moong Makhani
Main ingredients: Whole green grams, Kidney beans, Ginger, Garlic, Onions, Tomatoes, Fresh cream, Kasuri methi

title: Bhindi Kadhi - SK Khazana
method: ['Take yogurt in a large bowl, add gram flour and  1/4  tsp turmeric powder and whisk well. Add 3 cups of water and whisk till you get a smooth mixture with no lumps.', 'Heat 2 tbsps oil in a deep non-stick pan, add mustard seeds and let them splutter. Add fenugreek seeds, green chillies and ginger, asafoetida and 10-12 curry leaves, mix and saute for a minute. Add dried red chilli and mix well.', 'Add onion and mix well. Add salt and saute for 2 minutes or till onion turns translucent. Add the yogurt mixture and mix well. Cook on low heat for 12-15 minutes.', 'Heat remaining oil in a non-stick pan, add lady fingers, salt, red chilli powder and remaining turmeric powder and mix well. Saute for 8-10 minutes.', 'Transfer the kadhi into a serving bowl, top up with the sauteed lady fingers and drizzle chilli oil. Serve hot with a bowl of steamed rice.']

title: Chatpati Lasoon Mirch
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan.', 'Chop the green chillies into thick rings.', 'Take the garlic in a mortar and crush with the pestle.', 'Add garlic to the oil and cook on low heat till golden. Add chillies, saute and cook for -3 minutes. Drizzle some water and mix well. Add salt and fry on low heat.', 'Add butter and cook on low heat for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add 1 teaspoon chaat masala, chilli powder and cumin powder and mix well.', 'Add some water, stir and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Switch off the heat and add chopped coriander and lemon juice, mix well.', 'Serve hot garnished with remaining chaat masala and chilli powder.']

title: Dragon Chicken
method: ['Thinly slice chicken breasts and put into a bowl. Add salt,  1/2  teaspoon chilli powder, 1 teaspoon garam masala powder, crushed peppercorns and ginger-garlic paste and mix well. Set aside to marinate for 30 minutes.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a pan.', 'Add cornstarch and refined flour and some chicken stock to the chicken and mix well.', 'Deep-fry chicken in hot oil till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Cut bell peppers into triangles. Deseed and cut tomatoes into triangles.', 'To prepare sauce, heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan. Add ginger and saute for 30 seconds. Add green chillies, mix and saute for 10-15 seconds. Add garlic, mix and saute till golden.', 'Add spring onion bulbs, toss and saute till golden. Add tomato and bell pepper triangles and toss.', 'Add remaining chilli powder, crushed peppercorns and remaining garam masala powder and toss.']

title: Spaghetti Bolognese
method:
['Boil sufficient water in a deep pan, add salt, 2 tsps oil, spaghetti and cook till al-dante.', 'Heat remaining oil in a non-stick pan, add garlic, celery and onion and mix well. Cook for 1-2 minutes.
Add carrot and saute for 2 minutes. Add mutton mince and saute for 4-5 minutes on high heat.', 'Add tomato concasse and tomato puree, mix well. Add crushed black peppercorns, garam masala and saute for 1 minute.
Add red chilli powder, salt and continue cooking till the sauce thickens.', 'Strain spaghetti with the help of strainer.
Place the portion of spaghetti on a serving plate and top with the prepared sauce.
Grate some parmesan cheese on it and garnish with parsley sprigs. Serve hot.']

title: Vegetable Ribbons
method: ['Take a potato peeler or a manual slicer and cut zucchini, carrots and cucumbers lengthwise into thin ribbons. Sprinkle a little salt and set aside for five minutes.', 'Blend vinegar, soy sauce, brown sugar, red chilli flakes, basil leaves and salt to make a coarse paste. Transfer it into a bowl. Squeeze the cut vegetables to remove extra moisture.', 'Add vegetables to the dressing in the bowl along with celery and toss well. Serve garnished with olive slices.']

title: Peanut Butter Chocolate Brownie Icecream - Cook Sm
method: ['Put honey and peanut butter into a bowl and beat well with an electric beater. Add 8 scoops of vanilla ice cream and beat again. Roughly crumble brownies and add to the bowl and continue to beat taking care that some brownie pieces remain.', 'Transfer the mixture into a silicon mould.', 'Put 2 scoops of vanilla ice cream in another bowl and beat well. Spoon dollops of this ice cream over the peanut-vanilla mixture in the mould and create marble effects with a spoon.', 'Cover the silicon mould with a lid and refrigerate till frozen.', 'Serve chilled.']

title: Kadhi Kachori-SK Khazana
method: ['To make the filling, heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds, ginger, garlic, fennel seeds, coriander seeds, green chillies and crushed peppercorns and saute well.', 'Add onion, mix and saute till it is well browned. Add dried mango powder, chilli powder and salt and mix.', 'Add coriander leaves and mix well. Remove from heat and set aside to cool.', 'Divide the kachori into equal portions, stuff each portion with a spoonful of filling, shape into balls and roll out into thick kachoris.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Deep-fry kachoris till golden brown. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Place a kachori into each serving bowls and break into large pieces. Pour a ladleful of kadhi on top, drizzle some tamarind chutney and green chutney.', 'Sprinkle some coriander leaves and serve immediately.']

title: Stuffed Cauliflower Parantha
method: ['Put wheat flour, refined flour, salt and 1 teaspoon oil in a bowl. Add water as required and knead into a soft dough. Set aside.', 'Take cauliflower in a bowl. Add coriander leaves, green chillies, salt and lemon juice and mix well.', 'Heat remaining oil in a tempering pan. Add mustard seeds and let them splutter. Add asafoetida and pour tempering in the cauliflower mixture. Mix well.', 'Divide the dough into equal portions and roll out into medium discs, dusting with wheat flour.', 'Place a disc on the worktop. Put generous amount of cauliflower mixture on it, spread and cover with another disc. Seal the edges and roll out into a parantha. Similarly prepare the remaining paranthas.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa. Place a parantha on it and roast for a minute. Flip, drizzle some ghee on top and let the other side cook for a minute. Flip again, drizzle some more ghee on top and cook for another minute.', 'Cut into wedges and serve hot.']

title: Breakfast Juice
method: ['Roughly chop bottle gourd, carrots, green apple and red apple. Peel orange.', 'Place the chopped vegetables, fruits, spinach leaves and ginger in a blender jar and blend well to extract the juices. Discard the solid mass.', 'Add lemon juice and black salt to the juice and mix well.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Pepper Crusted Chicken
ingredients: ['3 chicken thighs on the bone', ' 1/2  cup crushed black peppercorns', 'Salt to taste', '1 lemon', '1 1/2  tablespoons ginger-garlic paste', '1 tablespoon green chilli paste', '2 tablespoons red chilli sauce', '2 tablespoons tomato ketchup', '1 tablespoon dark soy sauce', 'Oil for brushing', 'Salad to serve']
method: ['Make incisions on chicken thighs on all sides. Sprinkle salt. Squeeze the juice of  1/2  lemon and rub in well.', 'Take ginger-garlic paste in a large bowl, squeeze the juice of the remaining lemon into it, add green chilli paste, red chilli sauce, tomato ketchup and dark soy sauce and mix well.', 'Dip the chicken thighs in this marinade till they are well coated and set aside to marinate for 30 minutes.', 'Spread crushed black peppercorns on a plate, roll the marinated chicken in the peppercorns so that they are well coated on all sides.', 'Light sufficient charcoal in a barbeque, insert the prepared chicken on the skewers and place them on the barbeque grill. Cook till the chicken is cooked completely, rotating and brushing with oil occasionally. Take them off the heat.', 'Arrange them on a serving plate, and serve hot with salad.']

title: Makki Ki Roti Sarson Ka Saag Pizza
method: ['Preheat the oven to 250degC. Quarter the tomatoes, deseed and cut into long batons. Place a makki ki roti on a pizza pan. Spread sarson ka saag over the roti.', 'Spread sliced onions and sprinkle some corn kernels. Spread mozzarella cheese and put some more sliced onion and corn kernels on top. Decorate with tomato batons.', 'Drizzle some olive oil and bake in a preheated oven for eight to ten minutes. Serve hot.']

title: Tawa Mithai Chaat
method: ['Heat the tawa. Cut all the mithais into smaller pieces and arrange them on the rim of the tawa. Put rabdi in the middle. Leave the mithais like this for some time.', 'Toss batches of assorted mithai in rabdi and serve hot.']

title: Instant Panjeeri
method: ['Blend the biscuits to a coarse powder and transfer into a bowl.', 'Blend sugar to a fine powder and transfer into another bowl.', 'Heat ghee in a deep non-stick pan, add gond and fry till puffed and crisp. Drain into a third bowl.', 'Add almonds and raisins to the same pan. When raisins become puff up, add pistachios and biscuit powder and mix well. Add fried gond and mix well and switch off heat. Crush the gond.', 'Transfer into a bowl and lightly crush the mixture. Add powdered sugar. Again crush the mixture. Add a pinch of salt and mix well.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.']

title: Soya Falafel
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Put soya granules and chickpeas in a blender jar. Add mint sprigs, coriander leaves, green chillies, garlic, ginger, red chilli powder, pepper powder and chaat masala and blend to a coarse paste. Transfer into a bowl, add salt and onion and mix well.', 'To make salad, slice onion. Cut capsicum into thin strips. Halve tomato, discard seeds and cut it into thin strips and transfer all of them into a bowl. Roughly chop coriander sprigs and add and mix well. Add lemon juice and salt and mix well.', 'To make a dip, mix yogurt, lemon juice, garlic paste and salt into a bowl and mix well.', 'Divide the soya mixture into 16 equal portions, shape them into balls and deep-fry in hot oil for 2-3 minutes. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Transfer the salad into a serving bowl, add green and black olives and place it on one side of a serving plate. Put the dip into another serving bowl and place on the other side of the plate. Garnish with a mint sprig, place falafels in centre of the plate and serve immediately. OR', 'Place chapattis on a worktop, spread salad on one side, keep a falafel in the centre, drizzle dip over it, top with sliced black and green olives, roll and serve immediately.']

title: Sitaphal Basundi
method: ['Boil milk in a deep non-stick pan, stirring frequently, till it is reduced to half. Keep scraping the sides of the pan and mixing with milk.', 'Meanwhile break open the custard apples and scoop the seeds and mash through a strainer, to separate the flesh from the seeds, into a bowl. Some pieces may not get separated from the seeds so collect these pieces in another bowl and remove their seeds.', 'Add condensed milk, cashewnuts, almonds and green cardamom powder to the reduced milk and mix well. Cook on low heat for 5-6 minutes or till it thickens a little more. Scrape the sides occasionally.', 'Put a ladle of the milk mixture into a bowl, add saffron along with water and mix well. Refrigerate for 40-50 minutes.', 'Add the remaining milk mixture to the custard apple pulp. Add 2 tbsps of chunky pieces. Mix well. Refrigerate it for 40-50 minutes.', 'Brush the rims of serving glasses with honey. Take crushed pistachios in a plate and roll the rims of the and roll over it.', 'Fill each serving glass till  3/4  with plain sitafal basundi and add 2 spoons of saffron basundi on top. Serve chilled.']

title: Mirchi Vada
method: ['Slit chillies and deseed them.', 'Heat 1 tbsp oil in a non-stick pan. Crush coarsely coriander seeds and cumin seeds in a mortar with a pestle and add to the pan. Saute for a minute.', 'Add  1/2  tsp turmeric powder, asafoetida, 1 tsp red chilli powder, salt and 1 tsp pepper powder. Mix well and saute for  1/2  a minute.', 'Add potatoes and a little water, mix well and cook for 2 minutes.', 'Switch off heat and transfer mixture into a bowl. Add cheese and mix well.', '6. Stuff the chillies with potato-cheese mixture.', 'Take urad dal batter in a bowl. Add salt, remaining red chilli powder, remaining pepper powder and remaining turmeric powder and mix well.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Dip stuffed chillies in the batter, coat evenly and deep-fry in hot oil till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot with tomato chutney.']

title: Apricot Upside Down Pudding
method: ['Preheat oven to 180degC. Grease an aluminium cake tin with little butter and dust with a little flour.', 'Sift together flour, baking powder and cinnamon powder into a bowl.', 'Cream butter and brown sugar in another bowl till light and fluffy.', 'Add egg and keep beating. Add sifted ingredients and mix well. Add milk and mix again.', 'Pour honey in the prepared tin and spread it all over.', 'Mix apricots and peaches in a bowl and mix well. Transfer this over the honey in the tin and spread evenly.', 'Pour batter over the fruits and spread evenly. Pat the tin lightly.', 'Place it in the preheated oven and bake for 30-40 minutes.', 'Remove from oven. Turn upside down on a plate, slice and serve.']

title: Yule Log
method: ['Preheat oven at 180oC.', 'Separate egg yolks from the egg whites.', 'In a bowl, put egg yolks,  1/2  cup + 2 tablespoons of castor sugar, vanilla essence and beat with an egg beater till ribbon consistency is formed.', 'Whip the egg whites till soft peaks are formed and add the remaining castor sugar gradually and keep on whipping till firm peaks are formed.', 'Fold the egg whites with the egg yolk gently. Sift together refined flour, cocoa powder and salt into the mixture and fold till well combined.', 'Transfer the mixture to a baking tray lined with butter paper. Put the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 12-15 minutes.', 'Remove from the oven, dust some icing sugar and roll it into a log and allow it to cool.', 'To make butter sugar icing, put butter in a bowl. Sift together the icing sugar and cocoa powder into it and beat till creamy.', 'Open the log and spread half of the butter cream mixture reserving some evenly, roll again into a log and refrigerate for half an hour.', 'Cut the prepared log into half and shape it into a yule log, spread the reserved butter sugar icing, garnish with cherries and serve.']

title: Burani Espanaaj
ingredients: ['1 1/2 cups yogurt', '25-30 spinach leaves (palak)', '2 tablespoons oil', '2 medium onions sliced', '5-6 cloves garlic chopped', 'Salt to taste', '1/2 teaspoon black pepper powder']
method: ['Shred spinach leaves and then chop finely. Heat oil in a non stick pan, add onions and garlic and saute till lightly browned.', 'Add spinach and mix and saute. Add salt, pepper powder and cook till dry. Set aside in a bowl in the refrigerator to cool completely. Keep aside a little spinach for garnish and add yogurt to the rest and mix well.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with reserved spinach and serve chilled.']

title: Methi aur Kishmish Chutney
method: ['Finely chop ginger.', 'Heat mustard oil in a non-stick pan. Mix together mustard seeds, cumin seeds, onion seeds, fennel seeds and fenugreek seeds in a bowl to make panch phoran and add it to the pan with ginger and saute till fragrant.', 'Add soaked fenugreek seeds and saute for half a minute.', 'Add red chilli powder, turmeric powder, black pepper powder, sugar and jaggery and cook till both sugar and jaggery melt.', 'Add black salt, dried mango powder and salt and mix well.', 'Heat oil in a small non-stick pan, add raisins and saute for 3-4 minutes and add to the methi chutney.', 'Add lemon juice and mix well.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, cool and serve as required.']

title: Chicken Vindaloo Tacos
method: ['Put chicken pieces in a bowl. Add turmeric powder and salt, mix well and set aside to marinate.', 'Grind together vinegar, ginger, cumin seeds, coriander seeds, garlic cloves, cinnamon and dried red chilies with some water into a smooth paste.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add cardamoms, peppercorns and cloves and saute for 30 seconds', 'Add green chilies and onions, mix and saute till golden. Add marinated chicken, mix and cook for 2 minutes.', 'Add ground paste and mix well. Add little water, mix well and cook till the chicken is done.', 'Add sugar and potatoes, mix well and cook till the sugar melts. Add 1 tablespoon coriander leaves and mix well. Remove from heat.', 'Fill the taco shells with the chicken vindaloo. Garnish with coriander leaves, drizzle sour cream on top and serve immediately.']

title: Bread Upma-SK Khazana
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add mustard seeds and saute till the seeds splutter. Add cumin seeds and curry leaves and saute till leaves crackle.', 'Add onions and saute till it turns translucent. Add chopped and slit green chillies and potatoes and mix.', 'Add some water, salt and turmeric powder, mix well, cover and cook till the potatoes are done.', 'Cut bread slices into small cubes, add to the pan and mix well. Add some water, mix and let it get heated through.', 'Switch off heat, add lemon juice and coriander leaves and mix well.', 'Garnish with coriander sprig and serve hot.']

title: Prawn Seekh on Asparagus - SK khazana
method: ['Put the prawns in a food processor jar. Chop spring onion bulbs, garlic, ginger, and green chilli and add.', 'Squeeze the juice of  1/2  lemon into the jar, add garam masala, salt, a few mint leaves and some spring onion greens and process to a fine paste.', 'Break an egg, separate egg yolk into a bowl and add the egg white to the prawns mixture and mix well. Transfer this mixture into a bowl.', 'Dip your hands in water and apply a portion of the mixture around the asparagus evenly to form a seekh.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick grill pan. Sprinkle some black sesame seeds and some white sesame seeds on each seekh and place them in the grill pan. Grill till the underside is cooked and grill marks appear. Flip and grill till the other side is similarly cooked.', 'Place them on a serving plate, garnish with micro greens, cherry tomatoes and lemon wedges and serve hot.']

title: Onion Rings-SK Khazana
method: ['Mix together flour, crushed peppercorns, chilli powder, mustard paste, onion powder, garlic powder and mixed herbs in a bowl. Add sufficient water and mix well into a batter of coating consistency. Add salt and mix.', 'Coarsely crush cornflakes with breadcrumbs and spread on a plate.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Coat onion rings first with the batter and then with cornflakes mixture and deep-fry in hot oil till golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot with tomato ketchup.']

title: Orange Caramel Custard
method: ['Preheat the oven to 180degC. Boil the orange rind in half a cup of water for five minutes. Strain and cool Mix this liquid with the orange juice. Cut candied peel into thin strips. Break eggs and mix it lightly with the sugar.', 'Make caramel by taking three tablespoons of water in a heavy bottom pan and adding half a cup of sugar to it. Cook till the sugar melts and turns golden brown remove from heat to avoid burning of sugar.', 'Pour this caramel into individual cups and keep warm. Heat orange juice for three minutes and mix with the egg-sugar mixture mixing quickly to avoid cooking of eggs.', 'Strain and pour this mixture into the caramel-lined cups. Cover with greaseproof paper. Arrange a tray in the preheated oven, pour boiling water into it.', 'Place the covered cups in it and bake for thirty minutes. Allow to cool, place in refrigerator for two hours till properly chilled. De-mould and serve chilled garnished with strips of candied peel.']

title: Coconut Chutney
method: ['Grind green chillies, Bengal gram and scraped coconut to make a coarse paste. Add yogurt and salt and grind to make a fine paste. Add some water, grind again and transfer into a bowl.', 'For tempering, heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add black gram and saute till golden. Add mustard seeds and let them splutter. Add curry leaves, remove from heat, add the tempering to coconut mixture and mix well.', 'Serve.']

title: Chatpata Aloo Chaat
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a kadai and deep-fry potatoes till golden and drain on absorbent paper. Similarly deep-fry sweet potatoes and drain on absorbent paper.', 'Transfer both into a bowl, add black salt, chaat masala, dried mango powder, salt and red chilli powder and toss well.', 'Transfer onto a serving plate, drizzle sweetened yogurt, date and tamarind chutney, green chutney, cabbage, beetroot and coriander leaves on top. Serve immediately.']

title: Thin Mints
method: ['Sift refined flour, baking powder and cocoa powder into a bowl.', 'Beat castor sugar and butter in another bowl with an electric beater till light and fluffy.', 'Add eggs, one at time, and continue to beat till the mixture is light and fluffy.', 'Melt hundred grams of chocolate in a microwave. Allow to cool and add to the egg mixture. Fold in with a spatula.', 'Add half the chopped chocolate to the flour mixture and mix well.', 'Add the flour mixture, little by little, to the butter-sugar mixture and fold in well. Refrigerate for thirty five to forty minutes.', 'Preheat the oven to 180oC.', 'Dust some flour on the worktop. Take a portion of the cookie dough and roll out into a thin sheet.', 'Cut with a cookie cutter. Arrange them on a baking tray. Bake in the preheated oven for fifteen minutes.', 'Melt the remaining chopped chocolate in the microwave. Dip the cookies in the melted chocolate and sprinkle the sprinklers on top.', 'Arrange them on a serving plate and serve immediately.']

title: Punjabi Anda Bhurji
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add onions and saute till light brown. Add ginger, green chillies and tomatoes and continue to saute.', 'Break eggs into a bowl and add salt and whisk lightly.', 'Pour the eggs mixture into the pan and cook stirring continuously till almost dry.', 'Lower the heat and saute till dry. Add coriander leaves and serve hot with ajwain flavoured paranthas or bread.']

title: Orange Risotto
method: ['Heat two tablespoons butter in a non-stick pan, add rice and saute well.', 'Add milk, gradually, and stir continuously. Add orange juice, stir well and cook till the rice is done.', 'Add cream, saffron strands, almonds and pistachios and mix well.', 'Add the remaining butter, mix well and switch off the heat. Serve warm.']

title: Choco Bite Ice Cream
method: ['Combine cream, milk, milk powder, 2 tablespoons chopped chocolate in a blender jar and blend well.', 'Pour the mixture into a silicon mould and add remaining chopped chocolate on top. Cover and freeze for 7-8 hours.', 'Scoop and serve.']

title: Nadru ke Kabab
method: ['Roughly chop lotus stems and put in a mixer jar.', 'Roughly chop green chilli and coriander sprigs and add to the mixer and grind to a coarse paste. Add salt, red chilli powder, black pepper powder and cumin powder.', 'Quarter potato and add to the mixer and grind again till smooth. Transfer into a bowl. Add breadcrumbs and mix well.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a non-stick pan.', 'Grease your palms with oil, divide the lotus stem mixture into 12 equal portions and shape them into tikkis.', 'Shallow-fry the tikkis in hot oil, turning sides, till crisp and brown on both sides.', 'Arrange kababs on a serving plate, garnish with micro greens and capsicum curls and serve hot.']

title: Vanilla Baked Cheesecake
method: ['Preheat oven at 180oC.', 'Combine biscuit crumbs and 50 grams castor sugar in a bowl and mix well. Add butter and mix again.', 'Pour the mixture in a spring bottom cake tin, press and line the tin pressing along the edges as well. Refrigerate for 15-20 minutes.', 'Take cream cheese in a food processor and process till smooth. Scrape off the sides and blades and process once again.', 'Add remaining castor sugar and process till well blended. Add one egg at a time and process for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add cream, refined flour, vanilla essence and lemon rind and fold lightly with the help of a spatula.', 'Pour cream cheese mixture into the tin, level it out and tap lightly. Place the tin on a baking tray, put the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 15 minutes. Lower the temperature to 120oC and bake further for 40-45 minutes.', 'Remove from heat and cool to room temperature. Demould, cut into wedges, garnish with whipped cream swirls and serve.']

title: Aloo Tarkari
method: ['Heat mustard oil in a non-stick pan, add panch phoran and let the seeds splutter. Break the dried red chillies and add them to the pan. Add the potatoes and saute well.', 'Add turmeric powder, saute and cook for 3-4 minutes. Add red chilli powder, cumin powder, and saute well. Cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add salt, sugar and 2 cups of water, mix well. Cover and cook till the potatoes are completely cooked.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Maggi Parantha - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat butter in a non-stick pan, add green chillies and onion and saute till translucent. Add tomato and saute well.', 'Add salt, mix well and saute till the mixture is pulpy. Add turmeric powder, red chilli powder, coriander powder and garam masala powder and mix well.', 'Add  1/4  cup water and mix well. Add coriander leaves and mix well. Add 1 1/2  cups water and let the mixture come to a boil.', 'Add the taste maker and mix well. Crush and add the noodles and cook till the noodles are done and the water absorbed.', 'Transfer the noodles into a bowl and add grated cheese, mix well and set aside to cool.', 'Divide the dough into 4 equal portions and shape them into balls and flatten them slightly. Dust the worktop with some dry flour, place a ball on it and roll into a small roti. Place some noodles in the centre of the roti, gather the edges and press them together to seal. Roll it out into a parantha. Similarly make more paranthas with the remaining dough balls and noodles.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa, place a parantha on it and cook on both sides for 1 minute each. Apply ghee on both sides and cook till evenly golden brown on both sides.', 'Transfer the paranthe on a serving plate and serve hot with yogurt.']

title: Veg Biryani
method: ['Heat 1 tablespoon butter and 3 tablespoons ghee in a deep non-stick pan. Add caraway seeds and when it changes colour, add ginger-garlic paste, mix and saute for 30 seconds.', 'Add carrots, cauliflower florets and French beans, mix well, cover and cook for 3-4 minutes.', 'Add chilli powder, turmeric powder and biryani masala, mix and cook for 1-2 minutes. Add yogurt, mix, cover and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add 2 tablespoons coriander leaves, 2 tablespoons mint leaves, 3-4 tablespoons fried onions and salt, mix well and cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Spread cooked brown rice over the vegetables. Spread 2-3 tablespoons fried onions, remaining coriander leaves, remaining mint leaves and ginger strips.', 'Drizzle saffron milk-cream mixture and remaining ghee on top, cover and seal the lid with wheat flour dough. Cook on low heat for 10-15 minutes.', 'Transfer onto a serving platter, sprinkle some coriander leaves, garnish with a mint sprig and serve hot.']

title: Mango Rasmalai - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat milk in a deep non-stick pan, stir occasionally and let it come to a boil. Switch off the heat.', 'Mix vinegar and 1 cup water in a bowl.', 'Add  1/2  cup water to the milk mixture and stir well. Add the vinegar mixture to the milk, little by little, stirring continuously till the milk curdles.', 'Strain the curdled mixture through a muslin cloth and reserve the whey in a pan. Tie the muslin to make a potli and squeeze out excess water. Dip the potli in icy water till it cool down completely, squeeze excess water and take the chenna out of the muslin potli and place on the worktop.', 'Knead the chenna till smooth, shape it into in a cylinder and divide into small equal portions.', 'Shape each piece into a ball, flatten it slightly and dip it into the whey.', 'Heat sugar and 4 cups of water in another deep non-stick pan and stir till the sugar dissolve completely.', 'Take refined flour in a bowl and add 3 tbsps whey, mix well and add to the sugar mixture. Cover and let the mixture come to a boil.', 'Drop in the chenna patties into the sugar syrup, cover and cook for 2 minutes, drizzle a little whey, cover and cook for 2 minutes. Repeat this process for 10-12 minutes or till the chenna patties spring back when pressed. Drain and let the patties cool down to room temperature. Reserve the sugar syrup.', 'Put reduced milk into a blender jar, add  1/4  cup sugar syrup, mango puree, green cardamom powder, a large pinch of saffron and a few ice cubes and blend into a smooth mixture.', 'Squeeze out the excess sugar syrup from the chenna patties and arrange them in a bowl and pour the mango mixture over them.', 'Sprinkle green cardamom powder, pistachio sliversand saffron strands. Refrigerate 2-3 hours.', 'To serve, place two rasmalai in each serving bowl with some of the mango milk, garnish with a few ripe mango pieces and sprinkle pistachio slivers.']

title: Rice Noodle Fritters
method: ['Take vermicelli in a bowl. Add warm water, cover with cling film and keep till vermicelli softens.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a pan.', 'Strain the soaked vermicelli into a bowl and chop roughly.', 'Add red chillies, crushed fennel seeds, crushed cumin seeds, crushed peppercorns, onion and salt and mix. Add egg white and mix well.', 'Put spoonful of vermicelli mixture directly into hot oil and deep-fry till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot with sweet chilli sauce.']

title: Kadale Chutney
