Prepare chocolate shavings with a peeler.', 'Pipe out cream cheese mixture in alternate cavities of waffle halves.', 'Make a design with some chocolate sauce on one side of a serving platter. Pipe some cream cheese rosettes and place the waffles on the side. Garnish with strawberries, chocolate shavings and mint leaves.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Aloe Vera Aur Methi Ki Subzi
method: ['Heat water in a non stick handi. Add a pinch of turmeric powder and a little salt.Cut aloe vera into small pieces and add to the water.', 'Add methi dana, cover and cook till the water comes to a boil. Strain aloe vera and methi dana and refresh in cold water.', 'Heat oil in a non stick kadai. Add cumin seeds and saute till fragrant. Add asafoetida, ginger, green chillies and saute.', 'Add aloe vera and methi dana and mix well. Add red chilli powder, amchur, remaining turmeric powder, coriander powder, salt and mix well.', 'Add sugar, raisins, lemon juice and mix well. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve.']

title: Ambat Batata
method: ['Halve each potato and further cut each half into four equal pieces. Heat the oil in a non stick pan. Add the mustard seeds. When they splutter, add the cumin seeds and saute briefly.', 'Add the curry leaves, green chillies and stir. Immediately add the onions and saute till golden brown in colour.', 'Add the turmeric powder, potato cubes and stir-fry for one to two minutes. Stir in the yogurt, kokum pieces, half the coriander leaves and half the coconut, salt and lemon juice.', 'Reduce heat and simmer for one to two minutes. Garnish with the remaining coriander, remaining coconut and serve hot.']

title: Lemon Cranberry Cookies
method: ['Preheat the oven to 180o C. Line a baking tray with parchment paper.', 'Cream together the butter and sugar in a bowl till light and fluffy. Add the vanilla essence, egg, lemon zest and lemon juice and mix well.', 'Add the salt, baking powder, baking soda and flour and mix till well combined. Add the cranberries and mix.', 'Divide the mixture into equal portions and place them on the lined tray. Put the tray in the preheated oven and bake for ten to fifteen minutes. Remove from oven and cool.', 'Serve or store in an airtight container for about five days.']

title: Raghavdas Laadoo
method: ['Heat ghee in a kadai and roast rawa on low heat till light brown. In another pan heat sugar and one and half cups of water and make syrup of one string consistency. Heat another pan and roast the scraped coconut on low heat till reddish brown.', 'Keep aside. Add green cardamom powder to the roasted rawa. Mix. Add roasted coconut and mix again. Add syrup, raisins to the rawa mixture and mix. Cover and set aside to cool. Divide the mixture into twenty to twenty four equal portions. Shape each portion into a laadoo and serve.']

title: Egg and Mayo Sandwich
method: ['Take eggs on a plate, lightly mash using a fork. Add onion, chopped coriander and chilli powder and salt and lightly mix.', 'Apply mayonnaise on bread slices and place a generous portion of the prepared mixture on one slice of bread and cover with another slice of bread.', 'Heat butter in a non-stick tawa, place the prepared sandwich on it and cook till golden brown. Flip the sandwich and add butter on the sides.', 'Halve the sandwich and serve hot with tomato ketchup.']

title: Sweetcorn Chowder
method: ['Heat 2 tbsps olive oil in a non stick pan. Chop onion and add along with celery and saute.Add cream style sweet corn and mix.', 'Put the soup packet contents into a bowl, add vegetable stock and mix well.Add this to the pan and mix. Add salt and crushed peppercorns and mix.', 'Put some corn kernels in a soup bowl followed by green capsicum. Grate a little lemon rind over the soup and mix. Add milk and mix and cook till thick.', 'Transfer into a sauce boat and pour over the garnish kept in the soup bowl. Serve piping hot.']

title: Burger Salad
method: ['Put chicken mince, egg, salt, pepper powder and garlic in a bowl and mix well. Chop some of the parsley and add. Mix well.', 'Cut onion into rings.', 'Heat some oil in a non-stick pan.', 'Halve cherry tomatoes. Tear lettuce leaves and place in another bowl.', 'Place a medium size ring mould in the pan, put a portion of the chicken mince mixture in it and press. Place a cheese slice, top with another layer of chicken mixture and press to make a patty. Remove the ring mould carefully, and shallow-fry, flipping, till chicken is fully cooked and the patty turns golden on both sides. Similarly cook remaining patties.', 'Add onion rings in the same pan and saute till caramelized.', 'Add cherry tomatoes to the lettuce. Cut some cheese into small cubes and add with lemon juice, salt, pepper powder and olive oil and toss well.', 'Add 1 teaspoon mustard paste and mix well.', 'Chop remaining parsley and some of the oregano add and mix well. Add half the croutons and toss.', 'Transfer the salad in a serving bowl. Top with caramelized onion and place the patties. Tear remaining oregano and add with remaining croutons. Top with a dollop of tomato ketchup and grate remaining cheese over them. Serve immediately.']

title: Spicy Sprout Rice
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add cloves and asafoetida.', 'As cloves begin to change colour add green chillies, ginger, capsicum and spring onions. Saute for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add turmeric powder, red chilli powder, coriander powder and mixed sprouts and saute for one minute.', 'Add a few tablespoons of water so that the masala does not get scorched and the sprouts get cooked completely. Let the mixture become dry.', 'Add rice and salt to taste and toss well.', 'Serve hot garnished with tomato and coriander leaves.']

title: Quick and Easy Chicken Curry
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add cinnamon, cardamoms and cloves and saute till fragrant.', 'Add onions and saute till well-browned. Add ginger paste and garlic paste, mix well and saute for  1/2  minute.', 'Add turmeric powder, red chilli powder, cumin powder, coriander powder and a little water, mix well and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add tomato puree, mix and add salt. Mix again and cook till oil separates.', 'Add chicken pieces, salt, 1 tablespoon coriander leaves, mix well and add garam masala powder. Mix well, cover and cook on medium heat for 20 minutes.', 'Garnish with remaining coriander leaves and serve hot.']

title: Quinoa Lemon Rice - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan on medium heat, add peanuts and saute for 2 minutes. Add mustard seeds, split Bengal gram, split black gram , broken red chillies. Saute for a few seconds.', 'Add curry leaves and turmeric powder and mix well. Add cooked quinoa and mix well. Add salt, mix well and cook for 3-4 minutes.', 'Add lemon juice and mix well.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander sprig and serve hot.']

title: Sweet Buns
method: ['Preheat oven to 180degC. Grease a baking tray with oil.', 'Add 1-2 tablespoons water to yeast and heat in the microwave for 10 seconds. Remove from heat and mix well.', 'Combine refined flour, salt, milk powder, Sugar Free Natura and activated yeast in a bowl. Add sufficient water and knead into soft dough.', 'Add butter and tutti fruity and knead once again. Cover with a damp muslin cloth and set aside for 10-15 minutes.', 'Divide dough into equal portions and shape them into buns. Place buns on greased tray and sprinkle some more tutti fruity on top. Cover again with a damp muslin cloth and set aside to prove for 20-25 minutes.', 'Apply milk wash on the buns and place tray in preheated oven and bake for 15 minutes.', 'Remove from heat, cool and serve.']

title: Stir Fried Vegetables with Chilli and Basil
method: ['Heat 2 tbsps oil in a non stick pan. Arrange tofu pieces in single layer and cook till undersides turn golden.', 'Turn them over and cook till the other side is equally golden. Drain and set aside.', 'Slice spring onion bulbs and chop fresh red chillies diagonally. Heat 2 tsps oil in same pan, add spring onion bulbs, carrot, broccoli florets and sprinkle little water. Toss and cook for 1 minute.', 'Add  1/4  cup water and mix well. Add soya sauce, salt, sugar, red chillies and mix. Add tofu and fresh basil leaves.', 'Mix well and cook for 3-4 minutes. Add bean sprouts and mix. Transfer into a serving bowl and garnish with fried basil leaves. Serve hot.']

title: Chocolate Momos - SK Khazana
method: ['To make the stuffing, take mixed nuts in a bowl, add desiccared coconut, green cardamom powder and melted dark chocolate and mix well. .', 'Dust some flour on the worktop. Divide the dough into equal portions and roll out into thin disks. Cut into small discs with a cookie cutter.', 'Place some stuffing in the centre of each disc with some chocolate mixture, bring the edges together and shape into momos.', 'Heat sufficient water in a steamer. Place some of the momos in it, cover and steam for 5-7 minutes. Steam the rest of the momos similarly.', 'Arrange them on a serving platter and serve immediately.']

title: Quinoa Dosa - SK khazana
method: ['Put quinoa in a blender jar, add broken green chillies, ginger and  1/2  cup water and blend to a fine paste, Transfer into a large bowl.', 'Now put split skinless black gram, split Bengal gram, split pigeon peas, fenugreek seeds and oats in a blender jar, and blend to a fine paste, adding water as necessary. Transfer this mixture into the same bowl and mix well with your hand.', 'Add water to adjust consistency, mix well. Add salt, mix.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa, pour a ladle of the batter and spread it evenly to form a thin dosa.', 'Drizzle a little oil all around the dosa and cook till the underside turns golden brown. Fold the dosa into half and take it off the tawa. Make more dosas similarly.', 'Place them on serving plates and serve hot with coconut chutney and gunpowder mixed with ghee.']

title: Chicken Meatball Soup
method: ['Heat chicken stock in a non-stick pan. Slice galangal and add to the pan. Quarter onion and add.', 'Cut carrot diagonally into 1 inch pieces. Roughly chop Chinese cabbage.', 'Add cinnamon stick to the pan.', 'Put chicken mince in a mixer. Crush garlic and add to the mixer. Roughly chop spring onions with greens and add along with salt, pepper powder, coriander leaves, cornstarch and grind. Add fish sauce and grind to a smooth paste and transfer the paste into a bowl.', 'Dampen palms in water, make small balls of the ground paste and add to the pan. Cook till the meatballs are done.', 'Drain the meatballs and put into another bowl.', 'Strain the soup through muslin cloth into a third bowl.', 'Place the same pan back on heat, pour the strained soup into it, add carrot pieces, lemon juice and salt and mix well. Add cabbage and mix well. Cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Place the meatballs in a serving bowl, pour the chicken soup over it, garnish with coriander leaves and serve piping hot.']

title: Green Masala Egg Curry
method: ['Boil eggs, cool and peel.', 'To make green masala, put coriander leaves, mint leaves, ginger, garlic, green chillies, lemon juice and some water into a blender jar and blend into a fine mixture.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds and saute till their colour changes. Add onion paste, mix and saute for 2-3 minutes or till light golden.', 'Add turmeric powder and coriander powder, mix and saute for a minute. Add the green masala and mix well. Add salt and  1/2  cup water, mix and simmer for a minute.', 'Make some slits in the eggs and add to the gravy and mix lightly. Add garam masala powder, mix and simmer for 1-2 minutes.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with a coriander sprig and serve hot.']

title: Aloo Nazakat
ingredients: ['4 large oval shaped potatoes', 'Oil to deep fry', ' 1/2  cup grated cottage cheese (paneer)', '2 tablespoons chopped fried cashewnuts', '1 tablespoon chopped raisins', 'A few sprigs fresh coriander leaves', 'A few sprigs fresh mint leaves', 'Salt to taste', '1 teaspoon red chilli powder', '2 teaspoons green chilli paste', '1 tablespoon finely chopped ginger', '1  1/2  teaspoon chaat masala', '1 teaspoon garam masala powder', '1 cup hung yogurt', '1 tablespoon garlic paste', '1 tablespoon ginger paste', ' 1/2  cup roasted chana dal powder', ' 1/4  teaspoon turmeric powder', ' 1/2  teaspoon cumin powder', ' 1/2  teaspoon dried fenugreek leaf (kasoori methi) powder']
method: ['Preheat oven to 200deg C.', 'Peel potatoes and scoop out from centre to make a barrel. Reserve the scooped out portions.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai and deep fry the potatoes till light golden. Drain on absorbent paper and set aside. Similarly deep fry the scooped out portions of the potatoes till golden, drain on absorbent paper and set aside.', 'Mix together cottage cheese, fried scooped out potato portions, cashewnuts and raisins in a bowl.', 'Chop mint leaves and coriander leaves and add to the bowl.  Add salt,  1/2  teaspoon red chilli powder, 1 teaspoon green chilli paste and chopped ginger.', 'Add1 teaspoon chaat masala and  1/2  teaspoon garam masala powder and mash well while mixing.', 'In another bowl mix hung yogurt, garlic paste, ginger paste, roasted chana dal powder, salt, turmeric powder, remaining red chilli powder, cumin powder, remaining chaat masala, dried fenugreek leaf powder, remaining garam masala powder, remaining green chilli paste and 1 tablespoon hot oil and mix well.', 'Stuff potatoes with the cottage cheese mixture. Grease a non-stick baking tray.', 'Apply yogurt marinade generously over the stuffed potatoes and place in the baking tray. Keep the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes.', 'Halve the potatoes vertically, arrange them in a serving plate and serve hot.']

title: Mooli ka Parantha
method: ['Take whole wheat flour in a large bowl, add salt, red chilli powder, green chillies, carom seeds and coriander leaves. Snip a few fresh radish micro greens, roughly chop them and add them to the flour mixture. Add ghee and mix well. Add sufficient water and knead into semi-soft dough. Cover and rest for 10-15 minutes.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa.', 'Divide the dough into equal portions and shape them into balls. Slightly flatten them, dust them with a little dry flour and roll out into slightly thick discs.', 'Place the prepared discs on the hot tawa and roast for 1 minute. Flip, apply some ghee and flip again. Apply some ghee on the other side too and cook, turning sides, till both sides till and evenly golden.', 'Cut each parantha into 4 triangles, arrange them on a serving platter, garnish with micro greens and serve hot with yogurt.']

title: Pizza Nachos
method: ['To make the topping, take onions in a bowl, add tomatoes, green chillies, salt, lemon juice and basil leaves and mix well.', 'Spread a little pizza sauce on each piece of nachos, top with the onion-tomato mixture and place them on a serving plate.', 'Grate processed cheese generously over the nachos, top with olives and serve immediately.']

title: Almond Anjeer Modak
ingredients: ['1 cup almond flour', ' 1/4  cup dried figs (anjeer) paste', '4-5 dried figs (anjeer), chopped', ' 1/4  cup milk', '6-8 saffron strands', ' 1/2  cup powdered sugar', '2 teaspoons ghee + to grease', ' 1/4  teaspoon green cardamom powder']
method: ['Heat milk and saffron in a non-stick pan, add and once the milk comes to a boil, add powdered sugar and mix well till the sugar dissolves.', 'Add almond flour and mix well. Add dried figs paste and mix. Cook on low heat for 5-6 minutes or till the mixture starts to leave the edges of the pan.', 'Add ghee and green cardamom powder and mix well. Add chopped dried figs and mix well.', 'Transfer into a plate and allow to cool down to room temperature.', 'Grease a modak mould with some ghee, fill some of the prepared mixture in it. Press well and demould. Continue making more modaks with the remaining mixture.', 'Arrange the modaks on a serving platter, garnish with silver varq and serve.']
Main ingredients: Almond flour, Dried figs, Milk, Saffron, Powdered sugar, Ghee, Green cardamom powder

title: Thai Style Vegetarian Mince with Thai Rice
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick wok. Slice lemon grass root and add to the wok. Add schezwan chutney and soya granules and mix well.', 'Add coconut milk and torn Kaffir lime leaves. Slice lemon thinly and add 2-3 slices to the wok along with salt and mix. Keeping aside 1 basil leaf, tear the rest and add and mix.', 'Place rice in a serving bowl.', 'Add roasted peanuts to the wok and mix. Put the curry over the rice and serve hot garnished with a fresh red chilli and a basil leaf.']

title: Stir Fried Eggplant with Beans
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick wok.', 'Halve onion, slice and add to the wok with eggplant, salt and soy sauce and cook on high heat for 2 minutes.', 'Slice green chillies diagonally.', 'Add beans and garlic to the wok, mix and cook on high heat for 3-4 minutes.', 'Put cornstarch in a bowl, add  1/2  cup water and mix well to a smooth slurry.', 'Add sliced green chillies and sugar to the wok and mix. Cook for 2 minutes.', 'Cut beancurd into fingers and add with slurry and vinegar. Mix and cook for 1 minute.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot.']

title: Makhni Gravy
method: ['Quarter the tomatoes. Put them in a pressure cooker along with salt, half of the Kashmiri red chilli powder, ginger and two cups of water. Pressure cook till two whistles. Remove and set aside to cool.', 'Blend the mixture in a blender and strain. Heat butter in a pan, add garlic paste, ginger paste and two tablespoons of water. Cook for a minute. Add the pureed tomatoes and cook for two to three minutes.', 'Dry roast the kasuri methi in a microwave or on a tawa. Crush. Add the remaining Kashmiri red chilli powder to the gravy along with salt, sugar or honey. Stir and cook for a minute.', 'Add the crushed kasuri methi and garam masala powder. Mix and cook for a minute.', 'Add cream only if you need to use the gravy immediately.']

title: Chicken Curry
method: ['Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan, add dried coconut and onions, mix and saute for 2-3 minutes. Add salt, garlic cloves and dried red chillies, mix and saute till mixture turns golden brown. Remove from heat and cool.', 'Take chicken pieces in a bowl, add salt and turmeric powder and mix well. Set aside to marinate for 10 minutes.', 'Transfer the sauteed coconut-onion mixture into a mixer jar, add 3-4 tablespoons waterand grind into a coarse paste.', 'Heat remaining oil in a deep non-stick pan, add peppercorns, bay leaves and cinnamon, mix and saute till fragrant.', 'Add coconut-onion paste, mix and saute for 1-2 minutes. Rinse the mixer jar with 1/4  cup water and add to the pan, mix and cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add marinated chicken pieces, mix and cook for 1-2 minutes. Adjust salt and add 2 cups water, mix,cover and cook till the chicken is fully done.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander sprigs and serve hot.']

title: Soya Bean Parantha
method: ['Drain and mash the soyabean granules. Place the wheat flour and salt in a bowl, add sufficient water and knead into a soft dough. Cover with a damp cloth and rest for about half an hour.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add the onion and saute till light brown. Add the turmeric powder, green chillies and soyabean granules and mix well. Add the milk and stir to mix. Set aside to cool.', 'Place the mashed potatoes in a bowl, add the soyabean mixture and salt and mix well. Divide into eight equal portions. Divide the dough into eight equal portions and roll into a ball.', 'Place a portion of the soya granule mixture in the centre, gather the edges and shape into a ball again. Dust each ball in flour and roll into a parantha.', 'Heat a non stick tawa and place a parantha on it. Cook for half a minute, flip and drizzle a little oil all around and cook for a minute.', 'Flip again and drizzle some more oil all around. Cook till both the sides get cooked evenly golden.', 'Serve hot with dollops of butter.']

title: Pizza Sandwich
method: ['Slit the buns, brush them with a little olive oil and place them on a heated griller. Close the lid and grill till light golden.', 'Spread some pizza sauce over two of the halves. Sprinkle one and half tablespoons mozzarella cheese over each.', 'Sprinkle pepper powder and place some basil leaves and lettuce leaves on top. Spread some pizza sauce over the remaining two halves and cover the earlier halves with them.', 'Grill again. Pack in aluminium foil and give for lunch.']

title: Maru na Bhajiya - SK Khazana
method: ['Take gram flour, cornflour, turmeric powder, salt, garlic paste, ginger paste, coriander leaves, carom seeds and green chilli in a bowl, add sufficient water and whisk well to make a thick and smooth batter.', 'Slice the potatoes into not too thin slices.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Dip prepared potato slices in batter and set aside.', 'To make chutney, heat olive oil in non-stick pan, add garlic and saute on medium heat till fragrant.', 'Add tomatoes, salt and sugar and mix well. Add green chilli, mix and cook for 2-3 minutes and set aside for cool down.', 'Slide in the potato slices into hot oil and deep-fry till golden. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Transfer half the tomato mixture into a blender jar and blend. Add lemon juice and mix. Transfer into a serving bowl. Transfer the remaining half of the tomato mixture into another serving bowl.', 'Arrange the potato fritters on a serving platter, garnish with a tomato rose and sprinkle some coriander leaves on top of the fritters. Serve hot with the tomato chutney.']

title: Paan Mousse
method: ['Break the paans and put them into a mixer jar and grind into a coarse paste.', 'Transfer the paste into a bowl, rinse the mixer jar with a little water and add to the paste and mix well.', 'Take gelatin in a small bowl, add 2 tablespoon water, mix well and set aside to bloom.', 'Take whipped cream in a large bowl, add white chocolate ganache and mix well. Add 3-4 tablespoons of pan mixture and mix well.', 'Add the bloomed gelatin and mix well. Refrigerate for 2-3 hours or till the mixture is almost set.', 'Transfer the mousse into a piping bag fitted with a star nozzle.', 'Put a spoon full of chocolate soil in each serving shot glass, spread some gulkand on it and pipe the mousse over it.', 'Garnish with a pan leaf and some gulkand serve chilled.']

title: Chicken and Artichoke Salad
method: ['Place chicken breast on a plate and prick with a knife. Sprinkle salt, crushed peppercorns and garlic on top. Drizzle 1 tablespoon olive oil on top and rub well. Set aside to marinate for 10-15 minutes.', 'Heat 1 teaspoon olive oil in a non-stick pan. Place chicken breast on top and cook till evenly done from both the sides.', 'Roughly chop artichokes and place in a bowl. Roughly shred lettuce and add. Toss well.', 'Add 2 teaspoons olive oil, crushed peppercorns and mix well. Refrigerate for 5-10 minutes.', 'Place the salad onto a serving plate. Shred the chicken and place on the side and serve.']

title: Rawa Appe - SK Khazana
method: ['Soak semolina, Bengal gram. black gram and parboiled rice together in 2 cups water for 10-12 hours. Drain and blend them with sufficient water to a smooth mixture. Transfer into a bowl and ferment for 6-8 hours.', 'Soak fenugreek seeds and cumin seeds in  1/2  cup lukewarm water for 6-8 hours. Drain and blend them with coconut and sufficient water to a smooth paste.', 'Add coconut paste, turmeric powder, salt and jaggery powder to fermented batter and mix well.', 'Heat an appe griddle. Add some oil in each dent and pour batter into them till they half filled. Cover and cook till puffed up and the underside turns golden brown. Turn them over and cook till the other side turns golden brown.', 'Serve hot with coconut chutney.']

title: Sabudana Vada
method: ['To make the chutney, put coconut in a mixer jar, add coriander leaves, green chilli, cumin seeds, roasted peanuts, salt and  1/4  cup water and grind to a fine paste.', 'To make sweetened yogurt, take yogurt in a bowl. Add powdered sugar and salt and mix well.', 'To make the vada mixture, take soaked sago in a large plate. Add potatoes, ginger-green chilli paste, salt, cumin seeds, peanuts and squeeze the juice of lemon and mix till well combined.', 'Grease your palms with oil, take a portion of the vada mixture, shape it into a ball and slightly flatten it to shape like a vada.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Gently slide in the vades into the hot oil and deep fry till golden brown and crisp. Drain on an absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot with prepared chutney and sweetened yogurt.']

title: Green Smoothie Bowl
method: ['Halve green and black grapes and put into a bowl.', 'Put spinach leaves into a blender jar. Chop cucumbers and add. Add basil leaves, wheat grass, honey and ice cubes.', 'Cut kiwis into small pieces and add to the blender jar along with a little chilled water. Add chia seeds and blend into a smooth smoothie.', 'Pour this smoothie into the bowl of grapes. Garnish with basil sprigs and serve chilled.']

title: Chutney Chicken Vegetable Rice
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add cumin seeds and saute till fragrant. Add red bell pepper, green capsicum, yellow bell pepper, corn kernels and chicken, toss to mix.', 'Add salt, green chutney and toss to mix. Add rice, salt and garam masala powder and mix well. Sprinkle some water, mix, cover and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Chicken Broth with Poached Egg
ingredients: ['200 gms boneless chicken, boiled and shredded', '2 cups chicken stock', '2 eggs', '1 medium carrot, peeled', ' 1/2  medium cabbage', ' 1/2  tablespoon oil', '1 inch ginger, chopped', '7-8 garlic cloves, chopped', 'Salt to taste', ' 1/2  teaspoon crushed black peppercorns', '2 teaspoons soy sauce', '1 tsp red chilli sauce', '2 stalks spring onion greens']
method: ['Slice carrot into thick strips. Cut cabbage into thick strips.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add ginger and garlic and saute well.', 'Add carrot and saute. Add cabbage, mix and saute further.', 'Add salt, crushed peppercorns, soy sauce and red chilli sauce. Mix well and add chicken stock along with chicken. Stir to mix, cover and cook till done.', 'Finely chop spring onion green stalks.', 'Break eggs in two separate bowls.', 'Remove cooked vegetables and chicken in serving bowls. Let the stock boil.', 'Slide in the eggs, one by one, into the boiling stock and poach them.', 'Sprinkle some chopped spring onion greens in the serving bowls. Top with poached egg, garnish with remaining chopped spring onion greens and serve immediately.']

title: Prawns Dakshin Style
method: ['Dry roast coriander seeds and peppercorns in a small non-stick pan till fragrant. Remove from heat and cool down to room temperature.', 'Slit prawns horizontally without cutting through and flatten them to get butterfly shape. Put them in a bowl and add ginger-garlic-green chilli paste, salt and lemon juice. Mix well and set aside to marinate.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan. Add curry leaves and saute till crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Grind roasted spices into a coarse powder and transfer into a bowl.', 'To make chutney, put garlic cloves and broken green chillies in a blender jar and blend. Add coconut and blend again. Add coriander leaves and sufficient water and blend into a smooth chutney.', 'Crush the sauteed curry leaves and add to the ground spice powder and mix well.', 'Coat the marinated prawns in this mixture.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Place prawns in it and shallow-fry till evenly done and prawns are cooked.', 'Serve hot with the coconut chutney.']

title: Sitaphal Baked Yogurt - SK Khazana
method: ['Preheat the oven at 180 oC.', 'Put the pulp of custard apple in a blender jar and grind to a smooth puree.', 'Take yogurt in a mixing bowl, add fresh cream, condensed milk and custard apple puree and whisk well.', 'Pour sufficient water into a deep baking tray to make water bath. Place 4 earthen bowls in and pour the custard apple mixture into them. Cover them with aluminium foil.', 'Place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 8-10 minutes.', 'Remove for oven and keep the earthen bowls in the refrigerator to chill for 3-4 hours.', 'Garnish with blanched pistachio and serve chilled.']

title: Mirchi Ka Salan
method: ['Wash, wipe and slit green chillies lengthwise without cutting through. Heat sufficient oil in a kadai and deep fry for one minute. Drain on absorbent paper and keep aside. Dry roast sesame seeds, coriander seeds and cumin seeds.', 'Make paste of sesame seeds, peanuts, coriander seeds, cumin seeds, red chillies, ginger and garlic. Heat two tablespoons of oil in a pan, add mustard seeds, let it splutter and add curry leaves.', 'Add onion. Saute until onion is light golden brown, stirring continuously. Add turmeric powder and mix well. Add masala paste and cook for three minutes, stirring continuously. Stir in one and half cups of water and bring it to a boil.', 'Reduce the heat and cook for ten minutes. Add tamarind pulp dissolved in half a cup of water, if it is too thick. Add fried green chillies and salt and cook on low heat for eight to ten minutes. Serve hot.']

title: Eriseri
method: ['Boil yam cubes in two cups of salted water with a pinch turmeric powder, drain and reserve. Grind peppercorns with little water to a smooth paste. Soak half the scraped coconut with rice in one cup warm water and grind to a smooth paste.', 'Heat coconut oil and fry the remaining coconut to light brown. Cool and keep aside. Boil the raw banana in two cups salted water with turmeric powder. When nearly done add the cooked yam.', 'Add the peppercorn paste to the vegetables and continue cooking. Add the coconut paste and adjust seasoning. Simmer till the gravy thickens. Stir in the browned coconut.', 'Heat oil in a pan and add mustard seeds.', 'When the seeds crackle, add curry leaves. Add this tempering to the curry and cover immediately to trap the flavours. Serve hot.']

title: Biscoot Ambode
method: ['Put the black gram in a mixer jar and grind to a smooth and thick paste with very little water.', 'Transfer the mixture into a bowl and add coconut, curry leaves, asafoetida, green chillies, ginger and salt and mix well', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Drop spoonfuls of batter into the hot oil and deep-fry till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Arrange on a serving plate and serve hot.']

title: Gulkand Ice Cream - SK Khazana
method: ['Put fresh cream in a blender jar, add milk powder, condensed milk, gulkand, milk and rose syrup and blend till well combined.', 'Pour this mixture into an airtight container, sprinkle dried rose petals on top, mix it lightly and close the container with its lid. Keep it in the freezer and freeze for 7-8 hours.', 'Scoop out gulkand ice cream into serving bowls and serve.']

title: Pakwan Papdi Chaat
Main ingredients: Refined flour, Hot ghee, Oil, Fresh coriander leaves, Fresh mint leaves, Green chilllies, Garlic, Sweet yogurt, Date and tamarind chutney, Masala peanuts, Masala dal, Chaat masala

title: Chole Soya Curry
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add bay leaves and coriander seeds and saute for half a minute', 'Slit green chillies.', 'Add cumin seeds, pomegranate seeds andgreen chillies to the pan and saute for a minute.', 'Add ginger and garlic, mix and saute for 2 minutes. Add onions,mix and saute for 4-5 minutes', 'Add tomato puree, coriander powder, red chilli powder,chana masala, turmeric powder, garam masala powder and salt. Mix well and cook for 3-4 minutes.', 'Add chickpeas, soya chunks and chickpea stock, mash the chickpeas a little with the back of the ladle and mix well. Cook for 4-5 minutes.', 'Finely chop coriander sprigs and add. Mix well and bring to a boil. Add dried mango powder and mix well. Bring to a boil once again.', 'Switch off heat, transfer the curry into a serving bowl and serve hot.']

title: Penne Pasta with Pesto Sauce - Cook Smart
method: ['For the pesto sauce take basil leaves, pinenuts, 4 garlic cloves, most of the Parmesan cheese and 2 tbsps extra virgin olive oil in a grinder jar and grind. Add another 1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil and grind to a semi coarse paste.', 'To make the pasta dish, heat 2 tbsps extra virgin olive oil in a non-stick pan. Slice the garlic cloves.', 'Add garlic to the hot oil and saute till golden. Add cherry tomatoes and saute for 2-3 minutes, pressing the tomatoes a little with the back of the ladle. Add the pasta and toss for 2 minutes. Add  1/4  cup water and mix.', 'Add the pesto sauce and mix well. Add cream, salt and crushed peppercorns and toss. Cook for a minute.', 'Serve hot garnished with the remaining Parmesan cheese.']

title: Chicken Malai Tikka Roll - SK Khazana
method: ['Preheat the oven at 180o C. Line a baking tray with aluminum foil and grease it with butter.', 'Mix yogurt, green chilli paste, ginger-garlic paste, nutmeg powder, cardamom powder, garam masala, 1 tsp chaat masala, salt, fresh cream and cornflour in a bowl. Add the chicken cubes and mix well. Set aside to marinate for 15 minutes.', 'Arrange the marinated chicken pieces on the greased baking tray. Bake for 15-20 minutes or till the chicken is cooked.', 'Transfer chicken into a bowl, add malai, green chutney, remaining chaat masala, lemon juice, onion rings and fresh mint leaves and mix gently.', 'Place each roomali roti on the work top, place a portion of the chicken mixture at one end, fold three sides and roll it.', 'Grease a griller with some butter, keep the rolls on it, brush some butter on top of the rolls and close the griller. Grill till grill marks appear on both sides.', 'Wrap the rolls in tissue and place them on a serving platter. Serve hot with green chutney, onion rings and lemon wedges.']

title: Beetroot & Walnut Raita
method: ['Heat sufficient water in a non-stick pan, add walnuts and blanch them. Remove from heat, drain, cool and chop roughly.', 'Mix together yogurt, beetroot puree, walnuts, chilli powder, cumin powder and salt in a bowl.', 'Add mint leaves, mix well and refrigerate to chill.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with mint sprig and serve chilled.']

title: Chocolate and Almond Mousse
method: ['Cook the egg yolks and caster sugar in a double boiler, stirring, till thick or till it coats the back of the ladle. Remove from the heat.', 'Add the milk to the egg mixture and mix well. Remove from heat and set aside.', 'Place the chopped chocolate in a deep bowl and pour the milk-egg mixture over it and mix till the chocolate melts.', 'Beat the fresh cream lightly and fold into the chocolate mixture.', 'Grind  3/4 th almonds coarsely and sliver the remaining.', 'Add ground almonds to chocolate mixture and mix well. Place the bowl in the refrigerator for 10-15 minutes or till it thickens.', 'Place chocolate-almond mixture into individual glasses and refrigerate till set.', 'Sprinkle cocoa powder and serve chilled garnished with almond slivers and chocolate sticks.']

title: Seviyan Kheer Premix - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat ghee in a non-stick pan, lightly crush and add vermicelli and saute till fragrant and the colour darkens. Add raisins and saute till they puff up. Transfer into a large bowl and let the mixture cool down to room temperature.', 'Add milk powder, sugar, mixed nuts, chironji, green cardamom powder and saffron and mix well. Transfer into an air tight container and store up to 7-8 days in a dry place.', 'To make kheer, take  1/2  cup premix in a microwave safe glass bowl, add 1 cup hot water, cover it with a lid and set aside for 2 minutes. Keep the bowl in the Microwave and cook on high for 3 minutes.', 'Bring the bowl out of the microwave, transfer into a serving bowls, garnish each bowl with slivered pistachios and serve hot.']

title: Rice Soya Burger
method: ['Put rice in a chopper. Add green chillies, soya granules and process till well mixed.', 'Transfer the mixture into a large mixing bowl, add garam masala powder, cumin powder, turmeric power and red chilli powder and mix well.', 'Add potato, onion and salt and mix everything well. Add  1/2  tsp soy sauce. Chop coriander leaves and add and mix everything well.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick grill pan. Dampen your hands, take equal portions of mixture in your hands and shape into a pattie and put in the grill pan. Add onion roundels along with the patties and cook them too.', 'When the underside of the patties is golden, turn them over and cook the other side similarly.', 'Arrange the patties on serving plates.', 'Add  1/2  tsp soy sauce to the onions in the grill pan and mix well. Saute for another minute or so. Switch off heat.', 'Keep lettuce leaves over the patties and arrange tomato slices over them. Place the sauteed onion rings over the tomato slices. Keep a cheese slice over each.', 'Keep the plates in the oven at 180deg C for 15-20 seconds or till the cheese begins to melt.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Mangodi aur Papad ki Sabzi
ingredients: ['1 cup mangodi', '3-4 small papads', '1 1/2  tablespoons oil', '1 teaspoon cumin seeds', ' 1/2  teaspoon mustard seeds', '1 small onion, chopped', ' 1/2  inch ginger, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon finely chopped garlic', '1 medium tomato, chopped', ' 1/2  teaspoon turmeric powder', 'Salt to taste', '2 teaspoons red chilli powder', ' 1/2  tablespoon coriander powder', '1 teaspoon garam Masala', 'Coriander leaves for garnish']
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, Add cumin and mustard seeds and let them splutter.', 'Add onion and saute well. Add ginger and garlic, saute till onion turns golden brown.', 'Add tomato, saute well. Add turmeric powder and salt, mix well, cover and cook till the mixture becomes pulpy.', 'Add mangodi and mix well. Cover and cook for 5 minutes.', 'Break and add the papads into the pan. Add 1 cup water and mix well. Cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add garam Masala and mix well. Cover and cook for 1 minute, take it off the heat.', 'Garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot.']

title: Motichoor Laddoo
method: ['Cook sugar with three cups of water to make syrup of one thread consistency. Add milk and when the scum rises to the top, remove it. Add colour as desired and keep the syrup aside.', 'Make a thin batter of besan with three cups of water (pouring consistency). Add colour as desired.', 'Heat sufficient ghee in a kadai. Hold a perforated spoon over the hot ghee, pour a little batter over it and pass the batter through it fast into the kadai to make boondis. Fry for about two to three minutes.', 'Remove the boondis using a slotted spoon, drain thoroughly and put into the syrup. When the boondis have absorbed all the syrup add cardamom seeds and mix gently.', 'Divide into twenty-five portions and shape each into a laddoo.', 'Garnish with slivers of pistachios or almonds. Cool and store.']

title: Lauki Moong Dal
method: ['Boil the moong dal with four cups water, salt and ginger in a deep non-stick pan till it is almost done.', 'Add the lauki and cook. Add mint leaves and continue to cook till the dal is completely done. Mash it with a hand blender. Heat oil in non-stick pan. Add asafoetida, cumin seeds, cinnamon and curry leaves and saute till fragrant. Add it to the dal and mix', 'Add lemon juice and serve hot with steamed rice.']

title: Matar Wale Chawal
method: ['Heat ghee in a deep non-stick pan, add black peppercorns, green cardamoms, cloves, bay leaves, cumin seeds, mix and saute till fragrant.', 'Add rice and mix well. Add salt and 3 cups water, mix well and let the mixture come to a boil.', 'Add green peas, mix well, cover and cook till rice is completely done.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot.']

title: Goan Mussel Pulao
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add cinnamon, cloves and peppercorns and saute for a minute. Add onion, mix and saute for a minute.', 'Add ginger-garlic-green chilli paste, mix and cook for a 30 seconds. Add rice, mix and cook for a minute.', 'Add mussels, mix and saute for a minute. Reduce heat, add turmeric powder, chilli powder and Sunday masala and mix well.', 'Add tomato and mix well. Add salt, mix and cook on high heat for 30 seconds. Add 3 cups hot water, mix, cover and cook for 8-10 minutes. Add chopped coriander and mix well.', 'Serve hot garnished with a mint sprig and lemon slice.']

title: Matcha White Chocolate Latte
method: ['Heat milk in a non-stick pan and bring to boil. Add white chocolate, whisk and cook till chocolate melts and the mixture boils. Switch off heat.', 'Put 1 teaspoon matcha tea in individual cups and pour some boiled milk-chocolate mixture over.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Paneer And Pineapple Stir Fry
method: ['Heat oil in a non stick pan. Cut paneer into big cubes.', 'Add cumin seeds, onion, broken red chillies, capsicum, broccoli to the pan and saute. Cut tomatoes into big pieces, put into a mixer jar. Add garlic and grind. Add this to the pan.', 'Add turmeric powder and red chilli powder and mix.Add pineapple, tomato strips, paneer cubes, salt, garam masala powder and juice of 1 lemon. Mix with a light hand.', 'Tear some coriander leaves and add and toss.Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot.']

title: Shakkarkand Seviyaan Diyan Tikkiyan
method: ['Heat 2 tbsps oil in a non-stick kadai. Finely chop ginger and add along with green chillies and saute for a minute. Reduce heat, add roasted chana dal powder and saute for  1/2  minute.', 'Turn off heat and add  1/2  tsp amchur , red chilli powder, turmeric powder, roasted cumin powder and Punjabi garam masala powder. Turn on the heat again, add salt and saute. Add sweet potatoes and mix well.', 'Transfer the mixture into a bowl, mix well and set aside to cool. Halve the dates, sprinkle lemon juice and  1/2  tsp amchur and mix well.', 'Mix corn flour and  1/4  cup water in another bowl till smooth.', 'Transfer the sweet potato mixture in a parat and divide it into lemon sized balls, make a small dent in the centre, place some of the date mixture, bring in the edges and seal. Roll into a smooth ball and press lightly to shape into tikki.', 'Finely break the seviyaan and keep in a plate. Heat oil in anon-stick pan, dip the tikkis in corn flour batter, roll them in seviyaan so that they are well coated and place in the pan.', 'Shallow fry the tikkis, turning them, till they become golden brown on both sides. Drain on absorbent paper. Arrange them on serving plate, garnish with tomato slices and serve hot.']

title: Oats Chocolate Chip Waffle
method: ['Dry roast 1 cup oats, cool and grind to a fine powder.', 'Sift flour and powdered sugar, one by one, into a bowl. Add oats powder, baking powder and remaining oats and mix well.', 'Make a well in the centre and break eggs into it. Add vanilla essence and whisk well. Add milk, gradually and keep whisking till a smooth batter is formed.', 'Add 2 tablespoons melted butter and mix well. Add chocolate chips and mix well.', 'Heat the waffle iron. Grease with some butter, pour some batter into it, cover and cook for 2-3 minutes or till golden brown on both sides. Remove from the waffle iron and keep on a serving plate.', 'Make more waffles similarly.', 'Cut each waffle into small squares and serve immediately with maple syrup.']

title: Prawn Vermicelli
method: ['Shell and devein the prawns keeping the tails in tact. Make a slit on each prawn at one third distance from the head, bring the tail part and slide it into the slit.', 'Take all the prawns in a bowl. Add salt, garlic paste, cumin powder, Kashmiri red chilli paste, honey, lemon juice and mix. Add half an egg and mix.', 'Roll the marinated prawns in crushed vermicelli so that they are well coated. Keep in the refrigerator for about half an hour.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai on medium heat. Slide the prawns one by one into the hot oil and deep fry till golden brown. Drain and place on an absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Kand Ke Pakode
method: ['Peel kand and wash thoroughly under running water. Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Slice the kand thinly and place them in a bowl.', 'Add cumin seeds, black peppercorns, coriander seeds, salt and lemon juice and mix well so that the masala coats all the kand slices well.', 'For the batter mix gram flour, rice flour, red chilli powder, asafoetida, turmeric powder, salt, 2 tsps hot oil and mix well.', 'Add sufficient water and whisk into a smooth batter. Dip the kand slices in the batter, one by one, and slide into hot oil.', 'Deep fry till golden and crisp. Drain on tissue paper and serve hot.']

title: Maddur Vada - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Finely slice onions and finely chop green chillies. Finely chop curry leaves and coriander leaves and transfer all of these into a large bowl.', 'Add salt and mix well with your hand. Add rice flour, refined flour, semolina, white sesame seeds, peanuts and ginger and mix well. Add coriander leaves and mix well. Add  1/4  cup oil and mix till it forms a dough.', 'Take a portion of the mixture and shape it into a ball. Place it between two plastic sheets and press to form a thin disc. Gently remove and keep on a plate Make more vade similarly.Slide them into hot oil, a few at a time, and deep fry on low heat till golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Transfer them onto a serving plate and serve hot with coconut chutney and a cup of hot coffee.']

title: Palak Sprouts
method: ['Heat 2 tbsps oil in a deep non-stick wok and 1 tbsp oil in a non-stick pan.', 'Roughly chop onion and add to the pan and saute well.', 'Add garlic to the wok and saute till golden.', 'Place spinach leaves in a grinder jar and grind to a coarse paste. Add this paste to the garlic in the wok. Add  1/4  cup water and mix well.', 'When the onion in the pan becomes soft, add tomato and mix well.', 'Add salt and garam masala powder to the spinach and mix well and saute for 2 minutes. Add cream and mix well', 'Add ginger-garlic paste and mixed sprouts to onion-tomato mixture. Add  1/2  cup water, salt, turmeric powder, chana masala powder and red chilli powder and mix well. Cover and cook till the sprouts are done.', 'Cut ginger into strips and place in a bowl. Add salt and lemon juice mix well.', 'Make a bed of spinach mixture in a serving bowl, top with cooked sprouts, garnish with ginger strips and pour the lemon juice over the sprouts. Serve immediately.', '']

title: Khichra
method:
['Heat 2 tbsps ghee in a pressure cooker.
Add cinnamon, cloves, green cardamoms, ginger paste, garlic paste and mutton pieces and saute for 3-4 minutes.', 'For vegetarians use soya nuggets in place of mutton.
Add turmeric powder and 2 tsps red chilli powder and mix.', 'Break 2 green chillies and add.
Add chana dal, toor dal, urad dal and masoor dal and mix well.', 'Add dalia, salt,  3/4  cup fried onions and mix.
Add 6 cups water and when the mixture comes to a boil add rice, 2 tbsps coriander leaves and 2 tbsps mint leaves and mix.', 'Add garam masala powder and mix.
Cover the cooker with the lid and cook under pressure till 6-7 whistles are given out.', 'Let it stand for 15-20 minutes before opening the lid.
By now the mutton will be very soft.', 'Shred the mutton pieces and blend the mixture with a hand blender.
Heat remaining ghee in a small non stick pan, add remaining red chilli powder and mix.', 'Add this to the khichra and mix lightly.
Transfer into a serving bowl, sprinkle remaining fried onions, remaining mint and coriander leaves and lemon wedges and serve hot.']

title: Date Cake
method: ['Pre-heat oven to 175degC.', 'Sieve together refined flour, baking powder, cinnamon powder and nutmeg powder.', 'Grind dates with half the milk and yogurt. Mix with the sieved dry ingredients. Add powdered sugar and mix thoroughly. Mix in melted butter and vanilla essence. Add the remaining milk to correct the consistency.', 'Pour the mixture into a greased cake tin and place it in a pre-heated oven at 175o C for twenty to twenty five minutes.', 'Remove and cut into pieces when completely cooled.']

title: Blueberry Rolls
method: ['Preheat oven at 180oC. Grease a baking tin with some butter and dust some refined flour.', 'Take yeast in a bowl and a pinch castor sugar.', 'Heat milk in a non-stick pan.', 'Add 2-3 tablespoons warm milk to yeast and mix well.Set aside to activate for 2 minutes.', 'Sieve refined flour in another bowl. Add salt and 1 tablespoon castor sugar and mix well. Add activated yeast and mix again. Add remaining warm milk and knead into a soft dough.Add 2 tablespoons butter to the dough and knead again. Set aside.', 'Sieve blueberry compote into a bowl.', 'Dust some refined flour on worktop and roll out the dough into  1/2  inch thick rectangular sheet. Spread some blueberry compote over the sheet. Sprinkle some castor sugar over and roll the sheet tightly.', 'Discard the edges and cut the prepared roll into 1 inch rolls. Place each roll in the lined baking tin, cover with muslin cloth and set aside to prove.', 'Brush the rolls with some milk, place the baking tin on a baking tray, put the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes.', 'Brush the rolls with some butter and set aside to cool.Demould, dust some icing sugar over and serve.']

title: Soya Kheema Kachori - SK Khazana
method: ['To make the stuffing, heat oil in a non-stick pan, add ginger andgarlic and saute till raw smells disappear. Add green chillies, mix well and saute for 1 minute.Add onion, mix and saute till golden.', 'Addcumin powder, coriander powder,red chilli powder andturmeric powder, mix and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add soya granules, mix and saute for 1 minute. Add green peas and mix well and cook for 1 minute. Mash with a masher.', 'Add garam masalapowder and salt, mix well. Cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add lemon juice and mix, add coriander leaves and mix well. Take the pan off the heat. Transfer into a bowl and allow to cool down to room temperature.', 'Take refined flour in a large bowl, add salt, baking soda, oil and mix well. Add sufficient water and knead into a stiff dough. Cover with a damp muslin cloth and set aside for 5-10 minutes.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Divide the dough into equal portions and shape them into balls. Place each ball on the worktop and roll into a small puri. Place some of the stuffing mixture in the centre, bring the edges together and press to seal.', 'Further gently roll them into small kachoris.', 'Slide in the kachoris into hot oil, a few at a time, and deep-fry on low heat till golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Arrange the kachoris on a serving plate and serve hot with green chutney.']

title: Watermelon Olive and Feta Salad
method: ['Cut the watermelon into half and scoop out balls using a melon scooper.', 'To make the dressing, mix lemon juice, salt, crushed black pepper, oregano and parsley and whisk. Then add the olive oil and whisk again.', 'In a large mixing bowl, combine the melon balls, mint leaves, olives and the dressing and mix well.', 'Transfer the dressing in a serving bowl and crumble the feta cheese on top.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Penne Pasta in Pumpkin sauce
method: ['Heat olive oil in a deep non-stick pan, crush garlic and add and saute till lightly browned.', 'Put dal in a grinder jar, add pumpkin ki sabzi and  1/2  cup water and grind to a smooth puree.', 'Add this puree to the pan and mix well. Add penne and mix well. Add fresh cream, crushed peppercorns and Parmesan cheese powder and mix well.', 'Roughly tear basil leaves and add and mix well.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.']

title: Fish Moilee - SK Khazana
method: ['Take pomfret darnes in a bowl, add salt,  1/4  teaspoon turmeric powder and lemon juice and mix well.', 'Heat coconut oil in a non-stick pan add mustard seeds and let them splutter. Add curry leaves and onions, mix and saute till fragrant.', 'Add ginger-garlic paste, mix and saute for 2-3 minutes. Add remaining turmeric powder and mix well.', 'Add green chillies, 2 tablespoons water and the marinated fish and mix well.', 'Add salt and coconut milk, mix well and simmer for 3-4 minutes.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve warm.']

title: Tomato Basil Sandwich - SK Khazana
method: ['Cut the tomatoes into thin slices. Chop the basil leaves. Put both of them in a bowl.', 'Add salt, black pepper powder and extra virgin olive oil and mix well. Set aside for 10 minutes.', 'For each sandwich, place a brown bread slice and a white bread slice on a worktop. Apply little butter on both the slices. Apply cheese spread on brown bread slice, place tomato slices on it, cover with the white bread slice. Trim the edges of the sandwich and cut into 3 fingers each.', 'Keep them on a serving platter and serve immediately with tomato ketchup.']

title: Lotus Stem Stir Fry
Main ingredients: Lotus stems, Garlic, Ginger, Spring onions with greens, Green capsicum, Dark soy sauce, Bird's eye chillies, Blended sesame oil

title: Sarson ka Saag, Makki ki Roti aur Mozzarella ki Ma
method: ['Preheat the oven to 180degC. Chop the onion.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Chop garlic cloves and add to the pan. Saute till reddish brown.\nRoughly chop the green chilli.', 'Add onion to the pan and saute till softened.', 'Take the makki ka atta in a bowl. Add salt, mix well and knead into a soft dough using sufficient lukewarm water. Set aside.', 'Add sarson ka saag to the pan. Mix well and add the chopped chilli. Stir and cook for six to eight minutes.', 'Wet a muslin cloth and place it on the worktop. Divide the dough into equal portions and place them on the cloth one-by-one. Pat them into roundels with one fourth inch thickness and using a cutter cut the dough into three inch diameter discs and place on a hot non-stick tawa.', 'Add one tablespoon makki ka atta in sarson ka saag and mix well. Cook for four to five more minutes.', 'Cook the rotis, using oil on both the sides, till evenly browned.', 'Grate the mozzarella cheese into a bowl. Chop the oven roasted tomato wedges.', 'Remove the rotis from heat and place them on a worktop. Place a spoonful of the cooked sarson ka saag in the centre of the rotis. Sprinkle a little grated cheese on top and a few tomato pieces.', 'Place in the preheated oven and cook for five to seven minutes or till the cheese melts.', 'Remove from heat, garnish with onion rings, chaat masala and onion seeds. Serve hot.']

title: Spanish Tortilla
method: ['Heat olive oil and butter in a non-stick pan. Add onion and saute till it turns soft.', 'Add potatoes, cover and cook for fifteen to twenty minutes, stirring occasionally.', 'Add salt to the beaten eggs and mix well.', 'Add garlic and crushed peppercorns to the potatoes and mix well. Add eggs, cover and cook for twenty minutes.', 'Slide the tortilla onto a plate and place another plate on top, turn the whole thing over and slide it back into the pan to cook the other side.', 'Garnish with parsley and serve warm.']

title: Avocado Dip
method: ['Halve the avocado and squeeze juice of  1/2  lemon so that avocado does not get oxidised.', 'Scoop out the flesh of avocado and put into a bowl. Add juice of 1 lemon and mash with a fork.', 'Serve with cucumber or carrot sticks.']

title: Kurkure Paneer - SK Khazana
method: ['Put red chillies in a blender, add ginger, garlic, coriander seeds and black peppercorns. Add sufficient water and blend to a fine paste. Transfer into a bowl.', 'Add yogurt, lemon juice, rice flour and salt and mix well. Add a little water and mix to get the required consistency.', 'Cut cottage cheese into 1 1/2  inch cubes.', 'Crush roasted vermicelli and put into another bowl.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Dip the cottage cheese cubes in the ground paste, roll in the vermicelli till well coated. Slide them into hot oil and deep-fry till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Arrange them on a serving plate and serve hot with tomato ketchup.']

title: Dry Vegetable Manchurian
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Mix together cabbage, carrot, cauliflower,  1/3  of the green chillies,  1/3  of the garlic,  2/3  of the ginger, salt, refined flour and 2 tsps soy sauce well.', 'Shape into small balls, roll in cornflour and deep fry till golden and crisp.', 'Meanwhile heat 1 tbsp oil in a non-stick pan. Add remaining ginger, garlic and green chillies, celery, remaining soy sauce and saute.', 'Dissolve cornflour in 2 tbsps water. Add vegetable stock to the pan and simmer for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add cornflour mixture, pepper powder, vinegar and sugar and mix well.', 'Drain the vegetable balls and add to the sauce. Mix well. Switch off the heat.', 'Add half the spring onion greens and mix.', 'Transfer into a serving dish and serve hot garnished with remaining spring onion greens.']

title: Parappu Vadai-SK Khazana
method: ['Soak Bengal gram, pigeon peas and black gram together for 3-4 hours.', 'Drain and put dals in a grinder jar. Add asafoetida, green chillies and red chillies and grind to a coarse paste. Transfer paste into a bowl.', 'Add onions, coriander leaves, ginger paste, salt and baking powder and mix well.', 'Divide the mixture into equal portions and shape into medium sized vadais.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Deep-fry vadais till golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot with green chutney.']

title: Plum Jam
method: ['Coarsely grind the prunes. Roughly chop plums, add to the prunes and grind into a coarse mixture.', 'Mix together sugar, cinnamon, cloves and plum and prune mixture in a non-stick pan.', 'Cook for 10-12 minutes or till the mixture thickens and the plums are completely mashed.', 'Add honey, switch off the heat and mix well. Cool and store in a glass jar.']

title: Tomato and Basil Sandwich with Mascarpone Spread
method: ['Take mascarpone cheese in a bowl. Add crushed peppercorns, chilli flakes, parsley, salt, oregano and rosemary and mix well.', 'Take tomato slices in another bowl. Add basil, olive oil, crushed peppercorns and salt and mix well.', 'Spread some cheese mixture over4 bread slices. Top each slice with 5-6 tomato slices and cover with remaining 4 bread slices.', 'Trim edges, cut into triangles and serve immediately.']

title: Caramel Nut and Popcorn Ice Cream
method: ['To make the base, beat together egg yolks and castor sugar in a bowl till the mixture reaches ribbon consistency.', 'Heat together milk, cream and vanilla essence in a non-stick pan and bring to a boil.', 'Add the boiling mixture to the egg mixture and whisk continuously. Pour the mixture back into the pan, place on heat and cook on low heat, stirring continuously, till thick.', 'Pass the custard through a strainer and place in a cool place till completely cooled. Stir from time to time to prevent skin forming. Strain again if there are any lumps remaining.', 'Heat a non-stick pan, add castor sugar and cook till it caramelizes. Add walnuts, almonds and popcorn and mix well.', 'Transfer the mixture onto a silicon mat and let it set.', 'Break it into small pieces, add to the custard mixture and mix well.', 'Pour the mixture into an ice-cream tin, cover and freeze till fully set.', 'Demould, slice and serve.']

title: Jowar Bhakri - SK Khazana
method: ['Take sorghum flour in a parat, add salt, oil and sufficient water and knead into a soft dough. Cover with a muslin cloth and set aside for sometime.', 'Divide the dough into equal balls. Dust whole wheat flour on worktop, keep each dough ball on it and pat with your palm and fingers into a round bhakri.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa and place the bhakri on it, sprinkle some water, spread around with fingers. Cook for 2 minutes and flip. Cook for a minute, lift it with tongs and place on direct flame till it puffs up. Transfer onto a serving plate.', 'Make more bhakri similarly.', 'Serve hot with an onion wedge and a lemon wedge.']

title: Aamras Ki Kadhi
method: ['Mix together raw mango pulp, ripe mango pulp, besan and salt to a smooth mixture. Add buttermilk and mix again.', 'Heat oil in a deep pan. Add asafoetida, mustard seeds, fenugreek seeds and saute. Add curry leaves, green chillies and saute for two minutes. Add the mango mixture and mix. Add a little water if required and bring to a boil.', 'Lower the heat and simmer for ten to fifteen minutes. Correct the consistency by adding two cups of water.', 'Add boondi and simmer for five more minutes. Serve hot.']

title: Spanish Omelette
method: ['Preheat oven to 180 degC.', 'Heat oil in a non stick pan. Add onion and capsicum and saute. Add the potatoes and toss. Add green chilli and mix. Saute the vegetables till lightly browned.', 'Beat the egg whites and the whole egg together. Add salt and pepper powder and beat again. Pour the eggs over the vegetables.', 'Cover and keep the pan in the preheated oven and bake for fifteen to twenty minutes.', 'Cut into wedges and serve hot.']

title: Lavang Latika
method: ['Cook sugar with  1/2  cup water, stirring, till you get a syrup of one string consistency. Add rose essence and mix well. Mix maida and ghee in a parat, add a little water and knead into a stiff dough.', 'Cover with a damp cloth and let it rest for 15 minutes. Heat sufficient ghee in a kadai. Mix together tutti frutti and dry nuts. Divide into 12 equal portions.', 'Roll out each portion into a puri. Place one portion of the filling in the centre of the puri, drizzle a little ghee and fold in the sides to overlap each other.', 'Secure with a clove. Deep fry these lavang latikas till golden brown. Drain and soak them in warm sugar syrup for 15 minutes. Drain and serve warm.']

title: Poha Aloo Kachori
method: ['Trim edges of bread slices, cut them into small cubes and put into a bowl.', 'Add pressed rice, salt, black pepper powder and potato and mix well and knead into a soft dough. Add lemon juice and knead again.', 'To prepare stuffing, put peanuts in another bowl, add green chillies, ginger, red chilli powder, dried mango powder and salt and mix well. Add lemon juice and mix well.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Divide the dough into 8 equal balls. Shape each portion into a katori, place some stuffing in it, gather the edges and roll into a ball and seal neatly. Dampen your palms and flatten the kachoris between them.', 'Deep-fry the kachori in hot oil till golden and crisp on both the sides. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Place the kachoris on a serving plate and serve hot.']

title: Chicken Cutlets in Lettuce Wraps
method: ['Put chicken mince, salt, crushed peppercorns, red chilli powder, onion, turmeric powder and garam masala powder in a bowl and mix well.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add ginger-garlic paste and saute well.', 'Add chicken mixture, mix well and cook till the chicken is half done. Transfer into a bowl.', 'Divide the mince mixture into equal portions and shape them into cutlets.', 'Heat the same non-stick pan. Place the cutlets in it and cook till evenly done from both sides.', 'Place lettuce leaves on a serving plate. Place cutlets into each leaf, garnish with tomatoes and coriander leaves and serve immediately.']

title: Steamed Egg Katori
method: ['Take four microwave proof bowls (katoris).', 'Break two eggs into each bowl. Sprinkle salt, crushed red chillies, onion, green capsicum and grated cheese. Sprinkle some more crushed red chillies and keep the bowls in the microwave and cook, uncovered, on Microwave MEDIUM (60%) for two minutes.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Namakpara 3 Ways
method: ['Take flour in a large mixing bowl, add salt and baking powder and mix well. Add ghee and rub the flour between your fingers till the mixture resembles breadcrumbs. Add  1/4  cup cold water and mix till well combined. Add  1/8  cup cold water and knead into stiff dough. Cover the dough with damp cloth and rest for 15 minutes.', 'For sambhar sprinkle, take sambhar masala, salt, red chilli powder and citric acid in a mixer jar and grind to a fine powder. Transfer into a small bowl.', 'For pav bhaji sprinkle, take pav bhaji masala, salt, red chilli powder, garlic powder, onion powder and citric acid in a mixer jar and grind to a fine powder. Transfer into another small bowl.', 'For mint sprinkle, take dried mint leaves in a mixer jar, add salt, black salt and citric acid and grind to a fine powder. Transfer into a third small bowl.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Divide dough into equal portions, roll out each portion into a slightly thick disc and trim the sides with a knife. Cut into diamond shaped pieces. Gently slide them into hot oil, a few at a time, and deep-fry till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Divide the namakparas into 3 equal portions and put them in 3 different bowls. Sprinkle sambhar mixture over the namakparas in one bowl and toss. Sprinkle pav bhaji mixture over the namakparas in the second bowl and toss. Sprinkle mint mixture over the namakparas in the third bowl and toss. Let them cool down to room temperature.\nServe or store in airtight containers.']

title: Chilli Oil Wontons
method: ['Combine lamb mince, spring onion greens, chopped coriander, spring onion bulbs, salt, lemon flavoured pepper, sugar and soy sauce in a bowl and mix well.', 'Mix flour in some water and mix well to make a thick slurry.', 'Place the wonton sheets on a worktop. Put a portion of the mince mixture on one end, apply slurry on the edges and fold over to make a triangle. Twist the edges, apply slurry and stick together to form wontons.', 'Heat sufficient water in a steamer. Place the wontons in it and steam for 10-12 minutes.', 'Heat chilli oil in a non-stick pan. Add chilli flakes, mix well and heat well.', 'Place the wontons on a serving platter, garnish with sesame seeds and coriander sprigs and serve hot with the chilli oil.']

title: Aloo Bhujiya
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Grease a chakli press with some oil.', 'Grate potatoes in a bowl. Add garam masala powder, chilli powder, asafoetida, salt and mint powder and mix well.', 'Add gram flour gradually and knead into a dough.', 'Fill the chakli press fitted with a sev ring attachment with some prepared dough and press out strips directly into hot oil and deep-fry till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Lightly crush the fried aloo bhujiya and transfer onto a plate. Sprinkle some salt, chaat masala and dried mint powder and mix lightly.', 'Serve or store in an airtight container.']

title: Basil Walnut Pesto - SK Khazana
method: ['Put walnuts, parmesan cheese, garlic and black peppercorns in a blender jar and blend into a coarse paste.', 'Add parsley, basil leaves and olive oil, blend to a fine paste. Add salt and mix well.', 'Transfer the paste into a bowl and use as required.']

title: Til Poli
method: ['For the stuffing dry roast sesame seeds and khopra separately. Cool and powder coarsely.', 'Dry roast gram flour till fragrant. Cool and mix with the powdered khopra and sesame seeds.', 'Add jaggery and green cardamom powder and mix. Add one tablespoon of oil and mix well.', 'Divide into twelve portions and roll into balls. Mix together maida, atta and salt.', 'Heat the remaining oil and add to the flours and mix with your fingertips. Add sufficient water and knead into a firm dough.', 'Cover with a damp cloth and rest the dough for fifteen minutes. Divide into twelve equal portions.', 'Stuff each dough portion with the stuffing portion and roll into balls.', 'Further carefully roll them out into chapattis, dusting with flour as required, taking care that the stuffing does not come out.', 'Heat a non stick tawa and roast the til polis on both the sides, drizzling a little ghee, till light brown specks appear.', 'Serve drizzled with a little ghee.']

title: Green Chilli Chicken
method: ['Grind together roughly chopped green chillies, onions, garlic, ginger, coriander leaves and salt. Add this mixture to the cleaned chicken pieces and marinade for about half an hour.', 'Heat oil in a wok or kadai. Add cumin seeds. When they begin to change colour add turmeric powder. Add the marinated chicken, small green chillies and mix well.', 'Add cumin powder, coriander powder and mix well. Add salt to taste and garam masala powder and mix again. Add half a cup of water and mix.', 'Cover and cook on medium heat for eight to ten minutes. Lower the heat and cook for another eight to ten minutes or till the chicken is cooked.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Mirchi ka Salan
method: ['Heat a non-stick pan, add white sesame seeds, coriander seeds and cumin seeds and dry roast on medium heat till the sesame seeds plop and the mixture becomes fragrant.', 'Let them cool, transfer them into a mixer jar, add roasted peanuts, dried red chillies, ginger, garlic and some water, blend to make a smooth masala paste.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add mustard seeds and once they splutter add curry leaves and saute for  1/2  minute.', 'Add onion, mix and saute, stirring continuously, till fragrant. Add salt, mix and saute till light golden brown.', 'Add turmeric powder and mix well. Add masala paste and saute for 3 minutes, stirring continuously. Rinse the mixer jar with 1 1/2  cups water and add it to the pan and mix well. Bring the mixture to a boil. Reduce heat and cook for 10 minutes.', 'Add tamarind pulp (dissolved in half a cup of water, if it is too thick) and mix well.', 'Add fried green chillies, mix and cook on low heat for 8-10 minutes.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot.']

title: Strawberry Baked Yogurt
method: ['Preheat the oven to 180degC. Whisk together yogurt, cream, condensed milk and strawberry crush in a bowl till well blended.', 'Pour some water on a baking tray. Pour the prepared mixture into individual ramekin moulds and place the moulds on the baking tray.', 'Place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for eight minutes. Remove from oven and set aside to cool to room temperature and refrigerate for an hour.', 'Serve chilled garnished with mint sprigs.']

title: Corn Curd-SK Khazana
method: ['Grease a barfi tray with some oil.', 'Heat a non-stick pan. Add sweet corn, salt, pepper powder, spring onion greens, cornflour and  1/4  cup water, whisk and cook for 5 minutes.', 'Transfer the mixture in the greased tray, cool down to room temperature and refrigerate for 2-3 hours.', 'Heat some oil in a non-stick pan.', 'Cut the mixture into squares, dust with some cornflour and shallow-fry, in hot oil, turning sides,\ntill golden brown all around. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot with Schezwan sauce.']

title: Lemon Coconut Rice
method: ['Heat 1 tbsp oil in a non-stick pan, add mustard seeds and let them splutter. Add curry leaves, turmeric powder, coconut milk, rice and salt and mix well. Cook for 5-7 minutes. Transfer this into a bowl.', 'Add scraped coconut, lemon juice and crushed peppercorns and mix well.', 'Slice lemon.', 'Place some of the lemon slices at one end of each banana leaf piece, place a portion of rice over it and roll.', 'Heat remaining oil in another non-stick pan, place the rolls on it and cook till the underside is browned, flip and cook on the other side too.', 'Arrange the rice rolls on a serving plate and serve immediately.']

title: Chicken Dal Pakode
method: ['Cut chicken into strips and mix with lemon juice, half the red chilli powder, salt and ginger-garlic paste. Set aside to marinate for 15-20 minutes.', 'Put Bengal gram, black gram and green gram in a blender jar and blend into a thick paste using water if required.', 'Put gram paste, coriander powder, cumin powder, turmeric powder, garam masala powder, remaining red chilli powder and salt in a bowl and mix well.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Spread rice flour on a plate.', 'Dust the marinated chicken strips in the flour, coat well with the gram paste mixture and gently slide into hot oil. Deep-fry till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Christmas Pudding
method: ['Sieve flour and salt together. Mix in breadcrumbs with the flour. Rub in butter into the flour and breadcrumb mixture.', 'Add spice powders, lemon rind, sugar, dried fruits, candied peels and nuts. Add carrot, lightly beaten eggs and orange juice.', 'Add sherry, rum and leave it covered overnight. Next day transfer the batter into two moulds, cover with greaseproof paper and foil and then steam in a double boiler continuously for seven hours at a steady temperature.', 'When done cover and keep it overnight in a cool place. Reheat for atleast two hours before serving.']

title: Shikampuri Kabab
method: ['Heat 1 tablespoon ghee in a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds, green cardamoms, black peppercorns, cinnamon, dried red chillies, garlic cloves and mutton mince and mix well.', 'Add chana dal, salt and 1 cup water and mix well. Cover and cook till the mince is cooked.', 'Take the pan off the heat and cool. Transfer the mixture into a mixer jar and grind to smooth paste. Transfer the mixture into a mixing bowl.', 'Add onion, green chillies, coriander leaves, fresh mint leaves, garam masala powder and lemon juice and mix well.', 'Divide the mixture into 8 equal portions and shape each portion into tikkis and place them on a plate.', 'Break the egg into a bowl, add a little salt and whisk well.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a non-stick pan. Dip the tikkis in the egg mixture, place them in the pan and shallow-fry, turning sides, till evenly golden brown on both sides. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Arrange the kababs on a serving platter and serve hot with onion rings, lemon wedges and green chutney.']

title: Gulab Jamun Parantha - SK Khazana
method: ['Take gulab jamuns in a large bowl and crush them with a fork. Add pistachios, almonds and green cardamom powder, mix well and set aside.', 'Divide the dough into 4 equal portions and shape them into balls. Place a ball on the worktop and dust with dry flour. Roll out into a roti and apply some ghee on it and sprinkle some flour.', 'Place a portion of the gulab jamun mixture in the centre, bring the sides to the centre and seal and shape into ball. Dust with a little more flour and roll it into a parantha. Make more paranthe with the remaining dough and gulab jamun mixture similarly.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa, place a parantha on it and cook turning sides till both sides are almost done. Apply ghee on one side, flip and apply ghee on the other side too and continue to cook till both sides are evenly golden brown and crisp.', 'Cut into quarters and place them on a serving platter. Garnish with slivered almonds and pistachios. Serve hot with milk and ghee.']

title: Garlic Sev - SK Khazana
method: ['Knead together gram flour, chilli powder, turmeric powder, garlic powder, carom seeds, salt, 1 tablespoon oil and sufficient water to a stiff dough. Rest for 30 minutes.', 'Grease a sev mould with some oil and fill in a portion of dough.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Press sev directly into hot oil and deep-fry till golden brown. Drain on an absorbent paper.', 'Cool and serve or store in an airtight container.']

title: Caesar's Salad
method: ['Cut the bread slices into one inch pieces.', 'Heat the oil in a pan and add the garlic.', 'Add the bread cubes and saute till slightly crisp and browned at the edges. Remove and set aside. Wash and tear the lettuce leaves roughly and place in a large bowl.', 'Tear basil leaves and add to the lettuce. Add the cheese shavings or grated cheese.', 'Boil sufficient water in a pan, add eggs and boil them for two to three minutes only. Break the lightly boiled eggs into another bowl and whisk well.', 'Add mustard paste, Worcestershire sauce, olive oil, salt and freshly crushed black peppercorns and whisk till well blended. Add the fried bread and toss lightly. Pour the dressing over the salad and toss lightly.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Cheese Stuffed Masala Omelette
ingredients: ['8 eggs', '2 tablespoons milk', 'Salt to taste', ' 1/2  tablespoon oil', '1 tablespoon butter + as required', '4 white bread slices', 'Chopped fresh coriander leaves for garnishingMasala', '1 tablespoon oil', '2 teaspoons chopped garlic', '1-2 green chillies, finely chopped', '2 medium tomatoes, chopped', 'Salt to taste', '1 teaspoon red chilli powder', '1 teaspoon coriander powder', ' 1/2  teaspoon cumin powder', ' 1/4  teaspoon turmeric powder', '2 teaspoons chopped fresh coriander leaves Stuffing', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 teaspoon chopped garlic', '1 medium onion, sliced', '5-6 button mushrooms, sliced', 'Salt to taste', '2-3 tablespoons grated mozzarella cheese', '2-3 tablespoons grated cheddar cheese', ' 1/2  teaspoon finely chopped green chillies', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh coriander leaves']
method: ['To prepare masala, heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add garlic and green chillies and saute for 30 seconds.', 'Add tomatoes and saute on high heat for 1 minute. Add salt, chilli powder, coriander powder, cumin powder, turmeric powder and sugar and saute for 2-3 minutes or till tomatoes turn soft and pulpy. Switch off heat, add coriander leaves, mix well and cool.', 'Beat eggs in a bowl. Add milk and salt and beat well. Add the prepared masala and mix well.', 'To prepare stuffing, heat butter in the same non-stick pan. Add garlic and onion and saute till translucent.', 'Add mushrooms and saute on high heat. Add salt and saute for 2-3 minutes. Transfer in a bowl.', 'Add mozzarella cheese and cheddar cheese to stuffing and mix. Add green chillies and coriander leaves and mix well.', 'Heat oil and 1 tablespoon butter in another non-stick pan. Pour the egg mixture, swirl and lightly mix, cover and cook for 1 minute or till  3/4 th done from the underside.', 'Put some stuffing on one side of the omelette, cover and cook till fully done from the underside. Fold the omelette and cook for 1 minute.', 'Toast bread slices in an electric toaster.', 'Cut the omelette into wedges and place on one side of a serving platter.', 'Apply some butter on toasted bread slice, cut them into triangles, place on the other side of the platter and serve hot garnished with coriander leaves.']

title: Orangtini
method: ['For each portion, dry roast  1/2  tsp cumin seeds in a non-stick pan till fragrant. Set aside to cool.', 'Halve 1 lemon, and quarter each half, remove seeds and put all the pieces in a glass jar. Add 1 tsp castor sugar and black salt. Roughly tear 10-12 mint leaves and add.', 'Crush roasted cumin seeds in a mortar with a pestle. Add roasted cumin powder and muddle everything together with a muddler.', 'Add  1/2  tbsp lemon juice and 3 tsps orange squash and continue to muddle.', 'Take a few ice cubes in a stemmed glass and pour the prepared juice over them. Top with  1/2  cup soda and mix well. Garnish with orange slice and serve chilled.']

title: Stuffed Capsicum
method: ['Slice off the heads of green and red capsicums. Seed them and gently remove the white pith from inside them.', 'Mix potatoes, cottage cheese, cheese, dried mango powder, raisins, ginger, cumin powder, coriander leaves, cashewnut powder, red chilli powder, garam masala powder, green chillies and salt in a bowl.', 'Stuff this mixture in the both red and green capsicums and press it down firmly.', 'Heat oil a grill pan and keep the stuffed capsicum upside down, and press gently with your hand.', 'Grill them turning sides so that they cooked evenly all around. Cool, slice them into rings and serve.']

title: Egg Bhujne
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add garlic and green chillies and saute till garlic turns pink.', 'Add onions and saute till they turn translucent. Add tomato and capsicum, mix and cook till the tomato turns pulpy.', 'Add red chilli powder, turmeric powder, one tablespoon coriander leaves and salt. Mix well and cook on low heat for a minute. Add little water, mix and cook for a minute.', 'Break the eggs, one by one, into the pan, cover and cook on low heat for two minutes.', 'Serve hot garnished with remaining coriander leaves.']
