title: Sweet and Sour Chicken Rice
method: ['Cut green and red capsicums into small squares.', 'Heat 2 tbsps oil in a non-stick pan. Add capsicums and a little salt and grill.', 'Place rice in a bowl and heat in the microwave till well heated through.', 'Quarter orange and remove the peel with a knife leaving a little flesh on the peel.', 'When the capsicums are well grilled, drain and transfer into a bowl.', 'Add chicken to the oil remaining in the pan, add salt and saute. Squeeze the orange peel to extract juice and put into the pan along with the peels.', 'Have each orange quarter.', 'Add green chillies to the chicken and mix well and cook till the chicken is done. Transfer into another bowl.', 'Heat the stock in a deep non-stick pan, add 1 tbsp tomato ketchup. Add ginger, garlic, salt and sugar and mix well.', 'Remove the orange peels from the chicken and discard. Add 2 tbsps cornstarch water, mix well and cook till the sauce thickens.', 'Add chicken and orange pieces and mix. Simmer for 2-3 minutes. Add spring onion greens and mix. Add vinegar and mix.', 'To serve put the rice in a serving bowl. Pour the chicken with the sauce over the rice. Put the grilled capsicums on top and serve hot.']

title: Chettinad Potato Fry
method: ['Dry roast coriander seeds, fennel seeds, 1 tbsp split black grams and black peppercorns in a non-stick pan.', 'Heat 2 tbsps oil in another non-stick pan, add onion and saute till it turns golden.', 'Cut potatoes into big cubes.', 'Add round red chillies to the pan with the spices and continue to roast till fragrant. Set aside to cool.', 'Add potatoes to the onion. Add salt, turmeric powder and mix well.', 'Transfer the spice mixture into a blender jar and blend to a fine powder.', 'Heat remaining oil in another non-stick pan.', 'Add 1 1/2  tbsps spice powder to the potatoes and mix well. (Store the remaining ground powder in an airtight container to use later.) Cook for 3-4 minutes.', 'When the oil in the other pan gets hot add 1 tsp split black grams, mustard seeds, asafoetida, curry leaves and red chilli powder and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add this tempering to the potatoes and mix well. Cook for a couple of minutes. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.']

title: Burnt Garlic Vegetable Fried Rice - SK Khazana
method: ['To make fried garlic, heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add garlic and saute till golden brown. Strain the mixture into a bowl, reserve the garlic infused oil and keep aside the fried garlic.', 'Heat garlic infused oil in another non-stick pan, add spring onion bulbs, French beans, carrot, and salt, mix well.', 'Add shredded cabbage, soy sauce, rice and 3-4 tsps fried garlic and toss well.', 'Add spring onion greens, and vinegar and mix well. Cover and cook for 2-3 minutes. Mix well and take the pan off the heat.', 'Transfer to a serving plate, garnish with a little fried garlic (you can store the remaining fried garlic and use as required) and spring onion greens.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Jain Ragda Pattice
method: ['To make ragda, heat four tablespoons oil in a non-stick pan, add tomatoes and saute well. Add half teaspoon turmeric powder, red chilli powder and salt, mix well and cook for two minutes.', 'Add white peas and two cups water, mix and cook for three to four minutes. Remove from hea and set aside.', 'Put raw bananas into a bowl, add remaining turmeric powder and salt and mix well. Divide into eight equal portions and shape them into medium sized pattice.', 'Heat some oil in another non-stick pan. Place the pattice in it and shallow-fry, turning sides, till golden and crisp from both sides.', 'To make capsicum-pudina chutney, roughly chop capsicum and place in a grinder jar. Add mint leaves, salt, sugar, peanuts and lemon juice and grind. Roughly chop green chillies and add along with the sev and grind again into a smooth chutney.', 'Place the pattice on a serving platter. Pour the ragda on top. Top with the capsicum-pudina chutney, tamarind chutney and sev. Serve immediately.']

title: Kolhapuri Egg Curry-SK Khazana
method: ['Heat sufficient water in the egg boiler. Place the eggs and boil till hard. Remove from heat, cool, peel and halve vertically.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a shallow non-stick pan, place the egg halves in it and shallow fry, turning sides, till lightly browned on both sides.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon oil in another non-stick pan. Add peppercorns and cloves and saute for 15 seconds.', 'Add garlic and ginger and saute for a minute. Add onions, mix and saute till translucent.', 'Add green chillies, turmeric powder, garam masala powder and poppy seeds, mix and saute for a minute.', 'Add coconut and tomato, mix and saute for a minute. Break red chillies into pieces and add along with salt, mix, cover and cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Remove from heat, cool and blend into a smooth paste with sufficient water.', 'Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a deep non-stick pan. Add the ground paste and mix. Rinse the blender jar with 1 cup water and add to the pan. Mix well, cover and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add eggs and mix lightly. Add coriander leaves and mix lightly. Cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Serve hot garnished with coriander leaves.']

title: Gluten Free Almond Cake
method: ['Preheat the oven to 180@C. Grease a baking tin with butter and dust with cornflour.', 'Take castor sugar in a mixing bowl, break the eggs one by one at a time and add and beat with an electric beater till well combined.', 'Add vanilla essence and peanut butter and mix well.', 'Sieve together almond flour, cornflour and baking powder directly into the bowl and add walnuts and fold in gently till well combined.', 'Pour the batter into the greased tin and spread it evenly. Tap to release any air pockets. Keep the baking tin in the preheated oven and bake for 40-45 minutes.', 'Take the tin out of the oven and keep it on a wire rack and allow it to cool. Cut into squares.', 'Keep the cake squares on a serving platter, dust with icing sugar and serve.']

title: Thai Mini Pizza
method: ['Preheat oven to 180deg C.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add garlic, ginger and onion, mix and saute till onion is translucent. .', 'Add Thai red curry paste, mix well and saute for 1-2 minutes. Add mushrooms and salt, mix well and saute for 6-8 minutes.', 'Add coriander leaves, mix well and saute for 1 minute. Take the pan off the heat.', 'Place the pizza bases on a baking tray, sprinkle some grated mozzarella cheese on each and top it up with some mushroom mixture. Sprinkle a little cheese on top, place the tray in the preheated oven and bake till the cheese melts.', 'Place the pizzas on a serving platter, garnish with coriander sprigs and serve hot.']

title: Lychees Stuffed With Kesari Mava
method: ['Mix together khoya, saffron, 2 tbsps sugar in a non stick kadai and saute for 3-4 minutes.', 'Transfer into a bowl and keep aside to cool for some time.', 'In another non stick pan cook together the remaining sugar and a little water till the sugar caramelizes.', 'Add butter and cooking cream and remove from heat.Stuff the lychees with the khoya mixture and refrigerate.', 'For serving, pour caramel butter sauce into one bowl and put pistachios in another bowl and place them in a serving plate.', 'Arrange stuffed lychees in the same serving plate and serve.']

title: Vegan Hazelnut Spread - SK Khazana
method: ['Preheat the oven at 180@C.', 'Spread hazelnuts on a baking tray, keep the tray in the preheated oven and roast for 12-15 minutes or until they have browned a little. Take them out of the oven and set aside to cool down to room temperature.', 'Meanwhile, take dates in a bowl, add sufficient water and soak for 30 minutes.(If using soft dates then you need not soak them.)', 'Transfer the roasted hazelnuts into a grinder jar, grind to a fine powder. Drain and add the dates along with cocoa powder and a little water and grind. Add 2 tbsps water and blend till smooth. You can store in an air tight container for upto 2 weeks.', 'Or transfer into a bowl and serve as a dip with apple slices. or serve with apple slices or as required.']

title: Khatta Meetha Kaddu
method: ['Heat mustard oil in a non-stick pan till it smokes. Add fenugreek seeds, green chillies and ginger, mix and saute till fragrant.', 'Add turmeric powder, chilli powder and coriander powder and mix well. Add pumpkin and mix. Add sufficient water, mix, cover and cook till pumpkin is tender.', 'Add sugar, garam masala powder, dried mango powder, salt and coriander leaves and mix well.', 'Garnish with coriander sprig and serve hot.']

title: Overload Chocolate Cookies
method: ['Preheat oven to 175deg C. Line a baking tray with parchment paper.', 'Cream butter with sugar in a bowl till smooth. Add egg and mix well.', 'Sieve together refined flour, cocoa powder, baking soda and salt into the butter-sugar mixture and fold well.', 'Mix coffee powder in a little warm water, mix well and add to the mixture along with vanilla essence and mix well.', 'Fold in the chocolate chips and walnuts and knead into a dough.', 'Divide the dough into twelve equal portions, flatten them to shape into cookies and place on the baking tray.', 'Place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for ten to twelve minutes. Remove from heat and cool down to room temperature.', 'Serve.']

title: Pizza Samosa
ingredients: ['Readymade samosa dough as required', '2 tablespoons oil + to deep fry', '1 medium onion, cut into  1/2  inch cubes', '1 medium green capsicum, cut into  1/2  inch cubes', ' 1/2  cup boiled corn kernels', ' 1/4  cup tomato puree', '150 grams cottage cheese (paneer), cut into  1/2  inch cubes', 'Salt to taste', ' 1/4  cup green peas, blanched', ' 1/2  tablespoon dried mixed herbs + to sprinkle', ' 1/2  teaspoon red chilli flakes + to sprinkle', '100 grams mozzarella cheese, cut into  1/2  inch cubes', 'Parmesan cheese powder to sprinkle', 'Tomato ketchup to serve']
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add onion and saute for a minute. Add capsicum and corn kernels and cook for 1 minute.', 'Add tomato puree and cook for 1 minute on medium heat. Add paneer, salt and green peas and mix. Saute for 1a minute and switch off heat. Transfer into a bowl.', 'Add dried mixed herbs, red chilli flakes and mozzarella cheese and mix well.', 'Heat sufficient fortune oil a kadai.', 'Lightly knead the dough, divide into equal medium portions and roll them into thin oval discs. Halve each disc.', 'Take water in a bowl. Apply water on the edges of each halved disc, shape into a cone, fill in the prepared filling, apply water on edges and seal the edges to form a triangle.', 'Slide in the samosas into hot oil and deep fry till golden and crisp. Keep rotating the samosas occasionally so that they are evenly cook all around. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Sprinkle parmesan cheese powder, crushed mixed herbs and red chilli flakes on them.', 'Arrange on a platter and serve hot with tomato ketchup.']

title: German Loaf
method: ['Take yeast in a bowl. Add a pinch of castor sugar and 2 tablespoons warm water and mix well. Set aside to activate.', 'Put refined flour, wheat flour, 85 grams castor sugar and salt in an electric blender and blend. Add activated yeast and blend again.', 'Add lemon zest and blend. Add 225ml water gradually and blend to make a dough. Add oil and blend to make a soft dough.', 'Dust a bowl with some refined flour and transfer the dough into it. Cover with damp muslin cloth and set aside to prove for 20-25 minutes.', 'Grease a loaf tin with some butter and dust with some flour.', 'Dust the worktop with some flour, transfer the dough and knock back to release excess air.', 'Add almonds, figs, cranberries and prunes and knead well.', 'Transfer the prepared dough into the greased loaf tin, cover with damp muslin cloth and set aside to prove for 15-20 minutes.', 'Preheat oven to 180deg C.', 'Place the tin in the preheated oven and bake for 20-25 minutes, brushing with some butter. Remove from oven and cool.', 'Demould, slice and serve.']

title: Gajar ke Murabbe ka Custard Cake
method: ['Heat 1 cup water in a non-stick pan, add carrot slices, saffron and sugar and cook for 4-5 minutes or till the carrots are completely cooked.', 'Leaving 1 cm border all around, slice a thin layer from the top of the cake. Scoop out some of the cake from this area to make a pocket.', 'Moisten the inner wall of the pocket with the sugar syrup. Crumble the scooped out cake and add to the carrot mixture.', 'Mix well and transfer the carrot mixture into the cake pocket. Roughly mash the set custard and put it over the carrot mixture.', 'Garnish with tutti fruity, blanched pistachios and chocolate sauce.', 'Cut into wedges, place on a serving plate and serve.']

title: Keema Anda Curry - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds and onion, mix and saute till lightly browned.', 'Add salt, ginger-garlic paste and red chilli paste, mix and saute for a minute.', 'Add tomato puree and mix well. Add chilli powder, coriander powder, turmeric powder and cumin powder, mix and saute till oil separates from the masala.', 'Add chicken mince and mix well. Add salt and mix. Add garam masala powder and crushed peppercorns, mix and cook till the mince is fully done.', 'Quarter each egg and add to the pan. Add butter and coriander leaves and mix gently.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander sprig and serve hot.']

title: Macaroni Mazaa
method: ['Heat sufficient water in a non-stick deep pan.', 'Add half teaspoon oil and a little salt and boil the macaroni till al dente. Drain and refresh. Spread out onto a plate.', 'Heat the remaining oil in a non-stick pan and add the onions and saute till translucent. Add the sweet corn and saute for a couple of minutes. Add the capsicum and baked beans and saute for three to four minutes.', 'Add the boiled macaroni, tomato ketchup, red chilli sauce, soy sauce and salt and toss gently. Add the cream and toss gently.', 'Sprinkle the cheese and serve hot.']

title: Tea Pot Soup With Oriental Vegetables
method: ['Boil together chicken stock, vinegar, light soy sauce and salt in a deep pan. Reduce heat and simmer for three to four minutes. Add prawns and cook for half a minute or till the prawns turn pink.', 'Remove the prawns and place each prawn in a separate tea pot. Divide the mushrooms, chicken, almonds equally into four portions and place them in four teapots.', 'Pour the hot broth into each tea pot and serve immediately garnished with spinach leaves and lemon.']

title: Lasagna Pesto
method: ['Preheat oven to 180degC.', 'Heat oil in a non stick pan, add brinjal slices and cook lightly.Roughly chop onions and slice mushrooms.', 'Arrange 3 lasagna sheets in an ovenproof dish to cover the base. Spread 2 tbsps pesto sauce over them followed by mushrooms and onions.', 'Pour  1/4  cup white sauce over the vegetables and arrange 3 more lasagna sheets.Spread 2 tbspspesto sauce over them followed by  1/4  cup white sauce. Sprinkle  1/4  cup mozzarella cheese and arrange brinjal slices over it. Sprinkle black pepper powder.', 'Spread tomato concasse and arrange 3 more lasagna sheets. Over these spread the remaining pesto sauce, fresh basil leaves and  1/4  cup white sauce. Over this spread the remaining lasagna sheets topped with the remaining white sauce, remaining mozzarella cheese and parmesan cheese.', 'Bake in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes. Serve hot.']

title: Methi Chaman
method: ['Heat ghee in a non-stick pan, add caraway seeds, garlic and fenugreek leaves. Mix well and saute for 2 minutes.', 'Add salt and mix again. Saute for 2-3 minutes and add buttermilk. Mix and cook for 4-5 minutes.Cut paneer into  1/2  inch triangles.', 'Add turmeric powder, red chilli powder, green cardamom powder and white pepper powder to the fenugreek leaves in the pan. Mix well and cook for 3-4 minutes.', 'Add spinach puree and mix. Add paneer and mix well. Cook for 2-3 minutes more. Serve hot.']

title: Burnt Garlic Vegetable Fried Rice
method: ['Finely chop garlic cloves, string the French beans and chop them finely. Finely shred cabbage, peel and grate carrot. Slice spring onion bulbs and finely chop the spring onion green stalk.', 'Boil sufficient water in a deep pan and add salt. Drain and add the rice cover and cook till the rice is  3/4  done. Drain and spread the rice on a plate to cool down.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick wok, add garlic and saute on high heat till golden brown. Add spring onion bulbs, mix and saute for 30 seconds.', 'Add French beans, carrot and cabbage, mix and saute for 1 minute. Add salt and soy sauce and mix well.', 'Add rice and adjust salt, toss and cook for 1 minute. Cover and cook on low heat for 2 minutes. Switch off heat, add vinegar and mix well.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with spring onion greens and serve hot.']

title: Brownie - No Egg
method: ['Preheat oven at 180o C. Grease a square cake tin with some butter and dust with some flour.', 'Heat milk in a non-stick pan till warm.', 'Take chocolate in a bowl. Add warm milk and butter and mix well till the chocolate melts completely.', 'Add Sugar Free Natura Diet Sugar and walnuts and mix well. Add vanilla essence. Mix well', 'Sift together flour and baking powder into the chocolate mixture and mix till well blended into a batter.', 'Pour the batter into the prepared tin, tap a little and place it in the preheated oven. Bake for thirty minutes.', 'Remove tin from oven and cool brownie down to room temperature. Remove brownie from tin, cut into pieces and serve warm.']

title: Egg Fried Rice Recipe - SK Khazana
method: ['Break eggs into a bowl, add salt and beat well.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, pour whisked eggs and scramble lightly.', 'Add spring onions, salt, crushed black pepper, cooked rice, vinegar and light soy sauce and toss gently for 2-3 minutes.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot garnished with the spring onion greens.']

title: Sattu Pancakes
Main ingredients: Sattu, Yogurt, Whole wheat flour, Butter, Jaggery powder, Milk

title: Watermelon and Rose Cubes
method: ['Put 2 watermelon balls and a mint leaf in each square of an ice tray mould. Top up with rose syrup water, cover and freeze for 3-4 hours or till set.', 'Put cumin seeds, black salt and chaat masala in a mortar and crush with the pestle into fine powder.', 'Put 4-5 watermelon and rose cubes into each serving glass, add  1/2  teaspoon crushed cumin seeds mixture, 3-4 torn mint leaves and  1/2  cup white aerated drink and mix.', 'Garnish the rim of each glass with watermelon triangle and serve chilled immediately.']

title: Palak Paneer Sandwich
ingredients: ['1 medium bunch spinach (palak), blanched and shredded', '200 grams cottage cheese (paneer), grated', '8 slices of bread', '1 tablespoon oil', '1 tablespoon chopped garlic', '1 green chilli, chopped', 'Salt to taste', '4 tablespoons grated processed cheese', '3 tablespoons grated mozzarella cheese', 'Butter as required', 'Tomato ketchup to serve', 'French fries to serve']
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add chopped garlic, green chilli, and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add spinach and saute well. Add salt and saute for 1-2 minutes. Transfer to a bowl.', 'In the same bowl, add cottage cheese, processed cheese, mozzarella cheese, and mix well.', 'Apply butter on 4 slices of bread, place a portion of the prepared stuffing on each and spread evenly. Cover with remaining slices of bread and apply butter on top.', 'Grease a grill toaster with butter and place the prepared sandwiches with the butter side up and grill till done.', 'Cut the sandwiches in half diagonally. Serve hot with French fries and tomato ketchup.']

title: Madras Curry Powder
ingredients: ['1 cup coriander seeds', '1 tablespoon black peppercorns', '1 teaspoon fenugreek seeds', '1 tablespoon cumin seeds', '1 tablespoon fennel seeds', '10-12 cloves', '1 teaspoon mustard seeds', '1 inch cinnamon', '10-12 green cardamoms', '10-12 dried red chillies', '20-25 curry leaves', '2 bay leaves', ' 1/2  teaspoon asafoetida (hing)', '6-8 garlic cloves, sliced and fried', ' 1/4  cup fried onions', '1 1/2  tablespoons turmeric powder', 'Salt to taste']
method: ['Heat a earthenware pot, add coriander seeds, black peppercorns, fenugreek seeds, cumin seeds, fennel seeds, cloves, mustard seeds, cinnamon, green cardamoms and dried red chillies and dry roast for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add curry leaves and bay leaves and dry roast for 1 minute.', 'Add asafoetida and mix well. Transfer into a bowl and allow to cool down to room temperature.', 'Add fried garlic and fried onions and mix well.', 'Transfer into a blender jar, add turmeric powder and salt and grind to fine powder.', 'Transfer into a bowl and let it cool completely. Store in an airtight container and use as required.']
Main ingredients: Coriander seeds, Black peppercorns, Fenugreek seeds, Fennel seeds, Cloves, Cinnamon, Green cardamoms, Black cardamoms, Dried red chillies,  Curry leaves, Garlic, Onion

title: Chicken Tikka Thai Style
method: ['Heat sufficient coal in a barbeque.', 'Take chicken pieces in a bowl, add Thai red curry paste and mix well. Add coconut milk and salt and mix well. Add olive oil and mix well. If you have the time you can keep the chicken in a refrigerator to marinate for 1-2 hours.', 'Pierce each skewer through 3-4 chicken pieces and place them on the barbeque. Cook, rotating the skewers, basting with a little butter, till cooked completely.', 'Spread the tossed salad in the centre of a serving plate, sprinkle some fried peanuts over the salad, place the chicken skewers over them and serve hot lemon wedges.']

title: Thai Chicken Mango Curry-Cook Smart
method: ['Peel mango.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add red curry paste and saute. Add onion and saute well.', 'Roughly chop ginger and add, mix and saute well.', 'Add mushrooms, mix and cook on high heat.', 'Add chicken pieces and mix well. Add sweet potato stock, mix, cover and cook for 10 minutes.', 'Slice peeled mango.', 'Add brown sugar, fish sauce and coconut milk, reduce heat and mix well.', 'Add basil leaves and mango slices and mix well. Cover and cook on low heat till the chicken is cooked.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Tawa Pulao - Street Food
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add cumin seeds and saute till well browned. Add the onion and saute till lightly browned. Add ginger paste, garlic paste and tomatoes and saute till tomatoes become soft.', 'Add green peas, carrot, pav bhaji masala, red chilli paste and a little water. Mix and cook for two to three minutes.', 'Add the rice and mix. Add salt, green capsicum, coriander leaves and lemon juice and mix well.', 'Cook on high heat for a couple of minutes. Serve hot.']

title: Chocolate and Nut Rolls
method: ['To make sugar syrup, heat sugar in a non-stick pan. Add sufficient water and cook till the sugar dissolves.', 'Take refined flour in a bowl. Add  1/4  cup milk and knead into a semi soft dough. Set aside for 10-15 minutes.', 'Add  1/2  teaspoon milk to sugar syrup and mix well. Add lemon wedge, mix and remove the scum.', 'Combine chocolate and nuts in a bowl. Mix well.', 'Divide dough into equal portions. Grease a worktop with some oil, place the portions on it and roll out into medium size rotis. Cut them into squares or rectangles.', 'Place a portion of chocolate-nuts mixture in the center of the squares or rectangles, apply milk on the edges, roll and to seal the edge and make rolls.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Deep-fry rolls till golden and crisp, Drain and put them in the sugar syrup to . Soak for a few minutes.', 'Drain, arrange them on a serving plate and serve immediately garnished with nuts.']

title: Goan Peas Coconut Pulao
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan and add peppercorns, cardamoms, bay leaves, cloves, cinnamon and saute for 30 seconds.', 'Add ginger-garlic-green chilli paste, mix and saute. Add onion, mix and saute till translucent.', 'Add rice, mix and saute for a minute.', 'Boil 2 1/2  cups water in a microwave.', 'Add peas to the rice and cook for a minute on high heat. Add salt and mix well. Add boiled water and stir to mix. Cover and cook till it boils. Reduce heat and cook for 5-6 minutes.', 'Add coconut milk and mix well. Reduce heat, cover and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add lemon juice and mix well.', 'Serve hot garnished with a coriander sprig.']

title: Kulkul
method: ['Take butter in a bowl, add egg yolk and beat with an electric beater. Sieve powdered sugar into the bowl and continue to beat with the electric beater.', 'Sieve refined flour and salt into the bowl and mix. Add coconut milk, mix and knead into a stiff dough.', 'Divide the dough into small portions, spread each on the back of a fork and press lightly and roll to form kulkul. Place them on a plate.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai, gently slide in the kulkuls into hot oil and deep-fry till golden. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Place them on a serving plate, dust icing sugar over them']

title: Butter Chicken Dumplings
method: ['Line a steamer with iceberg lettuce leaves.', 'Put tomatoes in a pressure cooker, add  1/2  cup water, mace, cardamoms, garlic, ginger, chilli powder, salt and 2 tablespoons butter, mix, cover and cook under pressure till 3-4 whistles are given out.', 'Put chicken tikka, remaining butter, 1 tablespoon cream, chaat masala and coriander leaves in a bowl and mix well.', 'Put some chicken tikka mixture in the center of each wonton sheet, get the ends together, press the center lightly and tie with a chive strip to seal.', 'Heat some water in a small deep non-stick pan. Place the lined steamer on top and bring water to boil.', 'Place the chicken wontons in the lined steamer, cover and steam for 4-5 minutes.', 'Blend the pressure cooked tomatoes with a hand blender to a smooth mixture.', 'Heat another deep non-stick pan and strain the tomato mixture into it. Add garam masala powder, dried fenugreek powder and honey and mix. Add remaining cream, mix and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Put tomato gravy in a serving plate, place the steamed wontons over it and serve immediately.']

title: Beancurd Bhurjee Sandwich
method: ['Finely chop onion, ginger and green chillies separately.', 'Heat oil in a non stick pan, add onion and saute. Chop tomato. Add ginger and green chillies to the onion and saute for 2 minutes.', 'Add tomato and mix and saute. Crumble bean curd. Add turmeric powder and red chilli powder to the pan and mix. Add bean curd and salt and mix and saute for 1-2 minutes.', 'Chop coriander leaves and mint leaves and add and mix well.', 'Heat a grill. Spread bean curd mixture over 4 brown bread slices, cover with the remaining 4 slices.', 'Drizzle a little oil on the grill, place the sandwiches on it, close the lid and grill till golden and crisp. Serve hot.']

title: Til Gud Laddoo - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat a non-stick pan, add white sesame seeds and roast on low heat till crisp and light brown. Transfer into a bowl.', 'Add dried coconut to the same pan and roast on low heat till light brown. Transfer into the same bow and mix.', 'Heat ghee in the same pan, chikki wala gud and let it melt. Further cook on medium heat till the syrup reaches hard ball consistency.', 'Add sesame seeds mixture to the melted jiggery. Add peanuts, roasted chana dal and nutmeg powder and mix well. Roll into laddoos while still hot and keep them on a plate to cool.', 'Serve or store in an airtight container to serve when required.']

title: Secret Pizza
method: ['Preheat oven to 180degC . Place 2 brown bread slices on a baking tray and toast in the preheated oven. In a bowl, mix pizza pasta sauce and veg Bolognese sauce.', 'Take the toasted bread slices out of the oven. Spread the sauce mixture over them generously.', 'Cut mozzarella cheese into small cubes and spread them over the sauce. Over that spread a little onion slices, red capsicum slices, green capsicums, jalapenos, black olives. Put some more mozzarella cheese pieces over the vegetables.', 'Turn on the temperature of the oven to its highest, keep the tray in it and bake till the cheese begins to melt. Cut into triangles and serve hot.']

title: Masala Breakfast Dalia
method: ['Chop ginger finely. Cut green chillies and onion into large pieces. Heat oil in a non stick pan, add 1 cumin seeds and saute till light brown.', 'Add ginger, green chillies and onion and saute till lightly coloured. Drain and add dalia to the pan and mix. Add turmeric powder, salt and mix well. Add green peas and 3 cups water and mix. Cover and cook on the low heat till done. Cut tomato into large pieces and add. Mix well and serve hot.']

title: Plum and Grape Tea Cake
method: ['Preheat oven at 180degC. Line a 7-inch round cake tin by greasing with little butter and dusting with little flour.', 'Cut grapes into quarters. Roughly chop plums discarding the seed. Put these fruits in a bowl.', 'Cream together butter and castor sugar till creamy.', 'Break eggs in another bowl and beat well with an electric beater.', 'Add beaten eggs to butter-sugar mixture and blend with the electric beater till well mixed.', 'Add refined flour, almond powder, lemon juice, lemon rind, chopped fruits and fold lightly till well mixed.', 'Pour the batter in the prepared cake tin, tap a little and level it out. Put the tin in preheated oven and bake for 20-25 minutes.', 'Remove from oven and demould. Cut the cake into wedges, dust with icing sugar and serve.']

title: Five Spice Chicken and Pear Stir Fry
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add ginger and saute till it is lightly burnt.', 'Quarter the USA Pear, remove the seeds and cut into 1 inch pieces.', 'Add red chillies into the pan. Add U.S. Chicken, mix and saute on high heat for 2-3 minutes. Add dark soy sauce and five spice powder, toss well and continue to cook on high heat for 4-5 minutes.', 'Add pear pieces, toss well and cook for 1-2 minutes or till the pear is slightly softened.', 'Add broccoli florets, toss again and cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Take the pan off the heat and transfer into a bowl. Drizzle sesame oil, garnish with white sesame seeds and serve hot.']

title: Green Tea Cake with White Chocolate Frosting
method: ['Preheat oven at 180oC. Grease 2 baking tins with some butter and dust some refined flour.', 'Cream together butter and castor sugar with an electric blender till soft and fluffy. Add condensed milk and mix well.', 'Take a green tea bag in a bowl, add 2-3 tablespoons warm water and set aside. Add green tea decoction to butter cream mixture, mix and whisk well using the electric blender. Add edible green color and vanilla essence and mix well.', 'Sift together refined flour, baking powder and baking soda into the butter cream mixture and fold in well.', 'Fill both the greased baking tins with the batter. Place the baking tins on a baking tray, place the baking tray in the preheated oven and bake for 20-22 minutes. Remove from oven and demould.', 'To prepare icing, heat cream in a non-stick pan till warm.', 'Put white chocolate in another bowl, add warm cream and mix well till chocolate melts. Add whipped cream and fold in gently. Refrigerate till set.', 'Trim off a thin slice from the top of each cake to level the surface and reserve the slices. Halve both the cakes horizontally.', 'Place one half cake on a worktop, brush some sugar syrup, spread some icing mixture and place another half over it. Repeat the process till all the halves are used. Level the sides of the cake and cover with some icing mixture.', 'Put the remaining icing mixture in a piping bag fitted with star nozzle and pipe out rosettes on the outer edge of the top of the cake. Crumble the reserve cake slices and place them in the center. Decorate with the edible golden balls.', 'Serve.']

title: Pumpkin Poriyal
ingredients: ['400 grams red pumpkin, peeled and cut into 1 inch cubes', ' 1/4  cup scraped fresh coconut + for garnish', '2 tablespoons coconut oil', '1 1/2  teaspoons mustard seeds', '2 dried red chillies', '8-10 curry leaves', '1 1/2  teaspoons split skinless Bengal gram (dhuli chana dal)', '1 1/2  teaspoons split skinless black gram (dhuli urad dal)', ' 1/2  teaspoon asafoetida (hing)', '10-15 madras onions, sliced', '2 green chillies, chopped', '2 teaspoons sambhar masala', ' 1/4  teaspoon turmeric powder', ' 1/2  teaspoon sugar']
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add mustard seeds and let them splutter. Break dried red chillies and add into the pan. Add curry leaves, split skinless Bengal gram, split skinless black gram and asafoetida and mix well. Cook till the gram mixture change colour.', 'Add madras onions and saute till translucent. Add green chillies and mix well. Add pumpkin and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add sambhar masala and salt, mix well. Add turmeric powder and mix. Add  1/4  cup water, mix and cover and cook for 8-10 minutes, stirring in between.', 'Add sugar and scraped fresh coconut and mix well. Take the pan off the heat. Transfer into a serving bowl.', 'Garnish with coconut and serve hot.']

title: Sev Parantha - SK Khazana
method: ['Take mota sev in a bowl, add onion, red chilli powder, coriander powder, dried mango powder, cumin powder, salt, carom seeds, green chillies and coriander leaves and mix well.', 'Divide the dough into equal portions and shape them into balls. Dust each ball with flour and roll out into small discs. Apply a little ghee evenly, place some sev mixture in the centre of each disc, bring the edges together and press to seal. . Roll each stuff ball in flour and roll it into paratha.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa, place one paratha at a time on it, and cook for a minute. Flip and apply some ghee on it. Flip again and apply ghee on the other side too and cook, turning sides till the parantha is evenly cooked and golden.', 'Place the paranthe on a serving plate and serve hot with sev kachumber and yogurt.']

title: Shaami Kabab Wrap
method: ['Heat mutton mince in a deep non-stick pan. Add Bengal gram, garlic, cumin seeds, peppercorns, cinnamon, cloves, cardamoms, red chillies, salt and sufficient water and mix well. Cook till the mutton and gram gets fully cooked. Remove from heat, cool to room temperature and grind to a fine paste. Transfer in a bowl.', 'Add chopped onion and green chillies.', 'Chop coriander and add. Chop mint and add along with lemon juice, salt and garam masala powder and mix well.', 'Break egg in a bowl and whisk well.', 'Divide prepared mixture into equal portions and shape them into kababs.', 'Heat some oil in a non-stick pan.', 'Dip the prepared kababs in the whisked egg, place on the pan and shallow-fry in hot oil till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa. Place tortillas on it and roast till hot.', 'Place tortilla on a worktop. Put prepared kabab in the centre, crush lightly and top with onion rings. Drizzle some lemon juice and sprinkle chaat masala on top. Tear lettuce and add. Roll to make a wrap.', 'Serve immediately garnished with onion rings, lettuce, lemon wedges and mint sprig.']

title: Zesty Fish Tikka
method: ['Preheat oven at 180oC. Line a baking tray with an aluminum foil and grease with some oil.', 'Take fish pieces in a bowl. Add lemon juice, mix and set aside for 15 minutes.', 'Combine yogurt, salt, ginger-garlic paste, crushed peppercorns, chilli powder and garam masala powder in another bowl and mix well. Add 1 tablespoon oil and mix again.Add fish and mix well. Set aside for 30 minutes.', 'Grind together rock salt, pomegranate seeds, fenugreek leaves, carom seeds and caraway seeds to a fine powder.', 'Insert marinated fish pieces onto satay sticks.', 'Put the satay sticks onto the baking tray. Place the baking tray in preheated oven and bake for 15 minutes.', 'Sprinkle prepared spice powder on top and serve hot.']

title: Prunes and Walnut Lollypops
method: ['Dry roast walnuts in a non-stick wok for 4-5 minutes. Cool and grind them into a coarse powder and transfer it into a bowl.', 'Cook prunes in the same wok, stirring continuously, for 4-5 minutes or till pulpy.', 'Add walnut powder and green cardamom powder and mix well. Divide the mixture into small equal portions and shape them into balls.', 'Pierce one end of the lollipop stick into each ball.', 'Arrange on a serving plate and serve.']

title: Vella Fae
method: ['Dry roast semolina in a non-stick pan till fragrant.', 'Heat  1/2  teaspoon ghee in another non-stick pan. Add semolina, mix and saute on low heat till 2-3 minutes. Remove from heat, transfer into a bowl and cool down to room temperature.', 'Add sugar, cashewnuts, cardamom powder and soda bicarbonate. Add milk gradually and mix well to make a smooth batter. Set aside for 10 minutes.', 'Heat a paniyaram pan. Pour a few drops of ghee in each dent. Pour a spoonful of batter into each dent, cover and cook on low heat for 2-3 minutes on each side or till they become fluffy and golden.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Perfect French Fries
method: ['Trim the 4 sides of the potatoes to give them rectangular shape. Cut into thin slices and further cut into thin finger like strips and soak them in water.', 'Drain them and put into another bowl.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai, put the potato fingers into hot oil and deep-fry till partly done. Drain them on absorbent paper.', 'Let them cool down to room temperature, transfer them into zip lock bags and freeze them in the freezer.', 'Just before serving, bring them out of the freezer and deep-fry them in hot oil till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Sprinkle salt over them and mix them properly. Transfer them onto a serving platter and serve immediately.']

title: Pinwheel Chicken
method: ['Preheat oven to 180deg C.', 'Roughly chop onion.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds and saute till they change colour, add garlic and saute for a minute.', 'Add chopped onion and saute till translucent.', 'Chop green chillies and add to the pan and mix well.', 'Add chicken mince and saute on high heat for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add salt andgaram masala powder and mix well. Continue to cook for 2-3 minutes. Cool and grind till smooth.', 'Add coriander, mint, cashewnuts and desiccated coconut and mix well. Set aside.', 'Slit chicken breast, stuff with the chicken mixture.', 'Place the chicken over the aluminum foil, sprinkle salt and roll it tightly to make a pinwheel.', 'Put the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 5-10 minutes.', 'Heat butter in a non-stick pan, place the baked chicken and cook for 1-2 minutes.']

title: Rainbow Idli with Beet Ketchup
method: ['Heat a steamer with water, grease the idli moulds with oil.', 'Add salt to the idli batter and mix well, put a spoonful of idli batter in each mould. Top the idli batter individually with carrot, sweet corn, blueberry, nuts, green peas and beetroot puree.', 'Place them in the steamer and steam for 10 minutes.', 'To make ketchup, heat a non-stick pan, add beetroot puree, apple cider vinegar, brown sugar, coriander powder, 5 spice powder, clove powder, black peppercorns, tomato puree and salt and mix well, cook until it thickens.', 'Remove the idlis from the steamer, let them cool and then demould.', 'Wrap them in Freshwrapp and pack in the tiffin with beetroot ketchup.']

title: Roomali Roti - SK Khazna
method: ['Mix together flour, salt and oil in a parat. Add milk and knead into soft dough. Cover with a damp muslin cloth and let the dough rest for 1 hour.', 'Keep a metal kadai upside down over the flame and heat. Spray some water on it and wipe with a tissue.', 'Divide the dough into equal portions, place each portion on dusted worktop and roll out into large thin roti.', 'Place the roti on the upturned kadai, and roast, turning sides, till evenly done on both sides. Fold the roti into half and again into half to make a triangle. Make more rotis similarly.', 'Keep the rotis in a napkin lined basket and serve hot.']

title: Nariyal aur Kachche Aam ki Chutney
method: ['Combine coconut slices, coriander leaves, grated mango, garlic, mint leaves, ginger, green chillies and salt in a blender jar. Add sufficient water and blend into a fine paste.', 'Serve as an accompaniment with your choice of snacks and starters.']

title: Kokum Sharbat - SK Khazana
method: ['Drain the kokum petals and put into a grinder jar, add some water and grind into a fine puree. Reserve the water in which kokum was soaked.', 'Heat reserved kokum water in a non-stick pan. Add sugar, stir, bring to a boil and cook till the mixture becomes thick.', 'Take 4 serving glasses, in each glass put 1 tablespoon kokum puree, 1 tablespoon kokum syrup, black salt,  1/2  teaspoon cumin powder and 1 teaspoon lemon juice. Top with sufficient water.', 'Add some ice cubes and some torn mint leaves, stir and serve immediately.']

title: Rotli Pizza
method: ['Put wheat flour, semolina, salt, baking soda, yogurt, 1 teaspoon chopped green chillies,1 tablespoon coriander leaves and 1 tablespoon oil in a bowl and mix well. Add sufficient water and knead into a stiff dough. Set aside for 10-15 minutes.', 'Divide the dough into equal portions and roll out into thin rotlis dusting with flour.', 'Layer half the rotlis with some grated cheese and place another rotli over the cheese and roll out again to a thin disc.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa. Place a cheese stuffed rotli on it and roast for a minute.', 'Add remaining green chillies and remaining coriander leaves to dosa batter and mix well.', 'Flip and spread some of the dosa batter on the rotli.', 'Switch off heat, top with some cabbage, red bell pepper, green capsicum and press with a spoon. Switch on heat, drizzle some oil around the rotli pizza, flip it and cook for a minute.', 'Flip the rotli pizza again, drizzle some oil all around, spread some grated cheese, cover and cook till cheese melts.', 'Flip the rotli pizza again, drizzle some oil all around, spread some grated cheese, cover and cook till cheese melts.']

title: Chicken Dhansaak
method: ['Heat 3 tbsps oil in a pressure cooker, add cumin seeds, pumpkin, potato, chana dal, tuvar dal, masoor dal and moong dal and mix well.', 'Cube brinjals and add. Add fenugreek leaves, green chillies, ginger and garlic and mix well.', 'Add 3 cups of water, turmeric powder, red chilli powder, dhansaak masala and mix. Add salt and mint leaves and mix.', 'Cover the cooker with the lid and cook under pressure till 3 whistles are given out.', 'Meanwhile heat 2 tbsps oil in a non stick pan. Slice onions and add and saute for 2-3 minutes. Add chicken and mix.', 'Cut tomatoes into big cubes.', 'Add salt, turmeric powder, dhansaak masala and red chilli powder to chicken and mix well. Add  1/4  cup water, cover and cook.', 'Grind tomatoes to a puree and add to the chicken. Tear a few mint leaves and add. Mix well, cover and cook.', 'Switch off the heat under the pressure cooker and let it remain for 10 minutes. Open the lid and mash the mixture with a hand blender. Adjust salt.', 'Add this mixture to the chicken and mix well. Cover and cook for a few minutes.', 'Serve hot with brown rice and kachumber.']

title: Coconut Chikki
method: ['Heat jaggery in a non-stick pan and cook till it melts.', 'Dry-roast grated coconut in another non-stick pan till golden and fragrant. Transfer roasted coconut in a bowl. Similarly, dry-roast poppy seeds.', 'Add sugar to melted jaggery, mix and cook till sugar melts and caramelizes. Add  1/2  of roasted coconut and mix. Add roasted poppy seeds and mix well.', 'Add cardamom powder and mix. Add remaining roasted coconut, mix and cook for a minute.', 'Fill in  1/4  of a silicon muffin mould with coconut-jaggery mixture and level it out. Refrigerate to set for  1/2 -1 hour.', 'Demould and serve.']

title: Sandwich Dhokla
method: ['Take besan in a bowl. Add yogurt and mix well. Add water and whisk till smooth. Keep it overnight to ferment.', 'Dry roast the rice and dal on medium heat for four to five minutes. Cool and grind into a semi-coarse powder. Put the powder in a bowl.', 'Add yogurt and one and a half cups of warm water. Mix thoroughly so that no lumps are formed and the batter is of pouring consistency. Let it ferment overnight.', 'Add green chilli-ginger paste, salt and turmeric powder to the besan mixture and mix well. Add salt, crushed black peppercorns and green chilli paste to the rice batter and mix well.', 'Mix soda and lemon juice in a small bowl. Add half of it to the white batter and the remaining to the besan batter.Heat water in a steamer and grease the dhokla plates. Pour white batter into two plates till half full and fit the plates into the stand.', 'Keep the stand in the steamer, cover with the lid and steam till half done.Take the stand out and remove the dhokla plates. Spread green chutney evenly on both the white dhoklas. Pour the besan batter over this and rotate the plates so that the batter spreads evenly.', 'Fit the plates into the stand and place the stand in the steamer. Close the lid and steam for eight minutes. Take the stand out and let it cool slightly. Garnish with coriander leaves and coconut. Or you can pour a tempering of oil and mustard seeds.', 'Cut into squares and serve.']

title: Pineapple Aur Bread Ka Halwa
method: ['Core the pineapple and cut 5-6 slices. Cut the remaining pineapple into small pieces and set aside.', 'Heat 1 tbsp ghee in a non stick pan. Place the pineapple slices in the pan and cook till they caramelize. Trim the sides of the bread slices and cut into small pieces.', 'Trim the sides of the bread slices and cut into small pieces.', 'Transfer the caramelized pineapple slices into a plate and set aside.Add the bread pieces to the pan and saute in the remaining ghee for 1-2 minutes or till slightly crisp. Then add 2 more tbsps ghee and saute for 2-3 minutes.', 'Transfer the bread pieces into a plate and keep aside.', 'Add the remaining ghee to the same pan. Add cashewnuts, walnuts, pistachios, raisins, sugar, saffron, green cardamom powder and mix well.', 'Add chopped pineapple pieces and cook till they become transparent.', 'Add bread pieces and mix. Add khoya and mix well. Cook for 2-3 minutes. Transfer the halwa onto a serving plate. Garnish with the caramelized pineapple slices and pistachios and serve.']

title: Seed Crusted Chicken with Mango Yogurt Sauce
ingredients: [' 3/4  cup mixed seeds (pumpkin/sunflower/melon/black sesame seeds), toasted', '2 boneless chicken breasts', ' 1/4  cup desiccated coconut', '1 egg', 'Salt to taste', '1 cup rice flour', 'Crushed black peppercorns to taste', 'Oil for shallow frying', 'Sauce', ' 1/2  cup mango puree', ' 1/4  cup yogurt', '3 tablespoons mustard paste', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '2 teaspoons red chilli flakes']
method: ['Put the mixed seeds into a blender jar and grind into a fine powder and transfer onto a plate.Add desiccated coconut to the seeds mixture and mix well.', 'For dipping sauce, take yogurt, mango puree, mustard paste, lemon juice and chilli flakes in a bowl and mix well until combined. Transfer into a small container with a lid.', 'Break egg into a bowl, whisk well, add salt and whisk again. Spread the rice flour on another plate. Add salt and mix well.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan place the chicken breasts on yet another plate, sprinkle salt and crushed black peppercorns over them rub in well on both sides.', 'Dust the chicken with the rice flour, dip in egg and then coat it with the seeds mixture.', 'Place the chicken in the hot pan and cook, turning sides, till both  sides are evenly golden brown. Drain and place them  on an absorbent paper.', 'Cut the chicken into slices and pack them in tiffin with the mango yogurt sauce.']

title: Penne with Spicy Paneer Balls in Tangy Tomato Sauc
method: ['Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a non-stick pan. Add half the onion and 1 tablespoon chopped garlic, mix and saute till onion turns pink. Add salt and mix well.', 'Add green chillies and 1 teaspoon chopped parsley, mix well and saute for a minute.', 'Take the cottage cheese in a bowl. Add the sauteed mixture and parmesan cheese and mix well. Divide the mixture into equal portions and shape them into balls.', 'Break the egg in another bowl and whisk well.', 'Spread the cornflakes and flour on two different plates.', 'Coat the cottage cheese balls in in the flour, dip in the egg and coat in the cornflakes.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a pan. Deep-fry prepared balls till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Heat remaining olive oil in another non-stick pan. Add remaining onion, remaining garlic and salt, mix and saute well.', 'Add remaining parsley, basil leaves, Worcestershire sauce and Tabasco sauce and mix well.', 'Add tomatoes and chilli flakes, mix well and cook for 2-3 minutes. Add fried cottage cheese balls and mix well.', 'Add penne pasta and mix well. Add salt and crushed peppercorns and toss well. Let it get heated through.', 'Transfer onto a serving plate, drizzle some olive oil, top with some parmesan cheese and garnish with some parsley. Serve hot.']

title: Beetroot Browines
method: ['Preheat oven to 200o C. Grease a square baking tin with butter and line it with butter paper.', 'Take flax seed powder in a large bowl, add 9 tablespoons water and mix well, set aside for 5 minutes.', 'Peel the roasted banana and mash it with a fork. Add the banana to the flax seed mixture.', 'Add beetroot puree and mix well. Add honey and coconut oil and whisk till well combined.', 'Sift rice flour into the beetroot mixture and fold in gently. Sift cocoa powder into the beetroot mixture and fold in again. Add salt, baking powder and walnuts and mix well.', 'Pour the batter into the prepared cake tin, keep it in the preheated oven and bake for 20-25 minutes.', 'Remove the tin from the oven and let it cool. Cut it into squares and pack it in the tiffin.']

title: Potato Bites
ingredients: ['3-4 medium potatoes, boiled, peeled and grated', '2 tablespoons schezwan sauce', ' 1/4  cup mayonnaise', 'Crushed black peppercorns to taste', '1-2 green chillies, chopped', '1 teaspoon chilli flakes', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh coriander', ' 1/4  cup dried breadcrumbs + for coating', 'Salt to taste', '2-3 tablespoons corn flour slurry', 'Oil for deep-frying']
method: ['Mix together potatoes, schezwan sauce, mayonnaise, peppercorns, green chillies, chilli flakes, coriander, bread crumbs and salt in a bowl.', 'Divide the prepared mixture into equal portions. Dip in slurry, coat in bread crumbs, roll lightly between your palms, repeat the process once again and place on a plate.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Deep-fry the potato bites until golden-brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot with ketchup.']

title: Pasta in White Sauce - SK Khazana
method: ['To make white sauce, pour milk into a deep non-stick sauce pan. Stud onion wedge and bay leaf with clove and add to the milk and let the mixture come to a boil. Discard the bay leaf, onion and cloves and take the pan off the heat. .', 'Heat a wide and deep pan, add butter and when it melts add refined flour, mix and saute for 1 minute. Add the hot milk and mix continuously so that no lumps are formed. Cook till the mixture is smooth and thick.', 'Add salt and white pepper powder and mix well. Grate processed cheese into the pan, mix well and cook till the cheese melts.', 'Add nutmeg powder, mix well and take the pan off the heat.', 'Heat olive oil in non-stick pan, add garlic and saute till raw smells disappear.', 'Add yellow squash, broccoli florets and cherry tomatoes, mix and saute for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add penne paste and toss well. Add salt and crushed black peppercorns and mix well.', 'Add the white sauce, dried red chilli flakes, thyme and oregano and toss well. Take the pan off the heat.', 'Transfer the paste onto a serving plate, garnish with parsley sprig, drizzle a little olive oil and serve hot with pesto toast.']

title: Amla ka Sherbet
method: ['Put amla in blender jar with 1 1/2  cups water in which amla was boiled and blend into a smooth puree.', 'Heat 1 cup water in a deep non stick pan. Add amla puree and stir. Add sugar and mix. Cook till it comes to a boil.', 'Mix rock salt and cumin powder in a bowl. Add 2-3 tsps water and mix. Add this to the pan and mix. Cook for 10 minutes, removing scum in between.', 'Pour into sterilized bottles and store.']

title: Open Egg Sandwich
method: ['Take mayonnaise, mustard paste, curry powder, green chillies, salt, onion and crushed peppercorns in a bowl and mix well.', 'Cut each hotdog bun horizontally into half.', 'Spread some mayonnaise-mustard mixture on each half bun. Place some egg whites and sprinkle some salt on top.', 'Garnish with micro greens. Serve immediately.']

title: Onion Leeks Masala Rosti
method: ['Heat butter in a non-stick pan, add onions and saute till translucent. Add leeks to the pan, mix well and saute for a minute. Switch off heat and transfer the mixture into a bowl and cool for fifteen to twenty minutes.', 'Put potatoes into another bowl. Add red chilli powder, chaat masala, green chillies, salt, crushed peppercorns.', 'Add the onion-leek mixture along with salt and mix well.', 'Heat a non-stick pan.', 'Divide the potato mixture into four equal portions. Place a portion on the pan and spread into a thin disc. Cook till the underside is golden. Flip and cook till the other side is golden. Make the remaining rostis similarly.', 'Place each rosti on a serving dish. Garnish with cheese and spring onion greens and serve hot.']

title: Milk Bhath
method: ['Put rice in a non-stick pan, add thin coconut milk and salt, mix well and cook for 4-5 minutes.', 'Brush an aluminum tray with oil.', 'Add thick coconut milk to the rice mixture and mix well. Cover and cook till the rice is done.', 'Put the rice into the aluminum tray and spread it evenly. Cool down to room temperature and cut the milk bhath into square pieces and arrange on a serving plate and serve immediately.']

title: Triple Schezwan Crispy Noodles with Crackling Spin
method: ['Cut spinach into thin long strips. Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Cut the boiled noodles into small pieces and deep-fry till crisp. Drain on absorbent paper. Similarly, deep-fry spinach till crisp, drain on absorbent paper, sprinkle some salt.', 'Heat a non-stick pan, add 2 tbsps Schezwan chutney and rice and mix well. Saute till the rice is heated through.', 'Place half the fried noodles on a serving plate. Spread the rice over the noodles.', 'Heat  1/2  cup Schezwan chutney in the same pan. Break the dried red chillies and add to the pan. Add chicken mince and saute for 1-2 minutes. Add  1/2  cup water and cook for 5-8 minutes or till the mince is cooked.', 'Finely chop spring onion greens.', 'Add tomato ketchup to the pan and mix. Add spring onion greens and mix well.', 'Put the chicken over the rice. Top it with fried spinach and remaining fried noodles and serve.']

title: Chocolate Walnut Fudge
method: ['Grease a seven-inch square aluminium tray.', 'Heat a non-stick pan; add the butter and allow it to melt. Add the chocolate and stir till it melts. Stir in the condensed milk and cook for five to six minutes.', 'Add the walnuts to the pan and mix. Add the grated khoya, and vanilla essence, and mix well.', 'Transfer the mixture onto the greased tray and spread evenly with a greased spatula. Cool in the refrigerator before cutting into pieces. Serve chilled.', 'Makes 750 grams']

title: Peanut Butter and Banana Sandwich
method: ['Put peanut butter in a bowl and melt in a microwave for 30 seconds.', 'Lightly toast brown bread slices in a toaster. Peel and slice bananas.', 'Remove bread slices from the toaster and apply 1 tsp butter on each and toast again for a minute.', 'Remove the bread slices from toaster, spread some of the melted peanut butter on each bread slice, place some of the banana slices on 4 bread slices, sprinkle some of the brown sugar on each bread slice, place some of the chocolate chips over banana slices. Cover with the remaining slices. Spread 1 tsp butter on each sandwich. Place half the sandwiches in the griller and grill till golden and crisp from both sides. Similarly grill the remaining sandwiches.', 'Halve all the sandwiches and place them on a serving plate and serve immediately.']

title: Chocolate and Orange Souffle
method: ['Line ramekin moulds on the outside with a parchment paper creating a wall around the moulds.', 'Dissolve gelatin in 1 tablespoon water in a small bowl. Set aside till it blooms.', 'Chop chocolate to fine pieces.', 'Separate egg yolks from the whites and place them in two different bowls. Add 2 tablespoons castor sugar to the yolks.', 'Heat the yolk mixturein a double-boiler and whisk continuously till thick. Add chopped chocolates and cream and whisk till well blended. Addgelatin and mix well. Remove from heat and whisk.', 'Add orange marmalade, mix well and set aside to cool.', 'Whisk the egg whites with an electric blender. Add remaining castor sugar and whisk till light and fluffy.', 'Add  1/3  egg white mixture to the chocolate mixture and fold well. Add remaining egg white mixture and fold gently.Add whipped cream and fold well.', 'Pour the prepared mixture in the ramekin moulds filling a little extra. Refrigerate till set.', 'Dust cocoa powder on the souffle, garnish with orange segments and a mint sprig. Serve immediately.']

title: Dalia Kheer
method: ['Heat ghee in a pressure cooker, add cashewnuts and saute till golden brown. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Add broken wheat to the ghee remaining in the cooker and saute on medium heat for 1 minute. Add milk, jaggery powder, green cardamom powder and nutmeg powder and mix well.', 'Add half of fried cashewnuts, cover and pressure cook on high heat for 5-6 minutes.', 'Open the cooker when the pressure settles, transfer the kheer into a serving bowl, garnish with the remaining fried cashewnuts and serve hot.']

title: Paneer Kulcha-SK Khazana
method: ['Put flour, baking soda, baking powder, castor sugar, salt, milk and yogurt in a bowl, add sufficient water and knead into a soft dough. Set aside for 1 hour.', 'Mix together cottage cheese, onion, dried mango powder, green chillies, coriander leaves, chilli powder and salt in another bowl.', 'Preheat oven to 180o C.', 'Grease your palms and divide the dough into equal portions. Stuff each portion with a generous portion of cottage cheese mixture and shape into balls.', 'Sprinkle some onion seeds on top and flatten into small thick discs. Keep them on a baking tray.', 'Put the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes.', 'Serve hot with yogurt.']

title: Scones - SK Khazana
method: ['Sieve flour in a bowl, add butter, salt, baking powder and castor sugar. Mix with yourfingers till the mixture resembles breadcrumbs.', 'Add milk and knead gently into a dough. Wrap it incling wrap and keep in the refrigerator for 15-20 minutes.', 'Preheat the oven at 180@C.', 'Place the dough between two parchment sheets and roll into a thick disc.', 'Cut out small roundels with a cookie cutter and place them on a baking tray. Apply egg wash on top of each scone and sprinkle castor sugar over them.', 'Place the baking tray in the preheated oven and bake for 20-25 minutes. Take the tray out of the oven.', 'Transfer the scones onto a serving plate, halve each horizontally, apply cream cheese on base half and apply jam on top. Cover with the remaining half and serve.']

title: Tortilla Mango Cups-SK Khazana
method: ['Preheat oven to 180o C.', 'Brush both sides of the tortillas with some butter and sprinkle some cinnamon-sugar mixture on them.', 'Cut each into 4 triangles. Line each dent of a cupcake mould tray with them. Put the tray in the preheated oven and bake till the crust turns golden brown. Remove from oven, cool and demould.', 'Mix together whipped cream and mangoes in a bowl. Spoon this mixture into the baked tortillas cups.', 'Garnish with chocolate chips and serve immediately.']

title: Tender Coconut And Sago Kheer
method: ['Heat two cups of water in a non-stick handi. Add the sago and cook on low heat for ten to twelve minutes or till the sago gets cooked.', 'Add the Sugar free Natura Gold and cardamom powder and stir on low heat till well combined. Add the coconut milk and mix. Cook for two to three minutes.', 'Add the tender coconut, half the pistachios and almonds, dates and mix. Stir and cook for five to seven minutes or till the kheer thickens.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with the remaining pistachios and almonds and serve.']

title: Poha Cutlet
method: ['Dry roast gram flour in a non stick pan till fragrant.', 'Place poha in a large bowl, add yogurt, salt, sugar, garam masala powder, turmeric powder, green chilli-ginger paste and gram flour.', 'Finely chop coriander leaves and add. Add juice of  1/2  lemon and mix everything well.', 'Sprinkle a little oil on a non stick pan and heat. Divide poha mixture into equal portion and shape each portion into a cutlet. Place them in the pan in a single layer and cook, turning sides, till both sides are golden.Serve hot.']

title: Chicken Omelette-SK Khazana
method: ['To make 2 omelettes, mix together half the chicken, 3 eggs, salt, crushed peppercorns,  1/2  teaspoon chilli powder,  1/2  teaspoon chaat masala, half the onion and 1 tablespoon spring onion greens in a bowl. Add  1/4  cup milk and mix well.', 'Heat oil and butter in a non-stick tawa. Pour the prepared mixture on it and spread. Dip bread slices in the egg and set aside. Cook till the underside of the omelette is browned.', 'Place 2 bread slices side by side in the centre of the omelette, flip and fold the omelette from the sides.', 'Place the remaining bread slices on top, halve, flip and cook till the bread are toasted well on both sides. Make 2 more omelettes similarly.', 'Serve hot with tomato ketchup.']

title: Matki Pulao
method: ['Heat oil in a pan. Add cloves and asafoetida.', 'As cloves being to change colour add green chillies, ginger, capsicum and spring onions. Saute for one or two minutes.', 'Add turmeric powder, red chilli powder, coriander powder and moth and saute for one minute.', 'Add a few tablespoons of water so that the masala does not get scorched and the moth cooks completely. Let the mixture become dry.', 'Add the rice and salt to taste and toss well.', 'Serve hot garnished with tomato and fresh coriander.']

title: Vatana Batata Cauliflower Sukke
method: ['Heat two teaspoons oil in a small non stick pan, add black gram and saute till light golden. Add coriander seeds, fenugreek seeds, cloves and red chillies and saute till fragrant.', 'Grind with coconut, tamarind pulp and enough water to a slightly coarse paste.', 'Heat remaining oil in a non stick pan, add mustard seeds and let them splutter. Add curry leaves and asafoetida and saute for one minute. Add onion and saute till golden.', 'Add cauliflower, green peas and potatoes and mix well. Add turmeric powder, ground paste, salt and half cup water and mix well. Mix and cook on low heat for two to three minutes. Serve hot.']

title: Citrus Tea Punch
method: ['Boil 2 cups water in a deep non stick pan. Put a tea bag in it and let it infuse. Add 4 tbsps sugar and stir till it dissolves. Discard the tea bag, pour into a large bowl and let it cool.', 'Hull strawberries and chop them roughly. Halve orange and cut into thin slices. Peel 3-4 slices and chop them roughly.Add lemon juice and the chopped fruits to the tea decoction and mix.', 'Half fill tall serving glasses with ice cubes, pour the tea decoction with fruits into the glasses. Fill up the glasses with pineapple-orange juice. Decorate the rim with a lemon slice and serve immediately.']

title: Prawn Ghassi
method: ['Heat 1 tbsp oil in a non-stick pan, add coriander seeds, cumin seeds, peppercorns and fenugreek seeds and saute till fragrant. Switch off the heat and cool down to room temperature.', 'Roughly chop one onion.', 'Heat remaining oil in another non-stick pan, add onions and saute till translucent.', 'Transfer the roasted ingredients into a mixer jar, add dried chillies, garlic and scraped coconut.', 'Quarter remaining onion and add to the mixer jar. Add turmeric powder, tamarind pulp and  1/2  cup water and grind to a fine paste.', 'Add ground paste to the pan. Add  1/2  cup water and salt and mix well.', 'Add prawns and mix well and cook till the prawns are done.', 'Transfer the prawn ghassi into a serving bowl and serve immediately.']

title: Mixed Vegetable Curry
method: ['Heat 3 tbsps oil in a pressure cooker.', 'For the masala roughly chop onion and put into a mixer jar. Add coconut, garlic, roughly chopped ginger, roasted coriander seeds, fennel seeds, dried red chillies, green chilli and salt and grind to a fine paste with little water.', 'Add cumin seeds, curry leaves and onions to the pressure cooker and saute till lightly coloured.', 'Add potatoes, carrots, beans, cauliflower and ground masala and mix well. Rinse the mixer jar with a little water and add.', 'Add salt, green peas, capsicum and garam masala powder and mix well. Close the cooker with the lid and cook under pressure till 1 whistle is given out. Lower heat and cook for 5-7 minutes.', 'Open the lid of the cooker when the pressure reduces completely and serve hot with roti or chapatti.']

title: Cardamom Spiced Coffee Frappe
method: ['Dissolve coffee powder in 12 tablespoons lukewarm water to make a decoction.', 'Put cardamom seeds in the decoction and let the flavour infuse.', 'Add 1 cup milk in a cocktail shakes alongwith some ice cubes, one part of decoction and 2 tablespoons sugar syrup. Shake well. This will make frappe for one glass. Similarly make frappe for remaining 3 glasses.', 'Place lots of ice cubes into 4 individual tall glasses and pour the frappe in each glass. Serve chilled.']

title: Hot Chocolate - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat cream in a non-stick pan. Add chocolate and mix. Add milk, stir and let the chocolate melt and the mixture come to a boil.', 'Pour into individual mason jars, garnish with chocolate shavings and serve hot.']

title: Chutney Bombs-SK Khazana
method: ['Soak bread slices in some water, squeeze and put in a bowl.', 'Add potatoes, 1 tablespoon coriander leaves, chilli flakes, chaat masala, chilli powder and salt and mix well.', 'Blend together coconut, green chillies, garlic, ginger, remaining coriander leaves, salt, lemon juice and some water to a coarse chutney.', 'Divide potato mixture into equal portions, stuff each with some chutney, place a cheese cube in the centre and shape into balls.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Dip each ball in cornflour slurry, roll in breadcrumbs and slide into hot oil. Deep-fry till they turn golden brown. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot.']

title: VEG EMPANADAS
method: ['Heat olive oil in a non-stick pan, add garlic and saute well. Add onion and remove the leaves of thyme sprigs and mix well. Cook till onion turns translucent.', 'Add mushrooms and saute for 1-2 minutes. Add salt and mix well and cook for a minute. Take the pan off the heat and transfer into a bowl. Allow to cool slightly.', 'Add cheese sauce in the mushroom mixture and mix well.', 'For the dough, take flour in a large bowl, add salt, butter and mix till the mixture resembles breadcrumbs consistency. Add  1/2  cup cold water and knead to a soft dough. Chill in the refrigerator for 1 hour.', 'Dust the worktop with flour and place the dough on top and roll into a thin disc, cut out roundels using a cookie cutter.', 'Place a portion of the stuffing on each roundel and apply water on the edges, fold in half and press to seal. Dip a fork in flour and press the sides to create a design.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai, deep fry the prepared empanadas till golden brown and crisp. Drain on an absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot with marinara sauce.']

title: Hyderabadi Chicken Tahiri - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat ghee in a deep handi, add black peppercorns, cloves, green cardamoms, caraway seeds and bay leaves, mix and saute till fragrant. Add onions, mix and saute till golden brown.', 'Add ginger-garlic paste, mix and saute for 1-2 minutes. Add tomato puree, mix well And saute till fat separates.', 'Add green chillies and yogurt, mix well. Add chicken, mix well and saute on high heat for 4-5 minutes.', 'Add turmeric powder, red chilli powder, garam masala powder, salt, mint leaves and coriander leaves, mix well and saute for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add chicken stock and mix well. Add rice, mix well, cover and cook for 10-15 minutes or till both rice and chicken are cooked completely.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander sprig and serve hot with raita.']

title: Strawberry Cheesecake
method: ['Crush biscuits to a coarse powder and put it into a bowl. Melt butter in the microwave for one minute on HIGH (100%). Soak carrageenan (vegetable gelatin) in hot water in a bowl and stir till it dissolves completely.', 'Add melted butter to the biscuit powder and mix. Transfer this mixture into the spring form tin and press to make a base. Level the surface and keep it in t he refrigerator to set.']

title: Maggi Sandwich - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat 1 cup water in a non-stick pan, add instant noodles with the taste maker, mix well and cook for 2-3 minutes or till the water is absorbed. Take off the heat and set aside.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add onion, tomato, salt and red chilli flakes, mix well and saute for 2 minutes. Add dried oregano, fried garlic and sausages and mix well.', 'Add paprika powder and mix well. Add cheese and coriander leaves, mix well and cook for 1 minute.', 'For each portion, apply butter on 1 slice of bread, apply green chutney and spread some sausage stuffing.', 'Apply butter on another slice of bread and apply green chutney and place this on top of the sausage mixture, chutney side facing down. .', 'Apply a little butter on top of the 2nd slice and spread a some noodle mixture, sprinkle a little grated cheese, red chilli flakes and dried oregano. Garnish with shredded cabbage and serve with green chutney and wafers.']

title: Urad Dal Jalebi - SK Khazana
method: ['Soak Urad Dal in plenty of water for 4-5 hours.', 'Drain and put the gram into a mixer jar, add 2-3 tbsps water and grind well. Add 1 tbsp yogurt and continue to grind. Add 1 more tbsp yogurt and continue to grind until the batter is smooth and of pouring consistency.', 'Transfer this batter in a large bowl.', 'Meanwhile cook sugar with 1 1/2  cups water in a deep non-stick pan and bring it to a boil and continue to cook till sugar dissolves.', 'While the syrup is getting ready whisk the ground batter for 5-7 minutes.', 'Add saffron to the syrup and mix well, cook on low heat for 3-4 minutes or till the syrup reaches one string consistency.', 'Heat sufficient ghee in a shallow kadai.', 'Once the syrup reaches one string consistency, add green cardamom powder and lemon juice and mix well. Switch off the heat, keep the pan down and let it cool slightly.', 'Add baking powder to the batter and mix well. Pour this batter in a jalebi cloth, bring the sides of the cloth to form a bundle. Squeeze the batter into the ghee to make spiral shapes. Deep-fry on low heat, turning jalebis occasionally, till they are golden and crisp. Drain and soak them in the sugar syrup for 1 minute. Make more jalebis with the remaining batter.', 'Drain jalebis from the syrup and arrange on a serving plate, garnish with pistachios and crushed dried rose petals and serve.']

title: Dal Soya Parantha
method: ['Heat ghee in a non-stick pan, add fennel seeds, cumin seeds and carom seeds, mix and saute for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add ginger and green chillies, mix and saute for 2-3 minutes. Add Bengal gram and soya chunks and mix.', 'Add red chilli powder, coriander powder, cumin powder, garam masala powder, black salt, dried mango powder and crushed peppercorns, mix and cook for 3-4 minutes.', 'Transfer the mixture into a blender jar and blend to a coarse paste. Transfer the paste into a bowl.', 'Chop coriander leaves, add to the bowl and mix well. Add salt and mix again.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa.', 'Divide the dough into equal portions and roll each portion into a ball. Roll out each portion to a disc, place a portion of dal-soya mixture in the centre, bring edges together, press to seal and roll into a ball.', 'Dust each stuffed ball with dry flour and roll out into a parantha.', 'Place the paranthas on the hot tawa, one at a time, and cook, basting with ghee, till evenly cooked and golden on both sides.', 'Transfer onto individual serving plates and serve hot with your choice of pickle.']

title: Gatte ki Curry
method: ['To make gatta take gram flour in a bowl, add ginger, turmeric powder, red chilli powder, baking soda, cumin seeds, mint leaves and salt and mix to make a dough. Add 3 tablespoons oil and knead again. Set aside for 15 minutes. Roll the dough into a long cylinder and cut into equal pieces. Shape each piece into a ball.', 'Boil 2 cups water in a deep non-stick pan, add the gattas and cook till done. The gattas will float to the top. Drain them on absorbent paper and reserve the water for the gravy.', 'Heat sufficient ghee/oil in a kadai and deep-fry the gattas till light golden brown. Drain on absorbent paper and set aside.', 'For the gravy, take yogurt in another deep bowl, add red chilli powder, turmeric powder, coriander powder and salt and mix well.', 'Heat ghee in a deep non-stick pan, add cloves, cumin seeds, and asafoetida and saute till cumin seeds start to change colour. Add onions, mix and saute on high heat for 3 minutes or till they turn a light golden in colour.', 'Add yogurt mixture, mix well and continue to cook on low heat for 5 minutes.', 'Add gattas and the reserved water in which gattas were boiled, roasted cumin powder, garam masala powder and salt and mix gently. Cook on low heat for 1-2 minutes', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot. Serve hot.']

title: Basil Flavoured Rice Pudding With Grilled Tangerin
method: ['Heat milk in a deep non-stick pan on medium heat. Chop basil leaves and add. Roughly chop pistachios and almonds and add. Add rice and mix and cook.', 'Peel the orange with a sharp knife and then cut into thin wedges. Add 1  3/4  tbsps brown sugar to the rice mixture. Add cream and mix well. When the mixture thickens, take the pan off the heat and set aside.', 'Heat another non-stick pan, add orange wedges, sprinkle castor sugar and a  1/2  tbsp brown sugar and cook for 1 minute. Cut the orange skin into thin slices and add and mix well.', 'Take the pan off the heat. Put the orange slices in serving bowls, put the pudding alongside, garnish with a few orange peel slivers and basil leaves, and serve warm or cold.']

title: Egg Burgers
Main ingredients: Eggs, Chicken sausages, Olive oil, Tomato, Mustard paste, Romaine lettuce, Mayonnaise, Cheese slices

title: Box Pattice - SK Khazana
method: ['Boil sufficient water in a deep pan, add salt and chicken and cook for 5-6 minutes. Take them out of the water, place on a plate and shred with 2 forks.', 'Finely chop coriander leaves and green chillies separately.', 'To make the stuffing, heat butter in a non-stick wok, add refined flour and whisk well. Add milk and whisk well and cook till the mixture thickens.', 'Add shredded chicken and mix well. Add mustard paste, soy sauce, garlic powder, onion powder, dried oregano, paprika, black pepper powder, green chillies and coriander leaves and mix well.', 'Add salt and mix well. Take the pan off the heat and let the mixture cool down completely.\nHeat sufficient oil in a kadai.\nTake one samosa patti horizontally on a worktop and place another samosa patti vertically over it to form a cross.', 'Place a portion of the stuffing in the center and sprinkle a little mozzarella cheese and top it up with a little more of the stuffing. Fold one side, brush refined flour slurry on top and fold another side. Repeat the process till a parcel is formed. Set aside.', 'Dip each parcel into beaten eggs and roll on breadcrumbs to coat all over. Make more samose in the same way.', 'Slide the samose into hot oil and deep-fry till golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'To make the dip, take green chutney in a bowl, add mayonnaise and mix well.', 'Transfer the box pattice on a serving platter and serve hot with prepared chutney mayonnaise.']

title: Keema Roll
ingredients: ['250 grams mutton mince', '8 small refined flour rotis', '1 tablespoon oil + for deep-frying', '1 teaspoon cumin seeds', '1 tablespoon chopped garlic', '1 medium onion, finely chopped', '1-2 green chillies, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon red chilli powder', ' 1/4  teaspoon turmeric powder', '1 teaspoon coriander powder', '1 teaspoon cumin powder', ' 1/4  cup green peas', 'Salt to taste', ' 1/2  tablespoon chopped fresh mint leaves', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh coriander leaves', ' 1/2  teaspoon garam masala powder', ' 1/4  cup refined flour (maida) slurry', 'Tomato ketchup for serving']
method: ['Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan. Add cumin seeds and when it changes colour, add garlic and saute for 30 seconds.', 'Add onion and saute till golden brown. Add mutton mince, mix and cook for 1-2 minutes. Add green chillies, mix and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add chilli powder, turmeric powder, coriander powder, cumin powder, mix and cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add green peas, mix and cook for 1 minute. Add mint leaves,  1/2  tablespoon coriander leaves and salt and mix well.', 'Add garam masala powder, mix and cook till the mutton mince is fully done. Add remaining coriander leaves and mix well.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Put some mutton mixture in the center of each roti, apply some slurry on the edges and roll.', 'Put the mutton rolls in hot oil and deep-fry till golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot with tomato ketchup.']

title: Healthy Kothimbir Vadi - SK Khazana
method: ['Grease a small steel thali with oil.', 'Take gram flour in a bowl, add salt and 3 cups water and whisk to a smooth batter.', 'Heat 2 tsps oil in a deep non-stick pan, add 1 tsp mustard seeds, a pinch of asafoetida and ginger-garlic paste, mix and saute till the raw flavour disappears. Add coriander leaves, mix well and saute on medium heat for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add turmeric powder, red chilli powder, peanuts and salt and mix well. Add the gram flour mixture and mix well. Cook on medium heat, stirring occasionally, for 5-6 minutes or till the mixture thickens and comes together.', 'Transfer the mixture into the greased thali, spread it evenly and flatten it. Set aside to cool down to room temperature. Cut into 2 inch cubes.', 'Heat remaining oil in another non-stick pan, add remaining mustard seeds, a pinch of asafoetida and white sesame seeds and let the seeds splutter. Add the kothimbir vadis and mix well. Cook on medium heat for 4-5 minutes.', 'Arrange them on a serving platter, garnish with coconut and serve hot.']

title: Paneer Malai Tikka Roll - SK Khazana
method: ['Take yogurt in a bowl, add fresh cream, malai, ginger-garlic paste, green chilli paste, nutmeg powder, green cardamom powder, garam masala powder, chaat masala, salt, cornflour and lemon juice, whisk well.', 'Add the cottage cheese cubes and capsicums and mix gently. Set aside to marinate for 20-25 minutes.', 'Preheat the oven at 200deg C.', 'Skewer the capsicum and cottage cheese cubes alternately onto soaked skewers and place it on a lined baking tray. Brush melted butter on them, keep the tray in the preheated oven and bake it for 8-10 minutes.', 'For each roll, apply chutney in the middle of a romali roti, place one skewer of cottge cheese-capsicums on it and remove the skewer. Keep some onion rings on top and sprinkle some chaat masala, fold the edges and roll it from one side to the other.
