Add tomato, mix and saute tomato turns pulpy.', 'Add coriander powder, red chilli powder, remaining turmeric powder and salt, mix well and saute for 1 minute. Add  1/2  cup water, mix well and cook for 2-3 minutes.Add yogurt, mix well and cook for 3-4 minutes.', 'Add chicken, mix well and saute for 1-2 minutes. Crush kasuri methi and add and mix well. Add cashewnut paste and mix well. Cook till chicken is done.', 'Add sliced tomato, sliced onion and capsicum and mix well.', 'Squeeze the juice of remaining  1/2  lemon and mix well. Add remaining garam masalapowder and mix well. Cook for 1 minute and take it off the heat.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander sprig and serve hot.']

title: Tiger Bread - SK Khazana
method: ['Take yeast in a small bowl, add 1 tsp castor sugar and 2 tbsps warm water, mix well and set aside for 5 minutes to activate.', 'Sieve 2 cups refined flour in a planetary mixer bowl. Add remaining castor sugar and salt and whisk well.', 'Make a well in the center of the flour, add the activated yeast, milk and 1 cup water. Start the mixer and knead into a soft dough.', 'Stop the mixer and add olive oil and knead again till soft.', 'Dust flour on the worktop, place the dough on it and knead slightly and spread into an oblong shape. Fold the dough in three fold. Dust flour on a greased baking tray and place the dough on it. Cover with a damp muslin cloth and set aside to prove for 20-25 minutes.', 'Preheat the oven to 180@C.', 'To make the paste, add the yeast in a bowl, add castor sugar, rice flour, salt, olive oil and 2 tbsps water and mix well to make a thick paste.', 'Apply this paste on the bread with your hand. Place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes.', 'Remove and brush immediately with melted butter on all sides. Allow to cool down and transfer on a serving plate.', 'Slice and serve as required.']

title: Besan Burfi
method: ['Heat ghee in a non-stick pan. Grease an aluminium tray. Add gram flour to the pan and saute on medium heat, stirring continuously, till fragrant and browned.', 'Switch off the heat. Add sugar and stir well till it dissolves and blends with the gram flour. Add green cardamom powder and mix well.', 'Transfer the mixture into the greased tray and spread evenly. Level the surface. Sprinkle almonds and pistachios and set aside to cool and set well.', 'Cut into squares or diamonds or rectangles and separate them.', 'Serve or store in airtight container.']

title: Margherita Pizza - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat olive oil in a non-stick pan.', 'Take fresh yeast and sugar in a bowl, add  1/4  cup water, mix well and set aside to activate.', 'Add garlic to the pan and saute till fragrant, add tomato puree and mix well. Add salt, mix well and cook till the raw smell of tomatoes disappears and oil separates.', 'To make the pizza dough, add refined flour and olive oil to the yeast mixture and knead to a soft dough, adding water as required. Cover the bowl with cling wrap and set aside in a warm place till it doubles in size.', 'Add castor sugar to the pan. Chop the basil leaves and add to the pan. Add tomato ketchup, mix well and cook for 1 minute. Switch off the heat and set aside to cool.', 'Pre-heat the oven to 180@C', 'Divide the dough into two equal portions and shape them into balls. Dust the worktop with some polenta and some refined flour. Keep one ball on it and roll out into a thick disc.', 'Grease a baking tray with some oil and transfer the rolled out pizza base on it. Dork the pizza dough with a fork. Keep the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 5-7 minutes.', 'Bring the tray out of the oven and brush the base with a little olive oil. Spread the pizza sauce evenly all over the base.', 'Spread a generous layer of mozzarella cheese. Tear a few basil leaves and sprinkle all over the top. Sprinkle some salt and mixed herbs. Keep the tray back in the hot oven and bake at 180@C for 15 minutes.', 'Bring the tray out of the oven, cut the pizza into wedges, arrange them on a serving plate and serve hot.']

title: Deep-Fried Cookie Dough
method: ['To make cookie dough, beat together butter, brown sugar and sugar in a planetary mixer, on medium-high speed till well combined.', 'Add egg and vanilla essence and beat till well combined. Reduce speed to low, add flour and chocolate chips gradually till the dough is formed.', 'Divide the dough into 12 equal portions and shape them into 1inch thick balls. Place them on a baking sheet and refrigerate for 1hour or till firm.', 'To make batter, mix together flour, baking powder, salt and sugar in another bowl. Add milk and oil and whisk till a smooth batter is formed.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Dip the firm cookie dough balls in the batter and deep-fry in hot oil till golden brown. Drain on an absorbent paper.', 'Dust with powdered sugar and serve immediately.']

title: Moroccon Chickpea Tomato Salad
method: ['Put chickpeas, tomatoes, onion, parsley and mint leaves in a bowl and toss.', 'To make the dressing, mix together lemon juice, olive oil, paprika, cumin powder, salt and crushed peppercorns in a bowl.', 'Add the dressing to the chickpea mixture and mix well.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Daily Dal
method: ['Drain and put dal in a pressure cooker. Add 2 cups water, salt and turmeric powder.', 'Break green chillies and roughly chop ginger and add.', 'Close the cooker with lid and cook under pressure till 2-3 whistles are given out.', 'Chop onions roughly and chop tomato.', 'Heat oil in a non stick pan. Add asafoetida, cumin seeds and mustard seeds.', 'When the seeds splutter, add onions and red chillies and saute till fragrant.', 'Open the lid of the cooker when the pressure reduces completely.', 'Whisk well with a ladle so that the dal gets slightly mashed.', 'Add tomatoes to the pan and saute till they soften. Add this to the dal and mix well.', 'Pour into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot.']

title: Ragi Oats Dhokla
Main ingredients: Ragi flour, Urad dal flour, Powdered oats, Yogurt, Ginger-green chilli paste, Baking soda, Mustard seeds, White sesame seeds, Green chillies, Curry leaves, Sugar

title: Quick Oats Paniyaram
method: ['Dry roastoats in a non-stick pan for 1-2 minutes. Transfer into a blender jar, blend to a fine powder and transfer into a large bowl.', 'Add semolina, yogurt, carrot, coriander leaves, green chillies and salt and mix well. Add sufficient water and mix to make a semi-thick batter. Rest the batter for 10-15 minutes.', 'Heat 1 tbsp ghee in aa small non-stick pan, add mustard seeds and let them splutter. Add asafoetida and curry leaves, mix and saute for 30 seconds. Add thistempering to the oats mixture and mix well. Add fruit salt and 1 tbsp waterand mix well.', 'Heat a non-stick paniyaram pan and drizzle a little ghee in each dent. Add 1 tbsp batter in each, cover and cook on medium heat for 2-3 minutes. Flip and cook further for 1 minute. Take them off the heat. Make more paniyarams with the remaining batter.', 'Transfer the paniyaram onto a serving plate and serve hot with coconut chutney and sambhar.']

title: Pav Bhaji Tortilla Roll
method: ['Heat oil in a non stick pan. Add onions and saute till lightly browned. Add cauliflower and mix. Add ginger paste and garlic paste, mix well and saute for 1 minute. Add tomatoes and tomato puree, mix well and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add pav bhaji masala, mix well and cook for 2 minutes. Add potato and capsicum and mix.Add  1/4  cup water and mix. Add salt and mix well. Chop coriander sprigs and add. Mix and cook for 3-4 minutes or till dry.', 'Place a tortilla on worktop. Put a portion of bhaji on it and spread evenly. Put onion slices and tear 2 lettuce leaves and put on top. Place another tortilla on top and spread portion of bhaji evenly on it. Put 2 tbsps grated cheese on top.', 'Place a piece of aluminium foil on worktop and put tortilla on one side and roll. Similarly, make the other roll. Cut and serve.']

title: Chocolate Fudge Pie
method: ['To prepare short crust pastry, take flour in a bowl. Add powdered sugar, salt and butter and mix well till the mixture resembles breadcrumbs.', 'Add sufficient chilled water and knead into a soft dough. Refrigerate for 30-40 minutes.', 'Preheat oven to 180o C.', 'Line an aluminium tart mould with the dough and prick with a fork. Place a parchment paper on top and put some beans over it.', 'Place the mould on a baking tray. Place the tray in the preheated oven and blind bake for fifteen minutes.', 'To prepare fudge, pour melted butter into a bowl. Add castor sugar, vanilla essence and eggs and whisk well.', 'Fold in flour and cocoa powder. Add chocolate chips and pecans and mix well.', 'Pour the mixture over the baked tart shell and level it out. Place the tray back into the preheated oven and bake for twenty to thirty minutes. Remove from oven, cool and demould.', 'Cut into wedges, dust some icing sugar on top and serve.']

title: Aloo Angoor
method: ['Grind together ginger and green chillies. Add coriander leaves, coconut and 8-10 grapes and grind coarsely.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds, mustard seeds, curry leaves, potatoes, turmeric powder, dried mango powder and salt and mix well.', 'Squeeze the juice of lemon and add and mix well. Add the ground mixture and mix and saute for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add the remaining grapes and mix. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot.']

title: Vegetable Dhansaak
method:
['Chop ginger.
Crush and chop garlic.', 'Chop green chillies.
Heat ghee in a pressure cooker.', 'Add onions, ginger and garlic and saute.
Add green chillies and continue to saute for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add masoor dal and toor dal and mix and saute for a minute.
Add pumpkin, brinjal, potato, methi, mint leaves and mix everything well.', 'Add turmeric powder, red chilli powder and mix.
Add 3 cups water and mix.', 'Add tomatoes and salt and mix. Add dhansaak masala and mix. Close the cooker with the lid and cook under pressure till 2 whistles are given out.', 'Open the lid when the pressure reduces completely, mash the mixture with a hand blender till completely mashed.', 'Add tamarind pulp and mix well.
Simmer for 2-3 minutes.', 'Serve hot with Parsi brown rice.']

title: Baby Uttapam
method:
['Drain and grind urad till fine and fluffy.
Transfer into a bowl.', 'Drain and grind rice till smooth.
And transfer it into the same bowl and mix the two batters well.', 'Set aside in a warm place to ferment overnight.
Add salt and whisk well.', 'Heat a non stick dosa tawa and spread small amounts of batter into small uttapams keeping a little distance between each.
Slice onion and sprinkle a little on each uttapam.', 'Slice green capsicum and sprinkle a little on each uttapam. Slice tomato and sprinkle a little on each uttapam.', 'Sprinkle a little mozzarella cheese on each.
Drizzle a little oil around each, cover and cook on medium heat till they get cooked and the cheese melts.
Serve hot.']

title: Chocolate And Orange Cake
method: ['Preheat the oven to 190degC.', 'Grease a cake tin. Cream sugar and butter together till light and fluffy. Break the eggs into the mixture, add yogurt and mix well. Add orange juice and orange rind and mix.', 'Sieve flour and soda bicarbonate into it and mix well. Add grated chocolate and mix. Pour the batter into the prepared tin and bake in the preheated oven at 190degC for twenty five minutes.', 'Remove onto a wire rack to cool.', 'Slice and serve.']

title: Soya Keema Urad
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Roughly chop onions.', 'Add 1 tsp caraway seeds and onions to the pan and saute till onions turn translucent.', 'Dry roast 1 tbsp caraway seeds, black cardamom, cinnamon, cloves and black peppercorns in a non-stick pan. Switch off the heat and set aside to cool.', 'Add tomato and ginger-garlic paste to the onions, mix well and saute for 2-3 minutes. Add turmeric powder and red chilli powder and mix well.', 'Add soya granules, black gram and mix well. Add 1 cup water and salt and mix well. Cover and cook till gram is fully done.', 'Transfer the roasted spices into a grinder jar and grind to a fine powder.', 'Roughly chop fresh coriander sprigs and add to the pan. Cover and continue to cook for 3-4 minutes.', 'Add 1 tsp spice powder and mix well. (Store the remaining ground powder in an airtight container for future use.)', 'Add coconut and mix well. Switch off the heat but keep the pan covered for 8-10 minutes.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with coconut and coriander sprig and serve hot.']

title: Creamy Garlic Butter Prawns
method: ['Heat butter in a non-stick pan. Add garlic and saute till fragrant. Add spinach leaves, mix and cook till the leaves wilt.', 'Add onion, mix and saute till translucent. Add prawns, mix and cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add milk, tomatoes and Italian herbs, mix well and simmer for 1-2 minutes or till the sauce thickens.', 'Add white wine, cornflour and cheese, mix well and cook till the prawns are fully done. Add parsley and mix well.', 'Garnish with parsley and serve hot with spaghetti.']

title: Kasoori Paneer Tikka
method: ['Cut paneer into one and a half inch sized pieces. Deseed and cut green capsicums into one and a half inch sized pieces. Grind green chillies, ginger and garlic into a fine paste.', 'Take hung yogurt in a bowl. Add green chutney, green chilli-ginger-garlic paste, turmeric powder, ajwain, garam masala powder, half of the chaat masala, kasoori methi powder, roasted chana dal powder, fresh cream, salt and mix.', 'Add paneer cubes to the marinade and add mustard oil.', 'Soak wooden skewers in water for fifteen minutes.']

title: Beetroot Vade
method: ['Grate beetroot into a bowl. Roughly chop onions.', 'Grind Bengal gram, ginger, garlic, dried chillies, fennel seeds, curry leaves, salt and 2 tbsps water to a coarse mixture.', 'Add the ground mixture to the beetroot. Add onions and rice flour and mix well.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Dampen palms with water, divide the beetroot mixture into equal portions and pat them with finger tips into round vadas.', 'Deep-fry vadas in hot oil till brown and crisp on both sides. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Transfer the vadas on a serving plate and serve hot.']

title: Dry Fruit Sundae
method: ['Place 3-4 tablespoons oats in a jar. Drizzle 1 tablespoon black currant syrup and top with 2 tablespoons chopped canned fruits, some cashewnuts and vanilla ice cream and press a little.', 'Top again with remaining oats, drizzle 1 tablespoon black currant syrup and add remaining fruits. Drizzle remaining black currant syrup and top with some almonds and some cashewnuts.', 'Top with some pistachios and chocolate ice cream. Garnish with some more pistachios, almonds and cashewnuts and serve immediately.']

title: Potato Chips and Sev Omelette
method: ['Preheat oven to 180o C. Chop onion.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add onion and saute.', 'Break eggs into a bowl. Add chilli sauce and beat well. Add cream and beat again.', 'Grease a cake tin/tart mould with oil.', 'When the onion turns a light golden, pour beaten eggs into the pan and cook slightly.', 'Spread potato chips in the cake tin/tart mould.', 'Remove pan from heat and scramble eggs a little. Pour the egg mixture on the potato chips.', 'Roughly chop parsley springs and sprinkle on top. Top with sev and bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Rose Caramel Custard
method: ['Preheat oven at 180degC.', 'Heat 1 cup sugar in non-stick pan alongwith 3-4 tbsps water and cook till sugar caramelizes.', 'Line individual ramekin moulds and a glass baking dish with some caramel.', 'Break eggs in a bowl and whisk well.', 'Heat milk in another non-stick pan till just warm.', 'Add remaining sugar, vanilla essence and rose water to the egg and whisk well. Add the lukewarm milk and rose syrup and whisk again. Strain the prepared egg-rose syrup mixture in another bowl.', 'Fill the ramekin moulds and baking dish with prepared egg-rose syrup mixture.', 'Fill a baking tray with some water. Place the ramekin moulds and baking dish on the baking tray. Cover the moulds and baking dish with an aluminum foil and make a few holes on top.', 'Place the baking tray in preheated oven and bake for 35 minutes. Remove from heat and refrigerate to cool.', 'Serve chilled.']

title: Cheese Potato Masala Sandwich
method: ['Preheat a sandwich griller.', 'For one sandwich, apply 1 tsp butter on one side of a bread slice and 2 tsp green chutney. Layer 4-5 potato slices and sprinkle salt and some Bombay sandwich masala over them.', 'Layer some strips of mixed capsicums, some halved onion slices and sprinkle some grated cheese.', 'Apply 1 tsp butter on another white bread slice and place it buttered side down on top of the first slice. Apply 1 tsp butter on top.', 'Repeat the same procedure for remaining white and brown bread slices.', 'Brush some butter on the sandwich griller, place 2 sandwiches on it, close it and grill for 5 minutes or till brown grill marks appear on both sides of sandwich.', 'Cut each sandwich into 4 triangles and arrange them on a serving platter. Garnish each triangle with a cherry strung on a toothpick. Keep a carrot flower one side, sprinkle some grated carrot over the sandwiches and some mixed capsicum strips and serve them immediately with potato wafers and tomato ketchup.']

title: Murgh Badami
method: ['Put chicken pieces in a bowl, add ginger-garlic paste, turmeric powder, 1 teaspoon red chilli powder and salt and mix well. Set aside for 15-20 minutes.', 'Dry roast cinnamon, bay leaf, peppercorns, cloves and cardamoms in a non-stick pan. Cool to room temperature and grind to a fine powder.', 'Grind together poppy seeds and almonds reserving some for the garnishing to a smooth paste.', 'Heat ghee in a non-stick pan, add onions and saute till lightly browned. Add marinated chicken and mix well. Add remaining red chilli powder and ground powder reserving some for garnishing and mix well. Cover and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add yogurt and mix well. Cover and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add ground paste,  1/2  cup water and mix well. Cover and cook for 8-10 minutes.', 'Adjust salt and cream and mix well.', 'Sliver the reserved almonds.', 'Garnish with fresh cream, almond slivers, ground powder and serve hot.']

title: Cookie Ice Cream
method: ['Heat milk and cream in a non-stick pan and bring the mixture to a boil.', 'Separate egg yolks from egg whites. Add vanilla essence and castor sugar to yolks and whisk till well incorporated.', 'Add some boiled milk-cream mixture to egg mixture and whisk. Add remaining milk-cream mixture gradually and whisk well.', 'Transfer the mixture into same non-stick pan, place on heat, stir continuously and cook the mixture on low heat till it thickens.', 'Strain the mixture into another bowl and cool. Transfer into an air-tight container, cover and set in the freezer for 3-4 hours.', 'Transfer ice cream into an electric food processor and blend to a smooth mixture. Add broken cookies, discard the blade from the processor and mix well.', 'Transfer the ice cream mixture back into the same air-tight container and set in the freezer for 8-10 hours.', 'Serve chilled.']

title: Amygdalota
method: ['Preheat oven to 180o C. Line a baking tray with a silicon sheet.', 'Grind together almond flour and semolina to a fine powder.', 'In a planetary mixer, beat together egg yolk and castor sugar till creamy. Add almond-semolina mixture and orange zest and mix well. Transfer into a bowl.', 'Whisk egg white in another bowl till stiff peaks form. Add this to the almond mixture and fold in well.', 'Fill this mixture into a piping bag fitted with a star nozzle. Pipe out sixteen small rosettes on the lined tray and lightly press an almond half on top of each rosette.', 'Place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 20-30minutes or till light golden brown. Remove from heat and cool.', 'Serve or store in an air tight container.']

title: Lagan Ka Keema
method: ['Dry roast poppy seeds, chironji and dried coconut on medium heat till lightly browned. Cool and grind with  1/4  cup water to a smooth paste. Dry roast cloves, cinnamon, both the cardamoms on medium heat till lightly coloured. Cool and grind to a fine powder. Grind fried onions with yogurt to a paste. Heat ghee in an aluminium lagan. Add caraway seeds and stir. Add garlic paste and ginger paste, cover and cook for a minute.', 'Add keema and saute on high heat. Add salt and stir. Cover and cook for 5 minutes. Add coriander powder, cumin powder and red chilli powder and mix. Again cover and cook. Add fried onion paste to the keema and mix well. If the mixture becomes too dry, add a little water and cook. Keep coal pieces on a flame. Add the poppy seed paste to the keema and mix. Add a little water, cover and cook. Add coriander leaves and mint leaves and mix well.', 'Cover and continue to cook. Add lemon juice and stir. Add the spice powder and mix and cook. Keep the red hot coal pieces in a small steel bowl and keep the bowl in the centre of the keema mixture. Drizzle a little oil over and cover the pan immediately for about 30 seconds. Open the lid and remove the bowl. Stir the keema well and add saffron milk and mix. Cover and cook till the keema is completely done. Serve hot.']

title: Nariyal Ki Barfi
method: ['Heat ghee in a non-stick pan. Add scraped coconut and saute till fragrant.Add khoya and mix well and saute for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add milk and sugar free, mix well and cook for 2 minutes.Add desiccated coconut and keep stirring for 30 seconds.', 'Transfer the mixture into a greased aluminium tray and spread evenly. Place the tray in the refrigerator for about an hour.', 'Cut into squares or diamonds and serve.']

title: Apple Seviyan Kheer
method: ['Quarter apples and remove core. Heat ghee in a non-stick pan. Grate apples with skin and add to the pan and saute for 4-5 minutes or till light brown.', 'Break vermicelli and add, and saute for 1-2 minutes or till lightly browned. Add reduced milk, mix well and let the vermicelli cook.', 'Add sweet condensed milk and mix well. Add green cardamom powder and almonds and mix well.', 'Add sugar and mix well and cook till sugar melts.', 'Transfer into a serving bowls, garnish with almond slivers and serve hot.']

title: Chicken Manchurian- Sk Khazana
method: ['Finely chop ginger, green chillies and spring onions.', 'Take chicken in a bowl, add salt,  1/2  tsp dark soy sauce, 1 tbsp corn flour and egg whites and mix well.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai, slide in the chicken pieces and deep fry till golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Heat 1 tbsp oil in a non-stick wok, add garlic, ginger and green chillies and saute for 1 minute. Add spring onions, mix well and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add 1 1/2  cups water and mix well. Add remaining dark soy sauce, green chilli sauce, salt, sugar and chicken stock cube powder and mix well. Cook till the mixture comes to a boil.', 'Combine together remaining corn flour and 2 tbsps water and mix well.', 'Add the fried chicken to the wok and mix well. Add 1 tbsp cornflour slurry and mix well. Cook till the mixture thickens.', 'Switch the heat off and add vinegar and half the chopped spring onion greens and mix.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and garnish with remaining spring onion greens and serve hot with fried rice.']

title: Egg Hoppers - SK Khazana
method: ['Take white bread slices in a bowl, add sufficient water to soak.. Drain the rice and put it into a blender jar. Add  1/2  cup water and blend into afine paste and transfer into a large bowl.', 'Mash the bread slices and put into a blender jar, add coconut, cooked rice and  1/2  cup water. Blend into a fine paste and transfer into the same bowl and mix well. Set aside to ferment for 8-10 hours.', 'Add sugar, salt and baking soda, mix well. Add sufficient water and mix to get a batter of pouring consistency.', 'Heat a non-stick appam chetty, prick an onion with a frok, dip it into a bowl of sesame oil and grease the appam chetty with it.', 'For each hopper, pour a ladle full of batter into the appam chetty. Tilt and swirl it to cover the sides with batter. Cook for 1 minute. Break an egg into a bowl and gently pour it over the centre of the hopper.', 'Tilt and swirl the appam chetty so that the egg white spreads over the entire hopper. Sprinkle crushed black peppercorns, dried red chilli flakes and salt over the egg. Cover and cook till it leaves the sides of the pan. .Make more egg hoppers similarly.', 'Transfer the hopper onto a serving plate and serve hot with coconut sambal .']

title: Chicken and Mayo Sandwich
method: ['Put chicken, mayonnaise, salt and pepper in a bowl and mix well.', 'Place a bread slice on the worktop. Put generous amountof chicken-mayo mixture on it and spread evenly. Cover with another bread slice. Discard the edges and cut into triangles. Similarly make other sandwiches.', 'Serve with tomato ketchup or mustard sauce.']

title: Pyaaz ki Kachori
method: ['Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan. Add cumin seeds and saute till it changes colour.', 'Add ginger, garlic, green chilli, fennel seeds and coriander seeds and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add onion and saute till light golden brown. Add chilli powder, dried mango powder and salt and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add crushed peppercorns and saute. Add coriander leaves and mix well. Transfer in a bowl and cool.', 'Divide the dough into equal portions and shape into balls.', 'Make cavity in the center of each ball, put a portion of sauteed onion mixture, bring the ends together, seal and shape into balls. Lightly flatten each stuffed portion using your fingers into small thick disc.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Put the stuffed discs and deep-fry till golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot with date-tamarind chutney.']

title: Mango Fudge SK Khazana
method: ['Grease a barfi tray with some ghee.', 'Heat butter in a non-stick pan. Add mango pulp and cook for 5-6 minutes, stirring continuously. Add condensed milk and cook for 5-6 minutes, stirring continuously. Add khoya/mawa, mix and cook till it melts. Add cardamom powder and mix well.', 'Pour the mixture into the greased tray and top with slivered almonds and pistachios. Set aside till it cools down and sets. Serve.']

title: Nimboo Adrak Pani
method: ['Dry roast cumin seeds till dark brown and fragrant. Slice ginger. Halve 2 lemons and remove seeds and quarter each half. Put ginger and fresh mint leaves in a mortar and crush with a pestle. Put this mixture into a cocktail shaker.', 'Similarly crush 3-4 lemon pieces and add to the shaker. Squeeze the juice of the remaining lemon pieces into the shaker. Add another 1 tbsp lemon juice, salt and black salt.', 'Cool cumin seeds and crush in a clear mortar and pestle. Add  3/4  tsp of crushed cumin seeds into the shaker along with a few ice cubes and  1/4  cup water and shake well.', 'Strain into serving glasses, add a few of the crushed lemon pieces. Fill up the glasses with drinking soda, stir well and serve immediately.']

title: Fried Cheese Burger
ingredients: ['200 grams mozzarella cheese block, cut into 2 inch squares', '4 mini burger buns', '1 cup bread crumbs', ' 1/2  teaspoon garlic power', '1 teaspoon onion powder', ' 1/2  teaspoon dried mixed herbs', 'Salt to taste', ' 1/2  teaspoon red chilli flakes', ' 1/2  cup refined flour (maida)', 'Crushed black peppercorns to taste', 'Butter for toasting', 'Oil for deep fryingLayering', 'Ketchup- mayo for applying', 'Lettuce leaves as required', 'Tomato slices as required', 'Onion slices as required', 'Crushed black peppercorns to taste', 'Salt to taste', 'Pickled jalapeno slices as required', 'Black olives for garnish']
method: ['Spread bread crumbs on a plate. Add garlic powder, onion powder, dried mixed herbs, salt and red chilli flakes and mix well.', 'Take refined flour in a bowl. Add crushed black peppercorns, salt and pour  1/2  cup water and mix till well combined. Dip the mozzarella squares into the refined flour mixture, coat with the bread crumbs mixture, and repeat the process one more time.', 'Place the prepared mozzarella squares into the freezer for 1-2 hours.', 'Slit the burger buns in half.', 'Heat butter in a non-stick grill pan, place the burger buns and toast for 30 seconds.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai, gently slide in the frozen mozzarella squares and deep fry on medium heat till golden brown and crisp. Drain on an absorbent paper.', 'To make the burger, apply some ketchup-mayo on the burger bun base and place some lettuce leaves. Place the fried cheese and arrange tomato slice and onion rings. Sprinkle crushed black pepper corns, salt and arrange some pickled jalapeno slices over it. Arrange some more lettuce leaves on top. Apply some ketchup-mayo on the base of the remaining burger half and place it on top to make a burger.', 'Secure it with a toothpick and garnish with black olives. Serve immediately.']

title: Mixed Vegetable Raita
method: ['Finely chop onion, cucumber, tomato and sprigs of coriander leaves.', 'Heat a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds and dry toast till fragrant and lightly browned. Transfer into a mortar and pound to a coarse powder with the pestle.', 'Take yogurt in a bowl and whisk it well. Add onion, cucumber, tomato, coriander leaves,  1/2  tsp roasted cumin powder and black salt and mix well.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with some roasted cumin powder and serve.']

title: Lemon Pickle Mozzarella Sandwich
ingredients: ['4 buns', '2 tablespoons lemon pickle', '100 grams mozzarella cheese', '6 tablespoons hung yogurt', '20 fresh mint leaves', 'A few fresh coriander sprigs', '1 medium green capsicum', '1 medium red capsicum', 'Olive oil as required']
method: ['Grind lemon pickle with yogurt, mint leaves and coriander leaves to a fine paste.', 'Quarter both the coloured capsicums and place them on a hot griller. Sprinkle a little salt and olive oil over them, close the lid and gill them.', 'Cut mozzarella cheese into  1/4  cm thick slices.', 'Halve the buns and apply the lemon pickle chutney on all the halves. Turn the capsicum pieces on the griller so that the other side gets equally grilled.', 'Place mozzarella cheese slices on all the base halves of the buns.', 'When capsicum pieces get well grilled with grill marks on them, place one piece of each coloured capsicum over the cheese slices.', 'Cover them with the top halves and place them over the hot griller. Drizzle a little olive oil over them, close the lid and press lightly and grill till the sandwiches are well grilled.', 'Halve and serve hot.']

title: Tropical Delight
method: ['For rimming the glass, spread castor sugar on a plate. Grate the zest of the lemons over it and mix well.', 'Rub lemon wedges on the rims of the glasses and dip in the sugar-lemon zest mixture till the entire rim is well coated well. Set aside.', 'To make one portion of the cocktail, pour 60 ml white rum with coconut liqueur into a blender jar, add 60 ml coconut milk, 1 tbsp mango puree,  1/2  cup frozen mango chunks, 2 tsps lemon juice and a few ice cubes and blend into a smooth and thick mixture.', 'Pour into a prepared glass and garnish with a blue orchid and serve immediately.']

title: Chasni Ki Chutney
method: ['Roast cumin seeds in a pan.', 'Add roasted and crushed peppercorns and asafoetida and roast till you get a nice aroma. Add syrup and mix.', 'Add red chilli powder, black salt and salt and mix. Add tamarind pulp dissolved in a little water and cook the mixture for five minutes.', 'Strain through a strainer and use. You can cool and store.']

title: Shanghai Chicken
method: ['Mix egg, chicken, salt and cornflour in a bowl and set aside to marinate for fifteen minutes. Heat sufficient oil in a deep pan, and deep fry the chicken cubes till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Heat one tablespoon oil in a non-stick wok, add garlic and ginger and saute till fragrant.Add green chillies, soya sauce, tomato ketchup, vinegar and brown sugar and saute for three to four minutes.', 'Add carrot, cabbage, green peas, spring onions and peanuts and toss to mix.Add the fried chicken cubes, salt and mix well. Serve hot.']

title: Churi
method: ['Heat ghee in a non-stick pan. Add wheat flour and saute till it turns golden brown and fragrant. Transfer onto a plate and cool.', 'Add sugar, peanuts and dates and mix well.', 'Serve.']

title: Strawberry Cheesecake
method: ['Take Graham cracker crumbs in a bowl, add melted butter and mix. Add 1 tbsp castor sugar and salt and continue to mix till the mixture resembles wet sand.', 'Take cream cheese in another bowl, add sugar, mix till well combined. Beat the mascarpone cheese in a small bowl till smooth. Add it to the cream cheese mixture and fold in gently.', 'Add vanilla extract, lemon juice and mix well. Add a pinch of salt and mix well.', 'Add some whipped cream and fold in gently. Add the remaining whipped cream and fold in well. Refrigerate for 5-10 minutes.', 'To make instant cheesecake, put some of crumb mixture into each stemmed serving glass and press gently. Add dollops of cream cheese mixture and top it with sliced strawberries. Drizzle a little fresh strawberry sauce on top. Sprinkle some crumb mixture on top and serve.', 'For a classic cheesecake, put the crumb mixture into a spring form cake tin, spread it evenly and press down firmly. Keep the tin in the refrigerator for 10-15 minutes.', 'Add some fresh strawberry sauce into the cream cheese mixture and mix well. Pour it over the crumb mixture in the cake tin and spread it evenly. Refrigerate till set.', 'Demould and keep it on a plate. Cut into wedges and keep them on serving plates, drizzle a little strawberry sauce on top and serve immediately.']

title: Haleem
method: ['Take mutton in a bowl, add yogurt, salt, red chilli powder, garam masala powder, green chilli paste, turmeric powder and 1 tbsp ginger-garlic paste and mix well. Set aside in a refrigerator to marinate for 1 hour.', 'Heat ghee in a pressure cooker, add caraway seeds and saute till they change colour. Add black peppercorns and remaining ginger-garlic paste, mix and saute for 1 minute on medium heat.', 'Add split green gram, split Bengal gram and split black gram with skin, mix and saute well for 1 minute. Add split skinless black gram and broken wheat and mix well.', 'Add salt and meat masala and mix well. Add the marinated meat and mix well. Add mint leaves, coriander leaves, 2 tbsps fried onions and mutton stock and mix well. Cover the cooker and cook under pressure, on medium heat, till 6-7 whistles are given out. Switch the heat off.', 'Open the lid once the pressure settles and blend the mixture with a hand blender.', 'Heat the mixture again. Add milk and mix well. Adjust salt and mix well.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot garnished with lemon slices, coriander leaves, fried onions and a mint sprig.']

title: Steamed Ginger Chicken With Asian Greens
method: ['Take chicken pieces in a bowl. Add lemon juice, ginger, salt and black pepper powder and mix. Set aside to marinate for fifteen minutes.', 'Heat water in a steamer. Place a few cabbage leaves in a slotted pan. Place the marinated chicken pieces over them. Keep the slotted pan in the steamer, cover and steam till the chicken is cooked. Heat oil in a pan. Add broccoli florets, pak choy and saute for two minutes.', 'Sprinkle a little water. Add garlic, soy sauce and a little more water. Cook till the vegetables soften slightly. If you want you can grill a few pieces of steamed chicken over a griller.', 'Transfer the greens into a serving plate. Place the chicken pieces over them and serve hot.']

title: Pickled Chicken Parcels
method: ['Mix chicken, mustard oil and yogurt in a bowl. Add coriander, ginger-garlic paste and mix well. Add salt, green chillies and mix well.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add mustard seeds, caraway seeds, onion seeds, fenugreek seeds, fennel seeds till fragrant.', 'Add turmeric and saute for a minute.', 'Add the tempering to the bowl and mix well.', 'Place phyllo sheets on a worktop, cut into squares.', 'Break egg into a bowl, whisk well. Add some water and whisk well.', 'Place a stuffing in the center of the sheet, brush the egg wash on the sides and seal the edges to make a parcel.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, place the parcels on low heat till both the sides are crisp and brown.', 'To make dip, mix together yogurt and chilli sauce in a bowl.', 'Serve hot with a dip.']

title: Aioli Chicken
method: ['Horizontally slit chicken breasts into halves. Transfer into a bowl. Add salt, garlic, chilli flakes, 1 sprig chopped rosemary, lemon zest and lemon juice. Mix well and set aside to marinate for 5-10 minutes.', 'To make aioli, separate the yolk from the egg white and put the egg white in a blender jar. Add garlic cloves, mustard paste and remaining rosemary and blend well. Add 1 cup olive oil and blend again till smooth.', 'Heat 1 teaspoon olive oil in a non-stick pan. Place marinated chicken breasts in it and grill for 3-4 minutes on each side or till the chicken is fully cooked.', 'Tear ice berg lettuce leaves and arrange on a serving plate. Place grilled chicken over it. Drizzle the prepared aioli over it and serve.']

title: Peanut Butter
method: ['Preheat oven to 180deg C.', 'Spread peanuts on a baking tray and roast in the preheated oven for 10-15 minutes.', 'Remove the tray from the oven, transfer the peanuts into a mixer jar and grind to a\npaste.', 'Add oil, salt and honey and grind again to a smooth paste.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl. Spread over toasted bread slices and serve.']

title: Double Chocolate Brownie
method: ['Preheat oven to 180@ C.', 'Take powdered sugar in a bowl, add baking powder, salt, refined flour and cocoa powder and mix well.', 'Add vanilla essence, oil, and break in the eggs and whisk well. Add white chocolate chips and mix well.', 'Grease a glass baking dish with butter and dust with flour.', 'Transfer  1/2  of the mixture into the baking dish, drizzle chocolate-hazelnut spread and top with the remaining batter. Tap the dish lightly on the worktop, keep the dish in the preheated oven and bake for 35-40 minutes.', 'Remove the dish from the oven and cool slightly. Cut into pieces and arrange them on one corner of a serving platter. Keep a little crushed biscuits on the opposite corner of the platter and keep a quenelle of ice cream on top of it. Garnish the brownie pieces with raspberries, blueberries and strawberries and serve immediately.']

title: Turmeric Latte - SKK
method: ['Heat milk in a deep non-stick pan. Pour 2 cups in a large mug.', 'Add Tata Sampann Turmeric Powder to the pan, mix and bring to a boil.', 'Beat the milk in the mug with a frother.', 'Pour the turmeric milk into 4 separate mugs, top each with froth and sprinkle cinnamon powder. Serve hot.']

title: Almond Biscuits
method: ['Preheat the oven to 180degC. Grease the baking tray with butter.', 'Cream butter and brown sugar in a bowl till light and fluffy.', 'Separate egg whites, add to the mixture and whisk till the eggs are incorporated into the mixture.', 'Add refined flour and almond slices and fold into the mixture and make a soft dough.', 'Roll the dough into one-fourth inch thick sheet. Cut with square shaped cookie cutter, place them on a baking tray. Place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for fifteen to twenty minutes or till the cookies turn light brown.', 'Remove the tray from the oven and cool. Arrange the biscuits on a serving plate and serve.']

title: Masoor Dal Berries Chicken Pulao
method: ['Heat ghee in a non-stick pan. Add cardamom powder, bay leaves, cinnamon and cashewnuts and saute till fragrant.', 'Add sliced onion and saute for a minute. Add masoor dal and chicken cubes and mix. Add coriander powder, chilli powder, turmeric powder, garam masala powder and cumin seeds, mix and cook for a minute.', 'Add ginger-garlic paste, mix and cook for a minute. Add drained India Gate Basmati Rice and mix. Add mixed berries, saffron strands, browned onions and salt and mix well. Add 3 cups water, mix, cover and cook for 10-12 minutes or till rice is done.', 'Serve hot with raita.']

title: Princess Cake
method: ['Grease a bowl shaped aluminium mould with some butter and dust with some flour.', 'Cream together butter and condensed milk in a bowl till light.', 'Add yogurt and beat again. Add vanilla essence and beat.', 'Sift together flour, cocoa powder, baking soda and baking powder into the butter mixture. Fold well. Add milk and mix into a smooth batter.', 'Place a ring in a pressure cooker and fill with water till the height of the ring. Cover and heat till steam forms.', 'Fill the greased mould with the batter filling 3/4th. Tap lightly.', 'Place a plate on the ring and put the mould on it. Cover and cook for 15-20 minutes without the whistle.', 'To make butter-sugar icing, combine icing sugar and butter in a bowl and beat with a hand blender till smooth.', 'Transfer  1/2  cup of the prepared butter-sugar icing in another bowl. Add pink food colour and mix well.', 'Place the ready made cake on a turn table. This is the base.', 'Remove the bowl shaped cake from the cooker and let it cool. Demould.', 'Drizzle some sugar syrup on top of the base cake to moisten it. Spread the plain butter-sugar icing on top and level it out with a palette knife.', 'Place the bowl shaped cake on top of the base cake and moisten it by drizzling some sugar syrup on top. Spread some more plain butter-sugar icing on it and level it out with a palette knife. Cover the sides as well with the plain icing and level it out with the palette knife.', 'Keep the hands of a doll upwards and wrap the lower body tightly with a cling film. Insert the doll in the centre of the entire cake.', 'Fill a piping bag fitted with a star nozzle with the remaining plain butter-sugar icing. Fill another piping bag fitted with a star nozzle with the pink icing.', 'Pipe out rosettes of the pink icing on the doll and pipe out rosettes of plain icing covering the entire cake leaving a strip at the bottom. Pipe out pink rosettes on the bottom strip.']

title: Chicken Lazone
method: ['Preheat oven at 180oC. Grease a baking tray with some butter.', 'Take chicken breasts on a plate. Sprinkle salt, chilli powder, onion powder and garlic powder and rub well on both sides.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick grill pan. Place the chicken breasts in it and grill till grill marks appear on both sides. Remove from heat and set aside.', 'Place the chicken on the greased tray, put the tray in the preheated oven and cook for four to five minutes.', 'To prepare sauce, heat cream in a non-stick pan. Add butter and salt, mix and let the mixture thicken.', 'Serve chicken with the prepared sauce.']

title: Apple and Walnut Raita
method: ['Heat a non-stick pan. Add apples, sugar and walnuts and mix well and let the mixture caramelize.', 'In the meanwhile, take yogurt in a bowl. Add red chilli powder, roasted cumin powder, chaat masala and salt and mix well.', 'Chill the yogurt in the refrigerator.', 'Once the apples and walnuts are caramelized, transfer them onto a plate and let them cool down to room temperature.', 'Add apple and walnut mixture to the chilled yogurt and mix well.', 'Serve chilled, garnished with walnuts.']

title: Gajar ka Halwa - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat ghee in a deep non-stick pan. Add carrots, mix and saute for 15-20 minutes or till most of the moisture dries up.', 'Add milk, a little at a time and mix well. Cover and cook on medium heat for 10 minutes or till the carrots get cooked but still retain a slight crunch.', 'Add sugar, mix well and cook on medium heat, stirring occasionally, for 5-7 minutes or till the moisture dries up.', 'Add cashew nuts, almonds and cardamom powder, mix well and cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Transfer the gajar halwa into a serving bowl, garnish with cashew nuts and almonds and serve hot.']

title: Green Chana Barfi
method: ['Put the green chickpeas into a food processor jar, coarsely process it and transfer into a bowl.', 'Heat ghee in a non-stick kadai, add the coarse paste and saute on medium heat for 15-20 minutes.', 'Add mawa, mix well and saute till it melts. Add green cardamom powder, and mix well.', 'Reduce heat and add sugar, mix till well combined. Add pistachio nuts and cashewnuts and mix well.', 'Grease a barfi tray with ghee, transfer the cooked mixture into it, spread it evenly and tap it a few times.', 'Sprinkle almonds, cashewnuts and pistachio nuts on top. Garnish with silver warq. Keep aside to set.', 'Cut into squares or diamonds, arrange on a serving plate and serve.']

title: Sookhi Masoor Dal
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add cloves, peppercorns and saute.', 'Add asafoetida, mix and saute. Add onion and saute till they are golden.', 'Add ginger, green chillies, mix and saute for a while.', 'Add red chilli powder, turmeric powder. Mix well, add dal and salt and mix well.', 'Add a little water, mix well, cover and cook for 2 minutes.', 'Add tomatoes, mix well, cover and cook till the dal is soft.', 'Add garam masala powder and lemon juice. Mix well and let it get through.', 'Serve garnished with ginger juliennes.']

title: Meatballs in Cherry Sauce-SK Khazana
method: ['Blend together mutton mince, salt, crushed peppercorns, 1 teaspoon thyme leaves, mustard sauce, half the onions and breadcrumbs to a smooth mixture.', 'Divide the mixture into equal portions and shape into balls.', 'Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a non-stick pan, add meatballs and shallow-fry till well cooked and browned from all sides. Remove from pan and set aside.', 'Add remaining onions in the same pan and saute till translucent. Add canned cherries, cherry compote and few thyme leaves and mix well.', 'Add salt and crushed peppercorns, mix well and cook for 2-3 minutes. Add some water, mix and cook till cherries turn soft and pulpy.', 'Transfer the mixture into a bowl and blend with a hand blender.', 'Pour it into another non-stick pan and heat. Add the fried meatballs and mix well till all of them are well coated with the sauce.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Kerala Style Mutton Chilli Fry
method: ['Heat a pressure cooker, add mutton, one teaspoon garlic, turmeric powder, cardamoms, cinnamon and four cups of water. Mix and add salt. Mix well, cover and cook under pressure for four to five whistles or till mutton is three-fourth done.', 'Open the lid when the pressure has reduced completely and strain the mutton. Discard the cinnamon and cardamoms and reserve the cooking liquor.', 'Heat coconut oil in a non-stick pan, add mustard seeds and let them splutter.', 'Add green chillies, curry leaves, remaining garlic and ginger and saute till fragrant.', 'Add onions, mix and saute till the onions turn golden.', 'Add mutton pieces and mix well. Add crushed peppercorns and salt and mix again.', 'Add four teaspoons of cooking liquor and mix well. Cook for three to four minutes.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot.']

title: Jamun Shots - SK Khazana
method: ['Put the java plum flesh into a blender jar, add crushed ice, mint leaves, black salt and sugar and blend to a fine puree.', 'Rub the rims of shot glasses with lemon and dip them in a plate of salt.', 'Pour the plum puree into the glasses and serve.']

title: Bulghur Kofta
method: ['Take the bulghur in a bowl. Add salt, crushed peppercorns, paprika and sufficient hot water. Cover and set aside till the grains absorb all the water.', 'Heat olive oil in a non-stick pan. Add the garlic and onion, mix and saute well.', 'Add the lamb mince, mix and cook for ten minutes. Add the salt and crushed peppercorns, mix, reduce heat and cook for ten to fifteen minutes.', 'Add the pinenuts, cranberries and parsley and mix well. Remove from heat.', 'To make the kofte, knead the bulgur till fluffy, ensuring that there are no lumps. Divide into eight equal portions and stuff each with the cooked mince mixture.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Deep-fry the kofte till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Almond Phirni
method: ['Heat almond milk in a deep non-stick pan and let it come to a boil. Reduce heat and let it simmer for 8-10 minutes.', 'Put rice in a blender jar, add  1/4  cup water and blend to a coarse paste.', 'Add this paste to almond milk and mix well. Add a large pinch of saffron and mix well and cook till the rice is cooked and the mixture thickens.', 'Add green cardamom powder and mix well. Cook on low heat for 3-4 minutes, stirring constantly.', 'Add jaggery and mix well. Cook till the jaggery is completely dissolved. Add rose water and mix well. Take the pan off the heat.', 'Pour phirni into individual earthen bowls, sprinkle pistachio slivers on top and garnish with a few strands of saffron and serve chilled.']

title: Focaccia
method: ['Lightly oil a large baking tray Mix the yeast with sugar and four tablespoons of lukewarm water and stir till it dissolves. Top it up with more lukewarm water to get one and a half cups of the mixture. Sift the flour and salt together into a large bowl and make a well in the centre.', 'Pour the yeast mixture into the well and mix in the flour to make a soft dough. Turn out the dough onto a lightly floured surface and knead for eight to ten minutes, until smooth and elastic. Cover the dough with a damp cloth and set aside in a warm place to rise for one to one and a half hours or until the dough has doubled in volume.', 'Preheat oven to 200degC/400degF/Gas Mark 6. Knock back the dough and turn it out onto a lightly floured surface. Gently knead in mix dried herbs and olive oil. Divide the dough into fifteen portions and shape each into a ball.', 'Place balls on the prepared baking tray and pat each with fingertips into a thick five-inch round. Keep a little distance between each. Using your fingertips, poke the dough to make deep dimples over the entire surface.', 'Sprinkle each focaccia evenly with garlic and mix dried herbs. Bake in the preheated oven for twenty five to thirty minutes or until golden. Remove from oven and brush with olive oil.', 'Transfer them onto wire racks to cool slightly. Best served warm.']

title: Seyal Dabal
method: ['Trim the edges of the bread slices if you wish or let them remain. Tear them into medium sized pieces. Heat oil in a pan. Add asafoetida, cumin seeds, mustard seeds and onion. Saute till the onions are translucent.', 'Add tomatoes and stir. Add green chillies, turmeric powder, coriander powder, red chilli powder and mix. Saute for two to three minutes. Add one cup of water and salt to taste. When the water comes to a boil add the torn bread pieces and mix well.', 'When all the water has been absorbed, sprinkle chopped coriander leaves and mix lightly. Add lemon juice and mix. Serve hot immediately.']

title: Masala Chaas - SK Khazana
method: ['Put yogurt in a blender jar, add mint leaves, coriander leaves, green chilli, black salt, cumin powder, chaat masala and some water and blend to a smooth mixture.', 'Pour equally into 4 steel glasses, sprinkle some cumin powder and garnish with mint sprigs.', 'Refrigerate and serve.']

title: Crab Canapes
method: ['Put crabmeat in a bowl. Reserve some spring onions with greens and add the remaining to the crabmeat. Add mayonnaise, salt, crushed peppercorns, olives, half the fresh red chillies, ginger, lemon juice, olive oil and Tabasco sauce and mix well.', 'Slice cucumbers and place them on an absorbent paper so that excess moisture is soaked.', 'Arrange biscuits on a serving platter. Place the cucumber slices on it.', 'Finely chop parsley sprigs and add to the crabmeat mixture. Mix well.', 'Top the cucumber slices with small portions of the crabmeat mixture. Garnish with parsley leaves and remaining fresh red chillies.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Vegan Pasta- SK Khazana
method: ['Heat 1 tbsp oil in a pan, add 1 tbsp garlic and saute for 2 minutes or till raw smell disappears. Add tomatoes, red capsicum and rock salt, mix well and saute till the tomatoes turn pulpy.', 'Add raisin paste and mix well. Take the pan off the heat.', 'Transfer the mixture into a blender jar, add 6-8 basil leaves and blend to a coarse paste. Set aside.', 'Cut yellow capsicum, green capsicum and yellow squash into triangles.', 'Halve cherry tomatoes and slice button mushrooms.', 'Heat remaining oil in another pan, add remaining garlic and saute till raw smell disappears. .', 'Add yellow squash and mushrooms, mix and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add the prepared sauce and mix well. Add  1/4  cup water and mix well.', 'Add yellow and green capsicums and broccoli and mix well.', 'Add pasta and mix well. Add cherry tomatoes and cashew cheese and mix well. Add  1/4  cup water and mix well.', 'Tear remaining basil leaves and add and mix well and take the pan off the heat.', 'Transfer into a serving plate, garnish with basil sprig and serve hot.']

title: Chicken Tikka Croquettes
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Slice chicken tikka and transfer in a bowl.', 'Add onion, green chutney, chaat masala, thick white sauce and salt and mix well.', 'Divide the mixture into equal portions and shape them into croquettes.', 'Coat them with breadcrumbs and deep-fry the croquettes in hot oil till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot with tomato ketchup and green chutney.']

title: Quick Coconut Chicken
method: ['Chop coriander leaves with roots. Put chicken pieces in a deep non stick pan, add fish sauce and mix. Chop green and red chillies and add along with coriander leaves.', 'Grate rind of  1/2  a lemon and add. Add coconut milk, basil leaves and salt and mix. Cook on medium heat till chicken is completely cooked. Alternatively you can cook it in an oven. Put the chicken mixture into individual ramekin moulds after adding coconut milk, basil leaves and salt. Cover and cook in a preheated oven at 180oC for about 30 minutes.', 'Serve hot with steamed jasmine rice.']

title: Palak Paneer Paratha
method: ['Add salt to the wheat flour and knead into soft dough with sufficient water.', 'Heat 1 tbsp ghee in a non stick pan, add ginger, cumin seeds and green chilli and saute till fragrant. Add spinach and saute for a minute.', 'Add turmeric powder, red chilli powder, crushed coriander seeds, salt, chaat masala and saute for 2-3 minutes.', 'Transfer this mixture into a bowl. Add paneer and onion and mix well.', 'Heat a non stick tawa. Divide dough into equal portions and roll them into rotis.', 'For each paratha, spread spinach mixture on one roti and cover it with another roti. Press the edges slightly to seal and roll it further into a paratha.', 'Place a paratha on the hot tawa and cook for 1 minute. Flip and apply a little ghee, flip again and apply a little ghee on the other side too.', 'Cook, turning sides till evenly golden on both the sides. .Transfer onto a serving plate and serve hot.']

title: Dairy Free Spinach Soup-Cook Smart
method: ['Chop spinach roughly. Quarter onions.', 'Heat oil in a deep non-stick pan, add garlic and onions and saute for a minute. Cut potato in big cubes and add. Add 2 cups water and let the mixture come to a boil.', 'Add brown rice and cook till brown rice and potato are done. Add spinach and cook for a minute. Switch off the heat.', 'Strain, cool and grind with soya milk to a smooth puree.', 'Heat this puree in another deep non-stick pan. Add salt and crushed peppercorns and mix well. Cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Pour the soup into a soup bowl, sprinkle crushed peppercorns, garnish with red capsicum strips and serve immediately.']

title: Peach Clifoutis
method: ['Preheat oven at 180o C.', 'Deseed and slice the peaches. Layer a glass baking dish with sliced peaches.', 'Combine milk and eggs in a bowl and mix well. Add sugar, vanilla essence, salt and flour and mix again. Whisk with an electric blender.', 'Pour the prepared mixture over the layered peaches. Put the dish on a baking tray, place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 30-35 minutes.', 'Serve.']

title: Methi Aloo Bhujiya
method: ['Take the mashed potatoes in a mixing bowl, add garam masala powder, red chilli powder, asafoetida, salt, dried fenugreek leaves and gram flour and knead into soft dough.\nHeat sufficient oil in kadai.', 'Fill a small portion of the mixture into a greased chakli press fitted with sev attachment, press out bhujiyas directly into hot oil and deep-fry, on medium heat, till golden. Drain on absorbent paper and set aside to cool down to room temperature.', 'Crush and serve or store in an air-tight container.']

title: Chicken Frankie
method: ['Mix together the refined flour and salt; add water and knead into a firm dough. Cover with a damp cloth and set aside for about fifteen minutes. Divide into eight equal portions and roll into rotis.', 'Cook the rotis lightly on a tawa and set aside. Heat two tablespoons of oil in a pan; add the chicken, chopped onions, tomatoes, ginger paste, garlic paste, salt, chilli powder, turmeric powder and coriander powder; stir over high heat till the chicken is cooked.', 'Add the lemon juice and mix. Beat the eggs with salt in a bowl. Heat a tawa and place a roti on it. Spread a little beaten egg over the roti. Turn it over and dribble a little oil all a round.', 'Spread a little egg over the other side as well; turn over and cook a while longer. Be careful not to overcook the rotis.', 'Place a little chicken mixture on one side of the roti. Sprinkle some sliced onions over the chicken. Top with a little green chutney and sprinkle with a little vinegar. Roll up the roti into a tight roll.', 'Wrap in aluminium foil and serve immediately.']

title: Capsicum Chicken
method: ['Heat oil in a non- stick pan. Add garlic, ginger, green chillies and saute till garlic turns golden.', 'Roughly slice chicken breasts, add to the pan and mix well. Add capsicum, mix and cook for a minute.', 'Add turmeric powder, coriander powder, chilli powder, garam masala powder and salt, mix well and cook for 2 minutes.', 'Add onion, mix and cook for a minute. Add lemon juice and mix well.', 'Roughly chop fresh coriander sprigs, add to pan and toss to mix.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Rose Cookies
method: ['Take refined flour in a bowl, add rice flour, castor sugar, black sesame seeds, white sesame seeds, salt, egg and coconut milk and whisk well to ensure there are no lumps. Add sufficient water and whisk again to make a dropping consistency batter.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Dip a rose cookie mould in the batter, dip in the hot oil and gently dislodge the cookie. Continue to deep-fry till golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Place them on a serving platter, dust icing sugar on top and serve.']

title: 5 Seeds Bread
method: ['Preheat oven at 180oC. Grease a baking tray with some butter.', 'Take yeast in a bowl. Add castor sugar and some warm water, mix and set aside to activate.', 'Sift together wheat flour and refined flour in a bowl. Add salt and mix well. Add milk powder and mix well.', 'Create well in the centre, add activated yeast and mix well. Add sufficient water and knead into a soft dough.', 'Dust worktop with some refined flour, place the dough and knead again.', 'Dust a bowl with some refined flour, place the prepared dough in it, cover with damp muslin cloth and set aside for 20-25 minutes.', 'Dust worktop with some refined flour, place the dough and knead well. Brush the dough with butter and knead again.', 'Roll out the dough into an oval shape. Bring the sides of the dough overlapping each other. Place the prepared bread dough upside down on the greased baking tray, cover with damp muslin cloth and set aside to prove for 20-25 minutes.', 'Brush the bread dough with some milk. Sprinkle some sunflower seeds, lemon seeds, flax seeds, white sesame seeds and onion seeds on the dough. Create few insertions on top.', 'Put the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes.', 'Brush some melted butter over the baked bread and serve.']

title: Vermicelli Idli - SK Khazana
method: ['To make the tempering, heat oil in a non-stick pan, add mustard seeds, split black gram, split Bengal gram, asafoetida, green chillies and curry leaves, mix and saute till the grams change colour. Take the pan off the heat. Take vermicelli in a large bowl, add semolina, yogurt, salt and the tempering and whisk till well combined.', 'Add 1 cup water, whisk well and set aside for 15 minutes.', 'Heat sufficient water in a steamer.', 'Grease the idli mould with oil, pour the batter into individual dents.', 'Place the idli mould in the steamer, cover and steam for 10-15 minutes.', 'Dip a spoon in the water and gently de-mould the idlis and place on a plate.', 'Arrange them on a serving plate and serve hot with coconut chutney and sambhar.']

title: Lychee Dragon Fruit Mocktail-SK Khazana
method: ['Scoop out balls from dragon fruit and divide equally into 4 individual serving glasses.', 'Add 2 tablespoons lychee flesh, 5-6 mint leaves and 3-4 ice cubes in each glass.', 'Top with some lychee juice and drinking soda. Serve chilled.']

title: Dahi Golgappa - SK Khazana
method: ['Take boondis in a large bowl, add  1/2  cup water and set aside to soak.', 'Take potatoes in another large bowl, add 1 tsp red chilli powder, 1 tsp dried mango powder, salt, cumin powder, 1 tsp coriander leaves and squeeze juice of  1/2  lemon in it. Mash the mixture well and transfer into a small bowl.', 'Take moth bean sprouts and whole green gram sprouts in another large bowl. Add remaining red chilli powder, remaining dried mango powder, salt, date and tamarind chutney, 1 tsp coriander leaves and mix well. Transfer into another small bowl', 'Gently squeeze the boondis to remove the excess water. Transfer in a third small bowl.', 'For each serving, make holes on top of 6 puffed crisp puris and arrange them on a serving plate. Put 1 tsp sprouts mixture into the cavity of 2 puris, 1 tsp ragda mixture into the cavity of 2 puris and 1 tsp potato mixture into the cavity of the remaining 2 puris.', 'Sprinkle red chilli powder, dried mango powder, roasted cumin powder and salt on each stuffed puri. Drizzle a little yogurt, date and tamarind chutney, green chutney and red chilli-garlic chutney over each puri. Sprinkle sev over them. Crush 2-3 crisp puris and sprinkle on top.', 'Finally sprinkle coriander leaves and squeeze the juice of lemon on top, garnish with pomegranate pearls and boondi and serve immediately.']

title: Broccoli Salad
method:
['Separate broccoli florets keeping the stems intact.
Cut them vertically into halves.', 'Heat 2-3 cups water in a deep non-stick pan.
Add broccoli florets and salt and blanch.', 'To make the dressing, crush garlic cloves through a garlic press into a bowl.
Add olive oil, vinegar, salt and crushed red chillies and mix well.', 'Remove the broccoli florets from the hot water and refresh in ice cold water.
Set aside for 4-5 minutes.', 'Pat them dry on a kitchen towel.
Add honey to the dressing and mix.
Add the broccoli florets and toss to mix.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, sprinkle sesame seeds on top and serve immediately.']

title: South Indian Fried Chicken
method: ['Take chicken pieces in a bowl, add turmeric powder, coriander powder, cornflour, curry leaves, ginger-garlic paste, red chilli powder, salt and crushed black peppercorns. Break an egg and add only the white. Add lemon juice and mix everything well.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai, slide in the marinated chicken pieces and deep-fry till golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Heat coconut oil in a non-stick wok, add mustard seeds and saute till they splutter. Add green chillies and curry leaves and saute for few seconds. Add fried chicken, a pinch of salt and crushed black peppercorns and toss well.', 'Transfer the chicken pieces onto a serving platter, garnish with coriander spring and serve hot.']

title: Bathue Ka Raita
method: ['Clean and wash bathua leaves thoroughly. Blanch them in two cups of water for two to three minutes. Drain, cool and grind coarsely. Dry roast cumin seeds and grind to a fine powder.', 'Whisk yogurt with salt, pepper powder, half the roasted cumin seed powder and half the red chilli powder. Add the ground bathua and mix well.', 'Transfer into a serving dish, garnish with the remaining roasted cumin seed powder and red chilli powder and serve chilled.']

title: Creamy Chicken Pasta - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add garlic and onion, mix and saute till onion softens.', 'Add refined flour, mix and saute for 1-2 minutes or till the raw smell of flour disappears.', 'Add 1 cup milk, stir continuously and cook till the sauce begins to thicken. Add chicken and mix and cook, stirring continuously. Add the remaining milk and mix well and cook for 1 minute.', 'Add salt and white pepper powder and mix well.', 'Add pasta gradually and mix well. Add black olives and capsicums and mix well.', 'Add cream and cheese and mix well.', 'Transfer into serving bowl, garnish with parsley and serve hot.']

title: Kaskal Cutlet
method: ['Take mashed green bananas in a mixing bowl, add potatoes, ginger, garam masala, cumin powder, salt, chaat masala, green chilli, onion, red chilli powder and breadcrumbs and mix well.', 'Divide the mixture into equal portions and shape them into round tikkis.', 'Heat refined oil in a non-stick pan, place the tikkis in it and shallow-fry, on medium heat, turning sides till evenly golden brown on both sides. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Arrange the cutlets on a serving platter, garnish each cutlet with an onion ring and serve hot with tomato ketchup.']

title: Healthy Chiwda
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add the mustard seeds and let it splutter.', 'Crush garlic and add to the pan alongwith green chillies, curry leaves and saute till crisp.', 'Add the turmeric powder, mix well and saute for fifteen seconds.', 'Add the cornflakes, oats, puffed rice, flax seeds, chia seeds, pumpkin seeds and almonds and mix well. Remove from heat and cool.', 'Serve or store in an airtight container.']

title: Vellarikai Pachidi
method: ['Cut cucumber vertically and remove seeds and chop finely. Transfer into a bowl, add salt and mix well. Keep aside for some time. Place yogurt in a bowl, add salt and mix well. Squeeze cucumber well and add to yogurt and mix well.', 'Heat oil in a small non stick pan. Add mustard seeds, red chillies, curry leaves and asafoetida and saute till the seeds splutter. Pour it over the pachidi. Keep it in the refrigerator for some time and serve cold.']

title: Veg Chilli Momos
method: ['To make stuffing, heat 1 tbsp oil in a deep non-stick pan, add  1/4  tsp garlic, spring onion bulbs, carrot, French beans, cabbage, mushrooms, salt, crushed black peppercorns and  1/2  tsp soy sauce, mix well and saute for 2 minutes. Take the pan off the heat and set aside to cool down.', 'Place some stuffing in the centre of each dough roundel, apply water on the edges, bring them together, seal and give the momos any shape of your choice.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a deep pan, slide in the momos, a few at a time, and deep-fry till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Heat 1 tbsp oil in a deep non-stick pan, add 1 tbsp garlic, ginger and green chillies and red chilli sauce, mix and saute for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add capsicum, onion, spring onion greens, fried momos, red chilli flakes and salt and toss well. Add  1/4  cup water, cornflour slurry and soy sauce, mix well and cook for 1 minute.', 'Transfer onto a serving plate, garnish with chopped spring onion greens and serve hot.']

title: Summer Pudding
method: ['Place a medium size ring mould on a plate.', 'Roughly chop six to eight strawberries and six to eight blackberries.', '3. Heat chopped berries in a non-stick pan. Add eight to ten blueberries, Sugar Free Natura and lemon juice, mix and cook for two to three minutes. Lightly mash, add some water, mix and cook till soft and pulpy. Transfer in a bowl and refrigerate to cool.', 'Grind the cooked berries mixture to make a smooth puree. Strain the puree in another bowl.', 'Cut brioche slices using a medium size cookie cutter.', 'Halve remaining strawberries and remaining blackberries.', 'Dip prepared brioche roundels in puree. Place one roundel in the cookie cutter and place few strawberry halves. Put another roundel on top and place it above the strawberries, place blackberry halves on the edges and blueberries in the center and cover with another roundel.', 'Fill a squeezy bottle with remaining puree.', 'Transfer the prepared pudding on a serving platter and demould. Place two strawberries and a blackberry besides. Squeeze out some puree on top of the pudding and on the platter.', 'Put a dollop of cream cheese on top and serve immediately garnished with a mint sprig.']

title: Bhaji Par Eeda
method: ['Heat oil in a deep non-stick pan. Add onion and saute till translucent. Add green chillies and ginger and saute for 30 seconds.', 'Roughly chop spinach leaves, amaranth leaves and fenugreek leaves and transfer into a bowl.', 'Peel and finely chop raw mango. Add it to the pan and mix.', 'Add tomato, salt, chilli powder, cumin powder and coriander powder, mix and cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add  1/4  cup water, mix and cook on low heat for 10-15 minutes.', 'Gradually add chopped greens, mix and cook for 1-2 minutes. Cover and cook on low heat for 5-7 minutes.', 'Adjust salt and mix. Transfer the mixture into a shallow non-stick pan and spread evenly. Place the pan on heat.', 'Break eggs, one by one, and place them on top of cooked greens keeping some distance between each. Cover and cook 3-4 minutes.', 'Sprinkle some crushed peppercorns on top and serve hot.']

title: Oats Kande Pohe
method: ['Soak poha in a bowl for 2-3 minutes or till soft. Add the oats and strain the two.', 'Heat oil in a non stick kadai. Add asafoetida, mustard seeds, cumin seeds, curry leaves and peanuts and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add ginger and green chillies and saute 1 minute.', 'Add onions and potatoes and mix well and saute for 2 minutes.', 'Add poha, oats, turmeric powder, green peas, sugar, salt, lemon juice, coriander leaves and mix well.', 'Let it heat through. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot.']

title: Spicy Corn Patties
method: ['Grind together corn kernels, red chilli powder, ginger, green chilli, cumin seeds, lemon juice, coriander leaves with some water to a smooth paste.', 'Put maize flour, rice flour, breadcrumbs in a bowl. Add salt and mix well. Add ground paste and mix well.', 'Heat some oil on a non-stick tawa.', 'Grease palms with oil, shape the mixture into patties.', 'Shallow-fry the patties on hot tawa, turning sides, till crisp and brown on both the sides.', 'Serve hot with tomato ketchup.']

title: Mango Yogurt Icecream
method: ['Tale yogurt in a bowl, add mango puree, condensed milk and  1/2  cup chopped mangoes and mix well.', 'Transfer the mixture into an airtight container, spread the remaining chopped mangoes on top and close the container with its lid. Freeze for 8-12 hours.', 'Scoop out and put into serving glasses and serve immediately.']

title: Kiwi Lime Muffins
method: ['Preheat the oven at 220degC. Blend kiwi and banana into a puree.', 'Sieve together refined flour, baking soda and baking powder into a bowl.', 'In another bowl break eggs, add sugar, little by little, and whisk well.', 'Add vanilla essence, rooh afza , melted butter, banana-kiwi puree and flour. Fold in the mixture in cut and fold method.', 'Pour the batter into silicon moulds and sprinkle some lemon zest on top.', 'Bake in the preheated oven at 180degC for 20 to 22 minutes.', 'Remove from oven and cool. Remove from the moulds and serve.']

title: Lemon Coconut Tofu Squares - Diwali Special
method: ['Preheat the oven to 250degC. Grease a square baking tin with some butter and dust with some flour.', 'Put wheat flour, castor sugar, sea salt, vanilla essence and coconut oil in a bowl and mix till well combined.', 'Spread this mixture evenly in the baking tin, place the tin in the preheated oven and bake for fifteen to twenty minutes. Remove from oven and cool.', 'To make the filling, process together the tofu, castor sugar, flour and baking powder. Grate the lemon peel and add along withits juice and process till smooth.', 'Spread the filling evenly over the baked base, place it in the preheated oven and bake for twenty to twenty five minutes. Remove from oven and cool.', 'Cutinto squares, dust icing sugar on top and serve.']

title: Malwani Chicken Hara Masala
method: ['Apply salt and ginger-garlic paste to the chicken pieces and leave aside for  1/2  hour. Finely chop onions in a chopper.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add black cardamoms, green cardamoms, cloves, cinnamon, bay leaf and onions and saute till onion is golden.', 'Chop coriander leaves and put in a mixer jar. Add ginger, green chillies and coconut and grind into a fine paste with a little water.', 'Add marinated chicken to the pan and mix well. Cook for 3-4 minutes and add ground masala and mix again. Add  1/2  cup water and mix. Cover and cook till the chicken is soft.', 'Uncover the pan, adjust salt and add garam masala powder. Mix well and add coconut milk. Mix well and cook for 2 minutes. Serve hot.']

title: Noodles Burger
method: ['Take the mashed potatoes in a bowl, add red chilli flakes, turmeric powder, salt and coriander leaves and mix well.', 'Divide the mixture into equal portions and shape them into patties and coat then with breadcrumbs.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a non-stick pan, place the patties in it and shallow-fry, turning sides, till both sides are golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Heat 2 cups water in a non-stick pan, add taste-maker, mix well and let it come to a boil. Lightly crush the noodles and add to the pan, mix well and cook for 1 minute.', 'Add carrots and green peas and mix well. Add salt, dried red chilli flakes, mix and cook till the noodles are cooked completely. Take the pan off the heat.', 'Place lettuce leaves on the base half of each burger bun, place some noodles, place a patty and top it with some more noodles. Place a cheese slice on top of the noodles, followed with a few tomato slices and cover with the top half of the burger bun. Secure with a toothpick.', 'Place each burger on a serving plate and serve immediately.']

title: Masala Vada - SK Khazana
method: ['Put split black gram into a grinder jar, add  1/2  cup water and grind to a fine paste. Transfer the ground mixture in a bowl. Add curry leaves, green chillies, crushed peppercorns, coconut pieces, split Bengal gram, coriander leaves and salt and mix well.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Dip your hand in water, drop small portions of the mixture into hot oil and deep-fry till golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Arrange them on a serving plate and serve hot with coconut chutney and tomato chutney.']

title: Carrot Cake
method:
['Preheat oven to 180@C. Grease a cake 9 inch cake tin with oil. Grate apple into a bowl.
Add carrots and mix.', 'Add orange juice and mix.
Break the egg into it and mix well.', 'Add Sugar Free Natura and mix well.
Sieve refined flour, baking powder, soda bicarbonate, cinnamon powder into the above mixture and mix gently.', 'Add oil and mix.
Put the batter into the greased baking tin and bake in the preheated oven at 180@C for approximately thirty minutes.', 'Turn over the cake onto a rack to cool.
Cut into slices and serve.']

title: Benne Wafers
method: ['Preheat oven to 180degC. Line a baking tray with a silicon sheet.', 'Cream together the brown sugar and butter in a bowl using an electric beater till light. Add the egg and whisk well.', 'Sift together the flour, salt and baking powder into the butter-sugar mixture and fold well.', 'Add the vanilla essence and sesame seeds and mix well.', 'Divide the mixture into small equal portions and place on the lined tray. Put the tray in the preheated oven and bake for ten to twelve minutes. Remove from oven and cool.', 'Serve or store in an air-tight container.']

title: Rajma Puri
method: ['Take whole wheat flour in a parat, add mashed kidney beans, Garam Masala, turmeric powder, red chilli powder, coriander powder, cumin powder, salt, carom seeds and ghee and mix well.', 'Add sufficient water and knead to stiff dough. Drizzle 2 tsps oil and knead again. Cover and rest the dough for 10-15 minutes.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Divide the dough into small equal portions and shape them into balls. Apply a little oil to each ball and roll out into small and slightly thick puris.', 'Slide each puri into hot oil and deep-fry till they puff up. Flip and fry till they turn deep golden on both sides. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Place some puris in each thali and serve hot with any sabzi.']

title: Tawa Toast Sandwich - SK Khazana
method: ['Mix together capsicum, tomato, onion, green chillies, salt, chilli flakes, mixed herbs, butter and tomato ketchup on a plate.', 'Cut the bread loaf into 8 thick slices. Spread some butter and green chutney on the slices. Spread the vegetable mixture equally over half the slices. Halve cheese slices and place 2 halves on top of the mixture on each bread slice, cover with the remaining slices and press gently.', 'Heat some butter in a non-stick grill pan. Place one sandwich in the pan and grill till the underside turns golden and crisp. Spread a little butter on the top side of the sandwich and turn it over and grill till the other side becomes equally golden and crisp. Grill the remaining sandwiches similarly.', 'Halve them diagonally and place on a serving platter.', 'Tear lettuce leaves and place in a plate. Sprinkle some mixed herbs, chilli flakes and drizzle some olive oil on top. Toss well and place alongside the sandwich and serve immediately.']

title: Herbed Bread
method: ['Preheat oven at 180oC. Grease a baking tray with some oil.', 'Take yeast in a bowl. Add 2 tbsps warm water and sugar, mix well and set aside to activate.', 'Sieve flour in another bowl. Add salt and  3/4  tsp dried oregano. Make a well in the centre, pour the activated yeast in it and mix well. Add 2 cups water and knead into a soft dough.', "Dust the worktop with some flour. Place the dough on it and punch it. Keep kneading by stretching and punching till the dough is ready and doesn't break.", 'Spread the dough into an oblong shape, place on the greased baking tray, cover with a damp muslin cloth and set aside in a warm place to prove for 20-25 minutes.', 'Apply some milk on the proved bread dough. Sprinkle remaining Keya Oregano on top, put the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 20-25 minutes.', 'Remove from heat, brush with some butter and let it cool. Serve.']

title: Coconut Egg Curry
method: ['Heat oil in a non stick pan. Chop onions in a chopper and add it to the pan and saute till golden.', 'Add curry leaves and continue to saute for 2 minutes more.', 'Add turmeric powder and coriander powder and mix well.', 'Add red chilli powder and ginger-garlic paste and mix well and saute till fragrant.', 'Add 1 cup water and mix. Cook the gravy for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add tamarind pulp and salt and mix well. Simmer for 3-4 minutes.', 'Transfer into a bowl and blend with a hand blender till smooth. Transfer it back into the pan.', 'Add coconut milk and mix well and simmer for 1 minute.', 'Halve the eggs vertically and remove the yolks. Fill up the holes with corn.', 'Pour the gravy into a serving dish, place the egg halves over the gravy.', 'Garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot.']

title: Amti
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add cumin seeds, chopped onion, green chillies and asafoetida.
