Cut the red capsicum into small cubes.', 'Put spring onions, asparagus, red capsicum, green capsicum and apricots in a bowl. Add crushed black peppercorns and lemon juice and mix well. Add extra virgin olive oil and salt and mix well.', 'When the quinoa is done, switch the heat off, keep the pan covered and let it rest for some time. Then add it to the vegetables in the bowl and mix well.', 'Put the salad into martini glasses, garnish with reserved asparagus tips and serve.']

title: Mexican Rice
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick wok. Add garlic and saute till golden. Add onion and saute till golden.', 'Add capsicum, red pepper, carrot, yellow pepper, corn kernels and kidney beans and mix well.', 'Add dried herbs, chilli flakes, crushed peppercorns and tomato ketchup, mix and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add salt, torn basil leaves and rice, lower heat and mix well. Let it get heated through.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Chana Hara Masala
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stock pan, add cumin seeds and saute till fragrant.', 'Slice onions thinly and add to the pan. Roughly chop green chillies and add and saute for 1-2 minutes. Add ginger-garlic paste and saute till light golden.', 'Roughly chop tomato and add to the pan. Add Kashmiri red chilli powder, dried mango powder, black salt, chana masala powder and mix well.', 'Add coriander leaves and mint leaves and mix well.', 'Transfer the mixture into a mixer jar and grind using boiled gram water as required.', 'Heat another non-stick pan, add boiled gram,  1/2  cup boiled gram water, ground mixture and allow to boil.', 'Add salt and lemon juice and cook, stirring continuously, for 3-4 minutes.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot.']

title: Greek Chicken Roll
method: ['Put olive oil, lemon juice, Greek yogurt, red wine vinegar, onion, garlic, thyme, oregano, coriander leaves, salt, crushed peppercorns and chicken in a bowl and mix well. Set aside to marinate for 10-15 minutes.', 'Heat an electric griller and grease with some olive oil. Place the marinated chicken strips and grill on both sides till evenly done. Transfer onto a plate.', 'Take each tortilla, place some grilled chicken, Romaine lettuce, tomato strips, mixed olives, feta cheese and tzatziki in the center and wrap.', 'Diagonally slice and serve immediately with tzatziki.']

title: Masala Khichia Papad - SK Khazana
method: ['Blend together red chillies, garlic cloves, sea salt and lemon juice with some water to a fine chutney. Transfer into a bowl.', 'Roast khichia papads.', 'Drizzle 1 teaspoon melted butter on each roasted papad. Break into large pieces and top with some onion, some cabbage, some capsicum, some cucumber and some tomatoes.', 'Drizzle some green chutney and red chilli chutney, sprinkle nylon sev, coriander leaves, sea salt and chaat masala on top.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Muzzafar
method: ['Break roasted vermicelli with hand and keep aside. Take ghee in a pan and add cardamom powder and sugar.', 'Cook on low heat, stirring continuously, for two to three minutes.', 'Add milk and continue to cook for two to three minutes. Add broken vermicelli and continue to cook for four to five minutes or till vermicelli is dry.', 'Serve hot garnished with chironji, raisins, almonds, cashewnuts and silver warq.']

title: Cheesy Scrambled Egg Sandwich
method: ['Heat butter in a non-stick pan', 'Break eggs in a bowl, add salt and crushed peppercorns and whisk well and add to the pan and cook till the eggs are done.', 'Add cream and mix well. Transfer into a bowl, add parsley, processed and mozzarella cheese and mix well.', 'Apply butter on 4 bread slices, place a portion of the mixture on each, cover them with the remaining slices, apply some butter on top of the sandwich. Put the sandwich in the griller and grill till golden and crisp on both the sides.', 'Cut the sandwich in triangles and serve with tomato ketchup']

title: Masala Cheese Grilled Sandwich-SK Khazana
method: ['Heat a sandwich griller.', 'For each sandwich, spread some butter on both sides of a bread slice and grill till grill marks appear on both sides. Set aside.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add mustard seeds and let them splutter. Add asafoetida, ginger-garlic green chilli-coriander paste and turmeric powder, mix and saute for a few seconds.', 'Add potatoes and salt, mix and cook for 2-3 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside to cool.', 'Mix together cabbage, capsicum, tomato, salt and 1 teaspoon chaat masala in a bowl.', 'Apply some green chutney on a bread slice. Top with a generous portion of potato mixture, some cheese and place the grilled bread slice over it.', 'Top with remaining potato mixture and vegetable mixture. Sprinkle some chaat masala, cheese and cover with the remaining bread slice.', 'Apply some more butter on top, place the sandwich on the griller, cover and grill till well done on both sides and grill marks appear.', 'Grate some more cheese on top and serve immediately.']

title: Red Quinoa Salad
method: ['To prepare dressing, heat a non-stick pan, add black grapes and brown sugar, mix and cook for 1 minute. Mash the mixture and mix well. Add salt, mix and cook till the mixture reduces slightly and turns pulpy. Transfer into a bowl and cool.', 'Take red quinoa in a mixing bowl, and edamame, corn kernels, cherry tomatoes, pecan nuts and 3-4 torn lollo rosso lettuce leaves and mix well.', 'Add crushed peppercorns, malt vinegar and oil to the dressing and mix well.', 'Transfer the salad onto a serving platter. Put some feta cheese and drizzle some dressing on top and serve immediately.']

title: Pistachio Crusted Chicken
method: ['Place the chicken breasts on a plate, sprinkle salt, crushed black peppercorns, onion powder, garlic powder, dried mixed herbs, Worcestershire sauce and olive oil and rub the mixture well on the chicken breasts. Set aside to marinate for 10-15 minutes.', 'Preheat the oven to 180o C.', 'Put the American Pistachios in a food processor jar. Tear bread slices and add along with parsley sprigs and process to a fine mixture. Transfer this into a shallow wide bowl and spread it evenly.', 'Place the marinated chicken breasts on another plate and brush mustard sauce on all the sides. Coat them well with the pistachio mixture till well covered on all sides.', 'Grease a baking tray with some oil. Place the chicken over it, place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes.', 'Bring the tray out of the oven and gently place the chicken on the worktop. Slice them thickly.', 'Spread some saffron mayo on a serving platter and place the chicken slices on it. Sprinkle American Pistachios powder over them, garnish with micro greens and serve hot with salad.']

title: Chikkad Chole
ingredients: ['1 1/2  cups chickpeas (chole)', '6 tablespoons oil', '1 large onion, sliced', 'Salt to taste', ' 1/2  tablespoon crushed garlic', '1 teaspoon crushed ginger', '1 inch ginger, cut into thin strips + for garnish', '1 teaspoon dried mango powder', '1 tablespoon crushed coriander seeds', '1 teaspoon crushed black peppercorns', '1 teaspoon black salt', '2 crushed red chilli flakes', '2 teaspoons dried pomegranate seeds (anardana) powder', ' 1/4  teaspoon coriander powder', 'A pinch red chilli powder', 'Slit green chillies for garnish', '1 lemon wedge']
method: ['In a large bowl, add Tata Sampann Kabuli Chana and add sufficient water. Soak it overnight.', 'Heat 2 tbsps oil in a non-stick pressure cooker, add onion and a pinch of salt. Saute till golden brown.', 'Add garlic, ginger, ginger strips, sufficient water and soaked chana. Mix well.  Cover and pressure cook for 4-5 whistles are released on high heat and reduce the heat to low and cook further for 20 minutes. Allow the pressure to be released completely.', 'Transfer the cooked kabuli chana into another non-stick wok, place it on heat and add a little water. Mix well and mash it slightly.', 'Add dried mango powder, crushed coriander seeds, crushed black peppercorns, black salt, crushed red chilli flakes, anardana powder and adjust salt.', 'Add coriander powder, red chilli powder and cook for a few minutes.', 'Meanwhile, heat remaining oil in non-stick shallow pan, add the hot oil into the chana mixture and cook for 1 minute. Mix well and mash it slightly while mixing. Cover and cook for 2-3 minutes. Take it off the heat.', 'Garnish with ginger strips, green chillies strips, and squeeze a lemon on top. Serve hot.']

title: Cheeseburst Roti Pizza - SK Khazana
method: ['Divide the dough into equal portions, dust with some flour and roll out into slightly thick discs.', 'Apply 1 tablespoon pizza sauce on each of them. Place 1 tablespoon mozzarella cheese, 1 tablespoon processed cheese, 1 tablespoon green capsicum, 1 tablespoon yellow capsicum, 1 tablespoon red capsicum and a few jalapeno slices on one half of each roti. Top again with 1 tablespoon mozzarella cheese and 1 tablespoon processed cheese. Sprinkle  1/2  teaspoon dried oregano and  1/2  teaspoon chilli flakes and fold the other half of the disc over the stuffing, press the edges to seal and make a design with a fork. Prick a few holes on top to let the steam escape.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa. Place the pizza on it, baste with some oil and cook till the underside turns golden brown and crisp. Flip and cook till the other side is similarly done. Make more pizzas similarly.', 'Cut into halves, garnish with processed cheese and serve immediately with tomato ketchup.']

title: Kheema Samosas
method: ['Sieve refined flour with salt. Cut margarine into the sieved flour and rub in lightly with fingertips.', 'Add sufficient water and knead into stiff dough. Keep covered with a damp cloth for half an hour. Wash mutton mince under running water for two minutes. Drain, squeeze dry using your hands and keep aside.', 'Heat oil in a pan, add onions and saute on medium heat for two to three minutes or till light pink. Add chopped ginger and garlic and green chillies and continue to saute for half a minute.', 'Add mutton mince and salt and saute for two minutes. Add red chilli powder and turmeric powder. Sprinkle a little water and cover and cook on low heat till the mince is cooked and the mixture is completely dry. Add garam masala powder and remove from heat.', 'When cool, add spring onion greens and mix well.', 'To make samosas, divide dough into sixteen equal portions and roll out into oval shapes. Cut into half and shape into a cone. Fill with mutton mince stuffing and seal the edges. Refrigerate for about half an hour.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai and fry samosas till golden crisp. Drain onto an absorbent paper. Serve hot with mint chutney or tomato ketchup.']

title: Mango Granita
method: ['Put mango puree in a jar, add crushed peppercorns, lemon juice and 2 cups water and blend with an electric blender till smooth.', 'Pour the mixture into ice trays and freeze for 2-3 hours.', 'Demould the mango ice cubes, put in the grinder jar and grind well.', 'Divide the mixture equally in the serving stemmed glasses, garnish lemon rind curls and mint sprigs and serve immediately.']

title: Peach Raspberry Lemonade - SK Khazana
method: ['Halve the peaches, discard the seeds and roughly chop them. Cut lemons into small pieces. Transfer both into a jar. .', 'Halve the peaches, discard the seeds and roughly chop them. Cut lemons into small pieces. Transfer both into a jar. .', 'To make each portion, put a few ice cubes in each serving glass. Add 2 lemon slices, 2 peach slices, 2 raspberries and 1 rosemary sprig. Strain the muddled mixture equally into glass. . Top each glass with drinking soda and serve.']

title: Healthy Chicken Burger
method: ['Take chicken mince in a bowl. Add onion, garlic, apple, boiled brown rice and mix thoroughly. Add salt, dried basil, dried oregano, pepper powder and mix well. Heat oil in a pan. Slice the buns into two horizontally. Place a lettuce leaf over one half. Place a chicken burger over it and cover with the other half. Serve immediately with the sauce.', 'Shape the mixture into patties and shallow fry on both sides till they are golden brown. To make the sauce, heat oil and add grated ginger. Add orange juice, brown sugar, salt, dark soy sauce and reduce.', 'Add tomato puree, red chilli powder and mix. Simmer till it is slightly reduced. Add cornflour dissolved in a little water and mix till the sauce is sufficiently thick.', 'Slice the buns into two horizontally. Place a lettuce leaf over one half. Place a chicken burger over it and cover with the other half. Serve immediately with the sauce.']

title: Gulab Jamun Baked Alaska
method: ['Line small individual glass bowls with cling film.', 'Take kulfi discs in another bowl and break into small pieces with a spoon.', 'Put the kulfi pieces into the lined bowls filling upto  3/4 .', 'Cut gulab jamuns into halves and place one halve inverted on the kulfi in each bowl and cover with cling film. Freeze till kulfi sets.', 'To prepare mousse, take ganache in another bowl. Add candied rose petal and rose syrup and mix. Add whipped cream and fold well. Refrigerate.', 'To prepare meringue, take egg whites in another bowl. Add lemon juice and whisk well using an electric beater till frothy.', 'Add castor sugar gradually and whisk till light and fluffy.', 'Fill a piping bag fitted with a star nozzle with most of the meringue and reserve the remaining.', 'Cut the sponge into roundels using a medium sized round cookie cutter.', 'Place one sponge roundel on plate. Demould and place the prepared kulfi-gulab jamun upside-down on top of sponge. Similarly, prepare the remaining roundel.', 'Cover them with reserved meringue and pipe out meringue all over the dome. Brulee the meringue with a blow torch.', 'Put some mango puree on one side of a serving platter and spread with a spoon to create a pattern.', 'Put some biscuit crumbs on other side and place a mousse quenelle on top.', 'Place the Baked Alaska in the center. Put few dried rose petals and edible flower petals on top of mango puree pattern.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Chatpata Masala Aloo
method: ['Put kokum pieces into a mixer jar and grind into a fine paste.', 'Pound garlic cloves in a mortar with a pestle. Poke holes in the potatoes with a fork.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add mustard seeds, curry leaves, asafoetida and crushed garlic. Mix and saute till garlic turns golden. Add potatoes, mix and saute for 2 minutes. Add salt and red chilli powder, mix well. Add  1/4  cup water and mix. Cover and cook for 5-8 minutes. Add 1 tbsp kokum paste and mix well.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot.']

title: Fruit Cream Canadian Style
method: ['Pour the liqueur into a pan, add the mixed berries and stew for 2-3 minutes.', 'Divide them equally into 4 stemmed glasses.', 'Mix together milk, whipping cream and sugar. Put 4 tablespoons of this mixture into each glass.', 'Sprinkle  1/2  tablespoon pistachios on top in each glass and serve.']

title: Chicken Crispy
ingredients: ['2 chicken breasts, cut into thin strips', '1 tablespoon oil + for deep-frying', 'Salt to taste', 'Crushed black peppercorns to taste', '3-4 tablespoons cornstarch', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon chopped garlic', '1 inch celery, finely chopped', '2-3 spring onion bulbs, sliced', '1 cup mixed capsicum strips (green, red and yellow)', '1 tablespoon red chilli sauce', '1 teaspoon soy sauce', '2 tablespoons diagonally sliced spring onion greens + for garnishing']
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Put chicken strips on a plate. Add salt, crushed peppercorns, egg and cornstarch and mix well.', 'Put chicken strips in hot oil and deep-fry till golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add garlic and celery and saute till garlic turns golden brown. Add spring onion bulbs, mixed capsicum strips, red chilli sauce and soy sauce and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add salt, crushed peppercorns and fried chicken strips, mix and cook for 1-2 minutes. Add spring onion greens and mix well.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Bheeghe Kulche Chole
method: ['Grease a baking tray with little butter.', 'Heat 2 tablespoons butter in a pressure cooker. Add cloves, black cardamoms, green cardamoms and cinnamon and saute till fragrant.', 'Add chickpeas, salt, tea bags and sufficient water. Mix well and bring to a boil. Cover and pressure cook till 6-8 whistles are given out. Remove from heat, let the pressure reduce completely, drain and reserve the cooking liquor. Discard the tea bags.', 'Dissolve yeast in  1/4  cup water along with 2 tablespoons refined flour by heating in a microwave for 15 seconds.', 'Combine 2 1/2  cups refined flour, yogurt, dissolved yeast, salt and 2 tablespoons butter in a bowl and mix well. Add sufficient water and knead into a soft dough. Rest it for 20 minutes.', 'To make chole masala, grind together all the ingredients into a fine powder. Set aside.', 'Put 2 tablespoons butter, lemon juice, red chilli powder and 1 teaspoon chole masala powder in another bowl and mix well.', 'Put 2 tablespoons refined flour and baking powder in another bowl and mix well.', 'Roll out the dough into a thin sheet and sprinkle flour-baking powder mixture all over it. Fold into a book fold and refrigerate for 20 minutes.', 'Chop tomatoes and green chillies.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add green chillies and saute well. Add dried red chillies and 4 tablespoons chole masala and mix well.', 'Preheat oven to 250deg C.', 'Add boiled chickpeas, reserved cooking liquor to the pan and mix. Add tomatoes, grated ginger and mix well. Cover and cook till the tomatoes are pulpy. Remove from heat.', 'Fold the dough again into a round shape and rest for 5 minutes. Roll into a thick cylinder and cut into small equal portions, shape the into balls, dust with flour. Rest for 2-3 minutes.', 'Roll out the balls lengthwise, sprinkle some onion seeds on them and make the edges thin with your fingers. Place them on the baking tray and place the tray in the oven and bake for 10 minutes. Remove from oven and apply butter on kulchas.', 'Transfer the chole into a serving bowl and sprinkle the remaining chole masala on top. Serve hot with kulchas.']

title: Quinoa Pistachio Bars
method: ['Coarsely grind dates in a food processor and transfer into a bowl.', 'Add honey, pistachios, quinoa, chocolate chips and mix. Add salt and mix well.', 'Grease a barfi tray with some oil, transfer the date-quinoa mixture into it and level it out. Refrigerate for 1 hour.', 'Cut into 1 inch thick pieces and demould. Serve.']

title: Marble Cookies
method: ['Preheat oven to 180deg C.', 'Cream together butter and castor sugar in a bowl with an electric beater.', 'Break in an egg and whisk. Break in remaining egg and vanilla essence and whisk well.', 'Sieve together flour and baking soda into the bowl and fold in well.', 'Add dark chocolate chips and white chocolate chips and mix well.', 'Divide the dough into two and put into two different bowls.', 'Add cocoa powder to one bowl and mix. Add milk and mix well.', 'Dust the worktop with some flour, take each portion and roll into a thick log. Place the two logs side by side and roll together to make one thick roll.', 'Divide the log into equal portions and shape them into cookies. Arrange the cookies on a baking tray place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes.', 'Remove from oven and cool.', 'Serve.']

title: Cottage Cheese Steak - SK Khazana
method: ['Mix together parsley,  1/2  tbsp fresh herbs, crushed black peppercorns, salt,  1/2  tsp chilli flakes, olive oil and mix well. Apply this mixture on the cottage cheese pieces. Sprinkle cornflour over them and rub in well and set aside to marinate for 10-15 minutes.', 'Take yellow squash and green zucchini in a bowl, add capsicum triangles, broccoli, carrot, remaining chilli flakes, salt, crushed black peppercorns, remaining mixed fresh herb and 1 tbsp olive oil and mix well.', 'Heat 1 tbsp olive oil in non-stick pan, add the vegetables and toss well. Cook for 4-5 minutes. Transfer into a bowl.', 'Heat remaining olive oil in same non-stick pan, place marinated cottage cheese pieces and shallow-fry, turning sides, till light golden on both sides. Transfer onto a plate.', 'To make sauce, add butter to the same pan and let it melt. Add refined flour and saute till light brown. Add vegetable stock, Worcestershire sauce, crushed black pepper and salt, mix well, and cook for 2-3 minutes or till it thickens.', 'Make a bed of vegetables on a serving plate, place the cottage cheese steaks over them, pour the sauce over the steaks and serve hot.']

title: Dahi Ke Kebab
method: ['ake hung yogurt in a bowl. Add roasted gram powder, salt, one teaspoon red chilli powder, half teaspoon green cardamom powder, one fourth teaspoon cinnamon powder and one fourth teaspoon black pepper powder and mix well.', 'Divide into twenty equal portions. Dampen your hands and flatten each portion to give the kebabs smooth and even shape.', 'Heat ghee in frying pan and fry the kebabs, a few at a time, to a light golden colour. Drain and set aside. In the same ghee, fry onion till golden brown.', 'Drain and grind to a paste. In the ghee remaining in the pan add garlic, remaining red chilli powder, fried ground onions, clove powder, remaining green cardamom powder, remaining cinnamon powder, remaining black peppercorn powder and salt and saute till oil surfaces.', 'Add kebabs and gently mix into the masala. Serve immediately.']

title: Carrots And Beans Poriyal
ingredients: ['2 small carrots, cut into  1/2  inch cubes', '10-12 French beans, cut into  1/2  inch cubes', 'Salt to taste', ' 1/4  teaspoon turmeric powder', '2 tablespoons coconut oil', '1 teaspoon split Bengal gram (chana dal)', '1 teaspoon spilt skinless black gram (dhuli urad dal)', '1 teaspoon mustard seeds', '10-12 curry leaves', '2 dried red chillies, broken', ' 1/4  teaspoon asafoetida (hing)', '1 medium onion, chopped', ' 1/4  cup scraped fresh coconut']
method: ['Bring 1 cup water to a boil in a non-stick shallow pan, add salt and turmeric powder and mix well. Add French beans and carrots, mix, and cook for 8-10 minutes on a medium heat.', 'Heat coconut oil in another non-stick pan, add split Bengal gram and spilt skinless black gram and saute for 1 minute. Add mustard seeds and let them splutter.', 'Add curry leaves, dried red chillies and asafoetida and saute for a few seconds.', 'Add onion and saute till translucent. Add the cooked carrot and beans and mix well.', 'Add coconut and salt and mix well .Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot.']
Main ingredients: Carrots, French beans, Turmeric powder, Coconut oil, Split Bengal gram (chana dal), Split skinless black gram (dhuli urad dal), Mustard seeds, Curry leaves, Dried red chillies, Asafoetida, Onion, Scraped fresh coconut

title: Appam
method: ['Place bread slices on a plate, pour some water over them and let them soak for 10-15 minutes.', 'Put the drained rice in a mixer jar, add 50 ml water and grind into a smooth batter.\nTransfer into a bowl.', 'Put cooked rice and coconut in the same mixer jar. Squeeze out excess water from bread slices, add to mixer jar along with 25 ml water and blend into a smooth and thick mixture.', 'Add this mixture to the rice batter, mix well, cover and set aside in a warm place for\n6-8 hours to ferment.', 'Heat a cast-iron appam kadai.', 'Add salt to fermented batter and mix well.', 'Insert a fork in the onion, dip it in some oil and grease the hot appam kadai with it.', 'Pour a ladleful of batter in the greased pan and swirl to spread it all around the kadai so that the edges are thin and the centre is thicker. Cover and cook for 2-3 minutes.Remove the appam and keep on a serving plate. Make more appams similarly.', 'Serve hot with green coconut chutney or vegetable ishtew or chicken ishtew.']

title: Banoffee Pie
method: ['Preheat oven to 180deg C.', 'Roll out half the dough into a large disc, gently lift it up and place it on a pie dish. Press down the bottom and the sides. Trim off the extra dough hanging from the sides and prick all over with fork.', 'Place a baking paper over the dough disc and spread dried beans on it. Process the remaining dough similarly. Place the pie dishes in the preheated oven and bake for 20-25 minutes. Take them out of the oven and allow to cool.', 'Peel and slice bananas, sprinkle brown sugar and cinnamon powder over them and set aside.', 'Heat a non-stick pan, add dulche de leche and stir till it softens. Transfer the mixture over the baked pie shells spread it evenly.', 'Arrange the banana pieces neatly on top, spread whipped cream over them making little peaks. Refrigerate till set.', 'Bring them out of the refrigerator, sprinkle chocolate flakes on top, cut into wedges and serve.']

title: Crunchy Yogurt with Strawberries
method: ['Hull the strawberries and chop them roughly.', 'Take blueberry jam in a bowl, add whisked yogurt and mix well.', 'Rub a little mixed fruit jam on the insides of the serving glass cups to make stripes.', 'Crush kurmura laddoos coarsely in a bowl.', 'Half fill the glass cups with the crushed laddoos and put the blueberry yogurt over it.', 'Top it with strawberries, drizzle a little plain yogurt on top. Sprinkle a little crushed kurmura laddoos and serve immediately.']

title: Chicken Sukka - SK Khazana
method: ['Put onions, garlic, finger, red chillies, cinnamon, cloves, coriander seeds, black peppercorns and a little water in a blender jar and blend to a fine paste.', 'Take chicken in a bowl, add this paste, salt, red chilli powder and turmeric powder and mix well. Set aside to marinate for 30-45 minutes.', 'Heat oil in a deep non-stick pan, add the marinated chicken and saute for 5-6 minutes on high heat, stirring continuously.', 'Add coriander leaves, mix well and saute for 2-3 minutes on high heat. Cover and cook on medium heat for 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with a lemon slice and a coriander sprig and serve hot.']

title: Breakfast Bagel
method: ['Heat a non-stick tawa.', 'Slice bagel from centre and apply butter on the slices. Toast the slices till evenly done from both sides.', 'Cut tomato into slices.', 'Place toasted bagel slices on a worktop. Roughly tear Romaine lettuce and place on the lower base slices.', 'Place tomato slices on top and sprinkle salt and crushed peppercorns on top.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Break eggs into the pan and sprinkle salt and crushed peppercorns and cook for 2 minutes.', 'Roughly tear basil leaves and place on tomato slices. Place the fried eggs on top.', 'Place the bagels on a serving plate and cover with upper slices.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Red Velvet Cake
method: ['Preheat oven at 180degC. Line a 7-inch round cake tin by greasing with little butter and dusting with little refined flour.', 'Beat eggs and castor sugar in a bowl till fluffy.', 'Add vanilla essence and food colour and beat again.', 'Add refined flour and fold lightly till well blended. Add orange rind and mix well.', 'Pour batter in lined cake tin and put in the preheated oven. Bake for 30-40 minutes.', 'To make icing, combine cream cheese and icing sugar in a bowl and whisk well till well blended.', 'Remove cake from oven and demould. Discard the top rough layer and even it out. Slice diagonally from between. Spread icing evenly on the base. Cover with upper layer and spread icing evenly on this layer as well.', 'Cut into wedges and serve.']

title: Spicy Fish - SK Khazana
method: ['Take the fish pieces in a shallow bowl and squeeze the juice of the lemon over them. Add salt, rub in well on both sides of the fish pieces and set aside for 15-20 minutes.', 'Take paprika powder on a plate, add dried ginger powder, all spice powder, crushed black peppercorns, curry powder, cayenne pepper powder, cumin powder, salt and oil and mix well. Add the fish pieces and rub well till they are well coated with the spice mixture. Set aside to marinate for 10-15 minutes.', 'Place each fish piece on a piece of butter paper and fold the paper from all sides to make a parcel.', 'Heat remaining oil in a non-stick pan, place the fish parcels on it and cook for 1-2 minutes. Flip the parcels, cover and cook till the fish is cooked completely.', 'Discard the butter paper, and place the fish pieces on a serving plate. Garnish with lemon slices and serve hot with salad.']

title: Chocolate Moong Dal Pancakes - SK Khazana
method: ['Put moong dal in a bowl, add sufficient water and soak for 4-5 hours. Drain and blend with very little water to a thick and smooth paste.', 'Transfer the paste into a large bowl, add refined flour, powdered sugar, cocoa powder and break in an egg. Add melted butter, green cardamom powder and baking powder and mix well.', 'Add milk to adjust the consistency. Let the batter rest for 2-3 minutes.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa.', 'To make chocolate ganache, heat a small non-stick pan, add fresh cream and cook till it is about to come to a boil.', 'Grease the tawa with melted butter and pour ladlesful of batter to make 3 pancakes. Cook on low heat for 2-3 minutes, flip and cook for 4-5 minutes.', 'Take chocolate cubes in another bowl, add the hot cream and leave it for 2 minutes. Whisk well till all the chocolate melts and mixes with the cream.', 'For serving, place pancakes on top of each other, drizzle the prepared ganache over the, garnish with almond slivers and serve warm.']

title: Chicken Thai Rice
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick wok.', 'Slice garlic, add to pan and saute till golden. Add fresh red chillies and onion, mix and saute till onion turns golden.', 'Add Thai green curry paste and mix well. Add chicken mince and salt, mix well and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add rice and crushed peppercorns, mix and cook for a minute. Add coconut milk and some water, mix, cover and cook on low heat for 2-3 minutes.', 'Serve hot garnished with fried basil leaves.']

title: Potatoes In Spicy Tamarind Sauce
method: ['Chop red chillies and remove seeds. Heat oil in a non sick pan. Thickly slice onions.', 'Add red chillies and onions to the pan and saute for 2 minutes. Add ginger and garlic and saute for 1 minute. Add turmeric powder, crushed red chillies and fennel powder and mix. Continue to saute for 1 minute more.', 'Add sweet and sour sauce and mix. Add tamarind pulp and mix. Add potatoes, crushed black peppercorns and mix well. Add 2 tbsps water and mix till all the potatoes are well coated. Add salt and mix well. Serve hot.']

title: Cucumber and Pear Juice
method: ['Roughly chop cucumber, quarter and core pear and roughly chop celery.', 'Process all of these with some ice cubes to get the juice.', 'Pour the juice into individual glasses and serve immediately.']

title: Ginger And Oatmeal Halwa
method: ['Soak wheat in two cups of water for eight to ten hours. Drain and crush in a mixer. If it is too dry add a little water and crush.', 'Heat half the ghee in a pan and saute crushed wheat for five minutes. Add oatmeal flour and whole wheat flour and saute for a further two to three minutes. Add rolled oats and continue to saute. Add sugar and three cups of water, mix properly. Add more wa', 'Dribble the remaining ghee from top. Add slivered almonds, pistachios and dry ginger powder and mix.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Apple Sheera
method: ['Heat ghee in a deep non-stick bottom pan, add semolina and saute for 2-3 minutes. Add apple, mix and saute for 4-5 minutes.', 'Add salt and mix well. Add milk and mix. Add saffron, mix, cover the pan and cook till all the liquid is absorbed.', 'Add sugar and cardamom powder, mix well, cover and cook till for 5-6 minutes.', 'Transfer the sheera into a serving bowl, garnish with apple slices and pistachio slivers and serve warm.']

title: Jam Cookies
method: ['Take castor sugar in a bowl, add butter and beat with an electric beater till light. Add vanilla essence and beat well.', 'Sift together refined flour and cornflour into the bowl. Add milk and mix till well combined into a dough. Wrap the dough in cling wrap and chill in the refrigerator for 2-3 hours.', 'Preheat the oven to 180deg C.', 'Bring out the dough out of the refrigerator and roll it out into  1/2  cm thick sheet. Cut into roundels with a medium sized cookie cutter.', 'Cut out center of half the roundels with a smaller cookie cutter to make rings.', 'Spread some pineapple jam on each complete roundel, place a ring on top of each. Place them on a baking tray.', 'Keep the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 20-25 minutes. Remove the tray from oven and let the cookies cool.', 'Arrange them on a serving plate and serve.']

title: Chowmein Samosa - SK Khazana
method: ['Shape each spring roll wrapper into cones, fill it up with hakka noodles, apply cornflour slurry and seal the open end of the wrapper and keep the samosa on a plate.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a deep pan, slide in the samosas, a few at a time, and deep-fry on medium heat till golden. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Heat 2 tsps oil in a non-stick pan, add garlic, ginger, spring onion bulbs, and saute till translucent. Add schezwan sauce, tomato ketchup, soy sauce and mix well. Add  1/2  cup water, and mix well.', 'Add salt, mix well and let the mixture come to a boil. Add cornflour slurry and mix well.', 'Add the fried samosas, spring onions greens, and toss well.', 'Transfer into a serving plate. Garnish with sesame seeds and spring onion greens and serve hot.']

title: California Pistachio Pasta Salad
method: ['Mix all the ingredients of the salad dressing together.', 'Add the blanched pasta to the dressing. Add snow peas, tomatoes and mix. Add baby spinach leaves and mix. Add coarsely chopped pistachios and mix well. Finally add Parmesan cheese shavings and toss.', 'Serve hot or cold.']

title: Egg Karam Dosa
ingredients: ['6-8 eggs', '2 cups ready-made dosa batter', '1 tbsp ghee + for greasing + for drizzling', '1 tsp cumin seeds', '10-12 dried red chillies', '1 1/2  tbsps finely chopped garlic', '1 large onion, finely chopped', '1 small lemon sized tamarind ball', 'Salt to taste', 'Finely chopped green chillies for sprinkling', 'Finely chopped fresh coriander leaves for sprinkling', 'Grated processed cheese for sprinkling', 'Coconut chutney to serve']
method: ['To make chutney, heat ghee in a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds and let them change colour.', 'Add dried red chillies, mix and saute for 1-2 minutes. Add garlic and onion, mix and saute till translucent.', 'Add tamarind and salt and mix well. Cook for 1-2 minutes. Allow to cool slightly.', 'Transfer this mixture into a mixer jar and grind to a fine paste.', 'Take dosa batter in a large bowl. Add salt and mix well.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa. Grease it with some ghee.', 'Pour a ladleful of the dosa batter and spread it in a circular motion to make a thin disc. Drizzle some ghee along the sides. Apply some of the chutney evenly all over the surface of the disc.', 'Break the egg over the centre of the disc and lightly spread it all over the surface of the dosa. Sprinkle green chillies, coriander leaves and processed cheese. Cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Fold in half, place it on a serving plate and serve hot with coconut chutney.', 'Make more dosas similarly.']
Main ingredients: Eggs, Dosa batter, Ghee, Cumin seeds, Dried red chillies, Garlic, Onion, Tamarind, Fresh green chillies, Fresh coriander leaves, Processed cheese

title: Bisi Bele Bhaat-SK Khazana
method: ['Heat oil in a pressure cooker. Add onion, green chillies and 6-8 curry leaves, mix and saute till fragrant.', 'Add sambhar onions and turmeric powder and mix. Break 3 dried red chillies, add to the cooker alongwith tomatoes, asafoetida and chilli powder, mix well and cook till the tomatoes turn soft and pulpy.', 'Add hulianna masala and mix well. Add rice, pigeon peas, salt, 5-5 1/2  cups water and tamarind paste, mix well, cover and cook under pressure till the pressure is released 3-4 times.', 'Heat 2 tablespoons ghee in a non-stick pan. Add mustard seeds and saute till the seeds splutter.', 'Add remaining curry leaves and remaining dried chillies, mix and saute for 30 seconds. Add this to the cooked rice mixture.', 'Heat remaining ghee in the same pan. Add cashewnuts and fry till browned. Add this to the cooked rice mixture and mix well.', 'Garnish with coriander leaf and serve hot.']

title: Watermelon Kachumber
method: ['Mix together tamarind paste and pomegranate juice in a Nirlep non stick pan and cook. Cut the cucumbers into big cubes.', 'Mix together cucumbers and watermelon in a bowl. Sprinkle  1/4  tsp black pepper powder and salt and mix.', 'When the pomegranate juice thickens, transfer it into a bowl. Add the remaining black pepper powder and salt and let it cool down to room temperature.', 'Arrange spring onion green stalks on a serving plate, transfer the watermelon salad over them, drizzle the tamarind pomegranate dressing over and serve.']

title: Poori Bhaji
method: ['To make poori dough, put whole wheat flour in a large mixing bowl, add semolina, salt and hot oil and mix. Add sufficient water to knead into stiff dough. Cover with a damp cloth and rest for 10-15 minutes.', 'To make aloo sabzi, heat oil in a non-stick pan, add mustard seeds and once they start to splutter, add asafoetida and cumin seeds. Once cumin seeds start to change colour, add curry leaves and green chillies and saute for a few seconds.', 'Cut potatoes into cubes and add to the pan. Lightly mash potatoes with the back of a spoon, sprinkle some water and mix. Add half the coconut and half the coriander leaves and mix well.Cover and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'To make the pooris, heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Divide the dough into small portions, roll into balls and then roll out into thick small discs.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Slide the prepared discs into the hot oil and deep-fry till golden brown and puffed up. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Transfer sabzi into a serving bowl and garnish with remaining coriander leaves and remaining coconut. Arrange the pooris on a serving plate and serve hot with sabzi.']

title: Mini Double Chocolate Truffle Cake
method: ['Place cookies in a zip-lock bag and crush with a rolling pin. Transfer in a bowl.', 'Add butter and mix well. Transfer the mixture into a mini cake mould and press lightly. Refrigerate.', 'Chop white chocolate and transfer into another bowl.', 'Heat cream in a non-stick pan till it boils. Add this to the white chocolate and mix well till the chocolate melts. Refrigerate for 3-4 minutes.', 'Fill a piping bag with the dark chocolate ganache and pipe out over the cookie layer. Level it out.', 'Pour the white chocolate ganache over the dark chocolate layer and tap lightly. Refrigerate for 5-6 hours.', 'Demould, cut into wedges and serve.']

title: Aloo Bhalle - SK Khazana
method: ['Take mashed potatoes in a bowl, add cornflour, coriander seeds, red chilli powder and salt and mix well. Grease your palms with oil, divide the mixture into 4 equal portions, and shape each of them into a tikki.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a non-stick pan, place the tikkis in it and shallow-fry on medium heat, turning sides and pressing lightly, till evenly golden crisp on both sides. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Place each bhalla on individual serving plates and crush them lightly. Drizzle green chutney and sweet tamarind chutney and sprinkle chaat masala powder. Serve immediately.']

title: Masala Doodh
method: ['Boil milk in a non-stick pan. When it comes to a boil, reduce heat and simmer till the milk reduces to three-fourth its original quantity. Add saffron and mix well.', 'Grind cashewnuts, charoli, pistachios, almonds and nutmeg powder to a coarse powder.', 'Add sugar and three tablespoons nut powder to the reduced milk and mix well. Add almond slivers and cardamom powder, mix well and simmer for ten to twelve minutes.', 'Pour into four individual glasses and serve hot or chilled.', 'The remaining powder can be stored.']

title: Bhuna Bhutta
method: ['Peel off the skin of the corn cobs. Keep the cobs on individual twelve-inch by twelve-inch square pieces of aluminium foil.', 'Either sprinkle salt, smear butter and lemon juice or sprinkle salt, red chilli flakes, red chilli powder, brown sugar and smear butter and lemon juice.', 'Wrap the aluminium foil pieces around the cobs and twist the ends like a toffee.', 'Place the cobs on live charcoal on a barbecue and cook for fifteen minutes. Open the foil and serve hot.']

title: Masala Khakra-SK Khazana
method: ['Knead together wheat flour, gram flour, turmeric powder, chilli powder, dried mango powder, salt, asafoetida, dried fenugreek leaves and half the milk and oil and mix well. Add the remaining milk and knead to a semi-stiff dough. Rest the dough for 10-15 minutes.', 'Divide the dough into equal portions, dust with some flour and roll out into thin discs.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa. Dry-roast each disc on medium heat, pressing with muslin cloth and turning sides till golden brown and crisp on both the sides. Remove from heat, cool down to room temperature and serve or store in an airtight container.']

title: Baked Stuffed Mushrooms with Saffron Mayo
method: ['Preheat oven to180degC.', 'Put onion, green chillies, half the garlic, salt, crushed peppercorns and mozzarella cheese in a bowl and mix well. Add herbs and mix again.', 'Stuff the mushrooms with this mixture and place them on a baking tray. Place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 10-15 minutes.', 'Take mayonnaise in a bowl.', 'Heat milk in a small bowl in the microwave for 20-25 seconds. Remove from heat and add saffron. Mix well and set aside for 2-3 minutes so that the flavour gets infused.', 'Add remaining garlic, salt, crushed peppercorns to mayonnaise and mix well. Add saffron milk and mix well.', 'Place baked stuffed mushrooms on a serving platter and serve hot with saffron-mayo dip.']

title: Aloo Bhujia Tikki
method: ['In a bowl, add potatoes,  1/2  cup aloo bhujia sev, cornflour, green chillies, salt and ginger and mix well.', 'Spread some aloo bhujia sev on a plate.', 'Divide the mixture into equal portions and shape them into tikkis. Dip in cornflour slurry and roll in aloo bhujia sev.', 'Heat oil in a kadai, slide in the tikkis and and deep-fry till crisp and golden brown. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Arrange them on a serving platter and serve hot with green chutney.']

title: Anda Pav Toast - SK Khazana
method: ['Break in the eggs and sprinkle salt, whisk well using a fork.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick tawa, pour the egg mixture, sprinkle onion, tomatoes, green chillies, coriander leaves, red chilli powder and garam masala powder and cook for 1 minute.', 'Cut the pavs in half without cutting them through and place them on the eggs mixture and press gently.', 'Cook for 1-2 minutes, flip and bring the sides of the cooked egg mixture into the center of the pavs. Fold the pavs, press gently and apply 4 tsps butter on top. Cook for a minute more.', 'Flip the pavs and apply the remaining butter on top and press using a masher till the pavs turn crisp.', 'Take the tawa off the heat and place the anda pav toast on a worktop. Cut them in half and place them on a serving plate.', 'Serve hot with onion and tomato ketchup.']

title: Chicken Cafreal
method: ['Heat a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds, cloves, coriander seeds, green cardamom, black peppercorns and cinnamon, mix and dry roast till fragrant. Transfer into a mixer jar.', 'Add garlic, ginger, green chillies, coriander leaves and some water and grind to a smooth paste.', 'Take the chicken in a large bowl, add ground paste and salt and mix well. Keep aside to marinate for 1 hour.', 'Heat oil in a deep non-stick pan. Add the marinated chicken and mix well. Cover and cook for 15-20 minutes or till the chicken is well cooked.', 'Switch off the heat, add vinegar and mix well.', 'Transfer into a serving plate, garnish with fried onions and serve hot.']

title: Schezwan Tandoori Chicken-
method: ['Mix together yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, chilli powder, garam masala powder, dried fenugreek leaves powder, chaat masala, salt, lemon juice and mustard oil in a bowl.', 'Make incisions on chicken lollipops, add to the bowl and mix well. Set aside to marinate for 1 hour.', 'Preheat oven to 200o C.', 'Transfer marinated chicken lollipops on a baking tray, put tray in preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes. Remove from oven and brush with some butter.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add garlic and onion, mix and saute till onion turns translucent.', 'Add Schezwan sauce, mix well and bring to a boil. Add salt and mix well.', 'Add chopped spring onion greens and mix. Add baked chicken lollipops, mix well and let it get heated through.', 'Garnish with sliced spring onion greens and serve hot.']

title: Easy Hoisin Prawns
method: ['Heat oil in a nonstick pan. Add garlic and saute till golden brown in colour.', 'Add prawns and salt and saute on high heat for two minutes.', 'Add red chilli sauce, hoisin sauce and soya sauce and mix well.', 'Saute for two to three minutes or till prawns are cooked.', 'Switch off heat add vinegar and mix.', 'Transfer into a serving plate.', 'Garnish with spring onions and serve hot.']

title: Golden Goodie Cookies
method: ['Preheat oven to 180o C.', 'Cream together butter and castor sugar in a bowl till light.', 'Add egg and vanilla essence and mix well.', 'Add flour, salt, baking powder and desiccated coconut and fold in well.', 'Divide the mixture into twelve equal small portions and shape them into cookies. Place them on a baking tray and top with cherries.', 'Place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for fifteen minutes. Remove from the oven and cool down to room temperature.', 'Serve or store in an airtight container.']

title: Easter Eggs
method: ['Take 250 grams white chocolate in a microwave proof bowl and place in the microwave for 1 minute. Remove from heat, mix and bring down to room temperature.', 'Take 1 tablespoon melted white chocolate in another bowl. Add edible candy colour and mix well.', 'Dip a toothbrush in coloured chocolate mixture and spray it over individual egg moulds. Refrigerate for 1 minute.', 'Remove from refrigerator and pour the melted white chocolate in the moulds and refrigerate for 30 seconds. Remove from refrigerator and discard the melted white chocolate back into the same bowl. Refrigerate till chocolate sets.', 'Remove from refrigerator and demould the chocolate shells.', 'To make the filling, heat cream in a non-stick pan. Add mint leaves and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Take white chocolate in another bowl, strain the hot cream mixture in it and whisk well till chocolate melts.', 'Add edible green colour and whisk well. Add 1 cup whipped cream and fold. Add remaining whipped cream and fold well.', 'Fill a piping bag with prepared filling, pipe it out in each shell and place 2-3 nutty chocolates on it.', 'Heat a palate knife, lightly rub it on the edges of prepared shells and join 2 shells to make an egg shape.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Stuffed Mushroom Pakoras
method: ['Take mashed potato in a bowl, add green chilli, coriander leaves, salt, roasted cumin powder, coriander powder, chaat masala and ginger and mix well.', 'Put some cheese in the mushroom cavity, top it with potato stuffing and press it with the back of a spoon to spread it evenly.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a wok.', 'To make the batter, take gram flour in a large bowl, add salt, ajwain, and baking soda.', 'Add turmeric powder, Tata Sampann Red Chilli Powder and 2-3 tbsps hot oil. Add sufficient water, little by little, and whisk continuously till you get a thick and smooth batter.', 'Dip each mushroom in the batter till it is evenly coated, slide it into hot oil and deep-fry, stirring continuously so that they turn evenly golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Halve the pakoras, transfer them on a serving platter and sprinkle chaat masala over them. Serve them hot with green chutney mayonnaise.']

title: Halwa Puri - SK Khazana
method: ['Take whole wheat flour in a large bowl, add 1 tbsp semolina, 1 tsp ghee and salt and mix well. Add sufficient water and knead into stiff dough. Cover with a damp muslin cloth and set aside for 10 minutes.', 'Boil milk in a stainless steel pan.', 'Meanwhile, heat remaining ghee in a non-stick pan. Add raisins, almonds and cashew nuts and saute till a light golden brown. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Add remaining semolina to the ghee remaining in the pan, mix well and saute for 2 minutes. Add saffron, mix and saute till the semolina turns golden brown.', 'Add hot milk and cover immediately and cook for 1 minute. Uncover and mix continuously to avoid lumps. Cover and cook till all the milk is absorbed.', 'Meanwhile, heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Add sugar to the semolina mixture and mix well. Cover and cook till the sugar dissolves. Uncover, add the fried nuts and mix well. Add green cardamom powder and mix well. Take the pan off the heat and keep it covered.', 'To make puris, divide the dough into medium sized balls. Dip each in a little oil and flatten slightly. Roll it into a small disc.', 'Slide the puris into hot oil and deep-fry till they puff up and the underside becomes golden. Flip and deep-fry till the other side becomes golden. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Arrange the puris on a serving platter. Put the halwa in a serving bowl, garnish with sliced pistachios and serve hot with the puris.']

title: Moong Dal Waffle
method: ['Put split green gram in a blender jar, add some water and blend into coarse and semi-thick mixture. Transfer into a bowl.', 'Add corn kernels and green peas to the batter and mix. Add green chillies, crushed peppercorns, salt and coriander leaves and mix. Add cashewnuts and raisins and mix well.', 'Preheat an electric waffle iron.', 'Add baking soda to the batter and mix well.', 'Grease the preheated waffle iron with some oil. Pour some batter, cover and cook till golden brown and crisp. Use up the remaining batter similarly.', 'To prepare chutney-mayonnaise dip, mix together mayonnaise and green chutney in a bowl.', 'Spread some chutney-mayonnaise dip on two sides of a serving platter. Place waffles in the centre and serve hot.']

title: Nutty Dark Chocolate
method: ['Melt dark chocolate on a double boiler.', 'Dry-roast walnuts and almonds on a non-stick pan till golden and crunchy.', 'Remove chocolate from heat and bring down to room temperature. Add roasted nuts and mix well.', 'Pour the chocolate-nut mixture into a small heart shape silicon chocolate mould, tap and scrape out the excess chocolate from above the mould using a scraper. Refrigerate to set for 10-15 minutes.', 'Demould and serve.']

title: Kachchi Mirchi Ka Murgh
method: ['Slit bhavnagri chillies and remove seeds.', 'In a bowl mix together fennel powder, fenugreek seed powder, roasted cumin powder, crushed yellow mustard seeds, onion seeds and salt. Stuff this mixture into the slit chillies and set aside.', 'Take chicken pieces in a bowl.', 'Add salt, yogurt and crushed green chillies and let it marinate for about fifteen minutes.', 'Heat oil in a pan. Add onions and saute till they soften.', 'Add the stuffed chillies and mix. Add ginger paste, garlic paste, coriander powder, turmeric power, red chilli powder and saute for two to three minutes.', 'Cover and cook till the chillies soften. Add marinated chicken and mix well.', 'Cover and cook on high heat for about ten minutes.', 'Uncover and stir once. Cover and cook on low heat for another ten minutes.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Cheese Dip
method: ['Put the hung yogurt in a bowl. Add cheese spread, garlic, black pepper powder and salt. Mix well.', 'Add onion, capsicum, grated cheese and lemon juice. Mix well and refrigerate for about one hour. Serve chilled with chips.']

title: Egg Vermicelli Cutlet
method: ['Grate potatoes into a bowl. Add salt, cumin powder, green chillies, garlic, crushed peppercorns and coriander leaves and mix well.', 'Coat eggs with a thin layer of this potato mixture.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Put egg white in a bowl and spread vermicelli in a plate.', 'Dip the eggs in egg white, coat them in vermicelli, press lightly so that the vermicelli sticks to the eggs. Gently slide into hot oil and deep-fry till golden. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Nut Chikki Munchies
method: ['Roast the almonds and cashewnuts lightly and chop roughly. Crush walnuts.', 'Grease a tray. Melt jaggery in a pan. Add saffron and mix. When the jaggery has melted completely add roasted sesame, cashewnuts, walnuts and almonds and mix well.', 'Immediately transfer the mixture onto the greased tray and spread with a rolling pin. Dab some ghee on the surface and cut into squares when still hot.', 'When it cools loosen the squares and serve.']

title: Chukandar aur Corn ka Pulao
method: ['Heat oil in a deep non-stick pan. Add cumin seeds, mustard seeds and bay leaves and saute till mustard seeds splutter.', 'Add dried red chillies and saute for 30 seconds. Add corn kernels and beetroots, mix and cook for 30 seconds. Add salt and mix well.', 'Add India Gate Basmati Rice, chilli powder, turmeric powder, scraped coconut, mix and cook for a minute on low heat.', 'Sprinkle some water on top and mix. Increase heat and cook for a minute.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Walnut Chutney - SK Khazana
method: ['Roasted walnuts mixed with roasted cumin seeds and garlic and ground - delicious', 'Add red chillies to the same pan and dry roast for 1-2 minutes. Transfer into the same bowl.', 'Add walnuts to the same pan and dry roast till crisp. Transfer into the same bowl.', 'Add red chilli powder, sea salt and garlic cloves and mix together.', 'Transfer the mixture into a blender jar and blend to a coarse powder.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and let it cool down to room temperature. Use as required.']

title: Potato and Rosemary Focaccia
method: ['Preheat oven at 180degC.', 'Heat some water and add yeast and sugar in it. Mix well and set aside.', 'Combine refined flour, garlic, salt, 150 ml olive oil, yeast mixture and half the rosemary in a bowl. Mix well and knead into a soft dough using sufficient water. Set aside for  1/2  hour.', 'Add 1 tbsp olive oil to the dough and knead again.', 'Grease round baking tin with olive oil and spread the dough in it. Add remaining rosemary and potato cubes on top and press them. Add 1 tbsp olive oil on top and press again. Set aside for 20-25 minutes.', 'Place the tin in the preheated oven and bake for 12-13 minutes. Remove from oven, demould and cool to room temperature.', 'Slice and serve.']

title: Walnut Praline - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat brown sugar, castor sugar and salt together in a non-stick pan.', 'Add fresh cream and mix well and cook till the sugars start melting.', 'Add vanilla essence and maple syrup and mix well. Add walnut and mix well, bring to a boil. Remove from heat. Add butter and mix well.', 'Spread the mixture in small roundels on a baking tray. Keep the tray in the refrigerator to set overnight.', 'Taking the tray out of the refrigerator, arrange them on a serving platter and serve.']

title: Kalakand Nest
method: ['Preheat oven at 180deg C.', 'Line individual small tart moulds with samosa patti strips and place the prepared moulds on the baking tray. Place the baking tray in preheated oven and bake for 8-10 minutes. Remove from oven, cool and demould the nests.', 'Take a pinch saffron strands in a bowl. Add 1 tablespoon warm milk, mix and set aside for 2-3 minutes.', 'Take kalakand in another bowl. Add infused saffron milk, pistachios and almonds and mix well.', 'Make quenelle of kalakand mixture and place in each nest.', 'Serve immediately garnished with few saffron strands.']

title: Chicken Khichdi
method: ['Heat oil in a pressure cooker, add cumin seeds, bay leaf, green cardamoms, black cardamom, broken dried red chilli and onion, mix well and saute till the onion turns light golden brown.', 'Add ginger-garlic paste, mix well and saute for 1 minute. Add turmeric powder, red chilli powder and chicken masala, mix well and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add tomatoes, salt, coriander leaves and green chillies and mix well. Cover and cook till the tomatoes turn pulpy.', 'Add rice, split green gram and chicken pieces, mix well and saute on high heat for 1-2 minutes. Add 4 cups water and mix well.', 'Add lemon juice and mix, fit the lid on and cook till 3-4 whistles are released. Allow the pressure to settle completely.', 'Transfer to a serving plate, put a dollop of ghee on top, garnish with onion rings, lemon wedge and coriander sprig and serve immediately with papad.']

title: Highway Chicken Curry
method: ['Heat ghee in a deep non-stick pan, add cinnamon, green chillies and onions, mix well and saute till golden brown.', 'Add ginger-garlic paste, mix and saute for 1 minute. Add tomato and salt and mix well. Cover and cook till tomato turns pulpy.', 'Add chicken, coriander powder, red chilli powder, cumin powder, garam masala powder and coriander leaves, mix well and saute on high heat for 4-5 minutes.', 'Add sufficient water to just cover the chicken and mix well. Cover and cook till chicken is cooked completely.', 'Transfer the chicken into one serving bowl and steamed rice into another serving bowl. Garnish both with coriander sprigs and serve hot.']

title: Multigrain Thalipeeth Premix - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat  1/4  cup oil in a non-stick pan, add chopped green chillies and fry till crisp. Take the pan off the heat.', 'Spread chopped coriander on a microwave safe plate and microwave on high for 2-3 minutes, mixing in 1 minute.', 'Take whole wheat flour in a large plate, add pearl millet flour, sorghum flour, gram flour, amaranth flour and onion flakes and mix well.', 'Add turmeric powder, red chilli powder, cumin powder, coriander powder, salt and add dried coriander leaves and mix well', 'Add the fried green chillies along with the oil and mix till well combined. Store in an air-tight container and use up to 15 days.', 'For making thalipeeth, take 1 1/2  cups of the prepared premix and add  1/2  cup hot water and mix till well combined', 'Spread a portion of the mixture on a non-stick pan to make a disc and make 2-3 holes, place the pan on heat and drizzle with a little oil and cover and cook on low heat for 2 minutes, flip and cook uncovered for 2 minutes.', 'Serve hot with white butter.']

title: Kanda Bhajiya - SK Khazana
method: ['Slit the green chillies.', 'Thinly slice onions and transfer into a bowl. Add salt and mix well. Set aside for 10-12 minutes.', 'Add red chilli powder, cumin powder, coriander powder, turmeric powder, coriander leaves and rice flour and mix well.', 'Add gram flour and mix till all ingredients are well combined.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai', 'Drop small portions of the onion mixture into hot oil and deep-fry on medium heat till golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Add the slit green chillies to the hot oil and deep-fry for 1-2 minutes. Transfer on absorbent paper and sprinkle some salt.', 'Serve the bhajiyas hot with fried chillies and vada pav chutney.']

title: Dal Puri - SK Khazana
method: ['Take refined flour in a large bowl, add ghee and salt and mix well. Add water little by little and knead into a semi-soft dough. Cover with a damp muslin cloth and rest for 10-15 minutes.', 'To make the stuffing, take Chana Dal in a large bowl and sufficient water and let it soak for 1 hour.', 'Drain the dal and put into a blender jar, add garlic, ginger and break and add dried red chillies. Add green chillies, sugar, asafoetida and add a little water and blend into a coarse paste.', 'Heat a non-stick pan, add mustard oil and let it smoke. Add the dal paste and saute for 2-3 minutes. Add salt and mix till the moisture evaporates and the mixture leaves the sides of the pan and forms a mass. Transfer into a plate and let it cool down to room temperature.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa.', 'Divide the dough into medium sized portions and shape them into balls. Dust the worktop with flour and roll each dough ball into a small disc. Place some dal mixture in the center of each disc, bring the edges together and pinch to seal.', 'Dust the worktop with flour and roll the stuffed balls into thin discs.', 'Place them on the hot tawa, one at a time, and cook for 1 minute. Flip and drizzle some ghee evenly on top. Flip again and drizzle some ghee on the other side too and cook, turning sides, till both sides are evenly golden and crisp. Transfer them onto a plate', 'Cut each into 4 pieces, arrange them on a serving plate and serve hot with pickle.']

title: Chicken in Butter Garlic Sauce - SK Khazana
method: ['Take chicken cubes in a bowl, add salt, white pepper powder, cornflour and egg white and mix well. And set aside for 10 minutes', 'Heat sufficient oil in a deep pan, slide in the chicken pieces and deep-fry till  3/4  done. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Heat butter in a non-stick pan and let it melt. Add sesame oil, garlic and green chilli and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add mushroom and salt, saute for 2-3 minutes. Add chicken stock and cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add fried chicken pieces and 3-coloured capsicums, mix well and cook for 2-3 minutes. Add cornflour slurry, mix well and cook till the sauce thickens.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with green capsicum curls and serve hot with fried rice.']

title: Cold Mango Souffle-SK Khazana
method: ['Separate egg yolks from whites and put into 2 separate bowls.', 'Heat sufficient water in a deep non-stick pan, keep a mixing bowl over it, Put the egg yolks,  1/4  cup castor sugar and vanilla essence into the bowl and cook whisking continuously till the mixture is smooth.', 'Add gelatin and whisk well. Remove from heat and set aside.', 'Take egg white in another mixing bowl, add lemon juice and whisk. Add remaining castor sugar and whisk till fluffy.', 'Add mango puree to egg yolk mixture and whisk well. Fold in egg white mixture till well incorporated.', 'Add whipped cream and fold in gently.', 'Line individual ramekin moulds from outside with parchment paper and pour souffle mixture into each. Refrigerate overnight or till set.', 'Dust icing sugar on top, garnish with chopped mangoes and mint sprigs and serve immediately.']

title: Fish Tikka Wrap
method: ['Put yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, garam masala powder, chilli powder, lemon juice and salt in a bowl and mix. Add mustard oil and mix well.', 'Add fish pieces and mix. Add onion cubes and green capsicum cubes and mix well. Set aside to marinate for 15-20 minutes.', 'One each skewer insert these pieces in this order: 1 onion cube, 1 capsicum cube, 1 fish piece and repeat this till all the ingredients are used.', 'Preheat an electric griller and grease with some oil. Place the prepared skewers, cover and grill till well done and golden.', 'Warm tortillas from both sides on a non-stick pan. Transfer on the worktop.', 'Remove the fish pieces from the skewers.', 'Place few lettuce leaves, cucumber strips and grilled fish in the center of each tortilla. Squeeze lemon juice on top and sprinkle some chaat masala on top.', 'Fill a squeezy bottle with mint-mayonnaise and drizzle on top of prepared tortillas. Roll the tortilla wraps, in aluminium foil and halve.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Fried Cheese Sandwich
ingredients: ['Sliced emmental cheese as required', 'Sliced cheddar cheese as required', '4 white bread slices', '3-4 tablespoons mayonnaise', ' 1/2  teaspoon garlic powder', ' 1/2  teaspoon onion powder', ' 1/2  teaspoon finely chopped pickled jalapenos', '2 eggs', '2 tablespoons milk', 'Dried breadcrumbs as required', 'Oil for shallow frying', 'Tomato ketchup for serving']
method: ['Take mayonnaise in a bowl. Add garlic powder, onion powder and jalapenos and mix well.', 'Break eggs in a bowl. Add milk and whisk well.', 'Place 2 bread slices on worktop. Spread mayonnaise mixture on one slice and place emmental and cheddar slices on top. Cover with another slice. Similarly make other sandwich.', 'Cut the sandwiches into triangles, dip in egg mixture and roll in dried breadcrumbs.', 'Shallow fry the sandwiches till golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper and serve hot with tomato ketchup.']

title: Chilli Pomegranate Sorbet - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat pomegranate juice in a deep pan, add sugar and mix till sugar dissolves. Add black salt, crushed black peppercorns, roasted cumin powder, chaat masala and chilli powder and mix well.', 'Add a few mint leaves and mix. Cook till the mixture reduces a little bit. Take it off the heat and strain into another bowl. Refrigerate for 1 hour.', 'Pour the chilled mixture into an ice cream churner bucket. Place it on the churner and churn it for 20 minutes.', 'Take it out of the ice cream churner and serve immediately. Or transfer into an airtight container and freeze to serve whenever required.']

title: Risotto Verde
method: ['Heat oil in non stick pan, add garlic and saute till light brown.', 'Add spring onions, leek and rice, mix well and saute for 3-4 minutes.', 'Add  1/2  cup wine and stir to mix. Cook for 2 minutes and add remaining wine. Stir and cook for another 2 minutes.', 'Add spinach and mix well. Add remaining vegetable stock and cook for 3-4 minutes.', 'Add broccoli florets and yogurt. Mix well and cook till fully done.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Tamatar ka Korma
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan.', 'Combine coriander seeds, cumin seeds, poppy seeds, cloves, Bengal gram, broken green chillies, coconut and turmeric powder in a grinder jar. Add little water and grind into a coarse paste.', 'Add mustard seeds, curry leaves and onion to the pan and saute well.', 'Heat sufficient water in another non-stick pan. Add potatoes and salt, mix and cook till the potatoes turn soft.', 'Add ginger-garlic paste to the mustard seeds and saute well. Add tomatoes and salt, mix well, cover and cook till the tomatoes turn soft.', 'Add  1/4  cup water to tomatoes and mix. Add ground paste, mix well and cook further.', 'Drain potatoes and add and mix well. Add  1/2  cup milk and mix well. Adjust salt, mix well and add remaining milk. Mix well and cook for a minute.', 'Serve hot garnished with a coriander sprig.']

title: White Egg Curry
method: ['Heat butter and oil in a non-stick pan. When butter melts, add onion paste and saute, on medium heat, till onion turns golden.', 'Add milk and mix well. Add salt and crushed black peppercorns, mix and cook, stirring continuously, till the mixture comes to a boil. Cook further till it reduces slightly.', 'Halve the eggs vertically and add and mix gently. Add sugar, mix gently, reduce heat and simmer for 5 minutes.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with mint sprig and serve hot.']

title: Chicken Keema Pulao - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat oil in a deep non-stick pan, add cumin seeds and saute till their colour changes. Add black peppercorns, cloves, green cardamoms and cinnamon and saute till fragrant.', 'Add garlic and ginger, mix and saute well. Add onions and green chillies and saute till onions golden brown. Add chicken mince and mix well. Saute for 5-10 minutes on medium heat or till chicken is completely cooked.', 'Add turmeric powder, red chilli powder, garam masala powder and 2 tbsps coriander leaves and mix well. Add yogurt and mix. Add salt and mix. Add cooked rice and mix well. Cook for 2-3 minutes or till the rice is heated through.', 'Add remaining coriander leaves and mix well. Cook for a minute.', 'Transfer into a serving platter, garnish with coriander sprig and serve hot.']

title: Spot Idli
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add green chillies and onion and saute till translucent.', 'Add tomato and mix well. Add salt, mix well and cook till tomato is pulpy.', 'Add molagapodi, mix well and add  1/4  cup water and mix well and cook for 2-3 minutes. Transfer into a bowl.', 'For each portion spread  1/4  portion of the mixture evenly on the pan.', 'Add salt to the idli batter and mix well. Pour a ladleful of batter over the onion-tomato mixture in 3 places keeping a little distance between each. Cover and cook for 6-8 minutes.', 'Flip each idli, drizzle a little oil all around and cook for 2-3 minutes. Sprinkle coriander leaves over them. Use up the remaining batter in the same way.', 'Transfer the idlis onto serving plates, sprinkle some molagapodi over them and serve hot with coconut chutney.']

title: Rolled Cheese Omelette
method: ['For each portion, break 3 eggs into a bowl, add salt and beat well.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan, add  1/4  onions,  1/4  mushrooms and  1/4  tomato, salt and green chillies, mix and saute for 2 minutes.', 'Add beaten eggs, mix and cook for 30 seconds.', 'Add 2 tablespoons cheese and 2 tablespoons spinach, roll into an omelette and cook till fully done. Cut into 2 equal pieces.', 'Keep 2 toasted white bread slices on a serving plate, keep a piece of omelette on each toast, sprinkle some more cheese on top and serve immediately.']

title: Fafda - SK Khazana
method: ['Take gram flour in a parat, add turmeric powder, salt, red chilli powder and papad khar. Crush carom seeds between your palms and add. Add 3 tbsps oil and mix well.', 'Add sufficient water and knead into soft dough. Cover with a damp muslin cloth and set aside for 30 minutes.', 'Slightly knead the dough, take a portion of the dough and shape it into a cylinder, cut into equal portions and shape them into oblong.', 'Grease the worktop with some oil, press and stretch with the heel of your hand into long strips. Scrape the bottom using a knife and pick it up from the worktop.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai, slide in the fafdas into hot oil and deep-fry till crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve with fried green chillies, raw papaya salad and tea.']

title: Akuri
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add onion and green chillies and saute till onion turns golden.', 'Add tomato and saute for 1 minute. Add 1 tablespoon coriander leaves and saute for 30 seconds.', 'Add turmeric powder, chilli powder and cumin powder, mix well and saute for 1 minute.', 'Break eggs into a bowl, beat well and add to pan along with salt, Mix lightly for 1 minute. Add butter and remaining coriander leaves and mix well.', 'Cut bread toasts into triangles.', 'Garnish with a coriander sprig and serve hot with toast triangles.']

title: Watermelon Lollipop
method: ['Slice the watermelon into  1/2  inch thick discs.', 'Heat non-stick pan, pour the orange juice into it, add salt and cook till it reduces', 'Remove the seeds with the pointed end of a knife. Cut small roundels with a small cooker cutter.', 'Transfer the orange juice into a bowl and let it cool down to room temperature.', 'Add the watermelon roundels to the reduced orange juice and let them soak well. Keep the bowl in the refrigerator to chill.', 'Cut the cheese slice into  1/2  inch wide strips. Cut each strips into 2 equal pieces.', 'Take two 2x4 inch thermacole rectangles, keep them one over the other, wrap them with aluminium foil and keep it on a serving platter.', 'Halve the satay sticks.', 'Bring the bowl with watermelon roundels out of the refrigerator, pierce each with a piece of satay stick to make a lollipop and then pierce them into the thermacole piece.', 'Place a cheese strip over each lollipop, make a small slit on top of each lollipop, insert a parsley sprig into the slits and serve immediately.']

title: Rareya Kadaknath Kala Kukkad
method: ['Put chicken and onions in a pressure cooker. Crush green cardamoms and black cardamoms and add along with star anise, bay leaves, red chillies, ginger-garlic paste, black peppercorns and salt. Add 3 cups water, cover the cooker with the lid and cook for 25-30 minutes or till 7-8 whistles are given. Transfer into a bowl when the pressure has settled completely.', 'Heat kachchi ghani mustard oil in a kadai, add cooked chicken and cook till the stock reduces to half.', 'Add red chilli powder, garam masala powder and coriander powder and mix. Cover and cook for 12-15 minutes or till the gravy is further reduced.', 'Chop and add coriander leaves, mix and cook till the mixture is dry. Squeeze the juice of  1/2  lemon juice into the cooker and mix well. Transfer into a serving bowl.', 'Serve hot garnished with mint sprigs.']

title: VEG PIZZA BURGER- SK Khazana
method: ['To make the dough, take yeast in a small bowl, add sugar and 3 tbsps warm water and set aside to activate.', 'Take refined flour in a large bowl, make a well in the centre and pour activated yeast and  1/2  cup water and mix. Add  1/2  cup water, salt and 1 tbsp olive oil and knead to a soft dough. Cover and set aside to prove for 35-40 minutes.', 'Preheat the oven at 180oC. Grease a baking tray with olive oil.', 'Divide the dough into 8 equal portions and shape each portion into balls and roll each ball into a small disc and cut out small circles of 2 inch diameter using a cookie cutter.', 'Place 4 of the circles on the greased baking tray and apply 1 tsp pizza sauce on each, sprinkle capsicums, sweet corn kernels, onion and mozzarella cheese cubes.', 'Sprinkle salt and crushed black peppercorns, grate processed cheese and place a few black olive slices and fresh basil leaves.', 'Cover the pizza with remaining cut out circles and brush olive oil on top. Sprinkle dried mixed herbs and black sesame seeds.', 'Place the baking tray in the preheated oven and bake for 10-15 minutes. Take the tray out of the oven and arrange the pizza burgers on a serving plate.', 'Serve hot with French fries and tomato ketchup.']

title: Multiflour Chakli
method: ['Mix ragi flour, rice flour and soya flour in a bowl. Add butter and mix with your fingertips till the mixture resembles breadcrumbs.', 'Add sesame seeds, cumin seeds, ginger-green chilli paste, yogurt, salt and mix well. Add sufficient water and knead to a soft dough.', 'Put small portions of the mixture into a chakli mould and press out several chaklis onto a plastic sheet. Heat sufficient oil in a kadai till moderately hot.', 'Gently slide in the chaklis and deep-fry till light golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper and set aside to cool. Store in an airtight container and serve them when required.']

title: Paneer Kofta Curry
method: ['To prepare kofta, heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Take cottage cheese in a bowl, add salt, green cardamom powder and flour and mix well.', 'Dampen palms with some water, divide the cottage cheese mixture into equal portions and shape into balls. Slide in these balls into hot oil and deep-fry till golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Put tomatoes in a pressure cooker. Add cashewnuts, melon seeds, green cardamoms, poppy seeds, ginger, red chilli powder, salt, oil and 1 cup water, mix well and cover. Place the pressure cover on heat and cook under pressure till 2-3 whistles are given out. Open the lid when pressure is completely reduced.', 'Blend the tomato mixture with an electric blender and pass through a sieve into a deep non-stick pan.', 'Keep the pan on heat, add garam masala powder, honey and fresh cream and mix well. Add salt and mix. Take the pan off the heat.', 'Transfer the gravy into a serving bowl and add the koftas. Drizzle some cream and sprinkle garam masala powder. Serve hot.']

title: Dhadpe Pohe - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add mustard seeds and let them splutter. Add asafoetida, green chilli and turmeric powder and saute.', 'Take poha in a large bowl. Add onions, methkut, salt, sugar, lemon juice, coriander leaves, coconut and the prepared tempering. Mix well.', 'Cover and let it rest for 20-25 minutes.', 'Crumble the curd chilli and add to the poha mixture and mix well.', 'Serve.']

title: Quick Aloo ki Sabzi
method: ['Heat oil in a pressure cooker. Add mustard seeds and let it splutter. Add cumin seeds, asafoetida and curry leaves, mix and saute for 30 seconds.', 'Add tomato and salt, mix and cook till tomatoes are done. Add chilli powder, turmeric powder, coriander powder and cumin powder and mix well.', 'Add potatoes and chopped coriander and mix well. Add 1 cup water, mix, cover and cook for 3-4 whistles.', 'Add garam masala powder and mix well.', 'Serve hot garnished with a coriander sprig.']

title: Pindi Chole Samosa
method: ['Divide the dough into equal portions. Dust the worktop with some flour, place the portions on it and roll out into oblong shapes. Cut horizontally into halves.', 'Apply water on the edges of the dough halves and turn to make a cone. Fill with pindi chole, apply water on the edges, bring together and seal to make samosas.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Deep-fry samosas till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Place samosas in individual plates and mash them. Put yogurt and sprinkle some chilli powder and cumin powder on top. Drizzle some sweet chutney on top.', 'Serve hot garnished with coriander leaves.']

title: Dosa
method:
['Wash and soak both the rice for atleast four hours.
Wash and soak the urad dal also for atleast four hours.
Drain and mix.', 'Grind to a fine batter adding water as required.
Transfer the batter in a deep vessel, cover with a tight fitting lid and keep it in a dark and warm place overnight to ferment.', 'Just before making the dosas, add salt to taste and mix lightly. Heat a tawa.
Drizzle a little oil and wipe with a wet cloth so that the tawa is at the right temperature.', 'Drop a ladle full of batter on the tawa and spread it in a circular motion as thin as possible.
Drizzle a little oil all around and let the dosa cook on medium heat.', 'When ready the edges will begin to separate from the tawa.
Gently roll into a cylinder and serve hot with masala, chutney and sambhar.']

title: Anjeer Murg
method: ['Clean, wash and cut chicken into two inch size pieces. Soak figs in one cup of water. Peel, wash and finely chop onions. Peel, wash and grind ginger and garlic to a fine paste.', 'Remove stems, wash and finely chop green chillies. Remove stems, de-seed and break red chillies into three pieces each. Skewer one soaked fig between two chicken pieces onto a toothpick.', 'Heat ghee in a pan, add caraway seeds, whole red chilli pieces, cinnamon and allow them to crackle. Add the chopped onions and fry till golden brown.', 'Add the marinated chicken and figs. Mix lightly and cook on high heat for three minutes. Add half cup of water and saffron. Stir well and cook on high heat for five minutes or till the liquid is thickened and chicken is tender. Stir in the cream. Serve garnished with silver warq.']

title: Eggless Peach Bavarois
method: ['Drain the peaches and put them in a blender jar. Add yogurt and puree. Pour the puree into a bowl.', 'Take carrageenan in a small bowl, add  1/4  cup water and let it stand for a few minutes.', 'Add whipped cream to the peach puree and mix. Add sugar and mix.', 'Stir the carrageenan mixture well and add 4 tsps of it to the peach puree and mix well.', 'Pour into 4 ramekin moulds. Garnish with pistachios and keep the moulds in the refrigerator to set for 2-3 hours.', 'Once set decorate with a few slices of peach and serve chilled.']

title: Carrot, Sweet potato and Lentil Soup
method: ['Roughly chop onion.  Heat a pressure cooker, add onion, cumin seeds, sweet potatoes and carrots and mix.', 'Add 4 cups water, salt, bay leaves and split lentils and mix well.', 'Roughly chop fresh coriander stems and add. Add freshly crushed black peppercorns. Roughly chop tomato and add.  Put the lid on the cooker and cook under pressure on high heat till 3 whistles are given out. Let it stand for 5-10 minutes.', 'Open the lid, remove the bay leaves and cool the mixture slightly. Transfer half the mixture into a mixer jar and puree finely.
