Transfer into a bowl.', 'Put the remaining mixture into the mixer jar. Rinse the cooker with a little water and pour into the mixer jar and puree finely. Pour the puree into the cooker.  Add the puree kept in the bowl. Add sufficient water to adjust consistency.  Add skimmed milk if you wish. Mix well and bring the mixture to a boil.', 'If you wish you can add a little lemon juice and mix. Pour into soup bowl and serve piping hot garnished with a fresh coriander sprig.']

title: Prawn Bhajia-Cook Smart
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Roughly slice onions and put into a bowl. Finely chop green chilli and add to the bowl. Roughly slice spring onions with some greens and add to the bowl. Add prawns, green chilli sauce, salt and ice cubes and mix well.', 'Add refined flour and mix well. Add some 2 tablespoons chilled water and mix.', 'Pick up little mixture with a spoon and put into hot oil and deep fry till crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Transfer onto a serving plate, sprinkle red chilli powder and black sesame seeds and serve immediately.']

title: Korean Chicken Wings- SK Khazana
method: ['Take refined flour, cornflour and salt in a mixing bowl. Break the eggs and add. Add  1/2  cup water and whisk till you get a smooth batter.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Dip each chicken wing in the batter, slide into the hot oil and deep fry till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'To make the sauce, heat oil in a non-stick pan, add garlic and ginger and saute till golden. Add Korean chilli paste, mix and saute for 2 minutes. Grate a little of the orange zest into the pan. Squeeze the juice of  1/2  orange into the pan. Add soy sauce and brown sugar, mix well and add salt. Mix well and cook till the mixture thickens.', 'Add fried chicken wings in the sauce and mix till all the chicken wings are well coated.', 'Transfer them into a serving bowl, sprinkle toasted sesame seeds and garnish with spring onion greens. Serve immediately.']

title: Saunf Aloo
method: ['Heat oil in a pan.', 'Add asafoetida and turmeric powder. Add potatoes and mix. Saute for two to three minutes. Add salt, coriander powder, red chilli powder and crushed fennel seeds.', 'Mix and add yogurt and salt and mix. Cook for two minutes. Add coriander leaves and mix. Serve hot.']

title: Spicy Sprouts Sandwich
method: ['Put mixed sprouts, soya granules, onion, green chilli, pav bhaji masala, cumin powder and salt in a bowl and mix well.', 'Place a portion of the sprout mixture over four bread slices and spread. Cover with the remaining four slices.', 'Heat a sandwich griller, place the sandwich on it and grill for four to five minutes.', 'Serve hot with your choice of sauce.']

title: Kesari Phirni with Nutty Caramel Discs
method: ['Boil milk in a deep non-stick pan.', 'Caramelize castor sugar in another non-stick pan, stirring once a while.', 'Add cardamom powder and saffron to milk. Stir well, cover and let it reduce.', 'Add Milkmaid, stir to mix and let it reduce further.', 'Place the soaked rice in a food processor and grind coarsely. Add ground rice to the reducing milk mixture, stir to mix and cook on low heat for 15-20 minutes.', 'Add chopped nuts and poppy seeds in the caramelized sugar and mix well.', 'Pour the nutty caramel mixture on a silicon sheet and spread evenly. Use a medium cookie cutter and make round impressions on it and set aside till completely set.', 'Put the phirni into individual earthenware (kasore) and refrigerate for 1 hour.', 'Place the nutty caramel discs on top and serve chilled.']

title: Zucchini and Feta Fritters
method: ['Put zucchini in a bowl. Add salt and set aside for five to ten minutes. Squeeze out excess moisture and transfer into another bowl.', 'Add feta cheese, spinach, crushed peppercorns, mixed herbs, eggs, spring onion with greens and garlic and mix well. Add flour and baking powder and mix well.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a pan.', 'Divide the zucchini-cheese mixture into equal portions and deep-fry in hot oil till golden. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Chocolate Cupcakes with Raspberry Frosting
method: ['Preheat oven at 180deg C.', 'Take butter and sugar and beat with a hand blender till light. Add sour cream, egg yolk and vanilla essence and beat well. Add egg and beat again. Add melted chocolate and beat well.', 'Add flour, cocoa powder, baking powder and salt and beat till the mixture is smooth. Transfer the batter in a piping bag.', 'Snip off the end of the piping bag and pipe out the batter into individual cupcake moulds till they  3/4  filled. Keep the moulds on a baking tray, keep the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 20-25 minutes. Remove from oven, let them cool completely.', 'To make the frosting, take whipped cream in another bowl, add raspberry crush and mix well. Fill the frosting in a piping bag.', 'Snip off the end of the piping bag and pipe out the frosting on the cupcakes and serve.']

title: Bizco Flan
ingredients: ['Caramel', '1 cup castor sugar', 'Custard', '4 eggs', ' 1/3  cup castor sugar', '1 3/4  cups milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla essence', 'Cake', '2 eggs', ' 1/4  teaspoon vanilla essence', ' 1/4  cup castor sugar', 'A pinch of salt', ' 1/3  cup refined flour (maida)']
method: ['To make caramel, heat castor sugar in a non-stick pan. Add  1/4  cup water and mix well. Cook till the sugar melts. Once the sugar has melted, continue to cook till the sugar caramelizes and turns golden.', 'Carefully pour the caramel into 8" x 3" round silicon cake mould. Swirl it to spread the caramel evenly. Set aside to cool slightly.', 'Preheat the oven to 180oC.', 'To make custard, break the eggs into a large bowl. Add castor sugar and whisk well. Add milk and whisk till well combined. Add vanilla essence and mix well.', 'To make the cake, break the eggs into another large bowl. Add vanilla essence and beat with an electric beater till frothy.', 'Add castor sugar in batches and continue to beat till the mixture turns light and fluffy.  Add salt and beat well.', 'Sift the refined flour into the eggs mixture and gently fold in till well combined.', 'Strain the custard mixture over the caramel. Pour the cake mixture on top. Place the cake mould on a baking tray. Pour some water in the baking tray and cover with aluminium foil. Bake for 30 minutes. Remove the foil and continue to bake uncovered for 8-10 minutes.', 'Remove the baking tray from the oven and allow to cool down to room temperature. Place it in the refrigerator till chilled completely.', 'De-mould, cut and serve.']
Main ingredients: Castor sugar, Eggs, Milk, Vanilla essence, Refined flour

title: Anda Bhaji Pav
method: ['Heat oil and 1 tablespoon butter in a non-stick pan. Add ginger-garlic paste and saute well.', 'Add onions, mix and saute till translucent. Add tomatoes, mix and cook till tomatoes turn pulpy.', 'Add chilli powder, turmeric powder and coriander powder and mix well. Add little water, mix and cook till the oil separates from the masala.', 'Add green chillies and garam masala powder, mix. Add some more water, mix and cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add salt and mix well. Add chaat masala and eggs, mix and cook for a minute. Add coriander leaves and mix well. Remove from heat and set aside.', 'Heat some butter in a non-stick pan. Place the pavs in it and toast till lightly golden from both sides.', 'Place spoonsful of anda bhaji on each toasted pav, garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot with onion rings and lemon slices.']

title: Chicken Keema Mutter
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds and saute till their colour changes. Add onion, mix well and saute till onion turns golden brown.', 'Add ginger-garlic paste, mix and saute for 1 minute or till the raw smells disappear. Add tomato and salt, mix well, cover and cook till the mixture is pulpy.', 'Add chicken mince, mix well and saute on high heat for 4-5 minutes. Add red chilli powder, turmeric powder, coriander leaves and green peas and mix well. Cover and cook for 3-4 minutes.', 'Add garam masala powder and lemon juice and mix well. Take the pan off the heat.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot with pavs.']

title: Ullipaya Pakodi (Onion Pakoda)
ingredients: ['3 medium onions', 'Oil for deep frying', '1 cup rice flour', '2 green chillies, chopped', ' 1/2  teaspoon red chilli powder', ' 1/4  teaspoon turmeric powder', '1 teaspoon cumin powder', ' 1/2  teaspoon coriander powder', ' 1/2  teaspoon garam masala powder', 'Salt to taste', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh coriander leaves', 'Tomato ketchup for serving']
method: ['Slice onions. Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Take rice flour in a bowl, add green chillies, red chilli powder, turmeric powder, cumin powder, coriander powder, garam masala powder, salt and coriander leaves.', 'Add sliced onions and mix well. Sprinkle 1 cup water and mix well.', 'Drop small portions of the onion mixture into hot oil and deep-fry till golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Transfer the pakodis on a serving plate and serve hot with tomato ketchup.']
Main ingredients: Onions, Oil, Rice flour, Green chillies, Red chilli powder, Turmeric powder, Cumin powder, Coriander powder, Garam masala powder, Fresh coriander leaves

title: Spinach and Pecan Nut Baked Brie
ingredients: ['250 grams readymade puff pastry dough', '1 medium bunch spinach', ' 1/2  cup crushed pecan nuts', '250 grams brie cheese block', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon chopped garlic', '1 medium onion, finely chopped', '2-3 fresh thyme sprigs', 'Crushed black peppercorns to taste', 'Salt to taste', 'Refined flour (maida) for dusting', '1 egg']
method: ['Heat olive oil in a non-stick pan. Add garlic and saute till golden brown. Add onion and saute till translucent.', 'Add pecan nuts, mix and saute for 1 minute. Add thyme leaves and mix. Add crushed peppercorns and mix well.', 'Add torn spinach leaves and salt, mix and cook for 2-3 minutes. Transfer on a plate and slightly cool.', 'Preheat oven to 180deg C.', 'Dust the worktop with some flour and roll out the puff pastry dough into semi-thick square sheet.', 'Place the cheese block in the center of the sheet and put the spinach-pecan nut mixture on top.', 'Break an egg in a bowl and beat well.', 'Brush some beaten egg on the sides of the cheese, bring the edges together and seal.', 'Brush some more beaten egg over the sheet and place on a baking tray.', 'Put the tray into the preheated oven and bake for 25-30 minutes.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Sindhi Fish Curry
method: ['Sprinkle two tablespoons oil, salt, and turmeric powder over the fish darnesand rub well all over the surface. Set aside to marinate for ten to fifteen minutes.', 'Grind together coriander leaves, garlic, green chillies and fenugreek seeds to a smooth paste with little water.', 'Heat two tablespoons oil in a non-stick pan and shallow fry the marinated fish for two to three minutes on each side. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Heat remaining oil in another non-stick pan. Add ground paste and half cup water and mix well. Cook for two minutes.', 'Add coriander powder, salt and tomatoes and cook for two to three minutes.Add one cup water and mix well and let the mixture come to a boil.', 'Arrange the fish on a serving plate and pour the gravy over.', 'Garnish with lemon slices and coriander sprigs. Serve hot with Indian bread or steamed rice.']

title: Boiled Egg Bhurjee
ingredients: ['2 eggs, boiled', '2 eggs', '2 tablespoons oil', '1 tablespoon finely chopped ginger', '2 green chillies, finely chopped', '1 medium onion, finely chopped', '2 small tomatoes, finely chopped', 'Salt to taste', '1 teaspoon coriander powder', '1 teaspoon red chilli powder + for sprinkling', ' 1/4  teaspoon turmeric powder', ' 1/2  teaspoon garam masala powder + for sprinkling', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 tablespoon red chilli sauce + for drizzling', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh coriander leaves', '2 tablespoons green chutney', ' 1/4  cup grated processed cheese', 'Pavs for serving', 'Fresh mint leaves for garnishing']
method: ['Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan, add ginger and green chillies and saute till fragrant.', 'Add onions, mix and saute till translucent. Add tomatoes and mix. Add salt, mix and cook till the tomatoes turn soft and pulpy.', 'Finely chop boiled eggs.', 'Add coriander powder, red chilli powder, turmeric powder, garam masala powder and 1 tablespoon butter to the pan and mix well.', 'Add chopped eggs and mix well. Add red chilli sauce and mix. Add coriander leaves and mix well. Transfer into a bowl.', 'Heat remaining oil in the same pan. Break eggs in it and cook a sunny side up. Transfer the sunny side on top of the prepared bhurji.', 'Mix green chutney, remaining butter and cheese well and put on top of the sunny side egg.', 'Toast pavs till lightly browned on both sides.', 'Sprinkle red chilli powder, garam masala powder and mint leaves on bhurji, drizzle red chilli sauce on top and serve hot with toasted pavs.']

title: Tamatar Pyaaz ka Parantha -SK Khazana
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds and saute till their colour changes. Add green chillies, onion and tomato mix and saute for 2 minutes.', 'Add salt, carom seeds, dried mango powder, red chilli powder, garam masala powder, cumin powder, coriander powder and a pinch of turmeric powder, mix well and saute till the mixture is pulpy.', 'Crush dried fenugreek leaves between your palms, add to the mixture and mix well. Cook for 1 minute and take the pan off the heat.', 'Transfer the mixture into a large bowl and cool.Add whole wheat flour, and ghee, mix well and add sufficient water. Knead into soft dough and rest it for 15-20 minutes.', 'Divide the dough into 4 equal portions and roll them into balls. Flatten each ball slightly and roll out into a roti. Spread a little ghee on each roti and sprinkle a little flour, make pleats starting from one side towards the other. Roll it from one tapering end to the other and flatten it. Roll them into a paranthas.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa, place a one parantha on it. Roast for 1 minute and flip and roast for 1 minute. Apply a little ghee and flip again. Apply a little ghee on the other side too and continue to cook, turning sides, till both sides are evenly cooked. Cook the remaining paranthe similarly.', 'Crush each parantha and place in a serving basket, drizzle a little ghee on top and serve hot with raita and salad.']

title: Simple Palak Dal
method: ['Heat ghee in a deep non-stick pan. Add cumin seeds and asafoetida and saute till fragrant. Add garlic and green chillies and saute for a minute.', 'Add split green gram and mix well. Add salt and some water, mix and bring to boil.', 'Add spinach, mix and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Cheesy Crispy Pita-SK Khazana
method: ['Mix together tomato, capsicum, salt, green chilli and parsley in a bowl.', 'To prepare one sandwich, heat a non-stick tawa and grease it with some butter. Place one pita bread and roast on low heat from one side till golden brown and crisp.', 'Spread the vegetable mixture generously and top with 2 tablespoons cheese, cover with another pita bread and press gently. Flip the sandwich when the underside turns golden brown and crisp. Cook till the other side turns golden brown and crisp too. Transfer the sandwich on the worktop and cut into wedges. Make another sandwich similarly.', 'To prepare the dip, mix together mayonnaise and hung yogurt in a bowl. Add chilli flakes and parsley and mix well.', 'Place the sandwich on a serving platter. Put the dip in a serving bowl and garnish with a parsley sprig and serve hot.']

title: Cheesy Batata Wada-SK Khazana
method: ['Put gram flour, salt, coriander powder, cumin powder,  1/4  teaspoon turmeric powder, chilli powder,  1/4  teaspoon asafoetida, baking soda and 1 cup water in a bowl and whisk to a smooth, lump-free batter.', 'Blend together coriander leaves, ginger, garlic cloves and green chillies with some water to a smooth paste.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan. Add mustard seeds and let them splutter. Add remaining asafoetida, curry leaves, 1 tablespoon ground paste and remaining turmeric powder, mix and cook for a minute. Add potatoes and salt, mix well and cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Divide the potato mixture into equal portions, stuff with a cheese cube and shape into balls.', 'Coat the potato balls with the batter and deep-fry in hot oil till golden brown. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot.']

title: One Pot Creamy Mushroom Chicken
method: ['Put chicken in a bowl, add salt, thyme and crushed peppercorns. Mix well and set aside for ten to fifteen minutes to marinate.', 'Heat olive oil in a non-stick pan, add marinated chicken and cook, turning sides, till both sides are golden. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Add garlic in the same pan and saute for thirty seconds. Add onion and saute till golden.', 'Add mushrooms, mix and saute for two to three minutes. Add chicken stock and stir well.', 'Add cream, mix well and bring to a boil. Add chicken, mix well and cook for two to three minutes.', 'Add cheese and mix well. Adjust the seasoning.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Prawns in Sambal Sauce with Citrusy Sticky Rice
method: ['Place red chillies, birds eye red chillies, half the garlic, half the ginger, tamarind paste, 2 shallots and 1teaspoon fish sauce in a blender jar.', 'Finely chop half the lemongrass stalk and add to the jar. Add  1/2  teaspoon brown sugar and blendinto a smooth paste. Add salt if required.', 'Heat sesame oil and oil in a deep non-stick pan. Finely chop remaining shallots.', 'Add remaining garlic and ginger and saute till light brown. Add chopped shallots and saute for 1-2 minutes or till golden.', 'Slice the remaining lemon grass stalk and add alongwith the prepared paste, mix and saute for 5-10 minutes.', 'Take rice in a bowl. Add  1/2  cup vegetable stock and 3-4 tablespoons orange juice. Cover with cling film and prick it with a knife. Cook in the microwave for 8-10 minutes or till well done.', 'Add  1/2  cup vegetable stock to the cooked sambal mixture and mix well.', 'Slice the onion and tomato. Roughly tear lettuce leaves and place these in a bowl.', 'Deseed avocado and cut into cubes. Put in the bowl.', 'Add remaining stock to the cooked paste mixture and mix well.', 'Add half the lemon juice, salt and Thai sweet chilli paste to the salad and toss well. Chill in the refrigerator.', 'To the cooked paste mixture, add the remaining fish stock, brown sugar and mix well. Add remaining lemon juice and prawns and mix well.', 'Chop celery and add half to the prawns and rest to the salad.', 'Add remaining orange juice, chopped coriander and salt to the rice and mix well. Heat in the microwave for 2 minutes.', 'Put the rice in a mould and transfer onto a serving plate. Place salad on one side. Add the sambal prawns over the rice.Garnish with parlsey sprig andserve hot.']

title: Sandesh
method: ['Bring the milk to a boil in a deep, thick-bottomed non-stick pan. Add the lemon juice and stir till the milk curdles. Strain and immediately refresh the chhenna in chilled water.', 'Put the chhenna in a piece of muslin and squeeze till all the water is drained out.', 'Knead the chhenna well with the heel of your hand. Add caster sugar and cardamom powder, and knead again.', 'Cook in a non-stick pan on medium heat for eight minutes. Remove from heat and divide into twelve equal portions. Roll each portion into a ball and make a dent on the top.', 'When cooled, place a pistachio in the dent and serve.\nMakes 12 sandesh/350 grams']

title: Rosh Bora - SK Khazana
method: ['Take urad dal in a bowl, wash it well and soak in sufficient water for 3-4 hours.', 'Put fennel seeds in a mortar, add black peppercorns and3 green cardamoms and pound them with a pestle into a coarse powder.', 'Transfer the soaked and drained urad dal into a blender jar, add a little salt and a little water and blend to a thick and fine paste.', 'Transfer into a bowl and beat till the colour changes and the mixture becomes light.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Meanwhile, to make sugar syrup, heat a non-stick pan, add sugar and 1 cup water and let it cook. Add remaining green cardamoms and let the sugar melt completely and form a syrup. Switch off the heat.', 'Add some of the coarsely ground spices to the urad dal paste and mix well. Drop in spoonful of the batter into the hot oil and deep-fry till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Add the fried bodasto the sugar syrup,mix gently and let them soak for 15-20 minutes.', 'Drain the bodas and place them on a serving plate. Sprinkle slivered almonds and slivered pistachios over them and serve.']

title: Basic Cupcakes with Cocoa Frosting
method: ['Preheat oven to 180deg C.', 'Take butter in a mixing bowl, add castor sugar and beat with an electric beater till light. Add sour cream and beat. Add egg whites and vanilla essence and beat well.', 'Add flour and baking powder and fold till well combined. Add milk and mix well into a lump free batter. Transfer the batter into a piping bag fitted with a nozzle.', 'Pipe out the batter into individual cupcake moulds, filling them till  3/4  full. Place them on a baking tray, keep the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 8-10 minutes. Remove from oven, cool and demould.', 'To make the frosting, Take butter in another bowl, add powdered sugar and vanilla essence and beat till light. Add milk, shortening and cocoa powder and beat till well combined. Fill the frosting in a piping bag fitted with a star nozzle.', 'Keep the cupcakes on a serving platter, pipe out the frosting on each cupcake and serve.']

title: Malabar Paneer
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Deep-fry cottage cheese cubes till golden brown. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Heat 1 tbsp oil in a non-stick pan, add mustard seeds and let them splutter. Add onions, curry leaves, green chillies and onions, mix and saute till onion turns translucent.', 'Add ginger-garlic paste, mix well and saute for 1-2 minutes or till onion turns a light golden. Add turmeric powder and mix well.', 'Add fried cottage cheese cubes and mix well. Add coconut milk, mix and cook for 1-2 minutes. Add salt and mix well.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot.']

title: BAJRA MOOLI ROTI- SK Khazana
method: ['Take radish in a bowl, sprinkle salt and mix well and set aside for 5-10 minutes.', 'Take a muslin cloth and transfer the radish on it and squeeze out the excess water and put it on a parat.', 'Add dried mango powder, salt, garam masala powder, red chilli powder, onion and coriander leaves, green chillies, bajra atta and whole wheat flour and mix well. Add  3/4  cup water and knead to a soft dough.', 'Divide the dough into equal balls and flatten them lightly. Dust the worktop with bajra atta and roll out each ball into a thin disc.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa, place each roti on it and cook for 1 minute. Flip, apply a little ghee and flip again. Apply a little ghee on the other side too and cook, turning sides, till both sides are evenly done.', 'Transfer the rotis onto a serving platter and serve hot with pickle and white butter.']

title: Coconut Roast Chicken
method: ['Put chicken pieces in a bowl, add ginger-garlic-green chilli paste, lemon juice, red chilli powder, crushed peppercorns, coriander powder, fennel powder, rice flour and salt and mix well. Add coconut and mix well. Keep aside to marinate for  1/2  hour.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add curry leaves and onion and saute on high heat for 1 minute. Add only chicken pieces and saute.', 'Add tomato puree to the remaining marinade in the bowl and mix well.', 'Turn the chicken pieces when the underside becomes golden and saute till the other side too turns golden.', 'Add the tomato puree mixture to the pan and mix well. Cover and cook on medium heat, mixing a couple of times in between, for 15-20 minutes or till the chicken is fully done.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot.']

title: Double Chocolate Tartlets
method: ['Preheat oven to 180o C.', 'Dust the worktop with refined flour, and roll the short crust dough into a half inch thick sheet.', 'Place a cookie cutter on the dough sheet and cutinto roundels. Line the tart moulds with these roundels.', 'Place pieces of baking paper on the tartlets, put any beans and blind bake for ten to twelve minutes.', 'To make the chocolate ganache, heat cream in a non-stick pan till just warm. Put dark chocolate into a bowl and add half the cream. Put white chocolate into another bowl and add the remaining cream. Whisk both dark and white chocolate mixtures well till well blended.', 'Remove the tarts from the moulds, and fill them with white chocolate ganache and let it set for five to ten minutes.', 'Carefully spoon the dark chocolate ganache on top. Set aside again for few minutes till it sets.', 'Garnish with white chocolate chips and serve chilled.']

title: Citrus Marinated Prawns
method: ['Heat sufficient water in a non-stick pan and bring it to a boil. Add prawns and boil for a minute. Strain and transfer them in a shallow bowl.', 'Add orange juice, lemon juice, salt and pepper powder and mix well. Refrigerate to marinate for 20 minutes.', 'Arrange the marinated prawns on a serving platter.', 'To make dressing, take the leftover marinade in a bowl. Add garlic, parsley, olive oil, lemon liqueur and whisk well. Add salt and pepper powder and whisk till well blended.', 'Pour dressing on the prawns and serve immediately.']

title: Rainbow Fruit Parfait
method: ['To make one portion, take yogurt in a bowl. Add Sugar Free Gold and vanilla essence and mix well.', 'Take a tall glass. Add muesli and top with some yogurt sauce, strawberries, yogurt sauce, green grapes, yogurt sauce, black grapes, yogurt sauce, kiwi and remaining yogurt sauce.', 'Sprinkle some muesli and serve immediately.']

title: Turkish Chicken Thighs
method: ['Place chicken thighs in a large bowl. Add lemon juice and mix well.', 'Whisk together yogurt, garlic, ginger, paprika, dried mint powder and salt in another bowl.', 'Pour yogurt mixture over the chicken and coat well. Cover with a cling film and place in a refrigerator for one hour.', 'Preheat oven to 180deg C.', 'Place the marinated chicken on a baking tray, place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for fifteen to twenty minutes.', 'Serve hot garnished with parsley sprigs.']

title: Fresh Figs with Yogurt
method: ['Discard the stems of figs and make two slits on top without cutting through.', 'Take yogurt in a bowl. Add vanilla essence and honey and mix well. Fill this mixture into the slit figs.', 'Place the prepared figs on a serving platter. Garnish with chocolate and fig wedges and serve immediately.']

title: Green Masala Fish Fry
method: ['Grind together coriander leaves, green chillies, garlic cloves, salt and lemon juice with some water to a smooth paste.', 'Take fish darnes in a bowl. Add salt and mix. Add ground paste and mix well. Set aside to marinate for 10-15 minutes.', 'Spread semolina on a plate. Add rice flour and mix well.', 'Coat each marinated fish darn with semolina mixture.', 'Heat some oil in a non-stick pan. Shallow-fry the fish, turning sides, till evenly cooked, golden and crisp on both sides. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot garnished with coriander leaves and halved lemon.']

title: Medu Vada Premix - SK Khazana
method: ['Spread green chillies on a microwave safe plate and microwave on high for 5 minutes. Similarly, spread curry leaves on a microwave safe plate and microwave on high for 2-3 minutes.', 'Take split skinless black gram flour in a large bowl, add black peppercorns, asafoetida, salt, dry coconut pieces, microwaved green chillies and curry leaves. Mix well and transfer into an air-tight container. Use up to 15 days.', 'To make medu vada, take 1 cup premix and add  1/2  cup hot water and mix well. Add  1/8  cup hot water and continue to mix for 2 minutes. Set aside for 5-10 minutes.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Dip your fingers in water, take a portion of the mixture and shape into a ball, gently flatten and make a hole in the center and slide into the hot oil. Deep fry till golden brown and crisp. Drain on an absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot with coconut chutney.']

title: Baked Baby Potato Nachos
method: ['Spread sea salt on a baking tray and place the potatoes on it. Bake in an oven at 200oC for 12-15 minutes. Remove from heat and let the potatoes cool.', 'Cut jalapenos into small pieces.', 'Heat the refried beans in a non-stick pan till just warm.', 'Scoop the baked potatoes to get a cavity in the centre. Place them on a baking tray and sprinkle spice mix on top.', 'Spoon a portion of the warm refried beans, reserving some for plating, into each potato. Top each with a piece of jalapeno, some spring onion greens and grated cheese. Put the tray in the oven and bake at 200oC for 5 minutes or till the cheese melts.', 'Spread the reserved refried beans on a serving plate and place the potatoes on it. Top each potato with the tomato salsa and drizzle sour cream on them. Finish by topping with black and green olive slices and serve immediately with tortilla chips.']

title: Chicken Laksa
method: ['Roughly chop ginger, garlic, shallots, fresh red chillies and put into a mixer jar. Add peanuts and lemongrass and grind with a little water.', 'Heat oil in a non stick wok, add chicken and saute for 2-3 minutes. Put boiled noodles in a serving bowl and heat in a microwave oven.', 'Add the ground paste to the chicken in the pan along with curry powder and mix well. Add chicken stock, salt, red chilli powder and mix. Diagonally slice cucumber.', 'Add coconut milk to the pan and mix well. Let it just come to a boil and pour the chicken gravy over the noodles. Squeeze the juice of  1/2  a lemon and sprinkle on top.', 'Top with cucumber slices and bean sprouts. Garnish with fresh mint leaves and a halved lemon and serve hot.']

title: Aubergine with Tahini, Yogurt & Pomegranate
ingredients: ['2 long brinjals', '2 tablespoons tahini', '4 tablespoons fresh pomegranate pearls + to garnish', '4 tablespoons hung yogurt', '3-4 tablespoons olive oil', 'Salt to taste', ' 1/2  teaspoon cumin powder', ' 1/4  teaspoon red chilli powder', 'Juice of  1/2  lemon']
method: ['Heat olive oil in a non-stick grill pan.', 'Trim the two ends of brinjals and cut into thin long slices. Place the slices in the grill pan and grill, turning sides, till light golden.', 'Put hung yogurt and tahini in a bowl. Add salt, cumin powder, red chilli powder, lemon juice and mix well. Add 4 tablespoons pomegranate pearls and mix.', 'Remove the brinjal pieces from the grill pan, lay them flat on table top, place some of the yogurt mixture at one end and roll.', 'Keep the rolls on a serving plate, sprinkle a few pomegranate pearls and serve immediately.']

title: Chicken and Artichoke Pizza
method: ['Preheat oven to 180deg C. Dust a baking tray with some flour.', 'Dust the worktop with some flour. Place the dough on it and knock back to release excess air. Roll out into a square sheet.', 'Place the sheet on the dusted tray and dork using a knife. Spread pesto sauce all over the surface and top with artichoke, chicken, garlic, green olives and black olives. Sprinkle crushed peppercorns, and salt on top.', 'Place few basil leaves, grate mozzarella cheese and drizzle olive oil on top. Place the baking tray in the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes.', 'Cut into wedges and serve.']

title: Quick Chilli Pickle
method: ['Remove the stems and roughly chop the green chillies.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add asafoetida and ginger-garlic paste and mix. Add green chillies and mix well. Add salt and turmeric powder, mix well and cook till the green chillies soften slightly.', 'Add crushed mustard seeds and mix well. Switch off the heat and add lemon juice and mix well.', 'Transfer into a sterilized glass container. Let it rest for a day before serving.']

title: Orange Cupcake with Red Wine Frosting
method: ['Preheat oven to 180deg C. Place silicon cupcake moulds on a baking tray and line them with slightly smaller paper cupcake cases.', 'Cream together butter and castor sugar in a bowl with an electric beater.', 'Break in an egg and whisk.Break in another egg and add orange zest and whisk well.', 'Sieve together flour and baking powder into the mixture and fold in well. Add orange juice and mix well.', 'Fill a piping bag with this batter and pipe into the lined cupcake moulds upto  3/4  full.', 'Place the baking tray in the preheated oven and bake for 10-12 minutes. Remove from oven and cool.', 'Heat red wine in a non-stick pan. Add castor sugar, mix and cook till it reduces to thick syrup consistency. Remove from heat and cool.', 'Cream together butter and icing sugar in another bowl. Add vanilla essence and mix. Add some reduced red wine and mix well.', 'Fill a piping bag fitted with a star nozzle with the frosting mixture and pipe out rosettes on top of the cupcakes.', 'Serve garnished with fresh blueberries and mint sprigs.']

title: Walnut Baklava
method: ['Preheat oven at 177oC. Grease a 9 X 13 baking tin with some butter.', 'Cut the phyllo sheets so they fit in the tin. Cover with a damp cloth to keep them from drying out.', 'Grind together the walnuts, sugar and cardamom seeds to a coarse mixture. Transfer in a bowl and set aside.', 'Place a phyllo sheet in the tin. Brush with butter. Repeat 7 more times until it is 8 sheets thick, each sheet being brushed with butter. Cut the phyllo sheet in 2"X2" inch square.', 'Add a spoonful of the walnut mixture on it, pick up the four sides of the sheet and attach at one place. Place the tin in the preheated oven and bake for 20 minutes.', 'To make the syrup, heat 300 ml water in a non-stick pan. Add sugar, lemon juice, cinnamon and honey, mix well and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 7 minutes or till slightly thick. Discard the cinnamon and set aside to cool.', 'Drizzle the syrup over the baklava, garnish with crushed walnuts and serve.']

title: Burnt Ginger Rice
method: ['Cook rice in four cups of boiling water until just cooked. Drain well and cool.', 'Heat oil in a wok, add ginger and stir-fry for two to three minutes or until the ginger turns brown in colour.', 'Remove with a slotted spoon and place on an absorbent kitchen towel. Reserve some ginger pieces for garnish and finely chop the remaining.', 'Reheat oil, add fried ginger and onion and stir-fry for two to three minutes.', 'Add rice, light soy sauce, tomato sauce, red chilli paste, MSG and salt. Cook on high heat for a minute, stirring and tossing continuously.', 'Add coriander leaves, vinegar and serve hot, garnished with the reserved fried ginger slices.']

title: Rajma Croquette
method: ['Strain kidney beans and reserve the stock to use for some other dish. Trim the edges of the bread slices and cut the slices into small pieces.', 'Heat 1 tbsp oil in a non-stick pan, add ginger, green chillies, cashewnuts and raisins and saute lightly. Grind together bread and kidney beans to a coarse mixture. Transfer it into a bowl.', 'Add sauteed ingredients, red chilli powder, dried mango powder, chaat masala, cornstarch, salt and a little water and knead into a dough.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Divide the mixture into equal portions and shape each into a cylinder shaped croquette.', 'Coat them with breadcrumbs and deep fry in hot oil till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Sprinkle chaat masala on them and transfer onto a serving plate. Serve hot with tomato ketchup.']

title: Chicken with Bamboo Shoot - SK Khazana
method: ['Pour 2 glasses of water in a deep non-stick pan, keep it on heat, cover and let it come to a boil.', 'When the water boils, add garlic-red chilli mixture. Crush and add the blanched and peeled tomato and mix well. Add chicken and mix. Add salt and mix well. Cover and cook on medium heat for 10 minutes.', 'Add bamboo shoot, slice bhoot jalokia and add 2-3 slices to the chicken mixture. Cover and cook for 5 minutes.', 'Add mustard oil. Cover and cook on medium heat for 2 minutes. Switch off heat.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl. Serve hot garnished with a flower made of remaining part of the bhoot jalokia chilli. Serve hot with steamed rice.']

title: Aloo Gavar Sabzi
method: ['Cut potatoes into medium sized cubes. Put them in a bowl of water and keep aside.', 'Trim both the ends of the cluster beans, break them into 1 inch pieces and put into another bowl.', 'Add cumin powder, red chilli powder, turmeric powder, coriander powder, onions and potatoes.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add mustard seeds and let them splutter. Add cumin seeds and asafoetida. Once the cumin seeds begin to change colour add the vegetable mixture and mix well.', 'Add salt and jaggery and saute for a minute. Add  1/2  cup water and mix well. Cover and cook for 8-10 minutes or till the potatoes are soft.', 'Add 2 tbsps coconut and mix.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl. Garnish with remaining coconut and serve hot.']

title: Moroccan Chicken
method: ['Clean cut the chicken and all vegetables.', 'Heat olive oil in a pan. Add a little butter. Add onions, ginger and garlic and saute for two minutes. Add chicken and saute on high heat for two to three minutes.', 'Add carrots and mix. Add coriander powder, cumin powder, red chilli powder, salt and grated lemon rind and mix. Add one cup of water, cover and cook for three to four minutes. Add apricots and mix.', 'Cover and continue to cook for a minute. Add zucchini, red capsicum and mix. Cover and cook. When the chicken is almost done add tomatoes, saffron and mix.', 'Cover and cook till done. Add boiled chickpeas and mix. Cover and cook for two to three minutes. Adjust salt and stir.', 'Serve hot with couscous or with rice.']

title: Masala Rawa Puri
Main ingredients: Fine semolina, Ginger-green chilli paste, Red chilli powder, Oil

title: Chocolate Banana Ice Cream
method: ['Blend bananas in a food processor until they reach the consistency of soft serve ice cream.', 'Add cocoa powder, cream, vanilla essence and honey and mix well. Transfer into an air tight container and freeze until solid.', 'Serve.']

title: Leftover Roti Rice Rolls
method: ['Heat 1 tbsp oil in a non-stick pan. Add cumin seeds and saute till fragrant. Add cauliflower florets, mix well and cook till done.', 'Add green peas, potato, chilli powder, garam masala powder and salt, mix well and cook for a minute.', 'Add green chutney, red chilli sauce and rice and mix well. Add lemon juice and capsicum, mix and cook for a minute. Remove from heat and set aside.', 'Place rotis on the worktop. Place a portion of the prepared rice mixture in the centre and roll tightly.', 'Heat a non-stick pan. Place the prepared rotis on it, drizzle some oil on top and roast till golden from both sides.', 'Cut the roasted rolls and place them on a serving plate. Serve hot garnished with bell pepper curls, carrot strips and micro greens.']

title: Spinach Lasagna
method: ['Preheat oven to 180o C. Spread 2 lasagna sheets in a glass baking dish.', 'Place spinach on the worktop. Keep the garlic cloves over it and chop finely. Transfer into a bowl, add rice and salt and mix well. Add olive oil and mix well.', 'Spread 2 tablespoons chilli sauce and some spinach mixture on the lasagna sheets in the baking dish. Top with 2 tablespoons grated processed cheese.', 'Place 2 lasagna sheets on top, spread 2 tablespoons chilli sauce, 1 tablespoons processed cheese. Place 2 more lasagna sheets over the cheese and spread 2 tablespoons chilli sauce over them,', 'Slice mozzarella cheese thinly and place half of them over the sauce. Spread remaining spinach mixture over the cheese.', 'Place remaining lasagna sheets and top with remaining chilli sauce, remaining grated processed cheese, remaining mozzarella cheese slices and basil leaves.', 'Place the dish in the preheated oven and bake for  1/2  hour.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Red Kidney Bean and Coriander Burgers
method: ['Put kidney beans, lemon zest, lemon juice, cumin powder, coriander powder, coriander leaves, cornflour and salt in a blender jar and blend well into a smooth mixture.', 'Add half cup breadcrumbs and chopped onions and mix well.', 'Divide the mixture into four equal portions and shape them into patties. Coat the patties in the remaining breadcrumbs, press lightly and refrigerate for ten minutes.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, place the patties in it and shallow-fry, turning sides, till evenly done on both the sides.', 'Slice the burger buns horizontally. Place the prepared pattie on the lower half of the bun. Arrange tomato slices, onion rings on top and cover with remaining half of the bun.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Tandoori Pomfret
method: ['Make incisions on it and apply salt and lemon juice. Keep aside for twenty minutes.', 'Mix rest of the ingredients except butter. Apply this marinade to the fish and let it stand for about one hour in the refrigerator.', 'If using an oven, preheat it to 180oC. Put the fish on a skewer and cook it in moderate hot tandoor or the preheated oven (180oC) for about eight to ten minutes. Baste with butter and cook for another three minutes.', 'Serve hot with lemon wedges.']

title: Peppermint Chocolate
method: ['Melt chocolate in the microwave for thirty seconds. Remove from oven and whisk till smooth.', 'Heat milk in a deep non-stick pan, add sugar, stir and heat till the sugar melts.', 'Add melted chocolate and mix well. Simmer further three to four minutes.', 'Coarsely crush peppermint candies, reserving some for garnishing, and add to the chocolate milk. Mix well and bring to a boil. Switch off the heat, cool down the milk to room temperature and refrigerate for one hour.', 'Pour the drink into four individual tall glasses, drizzle little fresh cream and garnish with the chocolate shavings and reserved crushed candies.', 'Serve chilled.']

title: Brown Bread Ice Cream
method: ['Trim off the edges of bread slices and cut into small cubes.', 'Heat butter in a small deep non-stick pan. Add bread cubes, mix and cook for 1 minute. Add  1/2  cup castor sugar, mix and cook till sugar melts.', 'Add salt and cinnamon powder, mix and cook for 1 minute. Transfer onto a baking tray.', 'Place the baking tray in the preheated oven and bake for 10-15 minutes.', 'Heat milk in another small deep non-stick pan. Add cream, mix and bring the mixture to boil.', 'Take yolks in a bowl. Add vanilla essence, brown sugar and remaining castor sugar and whisk well.', 'Add  1/2  the milk-cream mixture and whisk well. Transfer the mixture into the remaining milk-cream mixture pan and turn on the heat. Whisk and cook till it thickens.', 'Take cream cheese in a bowl and mix to get a smooth texture. Strain into the prepared milk-cream mixture, mix well and cooldown to room temperature.', 'Blend the milk-cream mixture till smooth. Pour into an air-tight container, put baked bread cubes on top and cover. Freeze till set.', 'Serve.']

title: Vegetable Peanut Curry
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add garlic and ginger and saute till golden.', 'Add crushed peanuts, coconut and peanut butter, mix well and saute on low heat for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add coconut milk, 1 1/2  cups water and stir to mix. Add curry powder, salt and pepper powder, stir to mix and simmer for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add carrot, beans, green peas and cauliflower, mix well and bring to a boil.', 'Serve hot garnished with coconut.']

title: Raw Mango Rice-Cook Smart
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick wok.', 'Finely chop green chillies.', 'Add mustard seeds to the hot oil and let them splutter. Add Bengal gram and black gram and saute they turn a light brown.', 'Take the rice in a large pan. Finely chop the coriander sprigs.', 'Once the grams brown add turmeric powder and mix. Add curry leaves and green chillies and mix and saute till the leaves crackle.', 'Add raw mango and mix and saute for a couple of minutes. Add salt and sugar and mix. Add coriander leaves and mix.', 'Add this mixture to the rice and mix gently.', 'Garnish with mango slices and serve at room temperature.']

title: Karwari Prawns Sukka
method: ['Heat oil to deep fry.', 'Break the egg in a bowl. Add cornflour, chilli paste and salt mix well. Add prawns and mix well.', 'Deep fry in hot oil till golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper and keep aside.', 'Grind tomatoes, onions, half the curry leaves, black pepper powder and red chilli powder to a fine paste. Add water if required.', 'Heat one tablespoon oil in a pan. Add remaining curry leaves and ground masala and saute for two to three minutes till the masala is cooked and the oil separates.', 'Add the fried prawns and toss.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl. Serve hot.']

title: Prawn Bhaja with Basil Mint Pesto
method: ['Put prawns in a bowl, add gram flour, 2 tablespoons rice flour, semolina, salt, turmeric powder, chilli powder, ginger-garlic-green chilli paste and mustard powder and mix well. Add lemon juice and some water and mix well. Divide the mixture into equal portions.', 'Take remaining rice flour, remaining semolina, salt and crushed peppercorns on a plate and mix well.', 'To prepare basil mint pesto, grind together torn basil leaves, torn mint leaves, coriander leaves, garlic cloves, salt, crushed peppercorns and olive oil to a paste. Add walnuts and some water and grind again to a fine paste. Transfer into a bowl and set aside.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a non-stick pan.', 'Take each portion of prawn mixture, coat with rice flour-semolina mixture and shallow-fry in hot oil till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot with basil mint pesto.']

title: Soft Centered White Chocolate
method: ['Roughly chop strawberries.', 'Heat a non-stick pan, add strawberries, castor sugar and lemon juice and cook till pulpy.', 'Melt half the white chocolate in a deep bowl in a microwave for a minute. Whisk till smooth and cool down to room temperature.', 'Pour the melted chocolate into moulds, covering the sides evenly. Turn the moulds upside down over a bowl and scrape off the excess chocolate. Keep aside till set.', 'Strain the strawberry mixture and keep in the refrigerator till chilled.', 'Pour the strawberry sauce into piping bags and pipe into the prepared chocolate shells. Do not fill them completely.', 'Melt remaining chocolate on a double boiler. Remove from the heat and whisk well and cool down to room temperature.', 'Pour the melted chocolate on top of the filled shells and scrape off excess chocolate with a scraper.', 'Refrigerate the moulds for 5-10 minutes or till the chocolate set.', 'Remove the chocolates from the moulds and serve.']

title: Kiri Bath
method: ['Boil rice in three cups water in a deep non-stick pan and cook till rice is done.', 'Add coconut milk and salt and stir continuously till the mixture thickens.', 'Grease an aluminum tray with oil, put the mixture into it and spread it evenly. Cool down to room temperature.', 'Cut into squares, arrange on a serving plate and serve immediately.']

title: Prawn in Coconut Shell
method: ['Scoop out the tender flesh from the coconut and reserve the shell.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan.', 'Slice onion.', 'Add mustard seeds, curry leaves, peppercorns and sliced onion to the pan and saute.', 'Take prawns in a bowl. Add chilli sauce, mix well and set aside for 15 minutes.', 'Roughly chop dried red chillies and add to the pan, saute further.', 'Slice fresh turmeric and place in a grinder jar alongwith broken green chilli, coconut flesh, garlic cloves and roughly chopped ginger. Add very little water and grind into a coarse paste.', 'Add prawns in the pan alongwith ground paste, salt and mix well. Add coconut milk and mix well.', 'Transfer the prawn mixture into the reserved coconut shell, cover with the lid and seal with the wheat flour dough.', 'Heat sufficient water in a deep non-stick pan. Place the coconut shell in it and steam for 15-20 minutes.', 'Remove the seal and serve hot.']

title: Butter Chicken Biryani - SK Khazana
method: ['Take chicken pieces in a bowl, add salt, 1 1/2  tsps red chilli powder, turmeric powder,  1/2  tsp garam masala, ginger-garlic paste,  1/2  tsp ghee, 1 tsp lemon juice and hung yogurt and mix well. Add mustard oil and mix well and set aside to marinate for 30 minutes.', 'Heat butter and oil in a deep non-stick pan, add mace blades and onion puree, mix and saute till golden brown.', 'Add salt, remaining red chilli powder and 2 tbsps water, mix well. Add tomato puree and saute for 1-2 minutes. Cover and cook for 7-10 minutes or till oil separates.', 'Boil sufficient water in another deep non-stick pan, add 2 tsps salt and 1 tsp lemon juice. Open green cardamom pods and add. Add black cardamom, cloves, cinnamon stick, black peppercorns and  1/2  tsp ghee and mix well. Let the water boil for 3-4 minutes.', 'Add rice, mix and cook for 3-5 minutes on high heat or till the rice is  3/4  cooked.', 'Add the marinated chicken to the onion-tomato mixture and saute for 1 minute.\nDrain the rice.', 'Add  1/2  cup water to the chicken and mix well. Add kasuri methi powder, cover and cook for 7-10 minutes or till the chicken is almost cooked. Reduce the heat to low and add fresh cream.', 'Sprinkle  1/4  cup fried onions and 1 tbsp coriander leaves over the chicken. Tear 8-10 mint leaves and sprinkle. Sprinkle a pinch of nutmeg powder and a pinch of green cardamom powder.', 'Add rice and spread it evenly, sprinkle salt and remaining garam masala over the rice. Sprinkle  1/4  cup fried onions, remaining coriander leaves and remaining torn mint leaves.', 'Sprinkle remaining green cardamom powder, remaining nutmeg powder and remaining lemon juice. Drizzle soaked saffron milk.', 'Keep a small stainless steel bowl in the centre of the rice, place a piece of burning charcoal in it, drizzle a little oil over it, cover and let the smoke infuse for 1 minute. Remove the bowl, cover the pan and cook on low heat for 10-15 minutes.', 'Transfer the biryani onto a serving plate, garnish with fried onions and coriander leaves and serve hot with raita.']

title: Cheese And Coriander Parantha
method:
['Place whole-wheat flour and salt in a bowl.
Add coriander leaves and knead into a soft dough using milk.', 'Cover and rest the dough for twenty to twenty five minutes. Divide the dough into eight equal portions.', 'Shape them into balls.
Mix cheese with ginger, green chillies and chaat masala.', 'Divide into eight equal portions.
Roll out each ball into a medium sized chapati.', 'Spread a portion of the cheese mixture.
Fold up like an envelope and roll out into square paranthas.', 'Heat a tawa, place the parantha on it and shallow fry, drizzling a little oil or ghee, till both sides are lightly golden brown and crisp.
Cut into four and serve immediately.']

title: Mushroom Upma
method: ['Dry-roast the semolina in a non-stick pan till light golden. Transfer on a plate and set aside to cool.', 'Heat oil in a deep non-stick pan. Add mustard seeds and let them splutter.', 'Add cumin seeds, curry leaves, green chillies and asafoetida, mix and saute for 30 seconds.', 'Add onions, mix and saute till they turn translucent. Add tomatoes and mix.', 'Add little salt, mix well and cook till they turn pulpy.', 'Add shimeji and button mushrooms, mix and cook till dry. Add the roasted semolina and mix well.', 'Add 2 cups hot water and salt, stir well, cover and cook for 10-15 minutes.', 'Add green peas and 1 tablespoon coriander leaves and mix well. Cover and cook for 3-4 minutes.', 'Garnish with remaining coriander leaves and serve hot with lemon quarters.']

title: Kesari Indrayani
method: ['Bring the milk to a boil in a non-stick pan; lower the heat and simmer till the milk reduces to half its original volume.', 'Add the cream, sugar and saffron, and cook till the sugar dissolves.', 'Squeeze the rosogulla to remove excess syrup and place them in a bowl. Pour the milk-cream mixture over and set aside to cool. When completely cold, place in a refrigerator to chill.', 'To serve, place a few chilled rosogulla in each bowl. Sprinkle the pomegranate kernels, grated khoya, pistachios and almonds on top and serve at once.']

title: Cucumber Pachdi
method: ['Wash and scrub cucumbers thoroughly and then grate with the skin. Pour yogurt into a clean muslin cloth and hang it for half an hour, preferably in a cool place.', 'Grind together coconut, green chillies and ginger to a fine paste. Mix together the cucumber, coconut masala and yogurt. Add salt to taste.', 'Heat oil in a small pan, add mustard seeds. When they start to splutter, add curry leaves, red chillies and stir for a moment. Pour it on to the yogurt mixture. Stir it thoroughly.', 'Serve chilled.']

title: Cashewnut Butter Toast
method: ['Roast cashewnuts in an air fryer at 120o C for 5-7 minutes or till lightly browned. Transfer into a bowl and cool down to room temperature.', 'Toast 4 bread slices in the air fryer at 180o C for 4-5 minutes. Repeat with the remaining 4 slices.', 'To make cashewnut butter, put cashewnuts in a grinder jar, add 2 tbsps water, vanilla essence and honey and grind to a smooth paste. Transfer into a bowl.', 'Take the bread slices out of the air fryer, spread this cashewnut butter on them and halve them. Arrange the slices on a serving platter and serve immediately.']

title: Karuppu Ulundu Chutney
Main ingredients: Split black gram with skin, Dried red chillies, Fresh coconut, Ginger, Curry leaves

title: Peppered Prawns in Coconut Milk
method: ['Heat coconut oil in a non-stick kadai and add cumin seeds. As they begin to change colour, add curry leaves and onions and saute till the onions turn brown.', 'Add garlic, ginger, turmeric powder, chilli powder and salt and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add prawns and saute for 3-4 minutes. Add coconut milk, mix well, and simmer for 2 more minutes.', 'Sprinkle crushed peppercorns and mix gently.', 'Serve hot garnished with the coriander leaves.']

title: Pound Cake - SK Khazana
method: ['Preheat oven to 180degC. Grease a loaf tin with some butter and dust with some flour.', 'Take butter in a mixing bowl and whisk with an electric beater till light. Add castor sugar gradually and whisk till fluffy.', 'Break in eggs, one at a time, and whisk. Add vanilla essence and whisk again.', 'Sieve together flour and baking powder into the bowl and fold in with a spatula. Add milk and mix well.', 'Pour the batter into the greased tin and tap gently on the worktop. Keep the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 45-50 minutes. Remove from oven, cool and demould.', 'Slice and serve.']

title: Chicken Burnt Garlic Noodles
method: ['Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan; add chopped garlic and saute till golden. Add chicken, mix and cook for a minute.', 'Add noodles, bell peppers, soy sauce, chilli flakes, salt and pepper powder and mix.', 'Add spring onion with greens, mix and cook for a minute. Transfer onto a serving plate.', 'Heat remaining oil in another non-stick pan. Slice garlic, add to pan and fry till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Top the noodles with fried garlic and serve hot.']

title: Tofu
method: ['Drain the excess water and transfer the soya beans into a large bowl, add sufficient warm water And set aside for 30 minutes. Rub them between your palms to remove the skin. Add 1 1/2  cups water, the skin should be floating on top. Discard the skins and water.', 'Transfer into a blender jar and add 500 ml water, blend till smooth. Add 500 ml water and blend again till well combined.', 'Line a strainer with 2-3 layers of muslin cloth and keep it over a large bowl. . Pour the soya bean mixture into this.', 'Transfer this milk into a deep pan and place it on heat. Let it come to a boil, reduce the heat and let it simmer for 2 minutes.', 'Mix lemon juice and 2 tbsps water in a bowl, add this mixture to the soya milk, stirring continuously. Cover and cook for 2 minutes. .', 'Line another strainer with a muslin cloth, pour the curdled soya milk into it. Once most of the water has drained, gather the edges of the muslin cloth together and squeeze to remove the excess water.', 'Place the strainer over another bowl, and keep the muslin cloth with the curdled soya milk into the strainer. Place a heavy object on top and set aside for 1 hour or till it becomes firm. Refrigerate till set.', 'Cut and serve as required.']

title: Mushroom Quinoa Rissotto
method: ['Finely chop onion.', 'Heat olive oil and butter in a deep non-stick pan. When the butter melts, add onion and saute till translucent. Add garlic and saute further for  1/2  minute. Add white wine and mix well. Add button mushrooms and quinoa and mix well.', 'Add brown rice and 2 cups vegetable stock and mix well. Cook for 5-7 minutes or till most of the moisture has been absorbed. Add 2 cups vegetable stock, salt, crushed peppercorns and cook till the rice is almost done.', 'Add the remaining vegetable stock and cheese and mix well. Add fresh cream and mix well. Cover and cook till the rice and quinoa are completely soft.', 'Transfer into a serving platter, sprinkle some crushed peppercorns, garnish with micro greens and serve immediately.']

title: Urban BBQ
method: ['To prepare marinade, combine red garlic chutney and hung yogurt in a bowl and whisk well. Add mustard oil and whisk again.', 'Divide the mixture equally into 3 different bowls. Add prawns, chicken and cottage cheese alongwith bell pepper cubes in individual bowls and mix well.', 'Place a wooden chopping board on the worktop. Place a mud pot with 2 holes on opposite sides. Put in some sand filling  1/4 th and cover it with an aluminium foil. Fill the pot with coal till the level of holes. Put some oil on top and burn the coal.', 'Skewer one marinated bell pepper cube and cottage cheese in a metal skewer and repeat till ingredients are used. Similarly, twist and skewer marinated chicken and prawns.', 'Place skewered cottage cheese, chicken and prawns over hot coal and barbecue from all sides till golden specks appear. Baste with butter and barbecue for a minute.', 'Serve hot alongwith lemon wedge and onion rings.']

title: Oats Uttappam
method: ['Place sprouts in a bowl. Add onion, green chillies, salt and mix well.', 'Place oats in another bowl, add salt, dosa batter and mix well. Add mint chutney and mix well. Add a little water to adjust consistency.', 'Heat a non sticktawa and grease it lightly with a little olive oil. Pour a ladle full of batter and spread it thickly.', 'Sprinkle a little black sesame seeds, a little of the onion mixture and tomatoes and let the uttappa cook.', 'Shred iceberg lettuce leaves and keep in a bowl. Add 1 tsp olive oil, lemon juice and salt and mix well.', 'Drizzle a little olive oil around the uttappam. Flip it over when the underside is a light golden and drizzle some more oil all around and cook till the other side is slightly crisp.', 'Place the uttappamon a serving plate, place some lettuce leaves on top, sprinklea little black sesame seeds and serve hot.']

title: Kale Chips
method: ['Preheat oven to 180deg C.', 'Put olive oil and vinegar in a bowl and mix well. Add kale leaves and mix well.', 'Place the kale leaves on a baking tray, place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for fifteen minutes or till golden and crisp, flipping occasionally.', 'Remove from oven and sprinkle cheese on the chips. Serve immediately.']

title: Mini Calzones with Fresh Tomato Sauce
method: ['Dissolve yeast and 2 tsps sugar in  1/2  cup lukewarm water.', 'Combine 1 tsp salt and refined flour in a dough maker. Add dissolved yeast mixture and knead into a soft dough using 7 tbsps olive oil and sufficient water. Remove the dough from the maker and set aside for 15-20 minutes.', 'Dust the dough with little flour and spread with your fingers. Roll out into a large thin disc dusting with flour.', 'Dust a medium size cookie cutter with flour and cut out 12 discs from the rolled out dough disc.', 'Apple little water on edges of one cut out disc. Place 1 tbsp caramelized onions in the centre and top with 1 tsp grated cheese, pinch pepper powder and little fresh thyme. Bring the other half over, press the edges and seal to make a crescent shape.', 'Press the edge with a fork to make a design. Prepare the remaining calzones in a similar way.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Deep-fry calzones till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Place tomatoes, garlic cloves, salt, crushed peppercorns, remaining sugar, remaining olive oil and torn 5-6 basil leaves in a blender jar. Blend well into a chunky sauce.', 'Spread sauce on a serving plate. Put calzones on top, garnish with fresh basil leaves and serve hot.']

title: Khatta Meetha Kaddu
method: ['Peel the pumpkin and cut into pieces.', 'Heat oil in a kadai. Add fenugreek seeds, asafoetida, green chillies, pumpkin pieces and mix. Add salt, turmeric powder, coriander powder, ginger, red chilli powder and mix.', 'Add a little water, cover and cook on medium heat for ten to fifteen minutes. Add sugar, lemon juice, coriander leaves.', 'Cover and cook further on medium heat for ten minutes. The pumpkin pieces should get mashed. Serve hot.']

title: Bang Bang Chicken
method: ['Heat sufficient water in a deep non-stick pan. Crush the ginger and add. Bring to a boil.', 'Add knotted spring onion with greens and salt and boil. Add chicken, mix well and boil for 10 minutes.', 'Drain the chicken. Place the chicken on the worktop and cool down to room temperature. Debone the chicken, add  1/2  tablespoon sesame oil to chicken pieces, rub well and place them in a zip lock bag. Bang with a rolling pin.', 'Transfer chicken pieces into a bowl. Add spring onion bulbs, paprika, salt, soy sauce, remaining sesame oil, castor sugar and sesame seeds and mix well. Add peanut butter and a little stock in which the chicken was cooked and mix well.', 'Arrange lettuce cups in a serving tray, place some chicken on each cup and serve.']

title: Gujiya Curry
method: ['To make the covering, mix maida, salt, ghee, carom seeds and sufficient water and knead into a stiff dough. Cover with a damp muslin cloth and set aside.', 'Heat 2 tbsps oil in a non stick pan. Add asafoetida, cumin seeds, coriander seeds, green chillies and saute for half a minute. Add ginger, black peppercorns and onion and saute till light golden.', 'Add red chilli powder, turmeric powder, coriander powder, amchur, green peas, potatoes and saute. Add salt and mix well.', 'Transfer half of the mixture into a bowl and set aside. Add 2 cups water to the remaining mixture and simmer.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.Divide the dough into equal portions and roll into balls. Roll out each ball into a puri.', 'Place a portion of the filling on one side of each puri. Fold the puri, seal the edges and shape into gujiya. Add the remaining stuffing to the mixture simmering in the pan.', 'Add coriander leaves and mix well. Deep fry the gujiyas till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Halve the gujiyas and transfer onto a serving plate. Pour the gravy over the gujiyas and serve hot.']

title: Eggs Kejriwal
method: ['Heat a non-stick tawa. For each portion, apply butter on one side of a slice of bread and place it on the tawa, apply butter on the other side too. Sprinkle onion, green chillies and coriander leaves over the slice and place a cheese slice on top. Cover and cook till cheese melts. Take it off the tawa and keep it on a serving plate.', 'Place a medium sized cookie cutter on the same tawa, drizzle a little oil and break an egg into it, sprinkle salt, black pepper powder and green chillies and let the underside cook completely.', 'Remove the cookie cutter and place the egg over the cheese on the bread. Serve hot with tomato ketchup.']

title: Rawa Dosa - SK Khazana
method: ['Mix together semolina, rice flour, refined flour, cashewnuts, salt, crushed black pepper, ginger, green chillies and coriander leaves in a mixing bowl. Add 3 cups water and whisk well to make a thin batter. Set aside for 15 minutes.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa and pour the prepared batter on it in a thin layer, drizzle ghee all around and cook till the underside turns golden and crisp.', 'Fold the dosa and keep on a serving plate. Make more dosas with the remaining batter.', 'Serve hot with a bowl of coconut chutney and a bowl of sambhar.']

title: Kharvas
method: ['Take colostrums and milk in a bowl. Add green cardamom powder, nutmeg powder, saffron and sugar and mix well.', 'Heat sufficient water in a steamer. Pour the mixture into a silicon container and cover with the lid. Place it in the steamer and steam at high heat for about ten to fifteen minutes.', 'Reduce heat and steam for ten minutes or till it sets. Let it cool to room temperature and then chill in the refrigerator. Serve chilled.']

title: Vankaya Perugesi
method: ['Slit brinjals into four keeping them joined at the stem. Add salt and set aside.', 'Heat oil in a non stick pan, add onions, curry leaves, garlic paste and ginger paste and saute till fragrant.', 'Add red chilli powder and salt and mix well.', 'Whisk yogurt and gram flour in a bowl till smooth.', 'Add turmeric powder and whisk again.', 'Wash the brinjals and add to the pan with a little water and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add yogurt mixture and mix well.', 'Cover and cook on low heat for 3-4 minutes or till the brinjals are well done. Serve hot.']

title: Tiramisu Truffle
method: ['Take white chocolate in a microwave proof bowl and melt in microwave for 30 seconds. Remove from microwave, add cream cheese and mix well.', 'Add coffee decoction and mix. Refrigerate for 6-8 hours.', 'Take dark chocolate in a microwave proof bowl and heat in microwave for 30-40 seconds. Remove from microwave, mix and cool down to room temperature.', 'Divide the white chocolate-cream cheese mixture and shape them into balls.', 'Line a tray with a parchment paper.', 'Dip the balls in melted dark chocolate and place them on the lined tray. Dust some cocoa powder on top and refrigerate for 5-10 minutes.', 'Serve.']

title: Sweet Potato Tots
method: ['Mix together sweet potato, egg,  1/4  cup flour, salt, paprika and garlic powder in a bowl and knead into a dough.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Take the remaining flour in another bowl and add some water to make slurry.', 'Divide the sweet potato mixture into 16 equal balls. Dip them in the slurry and coat with breadcrumbs.', 'Deep fry the balls in hot oil till golden brown and crisp. Drain on an absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Coconut Tango
method: ['Heat a non-stick pan, pour reduced milk into and stir continuously till the milk thickens further.', 'Add sugar and mix well. Add half the khoya, mix well and cook on medium heat for ten minutes, stirring continuously.', 'Add tender coconut flesh and mix well. Add remaining khoya and stir till it melts. Lower heat, add coconut milk and mix well.', 'Switch off the heat and cool down to room temperature. Refrigerate for two hours.', 'Add pistachios to the chilled coconut mixture and mix well.', 'Garnish with pistachios and serve chilled in tender coconut shell.']

title: Simple Chicken Curry-SK Khazana
method: ['Put chicken pieces in a bowl. Add yogurt, 1 teaspoon chilli powder, salt,  1/4  teaspoon turmeric powder and ginger-garlic paste and mix. Add lemon juice, mix well and set aside to marinate for 30 minutes.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick deep pan. Add peppercorns, bay leaf, cardamoms, cloves and onions, mix and saute till onions turn brown.', 'Add tomato and salt, mix well, cover and cook till tomato turns soft and pulpy.', 'Add remaining chilli powder, salt, remaining turmeric powder, coriander powder and cumin powder and mix well.', 'Add marinated chicken, mix and cook on high heat for 3-4 minutes.', 'Add coriander leaves and 2 1/2  cups water, stir, cover and cook till the chicken is fully done.', 'Add garam masala powder, mix well and let it get heated through.', 'Garnish with coriander sprig and serve hot.']

title: Baingan Bharta Toast
method: ['Preheat oven at 180oC.', 'Cut edges of bread slices and cut into triangles.', 'Brush some oil over bread triangles and put them onto a baking tray. Place the baking tray in preheated oven and bake for 5-7 minutes.', 'Fill tomato ketchup in a piping bag.', 'Spread some baingan bharta evenly over toasted breads. Pipe out some tomato ketchup over the bharta and top with some mozzarella cheese.', 'Place the baking tray in the preheated oven and bake for 5-7 minutes or till cheese melts.', 'Serve hot garnished with coriander sprigs.']

title: Mewewali Meethi Kachori
method: ['Sieve maida into a bowl.', 'Add semolina and three tablespoons of ghee and knead into a semi soft dough using water as required.', 'Keep covered with a damp cloth. Coarsely grind almonds, pistachios, walnuts and cashewnuts. Mix coconut, mixed nuts, green cardamom powder, poppy seeds, sugar and mix well.', 'Divide into marble sized balls. Divide the dough into even sized balls slightly bigger than the stuffing balls. Spread each dough ball in the palm of your hand, place stuffing ball in the centre and gather the edges and seal. Further shape them into round', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai and deep fry the kachoris on low heat till golden brown. Drain and place them on an absorbent paper.', 'Store in an airtight tin when completely cooled.']

title: Green Chilli Chicken
method: ['Take chicken pieces in a bowl, add ginger-garlic-coriander leaves-green chilli paste, mix and set aside to marinate for 2-3 hours.', 'Heat oil in a deep non-stick pan, add cumin seeds, and once they change color, add light green chillies, dark green chillies and salt, mix, cover and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add the marinated chicken and mix well. Add turmeric powder and a little salt, mix well and cook on high heats for 5 minutes. Reduce heat, cover and cook for 20-25 minutes or till fully done.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot.']

title: Aloo Bajra Puri
method: ['Mix together potatoes, salt, peanut powder, coriander leaves and ginger-green chilli paste in a bowl.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Add millet flour to the potato mixture and knead well to a semi soft dough.', 'Divide the dough into 8 equal portions, shape into balls and roll out into thick puris.', 'Slide the puris, one at a time, into hot oil and deep-fry till puffed. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Smoked Five Spice Fish with Tamarind Sauce
method: ['Place a piece of coal on heat.', 'Take fish fillets on a plate. Add 2 teaspoons chopped garlic, salt, crushed peppercorns, five spice powder, lemon juice and  1/2  inch grated ginger. Mix well.', 'Make a space in the center of the fish pieces and place aluminum foil in it. Place the hot piece of coal on the aluminum foil, drizzle some oil on it, cover immediately and keep for 2-3 minutes.', 'Remove the cover and remove the coal. Place fish pieces into separate foils and seal into parcels.', 'Heat sufficient water in a non-stick pan. Put the parcels in it, cover and steam for 5-7 minutes.', 'To make tamarind sauce, heat 1 teaspoon oil in a non-stick pan. Add cumin seeds, cinnamon, star anise and saute.', 'Add remaining chopped garlic and remaining grated ginger and saute well. Add tomato ketchup and mix well. Add Worcestershire sauce, salt, crushed peppercorns and brown sugar. Mix well.', 'Add little water, stir to mix and cook. Add coconut milk and stir to mix. Add tamarind paste, mix well and cook for 2 minutes.', 'Open the parcels, place the fish on a serving platter and drizzle the tamarind sauce on top. Serve immediately garnished with lemon slices and the hot coal by the side.']

title: Leftover Chicken Toast - SK Khazana
method: ['Preheat oven to 180deg C.', 'Cut thin slices of the bread, keep them on a baking tray and spread a thin layer of butter over them. Keep the tray in the preheated oven and toast for 5-6 minutes.', 'Spread a generous layer of chicken curry over each of them. Place a few cherry tomato pieces over each slice, grate cheese directly over them and sprinkle a little coriander leaves over each slice.', 'Keep the tray back in the preheated oven and bake for 6-7 minutes.', 'Arrange them on a serving platter and serve immediately.']

title: Baked Bread-Cook Smart
method: ['Preheat oven to 180o C. Heat ghee in a non-stick pan.', 'Roughly tear 2 bread slices, place in a grinder jar and grind into fine crumbs.', 'Add breadcrumbs to the pan and saute for  1/2  minute. Add sugar, mix well and cook till the sugar dissolves completely.', 'Place a cookie cutter over the remaining 2 bread slices and cut out 4 round discs and fit them inside 4 individual ramekin moulds.', 'Add condensed milk to the pan and mix well. Add milk, mix well and cook, stirring continuously, till the mixture thickens. Switch off heat.', 'Pour the bread-milk mixture into the moulds. Top each with 1 tablespoon almonds, drizzle some ghee on top and place them on a baking tray.', 'Place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 20-25 minutes.', 'Serve warm or chilled.']

title: Masoor Dal Ke Pakode
method: ['Grind masoor dal and rice, without adding water, to a coarse mixture. Transfer the mixture into a bowl. Add onions, green chillies, cumin seeds and salt and mix well.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. With damp hands, take small portions of the mixture, shape into pakodas, slide them into hot oil. Deep-fry till half-done, drain on absorbent paper.', 'Reheat the oil and deep-fry the pakodas till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Sprinkle some chaat masala.Transfer onto a serving plate and serve hot.']

title: Caramel Bhapa Doi
method: ['Put yogurt, condensed milk, caramel sauce and milk in a large bowl and whisk. Strain the mixture into another large bowl.', 'Transfer mixture into individual earthen pots and cover with aluminium foil.', 'Heat some water in a deep non-stick pan. Place a steamer on top and bring the water to a boil.', 'Place earthen pots in the steamer, cover and steam for 10 minutes. Remove the pots from steamer and cool down to room temperature. Refrigerate for 2-3 hours.', 'Discard the foil and garnish with pistachio slivers and almond slivers.', 'Serve chilled.']

title: Spicy Corn Cups
method: ['Preheat oven at 200oC.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Finely chop green and red capsicums.', 'Add onion to the pan and saute for 1 minute. Add green chillies, capsicums, corn kernels and chaat masala. Mix and cook for 1 minute.', 'Add  1/2  tbsp butter, mix well and cook for 1 minute.', 'Divide the cooked corn mixture equally into 4 individual ramekin moulds.', 'Put potatoes in a bowl, add salt and cream and mix well. Add remaining butter and mix well.', 'Put the potato mixture equally over the corn mixture in each mould. Level the top, place the moulds in the preheated oven and bake for 15 minutes.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Sai Bhaji
method: ['Heat oil in a pressure cooker and add cumin seeds, ginger-garlic paste, onion, green chillies, tomatoes, turmeric powder, coriander powder and red chilli powder and mix well.', 'Cut brinjals and potatoes into 8 pieces each. Add both to the cooker and mix. Add chana dal and mix.', 'Add spinach, methi, suva, khatta bhaji, salt and  1/2  cup water and mix well. Close the cooker with and cook till 4 whistles are released.', 'Open the lid when pressure is reduced completely and check to see if the potato is cooked through.', 'Coarsely blend the sai bhaji with a hand blender.  Serve hot.']

title: Grilled Salmon
method: ['Marinate the fish with salt, 1 teaspoon crushed peppercorns and  1/2  tablespoon olive oil.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon butter in a non-stick pan. Add shallots and saute till translucent.', 'Add fish stock, stir to mix and cook.', 'Chop 3 tablespoons tarragon and add in the pan alongwith cream and mix well.', 'Add  1/4  cup butter gradually and whisk well to form a homogenous mixture and cook for 10-15 seconds.', 'Strain the sauce and add parsley and remaining chopped tarragon.', 'Heat  1/2  tablespoon butter and remaining olive oil in a non-stick grill pan. Place marinated fish pieces on it and sear for 15-20 seconds on each side.', 'Add asparagus pieces, salt and remaining crushed peppercorns and cook further.', 'Heat the prepared sauce.', 'Place asparagus on a serving plate and put the cooked fish on top. Pour the heated sauce over it and serve immediately.']

title: Fudgesicles
method: ['Heat a non-stick pan, add fresh cream and cook till it comes to a boil.', 'Take chocolate pieces in a bowl, add the hot cream and whisk till the chocolate melts and mixes well. Add vanilla essence and mix well.', 'Add whipped cream and mix well. Pour the mixture into popsicle moulds and tap lightly to remove air bubbles if any.', 'Insert 1 ice cream stick into each popsicle and keep them in the freezer to set.', 'Once they are set, bring them out of the freezer and remove them from the moulds. Arrange them on a serving platter and serve immediately.']

title: Walnut Phirni in Chocolate Cups
method: ['To prepare chocolate cups, fill silicon moulds till  3/4  full with melted dark chocolate. Swirl to coat all sides and drain extra chocolate. Keep them in the refrigerator for 5-10 minutes or till set.', 'Put walnuts in a grinder jar and grind coarsely.', 'Boil milk in a deep non-stick pan.', 'Transfer walnuts into a bowl. Put drained rice in the same grind jar and grind coarsely.', 'Add both rice and walnuts to the boiling milk and cook, stirring continuously till the rice gets cooked and the mixture thickens. Scrape the sides occasionally and mix well. Stir continuously so that no lumps are formed.', 'Add sugar, green cardamom powder and saffron strands, mix and cook for 2-3 minutes on low heat. Remove from heat and let it cool down to room temperature.', 'Demould chocolate cups from the silicon moulds and place on a serving platter.', 'Fill up each chocolate cups with phirni. Garnish with chocolate cigars and mint sprig. Serve immediately.']

title: Chilli Capsicum Macaroni
method: ['Deseed and cut capsicum into small cubes. Slit, deseed and chop red chilli.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add garlic and saute well.', 'Add onion and saute for 2 minutes. Add chopped red chilli and saute for a minute.', 'Add tomato ketchup, red chilli sauce, soy sauce, capsicum cubes and macaroni. Toss to mix.', 'Add salt and toss. Add chopped coriander and toss well. Let it get heated through.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Chicken Kathi Roll- SK Khazana
method: ['Heat mustard oil in a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds and let them change colour. Add onion and mix well and cook till golden brown.', 'Add ginger-garlic paste and mix and cook for 1-2 minutes. Add tomatoes, saute and cook for 2-3 minutes or till the tomatoes turn pulpy.', 'Add Tata Sampann Chicken Masala and salt and mix till well combined. Add  1/2  cup water and mix and cook for 3-4 minutes or till the oil separates.', 'Add chicken and green chillies and mix well. Cook for 10-15 minutes.', 'Add tomato ketchup, mix and add coriander leaves and take the pan off the heat.', 'Dust the worktop with refined flour and place a portion of the dough, shape it into a ball and flatten it slightly and roll into a thin disc.', 'Apply ghee and dust a little flour on top. Make a cut from the centre point to one end and start rolling to make a cone. Press it gently, dust with a little flour and roll into a parantha.', 'Heat 2 tbsps oil in another non-stick pan. Place the parantha on it and cook for 1-2 minutes, flip and add  1/2  beaten egg and spread it slightly. Flip and cook for 1-2 minutes. Transfer on to a worktop.', 'Add a portion of the prepared chicken mixture in the centre. Sprinkle pickled onion slices and cucumber slices and tightly roll.', 'Serve hot with tomato ketchup and kasundi mustard.']
