title: Black Currant Lassi
method: ['Blend together the black currant crush, yogurt, sugar and crushed ice in a blender till smooth. Pour the lassi in four glasses. Garnish with a swirl of black currant crush and serve chilled.']

title: Chicken Dhansak
method: ['Heat 3 tbsps oil in a pressure cooker, add cumin seeds, pumpkin, potato, chana dal, tuvar dal, masoor dal and moong dal and mix well.', 'Cube brinjals and add. Add fenugreek leaves, green chillies, ginger and garlic and mix well.', 'Add 3 cups of water, turmeric powder, red chilli powder, dhansaak masala and mix. Add salt and mint leaves and mix.', 'Cover the cooker with the lid and cook under pressure till 3 whistles are given out.', 'Meanwhile heat 2 tbsps oil in a non stick pan. Slice onions and add and saute for 2-3 minutes. Add chicken and mix.', 'Cut tomatoes into big cubes.', 'Add salt, turmeric powder, dhansaak masala and red chilli powder to chicken and mix well. Add  1/4  cup water, cover and cook.', 'Grind tomatoes to a puree and add to the chicken. Tear a few mint leaves and add. Mix well, cover and cook.', 'Switch off the heat under the pressure cooker and let it remain for 10 minutes. Open the lid and mash the mixture with a hand blender. Adjust salt.', 'Add this mixture to the chicken and mix well. Cover and cook for a few minutes.', 'Serve hot with brown rice and kachumber.']

title: Lemon Coconut Slice
method: ['Preheat oven to 180deg C. Grease and line a baking tin.', 'Put butter and sugar in a bowl and beat with an electric beater till well combined. Add egg and beat till just combined. Add flour and coconut and mix with spatula till well combined.', 'Pour this mixture into the prepared tin and bake in the preheated oven for fifteen minutes or till it turns golden and a skewer inserted into it comes out clean.', 'Meanwhile to make lemon curd, put the egg yolks in bowl, add quarter cup caster sugar and whisk it well.', 'Heat lemon juice and remaining caster sugar in a non-stick pan and bring it to a boil. Add this to the egg mixture and whisk well. Put this back into the pan and cook till it thickens or starts to coat the back of a wooden spoon.', 'Add lemon zest, switch off the heat and add some butter and mix.', 'Spread this lemon curd evenly over the prepared base.', 'To make the coconut topping whisk the eggs and sugar in a medium bowl, add scraped coconut and desiccated coconut and stir until well combined. Sprinkle evenly over the lemon curd. Bake in the oven for twenty to twenty five minutes at 180deg C or until the coconut is lightly golden and set.', 'Set aside in the tin itself to cool completely. Cut into squares to serve.']

title: Oats Pancake With Maple Syrup
method: ['Sieve together refined flour, whole wheat flour, soda bicarbonate and baking powder into a bowl. Add powdered sugar and mix. Add eggs and mix. Add buttermilk and mix well to make a smooth batter. Add oatmeal and milk and mix.', 'Add a little oil and vanilla essence and mix well. Heat a pan, grease it with a little oil. Pour a ladleful of batter and spread around the pan. Drizzle a little oil all round and let it cook on medium heat for two minutes.', 'Flip and cook on the other side. Serve hot with maple syrup. You can also serve it with fresh fruits or with honey.']

title: Noodle Biryani
method: ['Heat 2 tbsps oil in a non-stick wok, spread half the noodles in it to make a bed and let it cook till the underside is crisp and golden. Transfer it into an ovenproof glass baking dish.', 'Put carrot, French beans, cauliflower, soya granules and 4-5 tbsps Schezwan chutney in a bowl and mix well.', 'Tear 15-20 fresh mint leaves and 3-4 sprigs of fresh coriander leaves and add.', 'Add yogurt, lemon juice, bay leaves and star anise and mix well.', 'Spread this mixture over the noodles. Sprinkle half the fried onions over the vegetable mixture.', 'Add cooked rice in the same wok, add 1 tbsp Schezwan chutney and mix well.', 'Spread the rice over the fried onions.', 'Preheat oven to the highest temperature.', 'Meanwhile heat 1 tbsp oil in the same wok and add the remaining noodles and cook till the underside becomes crisp.', 'Sprinkle fried noodles over the rice in the baking dish. Sprinkle the remaining fried onions and remaining fresh mint leaves over the fried noodles.', 'Lastly cover all the layers with the crisp noodles.', 'Cover the dish with aluminium foil and cook in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes.', 'Serve hot with Schezwan chutney and yogurt.']

title: Pesto Chicken Roulade
method: ['Preheat oven to 180o C.', 'Slice each chicken breast without cutting through and open it out. Wrap them individually in a cling film and beat with a steak hammer.', 'Unwrap, sprinkle some salt and crushed peppercorns on top. Put some pesto in the center, place a cheese stick on top, fold the opposite edges and roll to make a log.', 'Wrap each chicken log in an aluminium foil and place them on a baking tray.Place the baking tray in the preheated oven and bake for 8-10 minutes.', 'Heat olive oil in a non-stick pan. Unwrap chicken logs, place in the pan and cook till evenly done from all sides and the chicken is cooked. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Cut into roundels.', 'Put some tomato sauce on the serving platter and place chicken roundels.Garnish with amaranth micro greens and serve hot.']

title: Blueberry Orange Almond Loaf - SK Khazana
method: ['Preheat oven to 180o C. Grease a loaf tin.', 'Take refined flour in a mixing bowl, add baking powder, baking soda and almond flour together and mix.', 'Break the eggs into another mixing bowl, add castor sugar and beat them well. Add butter and continue to beat till well combined.', 'Add the flour mixture to the eggs in batches and fold in with a spatula. Add milk and fold to make a smooth batter.', 'Add orange juice and mix well. Add orange zest, mix well.', 'Transfer the batter into the loaf tin, arrange the blueberries on top, sprinkle almonds all over.', 'Keep the tin in the preheated oven and bake for 20-25 minutes.', 'Take the tin out of the oven, cool, demould, cut into slice and serve.']

title: Subz Khichda (Veg Haleem)
method: ['Finely chop onions.\nHeat oil and ghee on a pan.', 'Add chopped garlic, chopped onions, turmeric powder, red chili powder, coriander powder, cumin powder, cinnamon powder and mix well.', 'Now add soaked and ground soya nuggets, soaked broken wheat and soaked barley. Cover the pan and let it cook.', 'Once cooked remove lid of the pan. Now add curd, almond powder, clove powder, kashmiri mirch powder, finely chopped mint, finely chopped coriander, lemon juice and mix well.', 'Remove Veg Haleem in a bowl.\nGarnish with fried onions and coriander.']

title: Christmas Pudding
method: ['Preheat oven to180oC. Sieve flour with salt, cinnamon powder, mace powder, nutmeg powder into a bowl.Add breadcrumbs and mix.', 'Add butter and mix.Add candied peel, cherries, raisins, sultanas and mix. Add brandy, whisky, rum, kahlua, brown sugar and eggs and mix well.', 'Add carrot and almonds and mix. Add lemon rind, orange juice and mix well.Grease a mould and pour the batter into it taking care not to fill it up to the top.Cover the bowl with aluminium foil and keep it in a baking tray.', 'Half fill the tray with water and cook in the preheated oven at 180oC for 45 minutes.', 'Reduce temperature to 150oC and cook for 3 hours. Ensure that there is water in the tray throughout the cooking. Before serving heat it again and serve.']

title: Raw Mango Rice - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add mustard seeds and saute till the seeds splutter.', 'Add Bengal gram and black gram, mix well and saute till they turn light brown. Add green chillies and curry leaves, mix and let the leaves crackle.', 'Add peanuts and mix. Add red chillies and sesame seeds, mix well and saute till fragrant.', 'Add turmeric powder and mix well. Add rice and mango and mix well. Add salt and coconut, mix well and let the rice get heated through.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Gur ka Parantha - SK Khazana
method: ['Mix together refined flour, wheat flour, salt and ghee in a bowl. Add water as required and knead into a semi-soft dough.', 'Mix together jaggery, almond powder, pistachio powder, desiccated coconut and sesame seeds in another bowl.', 'Divide dough into equal portions. Roll out into thick discs, apply some ghee and place a spoonful of jaggery mixture in the centre.', 'Bring the edges together and seal to make balls. Dust with refined flour and roll out into thick paranthas.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa. Place the paranthas on it, one by one, and cook, basting with ghee, till evenly done on both sides.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Cherry Pops
method: ['Put dark chocolate sponge cake crumbs in a large bowl, add sugar syrup and mix well to make a dough.', 'Cover each cherry cake crumb mixture and rest for ten minutes in a refrigerator.', 'Put white chocolate in a bowl and melt in a microwave. Temper till the required temperature is reached. Quickly coat the cherry pops with it.', 'Refrigerator for four to five minutes and serve chilled.']

title: Coconut Crusted Chicken with Burnt Garlic Mayo
method: ['To make the burnt garlic mayo, combine the mayonnaise, garlic and pepper powder in a bowl and mix well. Set aside.', 'Mix together cornstarch, salt, chilli powder and crushed peppercorns in another bowl. Set aside.', 'Mix together the coconut, crushed curry leaves and breadcrumbs in another bowl. Set aside.', 'Break eggs in another bowl. Add salt, beat and set aside.', 'Coat the chicken cubes with the cornstarch mixture, dip in the egg mixture and coat again with the cornstarch mixture.', 'Dip again in egg mixture and coat with coconut mixture.', 'Heat sufficient oil a kadai. Deep-fry prepared chicken cubes till golden. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot with burnt garlic mayo.']

title: Cheese Stuffed Seekh Kebabs
method: ['Take chicken mince in a bowl. Add ginger-garlic paste, salt, garam masala powder, coriander leaves, mint leaves, green chilies, chaat masala and fried onion and mix well.', 'Grind the chicken mixture to make a smooth mixture and transfer in the same bowl.', 'Divide the chicken mixture into equal portions and wrap each portion around a mozzarella cheese stick to make kebabs.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a pan.', 'Spread some breadcrumbs on a plate. Break eggs in a bowl and whisk well.', 'Coat each kebab with breadcrumbs, dip in egg and deep-fry in hot oil till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Insert skewers in each kebab and serve hot with mint chutney.']

title: Chilli Bean Salad with Caramelized Walnuts
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Heat 1 cup water in a non-stick pan, add walnut kernels and bring it to boil.', 'Cut both the beans into long strips.', 'Strain the water from walnut kernels.', 'Heat  1/4  cup water in the same non-stick pan, add sugar and honey and mix well. Add blanched walnut kernels and bring it to boil. Strain the nuts.', 'To make dressing roughly chop pickled jalapenos. Mix red chilli sauce, schezwan chutney and jalapenos in bowl.', 'Deep fry the walnut kernels in hot oil till crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Mix both the beans in a large bowl, add the dressing and mix well.', 'Arrange the beans on a serving platter, sprinkle white and black sesame seeds, top with caramelized walnuts and serve immediately.']

title: Apple Yogurt Salad
method: ['To prepare dressing, put drained poppy seeds, yogurt, honey, apple cider vinegar, salt and crushed peppercorns into a jar and blend with an electric hand blender till smooth.', 'Quarter the green apple and red apple, remove the core, dice and transfer into a bowl.', 'Add carrot strips, mint leaves, pecan nuts, 1-2 torn romaine lettuce leaves and\ndressing and toss well.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Chicken Lollipop
method: ['Take garlic paste, red chilli paste, soy sauce, vinegar, white pepper powder and salt in a bowl and mix.', 'Add chicken lollipops and mix well. Set aside to marinate for 30-35 minutes.', 'Preheat oven to 200o C. Line a baking tray with an aluminum foil.', 'Add cornflour to the marinated lollipops and mix well.', 'Grease the lined tray with some oil and place the lollipops on it.', 'Place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 10-12 minutes.', 'Arrange mixed capsicum curls and a small bowl of schezwan sauce on one end of a serving plate and keep the lollipops alongside. Serve hot.']

title: Chuara Matar
method: ['Soak poha in water for 4-5 minutes. Heat ghee in a non stick kadai. Add ginger, green chillies and saute. Add cashewnuts, raisins and mix well. Add tomatoes and mix.', 'Drain poha and set aside. Add turmeric powder, amchur, garam masala powder and green peas to the kadai and mix. Add salt and mix. Add poha and mix well.', 'Cut the potato into small cubes, add to the kadai and mix well. Transfer into a serving bowl and add lemon juice. Garnish with sev and serve hot.']

title: Pudina Chaas
method: ['Grind fresh mint leaves, green chilli, ginger and sea salt together to a coarse paste in a mortar with a pestle.', 'Blend this paste with yogurt, adding roasted cumin powder and four cups of water.', 'Pour chaas equally in four glasses, garnish with fresh mint leaves and serve immediately.']

title: Haleem-SK Khazana
method: ['Put mutton cubes in a bowl. Add yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, salt and mint leaves, mix well and set aside to marinate for 1 hour.', 'Heat 2 tablespoons ghee in a pressure cooker. Add broken wheat, Bengal gram, black gram and green gram, mix well and cook for 2 minutes.', 'Add marinated mutton cubes and mix well. Add caraway seeds, peppercorns, 1 teaspoon garam masala powder, green chilli paste, salt and fried onions and mix well.', 'Add mutton stock, mix, cover and cook under pressure till the pressure is released for 7-8 times.', 'Remove cooked mutton pieces and set aside. Blend the remaining mixture till smooth and place cooker on heat.', 'Add mutton cubes and mix well. Add remaining ghee and mix. Add milk, mix and cook for 5-10 minutes.', 'Add remaining garam masala powder and mix well.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, drizzle chilli oil, garnish with fried onions and mint sprig and serve hot with lemon wedges.']

title: Masala Chai
method: ['Put green cardamoms, cinnamon, cloves, black peppercorns and fennel seeds in a mixer jar and grind to a fine powder.', 'Crush ginger in a mortar with a pestle.', 'Heat 2 cups water in a pan till it comes to a boil, add tea leaves, crushed ginger, sugar and 1 teaspoon ground masala, mix well and let it boil for 3-4 minutes. Add milk and bring it to a boil again.', 'Strain into serving cups and serve hot.']

title: Farali Aloo ki Sabzi
method: ['Heat ghee in a non-stick pan and add cumin seeds. Once the seeds begin to change color, add green chillies and saute for half a minute.', 'Add potatoes and continue to saute till crisp.', 'Add peanuts, salt, sugar and coconut and mix well. Cover and cook on low heat for four to five minutes.', 'Transfer into a serving plate, garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot.']

title: Egg Curry
method: ['Grind together coconut, dried red chillies, half the onion, garlic, peppercorns, coriander seeds, cumin seeds, turmeric powder and tamarind pulp alongwith some water to a fine paste.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add remaining onion, mix and saute till golden.', 'Make a crisscross on the narrow side of the eggs.', 'Add the prepared paste to the pan, mix and cook for a minute. Add 1 cup water and mix well. Add salt, mix and cook on low heat for 2-3 minutes.Add eggs, mix and cook for 4-5 minutes.', 'Serve hot garnished with a coriander sprig.']

title: Papad Churi - SK Khazana
method: ['Roast the papads evenly on medium heat on both sides and set aside to cool slightly. Crush the roasted papads roughly and put them in a bowl.', 'Add red chilli powder, salt, coriander leaves, onion and ghee and mix well.', 'Transfer into a serving plate and serve immediately.']

title: Mini Apple Pies - SK Khazana
method: ['Chop the apple into small cubes.', 'Heat brown sugar in a non-stick pan. Add the chopped apple, mix and cook. Add lemon juice and mix. Cook till the apples become soft. Sprinkle some cinnamon powder from top and mix.', 'Keep the mini pie crust tarts on a serving platter, fill them with the apple mixture and serve immediately.']

title: Cottage Cheese Fajita
method: ['Combine the smoked paprika, chilli powder, garlic powder, onion powder, cumin powder, sugar and salt in a bowl and mix well.', '2. Combine the onions, red and yellow peppers, capsicum, juice of half a lemon and half of the dry spice mix in another bowl and mix. Set aside for ten minutes.', 'To make the salsa, combine the tomato, spring onion with greens, remaining lemon juice, salt, crushed peppercorns and coriander leaves in a bowl and mix well.', 'Cut the cottage cheese into long strips. Sprinkle the remaining dry spice mix on the strips.', '5. Heat half tablespoon oil in a non-stick grill pan. Place the cottage cheese strips and grill lightly.', 'Add the remaining oil to the same pan and add the vegetables. Toss on high heat for two to three minutes. Remove from heat and set aside.', 'Slightly warm the tortillas on a non-stick pan.', 'Place a tortilla on the worktop. Put the lettuce, top with grilled vegetables and grilled cottage cheese and add some salsa. Drizzle half tablespoon of sour cream and wrap.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Salted Caramel Cheesecake
method: ['To make salted caramel, heat sugar in a non-stick pan and let it caramelize. Add cream and butter, mix and cook till the butter melts. Add sea salt and mix well. Remove from heat and set aside.', 'Preheat oven to 180o C.', 'Take the crushed biscuits in a bowl. Reserve 1 tablespoon salted caramel, add remaining and mix well. Spread the mixture in a 5 inch loose bottom baking tin evenly to make the crust. Set aside.', 'Separate egg yolks from whites and put into two different bowls.', 'Cream together cream cheese, hung yogurt and castor sugar in a third bowl till smooth.', 'Lightly beat egg yolks, add to the cheese-sugar mixture and mix well.', 'Add lemon juice and vanilla essence and mix well. Add reserved salted caramel and coffee powder and mix well.', 'Beat egg whites with a hand blender till soft peaks are formed. Fold this into the cream cheese mixture.', 'Pour the mixture over the crust lined in the baking tin and spread. Place it in the preheated oven and bake for 30 minutes. Remove from oven and cool.', 'Cut into wedges, drizzle caramel sauce on top, garnish with mint sprig and serve.']

title: Romantic Rose Cupcakes
method: ['Preheat oven to 180degC. Line a silicon cupcake moulds with paper moulds.', 'Cream together butter and castor sugar in a bowl with an electric beater till light.', 'Add eggs, one by one, and beat till well blended.', 'Add rose essence and mix well.', 'Sieve together refined flour and baking powder into the bowl and fold in till well blended.', 'Add milk and mix well. Add rose petal jam and mix well.', 'Spoon the batter into the prepared moulds, filling till  3/4  and level them.', 'Place the mould on a baking tray, place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 25-30 minutes.', 'To make icing, cream together butter and icing sugar in another bowl with an electric beater till light.', 'Divide the icing into two portions. To one portion, add red food colour and mix well. To another portion, add green food colour and mix well.', 'Place the green icing into a piping bag and cut the tip in a way that when you pipe out a leaf shape is achieved. Place red icing into a piping bag fitted with a star nozzle. Refrigerate both the bags.', 'Remove cupcakes from the oven and cool down to room temperature.', 'Demould the cupcakes and pipeout rosettes and leaves from the red icing and green icing, respectively.', 'Serve.']

title: Pork Vindaloo
method: ['Put  1/2  tbsp ginger in a blender jar, add  1/2  tbsp garlic, red chillies, black peppercorns, cloves, cinnamon, salt and 2 tbsps vinegar and blend. Add  1/2  cup pork stock and blend further to a smooth paste.', 'Transfer the past into a large bowl, add pork pieces, mix well and set aside to marinate for 15 minutes.', 'Heat oil in a deep non-stick pan, add remaining garlic and remaining ginger, mix well and saute for 1 minute. Add onion, mix well and saute for a minute. Add green chillies, turmeric powder, salt, cumin powder and red chilli powder, mix well and saute for 2 minutes.', 'Add the marinated pork pieces, mix well and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Rinse the bowl with  1/2  cup stock and add to the pork mixture. Mix well, cover and cook for 5-6 minutes.', 'Add remaining stock and mix well. Add castor sugar and remaining vinegar, mix well. Cover and cook for 3-4 minutes.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot.']

title: Jain Hariyali Paneer Tikka
method: ['Put coriander leaves, mint leaves, green chillies, ginger powder, cumin powder and two tablespoons oil in a mixer jar and grind coarsely. Transfer into a large bowl and add gram flour, lemon juice and one tablespoon oil and mix well.', 'Add paneer, baby corns and red capsicum and gently mix till they are well coated with the ground paste.Set aside to marinate for twenty to thirty minutes.', 'String paneer, baby corn and red capsicum, one after other on skewers, keeping little space in between. Keep them on a plate.', 'Heat two tablespoons oil on a non-stick grill pan, place the satay sticks on it and cook, rotating the sticks occasionally, till the cottage cheese is golden brown all around.', 'Place the satay sticks on a serving plate, sprinkle chaat masala over them and serve hot.']

title: Triple Chocolate Cookies
method: ['Preheat oven to 180deg C. Line a baking tray with a silicon mat.', 'Cream together butter and castor sugar in a bowl with an electric beater. Add eggs and vanilla essence and whisk well.', 'Sieve together flour, cocoa powder and baking soda into the bowl and whisk well. Add milk and continue to whisk. Add white chocolate chips and dark chocolate chips and fold in well.', 'Divide the mixture into large equal portions and shape them into balls. Place them on the lined baking tray and flatten lightly.', 'Place the tray in preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes. Remove from oven and cool.', 'Serve.']

title: Sour Dough Open Sandwich
method: ['Cut the sourdough bread into slices. Brush with olive oil.', 'Rough chop basil leaves. Halve bocconcini. Preheat oven to 180o C. Grease a baking tray with some oil.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil on a non-stick grill pan, place the bread sliced in it and toast, turning sides till grill marks appear on both sides.', 'Place the grilled bread slices on the greased tray, top with 2-3 red cherry tomato halves, 2-3 yellow cherry tomato halves and 2-3 bocconcini halves, sprinkle some chopped basil, salt and crushed black peppercorns.', 'Place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 5-10 minutes.', 'Bring the tray out of the oven, arrange the sandwiches on a serving platter and serve immediately.']

title: Chocoholic
method: ['Heat fresh cream in a non-stick pan. When it is about to come to a boil, remove the pan from heat.', 'In a glass bowl, add milk chocolate and half cup of hot fresh cream. Whisk well and set aside to cool. Once cooled, fold in half cup of whipped cream and mix well. Set aside.', 'Repeat this same procedure using the white chocolate and dark chocolate as well.', 'Take four individual shot glasses and fill one-third of each glass with white chocolate mousse.', 'Top it up with dark chocolate mousse so that each shot glass is about two-third full. Fill up all the shot glasses with milk chocolate mousse. Sprinkle each with chocolate chips.', 'Refrigerate for half an hour at least and serve chilled.']

title: Jamaican Chicken Curry-SK Khazana
method: ['Heat oil in a deep non-stick pan. Add mixed herbs and chicken cubes, mix and saute till the chicken changes its colour.', 'Add potatoes, onions, green and red capsicums, jalapenos, garlic powder, Jamaican seasoning and curry powder and mix well.', 'Add 2 cups water, mix, cover and cook till chicken and potatoes are fully done. Add vinegar, soy sauce and salt, mix well and simmer for 1-2 minutes.', 'Garnish with parsley and serve hot with steamed rice.']

title: Dahi Ki Kadhi
method: ['Put yogurt and gram flour in a bowl and mix well till no lumps remain.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds, curry leaves, green chilli, asafoetida, ginger and mustard seeds and saute till the seeds splutter.', 'Add yogurt mixture and one cup water and mix well. Cook for four to five minutes on low heat.', 'Add turmeric powder, sugar and salt and mix well. Let the mixture come to a boil.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot with steamed rice.']

title: Narangi Pulav
method: ['Cut oranges into two halves. Extract juice and keep eight halves for service. Use skin of two oranges to cut into julienne. Boil orange rind julienne in a cup of water for a minute, drain and keep aside. Crush peppercorns coarsely. Dissolve saffron in milk.', 'Pick and wash rice twice and soak in four cups of water for half an hour. Drain and keep aside. Heat pure ghee in a saucepan. Add cinnamon, cloves, green cardamoms and saute for a minute. Add rice and saute. Add two cups of orange juice and one cup of water to rice.', 'Add sea salt, sugar, freshly crushed peppercorns and orange rind and stir once. Add dissolved saffron and stir once. Cover tightly and cook on medium heat till done. Serve rice in orange halves.']

title: Chocolate Walnut Kheer
method: ['Take rice and milk in a deep pan and cook stirring continuously so that the rice does not stick to the bottom. Cook till the rice is soft and the milk reduced.', 'Add mawa and mix. Add sugar and stir till it dissolves. Add crushed walnuts and stir.', 'Transfer into a bowl and add chocolate and mix. Cool and chill. Pour into individual bowls.', 'Sprinkle grated chocolate over the top, place a walnut in the centre and serve.']

title: Tomato Rice
method: ['Heat oil in a pressure cooker, add cumin seeds and saute till they change colour.', 'Add bottle gourd and potato, mix and saute for a minute. Add tomatoes, mix and saute for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add salt and green chilli, mix well and saute for 2-3 minutes. Add rice and mix well. Add 3 1/2  cups water and mix.', 'Add ghee and mix. Cover the cooker with its lid and cook under pressure till 2-3 whistles are released.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot with raita or yogurt or with papad and pickle.']

title: Aloo Posto
method: ['Heat mustard oil in a non stick pan till it smokes. Switch off heat.', 'Cut potatoes into  1/2  inch cubes. Drain and grind khus khus to a fine paste.', 'Heat the mustard oil again, add onion seeds and saute till fragrant. Add potatoes and mix well. Cover and cook for 5 minutes.', 'Add khus khus paste and mix. Cover and cook again till the potatoes are done.', 'Slit green chillies. Add salt, sugar and green chillies and mix. Add  1/2  cup water and mix. Simmer for a minute.', 'Add ghee and serve hot.']

title: Caramalized Vegetable Sandwich in Footlong
method: ['Horizontally slice footlong bread without cutting through. Press the base a little with fingers. Spread 2 tbsps butter on the base.', 'Spread garlic on base, cover and roast in oven for 2-3 minutes.', 'Cut red and yellow bell peppers and capsicum into thick juliennes.', 'Heat remaining butter in a non-stick pan. Slice garlic cloves, add to the pan and saute.', 'Add pepper and capsicum juliennes, rosemary, oregano and thyme and toss.', 'Add Balsamic vinegar and toss well. Add caramelized onions, toss and saute well.', 'Add salt, crushed peppercorns and mix well.', 'Remove bread from oven. Open cover and spread 2 tbsps mayonnaise each on base as well as inside of upper cover. Place torn lettuce leaves on base and top with cooked vegetables.', 'Cover, cut into 4 parts and serve immediately.']

title: Saeb Makhane ki Kheer
method: ['Heat ghee in a non-stick pan, add makhana and saute till crisp. Drain and transfer into a bowl and set aside to cool.', 'Add apples to the ghee remaining in the pan and saute for 7-8 minutes.', 'Transfer makhana into a grinder jar and grind to a fine powder.', 'Add jaggery to the apples and mix till it melts. Add green cardamom powder and mix well. Transfer the mixture into another bowl.', 'Add nuts to the same pan and roast till lightly browned. Add milk and bring to a boil.', 'Add makhana powder, mix well and cook till the mixture thickens. Add khoya and mix till it melts.', 'Switch off heat, add prepared apple mixture and mix till well combined.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with apple fans and serve hot.']

title: Penne In Thousand Island
method: ['Place the penne in a large bowl.', 'Add green capsicum, French beans, broccoli, carrot, black olives, lettuce and sweet basil and toss.', 'Add cherry tomatoes and Thousand Island dressing and mix well.', 'Serve chilled.']

title: Jowar Pumpkin Gnocchi
method: ['Take sorghum flour in a mixing bowl, add sweet potatoes and mash with a fork. Add 1 cup pumpkin puree, salt and crushed black peppercorns, and knead into a dough.', 'To make gnocchi, take small portions of the dough and shape them into cylinders. Flatten the edges.', 'Heat sufficient water in a deep non-stick deep pan and let it come to a boil. Drop in the gnocchis into the boiling water and cook till they float on the surface.', 'Meanwhile to make the sauce, heat oil in a shallow non-stick pan, add garlic and saute well.', 'Add the remaining pumpkin puree and mix well. Strain the cooked gnocchi and add to the sauce and toss gently till they are well coated with the sauce.', 'Add salt and mixed herbs. Tear basil leaves and add to the gnocchi. Add red chilli flakes and gently toss on high heat.', 'Transfer into a serving plate, grate parmesan cheese on top and garnish with basil leaves. Serve hot.']

title: Refried Beans Bruschetta
method: ['Heat oil in a shallow non-stick pan, add garlic and saute till golden brown. Add onion, mix and continue to saute till onion is translucent.', 'Add tomato, mix and saute till tomato turns pulpy.', 'Add red chilli powder and salt, mix well and saute for 1 minute. Add  1/4  cup water and mix well. Add cooked kidney beans and mix well. Add  1/2  cup cooking liquid, mix and cook for 5-6 minutes.', 'Mash the beans with a masher. Tear the coriander sprigs roughly and add. Squeeze the juice of  1/2  lemon and mix well. Take the pan off the heat.', 'Cut the baguette into 8 thin diagonal slices.', 'Heat olive oil in a non-stick grill pan, arrange the bread slices in it and grill, turning sides, till grill marks appear on both the sides.', 'Spread a generous portion of refried beans on each slice. Top it with some sour cream and some tomato salsa. Garnish with coriander sprig and serve immediately.']

title: Breakfast Triffle
method: ['Grate  1/2  an apple into a bowl. Add chilled yogurt and honey and mix well.Drain and place the mixed fruits in another bowl.', 'Put muesli in short stemmed glasses. Over that put the apple-yogurt mixture. Place the mixed fruits over the yogurt and serve.']

title: Crispy Vegetables-SK Khazana
method: ['Mix together mushrooms, baby corn, yellow capsicum, green capsicum, red capsicum , onion, salt, crushed peppercorns, 1 tablespoon refined flour, cornflour and a little water and mix well.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Deep-fry vegetables till golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan. Add garlic and saute for a few seconds. Add celery, chilli flakes, green chilli and spring onion bulbs, mix and saute till onions turn translucent.', 'Add chilli paste, tomato ketchup, salt and crushed peppercorns and toss well.', 'Garnish with spring onion greens and serve immediately.']

title: Candied Pumpkin Seeds
method: ['Heat  1/2  cup water in a non-stick pan. Add sugar and cinnamon powder, stir and bring to a boil.', 'Add sesame seeds and pumpkin seeds and cook till the liquid evaporates and leaves a syrup-like coating on the seeds, stirring continuously.', 'Transfer the mixture onto a silicon sheet and separate the seeds with a fork. Set aside to cool for 15 minutes.', 'Serve or store it in an air tight container.']

title: Nimboo Mirch Wale Chane
method: ['Take chickpeas in a bowl. Add 1 1/2  tsps red chilli powder, salt, 1 tsp chaat masala and 2 tbsps Punjabi chole masala and mix well.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Take refined flour, cornflour, baking soda, salt and 1 tbsp oil in another bowl. Add little water and mix well to make a thick batter.', 'Take 1 cup water in another bowl.', 'Add marinated chickpeas to the batter and mix well.', 'Dampen your fingers with water and pick each chickpea along with batter and slide into the hot oil. Separate the chickpeas with a spoon and deep fry till they are half done and float on top. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Reheat the oil in kadai to high temperature.', 'Meanwhile heat 1 tbsp oil in a non-stick pan, add garlic and saute till lightly brown. Add green chillies, ginger strips and saute till the mixture turns a light brown.', 'Add the half fried chickpeas back in kadai, and deep fry till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Add chickpeas to the pan. Add remaining red chilli powder, remaining Punjabi chole masala, remaining chaat masala, crushed black peppercorns and lemon juice. Chop coriander leaves and add, mix well and cook on medium heat for 1-2 minutes.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl. Garnish with green and red capsicum slices and serve hot.']

title: Instant Wheat Vermicelli Upma-SK Khazana
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add split black gram and saute till it turns golden brown.', 'Add mustard seeds and let them splutter. Add green chilli and curry leaves and saute. Add peanuts and saute for 30 seconds.', 'Add tomato and saute till soft. Add 1 cup water, turmeric powder, chilli powder and salt, mix and let the mixture come to a boil.', 'Add wheat vermicelli, mix, cover and cook for 2 minutes or till done.', 'Add lemon juice and 1 tablespoon coriander leaves and mix well.', 'Serve hot garnished with coriander leaves.']

title: Sizzling Walnut Brownie
method: ['Preheat oven to160degC. Grease a cake tin with butter and dust with refined flour.', 'Melt chocolate with butter in a bowl in a microwave for a minute. Remove from oven and whisk till smooth. Cool it down to room temperature.', 'Cream eggs, castor sugar and vanilla essence in a large mixing bowl till light and fluffy.', 'Sieve refined flour, cocoa powder and coffee powder into the egg mixture and fold in well.', 'Add chocolate mixture and walnuts and fold in till well blended.', 'Pour batter into the prepared tin, place it in the preheated oven and bake for 35-40 minutes.', 'Heat a sizzler plate, place the brownie on it, put vanilla ice cream over it and serve immediately.']

title: Lemon Chicken
method: ['Marinate chicken in one tablespoon of lemon juice and salt for half an hour. Blend cornstarch in half a cup of water.', 'Heat a non-stick pan. Add capsicum, bell peppers, chicken, chicken stock and bring it to a boil.', 'Add white pepper powder, MSG, sugar, star anise and lemon rind. Add blended cornstarch and cook till the sauce thickens and the chicken is done.', 'Stir in the remaining lemon juice and serve hot.']

title: Khasta Kachori
method: ['Sift the flour, salt and soda bicarbonate together. Add oil and mix well. Knead into a soft dough using sufficient water. Cover with a moist cloth and set aside. Soak the urad dal in two cups of water for an hour.', 'Drain and coarsely grind using a little water. Peel, wash and finely chop ginger. Remove stem, wash and chop green chilli. Roughly chop cashewnuts. Wash raisins and pat them dry.', 'Heat ghee in a kadai and add the ground dal, ginger, green chilli, asafoetida, coriander powder, cumin powder, red chilli powder, fennel powder, cashewnuts and raisins. Cook till all the moisture has dried up. Add sugar, salt and lemon juice.', 'Mix well and remove off the heat, let the mixture cool. Divide into sixteen portions. Divide the flour dough into sixteen equal balls. Roll out into small puris so that they are thinner around the edges and thicker in the centre.', 'Place a portion of stuffing in the centre and bring the edges together to form a ball. Flatten slightly. Heat sufficient oil in a kadai and deep fry kachoris on low heat for three to five minutes or until golden brown and crisp.', 'Serve with tamarind chutney.']

title: Homemade French Fries
method: ['Boil sufficient water in a deep non-stick pan. Add potato fingers and salt and cook till the potato fingers are almost done. Strain.', 'Freeze the boiled potato fingers for 20-25 minutes. Transfer into a zip-lock bag and freeze again for 2-3 hours.', 'To prepare tomato sauce, heat tomato puree in another deep non-stick pan. Add honey, chilli powder, dried ginger powder and black salt, mix and cook on low heat till the mixture reduces and thickens.', 'Preheat air fryer to 180o C.', 'Add olive oil to frozen potato fingers and toss well. Transfer into the air fryer basket.', 'Put the basket into the preheated air fryer and air cook for 12-15 minutes.', 'Add salt to the sauce and mix. Add vinegar, mix and cook for 2 minutes. Transfer into a serving bowl.', 'Transfer the French fries onto the worktop, sprinkle salt over them and mix well. Transfer into a paper bag.', 'Serve hot with tomato sauce.']

title: Chukandar aur Chickpea Kebabs
method: ['Dry roast roasted Bengal gram in a non-stick pan till lightly browned and put them into a mixer jar. Add chickpeas and grind till smooth. Transfer into a bowl.', 'Add beetroot, ginger, red chilli powder, pepper powder, onions, kitchen king masala and salt and mix well.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a non-stick pan.', 'Divide the mixture into 12 equal portions, roll into balls and then flatten slightly. Place half of them in the pan and shallow-fry in hot oil, turning sides, till golden and crisp on both the sides.Similarly cook the remaining 6 kebabs. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Place the kebabs on a serving plate, garnish with parsley, sprinkle chaat masala and serve immediately.']

title: Sprout Sev Puri - SK Khazana
method: ['Take the sweet potatoes in a bowl and mash them with a fork. Add red chilli powder, salt, chaat masala, 2 tbsps chopped onion, 2 tbsps coriander leaves and mixed sprouts and mix well .', 'Arrange papadis equally on 4 serving plates, top each with some sprout-sweet potato mixture.', 'Drizzle green chutney, date and tamarind chutney, red chilli-garlic chutney, some chaat masala, some red chilli powder, onion, some raw mango, some tomato and some grated beetroot, some masala chana dal, sev, salted peanuts and coriander leaves. Serve immediately.']

title: Thai Style Chips
method: ['Cut potatoes into wedges without peeling.', 'Put Thai red curry paste, red chilli paste, salt and coconut milk in a bowl and mix well. Grate some zest of lemon into the bowl. Add potato wedges and mix till the potatoes are well coated.', 'Add honey and mix well. Place these wedges in single file in air fryer basket and fry at 200o C for 5 minutes, then reduce the temperature to 180o C and fry for 5 minutes more.', 'Transfer onto a serving plate drizzle a little lemon juice and serve hot.']

title: Corn Upma - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add mustard seeds, urad dal, asafoetida, green chillies, ginger, curry leaves, and saute for 30 seconds.', 'Add onion and saute till translucent. Add crushed corn, boiled corn, and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add semolina, salt, and sugar and mix well. Add 3 1/2  cups hot water, and mix well. Cover and cook for 7-8 minutes or till semolina is cooked completely.', 'Take the lid off and mix well. Take it off the heat.', 'Garnish with coriander sprig and serve hot.']

title: Bread Upma
method: ['Chop ginger finely. Heat oil in a non-stick wok. Chop the onions finely. When the oil is hot add cumin seeds and mustard seeds and let them splutter.', 'Add ginger and onions and saute till soft. Chop green chillies finely, add and saute well. Chop tomatoes and potatoes into big pieces. Add potatoes to the pan and mix well. Add tomatoes and mix well.', 'Add red chilli powder, turmeric powder and salt and mix well. Add  1/4  cup water and mix well and cook for a while. Meanwhile trim the edges of the bread slices and cut them into small cubes.', 'When tomatoes soften slightly, add bread and mix well. Reduce heat. Chop spring onion greens and add and mix well. Add lemon juice and mix well. Serve hot.']

title: Hakka Noodles - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat sufficient water in a non-stick pan and bring to a boil. Add 1 tablespoon oil and noodles to the water and cook for 10-15 minutes.', 'Cut carrot and capsicum into thick strips.', 'Strain the noodles under running water and place in cold water.', 'Shred cabbage but not too fine. Slice the spring onion bulbs and reserve the greens.', 'Heat remaining oil in a non-stick pan. Add garlic and spring onion bulbs and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add carrot, capsicum, cabbage, salt and crushed peppercorns, toss and cook for 2-3 minutes. Add soy sauce and bean sprouts, mix and cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add noodles and mix well and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Diagonally slice reserved spring onion greens.', 'Garnish noodles with sliced spring onion greens and serve hot.']

title: Peppy Prawns
method: ['Chop garlic and ginger finely.', 'Take prawns in a bowl, add salt,  1/2  tsp pepper powder, 1 tbsp dark soy sauce and 1 tbsp of cornflour and mix well. Set aside, preferably in the refrigerator, to marinate for 15 minutes.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a pan, add the marinated prawns and deep-fry for about  1/2  minute.', 'Drain away the oil keeping a little of it in the pan. Add the garlic and ginger and saute for 2 minutes on high heat.', 'Diagonally slice the spring onion greens. Mix the remaining cornflour with 2 tbsps of water.', 'Add the prawns and remaining soy sauce and toss. Add salt, remaining pepper powder, crushed black peppercorns and cornflour mixture and mix well. Add spring onion greens and stir-fry on high heat for 1-2 minutes.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot.']

title: Aloo ki Sabzi
method: ['Place potatoes alongwith 1 cup water in a pressure cooker. Pressure cook till 3 whistles or 10-15 minutes. Remove from heat and let the pressure reduce. Peel potatoes.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick wok. Add mustard seeds and let them crackle. Add cumin seeds and let them change colour.', 'Add asafetida, turmeric powder, curry leaves, green chillies and saute for 2 minutes.', 'Add onions, mix and saute on high heat till onions are soft. Sprinkle little water, cover and cook.', 'Cut potatoes into dices and add alongwith salt,  1/2  tablespoon chopped coriander and mix well. Add little more water and mix well. Cover and cook for 5-7 minutes.', 'Crush potatoes a bit and switch off heat. Add lemon juice and remaining chopped coriander. Mix well and serve hot.']

title: Chhenar Payesh
method: ['Heat milk in a deep non-stick pan.', 'When it comes to a boil, reduce heat and simmer till it reduces and becomes a little thick.', 'Add sugar and stir till it dissolves. Slice almonds and pistachios.', 'Add chenna to milk and mix well. Switch off the heat.', 'Pour into individual bowls, garnish with almonds and pistachios and chill. Serve.']

title: Almond Shortbread Cookies
method: ['Preheat oven to 180oC. Line a baking tray with a parchment paper.', 'Cream together the butter and castor sugar till light and fluffy.', 'Add the almond essence and salt and beat. Add the flour and knead well.', 'Add the ground almonds and mix till well incorporated into a dough.', 'Divide the dough into twelve equal small portions and shape them into balls. Flatten them a little and place them one inch apart on the tray. Refrigerate for fifteen minutes.', 'Divide the dough into twelve equal small portions and shape them into balls. Flatten them a little and place them one inch apart on the tray. Refrigerate for fifteen minutes.', 'Serve or store in an airtight container.']

title: Chocolate Fruit Pizza
method: ['Preheat oven to 190degC. Slice the sponge cake horizontally into two. Bake them in the preheated oven for three minutes at 190degC.', 'Whisk cream along with powdered sugar till it forms soft peaks. Take strawberry crush in a bowl, add beaten fresh cream and mix gently. Slice the kiwi lengthwise.', 'Hull the strawberries and slice. Slice the pineapple. Remove the sponge slices from the oven and place on a plate. Spread the cream mixture.', 'Arrange the pineapple slices all round followed by strawberry slices and kiwi slices. Put the roasted nuts in the center and sprinkle white chocolate on top.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Banana Chocolate Chip Cake
method: ['Preheat oven to 180o C.', 'Sift together refined flour, salt and baking soda into a large mixing bowl. Add sugar and mix well. Add butter and mix well.', 'Break eggs and add. Add vanilla essence, yogurt and mix well.', 'Add banana puree and mix well. Add brown sugar and beat with electric beater till smooth. Reserve some chocolate chips and add the rest and mix well.', 'Grease a cake tin with oil and dust with some refined flour. Pour the batter into the tin and tap the tin on the worktop to settle the batter well and level it out. Spread the reserved chocolate chips on top.Grease a cake tin with oil and dust with some refined flour. Pour the batter into the tin and tap the tin on the worktop to settle the batter well and level it out. Spread the reserved chocolate chips on top.', 'Put the cake tin in the preheated oven and bake for 45-50 minutes.', 'Remove the cake from the oven, cool down to room temperature and demould, cut into wedges, arrange on a serving platter and serve.']

title: Spicy Noodles With Ginger And Vegetables
method: ['Boil noodles, drain and keep aside. Cut carrots, zucchini and spring onions into matchstick-size strips.', 'Heat vegetable oil in large skillet over high heat.', 'Add 2 tablespoons ginger and garlic; saute until fragrant.', 'Add spring onions, carrot and zucchini. Stir fry. Add fish sauce and take off the heat.', 'Heat sesame oil in a pan, add the remaining ginger, soy a sauce, fish sauce, red curry paste and some water.', 'Stir to mix well. Add mint leaves, coconut milk, some of the roasted peanuts and lemon juice .', 'In another pan, heat chilli oil. Add the boiled noodles and salt, stir and take off the heat.', 'Transfer the noodles into the serving dish, pour the sauce followed by vegetables .', 'Garnish with crushed peanuts and mint leaves']

title: Pan Fried Vegetable Momos
method: ['Put 1 cup flour in a bowl. Add salt and sufficient water, mix and knead into a semi-soft dough. Cover with a damp cloth and set aside for 1 hour.', 'To prepare sauce, heat a non-stick pan. Add soy sauce and bring to a boil. Add ginger strips, sesame seeds and salt, mix and cook for 4-5 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon oil in another non-stick pan. Add garlic and chopped ginger and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add spring onion bulbs, French beans, cabbage, carrot, spring onion greens and pepper powder, mix and cook for 2-3 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside to cool.', 'Dust the worktop with some flour, place a portion of the dough on it and roll out into a large thin disc. Cut out circles from it using a medium size cookie cutter.', 'Place a portion of the cooked vegetable mixture in the centre of each circle, bring the edges together and pinch to shape into momos.', 'Heat remaining oil in a pan. Place the momos, sprinkle some water on top, cover and cook for 3-4 minutes.', 'Serve hot with soy ginger sauce.']

title: Chickoo Walnut Kulfi with Salted Caramel Sauce
method: ['Heat milk in a deep non-stick pan. Once it comes to a boil, reduce heat and simmer, stirring continuously, till it reduces to half its original volume. Scrape the sides of pan and put it back into the pan.', 'Grind walnuts to a fine powder.', 'Take milk powder in a bowl, add 4 tbsps of hot milk and mix well. Add this mixture to the simmering milk and mix. Add green cardamom powder and khoya and mix well. Continue to simmer till the mixture thickens. Switch the heat off, transfer the mixture into a bowl and set aside to cool down to room temperature.', 'Add condensed milk and walnut powder to the milk mixture and mix well. Add sapodilla puree and mix well. Transfer into a tall jug.', 'Pour the mixture into metal kulfi moulds till they are  3/4  full. Cover them with their lids and keep the moulds in the freezer for 2 hours or till semi set. Now insert sticks into kulfi mixture and keep them in the freezer again till completely set.', 'To prepare salted caramel sauce, heat a non-stick pan, add sugar and caramelize it on low heat.', 'Gradually add cream and whisk continuously so that no lumps are formed. Add salt and mix well. Remove from heat. Add butter and whisk again.', 'Demould the kulfis, place them in individual serving bowls and serve with salted caramel sauce.']

title: Pizza Balls
method: ['Preheat oven at 180degC. Grease a baking tray with some oil.', 'Dust the worktop with some flour, transfer dough and knead well. Divide it into equal portions and shape them into balls.', 'Dust some flour on each ball and roll out to make a small thick disc.', 'Spread some pizza sauce on each disc. Put some grated mozzarella cheese and some bell pepper strips. Sprinkle some salt and crushed peppercorns on top, fold and shape them into balls.', 'Place them onto the greased baking tray and prove for 5-10 minutes. Place the baking tray in preheated oven and bake for 10-15 minutes. Remove from oven and cool.', "Make a devil's horns using bell pepper triangles and sliced olives on the pizza balls.", 'Place pizza balls on a serving platter and serve immediately with tomato ketchup.']

title: Mutton Curry
method: ['Clean, wash and cut mutton into half inch pieces on the bone. Heat oil, add bay leaves, green cardamoms, black cardamom, cinnamon, cloves, black peppercorns and onions.', 'Saute till onions turn golden. Add ginger paste, garlic paste, red chilli powder, coriander powder and turmeric powder and saute for two tot here minutes. Add mutton pieces, cook for some time and then add two cups of water.', 'When the mixture comes to a boil, cover, reduce heat and cook till mutton is almost done. Add tomatoes and salt and continue cooking till mutton is soft. Serve hot.']

title: Walnut And Grape Raita
method: ['Heat oil in a non stick kadai. Add cumin seeds and saute till fragrant. Halve the grapes and remove the seeds.', 'Add walnuts to the kadai and saute. Add grapes, red chilli powder, roasted cumin powder, salt and saute.', 'Add salt to yogurt and mix. Keeping aside a little walnut-grape mixture, transfer the rest into a serving bowl.', 'Add the yogurt and mix well.Top it with the remaining walnut-grape mixture. Drizzle Rooh afza and serve.']

title: Eggless Wheat Cinnamon Cookies
method: ['Take butter in a bowl and beat it with an electric beater till smooth. Add  1/4  cup castor sugar and whisk till light. Add vanilla essence and whisk.', 'Sift together wheat flour, nutmeg powder and  1/2  teaspoon cinnamon powder into the bowl and mix well. Add milk and mix to make a dough. Cover and refrigerate for 2-3 hours.', 'Mix together remaining castor sugar and remaining cinnamon powder on a plate.', 'Preheat oven to 180deg C.', 'Roll out the dough into  1/2  cm thick sheet and cut into roundels with a medium sized round cookie cutter.', 'Place the cookies on a baking tray and sprinkle some cinnamon-sugar mixture on top.', 'Keep the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 10-15 minutes. Remove the tray from oven and cool.', 'Stack the cookies on a serving plate and serve.']

title: Mooli ke Paranthe
method: ['Chop the leaves of the radishes. Grate the radishes into a bowl. Add salt, mix well and set it aside for 10 minutes. Put it on a piece of muslin, gather its edges and squeeze out excess water.', 'Transfer the squeezed radish into a bowl, add the radish leaves, coriander leaves, green chillies, dried pomegranate seeds, red chilli powder and carom seeds and mix well.', 'Divide the dough into equal portions, shape them into balls. Dust each ball with flour and roll into small rotis, place some radish mixture in the centre, gather the edges together and press ensuring that the stuffing is completely covered. Further roll them into paranthas.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa, cook paranthas, one at a time, for 1-2 minutes on each side. Spread some ghee on each side and cook, turning sides, till evenly browned on both sides.', 'Transfer them onto serving plates and serve hot with a pickle of your choice.']

title: Chocolate Banoffee Balls
method: ['To make toffee sauce, heat a non-stick pan. Add sugar and let it melt, stirring once in a while.', 'Add cream and mix well. Add butter and keep mixing till it melts. Transfer into a bowl.', 'Peel and place the banana in another bowl and mash. Reserve some crushed biscuits and add the rest to the banana and mix well.', 'Reserve some toffee sauce, add remaining to the banana mixture and mix well.', 'Divide the mixture into equal portions, shape them into medium sized balls and refrigerate for 30 minutes.', 'Coat the balls with the melted chocolate and refrigerate for 10 minutes.', 'Drizzle reserved toffee sauce and sprinkle reserved crushed biscuits on top and serve.']

title: Cranberry Pistachio Fudge
method: ['Grease a barfi tray with some butter.', 'Heat a non-stick pan. Add chocolate and mix till it melts. Add condensed milk, mix and cook for 5-6 minutes.', 'Add khoya and cook for 2-3 minutes. Add pistachios and cranberries and mix well.', 'Pour the mixture into the greased tray and tap. Cover with an aluminum foil and refrigerate till set.', 'Cut into pieces and serve.']

title: Sev Tomato Sandwich
method: ['Take aloo bhujia in a bowl, add tomato, onion, coriander leaves, green chillies, tomato ketchup and salt and mix well.', 'Apply butter on one side of all the bread slices, place a generous portion of the stuffing on 4 slices, place a cheese slice on top of the stuffing and cover each sandwich with another slice of bread with butter side down. Apply butter on top of all the sandwiches.', 'Melt butter on a non-stick tawa. Place each sandwich on it and toast, turning sides, till evenly golden brown on both sides.', 'Cut into triangles, arrange on a serving platter and serve hot with potato wedges.']

title: Moghlai Parantha
method: ['Mix refined flour, whole wheat flour, semolina, salt and baking soda in a bowl. Add milk and sufficient water and knead into soft dough. Cover with a damp muslin cloth and set aside for ten minutes.', 'Heat two tablespoons oil in a non-stick pan. Add onions and saute till golden brown. Add ginger-garlic paste and mix well. Add green chillies and saute well. Cook for two to three minutes more. Add tomatoes, garam masalapowder, red chilli powder, salt and turmeric powder and mix well.', 'Add chicken mince and mix well. Add half cup of water and mix well. Cover and cook for five to seven minutes.', 'Roughly chop mint and coriander leaves and add to the chicken and mix. Set aside to cool.', 'Dust the worktop with flour. Apply oil on your palms, take four large portion of the dough and roll out into a big discs.', 'Break eggs in a bowl. Add salt and whisk lightly. Place a portion of the chicken mixture in the centre of each disc.', 'Drizzle some egg mixture and spread evenly on the chicken mixture. Fold the edges to form square paranthe. Seal the edges with the remaining egg mixture.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a shallow non-stick pan. Place a parantha in the oil. Cook on medium heat for four to five minutes on either side. Similarly cook the remaining paranthe.', 'Drain on absorbent paper, cut into squares, arrange them on a serving plate and serve hot garnished with mint sprigs.']

title: Marwari Tahiri
method: ['Heat 1 tablespoon ghee and 1 tablespoon butter in a handi. Add broken cinnamon, cloves, torn bay leaves, broken dried red chillies and onions.', 'Saute till onions are well browned. Add garlic and saute for 1 minute. Add 1 tablespoon ginger-green chilli paste, mix and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add capsicum, green peas and carrot and saute for 2 minutes.Add pureed tomatoes, mix and add gatte. Mix and cook for 2 minutes.', 'Add 1 cup masoor dal, mix and cook for 1 minute. Add 1 tablespoon red chilli powder, 1 tablespoon turmeric powder, salt and mix. Add 1 1/2  cups rice and mix well.', 'Add 1 tablespoon fenugreek powder and mix well. Cook for 1 minute. Remove from heat and set aside.Heat remaining butter and 2 tablespoons ghee in a non-stick pan.', 'Add remaining ginger-green chilli paste and saute for 1 minute.Add remaining dal, remaining red chilli powder, remaining turmeric powder, coriander powder,  1/2  teaspoon fenugreek powder and chaat masala. Mix well and cook for 2 minutes.', 'Apply 1 teaspoon ghee on the base of another handi. Spread a layer of 1 cup white rice,  1/2  a layer of cooked dal mixture and lastly a layer of  1/2  of the cooked rice.', 'Spread another portion of white rice, top with a layer of remaining cooked dal mixture and lastly remaining cooked rice layer. Spread remaining white rice on top, cover and cook for 2 minutes.', 'Switch off heat, open lid and press lightly. Transfer tahiri in a serving dish. Garnish with fried onions, dried fenugreek leaves, chopped coriander leaves and fried cashew nuts. Serve hot.']

title: Classic Seafood Paella
method: ['Heat olive oil in a pan. Add garlic and saute. Add onions and saute till translucent.', 'Add red and yellow bell pepper and saute. Add crushed black peppercorns and mix.', 'Add prawns, clams, small fish and saute. Cover and cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add salt, sugar and tomatoes and mix well. Add rice and mix well.', 'Add fish stock, saffron dissolved in milk and chilli flakes and mix well.', 'Add 2 tbsps extra virgin olive oil. Chop basil leaves and add to the paella pan.', 'Add green peas and mix well. Cover and cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Sprinkle some extra virgin olive oil. Transfer in a serving plate.', 'Sprinkle some more extra virgin olive oil and serve hot.']

title: Chawal Ke Pakode
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Chop onions, ginger and mint leaves in a chopper.', 'Put rice in a bowl, add onion-ginger-mint leaves mixture, gram flour, salt, green chillies and chaat masala and mix well.', 'Shape into medium sized balls and slide into hot oil. Deep fry till golden and crisp.', 'Drain on absorbent paper and serve hot.']

title: Tomato Saar - SK Khazana
method: ['Halve the tomatoes and put into a blender jar and blend into a fine puree. Strain through a sieve into a bowl. Water can be added in blender to remove remaining puree. 4 cups puree is needed.', 'Put the puree into a deep non-stick pan, switch on heat. Add salt, green chilli, roasted cumin powder and red chilli powder and mix well. Add sufficient water. The consistency should be of a soup. Let the mixture come to a boil on medium heat.', 'Add jaggery and let it cook for a minute or till the jaggery dissolves completely. Add coconut milk and mix well. Let it simmer without it coming to a boil.', 'Heat ghee in a non-stick tempering non-stick pan, add mustard seeds and let them splutter.', 'Add curry leaves, dry red chillies and asafoetida and saute for  1/2  minute. Add the tempering to the saar, cover the pan immediately and let it simmer for 1 minute.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot with steamed rice.']

title: Chonkha Matar
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add cumin seeds and saute till they change colour. Add ginger and green chilli and saute till one minute.', 'Add red chilli powder, turmeric powder and coriander powder, mix well and saute for half a minute. Add green peas and toss to mix.', 'Cook till they are tender. Add salt and garam masala powder and mix well. Add lemon juice and coriander leaves and mix well. Garnish with ginger strips and serve hot.']

title: Shakarkandi Chaat - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a kadai, slide in the potato cubes and deep-fry till golden brown. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Deep-fry sweet potato cubes in the same oil till golden brown. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Put fried potatoes and sweet potato cubes in a bowl. Add date-tamarind chutney, green chutney and mix. Add chilli powder, chaat masala, cumin powder, green chillies, lemon juice and coriander leaves and mix well.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander leaves, pomegranate pearls and ginger strips and serve immediately.']

title: Coconut Rabdi
method: ['Bring the milk to a boil in a wide shallow pan, then reduce heat and cook on low heat. As the cream forms on the surface, push it towards the edge and continue to cook pushing the cream to the edge each time it forms on the surface.', 'Add sugar and saffron and stir until the milk is less than quarter of the original quantity. Scrape the cream formed on the sides back into the milk. Take it off the heat, cool down to room temperature and chill in the refrigerator.', 'Heat a non-stick pan, add desiccated coconut and roast for 1-2 minutes or till fragrant. Add fresh coconut, mix well and continue to saute on low heat.', 'Put tender coconut flesh in a chopper and crush. Add this to the cooled rabdi and mix.', 'Cool the roasted fresh and desiccated coconut and add to the rabdi mixture. Mix well, transfer into a chilled tender coconut shell, garnish with a few saffron strands and keep it in the refrigerator to chill.', 'Pour into individual serving bowls and serve chilled.']

title: Fried Chicken and Caramelised Onion Rice - SK Khaz
method: ['Heat 1 tablespoon ghee in a pressure cooker, add cinnamon, bay leaf, cloves and peppercorns and saute till fragrant.', 'Add 1 cup onions, mix and saute. Add sugar, mix and cook till the onions are lightly caramelised.', 'Add rice and mix well. Add chicken stock and mix well. Add salt, mix, cover and cook under pressure on high heat till one whistle is given out. Reduce heat and cook further for 5-7 minutes.', 'Take chicken cubes in a bowl, add chilli powder, coriander-cumin powder, turmeric powder, ginger-garlic paste and salt and mix well. Add yogurt and mix well. Set aside for 10-15 minutes.', 'Heat remaining ghee in a non-stick pan, add green chillies and saute for a minute. Add remaining onions and saute till they are caramelised.', 'Add marinated chicken, mix and cook for 8-10 minutes or till the chicken is fully done.', 'Add honey and lemon juice, switch off heat and mix well. Roughly chop mint and coriander sprigs and add, mix well.', 'Spread the rice on a serving platter, put the chicken over it in the centre, garnish with a mint sprig and serve hot.']

title: Chilli Chicken
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Take chicken cubes in a bowl, break egg and add. Add salt,  1/2  teaspoon white pepper powder, 2 teaspoons garlic and coriander leaves and mix well. Add 2-3 tablespoons cornflour and mix well.', 'Slide the marinated chicken cubes into hot oil and deep-fry till golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan, add remaining garlic and saute for 30 seconds. Add ginger and green chillies, mix and saute for 30 seconds.', 'Add onion cubes and green capsicum squares, mix and saute for 1 minute. Add salt and white pepper powder and mix well. Add vinegar and soy sauce and mix well.', 'Mix 1 tablespoon cornflour with some water in a small bowl to make a smooth slurry.', 'Add  1/2  cup water to chicken mixture and mix. Add 2 tablespoons slurry, mix and cook till the mixture thickens. Add fried chicken cubes, toss well and cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot garnished with spring onion greens.']

title: Uttappam Sandwich
method: ['Chop onions, tomatoes, green capsicum, yellow capsicum, red capsicum and a few sprigs of fresh coriander in a chopper and transfer into a bowl.', 'Take some batter in a bowl, add salt and spinach puree and mix well.', 'Heat a little oil on a non-stick tawa and wipe with a damp muslin cloth. Spread small amounts of batter to make 3 little uttappams at a little distance from each other.', 'Spread a little chopped vegetables on each. Sprinkle a little green chillies on each and cook on medium heat.', 'Drizzle a little oil all around the uttappams. When the underside is done, turn them over and cook the other side similarly.', 'Remove the uttappams from the tawa and keep them on the worktop. Keep a cheese slice over one uttappam, spread a little coconut chutney and place another uttappam over it. Keep another cheese slice over the 2nd uttappam and spread a little chutney and place the third uttappam over it. Make more sandwiches similarly.', 'Halve these sandwiches and serve immediately.']

title: Coffee Chocolate Milkshake
method: ['Put 4-6 vanilla ice cream, 4-6 chocolate ice cream, few ice cubes, coffee decoction, milk and chocolate sauceinto a blender jar and blend to a smooth mixture.', 'Pour some chocolate sauce in 4 tall serving glasses and swirl. Pour the milkshake into them. Place 1 scoop of vanilla ice cream and 1 scoop of chocolate ice cream on top in each glass.', 'Sprinkle some dark chocolate chips and serve immediately.']

title: Peach Crumble
method: ['Preheat oven at 180oC.', 'Take peaches in a bowl. Add sugar and mix. Add  1/4  tsp Keya Sri Lankan Cinnamon Powder and mix well.', 'Divide the peach mixture equally into 4 individual ramekin moulds.', 'To make crumble, combine flour, raw sugar, butter and remaining Keya Sri Lankan Cinnamon Powder in another bowl and mix till the mixture resembles breadcrumbs.', 'Divide the crumble equally over the peaches in the moulds. Place the moulds on a baking tray, put the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 15 minutes.', 'Serve warm.']

title: Gajar Halwa Kulfi Bombs
method: ['Cut the kulfis into 4 cms long pieces. Coat each piece of kulfi with gajar halwa and freeze them.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Take refined flour, cornflour, cinnamon powder, vanilla essence, powdered sugar and baking soda in a bowl. Add sufficient water and whisk well to make a thick and smooth batter.', 'Dip the coated kulfis in this batter, slide into hot oil and deep fry till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Arrange them on a serving plate. Drizzle chocolate sauce over them, sift cocoa powder and powdered sugar and sprinkle chocolate vermicelli on top. Crush and sprinkle California walnuts and drizzle some more chocolate sauce.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Muesli with Strawberries
method: ['Quarter the apple and grate into a bowl. Add yogurt, oats and apple juice and mix well.', 'Add cinnamon powder and honey and mix well. Keep the bowl in the refrigerator to chill overnight.', 'Cut 8 strawberries into small cubes. Divide them equally into 4 serving glass cups. In each cup add  1/2  tablespoon pumpkin seeds,  1/2  tablespoon almond flakes and  1/2  tablespoon chopped walnuts.', 'Chop the remaining strawberries. Fill the cups almost to the top with the chilled oats mixture.', 'Divide the chopped strawberries equally between the 4 cups, garnish with a little pumpkin seeds, almond flakes and chopped walnuts and serve immediately.']

title: Mangodi Ki Sabzi
method: ['Heat two tablespoons oil in a kadai and saute mangodi until crisp and slightly browned. Drain and set aside.', 'Beat yogurt, add gram flour, salt, red chilli powder, coriander powder and turmeric powder and mix well. Heat remaining oil in a kadai. Add bay leaf, cumin seeds, dry red chillies and saute.', 'Add ginger paste, mangodi, tomato puree and yogurt mixture. Add one cup of water and mix well. Add garam masala powder and coriander leaves.', 'Cook for a few minutes and serve hot.']

title: Milk Powder Burfi - SK Khazana
method: ['Grease a burfi tray with some ghee.', 'Heat ghee in a deep non-stick pan and add milk. Mix and let the mixture come to a boil, stirring continuously.', 'Add milk powder and sugar and mix well. Cook on medium heat, stirring continuously, till the mixture thickens and leaves the sides of pan.', 'Add green cardamom powder and mix well.', 'Transfer half the mixture into burfi tray and spread evenly on half the tray. Add soaked saffron milk to the remaining mixture and mix well. Spread it evenly over the first mixture.', 'Garnish with almond and pistachio slivers. Refrigerate till set.', 'Cut into squares and serve immediately.']

title: Chicken Bread Pot - SK Khazana
method: ['Preheat the oven to 180degC.', 'Heat butter in a non-stick pan, add refined flour, mix well and saute on medium heat till the mixture is lightly coloured.', 'Add milk, mix well so that no lumps form. Cook on medium heat for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add chicken cubes, salt, crushed black peppercorns, thyme and oregano and mix well. Cook for 3-4 minutes on medium heat.', 'Add cheese and mix well. Cook for 2-3 minutes and take it off heat.', 'Scoop out some bread from the centre of each bread half to make a cavity. Keep the cut out bread pieces aside.', 'Fill  2/3  of the cavity with chicken mixture, put out small pieces of the cut out bread over the chicken mixture. Put some more chicken mixture in the cavity.', 'Keep the stuffed bread halves on a baking tray. Break an egg on top of each bread half. Keep the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 5-7 minutes.', 'Garnish each bread half with red cherry tomatoes and a sprig of fresh parsley. Serve hot.']

title: Jain Olive and Tomato Pasta
method: ['Heat olive oil in a non-stick pan. Add tomato puree, oregano and chilli flakes and mix well. Add salt and mix.', 'Add tomato ketchup and torn basil leaves, mix and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add red bell pepper and mix well. Add cream and cheese, mix well and cook for 2 minutes.', 'Add pasta and mix well.Add olives and switch off the heat. Mix well.', 'Serve hot garnished with a basil leaf.']

title: Ham and Cheese Sandwich
method: ['Preheat oven at 180oC.', 'Place bread slices on a worktop. Spread 2 teaspoons butter n each slice. Sprinkle crushed peppercorns and  1/2  teaspoon red chilli flakes on top of each slice.', 'Place chicken ham slices on each slice. Sprinkle crushed peppercorns and  1/2  teaspoon red chilli flakes on each slice.', 'Top with 2 tablespoons grated cheese on each, sprinkle some more red chilli flakes and crushed peppercorns on top.', 'Brush a baking tray with butter and place the sandwiches on it. Put the tray in the preheated oven and let the cheese melt.', 'Cut into small squares and serve hot.']

title: Murgh aur Masoor ki Dal - Sk Khazana
method: ['Heat a deep non-stick pan on medium heat, add chicken, onions, yogurt, garlic and ginger. Increase heat to high. Add 1 1/2  tbsps oil, cumin seeds, salt, turmeric powder, red chilli powder, coriander powder and cumin powder and mix well. .', 'Add  1/2  cup water, 3 green chillies and 1 1/2  tbsps oil saute on high heat for 4-5 minutes.', 'Reduce heat, cover the pan and cook for 10-15 minutes or till the chicken is almost done. Add boiled whole maoor dal and mix well.', 'Add coriander leaves, ginger strips and desi ghee. Add about  1/2  -  3/4  cup water to adjust the consistency, mix well. Cover and cook for 5-7 minutes.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander, remaining green chillies and ginger strips and serve hot with chapattis or phulkas or steamed rice.']

title: Kolhapuri Sukka Mutton
method: ['Grate dry coconut and dry roast on a hot tawa till light golden brown, stirring continuously to ensure that it does not burn. Slice half the onions and chop the rest.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai and deep fry sliced onions till golden brown. Drain and plate on an absorbent paper and cool.', 'Grind them with roasted khopra and a little war water, to a fine paste. Rub salt and turmeric powder on mutton pieces.', 'Pressure cook with two and half cups of water for four to five whistles or till mutton is almost cooked. Heat three tablespoons of oil in a thick-bottomed pan. Add chopped onions, cook till golden brown.', 'Stir in ginger paste and garlic paste and saute for a minute. Add tomatoes and saute for five minutes. Add Sankeshwari red chilli powder and dry coconut-onion paste. Cook on high heat till oil leaves the masala.', 'Add boiled mutton and salt. Stir continuously and cook further for ten minutes till the consistency of the gravy is thick and mutton pieces are nicely coated with masala.', 'Sprinkle green cardamom powder and garam masala powder and serve hot.']

title: Corn Muffins with Cheesy Yogurt Dip
method: ['Preheat oven to180deg C.', 'Mix together corn, salt, crushed peppercorns, chili flakes and cornflour in a bowl.', 'Add eggs and mix well. Add panko and mix again.', 'Fill this mixture into the dents on a silicon muffin mould tray, place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 10-15 minutes. Remove from oven and cool down to room temperature.', 'Put yogurt, cream cheese, salt, crushed peppercorns and chives in another bowl and mix well. Refrigerate to chill.', 'Demould and place the muffins on a serving platter. Top with the cheesy yogurt dip and sprinkle spring onion greens. Serve immediately.']

title: Mixed Vegetable And Chickpea Hotpot
method: ['Preheat the oven to 170degC.', 'Heat one tablespoon olive oil in a deep non stick pan. Add the spring onions, garlic, carrots, salt and onion and mix.', 'Cover and cook for three to four minutes. Add refined flour and mix. Add chickpeas and mix. Add half the spring onion greens, red capsicum, crushed black peppercorns and cream and mix Transfer the mixture into a baking dish.', 'Place the potato slices, overlapping each other, till they cover the entire surface. Sprinkle salt, parsley and the remaining spring onion greens.', 'Drizzle the remaining olive oil over the potatoes. Keep the baking dish in the preheated oven and bake till the potatoes are fully cooked and lightly coloured.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Chicken Mayo Sandwich
ingredients: ['2 boneless chicken breasts, grilled and shredded', ' 1/4  cup mayonnaise', '4 croissants', ' 1/2  medium purple cabbage, shredded', 'Crushed black peppercorns to taste', '8-10 pecan nuts', 'Salt to taste', '1 teaspoon Dijon mustard paste', 'Few lollo rosso lettuce leaves', 'Potato chips for serving']
method: ['Halve the croissants vertically.', 'Mix together chicken, cabbage, crushed peppercorns, pecan nuts, salt, mayonnaise and Dijon mustard paste in a bowl.', 'To prepare one sandwich, place a lollo rosso lettuce leaf on one halved base of croissants, spread some chicken mixture and cover with the top halved croissant.', 'Serve immediately with some potato chips.']

title: Crispy Chicken-Cook Smart
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a wok.', 'Take chicken strips in a bowl. Add refined flour, salt and cornflour and mix gently with your hand. Make sure that the chicken strips do not stick to one another.', 'Deep-fry chicken strips in hot oil till golden and crisp.', 'Halve the onion and slice both halves horizontally.', 'Take 4 teaspoons oil from the wok and add to another non-stick wok and heat.', 'Add onion to the oil in the second wok and saute. Add green and red capsicum strips and saute well.', 'Drain the chicken and add to the onion in the other wok. . Add green chillies, green chilli sauce and salt. Mix well and cook for a minute.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Nasi Goreng
method: ['Heat one tablespoon of oil in a pan, add cooked rice and toss it with Sichuan sauce.', 'Sprinkle spring onions and mix gently and set aside. Keep it warm.', 'Mix lemon juice, salt, dark soy sauce, red chilli powder and honey well.', 'Marinate the chicken supremes in it for about twenty to thirty minutes.', 'Skewer them onto satay sticks lengthwise so that the entire supreme remains straight.', 'Heat two tablespoons of oil in a non-stick pan and place the satay sticks on it and cook till the chicken supremes are done.', 'Set aside. To make the peanut sauce heat one tablespoon oil in a pan, add chopped garlic and saute.', 'Add onion and continue to saute for a minute.', 'Add crushed peanuts, tomato puree, soy sauce and mix. Add a little water and cook for three to four minutes.', 'Add red chilli powder, honey and lemon juice. Add salt to the sauce and mix. Heat sufficient oil in a deep pan and deep-fry the prawn wafers.', 'Drain on absorbent paper and set aside. Heat one teaspoon of oil in a pan and fry the egg.', 'To serve arrange the rice on one side of a platter, place the chicken satay on a side.', 'Arrange the prawn wafers on another side. Pour peanut sauce over the chicken.', 'Place the fried egg on one side. Serve immediately garnished with spring onion greens.']

title: Beetroot Soup
method: ['Heat oil in a pressure cooker, add bay leaves, onions, beetroot and mix. Add bottle gourd, carrots, garlic cloves, crushed black peppercorns, salt and mix.', 'Add 4 cups water and mix well. Cover with the lid and cook under pressure til 2-3 whistles are given out.', 'Open the lid when the pressure reduces completely, cool the mixture and grind to a smooth puree. Strain the mixture into a bowl.', 'Heat a non stick pan, pour the soup into it and water to adjust consistency and bring it to a boil.Transfer into serving bowls and serve hot.']

title: Double ka Meetha - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat sufficient ghee in a kadai.', 'Cut bread slices into small squares and deep-fry in hot oil till golden brown. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Heat milk in a deep vessel and cook, stirring occasionally, it reduces to almost half its original volume.', 'Preheat oven to 180o C.', 'Add castor sugar to the milk, mix well and cook till the sugar dissolves.', 'Add saffron and cardamom powder, mix well and let the mixture come to a boil.', 'Add fried bread squares, rose water, pistachios, cucumber seeds, chironji and almonds and cook for 1 minute.', 'Keep the vessel in the preheated oven and bake for 8-10 minutes.', 'Take the vessel out of the oven, garnish with silver varq and serve warm.']

title: Cherry Tomato Jam
method: ['Boil sufficient water in a deep non-stick pan, give a slight slit on the tomatoes and put them in the boiling water for 15 seconds. Strain and soak in chilled water.', 'Put sugar in another non-stick pan, add 1 cup water and cook.', 'Strain the tomatoes from cold water and peel them, cut a thin slice from the top and squeeze lightly to remove seeds. Stuff each tomato with an almond if you wish.', 'Add cloves and cinnamon to the sugar syrup. Add lemon juice and mix.', 'Add tomatoes and almonds and mix and cook. Add lemon rind and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Drain tomatoes and almonds and put into a sterilized bottle. Cook the syrup further till it thickens, then pour it into the bottle.', 'If you wish you can keep 1-2 tomatoes and almonds in a soup spoon and serve.']

title: Samandhi Podi
method: ['Dry roast coconut, red chillies, coriander powder, black pepper powder, fenugreek seeds and curry leaves in a non-stick pan till the coconut is evenly browned. Set aside to cool.', 'Transfer the red chillies into a blender and grind it with salt. Add rest of the coconut mixture and grind again.', 'Add ginger powder and tamarind and grind again to a coarse powder.', 'Store in air tight bottle.']

title: Indian Style Crab Soup
ingredients: ['4 crabs cleaned', '1 tablespoon butter', '4-5 black peppercorns', 'Bay leaves', '1/2 inch cinnamon stick', '1 medium onion, finely chopped', '1 medium tomato, finely chopped', 'Salt to taste', '1 tablespoon garlic, chopped', '1 teaspoon ginger, chopped', '1/4 teaspoon turmeric powder']
