method: ['Heat butter in a non-stick pan add peppercorns, bay leaves, cinnamon and onion and mix. Saute till lightly browned. Add tomato and salt and cook for 3-4 minutes', 'Add crabs and saute for 2-3 minutes. Add garlic, ginger, turmeric powder and mix well.', 'Add 5 cups of water and cook on low heat for 10-12 minutes.', 'Remove the crab pieces and strain the soup into a bowl.', 'Place the crab pieces in a serving bowl and pour the strained soup over it.', 'Serve piping hot.']

title: Sesame Chicken
method: ['Heat a non-stick wok, add white sesame seeds and dry roast sesame seeds till the seeds start popping. Transfer into a bowl and set aside to cool.', 'Heat oil in the same non-stick wok.', 'Take chicken pieces in a bowl. Add 2 tbsps chilli sauce, refined flour and egg white and mix well.', "Put chicken pieces in the wok, one by one, so that they don't stick to each other and cook for 2 minutes.", 'Grate ginger into the pan, add  1/4  cup water and mix.', 'Add remaining chilli sauce and soy sauce, mix well and cook till done.', 'Add cornflour slurry and mix well. Add honey and mix well.', 'Add vinegar and mix well. Add crushed red chillies and salt and mix well.', 'Transfer chicken onto a serving platter, sprinkle roasted sesame seeds on top and serve hot.']

title: Sandwich Platter
method: ['Cut bread loaf into slices.', 'Heat 1 tsp butter each in non-stick pan 1 and non-stick pan 2. Place 2 bread slices in pan 1 and 3 bread slices in pan 2 and toast them well from both sides.', 'Fold both cheese slices and place them on toasts in pan 1. Let the cheese melt slightly.', 'To make Open Face Sandwich with Vegetables (one portion), apply 1 tsp butter each on both sides of 2 remaining bread slices that are not toasted. Place 5-6 asparagus pieces on each slice and sprinkle  1/2  tsp corn kernels each on both slices.', 'Slice olives and divide them equally on both slices. Add 2 gherkin slices on each slice and sprinkle salt and crushed peppercorns on top. Grate cheese on each slice, put the open sandwiches on a baking tray, put the tray in oven and bake at 180oC for 5 minutes or till the cheese melts.', 'To make Classic Cheese Sandwich (one portion), place one toasted bread slice, cheese side down on the other bread slice with cheese and heat on low flame till the cheese melts completely. Cut into halves before serving.', 'To make Club Sandwich (one portion), place the 3 toasted bread slices on the worktop. Apply 1 tbsp mayonnaise each and 1 tsp mustard sauce each on all 3 slices. Tear lettuce and place on one slice alongwith tomato slices. Place cheese slice on top and cover with second toasted slice, mayonnaise side down.', 'Apply remaining mayonnaise and remaining mustard sauce on top of the 2nd slice. Slice cooked chicken and put the chicken slices on top.', 'Heat 1 tsp oil in another non-stick pan. Break the egg in it and cook a sunny-side up. Sprinkle salt and crushed peppercorns on top, flip and cook the other side as well. Remove from heat, fold and place over the chicken slices. Cover with the third toasted slice, mayonnaise side down. Secure with toothpicks.', 'Place the sandwiches on a platter and serve immediately with tomato ketchup.']

title: Mozzarella Stuffed Chillies
method: ['Slit Bhavnagri chillies and remove the seeds. Slit the pickled Jalapeno chillies and remove seeds. Take grated cheese in a bowl, add dried mixed herbs and mix.', 'Stuff this mixture into the chillies. Mix cornstarch, salt and water to make a batter. Dip the chillies in the batter then roll in the breadcrumbs.', 'Repeat the process to get a double coating. Heat sufficient oil in a deep pan till very hot and deep fry the chillies till golden brown. Drain and place on an absorbent paper. Serve hot.']

title: Dahiwale Tinde
method: ['Keep some gourds whole and halve the rest. Make incisions on all pieces and whole ones.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add asafoetida, mustard seeds and cumin seeds and let the seeds splutter.', 'Add curry leaves, gourds and salt and mix well. Add turmeric powder and mix. Add  1/4  cup water, mix well, cover and cook for 1 minute.', 'Slit green chillies and add. Mix, cover and cook for 4-5 minutes.', 'Take yogurt in a bowl, add refined flour and whisk well.', 'Add  1/4  cup water to the pan, cover and cook for 5 minutes. Add yogurt mixture and mix well.', 'Roughly chop coriander leaves and add. Mix well. Cover and cook on low heat for  1/2  hour.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot.']

title: Stuffed Idlis-SK Khazana
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add mustard seeds and saute till the seeds splutter.', 'Add asafoetida and curry leaves, mix and let the leaves crackle. Add green chillies, ginger and garlic, mix and saute well.', 'Add potatoes and mix. Add salt, turmeric powder and coriander leaves and mix well. Add some water, mix, cover and cook till the mixture dries. Remove from heat and set aside to cool.', 'Heat sufficient water in a steamer.', 'Half fill greased idli moulds fitted on a stand with the idli batter. Put some cooked mixture over the batter and top with some more batter.', 'Place the stand in the steamer, cover and steam for 8-10 minutes.', 'Take the moulds out of the steamer and let them stand for a while. Demould the idlis and serve hot with coconut chutney.']

title: Mango Kesari - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat ghee in a non-stick kadai, add semolina, cashewnuts and raisins, mix and saute till fragrant.', 'Add saffron and mix well and saute till semolina turns golden brown.', 'Add mango pieces mix well and saute for 1-2 minutes. Add 1 1/2  cups hot water and stir continuously to avoid any lumps. Cover and cook till the moisture evaporates.', 'Add sugar and mix well, cook for 5-10 minutes or till the sugar dissolves completely.', 'Add green cardamom powder and mix well. Take the pan off the heat.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with slivered almonds, slivered pistachios and saffron and serve warm.']

title: Quick Garlic Spaghetti
method: ['Heat olive oil in a non-stick pan. Add garlic and saute till light golden.', 'Add vegetable stock and salt and mix. Add spaghetti and toss to mix.', 'Add parsley and parmesan cheese, mix and cook for 1 minute.', 'Serve hot garnished with some parmesan cheese.']

title: Palak Paneer
method: ['Finely chop onion and cut paneer into 1-inch cubes.', 'Boil sufficient water in a deep pan. Add spinach leaves and blanch fir 1 minute. Drain into iced cold water.', 'Drain the spinach leaves and squeeze out excess water and put into a mixer jar. Add green chilli and 1/2 cup water and grind to a fine paste.', 'Heat oil in a non stick pan, add cumin seeds and let them change colour.', 'Add the chopped onions and saute till translucent. Add garlic, mix and cook for a minute.', 'Add the ground spinach paste, mix and cook for 1-2 minutes. Add salt, garam masala powder, paneer cubes and fresh cream and gently mix. Cook for 1 minute.', 'Add dried fenugreek leaves powder, mix and cook for 1 minute. Take the pan off the heat.', 'Garnish with fresh cream and serve hot with parantha.']

title: Kachche Kele Ki Tikki
method: ['Cut each raw banana into three pieces without peeling them. Steam them in a steamer for ten minutes. Cool, peel and grate them.', 'Place green peas, green chillies and coriander leaves in a grinder. Grind into a coarse mixture. Add to grated bananas.', 'Add dried mango powder, garam masala powder, salt, asafoetida, red chilli powder and mix well. Divide into equal portions.', 'Grease your palms and shape each portion into a round tikki at least half inch thick. Heat two to three tablespoons oil in a non stick pan.', 'Place five to six tikkis at a time in the pan and shallow fry for three to four minutes or till the underside is light golden in colour.', 'Turn over and continue to cook for three to four minutes more or till the other side is equally light golden in colour. Serve hot with chutney or ketchup.']

title: Chilli Zucchini Toast
method: ['Wash, wipe dry and grate zucchini into a bowl.', 'Heat 1 tbsp olive oil in a non-stick pan, add garlic and onion, mix and saute for 1 minute. Add zucchini and mix well.', 'Cut bread slices into roundels with a round cookie cutter. Heat a non-stick pan, place the bread roundels in it and toast.', 'Add salt and crushed peppercorns to the zucchini and mix well. Cook on high heat till zucchini is done.', 'Add 1 tbsp refined flour to the zucchini mixture, mix well and saute till the raw smells disappear. Add green chillies and mix well.', 'Transfer the zucchini mixture into a bowl, add cottage cheese, potato and breadcrumbs and mix well.', 'Heat sufficient oil in another non-stick pan.', 'Spread generous amount of chilli-zucchini mixture evenly on one side of the toasted bread roundels, sprinkle refined flour on top, place them in the pan zucchini side facing downwards and shallow-fry till the underside is golden.', 'Arrange the chilli zucchini toasts on a serving plate, garnish with red capsicum curls and alfalfa sprouts and serve hot.']

title: Smoky Paneer Wrap
method: ['Combine vinegar and green chillies in a bowl.', 'Heat oil in a pan; add garlic paste and ginger paste and saute for half a minute. Add onion and continue to saute for half a minute longer.', 'Add capsicum, red chilli powder, turmeric powder, amchur, salt and paneer and saute over medium heat for two minutes.', 'Add bean sprouts and continue to saute for another minute. Remove from heat and set aside.', 'To obtain a smoky flavour, place a live charcoal in a bowl and place the bowl in the centre of the paneer mixture. Pour a tablespoon of hot ghee over the charcoal, cover immediately and leave for three to four minutes. Remove the bowl from the paneer mixture.', 'To make the wraps, divide the paneer mixture into four equal portions. Place a lettuce leaf on a roomali roti. Spread a portion of paneer mixture over the roti and drizzle with half a teaspoon of chilli-vinegar.', 'Roll up and wrap in aluminium foil and serve immediately.']

title: Onion Tomato Chutney - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a non-stick pan. Add garlic, 2 broken red chillies, asafoetida and onion, mix and saute till onion turns translucent.', 'Add tomatoes and mix well. Add sugar and salt, mix well, cover and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add little water, mix, cover and cook till tomatoes turn soft and pulpy. Remove from heat and cool.', 'Blend the tomato mixture to a smooth chutney and transfer into a serving bowl.', 'Heat remaining oil in another non-stick pan. Add mustard seeds and let them splutter. Add black gram and saute well.', 'Add remaining broken red chilli and curry leaves, mix and saute for 15 seconds.', 'Pour the tempering over the chutney and mix well.', 'Serve immediately with hot idlis.']

title: Bhindi Masala
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds and saute till the seeds chance colour.', 'Add onions, mix and saute till translucent. Add green chillies, mix and saute for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add ladyfingers, mix and saute for 3-4 minutes. Add red chilli powder, turmeric powder, coriander powder and salt and mix well. Cook till the ladyfingers are done.', 'Add dried mango powder and coriander leaves and mix gently.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander sprig and serve hot.']

title: Corn Fritters
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Combine cream style corn, breadcrumbs, spring onion greens, red chilli flakes, black pepper powder, salt and mix. Add cornstarch and mix well.', 'Shape them in balls and flatten to shape them into fritters. Deep fry in hot oil till golden brown in colour. Drain on absorbent paper', 'Serve hot.']

title: Mixed Fruit Chaat
method: ['Cut pineapple, watermelon, pears, apples, green apples, melon into one inch sized pieces. Halve the star fruit and then slice thinly.', 'Take all the cut fruits in a big bowl. Roast cumin seeds nicely. Grind the roasted cumin seeds coarsely with black salt in a mortar with a pestle. Remove into a bowl.', 'Grind together fresh red chilies, green chillies, coriander leaves and mint leaves in the mortar with a pestle.', 'Add lemon juice, lime juice and grind again. Add the black salt and roasted cumin seed powder and mix well. Add this mixture to the fruit bowl. Add chaat masala.', 'Mix well and serve.']

title: Paneer Parantha
method: ['To make paneer heat milk in a deep non-stick pan, add cream and bring it to a boil. Add vinegar and mix well.', 'Keep a large sieve over a bowl and line it with a muslin cloth. When the milk curdles, pour it in the sieve and strain the excess whey. Gather the edges of the cloth together and put it in cold water. Remove from water, keep it again in the sieve and keep a heavy weight over it. Set aside for 2 hours to let all the water drain away.', 'To make the stuffing, crumble the paneer into a bowl. Add cheese, onion, green chillies, red chilli powder, garam masala, chaat masala, carom seeds, fresh coriander leaves and salt and mix well.', 'Divide the dough into equal portions. Shape into balls and press between your palms, make a cavity in the centre of each ball and add spoonful of paneer stuffing, bring the edges together and seal completely.', 'Roll them out into five inch diameter paranthe.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa, place one parantha at a time on it and cook for  1/2  minute. Flip it and apply ghee on the cooked side. Turn it over again and spread a little more ghee on the other side too. Cook, turning sides, till both sides are evenly cooked and golden brown.', 'Wrap the paranthe in Freshwrapp and pack it in tiffin with yogurt packed in a small container with lid.']

title: Junglee Mushroom Kaliyaan
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a pan.', 'Roughly chop enoki and shimeji mushrooms and put into a .Add button mushrooms, shiitake mushrooms, chanterelle mushrooms, cottage cheese, salt,  1/2  teaspoon garam masala powder, crushed peppercorns, cardamom powder,  1/2  of green chillies and cornflour and mix well.', 'Dampen palms with some water, divide mixture into equal portions and shape them into cones.', 'Deep-fry cones in hot oil till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'To prepare gravy, heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan. Add cumin seeds and saute for 30 seconds. Add remaining green chillies and saute for 30 seconds. Add onions, mix and saute till golden.', 'Add tomatoes, mix and cook till pulpy. Add browned onion paste and ginger-garlic paste, mix and cook for a minute. Add turmeric powder, remaining garam masala powder and salt and mix. Add some water, mix and cook for a minute.', 'Add a large pinch of crushed peppercorns, mix and cook for a minute. Add crushed khoya, mix and cook for a minute. Add cream, mix and cook for 30 seconds.', 'Put the gravy in a serving platter and place the fried cones on it. Garnish with few coriander sprigs.', 'Slice cherry tomato and place on the gravy.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Mango And Lime Sorbet
method: ['Chill the mango cubes in the freezer for a couple of hours. Put them in a smoothie maker.', 'Add ginger, fresh mint leaves, lemon juice and sugar and blend till pulpy. Add ice cubes and blend some more. Pour into individual small glasses and serve immediately.']

title: Gur Aur Badam Ki Phirni
method: ['Boil the milk in a deep non-stick saucepan. Grind the drained rice into a fairly smooth paste. Add a little boiled milk in the ground rice and mix well.', 'Add the rice mixture to the boiling milk. Cook on medium heat till the mixture thickens. Add cardamom powder and rose water to the milk and stir well.', 'Take the pan off the heat and add crushed jaggery. Mix well. Add slivered almonds to the milk mixture and mix well.', 'Pour into individual earthenware bowls. Chill in refrigerator before serving.']

title: Tangdi Kabab - SK Khazana
method: ['Give slits on the chicken drumsticks and put them in la bowl. Add ginger-garlic paste, salt and lemon juice and mix well. Set aside for 10-15 minutes.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add carom seeds and gram flour and saute on low heat for a minute.', 'Smoke mustard oil in another non-stick pan and take the pan off the heat and let the oil cool.', 'For the second marinade, take hung yogurt in a bowl, add red chilli paste, red chilli powder, garam masala powder, chaat masala, roasted gram flour mixture and mustard oil and whisk well.', 'Add chicken drumsticks and mix well. Crush the fenugreek leaves and add and mix well. Set aside to marinate for 10-15 minutes.', 'Preheat the oven to 180degC. Grease a baking tray', 'Transfer the drumsticks on the greased baking tray, keep it in the preheated oven and bake for 10-15 minutes.', 'Arrange them on a serving plate and apply melted butter over each drumstick. Serve hot with green chutney, onion rings and lemon wedge.']

title: Dal Makhni (no onion no garlic) - SK Khazana
method: ['Put the black gram and kidney beans into a pressure cooker. Add sufficient water, salt, 1 teaspoon grated ginger and cook under pressure till the pressure is released for 8-10 times (8-10 whistles).', 'Heat butter and oil in a non-stick pan. Add cumin seeds and saute till fragrant.', 'Add chilli powder and tomato puree, mix well and cook till the oil separates.', 'Add the pressure cooked black gram and kidney beans,mix well and simmer for 15-20 minutes or even upto 30 minutes.', 'Add garam masala powder and cream, mix well and simmer for 10-15 minutes.', 'Garnish with white butter, drizzle some cream and serve hot.']

title: Gulab Jamun Mousse
method: ['Heat cream in a non-stick pan till warm.', 'Add warm cream to chopped chocolate and set aside for 5-10 minutes. Mix well to ensure that there are no lumps. Cool to room temperature.', 'Combine chocolate mixture and whipped cream in another bowl and mix well.', 'Fill the chocolate mixture into a piping bag and cut the tip of the bag.', 'Place 3 gulab jamuns each into 4 individual shot glasses and pipe the chocolate mixture on top. Tap the glasses a little and refrigerate for  1/2  hour.', 'Cut a gulab jamun into one-fourth and garnish each glass with a piece alongwith some pistachio slivers.', 'Serve chilled.']

title: Pav with Chingri Maach
method: ['To prepare pav, grease a steel plate with some butter. Take fresh yeast in a bowl. Add a pinch castor sugar and 2-3 tbsps warm water and set aside to activate.', 'Sift flour in another bowl. Add salt,  1/2  tbsp castor sugar and activated yeast and mix. Add some water and knead into a soft dough. Transfer in another bowl, cover with cling film and prove for 20-25 minutes.', 'Heat a pressure cooker and remove the whistle. Add sea salt, cover and heat.', 'Dust the worktop with some flour, transfer the proven dough and knock back to release air. Divide the dough into equal portions and shape them into balls. These are pavs.', 'Place the pavs on the greased steel plate and prove for 10-15 minutes.', 'To prepare chingri maach, heat mustard oil in a non-stick pan till smoky. Switch off heat and bring down to room temperature.', 'Place Gadre Crab Sticks on the worktop and halve.', 'Heat the mustard oil again in the same non-stick pan. Shallow-fry prawns in hot oil till golden. Drain on absorbent paper. Similarly, shallow-fry crab sticks.', 'Brush the proven pavs with some milk, put a steel ring in heated pressure cooker, place the steel plate on top of it and bake for 10-15 minutes or till done.', 'Add cumin seeds, cardamoms and cinnamon in hot mustard oil and saute till fragrant. Add onion and saute till golden. Add ginger-garlic paste and saute for 30 seconds.', 'Add cloves, coriander powder, turmeric powder, chilli powder and salt, mix and cook for a minute.', 'Add coconut paste, mix and cook for 30 seconds. Add some water to get a gravy consistency, mix and cook for a minute.', 'Add mustard paste and mix. Add raisin puree, mix and cook for a minute or till semi-thick consistency. Put fried crab sticks and prawns, mix and cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Put pavs on a serving platter, put some chingri maach in the center and serve hot garnished with some coriander leaves.']

title: Aloo Tuk Pepper Salt
method: ['Once the boiled baby potatoes are cooled, hold them between the palms and flatten them.', 'Meanwhile heat oil for frying the flattened potatoes.', 'Fry the potatoes till crisp and golden brown in colour. Drain on an absorbent paper.', 'Heat one tablespoon oil in a nonstick wok, add garlic and saute for a minute.', 'Add spring onions, salt, crushed black peppercorns and chilli flakes.', 'Add the fried potatoes and toss everything together to combine well. Serve immediately.']

title: Chicken Tagine With Chickpeas And Mint
method: ['Cut carrot into  1/2  inch thick round slices, cut French beans into  1/2  inch pieces and chop the tomatoes finely.', 'Heat a deep non-stick pan, add olive oil. Add ginger and garlic and saute. Add onion and saute till lightly browned.', 'Add turmeric powder, paprika powder and crushed coriander seeds. Stir and add tomatoes. Reduce heat and add carrot, French beans and chicken and continue to saute for 1 minute.', 'Add chickpeas and saute for 1 minute more. Add 2 cups water and stir. Increase heat, cover and cook. Chop coriander stems finely.', 'When the chicken mixture starts boiling, add salt, roasted cumin powder and coriander stems. Cover and cook till chicken is cooked. Add cinnamon powder and stir. Switch off the heat.', 'Tear fresh mint leaves and add. Serve hot with pita bread or roti or rice.']

title: Doodhi Juice
method: ['Put bottle gourd, cumin seeds, ginger, lemon juice, mint leaves, tulsi, black pepper powder and a little water into a mixer jar and grind till smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.']

title: Fish Paturi
method: ['Take the mustard powder in a bowl. Add six tablespoons water and set aside.', 'In a blender, blend together coconut, poppy seeds, green chillies and coriander to a smooth paste.', 'Mix the blended mixture with the mustard paste. Add turmeric, salt and mustard oil, mix well.', 'In another bowl marinate the fish with salt and lemon juice. Add the marinade and mix well.', 'Heat water for boiling in a steamer.', 'Take a piece of banana leaf and place a piece of marinated fish on it. Cover it from all sides and tie it with a thread.', 'Place these on a steamer tray and steam it for seven to eight minutes. Serve hot.']

title: Apple, Walnut And Pomegranate Salad
method:
['Chop spring onion bulbs.
Halve apple and slice it.', 'To make the dressing, combine spring onion bulbs, salt, crushed peppercorns, mustard paste, wine vinegar, olive oil and honey in a bowl.', 'Tear lettuce leaves and add to the dressing.
Add apples.', 'Halve pomegranate and remove the kernels and add to the salad. Add walnuts and toss to mix.', 'Transfer salad into a serving bowl.
Break the feta cheese and place on top.
Serve immediately.']

title: Choco Lava Cake
method: ['Preheat the oven to 180degC/350degF/Gas Mark 4. Grease the muffin moulds, dust with flour and remove excess flour.', 'Put the chocolate in a microwave-safe bowl, add the butter and melt in the microwave oven on HIGH for one minute. Remove the bowl from oven and stir the contents briskly. Break the eggs into another bowl. Add powdered sugar and blend with a hand blender till light and frothy. Sift the cocoa powder directly in the mixture and mix.', 'Add the melted chocolate-butter mixture and mix. Sift the flour and baking powder directly into the bowl and blend with the hand blender till smooth. Pour the batter into the muffin moulds, taking care not to fill up to the top.', 'Place the moulds in the preheated oven and bake for seven to eight minutes. Take the moulds out of the oven, loosen the edges carefully with a knife. Carefully unmould the cakes onto a serving plate and serve hot.']

title: Oats Uttapam
method: ['Grind oats to a coarse powder and put into a bowl. Add gram flour, yogurt, salt and sufficient water to make a batter of uttappam consistency.', 'Heat a non-stick pan. Apply 1 tsp oil with the help of a tissue paper. Reserve the tissue paper for later use.', 'To make each uttappam, spread a ladleful of the batter in the pan. Sprinkle some green capsicum, onion, tomato and green chilli on the uttappam. When the underside becomes golden, flip. Drizzle 1 tsp oil all around and cook for 2-3 minutes or till the other side becomes equally golden.', 'Transfer onto serving plates and serve hot with chutney of your choice.']

title: Chicken Biryani
method: ['Heat sufficient water in a deep non stick pan, add rice, salt, cinnamon, cloves, green cardamoms and cook.', 'Heat 2 tbsps oil in another non stick pan, add chicken, turmeric powder and salt and saute. Grind ginger, garlic and onion and add to the chicken and mix. Cover and cook for 3-4 minutes.', 'Add green chutney, adjust salt and mix well. Add yogurt and mix. Add garam masala powder and mix again. Take saffron and milk in a small bowl and heat in a microwave oven for  1/2  minute. Add fried onions to chicken and mix and cook till slightly dry.', 'When the rice is almost done strain it into a bowl. Add desi ghee and mix and spread the rice over the chicken. Sprinkle rose petals, saffron milk, rose water, kewra jal, garam masala powder, a few fresh torn mint leaves. Cover the pan and seal with dough. Cook under dum for 10-12 minutes on low heat. You can even keep the pan over a hot tawa and cook till done.', 'Serve hot garnished with fresh mint sprig.']

title: Mango, Cucumber and Rice Salad
method: ['Peel mangoes and cut into cubes. Transfer into a bowl', 'Roughly chop cucumbers and add to the same bowl.', 'Add spring onion and mix well.', 'Finely chop chillies', 'To make dressing, heat sesame oil in a non-stick pan, add sesame seeds, chillies and ginger and saute.', 'Add rice and some grated ginger to the bowl.', 'Roughly chop coriander and add to the bowl along with salt, lemon juice, vinegar, sugar and mix well. Pour tempering over the rice and mix well.', 'Serve immediately garnished with coriander and red chillies and sprinkle sesame seeds.']

title: Pomfret With Salsa Verde
method: ['Prepare salsa verde by blending parsley, pinenuts, gherkins, olives, garlic, lemon juice, salt and pepper powder in a food processor .', 'Gradually add the extra virgin olive oil to form a creamy paste.', 'Adjust the seasoning. Heat the olive oil in a non stick pan.', 'Place the fish fillets, sprinkle salt and cook on low heat.', 'Turn the fish and sprinkle salt on the other side too.', '. Cook till the fish is evenly done on both the sides. Serve the fish with salsa verde.']

title: Hazelnut and Turkey Biryani
method: ['Heat plenty of water in a deep pan.', 'Take U.S. Turkey pieces in a large copper lagan, add yogurt, biryani masala, turmeric powder, red chilli powder, coriander powder, cumin powder and 1 tbsp saffron water. Add salt and mix well.', 'Once the water comes to a boil, add rice, cloves, green cardamoms, black cardamoms, cinnamon and bay leaf, Add salt and mix well. Cook till the rice is  3/4  done.', 'Add  1/4  cup mint leaves,  1/2  cup fried onion and ginger-garlic paste and green chillies in the turkey mixture and mix well. Add lemon juice and Oregon Hazelnuts and mix well.', 'Drain the rice and spread it evenly over the U. S. Turkey mixture.', 'Add cream to the remaining saffron water, mix and drizzle this over the rice. Drizzle screwpine water, rose water and sprinkle remaining fried onion, ginger strips and remaining mint leaves, and drizzle ghee on top and the sides. Lastly sprinkle garam masala powder on top.', 'Apply dough on the edges of the reverse side of the lid and place it over the pan with the dough side facing downwards. Press to seal and place it on high heat for 5-10 minutes. Reduce the heat to low and continue to cook for 45 minutes.', 'Alternately you can keep the lagan in a preheated oven and cook at 160deg C for 45 minutes.', 'Let the biryani rest for 5-10 minutes. Open the lid, transfer the biryani onto a serving platter, garnish with Oregon hazelnuts, fried onions and mint leaves and serve hot.']

title: Tiranga Kheer - SK Khazana
method: ['For the green layer, heat ghee in a non-stick pan, add green peas and saute for 5-6 minutes. Transfer into a blender jar and blend to a coarse paste.', 'Put the same pan back on heat, add the pea paste and reduced milk and mix well. Cook for 3-4 minutes.', 'Add castor sugar, mix and cook till the sugar dissolves. Add green cardamom powder, pistachios and cook for 1 minute. Take the pan off the heat and cool down to room temperature', 'Put some of this mixture into each serving glass, sprinkle some pistachios on top and refrigerate till set.', 'For the white layer, pour the reduced milk into another non-stick pan and let come to a boil. Add rice and mix well, cook till the rice is cooked completely.', 'Add sugar and mix and cook till the sugar dissolves. Add green cardamom powder and mix well. Cook for 2-3 minutes and take the pan off the heat and let it cool down to room temperature.', 'Layer this mixture over the green pea mixture in all the serving glasses. Refrigerate till set.', 'For the orange layer, heat ghee in a third non-stick pan. Add carrots and saute till they soften. Add apricots, mix well and cook for 1-2 minutes. Add reduced milk and mix well. Cook for 3-4 minutes.', 'Add saffron and mix well. Cook for 1 minute. Add castor sugar, mix well and cook till the sugar dissolves. Add green cardamom powder, mix well and cook for a minute and take the pan off the heat.', 'Allow the mixture to cool slightly. Spread a layer of this mixture on top of the white layer in all the glasses and level the top.', 'Garnish with silver varq and slivered pistachios. Refrigerate till set. Serve chilled.']

title: Chilli Cheese Kulcha
method: ['Take flour in a mixing bowl, add baking powder, sugar, salt, butter and milk and knead into soft dough. Cover with a damp cloth and set aside for 40 minutes.', 'Preheat oven to 180@ C.', 'Take blue cheese in another bowl and mash it with a fork. Add coriander leaves, chillies and crushed peppercorns and mix well.', 'Divide the dough into 4 equal portions and shape each into a katori. Place some cheese mixture into each katori, bring the edges together and pinch to seal and shape into a ball. Roll out each stuffed ball into medium thick disc or kulcha.', 'Place the kulchas on a baking tray and brush with some ghee. Put the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes.', 'Bring the tray out of the oven, arrange the kulche on a serving platter and serve hot.']

title: Caramelized Onion and Cheese Tart
method: ['Preheat oven to 180@ C.', 'Heat butter in a non-stick pan, add onions and salt, mix and saute till translucent. Add sugar and saute till onion caramelises.', 'Add pine nuts and crushed black peppercorns and mix well.', 'Place toasted bread squares on a baking tray, spread some caramelised onion mixture on them and top with some cheese.', 'Keep the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 10 minutes.', 'Remove from oven. Garnish each tart with some parsley. Arrange them on a tray and serve immediately.']

title: Papaya Smoothie Bowl
method: ['Peel oranges, separate segments, remove the seeds and put them into a blender jar. Cut carrots into medium sized pieces and add.', 'Add mint leaves, pumpkin seeds, honey and yogurt and blend into a smooth mixture.', 'Add a few pieces of ice cubes and blend again.', 'For serving, take chilled papaya cubes in a bowl, pour the smoothie over them. Garnish with mint sprigs and serve chilled.']

title: Kasoori Methi Paneer
method: ['Heat the oil in a non-stick pan; add the green chilli-ginger paste and cumin seeds and when they start to change colour, add the chilli powder, coriander powder and salt and mix.', 'Immediately add the dried fenugreek leaves and cook on medium heat, stirring frequently, for two to three minutes.', 'Add the tomatoes, stir and cook, over high heat, for two to three minutes. Add half a cup of water, reduce heat, cover and simmer for three to four minutes.', 'Add the paneer cubes, sprinkle the dried mango powder and mix well.', 'Cook till the paneer cubes are fully coated with the masala and serve immediately.']

title: Chicken and Spinach Sliders
method: ['Roughly chop spinach leaves and put in a mixer jar, add chicken mince, garlic, pickled jalapenos and salt and grind. Add toasted sesame seeds and grind again to a coarse paste.', 'Slit burger buns into halves. Toast the buns in a non-stick pan.', 'Dampen your palms in water and divide the mixture into 8 equal portions, shape each into a ball and flatten to make tikkis.', 'Heat 1 tbsp oil in a non-stick pan, add 4 tikkis and, turning sides, till equally golden and crisp on both sides. Cook the remaining tikkis similarly.', 'Take hung yogurt in a bowl, add salt and mix well.', 'Spread some yogurt mixture on each burger bun base half, place a tikki in center, top with some more yogurt mixture and alfalfa sprouts and serve immediately.']

title: Multigrain Pulao
method: ['Roughly chop onions.', 'Heat oil in a deep non-stick pan, add black cardamom, cinnamon, cloves and peppercorns and let them splutter. Add onions and saute till translucent. Add chicken pieces and mix well.', 'Roughly chop potato.', 'Roughly break green chillies and add to the pan. Add barley and mix well. Add brown rice and white rice and mix well. Add potato and mix well.', 'Add dried plums and mix well. Add quinoa and mix well. Add buttermilk and chicken stock and mix again.', 'Add salt and mix well. Cover and cook on medium heat till the grains and chicken are fully done.', 'Transfer the multigrain pulao onto a serving platter, garnish with micro shoots and serve hot.']

title: Hara Bhara Kabab
method: ['Blanch spinach leaves in two cups of boiling salted water for five minutes. Drain, refresh in cold water and squeeze out excess water. Finely chop.', 'Mix spinach, peas and potatoes. Add green chillies, ginger, coriander leaves, chaat masala and salt to taste. Add cornflour for binding.', 'Divide the mixture into twenty-four equal portions. Shape each portion into a ball and then press it between your palms to give it a flat tikki shape.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Deep-fry the tikkis on medium heat for three to four minutes. Drain onto an absorbent paper. Serve hot with a sauce of your choice.']

title: Achari Murgh - SK Khazana
method: ['Take chicken pieces in a bowl, add yogurt,  1/2  tsp turmeric powder, salt and mango pickle and mix well. Set aside to marinate for 10-15 minutes.', 'Heat a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds, fenugreek seeds, mustard seeds, fennel seeds and nigella (onion) seeds and dry roast till fragrant. Transfer into a mortar and coarsely pound with the pestle.', 'Heat mustard oil in a non-stick kadai till it smokes then switch off heat and let the oil cool slightly. Switch on the heat again, add cloves, bay leaves, green chillies and onion, mix and saute till golden brown.', 'Add ginger-garlic paste, mix and saute for 1-2 minutes or till the raw smells disappear. Add tomatoes, mix and saute till the tomatoes become pulpy.', 'Add red chilli powder, turmeric powder, coriander powder and salt and mix well. Add 1 cup water, mix well and continue to saute till oil separates.', 'Add chicken and mix well. Add 2 tsps ground spices and mix well. Cover and cook till the chicken is  3/4  cooked.', 'Uncover the pan and cook till the chicken is cooked completely and the gravy thickened.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, sprinkle a little ground spices, garnish with green chillies and coriander sprig and serve hot.']

title: Khichdi-SK Khazana
method: ['Heat ghee in a non-stick pan. Add cumin seeds and saute till the seeds change colour.', 'Add asafoetida, curry leaves, ginger, green chillies and carrot, mix and saute for a minute.', 'Add French beans and green peas and mix well. Add sorghum, pearl millet, finger millet and amaranth, mix, cover and cook for 2 minutes.', 'Add green gram, rice, turmeric powder and salt and mix well. Add 4 cups water, stir, cover and cook till fully done.', 'Drizzle some ghee on top, garnish with curry leaves and serve hot.']

title: Red Slaw Sandwich
method: ['Halve baguette vertically and cut each half horizontally into two.', 'Take apple, red cabbage, iceberg lettuce, red capsicum, red radish, grain mustard, mayonnaise, salt and crushed peppercorns in a bowl and mix well.', 'Put some apple-cabbage mixture on one bread slice, top with some alfalfa and cover with another slice. Similarly prepare the other sandwich.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Egg Pulusu
method:
['Heat 4 tbsps oil in a deep non stick pan.
Add  1/4  tsp turmeric powder and eggs and saute, rotating the pan, for 1-2 minutes.
Once the eggs are well coloured, drain and place them in a bowl.', 'Add 1 tbsp oil to the same pan.
Add methi dana, mustard seeds, red chilli, curry leaves and onions and saute till lightly browned.', 'Dilute ginger-garlic paste with 1 tbsp water and add to the pan and mix well.
Add the remaining turmeric powder, coriander powder, cumin powder', 'and red chilli powder and saute for 1 minute.
Add  1/2  cup water and mix.
Add tamarind pulp and salt and mix well.', 'Add eggs and cook for 1-2 minutes or till the eggs are heated through.
Serve hot.']

title: Ambat Tikhat Surmai
method: ['Apply salt to the fish pieces and set aside for fifteen minutes. Soak kokum in half a cup of hot water.', 'Grind the tirphal in two tablespoons of water. Strain. Use only the water. Grind together whole red chillies, coriander seeds, coconut and turmeric powder with a little water.', 'Add tamarind pulp, tirphal water and one tablespoon of coconut oil. Apply this masala to the fish pieces and set aside for half an hour.', 'Heat the remaining oil, add fish pieces along with the masala. Reduce heat, cover the vessel with a lid and pour a little water over it.', 'Cook for ten minutes and remove lid. Add kokum with water to the fish. Bring to a boil and remove the kokum. Garnish with chopped coriander leaves and serve hot with steamed rice.']

title: Blue Curacao Lemonade
method: ['Halve lemons, remove seeds and cut into small pieces. Divide them equally into 4 glasses.', 'Put 1 1/2  tbsps sugar syrup in each glass and crush the lemon pieces with a muddler.', 'Add ice cubes. Add 1 1/2  tbsps blue curacao in each glass. Fill them up with drinking soda, stir and serve instantly with a stirrer and straw.']

title: Paneer Moong Toast - SK Khazana
method: ['Preheat oven at 180oC. Lightly grease a baking tray', 'Take cottage cheese in a bowl, add sprouted green gram, coriander leaves, red chillies, salt and sweet chilli sauce and mix well.', 'Cut roundels of the bread slices with a round cookie cutter. Spread some of the cottage cheese mixture and sprinkle sesame seeds on each roundel. Keep them on the baking tray.', 'Keep the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 5-10 minutes.', 'Arrange them on a serving platter, garnish with chives and serve hot.']

title: Fried Fish in Banana Leaves
method: ['Dry roast the cumin seeds till fragrant. Remove from heat and transfer in a grinder jar.', 'Add the coconut, green chillies, coriander leaves, mint leaves, garlic, raw mango, salt and turmeric powder and grind to a smooth paste.', 'Transfer in a bowl, add the lemon juice and mix well. Add the fish and coat well.', 'Cut the banana leaves into small portions and place the fish fillet in each portion. Wrap like a parcel and tie with a kitchen string.', 'Heat some oil in a non-stick pan. Place the parcels on it and shallow-fry for five minutes on each or till the fish is cooked.', 'Unwrap and serve hot.']

title: Varai ka Upma
method: ['Heat ghee in deep non-stick pan, add cumin seeds and saute till their colour changes. Add green chillies, curry leaves and samo or varai, mix well and saute lightly for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add rock salt and ginger-green chilli paste and mix well. Add 3 cups warm water, mix well, cover and cook on low heat till varai is completely done. If necessary add a little more water so that the varai cooks well.', 'Add lemon juice, mix well, cover and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Transfer upma into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander leaves and coconut and serve hot.']

title: Eggless Mawa Cup Cakes
method: ['Preheat the oven to 180deg C.', 'Take butter in a large mixing bowl, add mawa and beat together with an electric hand blender. Add condensed milk and continue to beat.', 'Sieve together refined flour, baking powder and baking soda into the bowl and mix together.', 'Add vanilla essence and milk and mix again with the hand blender.', 'Put the batter into individual silicone cupcake moulds kept on a tray till they are  3/4  full. Tap the tray on the table to settle the batter.', 'Keep the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 30 minutes.', 'Take the tray out of the oven and let them cool.', 'Demold, arrange them on a serving platter and serve with tea or coffee.']

title: Lotus Stem Honey Crunch
ingredients: ['250 gms lotus stems (kamal kakdi/bhein), scrubbed clean', 'Salt to taste', '1 tablespoon cornflour', '2 tablespoons oil + to deep fry', '6 dried Kashmiri red chillies', '3 tablespoons tomato ketchup', '3 tablespoons honey', '3-4 stalks of spring onion greens', '1 teaspoon vinegar']
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Cut lotus stems into thin diagonal slices and put them in a bowl. Add salt, cornflour and mix well.', 'Slide these into hot oil, taking care not to crowd the kadai, and deep fry till crisp and golden. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Roughly chop red chillies and remove seeds.', 'Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a non stick wok, add red chillies and saute. Add tomato ketchup, honey and salt and mix.', 'Chop spring onion greens.', 'Add fried lotus stems to the sauce and toss.  Add vinegar and mix.', 'Transfer into a serving dish, garnish with spring onion greens and serve hot.']

title: Homemade Paneer Toast-Cook Smart
method: ['Heat milk in a deep non-stick pan. Add cream and mix well. Add salt and mix well, and let the mixture come to a boil.', 'Add lemon juice, mix well and simmer till milk curdles and the whey separates.', 'Place a strainer on a bowl. Put a muslin cloth in the strainer, pour the curdled milk into it, tie the cloth into a potli and strain excess liquid.', 'Place the potli in a pan and put a heavy object on top to press it for a while. Discard the liquid and open the potli to get a block of paneer. Cool down to room temperature and then set in the refrigerator.', 'To make toasts, heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan. Add onion and saute well. Add green chillies and saute. Add salt and mix.', 'Add  1/2  cup grated fresh homemade paneer, mix well and cook. Add coriander, mix well and cook for 2 minutes.', 'Heat a sandwich griller.', 'Spread paneer mixture generously over 4 multigrain bread slices, cover with remaining bread slices and press lightly.', 'Drizzle little oil on the griller, place the sandwiches on it, 2 at a time, drizzle some more oil on top, cover and grill till grill marks appear on both sides of the sandwiches.', 'Cut into triangles and serve hot.']

title: Healthy Fruit and Nut Toasted Sandwich - SK Khazan
method: ['Thickly slice apples and set aside', 'Heat butter in a non-stick pan, place the apple slices and cook for 1-2 minutes on both sides. Add orange juice and cook for 2-3 minutes or till the moisture dries up.', 'Put cashew nuts, almonds and walnuts in a mortar and pestle and pound to a coarse powder.', 'Take cottage cheese in a bowl, add nuts mixture and mix well. Set aside.', 'Apply butter on one side of each bread slice and spread the apple mixture evenly on four slices of bread. Spread a portion of the nut-cottage cheese mixture over the apple. Cover with remaining slices of bread.', 'Heat a little butter on a grill pan and place the sandwiches and grill for 1-2 minutes, flip and apply a little butter. Grill further for 1-2 minutes.', 'Transfer the sandwiches on a serving plate and serve warm with maple syrup.']

title: Malai Peda - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat milk in a deep non-stick pan. When it comes to a boil, reduce heat and simmer till it is reduced half its original volume.', 'Add castor sugar, mix and bring to a boil.', 'Mix citric acid in 2 tablespoons water, add, mix and cook till it curdles slightly.', 'Mix cornflour in 2 tablespoons water, add, mix well and cook till the mixture thickens and resembles khoya. Remove from heat and cool.', 'Divide the mixture into equal portions, shape into small balls and flatten into pedas.', 'Garnish with almond slivers, pistachio slivers and saffron and serve.']

title: Vanilla Cookies
method: ['Heat milk in a non-stick pan, add custard powder, mix well and cook till the mixture thickens. Remove from heat, strain the custard into a bowl and set aside to cool.', 'Preheat oven to 180oC.', 'Sieve together refined flour, baking soda and baking powder into another bowl.', 'Cream together butter and castor sugar in a third bowl till light and fluffy. Add vanilla essence and custard and beat well.', 'Add flour mixture and fold till well combined.', 'Divide the mixture into equal portions and shape them into lemon sized cookies. Place them on a baking tray, place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for fifteen to twenty minutes. Remove from oven and cool.', 'Serve.']

title: Chicken and Caramelised Onion Sandwich
method: ['Heat butter in a non-stick pan and when it melts, add onion rings, salt, thyme and sugar and saute till onions are golden brown. Discard the thyme.', 'For each sandwich, take 2 bread slices, apply melted butter on both sides and place them on the worktop. Place some caramelised onions on one slice, on that place some shredded chicken, some cheddar cheese and some mozzarella cheese. Cover with the second slice.', 'Heat a non-stick pan, place the sandwich in it and cook till the underside turns golden brown, flip and cook till the other side turns golden brown and cheese melts.', 'Halve the sandwich and place on a serving plate and serve hot with French fries.']

title: Tawa Pulao - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds and let them change colour. Add onion, mix and saute till it turns light golden brown.', 'Add ginger-garlic paste and red chilli paste and saute for 1 minute. Add 2-3 tbsps water, mix and saute for 1-2 minutes or till the oil separates.', 'Add 1 1/2  tsps pav bhaji masala and mix. Add tomato puree and salt, mix and cook for 5-10 minutes or till the oil separates.', 'Add green capsicum, green peas, tomatoes, coriander leaves, rice, salt and remaining pav bhaji masala, mix well, cover and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot garnished with a coriander sprig.']

title: Pav Bhaji Pasta
method: ['Heat 2 tbsps butter in a non-stick wok till it melts. Add onions and saute till golden brown. Add ginger-garlic paste, mix well and saute for 1 minute. Add tomato, capsicum, cauliflower and salt, mix well, cover and cook for 5-6 minutes.', 'Add Kashmiri red chilli paste and pav bhaji masala and mix well. Add red chilli powder and turmeric powder and mix well.', 'Add potatoes and fresh green peas and mix well. Add coriander leaves and 1 cup water, mix well and cook for 1-2 minutes. Mash with a masher till well combined.', 'Add pasta and mix well. Add remaining butter and mix well and cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Transfer into a serving plate, grate cheese on top, garnish with a coriander sprig and serve hot.']

title: Grilled Garlicky Mushrooms
method: ['Put mushrooms, salt, red chilli powder, crushed garlic, lemon juice and gram flour in a bowl and mix well.', 'Heat oil in a non stick grill pan, place the mushrooms in it and cook till the underside is lightly coloured. Turn over and cook till the other side is similarly cooked.', 'Heat the tomato basil pasta sauce in a non stick pan.Sprinkle a little water over the mushrooms and cook till the mushrooms are soft.', 'Put a little sauce in each of 4 Chinese soup spoons. Keep a mushroom over the sauce, garnish with curly parsley and small pieces of spring onion green and serve hot.']

title: Egg Bread Korean Style
method: ['Preheat the oven at 200degC. Grease a loaf tin with some butter.', 'Mix together the butter, castor sugar, salt, baking powder, vanilla essence, one egg, flour and milk in a bowl.Whisk well to make a lump free batter.', 'Pour the batter in the greased tin and break the remaining eggs, one by one, on it. Put the tin in the preheated oven and bake for twenty to twenty-five minutes.', 'Serve.']

title: Chicken Croissants
method: ['Preheat oven at 200oC.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add garlic and saute for ten seconds. Add spring onion bulbs and saute for thirty seconds. Add capsicum and saute.', 'Add chicken and mix well. Saute till the chicken is properly cooked.', 'Add soy sauce, salt and crushed black peppercorns and mix well.', 'Add spring onion greens and mix well. Set aside to cool.', 'Dust the worktop lightly with some flour and roll the dough. With a large knife, trim the edges cut the dough length ways into two equal strips and cut them out in triangles and refrigerate for a few minutes.', 'Place the triangles one at a time, on the worktop, with the long point nearest you. Stretch out the two shorter points, put some stuffing in the center and then starting from short edge, roll up the triangles towards you.', 'As soon as they are shaped, place the croissants on a baking tray. Leave them in warm place until doubles in size. This will take about ten minutes.', 'Glaze the croissants lightly with milk wash and place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for fifteen minutes.', 'Serve warm.']

title: Mushroom on Toast
method: ['Preheat oven to 180degC Chop onion finely. Slice button mushrooms. Heat olive oil in a non-stick pan, add onion and mushrooms and saute. Crush garlic cloves and add. Add salt and cook till dry and lightly browned. Transfer mushrooms into a bowl and let them cool. Slice bread thinly and toast in the preheated oven till crisp. Remove from oven and arrange on a baking tray.', 'Add cream and cheese to mushrooms and mix well. Spread this mixture over the toasts generously. Place tray in preheated oven and bake till cheese melts. Serve hot.']

title: Veg Malai Sandwich - SK Khazana
method: ['Take onion in a large bowl, add capsicum, carrot, green chillies, crushed black peppercorns, salt, fresh malai and mix till well combined.', 'Apply butter and green chutney on 4 white bread slices, spread some vegetable mixture on each evenly.', 'Sprinkle grated cheese and cover with remaining bread slices. Apply butter on top.', 'Heat a griller and place the prepared sandwich on it. Grill till golden brown marks appear on both sides. Take it off the heat.', 'Cut each sandwich into 2 triangles, keep them on a serving plate and serve hot with green chutney and tomato ketchup.']

title: Dal Khichdi
method: ['Heat ghee in a pressure cooker.', 'Add cloves, cinnamon, asafoetida, ginger, chilkewali moong dal, dhuli moong dal, and rice and mix well.', 'Saute for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add French beans, cubed carrot, green peas, salt, turmeric powder, grated carrot and 5 cups water and mix.', 'Break green chilli and add. Close the pressure cooker with the lid and cook under pressure till 2-3 whistles are given.', 'Open the cooker when the pressure reduces completely and serve piping hot.']

title: Cheesy Jalapeno Garlic Bread - SK Khazana
method: ['Preheat oven to 180o C.', 'Halve garlic bread horizontally and place on a baking tray. Spread some butter on each halve and top with 1 tablespoon garlic and  1/2  tablespoon parsley.', 'Sprinkle some chilli flakes, put the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 4-5 minutes.', 'Mix together cream cheese, remaining parsley, chopped jalapenos and  1/2  teaspoon chilli flakes in a bowl. Add remaining chilli flakes, salt and crushed peppercorns and mix well.', 'Spread cream cheese mixture on baked garlic bread halves. Sprinkle mozzarella cheese, chilli flakes and parsley. Top with jalapeno slices.', 'Put the tray in the preheated oven and bake till the cheese melts.', 'Cut into strips and serve immediately.']

title: Bombil Fry
method: ['Clean the fish properly and slit open from one end. Pat them dry with absorbent paper.', 'Transfer the fish into a bowl, add turmeric powder, 1 teaspoon chilli powder, garlic paste and lemon juice and rub in well. Add salt and mix again. Set aside to marinate for 15-20 minutes.', 'Take semolina in a plate, add 1 teaspoon red chilli powder and salt and mix well.', 'Take cornflour slurry in a bowl, dip each marinated fish in it, roll in the semolina mixture till well coated and keep them on a plate.', 'Heat sufficient oil in kadai. Slide in each fish carefully and deep-fry till light golden. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Keep them on a serving plate, garnish with coriander leaves and serve warm with green chutney.']

title: South Indian Mushroom Masala
ingredients: ['10-12 button mushrooms, cut into quarters', '12-15 cashew nuts', '1 1/2  tablespoons oil', '1 teaspoon mustard seeds', ' 1/2  teaspoon split skinless black gram (urad dal)', '4-5 curry leaves', ' 1/2  tablespoon ginger-garlic paste', '2 medium onions, chopped', '1 medium tomato, chopped', '1 cup tomato puree', '1 tablespoon sambhar masala powder', ' 1/2  teaspoon turmeric powder', 'Salt to taste', '1 tablespoon freshly chopped coriander leaves', '1 tablespoon fresh cream', 'Sprig of coriander for garnish']
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add mustard seeds and let them splutter. Add urad dal, curry leaves and ginger-garlic paste, saute well.', 'Add onions and saute till golden brown. Add cashew nuts and mix well. Add tomato, mix well and cook till pulpy.', 'Add tomato puree, mix well. Add sambhar masala powder, turmeric powder and mix well.', 'Add mushrooms and salt, mix well. Cover and cook for 4-5 minutes or till the mushrooms are cooked completely.', 'Add chopped coriander and fresh cream, mix well. Transfer to a serving bowl.', 'Garnish with a sprig of coriander and serve hot.']

title: Pesto Mushrooms
method: ['Halve mushrooms. Heat 2 tbsps extra virgin olive oil in a non stick pan, add mushrooms and cook, tossing them occasionally for even cooking.', 'To make the pesto, grind together basil leaves, garlic, pine nuts, salt, peppercorns, parmesan cheese and 4 tbsps extra virgin olive oil to a smooth paste.', 'Add fresh cream to the mushrooms and cook. Chop red capsicum into  1/4  inch pieces. Add pesto to the mushrooms and mix. Adjust salt. Add red capsicum and mix. Serve hot garnished with a few slices of Parmesan cheese.']

title: Chicken Meat Balls in Curried Coconut Sauce
method: ['Finely chop onions.', 'Heat 1 1/2  teaspoons oil in a non-stick pan.', 'Finely chop fresh red chilli.', 'Add chopped onion to the pan alongwith garlic, celery and chopped red chilli, mix and saute for 1-2 minutes or till onion turns translucent.', 'Take chicken mince in a bowl. Add salt, crushed peppercorns and sauteed vegetables ad mix well.', 'Discard edges of bread slices and place in another bowl. Add milk and soak them well.', 'Add soaked bread slices to chicken mince mixture and mix well. Divide the mixture into equal portions and shape them into small balls.', 'Heat some oil in a non-stick pan. Shallow-fry the chicken meat balls till evenly golden and fully cooked. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon oil in another non-stick pan. Add cumin seeds, curry powder and saute on low heat.', 'Add ginger, chicken stock and stir to mix. Bring to a boil.', 'Add coconut milk and stir to mix. Simmer for 2 minutes.']

title: Fried Modak -SK Khazana
method: ['Heat 1 tbsp ghee in a non-stick pan, add coconut, jaggery and cook till jaggery melts and the mixture is thick. Add poppy seeds, green cardamom powder and 1 pinch of salt and mix well. Transfer the mixture into a bowl and set aside to cool.', 'To make the dough take whole wheat flour, refined flour, 1 pinch of salt and 1 tbsp ghee in a mixing bowl and mix well. Add sufficient water and knead to stiff dough. Set aside for 10-15 minutes.', 'Divide the dough into equal portions. Flatten each portion slightly and roll out to thin roundels. Place a portion of the coconut mixture in centre of each roundels, pleat the edges and bring them together and pinch to give it a modak shape.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai, slide in the modaks, a few at a time, and deep fry on medium heat till golden brown. Drain on an absorbent paper.', 'Arrange on a serving plate and serve or store in an airtight container.']

title: 3 Step Cheesecake
method: ['Crush biscuits finely in a grinder. Transfer in a bowl.', 'Add butter, mix well and transfer the mixture in a glass jar and level it out. Refrigerate till further use.', 'Combine cream cheese and hung yogurt in another bowl and whisk well. Add condensed milk and 1 tbsp blueberry compote and mix well.', 'Fold in whipped cream gently till well blended.', 'Fill a piping bag with the prepared cream cheese mixture and pipe out over the biscuit layer in the jar. Tap slightly.', 'Top with remaining blueberry compote and spread evenly. Refrigerate for 30 minutes.', 'Serve chilled.']

title: Pizza Roll Ups
ingredients: ['20 grams fresh yeast', '1 teaspoon sugar', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 1/2  cups refined flour + for dusting', '1 tablespoon olive oil + for greasing', ' 1/4  cup pizza sauce', ' 1/2  cup grated mozzarella cheese', ' 1/4  cup sweet corn, boiled', '4-5 button mushrooms, chopped', ' 1/4  cup finely chopped mixed capsicums', '1 pickled jalapeno, chopped', 'Dried oregano for sprinkling', 'Red chilli flakes for sprinkling']
method: ['Place the yeast in a big bowl. Add the sugar, 1 teaspoon salt and 2-3 tablespoons of warm water and set aside for 10-15 minutes.', 'Add flour, olive oil and remaining salt to the activated yeast and mix well. Add sufficient water and knead into soft dough.  Cover with a wet muslin cloth and set aside for 15-20 minutes in a warm place.', 'Preheat the oven to 200degC. Grease a baking tray with oil.', 'Dust some flour on the work table, place the dough over it and roll it into a thin rectangular sheet.', 'Apply pizza sauce and sprinkle mozzarella cheese. Add corn, mushrooms, mixed capsicums, jalapeno. Sprinkle dried oregano and chilli flakes.', 'Roll tightly and cut into thick slices.', 'Place the slices on a baking tray keeping some distance between each and bake for 10-15 minutes. Remove and let them cool. Wrap and pack it in the tiffin.']

title: Puri Bhaji - SK Khazana
method: ['Take flour in a bowl, add salt and oil and mix well. Add sufficient water and knead into a stiff dough. Cover the dough with a damp cloth and set aside to rest for 10-15 minutes.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add mustard seeds and once they splutter, add cumin seeds, asafoetida, green chillies, curry leaves, potatoes and turmeric powder and mix well. Add salt, sugar, coriander leaves, coconut and  1/2  cup water and mix well. Cover and cook for 5-6 minutes.', 'Open the lid and lightly mash the potatoes. Add lemon juice and mix well.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Divide the dough into small equal portions. Lightly grease the worktop and roll out each portion into a round puri. Slide in the puris, one at a time, and deep-fry, turning sides till they are golden on both sides. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Place the puris on a serving platter and potato bhaji in a serving bowl and serve hot.']

title: Paneer And Cheese Parantha
method: ['Put whole wheat flour, refined flour, gram flour, salt,  1/2  tsp red chilli powder, garam masala powder, tomato puree, 2 tbsps oil into a food processor, gradually add sufficient water and knead into a dough.', 'Mix paneer and cheese in a bowl. Add onion, salt, chaat masala, remaining red chilli powder, carom seeds and mix. Add 1 tbsp whole wheat flour and mash well.', 'Heat a non stick tawa. Divide dough into equal portions and roll into balls. Spread each ball in your palm keeping the edges thinner than the centre. Place a little stuffing in the centre, gather the edges and seal. Roll into balls and rest for a few minutes.', 'Dust with dry flour and roll into paranthas. Place each parantha on the hot tawa and cook, flipping sides, till evenly cooked on both sides.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Caesar Salad
ingredients: ['2 thick slices of bread', '1 tablespoon oil', ' 1/2  bunch (135 grams) iceberg lettuce', ' 1/2  bunch (100 grams) lollorosso lettuce', '5-6 basil leaves', '100 grams Parmesan cheese, shaved or grated', 'For the dressing', '2 eggs', 'Sea salt to taste', '2 garlic cloves, peeled', '3-4 black peppercorns', '1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce', '1 teaspoon French mustard paste', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil']
method: ['Boil sufficient water in a non-stick pan, add eggs and boil them for 4 minutes only.', 'To make the dressing, put garlic, sea salt and black peppercorns in a mortar and crush with a pestle.', 'Cut the bread slices into one inch pieces. Heat the oil in another non-stick pan, add the bread pieces and saute till slightly crisp and browned at the edges.', 'Add Worcestershire sauce and mustard paste to the garlic mixture and mix well. Break the eggs and add. Add extra virgin oil and mix well.', 'Wash and dry the lettuce leaves well, tear them roughly and place in a large bowl. Tear basil leaves and add to the lettuce. Add the dressing and toss well.', 'Add the bread croutons. Make shavings of the parmesan cheese with a peeler and add to the mixture in the bowl. Toss the mixture lightly with your hands.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.']

title: Almond Tea Cakes
method: ['Preheat oven at 180degC.', 'Cream butter and sugar in a bowl with the help of a beater till fluffy.', 'Add vanilla essence and eggs and beat well.', 'Add refined flour and baking powder, mix well into a soft dough. Divide the dough into equal portions reserving some dough and refrigerate for sometime.', 'To make filling, take egg white in a bowl. Add castor sugar and beat well.', 'Add lemon juice and beat well. Add almond powder and beat again.', 'Line individual cupcake moulds with refrigerated dough portions making a cup, add little filling in the cups filling  3/4 . Seal the cups with portions of reserved dough covering from top and brush milk on top.', 'Place the cupcake moulds in the preheated oven and bake for 18-20 minutes or till golden.', 'Place cupcake moulds on as serving platter. Dust icing sugar on top and sprinkle almond slivers on top.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Baked Yogurt
method: ['Preheat oven to 180degC.', 'Put yogurt, cream, condensed milk and vanilla essence in a bowl and whisk well.', 'Pour the mixture into individual earthen ware bowls.', 'Pour some water in a baking tray and place the bowls in the tray. Put the tray in the preheated oven and bake for eight to ten minutes.', 'Remove from oven and cool down to room temperature. Refrigerate for twenty to twenty five minutes.', 'Sprinkle castor sugar and spread evenly. Melt the sugar with a blow torch.', 'Serve chilled.']

title: AAM KA PANNA
method: ['Wash and boil the mangoes. Let them cool. Cool, peel, mash and strain the pulp.', 'Add five cups of water and mix well and cook till well blended.', 'Add the cumin powder, black salt, salt and Sugar Free Natura Diet Sugar. Mix well till Sugar Free Natura Diet Sugar is dissolved. Set aside to cool. Chill in the refrigerator.', 'Pour into tall glasses as required and dilute with chilled water as per your taste.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Marwari Kachori
method: ['Combine flour, 1 tablespoon ghee and a pinch salt in a bowl. Add sufficient water and knead into a stiff dough.', 'To make the filling, heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan. Add cumin seeds and let the seeds change colour. Add asafoetida, gram and mix well. Add garam masala powder, salt and little water, mix well, cover and cook till fully done.', 'Grind together coriander seeds and red chillies into a coarse powder.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Add prepared powder, dried mango powder and remaining ghee to the filling and mix well. Let it get heated through. Transfer onto a plate and let it cool.', 'Divide the dough into equal portions. Make a dent in each portion, stuff with a portion of the prepared filling and shape into kachoris.', 'Deep-fry kachorisin hot oil till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Chickpeas And Avocado Salad
ingredients: ['1 cup soaked overnight and boiled chickpeas', '1 medium avocado, roughly chopped', 'Mixed lettuce leaves as required', '12-15 red radish slices', '1 small English cucumber, thinly sliced into roundels', '1 small beetroot, boiled, peeled and thinly sliced into roundels', '1 fresh jalapeno, thinly sliced into roundels', ' 1/4  cup boiled sweet corn kernels', '3-4 red cherry tomatoes, halved', 'Peanut nougat, roughly chopped for garnish']
method: ['To make the dressing, take whisked yogurt in a bowl, add fresh cream, extra virgin olive oil, crushed black peppercorns, salt, smoked paprika and dried mixed herbs and whisk till well combined.', 'Arrange the mixed lettuce leaves on a serving plate. Sprinkle the boiled chickpeas and drizzle some of the dressing.', 'Arrange avocado pieces, place red radish roundels, and cucumber roundels. Randomly arrange beetroot slices, fresh jalapenos roundels, and boiled sweet corn kernels. Place red cherry tomato halves, drizzle the dressing, and garnish with peanut nougat.', 'Serve immediately.']
Main ingredients: Chickpeas, Avacado, Mixed lettuce, Radish, Cucumber, Beetroot, Jalapeno, Sweetcorn, Yogurt, Fresh cream, Extra virgin olive oil

title: Dates and Rice Kheer
method: ['Heat a non-stick pan. Add milk, rice and dates, mix and cook till the rice is fully done.', 'Add almonds and pistachios, stir and cook on medium heat for 3-4 minutes.', 'Add cardamom powder and mix well.', 'Garnish with almonds and pistachios and serve.']

title: Chicken Manchurian
method: ['Mix the egg, four tablespoons cornflour, salt and one tablespoon soy sauce in a bowl. Add the chicken pieces and mix. Set aside for half an hour. Mix the remaining cornflour in one cup of water.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a wok and deep fry the marinated chicken for two to three minutes. Drain on absorbent paper. Heat four tablespoons oil in a wok, add the ginger and garlic and stir fry for half a minute.', 'Add the onion and green chillies and continue to stir fry for a minute. Stir in the remaining soy sauce, chicken stock and salt.', 'Bring the mixture to a boil. Stir in the cornflour mixture and cook for a minute more or until the sauce starts to thicken, stirring continuously.', 'Add fried chicken pieces and capsicum and cook for a couple of minutes.', 'Stir in vinegar and serve hot, garnished with spring onion greens.']

title: Greek Roll
method: ['Heat a pan and put the onion roundels in it and roast till lightly browned. Sprinkle salt over them.', 'Take hung yogurt in a bowl and add coriander leaves and mint leaves along with salt, crushed black peppercorns, lemon juice and mix well.']

title: Pumpkin and Pineapple Crumble
method: ['Preheat oven to 180deg C.', 'Mix together pumpkin, pineapple, cinnamon powder and honey in a bowl.', 'Mix together wheat flour, oats, almonds and pumpkin seeds in another bowl. Add butter and mix till the mixture resembles breadcrumbs.', 'Spread the pumpkin mixture evenly in a casserole and top with the oats mixture. Place the casserole in the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes.', 'Serve warm.']

title: Lauki Ka Juice
method: ['Put the bottle gourd, amla, ginger, mint leaves, salt, black salt and cumin seeds in a blender. Add one cup of water and blend it for two to three minutes.', 'Add another cup of water, lemon juice, ice cubes and blend it for another two to three minutes. Strain into individual glasses and serve chilled.']

title: Cold Apple Soup
method: ['Chop green apples roughly. Heat butter in a deep non stick pan. Add apples and saute for a minute.\nAdd salt, sugar and black pepper powder and saute till apples are lightly browned.', 'Add white wine and cook till apples soften. Transfer into a blender jar, add chilled vegetable stock and blend till smooth. Finely chop red apple for garnish.', 'Pour the blended soup into a serving bowl, garnish with red apple and serve cold.']

title: Tariwale Chane
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pressure cooker; add cumin seeds, green chillies, and ginger, saute well.Add tomato, saute well and cook till soft and pulpy. Add red chilli powder, coriander powder, turmeric powder, garam masala powder, and saute well.', 'Add chickpeas and mix well. Add salt, 3 cups water and mix well. Cover and pressure cook on medium heat till 5-6 whistles are released.', 'Let the pressure release completely, add chopped coriander and mix well.Garnish with coriander sprig and serve hot with onion rings, green chillies, and lemon wedges.']

title: Tandoori Lollipop
method: ['Take chicken lollipops in a bowl. Add ginger-garlic paste, chilli powder, lemon juice and salt and mix well. Set aside for 15-20 minutes.', 'Take yogurt, red chilli paste, mustard oil, garam masala powder, dried fenugreek leaves powder, chaat masala, salt and gram flour in another bowl and mix well.', 'Add marinated chicken lollipops and mix well. Set aside to marinate for 2-3 hours.', 'Heat some oil in a non-stick pan. Place marinated chicken lollipops in it and shallow-fry till golden and crisp from all sides.', 'Garnish with a mint sprig and serve hot with lemon wedges and onion rings.']

title: Chao Tom
method: ['Grind together onions, garlic, prawns, fish, fish sauce, salt, sugar and pepper powder into a paste.', 'Add red chillies, egg, rice flour and grind into a fine paste. Transfer the mixture into a bowl.', 'Grease your palms with oil and divide the prawn mixture into equal portions. Tightly wrap the portions around sugarcane sticks. Place them on a plate greased with some oil.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Place prawn on sugarcane sticks in it and shallow-fry till golden and evenly done. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Garnish with red bell pepper curls and serve hot with sweet and chilli sauce.']

title: Jalebi
method: ['In a large bowl, whisk refined flour, yogurt and sufficient water to a smooth and pouring consistency batter. Cover and keep in a warm place to ferment for 24 hours.', 'Beat the batter with your hands again for 15 minutes. Cook sugar with 2 cups water in a deep non-stick pan on high heat, stirring continuously, till the sugar dissolves.', 'Add milk and when the scum rises to the top, collect it with a ladle and discard.', 'Add saffron and cook, stirring, till the syrup reaches one string consistency. Keep the syrup warm. Heat sufficient ghee in a kadai on medium heat.', 'Pour some batter onto a jalebi cloth, gather the edges and make a tight potli.', 'Squeeze round spirals into the hot ghee and deep fry, turning them over gently a few times, till they are evenly golden and crisp.', 'Drain and soak in sugar syrup for 2-3 minutes. Take them out of the syrup and serve hot.']

title: Karuppu Ulundu Dosa
Main ingredients: Split black gram with skin, Idli rice, Split Bengal gram, Fenugreek seeds, Oil

title: Healthy Muffins
method: ['Blend together the rice, grams and whole wheat till smooth. Cover and set aside to ferment for five to six hours.', 'Preheat oven at 200o C.', 'Add the bottle gourd, oil, lemon juice, baking soda, sugar, chilli powder, turmeric powder, ginger-green chilli paste and salt to the fermented rice-gram mixture and mix well.', 'Pour the mixture into eight individual silicon cup cake moulds.', 'To make the tempering, heat the oil in a small non-stick pan. Add the mustard seeds and let them splutter. Add the asafoetida and saute on a medium heat for a few seconds.', 'Pour the tempering over the batter in each cup.', 'Put the moulds in the preheated oven and bake for fifteen to twenty minutes. Remove from oven, cool and demould.', 'Serve.']

title: Chocolate Souffle
method: ['Preheat oven to 220oC.', 'Melt chocolate and butter together either in a double boiler or in the microwave oven on HIGH for one minute. Whisk both till smooth. Break eggs and separate the yolks from the whites. Add the yolks to the chocolate mixture and mix well.', 'Beat the egg whites with caster sugar and cream of tartar till hard peaks form. Grease the ramekins well with butter and dust with caster sugar. Tap them to remove excess and keep them on a baking tray. Add the egg whites to the chocolate mixture and fold', 'Spoon the batter into the ramekins leaving enough space at the top for the souffle to rise. Bake in the preheated oven for about ten minutes or till well risen but still wobbly in the centre.', 'Remove from the oven and serve immediately.']

title: Mango and Berry Muffins
method: ['Preheat the oven to 180o C.', 'Sieve the refined flour in a bowl. Add the castor sugar and mix well.', 'Melt the butter in the microwave for one minute.', 'Beat together the buttermilk and eggs in another bowl. Add the melted butter and mix well.', 'Add the buttermilk mixture to the flour mixture and mix well into a batter.', 'Dust the mangoes and cranberries with some flour and add to the batter, mix well.', 'Pour the batter into silicon muffins moulds till three fourth. Put the moulds in the preheated oven and bake for twenty to twenty-five minutes. Remove from heat and cool.', 'Demould and serve.']

title: Baked Eggs With Spinach And Potatoes
method: ['Blanch spinach leaves in boiling water. Add salt. Remove in half a minute. Drain. Cut boiled potatoes into roundels. Preheat oven to 200degC.', 'Arrange the potato roundels in a layer at the base of a baking dish. Arrange spinach leaves evenly over them. Add some butter on the leaves. Sprinkle, salt, grated cheese.', 'Break eggs over the top. Sprinkle some more salt, freshly crushed peppercorns. Cover with a lid and bake in the preheated oven at 200degC for ten minutes.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Vietnamese Flan
method: ['Preheat oven at 180degC. Heat coconut milk in a deep non-stick pan and bring it to a boil. Add 3 star anise,  1/2  cup brown sugar, stir to mix and cook till the sugar melts.', 'Break eggs in a bowl and beat with an electric beater till smooth.', 'Add chocolate powder, coffee powder, baking powder and tapioca starch and beat again till well blended.', 'Discard star anise from coconut milk mixture and add the mixture to beaten eggs. Beat again till well blended.', 'Pour the mixture into a silicon cake mould filling three-fourth and put it in the preheated oven. Bake for 40-50 minutes.', 'Remove from heat and let it rest for  1/2  hour. Refrigerate for 2-3 hours or till the flan is completely set.', 'Heat sugar syrup in a deep non-stick pan. Add little water, remaining brown sugar and remaining star anise. Stir to mix and cook till thick.', 'Cut the flan into cubes and put them on a serving dish. Drizzle the syrup on top and serve immediately.']

title: Paneer Tikka Pizza
method: ['Preheat oven to 180degC. Grease a baking tray with olive oil.', 'Place cottage cheese cubes in a bowl. Add red chilli powder, garam masala powder, salt, chaat masala, lemon juice, ginger-garlic paste and yogurt.', 'Heat  1/2  teaspoon oil in a non-stick pan. Add gram flour and roast on low heat till fragrant. Transfer this to the bowl and mix well. Set aside for 10-15 minutes.', 'Add 2 tablespoons water to yeast along with sugar and set aside for the yeast to activate.', 'Combine flour, salt, oil and activated yeast in a bowl. Add sufficient water and knead into a soft dough. Cover with a wet muslin cloth and set aside to prove.', 'Dust the worktop with flour, divide the dough into 4 equal portions and shape them into balls. Dust them with flour and roll out into thin discs to get the pizza base.', 'Place pizza base on the greased tray, cover with a wet muslin cloth and set aside for 10-15 minutes.', 'Heat some oil in a non-stick pan. Place marinated cottage cheese cubes, one by one, and cook till golden from all sides.', 'Spread 2 tablespoons cheese spread onto each base. Top with cheese, cooked cottage cheese cubes, capsicum, tomato and onion.', 'Place the pizza onto the baking tray, put tray in preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Lehsuni Palak
method: ['Boil sufficient water in a deep non-stick pan, add salt and spinach leaves and blanch for a minute. Drain and refresh in ice cold water.', 'Squeeze excess water and put into a blender jar. Add a little water and blend to a fine puree.', 'Heat oil and butter in a non-stick pan. Add garlic and saute till lightly browned.', 'Add green chillies and onion, mix and saute till onions are lightly browned.', 'Add spinach puree and mix well. Rinse the blender jar with  1/2  cup water and add to the pan, mix well and bring the mixture to a boil.', 'Add garam masala powder, salt and dried fenugreek leaves powder and mix well. Add cream, mix and cook for a minute.', 'Drizzle some cream on top, garnish with fried garlic and serve hot.']

title: Thengai Podi
Main ingredients: Fresh coconut, Split roasted Bengal gram, Split skinless black gram, Dried red chillies, Tamarind, Asafoetida, Sea salt

title: Gulkand Baklava - SK Khazana
method: ['Preheat the oven at 180@C.', 'Place 1 sheet of phyllo pastry on a burfi tray and brush melted butter on top. Place another sheet of phyllo pastry over it and brush melted butter on top. Repeat this process till 15 phyllo pastry sheets are layered.', 'Generously sprinkle powdered pistachios on top, place another sheet of phyllo pastry and brush butter on top. Place one more sheet of phyllo pastry and brush melted butter on top.', 'Apply gulkand and spread it evenly. Over this place 15 sheets of phyllo pastry brushing with melted butter between each sheet.', 'Cut into diamonds and brush some ghee on top. Place the burfi tray in the preheated oven and bake for 20-25 minutes.', 'Meanwhile to make sugar syrup, take sugar and  3/4  cup water in a non-stick pan and cook till sugar melts and the syrup reaches one string consistency.', 'Bring the tray out of the oven, drizzle the sugar syrup on top and sprinkle powdered pistachios and rose petals. Set aside to cool down.', 'Remove the pieces from the tray and serve.']

title: Grilled Chicken with Pineapple Salsa
method: ['Slice chicken breasts into halves. Add lemon juice, salt, soy sauce, garlic, orange juice, all-spice powder and paprika powder. Rub well and let it marinate for 10-15 minutes.', 'To make salsa, combine pineapple, radish, onion, lemon juice, jalapenos and chopped coriander and mix well. Keep in the refrigerator.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick grill pan. Place the marinated chicken on it, cover and cook for 3-4 minutes on each side or till the chicken is completely cooked.', 'Serve hot with pineapple salsa.']

title: Chocolate Avocado Milkshake
method: ['Halve and seed the avocado and scoop out the flesh. Slice  1/4  of the flesh and chop the remaining flesh.', 'Put a few ice cubes in a blender jar, add chocolate ice cream, chopped avocado, cocoa powder and almond milk and blend into a smooth mixture.', 'Spread some chocolate hazelnut spread on a plate. Place the mason jars inverted and coat their rim with it. Sprinkle some slivered pistachios over the chocolate hazelnut spread.', 'Pour the milkshake into the jars, garnish with some dark chocolate chips and avocado slices, put a straw in each jar and serve chilled.']

title: Muthia -SK Khazana
method: ['Heat sufficient water in a steamer.', 'Take fenugreek leaves, bottle gourd and carrot in a parat and mix well. Add salt and mix. Add garam masala powder, cumin powder, sugar, red chilli powder, baking soda, turmeric powder, green chilli paste, ginger paste, coriander leaves, gram flour and whole wheat flour and knead well to make a semi soft dough.
