Add 1 tsp oil and knead again.', 'Divide the dough into equal portions and shape each into a cylinder.', 'Place the dough cylinders in parchment paper lined perforated containers and place them one on top of the other over the steamer pot. Cover with lid and steam for 15-20 minutes.', 'Take the steamed muthia out and cut them into smaller roundels.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add mustard seeds and let them splutter. Add asafoetida, carom seeds, coriander seeds, cumin seeds, white sesame seeds, Kashmiri red chillies and curry leaves, mix and saute till fragrant. Add muthia pieces and toss well.', 'Sprinkle some salt and saute, tossing a few times, for 2-3 minutes\nTransfer into a serving platter, garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot.']

title: Kantola Suva Masala
method: ['Scrape the kantola and halve them. Remove the seeds. Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add dried red chillies and cumin seeds and saute till fragrant.', 'Add ginger, garlic and green chillies and saute for a minute. Add the kantola and mix well. Add turmeric powder and salt and toss.', 'Add bhuna masala and mix well. Add 1 cup water and mix. Cover and cook for 10-12 minutes, stirring occasionally, till the vegetable becomes dry.', 'Add dill and lemon juice and mix well. Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with a dill sprig and serve hot.']

title: Kaddu Puri - SK Khazana
method: ['Take the boiled pumpkin in a parat and mash with a fork. Add red chilli powder, cumin powder, coriander powder, turmeric powder, salt, coriander leaves, semolina and flour, mix well and knead into stiff dough. Set aside for 10-15 minutes.', 'Divide the dough into equal balls. Grease the worktop with a little oil, place a ball on it and roll out into a puri. Similarly roll out more puris with the remaining dough.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai, slide in the puris, one at a time, and deep-fry till it puffs up and turns golden. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Arrange the puris on a serving platter and serve hot with potato curry.']

title: Falafel Wrap-SK Khazana
method: ['Grind together chickpeas, garlic, parsley, onion, cumin powder, salt and crushed peppercorns to a coarse mixture.', 'Transfer the mixture into a bowl, divide into equal portions and shape into balls.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Deep-fry prepared falafels till golden brown. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Spread 1 tablespoon aioli on each tortilla. Top with some lollo rosso lettuce, Iceberg lettuce and 3 falafels. Crush the falafels slightly.', 'Top with some carrot strips, beetroot strips, 3-4 jalapeno slices, some more aioli and some French fries. Wrap tightly.', 'Halve, garnish with some parsley and serve immediately with French fries.']

title: Cheese Bread Pakora
method: ['Trim the edges of the bread slices. Halve each slice, soak in water and squeeze. Place a cheese cube in the centre of each piece and roll tightly.', 'Mix together gram flour, chilli powder, turmeric powder, chaat masala, salt and baking soda in a bowl. Add sufficient water and whisk to a smooth batter of coating consistency.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Dip each bread roll in the batter and deep-fry in hot oil till golden brown. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot with tamarind chutney.']

title: Matka Kulfi - SK Khazana
method: ['Pour milk into a deep non-stick pan and bring it to a boil. Further simmer till reduced to  1/3  its volume.', 'Remove from heat, add castor sugar, khoya and cardamom powder and mix till khoya melts. Add pistachios and mix well.', 'Fill the mixture into earthen pots (kulhads/matkas) and set aside to cool down to room temperature. Then keep them in the freezer to set.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Lemon Pistachio Cheesecake
method: ['Grind together the crushed pistachios and graham crackers. Add melted butter and grind till a damp mixture is formed.', 'Transfer the prepared mixture into a five inch loose bottom tin and press to form the crust. Refrigerate for thirty minutes.', 'Beat together cream cheese, lemon zest and condensed milk till smooth and well combined.', 'Pour this mixture over the crust and level it out. Garnish with crushed pistachios and refrigerate overnight.', 'Cut into wedges and serve.']

title: Jeera Biscuits
method: ['Preheat the oven at 180oC.', 'In a bowl, add butter, castor sugar and with the help of a whisk cream it nicely.', 'Break the egg in other bowl and whisk it. Add half of the egg to the butter and mix it nicely.', 'Heat a non-stick pan and lightly roast the cumin seeds.', 'Take the butter mixture, add the refined flour, baking powder, salt and cumin seeds and mix them all well to make dough. Refrigerate the dough for thirty minutes.', 'Take out the dough on the working table, knead it to bind nicely. Dust with refined flour if required.', 'Roll out the dough using a rolling pin and flatten out to  1/8  inch thick disk.', 'Using a round cookie cutter cut the cookies. Place it on an oven tray and refrigerate again for ten to fifteen minutes.', 'Bake it for fifteen to twenty minutes and serve.']

title: Butter Paneer Pizza
method: ['Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan, add onion and saute till translucent. Add tomato puree and  1/4  cup water and mix well.', 'Add garam masala powder, red chilli powder and coriander powder and mix well. Add salt and cashewnuts and mix well. Cover and cook for 5-10 minutes. Cool, transfer into a mixer jar and grind into a fine puree.', 'Heat remaining oil in another non-stick pan, add cottage cheese cubes and saute till golden brown. Drain on a plate.', 'Add the ground puree to the oil remaining in the pan. Rinse the mixer jar with some water and add to the pan. Mix and saute.', 'Add dried fenugreek leaves powder and honey and mix well.', 'Add fried cottage cheese cubes and mix well. Cover and simmer for 4-5 minutes. Transfer into a bowl and set aside to cool.', 'Dust the worktop with some refined flour, keep the dough over it and roll out into a pizza base of medium thickness.', 'Grease a baking tray with some oil and dust some dry flour over it. Place the pizza base in the tray. Cover with a piece of cloth and set aside for 15-20 minutes.', 'Preheat oven to 180deg C.', 'Remove the cloth, spread some butter paneer gravy and place the paneer cubes on top.', 'Arrange onions and capsicum pieces on it. Place butter cubes on top. Sprinkle mozzarella cheese and coriander leaves over the butter.', 'Baste the edges of the pizza base with some melted butter, keep the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 20-25 minutes.', 'Bring the tray out of the oven, cut the pizza into wedges, arrange them on a serving plate, sprinkle mixed dried herbs and red chilli flakes and serve.']

title: Chettinad Fish Fry
method: ['Marinate fish pieces with salt, turmeric powder and lemon juice and set aside for fifteen minutes.', 'Put garlic, ginger, cumin seeds, fennel seeds, coriander seeds, black peppercorns, salt, red chilli powder and tamarind paste in a mixer jar and blend to a smooth paste.', 'Apply this paste to the fish pieces and set aside for an hour.', 'Heat two tablespoons oil in a non-stick pan and shallow fry the fish from both sides till properly cooked.', 'Drain on absorbent paper. Serve hot.']

title: Rajgira Fruit Pizza
method: ['Separate orange segments and reserve the zest.', 'Heat coconut oil in a non-stick pan. Add jaggery and salt, mix and cook till the jaggery melts.', 'Add amaranth and mix well. Add cardamom powder and mix well.', 'Divide the mixture immediately into 4 equal portions, spreading into small discs onto a silicon sheet. Set aside for 15-20 minutes.', 'Mix together yogurt and orange zest in a bowl.', 'Spread a spoonful of yogurt mixture over each disc. Arrange kiwi slices, orange segments and melon slices, top with berries and sprinkle walnuts.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Jackfruit Kerala Curry
method: ['Take jackfruit cubes in a deep pan, add 2 cups water, salt and turmeric powder and cook till nearly done.', 'Heat a non-stick pan, add coriander seeds, cumin seeds and cloves and dry roast till fragrant.', 'Break the red chillies, remove the seeds and put into a mixer jar, add ginger, garlic, the roasted spices, coconut, tamarind pulp and a little water and grind to a smooth paste.', 'Heat coconut oil in another deep pan, add mustard seeds and let them splutter. Add curry leaves, mix and saute for  1/2  minute. Add onions, mix and saute till light golden.', 'Add green chillies, mix and saute for 1-2 minutes. Add tomato puree, mix and saute for 2-3 minutes.', 'Drain the jackfruit cubes and add to the second pan and mix well. Add the ground masala and mix well. Add salt and mix well. Cover, reduce heat and cook for 10-15 minutes or till the jackfruit cubes are completely done.', 'Transfer into serving bowl and serve hot with steamed rice or chapatti.']

title: Mutton Pulao - Sk khazana
method: ['To make green paste put coriander leaves, garlic cloves, green chillies and ginger in a blender jar, add a little water and blend to a fine paste.', 'Take mutton in a bowl, add salt, the green paste and yogurt. Mix well and set aside to marinate for 5 minutes.', 'Heat oil in a pressure cooker, add  3/4  the sliced onions and saute till they turn soft. Add the marinated mutton, mix well and saute for 1 minute on high heat. Add 2 cups water, Rinse the blender jar with  1/4  cup water and add it to the mutton and mix well. Cover with the lid and cook till 1 whistle on high heat. Reduce heat and continue to cook for 7-8 minutes or till mutton is  3/4  done. Switch off heat and let the pressure reduce completely.', 'Strain the cooked mutton liquor into a bowl and transfer the mutton pieces into a separate bowl.', 'Heat 2-3 tbsps ghee in a deep non-stick pan, add bay leaf, cinnamon, black pepper corns and cloves amd saute till fragrant. Add the remaining onions and saute till it turns slightly golden in colour.', 'Drain and add the rice, mix and saute for 1-2 minutes on high heat. Add a little salt and garam masala powder andmix well. Add 4 cups reserved mutton stock and mix. Cover and cook on medium heat for 5-6 minutes or till rice is  3/4  done.', 'Add the mutton pieces in pan and spread them on the top. Cover the pan again and cook on medium heat for 5 minutes.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander sprigs and fried onions and serve hot.']

title: Gajar Methi ki Sabzi
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds and garlic and saute till brown. Add onions and saute further till onions are translucent. Add carrots and mix well. Cook for 5-7 minutes.', 'Add ginger-green chilli paste and saute for 2 minutes. Add salt, fenugreek leaves and mix well.', 'Add turmeric powder, coriander powder and cumin powder and mix well. Cook till the fenugreek leaves and carrots are done. Add lemon juice and mix well. Reduce heat and cook for a minute.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.']

title: Stewed Watermelon
method: ['Heat a non-stick pan. Add watermelon cubes, sugar and star anise, mix well and cook till pulpy.', 'Serve warm.']

title: Sweet Adai
method: ['Heat some water in a non-stick pan. Add half the jaggery, mix and let it melt. Bring the mixture to a boil. Switch off heat and cool.', 'Take flour in a bowl. Add salt and cardamom powder and mix well. Add coconut and mix again.', 'Add cooled jaggery water and mix well. Keep on adding water as required to make a thick batter. Add remaining jaggery to the batter and mix well.', 'Heat 1 teaspoon ghee a non-stick pan. Pour a ladleful of batter in the pan and spread it to a medium disc or adai. Cook on low heat till underside turns golden. Flip and cook till the other side also turns golden.', 'Halve each adai and serve hot garnished with coconut.']

title: Sweet Chilli Chutney
method: ['Slit and remove most of the seeds and the white pith from the chillies. Add vinegar and soak for about half an hour. Grind to a fine paste.', 'Take sugar and half a cup of water in a pan and cook till sugar dissolves. Add chilli paste to the sugar syrup and mix. Let it cook on medium heat.', 'Heat oil in another pan. Add ginger and garlic and saute. Add salt and black salt to the red chilli mixture and mix well. Add the sauteed ginger-garlic and mix.', 'Add crushed roasted cumin seeds and a little water. Mix and cook for around five more minutes.', 'Cool and store in sterilized bottles.']

title: Juicy Julep
method: ['Remove the juice from the oranges and sweet limes and pour into a bowl. Add pineapple juice and ice and mix. Add grenadine syrup and mix. Pour into stemmed glasses. Top it up with ginger ale.', 'Decorate with fresh mint sprigs and serve immediately.']

title: Cassata-SK Khazana
method: ['Keep one slice of chocolate sponge cake in a silicon loaf mould. Top with a layer of strawberry ice cream and freeze for 10-15 minutes.', 'Top with a layer of butterscotch ice cream and freeze for 10-15 minutes.', 'Fill a piping bag fitted with a nozzle with vanilla ice cream and pipe on top of the butterscotch layer.', 'Mix together almonds, pistachios, cashewnuts and chocolate chips in a bowl. Sprinkle this mixture on top of the ice cream. Freeze till set.', 'Demould, cut into pieces and serve immediately.']

title: Mango And Blueberry Crumble
method: ['Preheat oven to 180degC. Peel and cut mangoes into small cubes and put them into a bowl. Take the refined flour in another bowl, add butter and rub it in with finger tips till it resembles breadcrumbs. Add sugar and mix.', 'Add almonds and mix well. Put the mango cubes into 4 individual bowls, top with 2 tsps of blueberry jam in each bowl. Put the flour mixture on top and bake in the preheated oven till a golden brown crust forms on top. Serve.']

title: Pina Colada Yogurt
method: ['Heat a non-stick pan. Chop pineapple slices and put in the pan. Add 2 tbsps brown sugar and mix. Add a little water and let it cook on medium heat till soft.', 'Dry roast scraped coconut in a non-stick pan on low heat. Meanwhile add powdered sugar to hung yogurt and whisk till well incorporated. Add desiccated coconut to toasted coconut and continue to roast till lightly browned.', 'Take stemmed glasses and put the pineapple mixture at the base. Put some sweetened yogurt over the pineapple and mix very lightly taking care that it does not get completely mixed. Sprinkle the roasted coconuts and a little brown sugar on top and chill in a refrigerator .']

title: Thakkali Oorugai
Main ingredients: Tomatoes, Sesame oil, Garlic, Green chillies, Dried red chillies, Tamarind pulp, Red chilli powder

title: Mangalorean Chicken Curry-SKKhazana
method: ['Put chicken pieces in a bowl. Add ginger-garlic paste, salt and turmeric powder, mix and set aside to marinate for 10-15 minutes.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan. Add dried red chillies and saute for 30 seconds. Transfer into a bowl.', 'In the same pan, add coriander seeds, peppercorns and fenugreek seeds, mix and saute for 10 seconds. Transfer into the same bowl.', 'Dry roast cumin seeds on low heat till light golden brown. Transfer into the same bowl.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon oil in the same non-stick pan. Add 2 chopped onions and saute till well browned. Add garlic cloves, mix and saute on medium heat till golden brown. Transfer to the same bowl.', 'In the same pan, add coconut and roast till well browned. Transfer to the same bowl and allow the mixture to cool.', 'Blend the mixture with some water to a smooth paste.', 'Heat 3 tablespoons oil in a deep non-stick pan. Add chopped garlic and remaining onions, mix and saute on medium heat till golden brown.', 'Add marinated chicken pieces, mix and cook on high heat for 5-7 minutes. Add prepared paste, mix well cover and cook for 4-5 minutes.', 'Rinse the blender jar with 2 1/2  cups water and add to the pan, mix and cook for 8-10 minutes.', 'Add tamarind pulp and coriander leaves, mix, bring to a boil, cover and cook till done.', 'To prepare tempering, heat coconut oil in a non-stick pan. Add mustard seeds and let them splutter. Add curry leaves, saute for few seconds and add the tempering to the chicken curry and mix well.', 'Serve hot with steamed rice.']

title: Couscous Salad with Goat Cheese
method: ['Heat butter in a non-stick pan. Add mushrooms and saute well for two minutes. Drain and set aside in a bowl.', 'To make the dressing, put olive oil, lemon juice, mustard paste, salt and crushed peppercorns in a bowl and mix well.', 'Heat half cup of water in another non-stick pan, add orange zest and orange juice, mix continue to heat.', 'Put couscous in another bowl and pour the flavoured water into it. Mix well, cover and set aside for five minutes.', 'Fluff up the couscous grains with a fork. Add walnuts, carrots, sauteed mushrooms, cheese, radish and kale leaves and toss.', 'Add the dressing, toss till well mixed and serve immediately.']

title: Kokum Sharbat - cook smart
method: ['Heat sugar in a deep non-stick pan. Strain the juice from soaked kokum petals into it, mix well and cook till the mixture reduces and thickens. Remove from heat and set aside to cool.', 'Add some ice cubes and 2 tablespoons kokum mixture into individual glasses. Top with water/club soda and serve chilled.']

title: Dum Paneer Kalimirch
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick frying pan. Grind browned onions with  1/4  cup water to a fine paste.', 'Add bay leaf, cinnamon, green cardamoms, cloves and cumin seeds to the pan and saute till fragrant.', 'Add ginger-garlic-green chilli paste and browned onion paste and mix well. Swirl  1/2  cup water in jar in which browned onions were ground and add.', 'Add paneer, coriander powder, cumin powder and garam masala powder and mix well.Add yogurt and mix well.', 'Add coriander leaves, mint leaves and salt and mix. Add black peppercorns and mix well. Cook on low heat for 10-12 minutes. Serve hot.']

title: Soya Turnovers
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add onions and capsicum and saute for 2-3 minutes. Drain soya granules and add along with salt and mix well. Cook till the soya is done. Transfer into a bowl', 'Add mixed herbs, red chilli flakes and tomatoes and mix well. Add green and black olives and mix well.', 'Heat sufficient oil in another non-stick pan.', 'Spread 1 tbsp chutney on each chapatti, place soya mixture on one side, top with 1 tbsp grated cheese and fold into half to make a semicircle.', 'Shallow-fry the turnovers in hot oil, turning sides, till crisp and golden on both the sides.', 'Halve the turnovers, place them on a serving plate, garnish with mint sprigs and serve immediately.']

title: Kadai Prawns Masala
method: ['Heat butter and oil in a kadai. When the butter melts, add cumin seeds and saute till their colour changes. Add onions, mix and saute till golden brown.', 'Add tomatoes, mix well and saute for 1 minute. Add salt, mix and saute till the tomatoes become pulpy.', 'Add red chilli powder, coriander powder, turmeric powder, pav bhaji masala and coriander leaves, mix and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add tomato ketchup and mix well. Add prawns, mix well and saute, stirring continuously for 6-8 minutes on high heat.', 'Add lemon juice and dried fenugreek leaves (kasuri methi) powder, mix and cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander sprigs and serve hot.']

title: Citrus Juice (For Kids)
method: ['Process the oranges, carrot and ginger in a food processor.Add salt and sugar and mix well.', 'Pour into individual glasses and serve.']

title: Waffle Sundae-SK Khazana
method: ['Mix together flour, cocoa powder and powdered sugar in a bowl. Add eggs, vanilla ice cream and milk as required and whisk to a smooth batter.', 'Add baking powder and butter and mix well. Add chocolate chips and mix well.', 'Heat a waffle iron and grease with some butter. Pour batter, cover and cook till fully done. Make more waffles similarly.', 'For each portion, keep a waffle on a serving plate. Top with 2 scoops vanilla ice cream, 1 scoop mango ice cream, 1 halved strawberry, 4-5 blueberries and some chocolate chips. Cover with another waffle and repeat the process.', 'Garnish with chocolate cigars, drizzle some strawberry syrup and chocolate syrup and serve immediately.']

title: Cardamom Spiced Coffee Frappe
method: ['Dissolve coffee powder in 12 tbsps lukewarm water to make a decoction.', 'Pound cardamoms in a mortar with a pestle and add to the decoction. Let the flavour infuse.', 'Add 1 cup milk in a cocktail shaker alongwith some ice cubes, one part of decoction and 2 tbsps sugar syrup. Shake well. This will make frappe for one glass. Similarly make frappe for remaining three glasses.', 'Place lots of ice cubes in a tall individual glasses and pour the frappe in each glass. Serve chilled.']

title: Lemony Fiesta
method: ['Halve the sponge cake horizontally and then cut four roundels with a cutter. Place one on each serving plate.', 'Heat one cup of water in a pan. Add lemon rind and let it come to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for two to three minutes. Mix cornflour in a little water.', 'Add Sugar Free Natura and a small pinch of yellow colour to the pan and mix. Add cornflour mixture and cook till the sauce thickens slightly.', 'Take it off the heat and add lemon juice and mix. Spread a little of this sauce on the cake roundels. Place two scoops of vanilla icecream over it. Place the kiwi slice on the top.', 'Pour the remaining sauce over and serve immediately.']

title: Mac and Cheese Pops
method: ["Heat butter in a non-stick pan. Add 1 tablespoon refined flour and saute well, but make sure that it doesn't turn brown.", 'Add milk, little by little, and keep stirring till the sauce thickens. Lower heat and simmer for 5 minutes.', 'Switch off heat, add pasta, cheese and mix well. Add salt and mix again.', 'Finely chop parsley and add. Mix well and spread on a plate to cool.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Take remaining refined flour in a bowl. Add sufficient water and mix well to make a thick slurry.', 'Divide the mac-cheese mixture into small portions, dip in the slurry and coat in the breadcrumbs. Shape into balls.', 'Deep-fry balls in hot oil till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot with tomato ketchup.']

title: Egg Biryani
method: ['Heat 2 tablespoon ghee in a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds, green cardamoms, cinnamon and cloves, mix and saute till fragrant.', 'Add onion, mix and saute till onion turns a light golden brown in colour.', 'Add ginger-garlic paste and tomatoes, mix and saute till tomatoes turn pulpy.', 'Add red chilli powder, coriander powder, turmeric, cumin powder, mix and saute till ghee separates.', 'Add  1/4  cup water and salt and mix well. Add yogurt, mix and cook for 2 minutes. Add  1/4  cup fried onions and mix well.', 'Halve the eggs vertically and add to the pan. Add potatoes and mix gently.', 'Sprinkle 8-10 mint leaves. Layer the cooked rice over the masala. Drizzle saffron infused milk, sprinkle remaining fried onions, remaining ghee and remaining mint leaves, cover and cook on low heat for 5-7 minutes.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with mint leaves and serve hot.']

title: Caramel Walnut Chocolate Tart - SK Khazana
method: ['Put the chocolate biscuits into a zip lock bag and crush them with a rolling pin.', 'Transfer the crushed cookies into a bowl, add cocoa powder and melted butter and mix well.', 'Spread the prepared biscuit mix on a tart mould and level with a spoon. Refrigerate to set.', 'Heat a non-stick pan, add walnuts and dry roast them. Add dulche leche and mix well.', 'Heat fresh cream in another non-stick pan till lukewarm.', 'To make ganache, take dark chocolate in a bowl and pour the fresh cream over it and mix till well combined.', 'Spread a layer of prepared walnut-dulche leche mixture over the biscuit layer in the tart mould.', 'Top it with a layer of the chocolate ganache and form little peaks with a spoon.', 'Sprinkle walnuts and refrigerate till sets. Demould, cut into wedges and serve cold.']

title: Crispy Chicken
method: ['Crush cornflakes in a blender. To make marinade, mix refined flour, cornstarch, salt, ginger paste, garlic paste, red chilli paste, vinegar and egg well.', 'Cut chicken into 2 inch cubes and add and mix well. Add oil, mix and refrigerate for 1 hour.', 'Spread crushed cornflakes on a plate. Coat marinated chicken pieces in it and place in air fryer container.', 'Fit container in the stand and air fry at 180degC for 10 minutes. Serve hot.']

title: Herb Garlic Prawns
method: ['Take prawns in a bowl. Add lemon juice, salt and crushed peppercorns and mix well.', 'Finely chop basil leaves and parsley and add to the bowl along with garlic, thyme leaves, chilli flakes and 2 tablespoons olive oil and mix well. Set aside to marinate for 1 hour.', 'Arrange marinated prawns onto skewers.', 'Heat butter and 1 teaspoon olive oil in a non-stick grill pan. Place skewers on it and grill till prawns are fully and evenly cooked.', 'Serve hot with your choice of salad.']

title: Baked Alaska
method: ['Keep the ice cream brick overnight in the freezer to make it very hard. Preheat oven to 200degC/400degF/Gas Mark 6. In a bowl beat egg whites till semi-stiff. Add cream of tartar or lemon juice.', 'Gradually add the sugar, a couple of tablespoonfuls at a time and continue to beat until the meringue forms stiff peaks and turns glossy. Slice the sponge cake into half horizontally.', 'Sprinkle some sugar syrup from the canned fruit on the cake sheets. Place canned mixed fruits on top of the cake base. Arrange the ice cream on it and cover it with other half of cake.', 'Make sure the ice cream is covered from all sides with the sponge cake. Spread the meringue over and around the cake until it is completely covered.', 'Place on a baking sheet and place in the preheated oven for about two to three minutes to brown the meringue. Take a round spoon, place brandy in it and heat.', 'The moment it catches fire pour this on the Baked Alaska spreading evenly. Serve immediately on a chilled serving dish.']

title: Chana Dal aur Wadi with Chenna
method: ['Heat 2 tbsps ghee in a non-stick pan. Add cumin seeds and saute till fragrant. Add dried red chillies and saute.', 'Add ginger, garlic, green chillies and saute for a minute. Add tomato and saute till pulpy.', 'Add Kashmiri red chilli powder, turmeric powder, dried mango powder, tamarind paste and saute for 2 minutes.', 'Add boiled split Bengal gram, 1 1/2  cups water and salt and bring to a boil. Break the wadis and add.', 'Crush the malai paneer and add and cook on medium heat for 3-4 minutes. Add coriander leaves and mix well.', 'Heat the remaining ghee in a small non-stick pan. Add asafoetida and pour the tempering over the dal. Transfer into in a serving bowl, garnish with a coriander sprig and serve hot.']

title: Lapsi Aur Gur Ka Halwa
method: ['Soak jaggery in one cup of water. Heat ghee in a kadai. Add lapsi and roast on low heat till brownish red in colour. Add two cups of water and cook on low heat till lapsi is soft.', 'Mix in sugar. Add jaggery syrup and mix well. Keep on heat for one to two minutes, stirring continuously.Add green cardamom powder and colour as required. Serve hot garnished with slivered almonds.']

title: Murgh Kandhari Kofta
method: ['Pour pomegranate juice into a deep non stick pan and heat. Add salt and mix. Dampen your palms, take small portions of minced chicken and shape into small lemon sized balls. Add them to the pomegranate juice and cook.', 'Mix browned onion paste and almond paste with  1/2  cup water in a bowl. Add this to the chicken balls and mix. Add salt and red chilli powder and mix. Add yogurt and mix. Add tomato puree and mix and cook till done. Add garam masala powder and mix. Add cream and mix. Garnish with fresh pomegranate pearls and serve hot with steamed rice.']

title: Banjara Gosht
method: ['Marinate the mutton with yogurt and one teaspoon red chilli powder for twelve hours.', 'Heat oil in a nonstick pan. Add cloves, cinnamon, bay leaves, peppercorns, mace, green cardamom, black cardamom and saute for a few seconds.', 'Add ginger-garlic paste, chopped green chillies and saute. Add the onions and saute till golden brown in colour.', 'Add turmeric powder, remaining chilli powder, coriander powder and two broken dried red chillies. Sprinkle little water and cook for a minute.', 'Add the marinated mutton and mix well.', 'Add 2 cups water, cover and cook for 20-25 minutes on medium heat. Add salt and mix well.', 'Transfer in a serving bowl and serve hot garnished with remaining dried chillies, crushed coriander seeds and mint sprigs.']

title: Boondi Aur Makai Ki Bhel
method: ['Take onion, cucumber, tomato and green chilli in a bowl.', 'Add corn and boondi, roasted peanuts, chaat masala, coriander leaves, lemon juice and tamarind chutney.', 'Mix well and serve immediately.']

title: Cheese and Egg Toast
method: ['Preheat oven to 200degC.', 'Heat 1-1 1/2  cups water in non stick pan. Add salt and bring to a boil.', 'Mix cheese, mustard powder, crushed red chillies and 1 egg in a bowl.', 'Grease a baking tray with a little oil and place the bread slices on it. Spread cheese-egg mixture on them and cook the preheated oven till cheese melts.', 'Break 1 egg in a bowl. Add vinegar to boiling water, slide the egg in it and poach. Similarly poach the remaining eggs.', 'Place cheese toasts on a serving plate and put a poached egg on each of them. Place cherry tomatoes along sides and sprinkle little mustard powder on top.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Beetroot And Mustard Pulao
method: ['Heat oil in a non stick pan. Add bay leaves, black cardamom, green cardamom, cinnamon, cloves, caraway seeds and reduce heat. Cut onions into cubes and add to the pan. Saute lightly.', 'Cut beetroots into cubes. Add ginger-garlic paste, red chilli powder, turmeric powder and black peppercorns and saute.', 'Pour 3 cups water and bring it to a boil. Drain rice and add.Add beetroots, kasundi mustard and mix.', 'Add salt and mix. Cover and cook, stirring at regular intervals, for 6-8 minutes or till the rice is done.', 'Turn off the heat and transfer into a serving plate. Garnish with kasundi mustard and serve hot.']

title: Quesadillas
method: ['Mix together cornmeal, refined flour and salt. Knead it into a soft dough with milk and half a cup of water. Cover with a wet muslin cloth and set aside. Divide into equal portions and roll each portion into a thin chapatti of ten inches diameter.', 'Lightly roast them on a hot tawa on both sides and set aside. These are tortillas. For stuffing, heat olive oil in a pan and saute onion and garlic for a minute. Add boiled kidney beans, tomato ketchup, salt, green chillies, paprika, coriander leaves and cook for two to three minutes.', 'Heat a tawa and place a tortilla on it. Spread some stuffing, top with cheese and cover with another tortilla. Spread some more stuffing and top with cheese and coriander leaves and cover with another tortilla. Dribble some olive oil all around. Turn when the underside is cooked and cook the other side similarly. Remove, cut into wedges and serve hot.']

title: Badami Puri
method: ['Knead together refined flour, rice flour, almond paste,  1/4  tsp cardamom powder and ghee with milk as required to a stiff dough.', 'Divide the dough into equal portions, dust with some refined flour and roll out into small discs. Brush with some ghee, fold into triangles, roll out and prick all over with a fork. Secure with a clove.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Deep-fry prepared puris till golden brown. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Heat sugar in a non-stick pan. Add sufficient water, saffron and remaining cardamom powder, mix well and cook till a thick syrup is formed.', 'Soak the fried puris in the sugar syrup, garnish with nuts and serve immediately.']

title: Peri Peri Crispy Corn- Sk Khazana
method: ['Boil sufficient water in a deep pan, add salt and sweetcorn kernels and cook for 3-4 minutes. Drain them and put into a bowl. Refrigerate till chilled.', 'Add cornflour to the boiled corn and mix well.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai, deep-fry the corn kernels till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Transfer the fried corn into a jar, add peri peri masala powder, cover the jar with a lid and shake well.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.']

title: Chocolate Hazelnut Milkshake
method: ['Combine ice cream, hazelnut-chocolate spread, 2 tablespoons chopped hazelnuts, milk,  1/2  teaspoon cinnamon powder in a blender jar and blend well.', 'Pour the milkshake into individual glasses and serve chilled garnished with chopped hazelnuts and cinnamon powder.']

title: Wonton Rolls
method: ['Preheat oven to 180o C. Roughly chop onion.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add onion and garlic and saute till lightly browned.', 'Roughly chop potato wedges and place in a bowl, add sauteed ingredients and mix well. Add tomato ketchup and red chilli sauce and mix well.', 'Place a wonton sheet on the worktop, brush with butter and cover with another wonton sheet. Similarly use rest of the sheets.', 'Place some of the potato mixture in the center of each wanton sheet, apply cornstarch slurry on the sides and fold one edge over another to make a packet.', 'Brush a baking tray with butter, place the wanton packets on it and brush the top with some butter. Place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 10-12 minutes.', 'Arrange the wonton packets on a serving plate and serve immediately.']

title: Spiced Prunes Chutney
method: ['Roughly chop the California Prunes.', 'Take tamarind in a bowl, add 1 cup hot water and set aside for 20 minutes.', 'Heat a non-stick pan, add prunes and jaggery. Drain the soaked tamarind and add into the pan.', 'Add red chilli powder, roasted cumin powder, fennel powder, dried ginger powder, salt, black salt, and 1 1/2  cups water and cook till the jaggery melts and the prunes soften.', 'Mash the mixture with the back of the spoon till it comes together.', 'Take the pan off the heat and allow the chutney to cool.', 'Transfer the chutney into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander sprig and red chilli and serve with lavash.']

title: Barbecued Mango Chicken
method: ['To make the marinade, grind together raw mango, garlic, green chillies, crushed black peppercorns, sugar, coriander leaves and lemon juice with a little water and transfer into a bowl.', 'Add chicken and salt and set aside for 30 minutes to marinate.', 'Heat oil in a non stick pan. Skew the chicken pieces onto satay sticks and place the sticks in the pan.', 'Cook rotating the sticks, so that the chicken gets cooked evenly all around.', 'Place tomato flowers and coriander leaves on a serving plate.', 'Arrange the chicken pieces on the plate. Cook the remaining marinade in the pan till it is slightly reduced.', 'Spread it over the chicken and serve hot.']

title: Brown Basmati Rice Biryani
method: ['Heat ghee in a non-stick pan.', 'Heat 4 cups water in another deep non-stick pan. Add green cardamoms, star anise, cloves, black cardamom, cinnamon and bay leaf and bring it to a boil. Add rice, mix and let it cook.', 'Add caraway seeds to the ghee and saute for a minute. Add onions and saute till well browned.', 'Add salt to the rice, mix well and cook till the rice is fully done.', 'Add ginger-garlic paste, mix and saute for a minute. Add pumpkin and carrot, mix, cover and cook for 8-10 minutes.', 'Strain the rice in a colander and set aside.', 'Add bottle gourd, turmeric powder, chilli powder and salt to the vegetables and mix well. Add yogurt and mix well. Add 1 teaspoon garam masala powder and mix well.', 'Discard bay leaves and cinnamon from the strained rice and add the rice to the vegetables. Mix well.', 'Add saffron milk, remaining garam masala powder, cardamom powder, ginger juliennes and torn mint leaves. Mix well, cover and cook on low heat for 3-5 minutes.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Almond Tart - SK Khazana
method: ['Preheat the oven to 180o C.', 'Put almonds in a blender jar and blend to a fine powder. Add castor sugar, fresh cream and egg yolk and blend again.', 'Dust some flour on the worktop, place the puff pastry on it and cut it into 2 equal pieces. Roll 1 half into a square and set aside. Roll the other half too similarly. Place one pastry square over the other, place a large plate over them and cut into roundels.', 'Line a baking tray with butter paper, dust icing sugar on it and place one puff pastry roundel on it. Leave some space on the edges and evenly spread the almond mixture in the centre.', 'Brush milk on edges, place the second puff pastry roundel and press edges with help on fork.', 'Make a dent in the centre and make a pattern with sharp knife point.', 'Break egg into a bowl and lightly beat it. Brush egg over the pastry and dust some icing sugar on top. Place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 10-15 minutes.', 'Bring the tray out and place the tart on a serving platter. Dust some more icing sugar on top. Serve with vanilla ice cream.']

title: Cranberry Centered Thumbnail Cookies
method: ['Preheat oven at 180oC.', 'Combine powdered brown sugar and butter in a bowl. Beat well with an electric beater till light and creamy.', 'Break egg in a bowl and whisk well. Add half the whisked egg to butter-sugar mixture and beat well. Add vanilla essence and beat again.', 'Break egg in a bowl and whisk well. Add half the whisked egg to butter-sugar mixture and beat well. Add vanilla essence and beat again.', 'Heat a non-stick pan. Add cranberries, sugar, lemon rind, lemon juice and some water, mix well and cook till cranberries turn pulpy. Switch off heat and blend into a fine paste using water as required.', 'Divide the dough into equal portions and shape them into small balls. Flatten them into cookies and place them on a baking tray.', 'Make a dent in the centre of each cookie with your thumb. Brush with remaining whisked eggs, sprinkle walnuts and fill the dents with the prepared cranberry paste.', 'Put the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 12-15 minutes.', 'Remove from heat, cool and serve.']

title: Mixed Flour Roti
method: ['In a bowl mix whole wheat flour, soya flour, jowar flour, bajra flour and salt. Add green chillies, onion, coriander leaves, turmeric powder and mix. Add enough water and knead into a soft dough. Rest the dough for ten minutes.', 'Divide the dough into twelve equal portions. Dust with flour and roll out into medium thick chapattis.', 'Heat a tawa and roast the chapattis till done on both sides.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Bread Rolls-SK KHazana
method: ['Put yeast in a bowl. Add castor sugar and 2 tablespoons warm water, stir and set aside till the yeast activates.', 'Mix together flour, activated yeast, milk powder and sufficient water on the worktop and knead to a soft dough. Add 1 tablespoon butter and salt and knead further. Put the dough in a bowl, cover with a damp muslin cloth and set aside to prove for 10-15 minutes.', 'Grease a baking tray with some oil.', 'Dust dough with some flour, divide into equal portions and shape into small balls. Place them on the greased tray, cover and set aside to prove for 20-25 minutes.', 'Preheat oven to 180degC.', 'Brush some milk on each ball and sprinkle black sesame seeds on top. Place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes.', 'Remove from heat, cool and serve.']

title: Malai Tangdi Kabab
method: ['Preheat oven at 200oC.', 'Slit chicken drumsticks without cutting through and place in a bowl. Add 1 tablespoon garlic paste, 1 tablespoon ginger paste, salt and 1 teaspoon lemon juice and rub well. Set aside to marinate for 15 minutes.', 'Combine 1 teaspoon garlic paste, 1 teaspoon ginger paste, remaining lemon juice, salt and cheese in another bowl and mix well. Add yogurt and mix again. Add white pepper powder, green cardamom powder, nutmeg powder and mix. Add chopped coriander and mix well. Add fresh cream and mix well.', 'Add marinated chicken and coat well. Set aside to marinate further for 15 minutes.', 'Place the marinated chicken drumsticks on a baking tray. Put the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 25 minutes.', 'Take the baking tray out after 10 minutes, brush with butter and bake again for the remaining 15 minutes.', 'Serve hot garnished with onion rings, mint sprig and lemon wedge.']

title: Bagel Sandwich
method: ['Take cream cheese in a bowl, add dill leaves and mix well.', 'Halve the bagels horizontally, and apply some butter on all the halves. .', 'On each base half, place a layer of iceberg lettuce leaves followed by tomato slices. Sprinkle salt and crushed black peppercorns over them.', 'Top with lollo rosso leaves, 2 smoked salmon slices, 4-5 avocado slices and sprinkle some crushed black peppercorns over. Keep some micro greens on top. Spread the cream cheese spread on the top halves of the bagels and cover each sandwich with them.', 'Keep them on serving platter and serve immediately with purple yam chips.']

title: Lemon Butter Shrimps-SK Khazana
method: ['Heat 1 tablespoon butter and 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan. Add shrimps and toss. Add salt and crushed peppercorns, mix and cook for 2-3 minutes. Transfer into a bowl and set aside.', 'Heat remaining butter and remaining oil in the same pan. Add garlic and onion, mix and saute till onion turns translucent.', 'Add lemon juice and mix. Add parsley and cream, mix well and simmer for a minute.', 'Add cooked shrimps and mix well. Add salt and crushed peppercorns, mix well and cook for a minute.', 'Take steamed rice in a serving plate, make a well in the centre, put some of the shrimps in it, sprinkle some parsley, garnish with parsley sprig and serve hot.']

title: Rajgira Parantha
method: ['Take amaranth flour in a large mixing bowl, add whole wheat flour, ginger-green chilli paste, cumin seeds, red chilli powder, salt, lemon juice and 1 tsp ghee. Mash the potato and add and mix well. Add sufficient water and knead to medium soft dough. Add coriander leaves and mix well. Add  1/2  tsp ghee and knead till smooth.', 'Apply oil on a plastic sheet. Divide the dough into medium equal portions and shape into balls. Place each dough ball on one half of the sheet, cover with remaining half and roll into a thin parantha.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa, place each parantha on it, cook on medium heat, turning sides till brown specs appear on both the sides. Apply a little ghee on both sides and cook each side for 1 minute.', 'Transfer the paranthe onto a serving plate and serve hot with yogurt.']

title: Baked Red Pumpkin Masala
method: ['Cut pumpkin into small cubes and put into a bowl. Cut onions into small cubes.', 'Put garlic cloves, ginger and green chillies in a chopper and chop finely.', 'Take a rectangular ovenproof glass dish and put pumpkin and onion cubes in it. Put the chopped garlic-ginger-green chillies over it.', 'Add bay leaves, black peppercorns, cumin seeds, coriander powder, turmeric powder, garam masala powder, dried mango powder, cumin powder, salt, lemon juice and oil and mix well with two spoons.', 'Cook in the oven at 220deg C for 8-10 minutes. Reduce the temperature to 180deg C and cook for 8-10 minutes more.', 'Take it out of the oven and serve hot.']

title: Mixed Kathol
method: ['Soak moong, chawli and moth in five cups of water for four hours.', 'Drain and pressure-cook with salt and three cups of water till two whistles. Keep aside along with the stock.', 'Heat oil in a kadai, add ajwain and fry for a minute. When it begins to change colour, add asafoetida along with one cup of water and cover immediately. Cook for two minutes.', 'Remove lid, add turmeric powder, red chilli powder, coriander powder, garam masala powder, kokum, jaggery and mix. Add moong, chawli and moth along with the stock.', 'Stir and continue to cook on high heat for five minutes. Add salt, chopped coriander leaves, stir and cook for a minute.', 'Add scraped coconut, mix and serve hot.']

title: Salted Caramel Mousse
method: ['To make mousse, melt chocolate in a bowl in microwave for 30 seconds and mix well.', 'Mix melted chocolate and whipped cream in another bowl and whisk well.', 'Put the mousse in a piping bag and pipe out into stemmed glasses.', 'To make salted caramel, heat sugar in a non-stick pan, add salt and let the sugar melt. Add 2 tbsps water and stir continuously till the sugar caramelizes. Add butter and fresh cream and mix well.', 'Top the mousse with salted caramel, garnish with nuts and white chocolate chips and serve immediately.']

title: Chicken Mandi
method: ['Grind together the two cardamoms, three cloves, five peppercorns, nutmeg powder and two bay leaves into a fine powder.', 'Take the chicken on a plate. Add the salt, lemon juice, saffron, prepared spice powder and two tablespoons chicken stock, rub well, cover and refrigerate to marinate for three to four hours.', 'Preheat oven at 200o C.', 'Place the marinated chicken on a baking tray, put the tray in the preheated oven and bake for ten minutes. Reduce the temperature to 150o C and bake further for thirty-five to forty minutes.', 'Heat olive oil in a non-stick pan. Add the remaining cardamoms, remaining cloves, remaining peppercorns and remaining bay leaves, mix and saute till fragrant.', 'Add the onion, mix and saute till golden. Add the rice, mix and saute for a minute.', 'Add the remaining chicken stock and salt and mix well. Cover and cook till the rice is fully done.', 'Serve the baked chicken on a bed of the cooked rice.']

title: Sticky Date Pudding
method: ['Preheat oven at 180oC. Grease a pudding mould with some butter and dust with some flour.', 'Boil 1 cup water in a non-stick pan. Bring it to boil and switch off the heat.', 'Take dates in a bowl, add hot water and baking soda and mix well. Set aside till soft and pulpy.', 'Cream butter and brown sugar with an electric beater till light and fluffy.', 'Add vanilla essence and blend well. Add eggs, one by one, and blend again. Add date mixture and blend nicely.Add flour and fold gently.', 'Pour the prepared mixture in the pudding mould, place the mould in the preheated oven and bake for 45-50 minutes.', 'To make toffee sauce, heat brown sugar in a non-stick pan and cook till it caramelizes. Add cream and mix well. Add butter and mix well.', 'Demould the pudding on a serving plate. Cut a slice.Top it with a scoop of vanilla ice cream and drizzle the prepared toffee sauce over. Serve immediately.']

title: Tuna Pasta Salad
method: ['Remove the seed from the avocado and scoop out its flesh and put into a bowl.', 'To prepare dressing, take red wine vinegar in a jar. Add grainy mustard, crushed peppercorns, salt and olive oil, cover and shake well.', 'Take pasta in another bowl. Add cherry tomatoes, celery, carrot, radish, spring onion bulbs, pecan nuts, avocado flesh and tuna and mix.', 'Add micro greens and iceberg lettuce and mix. Add the dressing and mix well.', 'Serve.']

title: Smoky Chicken Lasagna
Main ingredients: Boneless chicken breasts, Lasagne sheets, Tomato concasse, Fresh cream, White sauce, Mozzarella cheese, Cheddar cheese,

title: Karara Dum Aloo
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add mustard seed and when they splutter, add asafoetida and mix. Add potatoes and toss lightly. Add red chilli powder, chaat masala, roasted cumin powder and toss lightly.', 'Add bhuna masala, sugar, salt and mix. Cook for 1-2 minutes. Transfer into a serving bowl. Garnish with roasted peanuts, tamarind chutney, crushed papad and serve immediately.']

title: Kanch Kolar Bora
method: ['Peel the bananas and put them in a bowl, add potatoes and mash them all together with your hand ensuring that there are no lumps. Add onion, green chillies, salt and poppy seeds and mix well. Add coriander leaves and mix well. Add egg white and mix well.', 'Heat 1 tbsp oil in a non-stick shallow frying pan.', 'Divide the mixture into equal portions and shape them into balls and flatten them slightly.', 'Place these boras in the pan and shallow-fry on medium heat, turning sides, till golden brown and crisp on both sides', 'Transfer the boras on a serving platter and serve hot with tomato ketchup.']

title: Paneer Roll
method: ['Heat ghee in a non-stick pan, add refined flour and saute on low heat for half a minute.', 'Add milk and mix well. Add capsicum, sweet corn, salt, pepper powder, oregano and red chilli flakes and mix well.', 'Switch off heat and add cottage cheese, mix well and transfer into a bowl.', 'Crush vermicelli and spread on a plate.', 'Divide cottage cheese mixture into eight equal portions and shape them into cylinders. Coat the balls with crushed vermicelli and refrigerate for fifteen to twenty minutes.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Deep-fry the paneer rolls till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Arrange the paneer rolls on a serving plate and serve hot with tomato ketchup.']

title: Schezwan Fried Rice-SK Khazana
method: ['Heat 5-6 cups water in a deep non-stick pan. Add salt and bring to a boil. Add rice, mix lightly, cover and cook till rice is  3/4  done, stirring occasionally. Strain in a colander, spread on 2 plates and set aside to cool.', 'Chop carrot, French beans, capsicum, cabbage, spring onion greens and spring onion bulb.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick wok. Add half the chopped vegetables and saute till they soften slightly yet retain their crunchiness.', 'Add 1 tablespoon Schezwan sauce, a pinch of pepper powder and a pinch of broth powder and mix well. Add cooked rice and toss well. Let the rice get heated through.', 'Add some of the chopped spring onion greens, mix and cook for 1-2 minutes. Add  1/2  teaspoon vinegar and mix well. Similarly use up the remaining chopped vegetables and rice.', 'Garnish with some chopped spring onion greens and serve hot.']

title: Peach Melba Smoothie
method: ['Blend together peaches, strawberry crush, milk and ice cubes till smooth. Add chopped peaches and mix well.', 'Pour the smoothie equally into four tall glasses and serve immediately.']

title: Cheese Chicken Kebab
method: ['Break egg into a bowl. Add caraway seeds, green cardamom powder, green chilli paste, ginger-garlic paste, coriander leaves, roasted chana dal powder, turmeric powder, cream and yogurt and mix well.', 'Add cheese, salt, crushed black peppercorns and mix well. Add the chicken cubes and mix. Set aside to marinate for about half an hour.', 'String the chicken cubes onto skewers. Heat a non stick grill pan. Drizzle some oil and place the skewers on it.', 'Shallow fry, turning the skewers from time to time, till the kebabs are golden on all sides.', 'Cover the pan with aluminium foil to ensure even cooking. Serve hot.']

title: Virgin Mary Shots
method: ['Halve the tomatoes, put into a juicer and extract juice. Collect the juice in a bowl. Put 3 inch celery stalk in the juicer and extract juice. Collect the juice in the same bowl. Remove the froth and discard.', 'Chill 3 glasses in the refrigerator. Spread salt in a plate. Halve a lemon and rub it on the rims of the glasses. Dip the rims in the salt. Add lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce and Tabasco sauce to the tomato juice and mix well.', 'Cut 3 thin slices from the remaining lemon and make a slit on one side. Cut the remaining celery into thin sticks. Put a few ice cubes in each glass and pour the tomato juice over them.', 'Fit the lemon slices on their rims and put a celery stick in each glass. Serve immediately.']

title: Potato Salli - SK khazana
method: ['Peel potatoes and set aside. Pour plenty of water in a large bowl and sprinkle a little salt, soak the potatoes in it.', 'Thinly slice the potatoes and cut them into thin strips, soak them in the salted water.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. , Drain the potato strips, spread them on a kitchen towel and pat dry.', 'Drop in the potato strips into the hot oil and deep-fry till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Transfer them on a serving platter and serve.']

title: Paneer Pasanda
method: ['Take grated cottage cheese in a bowl, add cashewnuts, raisins and green chutney and mix well. Stuff this mixture into the slits of the cottage cheese cubes.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a non-stick pan, dip the stuffed cottage cheese cubes in cornflour slurry, slide into hot oil and deep fry till light golden. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'To make the gravy, heat oil in a deep non-stick bottom pan, add bay leaves, cinnamon, green cardamoms and cloves and saute till fragrant. Add onion puree and saute for 2-3 minutes. Add ginger-garlic paste and saute for 1-2 minutes', 'Add tomato puree, mix well and saute for 1-2 minutes. Add red chilli powder, coriander powder, turmeric powder, green chillies and salt, mix well and saute for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add 1 cup water and mix well. Cover and cook for 4-5 minutes.', 'Add cream and mix well. Add green cardamom powder and mix well.', 'Arrange the fried paneer pieces in a serving bowl, pour the gravy over. Garnish with fresh coriander sprig and serve hot.']

title: Bhajnee Thalipeeth
method: ['Mix salt, turmeric powder, onion and two teaspoons of olive oil with bhajnee flour. Add water as required, a little at a time and form into a soft dough.', 'Divide dough in to eight equal portions. Flatten each portion, on a moist banana leaf or a thick polythene sheet, into quarter inch thick discs of four to five inches diameter. Make a hole in the center of each thalipeeth.', 'Heat a tawa (griddle), spoon a little oil and transfer thalipeeth carefully onto the tawa. Spoon a little oil on the sides of thalipeeth and cook on low heat for one minute. Turn the thalipeeth and cook the other side for one minute or till crisp and golden brown.', 'Serve hot with a chutney of your choice.']

title: Vada Pav Chutney
method: ['Dry roast coconut in a non-stick pan. Transfer it on a plate and set aside to cool at room temperature.', 'Remove stems of dried red chillies and Kashmiri red chilies and dry roast in a non-stick pan on low heat for 2-3 minutes. Switch off heat and transfer on a plate to cool.', 'Grind together roasted coconut, chillies, garlic cloves, tamarind, peanuts and sea salt to a coarse powder.', 'Serve with vada pav.']

title: Chicken on Sugarcane Sticks
method: ['Grind chicken mince, garlic, shallots, salt, pepper powder, sugar, fish sauce, roasted rice powder and egg white to a paste. Transfer into a bowl.', 'Lightly grease your hands with oil and wrap a portion of the chicken mixture tightly around the middle of a sugarcane stick. Repeat with the remaining mixture and sugarcane sticks.', 'Heat some oil in a non-stick grill pan and grill the sticks, rotating them frequently, until lightly browned on all sides.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Katori Chaat
method: ['Peel potatoes and thickly grate them into a bowl of water. Wash them well. Drain on absorbent paper, cover with another absorbent paper and pat them dry. Transfer them into a bowl, add cornflour and mix well.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Line tea strainer with some of this mixture, place another tea strainer over the potato and press it gently to get the shape of a katori. Lower this into the hot oil and deep-fry till half done. Remove the strainer on the top and lower the strainer with the potato into hot oil again and deep-fry till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper. Make more katoris with the remaining potato mixture.', 'Place the katoris on a serving plate, fill them up with pindi chole, onion, tomato, and add a little yogurt, sweet tamarind chutney, green chutney, sprinkle some chaat masala, sev and coriander leaves and serve immediately.']

title: Methi Papad ki Sabzi
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add cinnamon, red chillies, mustard seeds and saute till the seeds splutter.', 'Add methi dana and mix. Add asafoetida, red chilli powder, turmeric powder and coriander powder and mix well. Add  1/2  cup water and salt, mix well and cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add jaggery and mix till it dissolves. Add kokum petals, mix and cook for 3-4 minutes.', 'Roughly tear papads into small pieces and add to the pan. Add sugar mix well and cook till the papads are soft.', 'Transfer the sabzi into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander leaves and serve immediately.']

title: Curry Bomb - SK Kazana
method: ['Heat oil in non-stick pan, add onion, celery and carrot, mix and saute for 1-2 minutes. Add ginger-garlic paste. Mix well and cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add tomato puree, mix well and saute for 1-2 minutes. Add chicken cubes and mix lightly. Add Tata Sampann Chicken Masala and salt, mix well and saute for 2-3 minutes on medium heat.', 'Add green peas and toss well. Add  1/2  cup water and coriander leaves and juice of  1/2  lemon and mix well. Set aside to cool down to room temperature.', 'Dust flour on the worktop, knead the pav dough lightly and divide into 6 portions and shape them into balls. Flatten each portion and roll out into a thick disc. Place some chicken mixture in the centre of each disc, gather the edges together and seal and shape them into a ball.', 'Place these buns on a baking tray, cover with damp muslin cloth and set aside for 15 minutes to rise.', 'Preheat the oven at 180@C.', 'Brush the buns with egg wash and sprinkle some onion seeds on top. Keep the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 20 minutes.', 'Brush melted butter over the buns, place them on a serving platter and serve hot with tomato ketchup.']

title: Lemon Grass Spa Drink
method: ['Heat 4 cups water in a non-stick pan. Roughly chop lemon grass stem and add to the water. Cut ginger roughly and add to the pan. Add 4 tbsps sugar and simmer on medium heat for 15-20 minutes.', 'Cut each lemon into 8 pieces and put into a glass. Add 4 tbsps sugar and crush with a muddler. Discard the lemon seeds. Strain the mixture into another bowl.', 'If you wish you can keep the lemon grass mixture overnight to infuse and strain the next day into the bowl with lemon-sugar mixture.', 'Put some of the mixture into each glass. Put some ice cubes. Fill up the glasses with drinking soda and mix.', 'Serve chilled with a lemon grass stick in each glass.']

title: Chicken Noodle Soup Thai Style
method: ['Cut lemon grass into diamond shaped pieces. Roughly chop ginger.', 'Heat chicken stock in a non-stick pan, add lemon grass and ginger and mix well.', 'Roughly chop spring onion bulbs.', 'Add chicken pieces and noodles to the pan and mix well. Tear lime leaves and add.', 'Roughly chop fresh red chilli and add to the pan. Add lemon juice and mix well. Add salt and mix well. Add spring onion bulbs.', 'Roughly chop coriander sprigs and add and mix again. Cook till chicken is done.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve piping hot garnished with a lemon wedge.']

title: Prawns Koliwada - SK Khazana
method: ['Take prawns in a bowl, add salt, chilli powder, cumin powder, garlic paste, ginger paste and lemon juice and mix well.', 'Add yogurt and gram flour, mix well and set aside for 10-15 minutes.', 'Heat sufficient oil in kadai. Deep-fry the marinated prawns till golden brown. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Sprinkle chaat masala over the prawns, arrange them on a serving platter and serve immediately with onion rings, lemon slices and a bowl of green chutney.']

title: Dal Fry -- SK Khazana
method: ['Wash toor dal with sufficient water and drain.', 'Heat a pressure cooker, add split Bengal gram, split skinless green gram and washed toor dal. Add salt,  1/2  tsp turmeric powder and 3 1/2  cups water, cover the cooker and cook under pressure till 4-5 whistles are released.', 'Meanwhile, finely chop onions and green chillies.', 'For the tadka, heat oil and ghee in a pan, add cumin seeds and let their colour change.', 'Add asafoetida, dried red chillies, garlic, ginger, curry leaves and green chillies, mix and saute on high heat till garlic turns golden.', 'Add onions, mix and saute till golden brown.', 'Open the lid of the pressure cooker and mash the cooked gram mixture with a masher.', 'Add tomatoes to the onion mixture and saute on high heat till they soften.', 'Add red chilli powder, remaining turmeric powder, cumin powder and salt and mix well and cook till the mixture is pulpy.']

title: Aloo Anardana Chaat
method: ['Put potatoes, onion, green chillies, mint leaves and coriander leaves in a bowl and mix. Add lemon juice, chaat masala, salt and peanuts and mix well.', 'Put some potato mixture and pomegranate pearls in individual serving bowls. Drizzle some green chutney and yogurt. Sprinkle some chaat masala and some sev. Repeat the process till all ingredients are used.', 'Drizzle some more yogurt and green chutney and put some sev on top.', 'Serve immediately garnished with chopped coriander.']

title: Chinese Style Corn Curd
method: ['Heat a non-stick pan. Mix together sweet corn, ten tablespoons cornflour, salt, white pepper powder and add to the pan. Cook on high heat for five minutes or till the mixture becomes thick.', 'Add spring onion greens and mix well. Remove from heat.', 'Grease a plate or a barfi tray with oil and dust with some cornflour. Shake off excess flour. Put the sweet corn mixture on it, spread evenly and smoothen the surface. Set aside till it cools down to room temperature and then refrigerate for two-three hours.', 'Cut into square or diamond shaped pieces and dust with some cornflour. Heat sufficient oil in a wok and deep-fry these pieces till golden. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Arrange on a serving plate and serve hot.']

title: Steamed Shrimp Wontons
method: ['Combine shrimps, ginger, spring onion greens, water chestnuts, salt, castor sugar, soy sauce and sesame oil in a bowl and mix well.', 'Dissolve cornstarch in sufficient water to make a thick slurry.', 'Place the wonton sheets on a worktop. Put spoonful of prepared shrimp mixture onto each, apply slurry on the edges, bring over one side and press to make a triangle. Fold further using slurry and give your choice of shape to the wontons.', 'Steam the wontons in a Chinese bamboo steamer for 5-7 minutes.', 'Serve hot with sweet chilli sauce.']

title: Chocolate Crinkle Cookies
ingredients: ['1 cup cocoa powder', '2 cups refined flour (maida)', '2 teaspoons baking powder', ' 1/4  teaspoon salt', '1 1/2  teaspoons instant coffee powder', '1 1/2  cups castor sugar', ' 1/2  cup oil', '3 eggs', '2 teaspoons vanilla essence', ' 3/4  cup icing sugar']
method: ['Sift refined flour, baking powder, salt and coffee powder into a large bowl.', 'To make the cookie dough, sift cocoa powder into a stand mixer bowl attached with a paddle attachment, add castor sugar and oil and mix till well combined.', 'Add eggs, one at a time, and mix after each addition. vanilla essence and mix well.', 'Add the flour mixture to the eggs mixture and gently fold in till well combined. Add Wrap the dough with cling film and refrigerate for 2-3 hours.', 'Preheat the oven to 180o C.', 'Divide the cookie dough into small portions and roll each portion into balls. Coat each ball with icing sugar and place them at equal distance on a baking tray lined with a silicon sheet.', 'Place the baking tray in the preheated oven and bake for 10-15 minutes. Remove from the oven and allow the cookies to cool slightly.', 'Gently lift and place them on a wire rack to cool down to room temperature.', 'Store in air tight container or serve.']

title: Hirvi Mirchi Cha Thecha
method: ['Break green chillies with hand. Heat olive oil in a pan. Add cumin seeds, garlic and green chillies and saute. Add sesame seeds and continue to saute.', 'Add sea salt, coconut and mix. Add coriander leaves and cook for three to four minutes. Put the mixture in a mortar and pound with the pestle to a coarse paste.', 'Serve with bhakris (type of Indian bread).']

title: Paunk ke Vade
method: ['Put raw sorghum in a food processor, add mint leaves, salt, red chilli powder, turmeric powder, chaat masala, baking soda, gram flour, onion, green chillies and ginger and process the mixture to a coarse paste. Transfer it into a bowl.', 'Heat oil in a kadai, drop small portions of the sorghum mix into hot oil and deep-fry, on medium heat, till crisp and golden. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Arrange them on a serving platter and serve hot with tomato ketchup.']

title: Chocolate Brownie Cookies
method: ['Mix together butter and chocolate chips in a bowl and melt in the microwave for 30 seconds. Remove from microwave and mix till smooth.', 'Break eggs in a mixing bowl and beat with an electric beater till fluffy. Add vanilla essence and whisk. Add castor sugar and cream till light. Add melted chocolate and beat well.', 'Sift together refined flour, cornflour, baking powder, cocoa powder and salt into the mixture and fold in till well incorporated.', 'Add walnuts and mixed chocolate chips and fold in again. Refrigerate for 30 minutes.', 'Preheat oven to 180o C. Line a baking tray with a parchment paper.', 'Divide the mixture into equal portions and place them on the lined tray keeping a little distance between each. Put the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 10-15 minutes.', 'Remove from oven and cool. Serve with milk.']

title: Karwari Coconut Prawn Dry
method: ['Take prawns in a large bowl. Add salt and turmeric powder and keep aside to marinate for 10-15 minutes.', 'Take coconut and red chillies in a mixer jar. Add sufficient water and grind to a smooth paste.', 'Heat oil in a nonstick pan. Add onions and saute till translucent.', 'Add ground paste and saute for 2 minutes.', 'Add prawns and cook for 5-10 minutes or till prawns are well cooked.', 'Transfer into a serving dish garnish with coconut and serve hot.']

title: Bajra Risotto
method: ['Heat olive oil in a non-stick pan, add butter and let it melt. Finely chop onion and add to the pan, saute till translucent. Add garlic and saute well for 2 minutes.', 'Add white wine, mix well and cook for 2-3 minutes. Add cooked bajra and mix well. Cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add thyme sprigs and crushed black peppercorns and mix well. Grate parmesan cheese into the risotto and add fresh cream and mix well. Cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, sprinkle chilli flakes and crushed black peppercorns. Garnish with parsley and serve hot.']

title: Hearty Donuts
method: ['Heat milk in a deep non-stick pan. Add castor sugar and heat till the sugar melts.', 'Take yeast in a bowl. Add some of the sweetened milk and mix well till yeast dissolves. Set aside.', 'Sift flour into another bowl and make a well in the centre.', 'Add butter to the pan and heat further till the butter melts and the milk boils.', 'Add activated yeast in the well and mix well. Add remaining sweetened milk-butter mixture and mix well.', 'Separate egg yolks from the whites and add the yolks to the flour mixture. Mix well into a soft dough.', 'Dust the worktop with some flour, place the dough on it and knead well. Dust a large bowl with flour, place the dough in it, cover with a cling film and place in a warm place for 1 hour.', 'Dust the worktop again with some flour and place the proved dough on it. Roll out into 1 inch thick sheet. Using large heart shaped cookie cutter cut out heart shapes from the sheet. Place a small heart shaped cookie cutter in the centre of the large ones and cut out so that a hollow area is formed. Use the smaller hearts as well and set aside to prove for 10-15 minutes.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Deep-fry the heart shaped donuts till golden. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Melt the chocolate in a microwave for a minute. Remove from heat and mix till smooth. Add food colour and mix well.', 'Fill a piping bag fitted with a nozzle with strawberry jam and pipe the jam into the smaller donuts from the back.', 'Drizzle coloured chocolate on the larger donuts and sprinkle colourful balls and stars on top. Dust the jam filled donuts with icing sugar and refrigerate till set.', 'Drizzle coloured chocolate on the larger donuts and sprinkle colourful balls and stars on top. Dust the jam filled donuts with icing sugar and refrigerate till set.']

title: Peanut Jam French Toast
method: ['Break eggs into a bowl. Add castor sugar, cream, milk and whisk well.', 'Spread peanut butter on four bread slices and jam on the remaining slices. Now sandwich the slices in such a way that peanut butter and jam face each other.', 'Heat the butter in a non-stick pan. Dip the sandwiches in the egg mixture and cook in the pan, turning sides till evenly golden on both sides.', 'Cut into triangles and sprinkle icing sugar on top. Serve immediately.']

title: Fried Gnocchi
method: ['Take a medium size bowl and add potatoes into it. Sprinkle some water and microwave it for 2 minutes.', 'Take a large mixing bowl; add  1/2  cup refined flour, salt, garlic powder, onion powder, nutmeg powder, paprika powder, lemon pepper, mix well.', 'Remove the potatoes from microwave and grated it when the potatoes are still hot.', 'Add the grated potato into the refined flour mixture and knead it into soft dough.', 'Add parmesan cheese powder and knead well.', 'Grease the palm with some oil; take a small portion of the dough and shape it to a tiny ball.', 'Coat the fork with some refined flour, place the portion of dough over it and roll to prepare the gnocchi.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadhai; add the shaped gnocchi and fry them on medium heat for three to four minutes or till it turns golden brown in colour.', 'Remove the fried gnocchi on an absorbent paper and serve immediately.']

title: Paan Ice Cream
method: ['Bring milk to a boil and cook till it reduces to one third its volume. Remove from heat and add sugar and mix. Add khoya and mix. Set aside to cool.', 'Add fennel seeds, gulkand, green cardamom powder, paan leaves and meetha paan and blend everything together in a blender. Strain the mixture.', 'Transfer into an ice cream tin and cover with the lid. Keep it in the deep freezer for four to six hours or till well set.', 'Unmould, slice and serve immediately.']

title: Chicken Bhuna Fry
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add onion and saute till golden. Add ginger-garlic paste, mix well and saute for 2 minutes.', 'Add tomatoes, mix and saute till tomatoes turn soft and pulpy.', 'Cut chicken breasts into small pieces.', 'Add red chilli powder, turmeric powder and coriander powder and mix well. Add  1/4  cup water, mix well and cook for 3-4 minutes.', 'Add salt, mix well and cook till the oil separates. Reduce heat, add yogurt, mix well and cook for 3-4 minutes.', 'Add chicken pieces, mix well and cook on high heat. Add cashewnut-almond powder, mix well and cook till the chicken is fully done.', 'Add garam masala powder and mix well. Cook for a minute.', 'Garnish with chopped coriander and serve hot.']

title: Eggs Spinach Wrap
method: ['Break the eggs into a bowl, add salt and whisk well with a fork.', 'Heat 2 tsps oil and 1 tsp butter in a non-stick pan, add green chillies and onion, mix and saute till onion turns translucent.', 'Add mushrooms, spinach, sweetcorn, salt and burnt garlic, mix well and cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add mustard paste, mix well and cook for 1 minute. Transfer into a bowl and set aside to cool down.', 'For each portion, heat 1 tsp oil in the same pan, add  1/4  the egg mixture and spread it evenly.', 'Spread some spinach mixture on one end of the eggs and sprinkle some cheese on top.', 'Loosen the edges and start rolling starting from the end where the stuffing has been spread. Cook on both sides for a minute. Similarly cook more wraps with the remaining ingredients.', 'Cut each wrap into 4 pieces and arrange them on serving plates and serve hot with tomato ketchup.']

title: Rajma Cheese Parantha - SK Khazana
method: ['Take whole wheat flour in a large bowl, add cooked rajma, onion, crushed coriander seeds, dried pomegranate seeds powder, chopped coriander, chopped mint, chilli powder and salt. Add  3/4  cup of cooked kidney beans liquor and mash the kidney beans using your finger and knead into a soft dough. Add oil and knead again. Cover with a damp muslin cloth and set aside for 10-15 minutes.', 'For the stuffing, grate processed cheese and mozzarella cheese in a bowl. Add chopped coriander and green chilli, mix well.', 'For making the parantha, dust the worktop with flour. Take a portion of the dough, flatten it and make a cavity in the centre. Stuff with a portion of the cheese stuffing and bring the sides to the centre to seal and roll into a parantha.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa, place the parantha on it and cook for 1-2 minutes on each side, flip and apply oil and cook further for 1-2 minutes. Flip again and apply oil on it and cook further for 1 minute.\nTransfer the prepared parantha on a serving plate and serve hot with yogurt.']

title: Creamy Cajun Potatoes
ingredients: ['10-12 baby potatoes, parboiled with skin', 'Oil for deep-frying', '2 tablespoons mayonnaise', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon dried chilli flakes', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon dried parsley', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon onion powder', '1 teaspoon paprika', 'Salt to taste', 'Finely chopped onion for garnishing', 'Finely chopped parsley for garnishing']
method: ['Lightly press baby potatoes between palms, place on a plate and set aside.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a pan. Deep-fry baby potatoes till golden-brown. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Heat mayonnaise in another non-stick pan. Add oregano, chilli flakes, basil, parsley, thyme, garlic powder, onion powder, paprika powder, salt and mix well. Add 2 tablespoons water and mix once again.', 'Add fried baby potatoes, mix and remove from heat.', 'Serve hot garnished with chopped onions and parsley.']

title: Hare Masalewali Machchli
method: ['Rub salt, turmeric powder and 1 tbsp lemon juice on pomfret fish. Refrigerate for 10-15 minutes.Grind coriander leaves, coconut, green chillies, ginger, garlic, green garlic with greens, salt, coriander seeds, cumin seeds and remaining lemon juice with little water into fine paste.', 'Heat oil in non stick pan. Using your fingertips apply the ground paste all over the fish liberally, ensuring that the paste is applied inside the slits too.', 'Combine rice flour and semolina on a plate. Add salt and mix well.Place fish on flour mixture and coat generously. Press firmly and set aside for 5 minutes.', 'Place fish in pan, cover and cook on medium heat for 5 minutes. Flip, cover and cook the other side on medium heat for 5 minutes. Serve hot.']

title: Creamy Khoya Chawal
method: ['Mix saffron and milk in a bowl, keep it in microwave on high for 30 seconds.', 'Slice almonds and chop pistachios.', 'Heat ghee in a non-stick pan, add green cardamoms, cloves, raisins, almonds, pistachios and cashewnuts and saute till fragrant.', 'Add sugar and mix well. Add saffron dissolved in milk and khoya and mix well. Add boiled basmati rice and mix it well.', 'Cover the pan and continue to cook for a few minutes. Serve hot.']

title: Chilli Cheese Chutney Sandwich
method: ['Heat one tablespoon of butter in a non-stick pan, add onion and capsicum and saute for four to five minutes.', 'Remove from heat and transfer in a bowl. Add cheese, salt and green chutney and mix well.', 'Apply one tablespoon of butter on each of four bread slices and spread capsicum mixture on them. Cover with remaining four bread slices.', 'Heat a sandwich toaster. Brush some butter on top of the sandwiches and place them in the toaster. Toast till golden.', 'Remove from heat, cut into triangles and serve hot with green chutney.']

title: Orange Chocolate Bark
method: ['Line a barfi tray with parchment paper.', 'Put white chocolate in a microwave bowl and melt in the microwave for one minute. Remove from microwave and bring down to room temperature. Similarly, melt dark chocolate.', 'Add orange essence, edible orange colour and orange zest to the melted white chocolate and mix well.', 'Pour the melted dark chocolate into the lined tray and lightly pour the white chocolate mixture on top.', 'Create a marble effect using a toothpick and refrigerate for thirty to forty minutes.', 'Cut into uneven shapes and serve.']

title: Cream Cheese Toast - SK Khazana
method: ['Mix together cream cheese, chives, parsley and crushed peppercorns in a bowl. Add salt and mix.', 'Heat a sandwich griller and brush with some butter.', 'Spread a spoonful of cream cheese mixture on 4 bread slices and place them on the griller, two slices at a time. Top each with 5-6 blueberries and 3 walnut kernel halves.', 'Spread a spoonful of cream cheese mixture on the remaining bread slices and place them over the slices on the griller, mixture side facing downwards.', 'Brush some more butter over them, cover and grill till grill marks appear on both sides of the sandwiches. Repeat this process with the remaining bread slices.', 'Cut into triangles and serve immediately.']

title: French Beans Sabzi
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add mustard seeds, and once they begin to splutter, add curry leaves, asafoetida and beans and mix well.', 'Add salt, mix well and cook for 3-4 minutes. Add a little water, mix well and cook for 1-2 minutes. Add a pinch of baking soda and mix.', 'Add ginger-green chilli paste and coriander leaves, mix well and cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with coconut and serve hot with chapattis.']

title: Easy Southern Pralines
method: ['Line a baking tray with a silicon mat.', 'Heat castor sugar and brown sugar in a non-stick pan and cook till they caramelize.', 'Remove from heat, add vanilla essence, Cajun spice, salt and pecans and mix till the mixture thickens.', 'Place spoons full of the mixture on the lined tray and set aside to cool.', 'Serve.']

title: Missi Roti
method: ['Take gram flour and whole wheat flour in a bowl. Roast cumin seeds, carom seeds, peppercorns and dry pomegranate seeds. Pound them to a powder.', 'Add green chillies, onion, salt, turmeric powder, coriander leaves and mix well. Add sufficient water and knead. Add one tablespoon of oil and the pounded spice powder and knead into a dough.', 'Cover and rest the dough for about fifteen minutes. Divide into sixteen equal portions and roll into balls. Further roll each portion into a roti.', 'Heat a tawa and roast the rotis with a little oil till both sides are well done. Serve hot with a dollop of butter.']

title: Molten Lava Cake
method: ['Preheat oven at 180oC.', 'Cream together butter and condensed milk in a bowl till light.', 'Sift together flour, cocoa powder, baking powder and baking soda into the butter mixture and fold well. Add milk and fold till well combined into a smooth batter.', 'Fill a piping bag with the prepared batter and pipe out portions into individual silicon muffin moulds filling 3/4th.', 'Put the moulds on a baking tray, place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes. Remove from heat and cool to room temperature.', 'Whisk melted chocolate till smooth and tempered. Pour the chocolate on an OHP sheet and spread with a spatula. Refrigerate till semi-set.', 'Add cinnamon powder to the chocolate ganache and mix well.', 'Discard the rough upper part of the baked muffins. Use a small cookie cutter to make a hole in the centre of the muffins, cutting through. Place the prepared muffins on serving plates.', 'Fill another piping bag with the cinnamon flavoured chocolate ganache, reserving some.', 'Reheat the reserved ganache in a microwave till hot.', 'Pipe out the flavoured ganache to fill half the muffin holes.', 'Use a cookie cutter to mark discs of the size of the muffin on the semi-set chocolate on OHP sheet. Refrigerate again till fully set. Discard the extra chocolate to get chocolate discs.', 'Place one chocolate disc on each muffin. Pour the hot chocolate ganache on the disc and let it melt.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Masoor Cutlets
