method: ['Cut cottage cheese into thick slices. Cut 4 roundels from them using a medium size cookie cutter. Slit the roundels without cutting through and reserve the left over cottage cheese pieces.', 'Sprinkle salt and pepper powder to taste on both sides of the roundels and set aside.', 'Finely chop ginger. Add green chillies to it and chop further.', 'Chop 7-8 coriander sprigs alongwith the stems and transfer all the chopped ingredients into a bowl. Grate cheese into it and add 1 tbsp mint chutney. Mix well and add  1/4  tsp pepper powder and salt and mix well. Mash the reserved cottage cheese pieces and add. Mix well.', 'Stuff the prepared mixture into the slit cottage cheese roundels and press lightly.', 'Break papads into smaller pieces and crush further in a food processor into smaller pieces. Spread the crushed papad on a plate.', 'Combine refined flour with sufficient water in a bowl and mix well into a smooth and thin slurry. Add salt and remaining mint chutney and mix well.', 'Dip prepared cottage cheese sandwiches in the slurry and coat in the crushed papad. Repeat this procedure once again.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Deep-fry double crusted cottage cheese sandwiches on medium heat till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'To make tomato-plum salsa, roughly chop plum and tomato. Chop green chilli and roughly chop coriander sprigs and transfer all these in a bowl. Add crushed peppercorns, salt and lemon juice and mix well.', 'Place some tomato-plum salsa on a serving plate. Put the cottage cheese sandwiches on top and drizzle some more salsa on top. Garnish with few coriander sprigs and serve immediately.']

title: Crispy Vegetables with Honey and Chilli
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Put 3 tablespoons refined flour in a bowl, add 2 tablespoons potato starch, 1 1/2  tablespoons cornflour, black pepper powder, salt and baking powder and sufficient water, a little at a time, and whisk to make a smooth and semi-thick batter.', 'Take asparagus, zucchini, broccoli florets, button mushrooms, babycorns and carrot in another bowl, add salt, pepper powder and enough batter to lightly coat all the vegetables.', 'Add remaining potato starch and remaining cornstarch and mix well.', 'Put the half the vegetables carefully into hot oil and deep-fry on high heat till crisp. Fry the remaining vegetables similarly.', 'Meanwhile to make sauce, heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan, add garlic and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add Kashmiri red chilli paste, mix and saute on medium heat for 2-3 minutes. Add celery, mix and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add honey, salt and pepper powder and mix well. Drain the fried vegetable directly in the sauce and toss well.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with spring onion greens and serve hot.']

title: Penne Ala Vodka
method: ['Roughly chop onion. Chop celery. Heat olive oil in a non stick wok and add onion and celery. Crush garlic cloves and add and saute.', 'Add tomatoes and mix. Add salt, chilli sauce and crushed peppercorns and mix. Add 2 tbsps vodka and mix well and cook till the tomatoes soften. Transfer into a bowl and allow it to cool slightly.', 'Transfer into a mixer jar and blend into a puree.Put the pasta in the wok, add the puree and mix well.Add remaining vodka and mix. Add cream and mix and cook till the penne gets heated through. Serve hot']

title: Chicken Chilli Rice
method: ['Heat  1/2  tablespoon oil in a non-stick wok. Add garlic, ginger and sliced green chillies and saute for 2 minutes.', 'Cut chicken into cubes and add to the pan. Mix well and cook till the chicken is half done.', 'Add rice, chicken stock, soy sauce, green chilli sauce, salt and pepper powder, mix well and bring to a boil. Cover and cook on low heat till both the rice and chicken are cooked.', 'Cut spring onion bulbs into halves. Reserve two of the spring onion green stalks.', 'Heat 1 teaspoon oil in a small non-stick pan. Add spring onion bulbs and capsicum and saute for 2 minutes.', 'Chop the reserved spring onion green stalks.', 'Add sauteed vegetables and some of the chopped spring onion greens to the rice and mix well.', 'Serve hot garnished with remaining chopped spring onion greens and a slit green chilli.']

title: Paneer Tawa Masala
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds, onion, salt and ginger-garlic paste, mix and saute till translucent.', 'Add tomato, mix well and saute till tomato turns pulpy. Add tomato puree and mix.', 'Simmer for 2-3 minutes, add green chillies and green capsicum, mix well and saute for 3-4 minutes.', 'Add turmeric powder, garam masala powder, coriander powder and red chilli powder and mix well. Add  1/2  cup water and mix. Add salt, mix and simmer for 4-5 minutes.', 'Add cottage cheese cubes and mix well. Add lemon juice, mix well and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander sprig and serve warm.']

title: Gulab Jamun Malpua - SK Khazana
method: ['Take the gulab jamuns in a large bowl and crush them with a fork. Add refined flour, sugar, green cardamom powder, saffron water, salt and milk and whisk well. Add a pinch of baking powder and mix well.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai, drop ladle full of batter to form a disc. Deep-fry on medium heat till golden brown and crisp. Drain on a plate.', 'Place a few malpuas on a serving plate, drizzle some the gulab jamun sugar syrup over them and sprinkle pistachios on top. Apply silver varq and serve.']

title: Seekh Parantha - SK Khazana
method: ['Take whole wheat flour in a bowl, add salt, 1 tsp oil and sufficient water and knead to a semi stiff dough. Add 1 tsp oil and knead again to a semi soft dough. Set aside to rest for 10-15 minutes.', 'Divide the dough into equal portions and roll into balls. Flatten the balls, drizzle some oil on each ball and roll out into a big parantha. Prick all over with a fork.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai and deep fry the prepared paranthas. Drain on an absorbent paper and set aside.', 'Heat sufficient oil in shallow non-stick pan. Place the seekh kebabs and shallow-fry till golden brown and crisp. Set aside.', 'Place each parantha on a serving plate. Place 2 seekh kebabs on it, drizzle some green chutney. Place some onion rings over the kababs, squeeze some lemon juice and sprinkle some chaat masala powder.', 'Garnish with mint leaves and serve immediately.']

title: Lapsi
method: ['Heat ghee in a non-stick kadai, add green cardamoms and fennel seeds, mix and saute till fennel seeds turn brown. Add broken wheat, mix well and saute on medium heat, stirring continuously, for 8-10 minutes or till it turns golden brown in colour.', 'Meanwhile heat 3 cups water in a deep non-stick pan.', 'Add hot water to the sauteed daliya, mix well, cover and cook, on medium heat, stirring occasionally for 10-15 minutes.', 'Add sugar, cashewnuts, almonds and raisins, mix well and cook for 2-3 minutes or till the sugar melts.', 'Transfer lapsi in a serving bowl and serve hot, garnished with almond slivers.']

title: Baked Mango Cheese Cake
method: ['Preheat the oven to 180degC.', 'Take crushed biscuits in a bowl. Add melted butter and mix. Take a spring bottom tin and line the bottom with this mixture.', 'Press lightly and keep the tin in the refrigerator to chill. Break eggs into a bowl. Add sugar and whisk with a hand blender till frothy.', 'Take cream cheese in another bowl. Add mango pulp and mix with a hand blender. Add eggs and mix. Pour this mixture over the biscuit base in the spring bottom tin.', 'Spread mango cubes over it Keep the tin in the preheated oven and bake for about forty minutes or till well set.', 'Take it out of the oven and let it cool. Keep it in the refrigerator to chill.', 'Heat half cup water in another pan, add mango jelly crystals and cook till well dissolved. Cool to room temperature. Pour it over the chilled cheesecake and keep it in the refrigerator to chill again.', 'Serve chilled.']

title: Lauki Kofta Curry
method: ['Squeeze the grated bottle gourd to remove all the moisture and put it in a mixing bowl. Add gram flour, 1 teaspoon red chilli powder and salt and mix well to make a batter.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai, drop small portions of the batter into hot oil and deep-fry till light golden. Drain the kofte on absorbent paper.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan, add onions and saute till they turn a light golden.', 'Add tomato puree, mix and saute till the mixture thickens.', 'Add remaining red chilli powder, turmeric powder and coriander powder and mix well.', 'Add salt, mix well and cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Place the kofte in a serving bowl and pour the gravy over them. Sprinkle a little garam masala powder and garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot.']

title: Idli Fry-SK Khazana
method: ['Take idli cubes in a bowl, add some cornflour and mix.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai And deep-fry till light golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan. Add mustard seeds and let them splutter.', 'Add red chillies, curry leaves, black gram, Bengal gram, asafoetida, molagapodi, some water and salt, mix and cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add fried idli pieces and toss well. Add some more water, mix and let it get heated through.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Stuffed Eggplant Rings-SK Khazana
method: ['Preheat oven to 180o C.', 'Place a small cookie cutter in the centre of each slice and cut out a circular slice to get a doughnut shaped slice.', 'Put the cut out slices in a bowl and mash well.Add potatoes, processed cheese, cheddar cheese, chilli flakes and salt and mix well.', 'Grease a baking tray with some oil and place the hollowed eggplant slices on it.', 'Stuff the centre portions of each slice with potato mixture, brush some oil and sprinkle some panko crumbs on top.', 'Put tray in preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes or till the crust turns golden brown.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Freak Shake
method: ['Put vanilla ice cream into a blender jar and add milk. Break 5 doughnuts and add and blend to a smooth mixture.', 'Take chocolate-hazelnut spread in a bowl and dip the rim of each of 4 mason jars in it. Pour the milkshake equally into each jar.', 'Sprinkle pistachio shavings on the chocolate-hazelnut spread and pipe out whipped cream over the milkshake till it rises well above the rim of the jar.', 'Halve marshmallows, skewer each piece onto a satay stick and toast over direct flame for a minute. Place 2-3 toasted marshmallow pieces over whipped cream in each jar. Sprinkle chocolate chips and chocolate shavings on top.', 'Coat 4 chocolate sticks with chocolate hazelnut-spread from all sides and place one in each jar along with a plain chocolate stick.', 'Top each mason jar with 1 of the remaining doughnuts and serve immediately.']

title: Nimbu Pani
method: ['Squeeze juice of lemons into a bowl. Add sugar, salt, black salt, few fresh hand torn mint leaves and mix well.', 'Add sufficient water and mix well till sugar dissolves.', 'Add ice cubes, pour into individual glasses and serve chilled garnished with a mint sprig.']

title: Rajma Rasmisa
method: ['Pressure cook rajma with five cups of water and salt till totally cooked and soft. Heat oil in a deep non-stick pan. Add bay leaves and onion (you can grate the onion if you wish).', 'Add ginger and garlic and continue to saute till the mixture turns golden. Add tomato puree, mix and continue to cook. Add coriander powder, cumin powder, red chilli powder, turmeric powder and cook till the oil leaves the masala.', 'Add rajma along with the cooking liquour and mix. Adjust salt and add garam masala powder. Lower the heat and simmer for about fifteen to twenty minutes on low heat. Serve hot with steamed rice.']

title: Grilled Tofu Sandwich
method: ['Heat oil in non stick pan, add onion and saute.', 'Put paneer in a bowl, add tofu and mix.', 'When onion becomes transluscent, add cherry tomatoes, salt and red chillies and sautetill tomatoes soften. Cool slightly.', 'Put peanuts in a mixer jar, add tomato mixture and blend till smooth. Add this to the paneer-tofu mixture and mix well.', 'Spread a thick layer of this mixture on 4 bread slices, cover each with bread slice. Brush the inside of the sandwich toaster with extra virgin olive oil, place a sandwich in it, close the toaster and toast over medium heat till golden and crisp on outside.', 'Cut into triangles and serve hot.']

title: Peas and Potato Soup with Salsa
Soft Centered White Chocolates
method: ['Melt white chocolate on a double boiler. Remove from heat, stir continuously and bring down to room temperature.', 'Pour melted chocolate into a small heart shape silicon chocolate mould and refrigerate for 1-2 minutes.', 'Pour back the melted chocolate from the mould into the bowl ensuring that the insides of the mould are still covered with chocolate.Scrape out the excess chocolate using a scraper. Tap the mould and refrigerate again for 1-2 minutes.', 'Fill a piping bag with the mixed fruit jam and pipe it out into the chocolate coated mould filling  1/2  of it.', 'Fill the remaining  1/2  of the mould with remaining melted chocolate and tap. Scrape out the excess chocolate using a scraper and refrigerate to set for 10-15 minutes.', 'Demould and serve.']

title: Kachia Moru
method: ['Grind together coconut, chilli powder, onion and cumin to a fine paste.', 'Pour buttermilk into a non-stick pan, add turmeric powder, curry leaves, salt, sugar, gram flour and the ground paste and mix well.', 'Cook on low heat, stirring continuously, till the mixture comes to a boil. Remove it from heat and let it cool, stirring occasionally.', 'Heat oil in a small non-stick pan, add mustard seeds and once they splutter add fenugreek seeds and red chillies and saute for one minute. Let the tempering cool and then add it to the buttermilk mixture and mix.', 'Pour into individual glasses and serve.']

title: Bhajnee Thalipeeth
method: ['Put bhajanee flour in a bowl, add salt, turmeric powder, onion, fresh coriander and two teaspoons oil and mix. Add water as required, a little at a time and mix into soft dough.', 'Divide the dough into eight equal portions. Flatten each portion on a plastic sheet into quarter inch thick disc of four to five inches diameter. Make a hole in the center of each thalipeeth.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa, transfer one thalipeeth carefully onto the tawa. Spoon a little oil on the sides and cook on low heat for one minute.', 'Turn the thalipeeth and cook the other side for one minute or till crisp and golden brown. Make the remaining thalipeeth similarly.', 'Place them on serving plates and serve hot with a blob of white butter or yogurt.']

title: Brown Rice Cakes
ingredients: ['1 1/2  cups quick cooking brown Basmati rice', 'Salt to taste', '2 fresh red chillies, chopped', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh coriander leaves', 'Crushed black peppercorns to taste', '2 tablespoons toasted white sesame seeds', '1 tablespoon ginger-garlic paste', '2 tablespoons corn flour', '1 teaspoon red chilli powder', ' 1/2  teaspoon turmeric powder', ' 1/4  teaspoon garam masala powder', ' 1/2  teaspoon dried mango powder (amchur)', 'Oil for shallow frying', 'Tomato ketchup for serving']
method: ['Take brown Basmati rice in a bowl. Add sufficient water and wash for 2-3 times. Add sufficient water and soak for 25-30 minutes. Drain well.', 'Boil 5-6 cups water in a deep non-stick pan, add salt and soaked rice and mix well. Cook for 15 minutes. Drain and set the rice aside.', 'Transfer the cooked rice into a bowl, add red chillies, coriander leaves, crushed black peppercorns, white sesame seeds, ginger-garlic paste, corn flour, red chilli powder, turmeric powder, garam masala powder, dried mango powder and salt and mix well.', 'Mash well with hands. Divide the mixture into equal portions and shape into tikkis. These are cakes.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a shallow non-stick pan. Arrange these cakes in the pan and shallow-fry on medium heat for 2 minutes or till the underside is golden and crisp. Flip and cook on other side for 2 minutes.  Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Arrange them on a serving platter and serve hot with tomato ketchup.']
Main ingredients: Quick cooking brown rice, Fresh red chillies, Fresh coriander leaves, Crushed black peppercorns, White sesame seeds, Ginger-garlic paste, Corn flour, Red chilli powder, Turmeric powder, Garam masala powder, Dried mango powder

title: Strawberry Detox Water
method: ['Hull the strawberries and chop roughly.', 'Put chopped strawberries, lemon slices, mint sprigs, cinnamon powder and sufficient water in individual mason jars.', 'Add ice cubes and stir well.', 'Serve chilled.']

title: Cheesy Corn Balls
method: ['Heat butter in a non stick pan. Add refined flour and saute for 1 minute. Add milk and whisk well so that there are no lumps. Switch off the heat and add cheese and mix. Drain corn kernels and add and mix well.', 'Add green chillies, little salt, black pepper powder and mix. Mash cooked rice and add. Chop a few sprigs fresh coriander leaves and add. Add 2 tbsps fresh bread crumbs and mix well and let it cool.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Spread a little breadcrumbs in a plate Divide the mixture into equal portions and shape them into balls.', 'Roll them in bread crumbs and deep-fry till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Arrange them on a serving plate. Cut a cheese slice into small triangles and place one on each cheese ball. Garnish with a little chopped coriander leaves and serve hot with tomato ketchup.']

title: Cream Corn and Egg on Toast
method: ['Toast brown bread slices in a toaster till crisp.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add ginger and green chillies and saute for a minute.', 'Add onion and saute for 2 minutes. Add turmeric powder, cream corn and salt and mix well.', 'Break eggs into the pan and mix. Add coriander leaves and mix and cook till the eggs are done.', 'Place the toasts on a serving plate. Spread the corn mixture on them. Garnish with a mint sprig and a spring onion flower and serve hot.']

title: Corn and Sprout Chaat - SK Khazana
method: ['Preheat the oven at 180o C.', 'Place the corn cobs on a baking tray, sprinkle oil, salt, crushed black peppercorns, 2 tbsps green chutney, 2 tbsps red chilli-garlic paste and some chaat masala and rub in well.', 'Keep the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 20-25 minutes. Bring the tray out of the oven and let the cobs cool completely. Separate the kernels off the cobs and put into a bowl.', 'Add mixed sprouts, capsicum, onion, tomatoes, jalapenos, chaat masala, coriander leaves, lemon juice, remaining red chilli-garlic paste and remaining green chutney and salt and mix well.', 'Transfer into serving plates, garnish with sev and serve immediately.']

title: Egg Fingers - SK Khazana
method: ['Break 6 eggs into a large bowl. Add salt, turmeric powder and crushed black peppercorns and whisk well with a fork.', 'Heat sufficient water in a steamer. Grease a dhokla thali with oil, pour the egg mixture in it. Place the dhokla thali in the steamer, cover and steam for 12-15 minutes. Take the thali out of the steamer and set it aside to cool down to room temperature.', 'Take refined flour on a shallow wide bowl, add rice flour, coriander leaves, dried red chilli flakes, crushed black peppercorns, onion powder, paprika and garlic powder and mix well. Add salt, mix and set aside.', 'Break the remaining egg in another bowl, add a pinch of salt and mix well.', 'Spread breadcrumbs on a plate, add a pinch of salt and mix well.', 'Loosen the sides and de-mould the steamed egg, place it on a worktop and cut into 2 inch strips.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a deep pan.', 'Coat each strip with the spiced flour mixture, dip in the egg and coat with breadcrumbs. Slide these fingers into hot oil and deep-fry till golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Transfer them into a serving bowl and serve hot with tomato ketchup.']

title: Prawns with Chilli Ginger
method: ['Put prawns in a bowl. Add salt and crushed peppercorns, mix well and set aside for ten to fifteen minutes.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add garlic, ginger and shallots, mix and saute for a minute.', 'Add chillies and lemongrass, mix and saute for a minute.', 'Add stock, stir and bring to a boil. Add prawns and bring to a boil. Adjust seasoning.', 'Add coriander leaves and mix well.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Palak Paneer Quesadills
method: ['Heat olive oil in a non-stick pan. Add cumin seeds and saute for 30 seconds.', 'Add garlic and saute for 1 minute. Add spinach, mix and cook for 2 minutes. Add salt and mix.', 'Switch off heat, add cream and lemon juice and mix well. Divide into 4 portions.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa. Place each tortilla on it, one at a time, and spread a portion of the spinach mixture on top.', 'Grate some cottage cheese over spinach, top with processed cheese and mozzarella cheese. Cover with another tortilla and drizzle some olive oil on the sides. Cook, flipping, till the cheese melts and both sides turn golden.', 'Cut into wedges and serve hot with tomato ketchup.']

title: Vegetable Chop - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat a non-stick pan, add fennel seeds, coriander seeds, cumin seeds and green cardamom and roast on low heat till fragrant and take the pan off the heat and cool.', 'Transfer the roasted mixture into a blender jar and grind to a fine powder.', 'Heat 1 tbsp oil in a non-stick wok, add the peanuts and saute till golden brown. Drain them into a bowl.', 'In the same hot oil, add coconut slices and saute till they turn golden brown. Drain them into the same bowl.', 'In the same hot oil, add panch phoran and ginger-garlic paste, mix well and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add carrot, beetroot, green chillies, salt and sugarmix well, cover and cook for 10-15 minutes or till the mixture softens.', 'Add the spice powder, peanuts and coconut and mash the mixture well. Take it off the heat and transfer to a bowl.Add potatoes and mix till well combined. Add coriander leaves and mix well.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Grease palms of the hands with oil and divide the mixture into equal portions. Shape each portion into a cylindrical chop.', 'Dip each chop in cornflourslurry, roll in dried breadcrumbs and repeat one more time.', 'Slide in each chop into the hot oil and deep-fry till golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Put some kasundi in each serving bowl, top it with some onion slices and keep a chop in each bowl. Garnish with coriander sprigs and serve hot.']

title: Spicy Stir Fried Squids
method: ['Put squids in a bowl, add 1 tablespoon spring onion greens, 1 tablespoon garlic, crushed peppercorns, some of the green chillies,  1/2  tablespoon soy sauce and salt and mix well. Set aside to marinate for 30 minutes.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a pan.', 'Break egg into a bowl, whisk well, add half of it to the squids and mix well. Add cornstarch and mix again.', 'Deep-fry the squids in hot oil till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Diagonally slice fresh red chillies.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan. Add fresh red chillies, remaining green chillies, celery and coriander stems, mix and saute on high heat for a minute.', 'Add ginger and saute for a minute. Add remaining garlic and saute for 30 seconds. Add remaining soy sauce and some water and mix well.', 'Add fried squids and toss. Add mint leaves, remaining spring onion greens and crushed peppercorns and toss.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Arbi Ke Patton Ki Subzi
method: ['Heat oil in a pressure cooker. Add asafoetida, mustard seeds and methi dana.', 'When the mustard seeds splutter, add garlic, curry leaves, green chillies, chana dal, turmeric powder, gram flour and mix well.', 'Add jaggery, coconut, peanuts, arbi leaves and stems, tamarind paste, salt and mix well.', 'Add 4 cups of water, cover and cook on high heat for 10-12 minutes or till 5-6 whistles are given out.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot.']

title: Gur Papdi - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat ghee in a non-stick pan, add whole wheat flour and saute, stirring continuously, for 8-10 minutes or till it is golden brown in colour.', 'Take the pan off the heat, add nutmeg powder, green cardamom powder and jaggery and mix well.', 'Grease an aluminium burfi tray, put the mixture into it and spread evenly. Sprinkle slivered almonds and pistachios all over the surface and set aside to cool.', 'Cut into squares, arrange on serving platter and serve.']

title: Watermelon Fruit Basket
method: ["To prepare basket, take a watermelon and cut off a thin slice from the lower end so that watermelon stands and doesn't topple. Keep it standing on the worktop, make small slits on either side of the stem and cut it down to half the melon from both sides. Then cut it horizontally and separate the slice from either side. What will remain is a thick handle.", 'With a scooper, scoop out some red flesh balls from the handle on either side and put them in a bowl. Remove the remaining flesh with a sharp knife to give the handle a proper shape.', 'Scoop out the flesh from the lower half of the watermelon with the scooper to make a hollow. Now we have the melon cut in the shape of a basket.', 'With a sharp knife, make zigzag cuts or triangles on the rim of both sides of the basket. Similarly make zigzag cuts on either side of the handle. Trim the stem.', 'Put green apple, red apple, muskmelon, papaya cubes, red grapes and a few watermelon balls in the basket.', 'Quarter one orange and slice each quarter into thin crescents.', 'Line all around the top edge of the basket with orange slices. Break one slice in middle and place in centre over the fruits and place a red grape over it.', 'Place the filled basket in the centre of a pineapple shaped tray or any other tray. Fix a flowery hairband on the outer side of the handle and secure it with toothpicks.', 'Make zigzag cuts in the centre of the remaining orange and gently separate the top and bottom halves. Place a red grape in centre of both halves and secure it with a toothpick and place them on the side of the basket orange over the tray.', 'In two hollowed halves of a pineapple, add remaining muskmelon, remaining papaya, watermelon scoops and orange slices. Peel and slice the kiwi and place the slices over the fruits in the hollowed out pineapple halves.', 'Cut remaining kiwi into half, peel the outer skin, cut slices, and place them in the basket.', 'Place 2 whole yellow bananas on either side of the basket. Serve immediately.']

title: Methiwale Chawal
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Slice onion.', 'Add cumin seeds and onion to the pan and saute till onion is translucent.', 'Add fenugreek leaves and mix well. Add salt and mix again and saute for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add tomatoes, turmeric powder and coriander powder and mix well. Add rice and 3 cups water and mix well. Add red chilli powder and mix well. Cover and cook on medium heat till the rice is done.', 'Transfer into a serving plate and serve hot.']

title: Chilli Chicken - SK Khazana
method: ['Take chicken cubes in a bowl, add salt, pepper powder, egg, 1 tablespoon cornflour and refined flour and mix.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Gently slide in the chicken cubes and deep-fry till crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'To make the sauce, heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan. Add garlic, chopped green chillies, slit green chilles, onion, capsicum and salt, mix and saute for a few seconds.', 'Add chicken stock, soy sauce and fried chicken pieces, mix well and bring to a boil.', 'Mix together remaining cornflour and remaining stock in a bowl to make slurry. Add this to the sauce, mix and cook till the sauce thickens.', 'Add chilli sauce and vinegar and mix well.', 'Transfer into a serving dish, garnish with spring onion greens and serve hot.']

title: Veg Kofta Pulao
method: ['Dry roast star anise, peppercorns, cinnamon, bay leaf, green cardamoms, cloves and black cardamoms in a non-stick pan till fragrant. Cool and grind to a fine powder.', 'Heat ghee in another non-stick pan, add green chillies and ginger and saute for a minute. Add onions and saute till they are lightly browned.', 'Add rice and mix well. Add stock and mix well.', 'Add salt and 1 tablespoon spice powder, 1 tablespoon leaves and 1 tablespoon mint leaves and mix well.', 'Add saffron and mix well. Cover and cook till the rice is done.', 'To make koftas, heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Mash potatoes in a bowl, add cheese, capsicum, carrot, green chillies, remaining mint leaves and remaining coriander leaves and mix well.', 'Add 1 teaspoon spice powder and mix well.', 'Add salt and mix well.', 'Spread refined flour on a plate, divide the mixture into equal portions, shape them into balls and coat them with refined flour.', 'Deep-fry the koftas in hot oil till brown and crisp on all the sides. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Add screw pine essence to the rice and mix well. Cook for 10 minutes.', 'Transfer rice onto a serving plate, place koftas over it, garnish with fried onions and serve immediately.']

title: Bhakarwadi Cones
method: ['Mix together refined flour, 2 tbsps gram flour, semolina,  1/4  tsp red chilli powder, black pepper powder, 1 tbsp ghee and salt in a bowl. Add sufficient water and knead into stiff dough.', 'Apply a little ghee to the dough, cover with a damp muslin cloth and set aside.', 'Heat the remaining ghee in a non-stick pan. Add white and black sesame seeds, cashewnuts, almonds and raisins and saute till the nuts are a light golden.', 'Add remaining red chilli powder, turmeric powder, dried mango powder, poppy seeds, remaining black pepper powder, desiccated coconut, remaining gram flour, sugar, salt and mix well. Saute on low heat for 2-3 minutes. Transfer the mixture into a bowl and set aside.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Divide dough into equal portions and roll into balls. Apply little ghee on the balls and roll out into elongated rotis. Cut the roti into long strips.', 'Brush the outer surface of kulfi moulds with oil and roll the strips around the mould.', 'Slide the cones into hot oil and deep fry till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Separate the cones from the mould. Stuff the filling in the moulds, transfer into a serving plate and serve.']

title: Jamun Yogurt Slush
method: ['Put jamuns in individual serving wine glasses upto 1/4  full.', 'Blend together yogurt, vanilla essence, lemon juice and powdered sugar to a smooth mixture. Add some ice cubes and blend again.', 'Pour the yogurt mixture on top of jamuns. Drizzle some honey and sprinkle some chopped almonds and pistachios on top.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Pesto Chicken Tikka
method: ['To make pesto, break basil leaves and put into a blender jar, add pinenuts, garlic, salt, olive oil and parmesan cheese and blend into a fine paste. Transfer into a bowl.', 'Add hung yogurt to the pesto and mix well. Add chicken pieces and mix well. Add black pepper powder and salt, mix well and set aside to marinate for 30 minutes.', 'Preheat the oven to 180@C. Line a baking tray with aluminium foil.', 'Transfer some of the marinated chicken pieces on the baking tray, keeping a little distance between each.', 'Keep the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes or till the chicken is cooked completely. Take the tray out and transfer the cooked pieces onto a plate and bake the remaining pieces similarly.', 'Garnish with red and yellow capsicum strips and serve hot with green chutney and onion rings.']

title: Vegan Shahi Paneer
method: ['Grate onions on a plate and set aside. Cut tofu into 1 inch cubes and set aside.', 'Blend together soaked melon seeds and soaked poppy seeds along with  1/4  cup water to a smooth paste.', 'Heat a pan, add the grated onion and saute till it turns translucent. Add the prepared paste and mix well. Cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Pour cashew yogurt and mix well. Cook for 1-2 minutes. Add garam masala powder and red chilli powder, rock salt and mix well. Cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Pour 1 cup water and stir till well combined. Add cashew butter and mix till well combined. Add the tofu pieces and mix.', 'Add 1 cup water and mix, cook for 1-2 minutes. Add chopped coriander and mix. Take the pan off the heat.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander sprig and serve hot.']

title: Boondi And Rabdi Stuffed Pancakes
method: ['Preheat oven to 180oC.', 'Sieve refined flour, baking powder and soda bicarbonate into a bowl. Add buttermilk and whisk to make a smooth batter. Add powdered sugar and mix.', 'Heat a little oil in a pan. Pour a ladle full of batter and spread it around. Cook till the underside is lightly browned. Flip and cook till the other side is cooked similarly. Cook other pancakes similarly.', 'Take boondi laddoos in a bowl. Add chopped almonds, raisins, cashewnuts and mix breaking the laddoos. Add rabdi and mix. Take a spring bottom cake tin.', 'Trim the pancakes to fit into the tin. Keep one pancake at the base of the tin. Spread some of the boondi stuffing over it.', 'Cover with another pancake and spread some more of the stuffing. Keep another pancake and spread some more of the stuffing. Keep the tin in the preheated oven and bake for ten minutes.', 'Remove from the oven and unmould.', 'Decorate with peeled almonds and serve.']

title: Date And Coconut Fingers
method: ['Place dates and milk in a deep non-stick pan, cover and cook on medium heat for eight to ten minutes or till the dates are soft. Allow to cool down and mash with hands, transfer into a bowl and refrigerate for thirty to forty minutes.', 'Take it out of the refrigerator and add biscuits, vanilla essence, cashewnuts, almonds and walnuts and mix well. Divide into eight equal portions and shape into fingers.', 'Spread the desiccated coconut evenly on a plate. Roll the fingers in the coconut and dust off any excess coconut.\nServe immediately.']

title: Corn Cheese Muffins - SK Khzana
method: ['Preheat the oven to 180@C.', 'Sieve together refined flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt into a mixing bowl.', 'Add polenta, green chillies, chives, onion, processed cheese, oil, milk and spring onion greens and mix well.', 'Pour the batter into the muffin moulds, place the moulds in the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes.', 'Remove the muffins from the moulds and serve.']

title: Jain Tostada
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a non-stick pan.', 'Heat olive oil in a non-stick pan. Add green chillies and saute for 30 seconds. Add tomato and kidney beans, mix and cook for a minute. Add salt, chilli powder and sugar and mix well. Add some water, mix and mash the mixture using a masher. Remove from heat.', 'Deep-fry each tortilla in hot oil till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Top each fried tortilla with some kidney beans mixture and corn kernels.', 'Finely chop iceberg lettuce leaves and top over the kidney beans mixture followed by some grated cheese and some tomatoes.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Egg and Chips
method: ['Heat extra virgin olive oil in a non-stick pan. Slice onion and add and saute till it turns translucent.', 'Finely chop tomatoes. Roughly chop garlic and add to the pan and saute for a minute.', 'Add tomatoes and salt and saute till they become soft. Add a little water and tomato ketchup and mix well.', 'Cut bread slices into small cubes and arrange them in the center of a serving plate.', 'Finely chop parsley sprigs and add to the pan and mix well. Add crushed peppercorns and mix again.', 'Break eggs over the tomato gravy. Cover and cook till eggs and tomatoes are fully done.', 'Arrange potato chips around the bread on the serving platter.', 'Switch off heat and slowly transfer the eggs on top of the bread. Crush corn chips and put on top of the eggs. Garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot.']

title: Peanut Butter Toast with Fried Egg
method: ['Halve cherry tomatoes and put in a bowl. Slice spring onion bulb and put in the same bowl.', 'Toast brown bread slices. Heat olive oil in a non-stick pan.', 'Roughly tear rocket leaves and put in the same bowl.', 'Once the toasts are done, spread 1 tbsp peanut butter on each toast.', 'Break 1 egg in a bowl. Place a fried egg ring in the pan and pour the egg into it. Sprinkle salt and crushed peppercorns on it and cook sunny side up. Remove the ring mould and switch off the heat. Prepare the remaining fried eggs similarly.', 'Add chilli sauce to the salad bowl and toss well.', 'Place 2 buttered bread slices on each serving platter. Put some salad on top of them and place one fried egg on each pair and serve immediately.']

title: Reshmi Paneer
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan.', 'Cut onion into half and slice horizontally.', 'Add cumin seeds and onion to the pan and saute well.', 'Cut capsicum into thin strips and add along with tomato strips and mix well. .', 'Add garlic paste, ginger paste, coriander powder and turmeric powder and mix well. Saute well.', 'Add tomato puree, mix and cook further.', 'Cut cottage cheese into thick fingers.', 'Add salt and red chilli powder to the pan and mix well. Add little water, mix well and cook. Add cottage cheese and cream and mix gently.', 'Add cream to the pan and mix well. Add garam masala powder and mix well.', 'Add coriander leaves and mix well. Let it get heated through.', 'Serve hot garnished with ginger strips.']

title: Jain Taco
method: ['To prepare salsa sauce, heat boiled tomato puree in a non-stick pan.', 'Roughly chop basil leaves and add to pan. Add 1 teaspoon dried oregano, chilli flakes and salt, mix and cook for a minute. Add tomato ketchup and 1 tablespoon olive oil, mix and cook for a minute. Add fresh torn oregano, mix and cook for 2-3 minutes. Remove from heat and transfer into a bowl.', 'To prepare red kidney bean filling, heat remaining olive oil in another non-stick pan. Add celery and saute for 30 seconds. Add tomatoes and saute for a minute.', 'Add remaining dried oregano, chilli flakes, crushed peppercorns, salt and red kidney beans and mix well. Add chilli powder and mash the mixture using a masher. Add Mexican sauce, mix and cook for a minute and switch off the heat.', 'Arrange the taco shells on the table top. Put some iceberg lettuce, purple cabbage and red kidney bean filling in each taco. Top with some bell peppers, capsicum, salsa sauce, sour cream, and grated cheese. Serve immediately.']

title: Baked Spaghetti
method: ['Preheat oven at 200o C. Grease a tart tin with 1 tsp olive oil.', 'Heat 1 tbsp olive oil in a non-stick wok.', 'Put spaghetti into a bowl.', 'Add onion in the wok and saute for 2-3 minutes.', 'Break eggs and add to the spaghetti in the bowl and mix well. Add half the grated processed cheese and mix well. Add salt, black pepper powder and mix well.', 'Add ginger-garlic paste to the onion in the wok and mix well. Saute for 1-2 minutes. Add tomatoes, mix well and saute for 3-4 minutes', 'Transfer the spaghetti mixture into the tart tin. Place in the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes.', 'Add chicken mince to the wok and mix well. Add dried mixed herbs and mix well. Add  1/4  cup water, salt and pepper powder and mix well. Mash the tomato pieces with the back of the ladle and continue to cook.', 'Add capsicum and mix well. Cook till chicken is done and all the moisture evaporates. Switch off the heat and keep the pan covered for 2 minutes.', 'Remove the tart tin from the oven, put the chicken-tomato mixture over the spaghetti and spread it evenly. Sprinkle mozzarella cheese and the remaining processed cheese and bake further at 180o for 25-30 minutes.', 'Loosen the sides from the tin, invert on a serving platter, cut into wedges, garnish with bean sprouts and serve immediately.']

title: Chicken Bao - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add garlic, ginger and red chillies, mix and saute for a minute.', 'Add spring onion greens and mix well. Add chicken pieces and mix.', 'Add salt, crushed peppercorns, soy sauce and oyster sauce, mix well and cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add some water and mix. Add honey, mix well and cook till the chicken is fully done.', 'Stuff baos with some cabbage, some carrot strips, a cooked chicken piece and some cucumber slices.', 'Garnish with coriander sprigs and serve immediately.']

title: Boondi ki Sabzi
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add cumin seeds and saute for 30 seconds. Add asafoetida and spring onions, mix and saute for a minute.', 'Add turmeric powder, chilli powder, coriander powder, boondi and salt and mix well. Add  1/4  cup water and chopped coriander, mix, cover and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Roti Jala
method: ['Mix refined flour, salt, turmeric powder and coconut milk in a bowl.', 'Break egg into it and whisk well. Add sufficient water and whisk to form a smooth batter.', 'Strain the batter into another bowl.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, rub with a tissue paper.`', 'Fill a squeezy bottle with batter and squeeze out net-like strips on the hot pan. Cook on both the sides. Repeat the procedure till all the batter is finished.', 'Place the prepared roti jala on a worktop, fold and roll.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Besanwali Bhindi
method: ['Thinly slice the bhindi diagonally.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Slice the onion. Add cumin seeds and onion to the pan and saute till onion is soft.', 'Add bhindi, salt, coriander powder, turmeric powder and red chilli powder.', 'Toss to mix and cook for 3-4 minutes, stirring occasionally.', 'Add besan and toss to mix. Add amchur and mix well.', 'Add onion seeds and mix again. Cook, stirring occasionally, till bhindi is done.', 'Adjust salt, if required. Serve hot.']

title: Lasagne Bolognese
method: ['Bring plenty of water to a boil in a large pan and stir in the olive oil. Add the lasagne sheets and cook till al dente (cooked, but still firm to the bite).', 'Drain and refresh in cold water. Drain again and set aside to cool.', 'Preheat the oven to 180degC.', 'To make the sauce, heat the olive oil in a pan. Add the onion and celery and saute for a few minutes. Add the garlic and continue to saute for a few seconds. Add the carrot and mutton mince and continue to saute over high heat for three to four minutes.', 'Lower heat, add half a cup of water and simmer till mince is tender. Stir in salt and crushed peppercorns, tomato concasse and tomato puree and mix well.', 'Line the base of an ovenproof dish with a few cooked lasagne sheets. Top with some of the Bolognese sauce. Repeat layers ending with lasagne.', 'Pour the cheese sauce over and sprinkle the top with grated cheese. Bake for about fifteen to twenty minutes.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Turkish Pizza
method: ['Mix yeast, sugar and 2 tbsps warm water in a bowl and set aside to froth.', 'Put refined flour in a bowl, break one egg and add along with yogurt, activated yeast and salt and mix well. Add  3/4  cup water and knead into medium-soft dough. Set aside to rise.', 'Preheat oven to 180o C. Finely chop onion.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add onion and garlic and saute till lightly browned.', 'Finely chop green chilli and add to the pan and saute further for half a minute.', 'Add minced mutton and mix well. Add  1/4  cup water and mix well. Cover and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Cut green and red capsicums into small pieces.', 'Add capsicum pieces to the pan and mix well. Add salt and mix well. Cover and cook for 3-4 minutes.', 'Add red chilli powder, all spice powder and tomato puree and mix well. Cover and cook till the mutton is fully cooked. Transfer into a bowl.', 'Dust worktop with refined flour, place the dough on it and roll out into a thick oblong sheet.', 'Grease a baking tray with oil and place oblong sheet on it.', 'Break the remaining egg into a bowl and whisk well. Grate mozzarella cheese into another bowl.', 'Spread mutton mixture on the oblong sheet, fold the edges inwards and join them at the ends. Top with grated mozzarella cheese. Brush the sides on the oblong sheet with whisked egg.']

title: Prawns Varuval
method: ['Take prawns in a bowl, add ginger-garlic paste, red chilli powder, turmeric powder, salt and crushed black peppercorns, mix well and set aside to marinage for 10 minutes.', 'Heat 1 1/2  tbsps oil in a non-stick pan, add the marinated prawns and saute on high heat for 3-4 minutes. Take it off the heat and transfer into another bowl.', 'Heat remaining oil in the same pan, add curry leaves and green chillies, mix and saute for a 1 minute. Add onion, mix and saute till golden brown.', 'Add the prawns, mix well and saute for 2-3 minutes.', 'Transfer into a serving platter, garnish with coriander sprigs and serve hot.']

title: Corn Mushroom on Toast
method: ['Coarsely grind boiled corn kernels and slice the mushrooms.', 'Heat butter and oil in a non-stick pan. Add mushrooms and cook for 3-4 minutes.', 'Add Schezwan chutney and mix well. Add ground corn and saute for 1-2 minutes. Switch off the heat.', 'Toast brown bread slices. Apply butter on the toasts. Spread the corn mushroom mixture on the toasts. Garnish with mint leaves and serve.']

title: Desi Keema Lasagna
method: ['Heat olive oil in a shallow non-stick pan, add garlic, ginger and green chillies, mix and saute till raw smells disappear.', 'Add onion, mix and saute till translucent. Add mutton mince and mix well. Cover and cook on medium heat for 8-10 minutes.', 'Add tomato puree, Tata Sampann Garam Masala, salt, red chilli powder, turmeric powder, coriander powder and roasted cumin powder and mix well. Cook for 15-20 minutes.', 'Add coriander leaves and mix well. Cook for 1 minute and take it off the heat and set aside to cool slightly.', 'Preheat the oven to 180@C.', 'Halve the lasagna sheets and arrange them at the base of a baking dish. Spread some white sauce and tomato sauce evenly over them. Spread some keema mixture evenly. Sprinkle a little fried onion and grated mozzarella cheese. Repeat these layers one more time.', 'Top it up with the remaining lasagna sheets and spread white sauce on it evenly. Spread the tomato sauce, sprinkle fried onion, crushed black peppercorns, dried oregano, dried red chilli flakes and grated mozzarella cheese. Place a few basil leaves on top. Place the baking dish in the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes.', 'Bring the dish out of the oven, cut the lasagna into wedges and place them on serving plates. Serve hot.']

title: Rabdi Burfi - SK Khazana
method: ['Bring the milk to a boil and in a deep non-stick pan. Add sugar, mix well till melts.', 'Add 1 cup mawa cook for 15 minutes while stirring periodically. Add nutmeg powder and mix well. Cook till it comes to rabdi consistency.', 'Add the remaining mawa, cook, stirring continuously till the mixture thickens.', 'Pour the mixture into a greased burfi tray. Allow to cool down to room temperature and keep in the refrigerator overnight.', 'Garnish with silver varq and pistachio powder. Cut into cubes and serve cold.']

title: Chole Aloo Tikki - SK Khazana
method: ['Put boiled chickpeas in a food processor jar, add green chillies and ginger, and grind to a coarse paste. Transfer into a bowl.', 'Add potatoes, lemon juice, salt, coriander leaves, black pepper powder, cornflour, and mix well.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Grease your palms with a little oil, divide the mixture into equal portions and shape each portion into a tikki.', 'Slide the tikkis into hot oil and deep-fry the tikkis till golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Arrange the tikkis on a serving platter and serve hot with green chutney and tomato ketchup.']

title: Kimchi- SK Khazana
method: ['Quarter the cabbage lengthwise, sprinkle salt between each layer of the cabbage. Keep them in a deep container, place a flat tray on it and place a heavy weight on top. Set aside for 2-3 hours.', 'Heat a non-stick pan, add rice flour and 1 cup water and whisk till well combined. Cook, whisking continuously, till the mixture thickens.', 'Trim the top of the radish and thinly slice into roundels. Further cut into thin strips.', 'Thinly slice spring onions and cut chives into  1/2  inch pieces.', 'Transfer the rice flour mixture into a bowl, add Korean red chilli powder, garlic paste and grate ginger into it. Add 2 tbsps fish sauce and 2 tsps castor sugar and mix well.', 'Add the chopped radish, spring onions and Chinese chives and mix well.', 'Take the cabbage out of the container and keep them on a plate. Dip them into fresh water. Drain them and place in a sieve so that all the excess water drains away.', 'Apply the spiced rice flour mixture on each layer of the cabbage and roll. Transfer the rolls into an air-tight jar and set aside for 1 day.', 'You can now use the kimchi.']

title: Blueberry Hearty Pies - SK Khazana
method: ['Preheat oven to 180o C. Grease a baking tray.', 'Take refined flour in a bowl, add castor sugar and cardamom powder and mix. Add butter and rub between finger tips till the mixture resembles breadcrumbs.', 'Add milk and mix with your hand to make a dough.', 'Dust flour on worktop, transfer the dough on it and roll into a not too thin square.', 'Keep a heart shaped cookie cutter on it and cut out 10 equal pies.', 'Keep a blob of blueberry jam on half the pies and cover with the remaining pies to make sandwiches.', 'Pinch the edges of each pie with a fork to seal them.', 'Break an egg into a small bowl and whisk lightly.', 'Sprinkle some dry flour on the baking tray, keep the pies on it and brush them with egg. Keep the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 10-12 minutes.', 'Arrange them on a serving plate, dust some icing sugar over them and decorate with fresh blueberries. Serve.']

title: Chocolate Rasmalai Terrine
method: ['Put chocolate in a microwave bowl and melt in the microwave. Remove from oven, mix till smooth and cool down to room temperature.', 'Mix together gelatin, white wine, icing sugar and double cream in a non-stick pan. Place the pan on heat and stir till gelatin melts.', 'Mix together whipped cream and melted chocolate. Add the gelatin mixture and mix well.', 'Grease a rectangular mould with some olive oil and dust with some icing sugar.', 'Pour some of the chocolate mixture in the mould and level it out. Top with the rasmalais and pour the remaining chocolate mixture on top. Freeze for three hours.', 'Slice and serve.']

title: Orange And Chocochip Muffins
method: ['Preheat oven to 180 degC.', 'Grease twelve muffin moulds. Sieve flour, baking powder, baking soda, powdered sugar, cocoa powder, salt into a large bowl. Mix well.', 'Break egg into another bowl and whisk lightly. Add orange rind and whisk some more. Add vanilla essence and mix. Add buttermilk and mix again. Add melted butter and whisk well. Add orange juice and mix again.', 'Add this mixture to the flour mixture and mix well. Add half the choco chips and mix. Pour into the prepared muffin moulds and sprinkle the remaining choco chips on top.', 'Place the moulds into the preheated oven and bake for twenty to thirty minutes. Remove from the oven and let them rest for about ten minutes.', 'Unmould and serve warm.']

title: Burnt Corn Salad
method: ['Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a non-stick pan till very hot. Add corn kernels and stir on high heat for 2 minutes or till burnt. Remove from heat and transfer into a bowl.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in the same pan, add spring onion bulb and capsicum. Saute for 1 minute on high heat and transfer into another bowl.', 'To make dressing, put remaining olive oil, lemon juice, paprika powder, red chilli flakes, sugar and salt in a small jar with lid. Cover and shake well till the mixture becomes homogenous.', 'Add burnt corn to the sauteed vegetables and mix well. Add tomato and mix well. Drizzle the dressing on top and toss well.', 'Reserve some spring onion greens for garnishing and add the remaining to the corn mixture. Mix well.', 'Serve warm or chilled garnished with reserved spring onion greens.']

title: Grilled Pineapple Slush
method: ['Heat an electric griller and grease with some butter. Place the pineapple roundels and grill till golden.Transfer in a bowl and cool.', 'Grind the grilled pineapples to make a smooth puree.', 'Strain the pineapple puree into another bowl. Put it back in the blender. Add castor sugar, lemon juice, black salt, salt, chaat masala and mint leaves and blend.Add ice cubes and blend again.', 'Pour into serving glasses and serve garnished with mint sprigs.']

title: Chicken Crumb Chops
method: ['Dry roast the coriander seeds, cumin seeds, peppercorns and dried red chillies till fragrant.', 'Grind together the roasted spices with ginger, garlic, poppy seeds and salt into a fine paste.', 'Take the chicken drumsticks in a bowl. Add the prepared paste, mix and refrigerate to marinate for two to three hours.', 'Heat a non-stick pan. Add the chicken drumsticks along with the marinade and cook on medium heat till dry.', 'Break the egg in a bowl, add salt and whisk well. Spread the breadcrumbs on a plate.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Dip the cooked chicken in the egg and coat with the breadcrumbs.', 'Deep-fry the chicken in hot oil till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Cake Pops
method: ['Put butter in a large mixing bowl, add vanilla essence and icing sugar and beat till well combined.', 'Crumble chocolate sponge cake and mix with half of butter-icing sugar mixture. Mix well with your hands. Divide into 10 small portions, roll into balls, ensuring that there are no cracks on them, and place on butter paper.', 'Similarly crumble vanilla sponge and add with remaining butter icing-sugar mixture, roll into 10 balls, ensuring there are no cracks on them, and place on a butter paper.', 'Melt dark chocolate in the microwave for 1 minute. Whisk well. Dip the tips of the lollypop sticks, one by one, in melted chocolate and insert in the prepared balls. Refrigerate for 15-20 minutes.', 'Melt the white chocolate in the microwave for a minute and whisk well.', 'Take out the cake pops from the refrigerator and keep out for 5-10 minutes.', 'Dip some of the cake pops in melted dark chocolate and others in white chocolate till they are completely coated.', 'Sprinkle with different sprinklers and place in shot glasses. Serve immediately.']

title: Chocolate Coffee
method: ['Put grated chocolate, leaving aside for garnish, in the serving glasses. Add a little milk and keep in the microwave for one minute to melt.', 'Pour coffee decoction into the glasses and mix well.', 'Heat milk and pour into the glasses till almost full. Mix well.', 'Pipe whipped cream over the top, sprinkle a little grated chocolate and serve immediately.']

title: Andhra Chicken Pickle
method: ['Take chicken pieces in a bowl. Add salt and  1/2  teaspoon turmeric powder and mix well. Set aside to marinate.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add mustard seeds and let them splutter.', 'Add remaining turmeric powder and mix well.', 'Add marinated chicken pieces and mix well. Cook on high heat for 2-3 minutes. Cover and cook on low heat for 8-10 minutes.', 'Add ginger-garlic paste and red chilli powder, mix well.', 'Add tamarind paste, mix well and cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Serve.']

title: Chocolate Strawberry Roll Ups
method: ['Hull and cut strawberries into small pieces.', 'Trim off edges of bread slices and roll them with a rolling pin.', 'Spread some chocolate-hazelnut sauce on one side of each slice. Put some strawberries over the sauce and roll.', 'Break eggs into a bowl. Add vanilla essence and whisk. Add milk and whisk well.', 'Spread some castor sugar on a plate. Add cinnamon powder and mix well.', 'Heat butter in a non-stick pan.', 'Dip each bread roll in the egg mixture, place on hot pan and shallow-fry till golden all around. Drain and roll with sugar-cinnamon mixture.', 'Arrange on a serving platter and drizzle some maple syrup on top. Serve immediately.']

title: Honey Garlic Chicken - SK Khazana
method: ['Put chicken pieces in a bowl. Add cornflour, salt and egg and mix well.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Deep-fry chicken pieces till crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a non-stick wok. Add garlic, onion, capsicum, chilli flakes and sesame seeds, mix and saute for a minute.', 'Add  1/2  cup chicken stock and soy sauce, mix and cook for a minute. Add remaining chicken stock, pepper powder and salt, mix and simmer for 2 minutes.', 'Add fried chicken pieces, cornflour slurry and honey, mix well and cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Garnish with spring onion greens and serve hot.']

title: Mutton Boti Burger
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, squeeze and add the grated onion and saute till onion is browned.', 'Add ginger-garlic paste and little water and saute for a minute.', 'Add turmeric powder, red chilli powder, coriander powder and cumin powder and mix.', 'Add the mutton pieces with the stock, mix well and cook for a few minutes or till the mixture is dry.', 'Add yogurt, salt, garam masala powder andcoriander leaves and mix again.', 'Cover with a lid and cook for fifteen to twenty minutes.', 'Remove the lid and cook till the gravy becomes thick.', 'Heat another non-stick pan, slit the burger buns in half and toast themin the pan. Remove and place them on the worktop.', 'Tear the lettuce and place on the base half of the burger buns. Put the mutton mixture generously over the lettuce. Top it up with some onion rings. Sprinkle chaat masala and cover the burgers with the top halves.', 'Place them on serving plates and serve hot with French fries.']

title: Sweet and Sour Chicken
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Take chicken pieces in a bowl, add egg and mix. Add cornflour, refined flour, salt and crushed peppercorns and mix well.', 'Slide the chicken pieces into hot oil and deep-fry till golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan. Add garlic and ginger, mix and saute till the raw smells disappear.', 'Add spring onion bulbs, mix and saute for 1 minute. Add tomato ketchup and mix. Add soy sauce and chicken stock, mix and cook for 1 minute.', 'Add sugar, salt and crushed black peppercorns and mix. Add cornflour slurry, mix and cook till the mixture thickens.', 'Add vinegar and mix. Add fried chicken pieces, mix and cook for 1-2 minutes. Add 1 tablespoon spring onion greens and mix well.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with spring onion greens and serve hot.']

title: Potato Corn Soup
method: ['Roughly chop onions and garlic. Heat oil in a deep non stick pan, add onions and garlic and saute for 2 minutes. Add salt. Roughly chop potatoes and add. Saute for 2 minutes.', 'Transfer into a mixer jar, add 1 cup water and grind to a fine puree. Pour the puree back into the pan, add milk and mix well. Add cream style sweet corn and mix well and heat. Finely chop parsley. If you wish you can add a little black pepper powder. Cook the soup till it comes to a boil.', 'Pour the soup into individual soup bowls, garnish with parsley and serve piping hot immediately.']

title: Aam Papad - SK Khazana
method: ['Grease 2 trays with ghee.', 'Heat a non-stick pan, add mango puree, sugar and cardamom powder. Mix well and cook, stirring occasionally, for 20-25 minutes or till the mixture thickens.', 'Pour the prepared mixture on the greased trays and tap the trays gently. Sundry for 2-4 days.', 'Gently remove the aam papad and cut into squares. Serve.']

title: Tandoori Sandwich
method: ['Take chicken in a bowl, add salt and ginger-garlic paste and mix well.', 'Add yogurt, mayonnaise, garam masala powder, red chilli powder, dried mango powder and coriander leaves and mix well. Add tandoori mayonnaise and mix well. Set aside to marinate for 15-20 minutes.', 'Preheat an air-fryer to 200oC.', 'Place the marinated chicken pieces in the air-fryer basket, fit it to the air-fryer and cook for 25 minutes. Cook the remaining chicken similarly.', 'Bring the chicken pieces out, cool and shred them and put into a large bowl. Drizzle tandoori mayonnaise and mix well.', 'Apply butter and mustard paste on all the bread slices. Spread some chicken mixture on 4 slices, place a few onion rings, sprinkle dried red chilli flakes and dried mixed herbs over the chicken. Place a cheese slice and cover them with 4 of the remaining slices buttered side facing the chicken.', 'Apply butter on top of these slices and spread some chicken mixture. Sprinkle oregano and red chilli flakes. Place a few onion rings and a cheese slice. Cover them with the remaining 4 slices.', 'Preheat a griller, grease the lower portion of griller with butter and place, one sandwich at a time, apply butter on top of the bread, close the griller and grill till golden grill marks appear on both the sides.', 'Cut each sandwich into 2 triangles and place them each serving plate. Serve hot with mustard paste, mayonnaise, tomato ketchup and potato wafers.']

title: Bhature - SK Khazana
method: ['Mix together flour, salt, castor sugar, baking soda, baking powder in a bowl. Add yogurt, water as required and knead into a soft dough. Add 1 tablespoon oil and knead once again. Cover with a damp muslin cloth and set aside to rest for 1 hour.', 'Divide the dough into equal portions, grease with some oil and roll out into thin discs.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Gently slide in the bhature, one at a time, and deep-fry till puffed up and golden. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Transfer onto a serving platter and serve hot with chole.']

title: Sesame and Banana Bread
method: ['Preheat the oven to 180degC. Grease a loaf tin with some butter and dust with some refined flour.', 'Combine together the refined flour, wheat flour, brown sugar, baking soda and salt in a bowl and mix well. Add the sesame seeds and mix.', 'Combine together the olive oil, egg, banana and yogurt in another bowl and mix well. Add this to the flour mixture and fold well.', 'Pour the batter in the greased tin, put the tin in the preheated oven and bake for forty-five minutes. Remove from oven, cool and demould.', 'To make the glaze, heat a non-stick pan. Add the castor sugar, brown sugar, lemon juice and one tablespoon water, mix and cooktill the sugar melts.', 'Drizzle the prepared glaze on the bread, spread evenly, slice and serve.']

title: Mixed Green Coconut
method:
['Heat oil in a non stick pan. Slit green chillies and halve them. Add onion and garlic to the pan and saute.
Chop palak.', 'Add green chillies, methi, green chavli, red chavli, palak and salt and mix well.
Cook till most of the moisture is absorbed.', 'Add 2 tbsps water if you want it moist.
Add coconut and mix well. Serve hot.']

title: Biscuit Ice Cream Chocolate Bars
method: ['Stick half the glucose biscuits on the edge of one aide of the ice cream bar. Trim the exposed portion of the bar and turn it sideways so that biscuit portion is on one side.', 'Now halve the bar from middle lengthwise and stick the remaining biscuits on the cut side. Transfer the bar on an aluminium sheet and cover it completely. Freeze for 1-2 hours.', 'Further cut into smaller bars. Insert an ice cream stick in centre of each bar.', 'Take melted dark chocolate in a bowl. Pour melted dark chocolate on each bar with a spoon. Drip off extra chocolate.', 'Sprinkle pistachio, vermicelli sprinkles and almonds on each bar. Place them on a silicon mat and refrigerate for 5 minutes.', 'Remove from refrigerator and transfer onto a serving platter and serve immediately.']

title: Keema Pav - SK Khazana
method: ['Preheat oven to 180deg C.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds and saute till they change colour. Add onions and saute till lightly browned.', 'Add ginger-garlic paste and mix well. Add green chillies, mutton mince, mix and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add tomatoes, mix and cook for 2-3 minutes. Add chilli powder, turmeric powder, coriander powder and mix well.', 'Add some water and mix. Add salt and mix. Add green peas and some more water, mix, cover and cook till fully done. Add lemon juice and mix.', 'Halve pavs horizontally. Spread cooked mutton mixture on the base half, top with emmental and cheddar cheese slices and cover with the top half.', 'Place the pavs on a baking tray and cover with aluminium foil. Put the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 15 minutes.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Quick Chocolate Torte
method: ['Melt dark chocolate in the microwave for one minute. Whisk and add milk and whisk again. Line a spring form tin with wafer biscuits.', 'Take crushed digestive biscuits in a bowl. Add crushed arrowroot biscuits and mix. Add Sugar Free Natura and mix.', 'Keeping aside a little of the chopped walnuts and cashewnuts add the rest along with milk powder and chocolate milk and mix well.', 'Pour this mixture over the wafer biscuits in the spring form tin and keep it in the refrigerator to chill.', 'Remove the torte from the spring form tin and place on a serving plate.', 'Sprinkle the remaining walnuts and cashewnuts and cut into wedges and serve.']

title: Rice Flake Fish
method: ['Preheat oven to 200degC. Combine fish, chilli sauce, ginger-garlic paste and lemon juice in bowl. Mix well and set aside for 5-10 minutes.', 'Finely chop basil leaves. Add pressed rice, basil leaves and egg to the fish. Mix well and set aside for 5 minutes.', 'Place marinated fish in a baking dish and cook in the preheated oven for 5 minutes. Drizzle a little oil and cook in the oven for 5 minutes more. Serve hot.']

title: Coconut Crusted Potato Balls
method: ['Heat butter in a non-stick pan. Add garlic and saute for 30 seconds. Add potatoes, mix and cook for 1 minute.', 'Add crushed peppercorns, chilli flakes, parsley, nutmeg powder and salt and mix and cook for 1-2 minutes. Add parmesan cheese and mix well. Transfer onto a plate and cool.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a pan.', 'Divide the potato mixture into equal portions and shape them into balls.', 'Take  1/4  cup flour on the worktop and coat each ball with it.', 'Take remaining flour in a bowl. Add some water and mix well to make smooth slurry.', 'Take coconut in a bowl. Dip each ball in slurry and coat with coconut.', 'Deep-fry the balls in hot oil till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot garnished with parsley sprigs.']

title: Parsi Style Mutton Kababs
method: ['Take mutton mince in a bowl. Add salt, chilli powder, cumin powder, garam masala powder, ginger-garlic paste, green chillies and browned onions.', 'Trim off edges of bread slices and put them in another bowl. Add some water and soak for few seconds.', 'Squeeze out excess water from the soaked bread slices, crumble and add it to the mutton mixture.', 'Roughly chop mint sprigs and coriander sprigs, add to mutton mixture and mix well. Keep it in the refrigerator to marinate for 30 minutes.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Divide the mutton mixture into equal portions and shape them into balls.', 'Deep-fry mutton balls in hot oil on medium heat till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot garnished with a lemon wedge and few mint sprigs.']

title: Roasted Cherry Tomato and Guacamole Sandwich
method: ['Preheat oven to200o C. Line a baking tray with a silicon mat.', 'Halve cherry tomatoes and spread them in the baking tray. Drizzle some oil and sprinkle some crushed peppercorns and salt on top. Put some torn rosemary sprigs.', 'Place the baking tray in preheated oven and roast for 10 minutes.', 'To prepare guacamole, take avocado flesh in a bowl. Add tomato, onion, green chillies, coriander leaves, lemon juice, salt and crushed peppercorns and mix well.', 'Spread some feta cheese and guacamole on each bread slice. Put some roasted cherry tomatoes on top.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Thai Style Noodle Salad-Cook Smart
method: ['Boil 2 cups water in a deep non-stick pan.', 'Cut spring onions with greens into diamond shaped pieces and put into a bowl. Quarter cucumber vertically, remove the seeds and cut again into long thin strips. Put this into the same bowl.', 'Put glass noodles in the boiling water, switch off the heat and let it remain for a couple of minutes. Drain and put into a bowl of 1 cup cold water and separate its layers gently.', 'Cut capsicum into long thin strips and mix with cucumber and spring onions. Add carrot and mix well.', 'For dressing, finely chop lemon grass. Finely chop red chillies and put both into a bowl. Add ginger, salt, lemon juice and honey and mix well.', 'Add the dressing, reserving some, to the bowl of vegetables and mix well. Let it stand for 2-3 minutes.', 'Drain the noodles, squeeze out excess water and add to the bowl and mix well.', 'Finely chop mint leaves and coriander sprigs and add to the bowl. Drizzle the reserved dressing and mix well.', 'Transfer onto a serving plate and serve garnished with a sprig of mint.']

title: Apple Crisp
method: ['Preheat oven to 180deg C.', 'Halve and core the apple.', 'Dust worktop with some flour, place the dough and roll out into a  1/2  cm thick rectangle sheet. Cut into thick strips.', 'Brush each strip with some butter. Sprinkle some brown sugar and cinnamon powder on top.', 'Thinly slice the apple halves horizontally.', 'Place apple slices on one side of each strip, fold and roll them. Place them into individual silicon muffin moulds.', 'Place the moulds on a baking tray. Place the baking tray in the preheated oven and bake for 10-15 minutes.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Peri Peri Chicken Pizza- SK Khazana
method: ["To make peri peri paste, put onion, garlic cloves, ginger, red capsicum, coriander seeds, cumin seeds, bird's eye chillies, crushed black peppercorns, smoked paprika, sugar and salt in a blender jar. Grate some lemon zest into it and add juice of  1/2  lemon. Add parsley sprigs and dried red chillies and blend to smooth paste.", 'Take chicken in a bowl, add 2 tbsps of peri peri paste and 2 tbsps oil and mix till the chicken is well coated.', 'Heat remaining olive oil in a non-stick grill pan, place the chicken in it and cook on high heat, turning sides, till grill marks appear on both sides. Reduce the heat and cooked till done.', 'Slice the chicken and cut into  1/2  inch cubes.', 'Preheat the oven to 180deg C.', 'Dust the worktop with flour, place the dough on top, tap and press to spread to form a thick disc, the size of a pizza pan. Put it in the pan and spread it evenly, prick all over with a fork.', 'Spread 2 tbsps peri peri paste on the pizza base. Sprinkle mozzarella cheese cubes, green capsicum triangles, cherry tomato halves, chicken cubes and black olive slices. Sprinkle dried mixed herbs and drizzle some olive oil on top.', 'Keep the pan in the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes.', 'Cut into wedges and serve']

title: Paneer Kulcha
method: ['ift the flour together with the baking powder, baking soda and salt into a bowl. Add the sugar, milk, yogurt and knead well into a medium soft dough.', 'Apply 1 tbsp oil on the dough, cover with a damp cloth and set aside for 1 hour. Chop onion and mix it with paneer in a bowl. Add salt and red chilli powder and mix well', 'Grease your palms with a little oil and take a portion of the dough on one palm. Spread the dough with your fingers, place a portion of the stuffing in the centre, gather the edges and seal it well to enclose the stuffing completely and roll into pedas.', 'Use up the remaining dough and stuffing similarly. Put a little oil on each peda, and press lightly. Keep them aside for 15 minutes.', 'Sprinkle a few onion seeds over each peda. Dampen your left hand with water, place a peda over it and spread, using both hands, into a round kulcha.', 'Heat a non stick tawa. Place a kulcha over it with the side dampened with water facing down. Cover and cook till the underside is golden. Flip, cover and cook till the other side is equally golden.', 'Serve hot drizzled with butter.']

title: Punjabi Samosa
ingredients: ['1 1/2  cups refined flour', '4 medium potatoes, boiled and peeled', ' 1/4  teaspoon carom seeds (ajwain)', 'Salt to taste', '4 tablespoons ghee', '3 tablespoons coriander seeds', '2 tablespoons cumin seeds', '1 tablespoon chopped ginger', '2-3 green chillies, chopped', ' 1/2  cup boiled green peas', ' 1/2  teaspoon garam masala powder', '2 tsps dried and crushed pomegranate seeds', '2 tsps dried mango powder (amchur)', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh coriander leaves', 'Oil for drizzling + for deep frying', 'Green chutney to serve', 'Date and tamarind chutney to serve', 'Fried green chillies to serve']
method: ['Take refined flour in a parat. Add carom seeds, salt and mix well.', 'Add 2 tablespoons ghee and mix well. Add 1 cup water and knead to stiff dough.Cover with a moist muslin cloth and set aside for 10 minutes.', 'Dry roast coriander seeds on medium heat for 2-3 minutes. Transfer to a mortar pestle.', 'Dry roast the cumin seeds in the same pan for 2 minutes on medium heat. Transfer in the mortar pestle and crush coarsely.', 'For the stuffing, heat remaining ghee in a kadai. Add 1 1/2  tablespoons of ground spice mix and saute for a few seconds.', 'Add ginger, green chillies and saute for 30 seconds.', 'Crush the potatoes and add to the kadai. Add the green peas and mix well. Add salt, garam masala powder, dried pomegranate seeds, dried mango powder and mix well.', 'Add coriander leaves and mix well. Take the pan off the heat.', 'Drizzle a little oil on a worktop and spread it evenly. Divide the dough into equal portions and shape each into a ball.', 'For making samosa, roll the prepared balls in an oblong and cut in half to make a semi-circle. Take a semi-circle and apply water on the edges, shape into a cone. Stuff with a portion of the prepared stuffing and press the edges to seal.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai, deep fry the prepared samosas on medium heat till golden brown and crisp. Drain on an absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot with green chutney, date and tamarind chutney and fried green chillies.']

title: Mini Prawn Burger - SK Khazana
method: ['Put prawns into a blender, add prawns and blend to a coarse paste. Transfer it into a bowl. Add grated onion, potatoes, parsley, salt, crushed peppercorns and egg yolk.', 'Grate the zest of a lemon into the bowl and add breadcrumbs and mix well.', 'Take the egg whites in a bowl. And spread breadcrumbs on a plate.', 'Divide the mixture into 4 equal portions and shape into patties. Dip them in egg white and then coat with breadcrumbs and keep on a plate.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a non-stick pan, keep the patties in it and shallow fry on medium heat, turning sides, till golden brown on both sides. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Cut the burger buns into half. Heat butter in another non-stick pan, keep the burger buns in it and toast them lightly.', 'Apply tartar sauce on the base halves of the buns. Place a prawn patty over the tartar sauce. Top it with a few onion rings, a slice of tomato, little tartar sauce and crush black peppercorns on top.', 'Keep a few micro greens on top. Cover the burger with the top halves, secure with a toothpick pierced with a halved cherry tomato. Serve immediately.']

title: Pachadi
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add mustard seeds and let them splutter. Add asafoetida, split skinless black gram and broken dried red chillies and red chilli powder and saute for a few seconds.', 'Add tomatoes and mix well Add salt and toss for 1-2 minutes. Take the pan off the heat and set aside to cool completely.', 'Take yogurt in a bowl, add the tomato mixture and adjust salt, mix till well combined.Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with fried curry leaves sprig and serve chilled.']

title: Pyaaz Aur Besan Ke Wade
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Chop onions in a chopper and put into a large glass bowl. Chop mint leaves, coriander leaves, green chillies in the chopper and add to the onions in the bowl. Add salt, red chilli powder, turmeric powder, coriander powder, cumin powder, gram flour and baking powder and mix well.', 'Sprinkle a little water and mix well. Drop spoonful of the mixture into the hot oil and deep fry till golden. Drain on absorbent paper and serve hot.']

title: Mix Vegetable Kofta Curry
method: ['To make the gravy, heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add cinnamon, green cardamoms, black peppercorns and cumin seeds and saute till fragrant.', 'Add red pumpkin, bottle gourd, red chilli powder, coriander powder, turmeric powder, cumin powder and garam masala powder and mix well.', 'Add bhuna masala and mix well. Add coriander and mint leaves and mix. Transfer the mixture into a mixer jar and let it cool slightly. Add a little water and grind into a puree. Transfer the puree into a bowl and set aside.', 'To make the koftas, mix together mixed vegetables, potatoes, breadcrumbs, green chillies, ginger, red chilli powder and salt.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Divide the mixture into equal portions and shape them into balls. Slide these into hot oil and deep fry till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Heat butter in another non-stick pan. Add tomato puree and cook for 2 minutes. Strain the ground puree and add to this pan. Add fresh cream and mix well. Allow the gravy to come to a boil. Simmer for 1-2 minutes.', 'Transfer the gravy into a serving dish, place koftas over it and serve hot.']

title: Chilli Hoppers
method: ['Mix cheese, chopped garlic, crushed red chillies, crushed black peppercorns, chopped fresh parsley in a bowl.', 'Slit the chillies and remove the seeds. Stuff them with the cheese mixture. Set aside.', 'Mix refined flour, cornflour, baking powder and salt in a bowl. Add sufficient water and whisk to make a smooth and thick batter. Rest the batter for ten minutes.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a deep pan. Dip each stuffed chilli in the flour batter and deep-fry till crisp. They will not turn brown but remain white.', 'Drain onto an absorbent paper and serve hot.']

title: Plum Shortcake
method: ['Preheat oven to 180degC. Sieve together refined flour and baking powder into a bowl.', 'Whisk together eggs and vanilla essence in another bowl for 1-2 minutes. Add sugar, little by little, and whisk for 5-7 minutes or till fluffy.', 'Add butter and whisk further for 2-3 minutes. Add plums and flour and mix using cut and fold method.', 'Pour the mixture into a greased cake tin and bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes. Remove from the cake tin, garnish with fresh plum slices, dust some icing sugar and serve.']

title: Pesto Chicken Bake
method: ['Preheat oven to 180deg C.', 'Line a glass baking dish with tomato roundels and sprinkle some salt and crushed peppercorns over them.', 'Place chicken slices covering the tomato layer and spread pesto on top. Sprinkle some salt and crushed peppercorns over the pesto.', 'Place the baking dish in the preheated oven and bake for 8-10 minutes. Remove from oven.', 'Place mozzarella cheese roundels on top covering the pesto layer and sprinkle some mixed dried herbs, crushed peppercorns and salt.', 'Place the dish back into the preheated oven and bake for 5 minutes.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Basic Vanilla Ice Cream
method: ['Mix cornflour in quarter cup of milk. Boil the remaining milk in a non-stick pan. Add sugar and the cornflour mixture and simmer for four to five minutes. Set aside to cool.', 'Add fresh cream and vanilla essence and mix well. Pour it in a shallow container. Cover and freeze till almost set. Divide the mixture into two portions and blend each portion separately in a blender till smooth.', 'Transfer each of the two portions into the shallow container. Cover and freeze till firm. Scoop and serve.']

title: Kale and Chicken Salad
method: ['To make the dressing, put mayonnaise, mustard paste, honey and salt in a bowl and mix well.', 'Put kale, chicken, apple and carrot in another bowl and toss. Add the dressing and mix well.', 'Serve chilled.']

title: Baingan Chips
