method: ['Heat olive oil in a non-stick pan. Cut tomatoes into big cubes and add to the pan and toss well. Once the tomatoes become soft, switch off the heat and transfer them onto a plate.', 'Roughly chop spinach and put into a mixer jar, add garlic cloves and grind well. Add peanuts and extra virgin olive oil and grind to make a smooth spinach pesto.', 'Heat the same non-stick pan, add penne, spinach pesto and salt and mix well.', 'Add mixed dried herbs and fresh cream and mix well. Add grated cheese and mix well. Add crushed peppercorns and mix well. Add cooked tomatoes, reserving some, and mix well and cook for a minute.', 'Transfer onto a serving platter, garnish with reserved cooked tomatoes and drizzle leftover olive oil from the cooked tomatoes and serve immediately.']

title: Eggless Chocolate Cake - SK Khazana
method: ['Preheat oven to 180o C. Grease a cake tin with some butter and dust a little dry flour. Discard excess flour.', 'Take butter, condensed milk and vanilla essence in a mixing bowl and beat with an electric beater till light and fluffy.', 'Sieve refined flour, cocoa powder and baking powder directly into the butter mixture.', 'Fold in with a spatula. Add milk and mix into a lump-free batter.', 'Transfer the batter into the prepared cake tin and tap lightly on the worktop to remove any air bubbles.', 'Keep the cake tin in the preheated oven and bake for 25-30 minutes.', 'Demould the cake on a serving plate, dust with icing sugar. Cut into wedges and serve.']

title: Moong Beans
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add mustard seeds and cumin seeds and let them splutter.', 'Slice onion and add to the pan and saute till onion turns translucent.', 'Add split green gram along with the water in which it was soaked and mix well. Cover and cook for 3-5 minutes.', 'Add turmeric powder and salt and mix well. Add  1/4  cup water and mix well. Cover and cook for 2-3 minutes. Add French beans and mix well. Add ginger and mix. Cover and continue to cook for 2 minutes.', 'Slit the green chillies and add to the pan. Add 2-3 tbsps water and mix. Cover and cook on low heat till the green gram and beans are just done. Take care not to overcook.', 'Switch off the heat, uncover the pan, add lemon juice and garam masala powder and mix well.', 'Transfer into a serving platter, garnish with ginger strips and serve hot.']

title: Cocktail Samosa - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat 2 tsps oil in a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds and saute till their colour changes. Add coriander seeds, green chillies and ginger and saute for 1 minute. Mash potatoes and add and mix well.', 'Add red chilli powder, garam masala powder, dried mango powder, coriander leaves, green peas and salt and mix well. Cook for 2-3 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside to cool.', 'Divide samosa dough into equal portions and roll out into thin oblong discs and cut each disc into half. Apply a little water to the edges of each half and shape them into a cone. Stuff the cone with some potato-green pea mixture, shape them into samosa and seal the edges by pressing.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai, slide the samosa, a few at a time and deep-fry till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot with sweet tamarind chutney.']

title: Chicken Farcha
method: ['Put chicken drumsticks in a bowl. Add ginger-garlic paste, coriander powder, cumin powder, turmeric powder, chilli powder, crushed peppercorns and salt and mix. Add lemon juice and mix well. Set aside to marinate for 15-20 minutes.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Spread breadcrumbs on a plate and coat the marinated chicken drumsticks.', 'Dip each prepared chicken drumstick in beaten egg and deep-fry till golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot garnished with onion rings, lemon slices and mint leaves.']

title: Creamy Spinach Chicken
method: ['Take chicken breasts on a plate, add salt, crushed peppercorns and Worcestershire sauce and rub in well on both sides. Set aside to marinate for 10-15 minutes.', 'Heat olive oil in a non-stick pan, place the marinated chicken breasts in it with the skin side down and cook till the underside turns golden brown.', 'Flip the chicken breasts and slide them to either side of the pan. Add garlic in the centre of the pan and saute for 30 seconds. Add onion, mix and saute till onion turns translucent.', 'Add mushrooms, mix and saute for 1 minute. Add spinach and crushed peppercorns, cover and cook for 5-10 minutes.', 'Add cream, mix and cook for 1 minute. Add salt and 1-2 tablespoons water, mix, cover and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Remove the chicken from the pan and place on a serving plate, pour the spinach mixture all around them and serve hot with salad.']

title: Pista Barfi
method: ['Grease a barfi tray with some ghee.', 'Heat sugar with  1/4  cup water in a non-stick pan, stirring till the sugar dissolves.', 'Add milk, stir and discard the scum that rises to the surface. Cook till the syrup thickens slightly.', 'Add liquid glucose and mix till well combined. Add ghee and mix well.', 'Add pistachio powder, mix well till the mixture comes together to form a lump. Transfer the mixture into a bowl and let it cool slightly. Apply ghee on your palms and knead the mixture slightly.', 'Spread this mixture on the barfi tray and spread evenly. Apply some ghee on a rolling pin and roll on the surface to make it even.', 'Garnish with silver varq and let it set at room temperature.', 'Cut into diamonds, arrange them on a serving platter and serve.']

title: Kachche Kele aur Sabudane ke Cutlets
method: ['Peel the boiled bananas.', 'Finely chop green chillies and put into a bowl. Grate the bananas into the bowl. Add ginger, crushed peanuts, sago and lemon juice. Chop coriander leaves and add. Add salt and mix well.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Divide the mixture into equal portions and shape them into flat cutlets. Place them in the pan, a few at a time, and cook till the underside becomes golden. Turn them over and cook till the other side is similarly cooked.', 'Drain on absorbent paper, arrange them on a platter, garnish with micro-greens and serve hot.']

title: Motichoor Parantha with Rabdi
method: ['Put motichoor laddoos in a bowl, add walnuts, almonds, pistachios, green cardamom powder and mix mashing the laddoo as you mix.', 'Add almonds, walnuts pistachios and cardamom powder to the rabdi and mix well. Keep aside.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa.', 'Roll out the dough into a large sheet and cut circles with a cookie cutter.', 'For each parantha spread a portion of the laddoo mixture on one circle and cover with another. Press the edges to seal.', 'Cook them on the hot tawa. When the underside is done, turn it over and drizzle a little ghee on each side and cook till both sides are equally done.', 'Place on a serving plate.', 'Drizzle some rabdi and some chopped nuts. Serve hot.']

title: Beetroot Porial
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add mustard seeds and allow them to splutter. Add chana dal and urad dal and saute till lightly brown.', 'Add green chillies and curry leaves. Stir and add beetroot and mix well. Add salt and mix. Sprinkle 1-2 tbsps water and cover the pan. Cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'If you like the beetroot to be softer, cook for some more time. Add coconut and coriander leaves and mix well. Serve hot.']

title: Aloo Ka Bharta
method: ['Heat oil in a pan.', 'Add cumin seeds, green garlic and green chillies and saute for a minute. Allow the tempering to cool.', 'In a bowl mix mashed potatoes with spring onions. Add the tempering and mix well.', 'Add salt, red chilli powder and mix well.', 'Add spring onion greens, mix and serve.']

title: Tahini and Cardamom Ice Cream - SK Khazana
method: ['Put the green cardamom in a mortar and crush with the pestle.', 'Heat in a deep non-stick pan, pour milk and fresh cream into it and whisk well. Add crushed cardamom and whisk well. Cook for 2-3 minutes. Set aside to cool for sometime. .Strain this mixture into a blender jar, add milk powder, condensed milk, and tahini and blend into a smooth mixture.', 'Strain the mixture into a freeze proof container. Sprinkle black sesame seeds and white sesame seeds on top and cover the container with its tight fitting lid. Keep it in the freezer to set.', 'To serve take scoops of the icecream in serving bowl, garnish with sesame tuile and serve immediately.']

title: Cheese and Herb Dip
method: ['Take cheese spread in a bowl. Stir well to make it smooth and add milk. Mix well.', 'Dry roast oregano and thyme in a non-stick pan. Remove from heat and set aside to cool.', 'Add salt and crushed peppercorns to the bowl and mix well.', 'Add the roasted herbs and mix well.', 'Serve chilled.']

title: Barley And Nut Salad
method: ['Finely chop celery sticks. Heat oil in a non stick kadai, add cumin seeds and saute till fragrant. Add barley and celery and mix well.', 'Transfer into a bowl. Finely chop cucumber and tomato and add to the bowl.', 'Coarsely grind the peanuts and add to the bowl. Add crushed black peppercorns, lemon juice, salt and mix well.', 'Place a ring mould in the centre of a serving plate and fill it with the barley salad. Press lightly. Remove the ring mould, garnish with lemon slices and serve.']

title: Cheesy Meatballs Hotdog
method: ['Mix together mutton mince, 1 tablespoon garlic, mustard paste, salt, 1 teaspoon chilli flakes, crushed peppercorns, 1 tablespoon parmesan powder and breadcrumbs in a bowl. Add egg and mix well. Set aside for 10 minutes.', 'Divide the mutton mixture into 16 equal portions and shape them into balls.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a non-stick pan. Place the meatballs in it and cook till half done.', 'Heat remaining olive oil in another non-stick wok. Add onion and remaining garlic and saute for  1/2  minute.', 'Add tomato puree and mix well, cook on low heat for 5-10 minutes. Add meat balls, basil leaves, salt, crushed peppercorns, remaining chilli flakes and 1 tablespoon parmesan cheese powder and mix well. Cook till the meatballs are fully done and gravy thickens. Remove from heat and set aside.', 'Preheat oven to 180deg C.', 'Slit the hot dog buns horizontally and stuff with 4 meat balls along with the gravy into each. Sprinkle mozzarella cheese and place them on a baking tray. Place the tray in the preheated oven and bake till the cheese melts.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Onion And Rice Parantha
method: ['Sieve whole-wheat flour along with salt. Make soft dough with yogurt and half cup of water. Cover with a moist cloth and set aside for half an hour.', 'For stuffing mix chopped onion, salt, chopped green chillies, red chilli powder, cumin powder, chopped coriander leaves, cooked rice (you can use leftover rice for this purpose and rice need not be reheated). Knead the dough again and divide into four equal parts.', 'Make balls and press between palms of your hand. Roll out each ball into three-inch diameter disc and thin down the edges.', 'Stuff rice mixture in the flattened disc and shape into a ball again. Roll out into a seven-inch diameter disc using a rolling pin.', 'Heat a tawa. Place the parantha over it. Turn over once and spread some ghee around it. Turn over again and spread a little more ghee on the other side. Cook till both sides are well cooked.', 'Serve hot with fresh yogurt and pickle of your choice.']

title: Urad Dal Khichdi
Main ingredients: Split back gram with skin, Rice, Ghee, Cumin seeds, Asafoetida, Ginger

title: Kiwi Bread ka Halwa
method: ['Heat sufficient ghee in a kadai.', 'Trim edges of bread slices and cut into small cubes. Slide the cubes in hot ghee and deep-fry till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Heat 2 tablespoons ghee in a non-stick wok. Add melon seeds, cashewnuts, pistachios and raisins and saute till well browned.', 'Add sugar, 1 1/2  cups water and stir to mix. Add saffron strands, mix well and cook.', 'Blend kiwis into a coarse puree and add in the pan. Stir to mix and cook for 6-8 minutes.', 'Add milk, fried bread cubes, mix well and add khoya. Mix well and add cardamom powder. Mix again and cook for 5 minutes or till the mixture reaches a halwa consistency, stirring continuously.', 'Serve warm.']

title: Pumpkin Pudding
method: ['Place pumpkin pieces in a large pan. Add sugar and one cup of water.', 'Cover and cook on medium heat for about twenty five to thirty minutes. Mix cornflour with milk till smooth.', 'Once the pumpkin is cooked add the cornflour-milk mixture and mix. Cook till the mixture thickens. Sprinkle cinnamon powder. Add half cup of crushed hazelnuts, desiccated coconut and mix.', 'Transfer the mixture into a serving dish.', 'Sprinkle remaining hazelnuts and pomegranate pearls and serve.']

title: Prawns in Black Bean Sauce
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a wok. Deep-fry prawns till they change colour. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan. Add ginger and garlic and saute on high heat for a minute.', 'Add black bean sauce and mix well. Add salt and pepper powder and mix well. Add  3/4  cup stock, mix and cook.', 'Dissolve cornflour in remaining stock to make a smooth slurry.', 'Add fried prawns to the sauce, mix well and simmer for a minute.', 'Add vinegar and mix well. Add slurry, mix well and cook for 2 minutes or till the sauce thickens.', 'Add spring onion greens, mix well and simmer for a minute.', 'Garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot.']

title: Peanut Butter and Chocolate Cupcakes
method: ['Preheat oven to 180@C.', 'Sieve together the refined flour and baking powder into a bowl and add chocolate chips. Mix well. Set aside.', 'Cream together butter and castor sugar in a large bowl, till fluffy.', 'Add one egg at a time and continue creaming.', 'Break egg in small bowl and whisk well.', 'Add half the egg and vanilla essence and cream further till light and fluffy.', 'Add the refined flour mixture. Mix well. Ensure that there are no lumps formed. Gradually add milk and mix well. Put the mixture into piping bag and pipe out in silicon moulds, place the moulds on a baking tray.', 'Put the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 20 to 25 minutes. Remove from heat and cool down to room temperature.', 'Demould', 'Mix whipped cream and peanut butter in another bowl. Transfer into a piping bag and pipeout rosettes over the cupcakes and garnish with chocolate chips.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Taazi Haldi aur Gajar ki Sabzi
ingredients: ['1 1/2 cups fresh turmeric (taazi haldi) , chopped', '1 medium carrot , chopped', '2-3 tablespoons ghee', '1 teaspoon cumin seeds', '1/4 teaspoon asafoetida', '2 tablespoons crushed ginger-garlic-green chillies', '1 large onion , chopped', 'Salt to taste', '1/4 cup yogurt', '1 teaspoon red chilli powder', '1/2 tablespoon cumin powder', '1 tablespoon coriander powder', '5-6 tablespoons fresh coriander leaves , chopped']
method: ['Heat ghee in a non-stick kadai, add cumin seeds and saute till they change colour. Add asafoetida and crushed ginger-garlic-green chillies, mix and saute for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add onion, mix and saute till translucent.', 'Add fresh turmeric and carrot, mix well and saute for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add salt, mix, cover and cook on medium heat for 6-8 minutes.', 'Add yogurt, red chilli powder, cumin powder, coriander powder, a little salt and 3 tbsps coriander leaves and mix well. Cover and cook for 2-3 minutes or till ghee surfaces.', 'Add remaining coriander leaves and mix well.', 'Transfer the sabzi into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot.']

title: Satvik Khichdi
method: ['Heat ghee in a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds and saute till they change colour.', 'Add capsicum, mix and saute for two to three minutes. Add tomato, mix and cook till soft.', 'Add cauliflower and potatoes, mix and cook for five to ten minutes.', 'Add salt, chilli powder, turmeric powder and garam masala powder, mix well and cook for one minute.', 'Add rice and green gram and mix well. Add four cups water, stir to mix and bring to a boil on high heat. Lower heat, cover and cook till the moisture dries out.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Baked Veggie Bites
method: ['Preheat oven at 180oC. Grease a glass baking dish with some oil.', 'Put gram flour, coconut, carrot, cabbage, chilli powder, cumin-coriander powder, ginger, coriander leaves, salt and  1/2  cup water in a bowl and whisk well.', 'Add baking soda and mix. Add some oil and mix well.', 'Pour the mixture into the greased dish and sprinkle some sesame seeds. Place the dish on a baking tray. Place the baking tray in the preheated oven and bake for 25 minutes.', 'Cut and serve hot.']

title: Turai Punjabwale
method: ['Heat ghee in a pressure cooker and add cumin seeds. When then begin to change colour, add onions and saute till transparent.', 'Add ginger, green chillies and turmeric powder and saute till the onions turn light brown. Add tomatoes and cook till they are soft.', 'Add coriander powder, red chilli powder, dried mango powder, garam masala powder and salt. Saute till the ghee separates from the masala.', 'Add the ridge gourd slices and potato cubes and saute for three to four minutes. Add half cup water and pressure cook till two whistles are given out. Serve hot.']

title: Chilli Lime Fish
method: ['Thinly slice cucumbers and carrots lengthwise using a slicer.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Take fish pieces in a bowl. Add soy sauce, salt, ginger-garlic paste and refined flour and mix well.', 'To make dressing, combine Thai chilli sauce, red chilli sauce, fish sauce, sesame oil and lemon juice in a bowl. Mix well till a homogenous mixture is formed.', 'Take cucumber and carrot slices in another bowl. Add some dressing and mix well.', 'Finely chop basil leaves, red chilli and coriander sprigs together.', 'Deep-fry fish pieces in hot oil till golden ad crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Place cucumber-carrot salad on a serving platter. Put fried fish on one side, drizzle remaining dressing on top, garnish with chopped basil-chilli-coriander and serve immediately.']

title: Dakshin Calamari
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Take squid rings in a bowl. Add ginger-garlic paste, chili powder, gun powder, salt, chopped curry leaves, crushed peppercorns, lemon juice and rice flour and mix well.', 'Break in an egg and mix well.', 'Coat each squid ring with breadcrumbs.', 'Deep-fry in hot oil till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot garnished with fried curry leaves.']

title: Palak Raita
method: ['Dry roast cumin seeds on a hot tawa and grind to a fine powder. Whisk the skimmed milk yogurt and add black salt, roasted cumin powder and red chilli powder.', 'Mix well and chill in the refrigerator. Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add garlic and green chillies and stir-fry briefly. Add spinach and spring onion along with its greens and saute over high heat for three to four minutes, stirring continuously.', 'Season with salt and mix well. Continue to cook on high heat till the spinach is almost dry. Take it off the heat and cool. Mix with the seasoned yogurt just before serving.']

title: Low Calorie Carrot Pickle
method: ['Put red chillies in a grinder jar, add  1/4  cup mustard seeds and grind.', 'Heat oil in a pan, add  1/2  tsp mustard seeds, fenugreek seeds and asafoetida and saute till the seeds splutter.', 'Add carrots and mix well. Add salt and mix. Switch off heat.', 'Add 2 tbsps of the ground mixture and mix well. Squeeze juice of  1/2  lemon and mix.', 'Cool and store in a bottle. After a day keep it in the refrigerator. It will keep upto 2 weeks.', 'Serve.']

title: Thandai Cigars
method: ['To make roasted almonds, heat butter in a non-stick pan, add almonds and roast on low heat for three to four minutes.', 'To make fennel tuile, pre-heat oven at 180deg C. Mix together icing sugar, refined flour, butter, fennel seeds, crushed black peppercorn, twenty five milliliter water and mix well.', 'Place a silicon mat on a baking tray and pour four tablespoon of batter, leaving sufficient distance between each. Place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for five to six minutes till the edges turn golden brown.', 'Remove the tray from the oven and let it cool for one minute. Carefully lift the biscuits and roll them on the handle of a wooden spoon, one at a time, to get a cylindrical shape. Remove them gently after they are cooled. Repeat the same process with rest of the batter.', 'To make rose mascarpone cream, mix mascarpone cheese, icing sugar, whipped cream, gulkand, rose extract, dried rose petals and mix well. Fill the mixture into a piping bag.', 'Crush roasted almonds in a garlic chopper and put into a bowl.', 'Pipe the filling into the tuile biscuit from both sides and coat the edges with crushed roasted almonds.', 'Arrange them on a serving plate and serve immediately.']

title: Beetroot Coconut Barfi
method: ['Grease a barfi tray with some ghee.', 'Heat ghee in a deep non-stick pan, add sugar, coconut and cream and mix well. Cook on medium heat, stirring continuously, for 15-20 minutes.', 'Meanwhile roughly chop walnuts.', 'When mixture begins to leave the pan, add the beetroot and mix well. Add powdered sugar and green cardamom powder, mix well and cook on medium heat for 2-3 minutes.', 'Transfer the barfi mixture in the greased tray and spread it evenly. Sprinkle walnuts on top. Set aside till set and cooled down to room temperature.', 'Cut into rectangular barfis. Insert a coloured ice cream stick in each barfi, arrange them on a serving platter and serve immediately.']

title: Koki - SK Khazana
method: ['Mix together flour, green chillies, carom seeds, pomegranate seeds, coriander leaves, onion, 2 tablespoons ghee, salt and fresh cream in a bowl. Add water little by little and knead into stiff dough. Cover with a moist muslin cloth and set aside to rest for 15 minutes.', 'Divide the dough into equal portions, dust in flour and roll out into thin discs - these are kokis.', 'Heat a non-stick pan. Cook each koki till evenly cooked from both sides. Apply a little ghee on each side, and cook turning sides, gently pressing with a flat spatula.', 'Arrange the kokis on a serving platter and serve hot with yogurt.']

title: Muesli Chivda
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add mustard seeds and let them splutter. Add curry leaves and saute.', 'Slit, deseed green chillies and add, mix and saute well. Add peanuts and cashewnuts, mix and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add muesli, mix and saute for 1 minute. cinnamon powder, mix well and saute for 2 minutes.', 'Add salt and black salt, mix and let it get heated through. Remove from heat and cool to room temperature.', 'Serve.']

title: Babycorn in Hot Garlic Sauce
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Combine babycorn, salt, crushed peppercorns, 1 teaspoon chilli flakes and cornstarch with 2 tablespoons stock in a bowl and mix well.', 'Deep-fry babycorn in hot oil till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon oil in anon-stick pan. Add garlic and saute for 30 seconds. Add red chilli paste, mix and saute for a minute. Add onion, capsicum and peppers and toss to mix. Add remaining stock and mix well.', 'Add tomato ketchup, remaining chilli flakes and sugar, mix and bring to boil.', 'Dissolve cornstarch with some water to make smooth slurry and add it to the pan. Add salt and crushed peppercorns and mix well.', 'Add fried babycorns to the sauce mixture and mix well. Add spring onion greens, mix and cook for a minute.', 'Add vinegar and switch off heat and mix well.', 'Serve hot with some bell pepper curls.']

title: Avocado Sandwich
method: ['To prepare spread, take mayonnaise in a bowl. Add mustard paste and honey and mix well.', 'Apply some prepared spread on 1 bread slice. Place tomato roundel, cucumber roundels and sprinkle some salt and crushed peppercorns on top.', 'Apply some spread on another bread slice and place it spread side down over the cucumber roundel. Apply some cream cheese on top and place avocado slices and onion roundels on top. Sprinkle some salt and crushed peppercorns on top.', 'Apply some cream cheese on a third bread slice and place it cheese side down over the avocado slice. Similarly, prepare with remaining bread slices.', 'Serve the sandwiches with banana chips, tomato ketchup and remaining spread. They can be packed in tiffin box to take to office too.']

title: Pasta Stuffed Bell Peppers
method: ['Pre-heat an oven at 180degC/ 360 degF. Cut a thin slice off the top of all the capsicums and remove seeds and trim the white ribs. Chop onion. Heat 2 tbsps olive oil in a non stick pan, add onion and saute. Chop tomato and add and continue to saute. Halve black olives and add. Add macaroni.', 'Chop parsley and add. Add salt, crushed red chillies, pepper powder and  1/4  cup water. Mix well and cook till dry. Drizzle a little olive oil in each capsicum shell and sprinkle a little salt. Chop mozzarella cheese and add to the macaroni and mix well. Stuff this mixture into the capsicum shells. Drizzle a little olive oil on top and arrange the capsicums on a baking tray.', 'Bake in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes. Serve hot.']

title: Aloo Potol
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add potatoes, pointed gourds, salt and  1/4  tsp turmeric powder, mix well, cover and cook on high heat for 1-2 minutes. Reduce heat, cover and cook for 2-3 minutes or till they turn a light golden. Drain the potatoes and pointed gourds and put them into a bowl.', 'Add panch phoron to the oil remaining in the pan and saute for a minute. Add ginger-garlic paste, remaining turmeric powder, coriander powder and red chilli powder, mix and saute for a minute.', 'Add the fried potatoes and pointed gourd and mix. Break green chilli and add. Add sugar and mix well. Add  1/2  cup water, mix well, cover and cook on low heat for 2-3 minutes. Switch the heat off.', 'Transfer aloo potol into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander sprig and serve hot.']

title: Banana and Coffee Muffins
method: ['Preheat oven to 180deg C.', 'Sift refined flour and baking powder together into a bowl and set aside.', 'Cream butter and sugar together in a large mixing bowl till light and fluffy. Add eggs, one by one, beating well till the mixture becomes light. Add vanilla essence and mix well.', 'Fold in refined flour, adding it in batches. Add milk and mix well.', 'Add 2 tablespoons water to coffee powder and microwave for 10 seconds and cool it slightly.', 'Add coffee decoction and banana puree to the flour mixture and mix well. Pour the batter into a piping bag and pipe the batter into silicon muffin moulds.', 'Place the moulds in the preheated oven and bake for 25-30 minutes. Remove from oven and cool on a wire rack.', 'Serve.']

title: Chicken in Tamarind Sauce with Jasmine Rice
method: ['Make incisions on chicken breasts. Apply 1 tbsp red curry paste on both sides of each breast. Heat 2 tbsps oil in a non stick pan. Place chicken breasts on it and cook, turning sides, till well browned on both sides.', 'Heat remaining oil in another non stick pan. Add remaining red curry paste and saute for a minute. Add tamarind pulp and mix well. Cook for a minute. Add 5-6 tbsps water and stir to mix. Cook till it comes to a boil. Add brown sugar and mix well. Pour the sauce over chicken and coat them well with the sauce.', 'Place chicken pieces on a serving plate and pour the sauce over it. Place cooked jasmine rice along the side and serve immediately.']

title: Turai Ke Pakode
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Cut ridge gourd into roundels.', 'Combine gram flour, turmeric powder, chilli powder, salt and 3 tablespoons warm oil along with some water to make a smooth batter.', 'Put ridge gourd roundels into the prepared batter and mix well.', 'Deep-fry each roundel into hot oil till golden and crisp. Drain in absorbent paper.', 'Sprinkle some chaat masala on the pakodas and serve hot.']

title: Plantain Sambhariya
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Deep-fry the bananas fingers till golden and drain on absorbent paper.', 'Heat the remaining oil in a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds and green chillies and saute till fragrant.', 'Add raw peanuts and saute for 3-4 minutes.', 'Add fried bananas, raisins, coconut, coriander leaves, salt, sugar and lemon juice and mix well. Cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve.']

title: Dahi Sandwich - SK Khazana
method: ['Take hung yogurt in a bowl, add corn kernels, yellow capsicum, red capsicum, green capsicum, cabbage, carrot, pepper powder, salt and chaat masala and mix well.', 'For each sandwich, spread some of this mixture on one bread slice and cover with another slice. Heat butter on a non-stick tawa, place a sandwich on it and toast till the underside turns golden. Flip, drizzle some butter on the sides and cook till evenly golden on the other side. Toast the remaining sandwiches similarly.', 'Halve each sandwich and place on a serving plate, grate some cheese over them, and serve with tomato ketchup.']

title: Sheer Kurma
method: ['Heat ghee in a non-stick pan, add vermicelli and saute till fragrant.', 'Add milk and sugar, mix well and cook for 2-3 minutes. Add  1/2  teaspoon green cardamom powder and mix well.', 'Add charoli, mix and cook for 1 minute. Add saffron and nutmeg powder and mix well. Add pistachios, almonds, remaining green cardamom powder and mix well. Cook till the mixture thickens.', 'Transfer into individual serving bowls, garnish with pistachios, almonds and a few saffron strands and serve warm.']

title: Chocolate Mille Feuille
method: ['To make the chocolate mousse, cook the egg yolks and caster sugar in a double boiler, stirring, till thick or till it coats the back of the ladle. Remove from the heat.', 'Heat the milk in a non-stick pan but do not boil it. Add this to the egg mixture and mix well.', 'Place the chocolate in a bowl and pour the milk-egg mixture over it and mix till the chocolate melts.', 'Beat the fresh cream lightly and fold into the chocolate mixture. Refrigerate the mixture for one hour.', 'To make the chocolate planks, melt the dark chocolate in a microwave on HIGH for about thirty seconds. Remove from the heat and stir continuously till it cools down to room temperature.', 'Spread the mixture uniformly on a silicon sheet. Once the chocolate is semi-set, cut three-inch by one-inch planks using a measuring scale. Place the silicon sheet in the refrigerator for ten to fifteen minutes so that the chocolate is completely set.', 'Transfer the set planks onto a plate.', 'Arrange four of them on a serving plate and pipe a little of the chocolate mousse on them. Cover each plank with another plank. Repeat this procedure until all the planks are used.', 'Pipe rosettes with the remaining mousse on the uppermost planks. Place in the freezer for fifteen to twenty minutes.', 'Serve chilled.']

title: Burghul, Red Pepper And Orange Salad
method: ['Soak burghul for fifteen minutes. Strain.', 'Take yellow and red capsciums separately on a fork and roast directly on flame. Slice onion and cut orange segments.', 'Take a salad bowl. Put sliced onion, sliced garlic, burghul and mix. Put water on the roasted capsicums and then remove the burnt skin. Cut into small pieces and add to the bowl. Add tomatoes and parsley. Add salt, white pepper powder, a little sugar and', 'Tear iceberg lettuce and add. Toss well. Add olive oil and toss again.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Lauki Kiwi Masala
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add cumin seeds and mustard seeds and let the seeds splutter.', 'Slit green chillies into two.', 'Add asafoetida, ginger and saute well.', 'Add green chillies and saute further. Add bottle gourd and toss. Add turmeric powder, salt and toss again. Cover and cook for 8-10 minutes.', 'Add kiwis and mix well. Toss and cook for a minute.', 'Add chopped coriander and toss again.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Peach Crumble
method: ['Preheat oven at 180oC.', 'Arrange peaches on the base of a glass baking dish. Sprinkle 1 tablespoon brown sugar, cinnamon powder and raisins on top.', 'Put flour in a bowl. Add butter and remaining brown sugar and mix with fingertips till the mixture resembles breadcrumbs.', 'Top the peaches with this mixture, place the dish in the preheated oven and bake for 20-25 minutes. Remove from heat and cool down to room temperature.', 'Top with whipped cream and serve.']

title: Oat Pancakes
method: ['Combine together the oat flour, baking powder and salt in a bowl and mix.', 'Whisk together the milk, melted butter and eggs in another bowl. Add the ginger garlic paste, chilli powder, spring onion with greens, sweet corn and coriander leaves and mix well.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa and brush some butter on it. Spoon out the prepared mixture into small pancakes and cook for two to three minutes on each side.', 'Serve hot with tomato ketchup.']

title: Puchka
method: ['For the filling, place the boiled chane and boiled potatoes in a bowl. Mash the together with your hand.', 'Place the tamarind pulp in a deep bowl. Add the salt, black salt, roasted cumin powder and red chilli powder and mix well. Stir in four cups of water. Add ice cubes and stir to mix.', 'To serve, make a hole in the centre of each puri with your thumb; fill the puri with a little potato-chana mixture. Dip the puri into the tamarind water and serve immediately.']

title: Masaledar Mutton
method: ['Heat oil in a pressure cooker, add green cardamoms, black cardamoms, cloves, bay leaves and cinnamon and saute for half a minute.', 'Add onions and saute till golden brown.Add mutton and saute on high heat for five minutes. Add garlic paste and saute for two minutes.', 'Add yogurt, turmeric powder, red chilli powder, salt and coriander powder and cook for two minutes, stirring continuously.Add tomato puree and green chilli and stir.', 'Add six to seven cups water and bring to a boil. Close the lid and cook under pressure until the pressure is released five to six times (5-6 whistles).', 'Open the lid when the pressure is reduced completely. Add garam masala powder, crushed peppercorns, coriander leaves and mint leaves and cook for a few minutes or till most of the water is absorbed. Serve hot with rotis.']

title: Kairi Murg
method: ['Peel and cut raw mangoes into small pieces. Puree half of the pieces.', 'In a bowl marinate the chicken with half the ginger paste, half the garlic paste, salt, half the garam masala powder, half the green chilli paste, pureed mango for about an hour.', 'Place a coal over the gas flame and when it is red hot place it in a katori in the centre of the marinated chicken.', 'Place a few cloves over it and pour one tablespoon of oil on it and immediately cover it with a lid. Let it stand for a few minutes.', 'Heat the remaining oil in a kadai, add the sliced onions and saute till transluscent.', 'Add the remaining ginger paste, garlic paste, green chilli paste and saute for two minutes.', 'Add marinated chicken, turmeric powder, red chilli powder, coriander powder, remaining garam masala powder and raw mango pieces.', 'Stir so that the masala coats all the chicken pieces evenly. Cook on high heat for a few minutes.', 'Adjust salt, add chopped coriander leaves and a little water. Cover and cook till done.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Eggless Sponge Cake
method: ['Preheat the oven to 180oC/350oF/Gas Mark 4. Grease a cake tin and lightly dust it with flour. Sift flour with soda bicarbonate and baking powder.', 'Cream together the sugar and butter, till light and fluffy. Add the condensed milk and beat well. Stir in the milk and vanilla essence. Gradually add the flour, mixing well after each addition. Mix well for three to four minutes till the mixture is smooth and light.', 'Pour the batter into the prepared tin and bake for about thirty to thirty five minutes. Remove from the oven and turn out onto a wire rack and leave to cool completely.', 'Cut into wedges and serve.']

title: Oats Rawa Dhokla
method: ['Grease dhokla pan with some oil. Set aside.', 'Combine the semolina, oats and yogurt in a bowl and mix. Add half cup of water and mix well into a thick batter. Cover and set aside for thirty minutes.', 'Grind together the green chillies and ginger into a fine paste.', 'Add the fruit salt and 1 tablespoon oil to the batter and mix. Add the prepared paste and mix well. Add more water if required to adjust the consistency.', 'Pour the batter into the dhokla pan filling  3/4  of the pan. Cover and steam for 12-15 minutes. Remove from heat and cool.', 'To make the tempering, heat remaining oil in a non-stick pan. Add the mustard seeds, sesame seeds, green chillies and curry leaves and saute till the mustard seeds splutter.', 'Add the tempering to the dhoklas, cut into squares and arrange on a serving platter.', 'Sprinkle gun powder on top and serve.']

title: Tariwali Egg Curry
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add onions and saute till brown.', 'Add turmeric powder, red chilli powder, coriander powder and ginger-garlic paste and saute for  1/2  minute.', 'Add tomato puree and salt and saute till oil separates.', 'Add sufficient water and eggs and cover and cook for 10 minutes.', 'Serve hot garnished with coriander leaves.']

title: Paella
method: ['Take chicken in a bowl, add red paprika powder, dried oregano, crushed black pepper, and sea salt and rub them well all over the chicken pieces.', 'Heat 1 tbsp oil in a paella pan, add the chicken and sear on high heat, turning sides, till golden brown all around. Transfer onto a plate and set aside.', 'Heat remaining oil in the same pan, add onions and saute till golden brown. Add garlic, mix and saute till raw smell disappears. Add tomato puree and mix well. Add Arborio rice and mix well.', 'Add 2 cups fish stock, mix well and cook on medium heat till the rice is  3/4  done.', 'Add sea salt, saffron, crushed black pepper, chicken and remaining fish stock and mix well. Cook for 5-6 minutes', 'Add clams. Diagonally slice chicken sausages into 4 pieces and add in the pan. Mix well. Cook for 10-12 minutes on medium heat.', 'Add prawns and rawas fish and mix well. Add fresh oregano sprigs, mix well and cook for 5-7 minutes.', 'Add green peas and squeeze the juice of  1/2  lemon, mix well and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Garnish with flat parsley and serve hot in the paella pan itself.']

title: Rajgira Puri
method: ['Grate potatoes into a bowl. Add ginger-green chilli paste, coriander leaves and rock salt and mix well. Add rajgira flour, little by little, mix and knead into a stiff dough. Add ghee and knead again. Set aside for 10-15 minutes.', 'Heat sufficient ghee in a kadai.', 'Divide the dough into small equal portions and roll into balls. Place each ball on a greased plastic sheet and gently pat into a puri.', 'Deep-fry puris in hot oil, one by one, till puffed up and golden. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Green Tomato and Kiwi Chutney
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds, mustard seeds, fenugreek seeds, onion seeds, fennel seeds, ginger and green chillies and saute till fragrant.', 'Add green tomatoes and kiwis and mix and cook till both tomatoes and kiwis soften.', 'Add sugar and mix well. Add red chilli powder, black pepper powder and black salt and mix well. Add salt, mix well and continue to cook till tomatoes are fully cooked.', 'Add vinegar and mix well.', 'Transfer into serving bowl and serve.']

title: Kolhapuri Missal Pav
method: ['Heat four cups of water in a deep non-stick pan, add mixed sprouts and boil for ten minutes. Strain and reserve the stock.', 'Heat one tablespoon oil in another non-stick pan, add mustard seeds and let them splutter. Add curry leaves, half teaspoon turmeric powder and asafoetida. Mix well and saute.', 'Add half the onions and saute till they turn translucent. Add green chillies and mix.', 'Add boiled sprouts, mix well and cook. Add one cup of water, mix, cover and cook on low heat for five minutes.', 'Add salt, red chilli powder, garam masala powder and mix well. Add half cup of water and mix, cover and cook for two minutes.', 'Add tamarind paste and jaggery, mix well and cook on low heat for two minutes. Switch off heat and set aside.', 'Transfer reserved stock into a deep non-stick pan and place on heat. Add salt, a pinch of turmeric powder and bring to a boil. Remove pan from heat.', 'Heat remaining oil in a small non-stick tempering pan. Add garlic and saute till it turns brown. Add Kolhapuri masala, mix well and pour the tempering over the boiled stock in the pan.', 'Place the pan back on heat and bring to a boil. Switch off heat.']

title: Jain Pitla
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons gram flour (besan)', '1 tablespoon oil', '1 teaspoon mustard seeds', '1 teaspoon chopped green chillies', '5-6 curry leaves', '1/2 cup chopped cabbage', '1/4 teaspoon turmeric powder', '1/2 teaspoon red chilli powder', 'Salt to taste', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh coriander leaves']
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add mustard seeds and let it splutter. Add green chillies, curry leaves and cabbage and mix well.', 'Add some water alongwith add turmeric powder, chilli powder, salt and gram flour, mix and cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add lemon juice and chopped coriander and mix well.', 'Serve hot garnished with a coriander sprig.']

title: Rose Kulfi with Faluda
method: ['Heat reduced milk in a non stick pan, add condensed milk, mix well and simmer for 5-6 minutes.', 'Mix cornflour with 3-4 tbsps water in a bowl and add to the pan. Lower heat and cook till thick.', 'Switch off heat and add 2 tbsps rose petals, gulkand, 3 tbsps rose syrup and mix well. Add almonds and mix again. Pour into kulfi moulds, screw on the covers and keep them in a refrigerator to set.', 'Place falooda in a bowl, add remaining rose syrup and rose petals. Mix well and chill in the refrigerator.', 'When set, demould kulfis, slice them and place in serving bowls. Pour falooda mixture over them and serve chilled.']

title: Paneer Koliwada
method: ['Take yogurt in a bowl, add red chilli-garlic paste, mint paste, coriander paste, ginger-garlic paste, salt, red chilli powder, chaat masala, cumin powder, gram flour and some water and whisk to make a smooth and thick batter.', 'Add baking soda, lemon juice and whisk. Add cottage cheese and mix well.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a in a non-stick pan, place small portions of the mixture, keeping a little distance between each, flatten them slightly and shallow-fry, turning sides, till evenly golden brown on both sides. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Arrange them on a serving platter, garnish with coriander sprigs and serve hot with onion rings and green chutney.']

title: Jain Cholay Rajma Dal
method: ['Heat one tablespoon oil ina non-stick pan and add cinnamon, tomato puree, sesame seeds, garam masala powder, red chilli powder and salt and mix well. Cook for two to three minutes.', 'Add chickpeas and kidney beans and mix well. Add one and a half cups water and let it cook for about five to ten minutes or till oil rises to the surface.', 'Now add coriander leaves, parsley, mint leaves and one tablespoon olive oil and mix well.', 'Finally add lemon juice and mix well. Switch off the heat.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot garnished with mint leaves.']

title: Almond Katli Modak
method: ['Pour 1 cup water into a deep non-stick pan, add sugar and mix well. Add milk and stir well. Collect the scum that rises on the surface and discard it.', 'Wipe the sides of the pan with a moist muslin cloth to avoid crystallization. Cook till sugar reaches 3 string consistency.', 'Wet your fingers and add liquid glucose to sugar syrup and mix well. Add almond flour and mix well. Add ghee and mix well.', 'Transfer the mixture into a parat and mash well with the help of a wooden masher and spread it evenly. Allow to cool down.', 'Grease your palms with ghee, add green cardamom powder to the mixture and mix well.', 'Stuff small portions of the mixture in modak mould and press it gently. Level the surface with the help of a butter knife. Set aside for 10 minutes. Open the mould and remove the modaks carefully.', 'Arrange the modaks on a serving platter and serve. Or transfer into an airtight container and store in the refrigerator to serve whenever required.']

title: Mexican Rice-SK Khazana
method: ['Heat oil in a deep non-stick pan. Add rice and saute for a minute.', 'Add garlic, mix and saute for a minute. Add onion, mix and saute for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add Chipotle sauce and mix. Add tomato puree, mix and cook for 1 minute. Add carrot, peas, mixed capsicums and lemon juice, mix and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add salt and crushed peppercorns and mix well. Add stock, mix, cover and cook till done.', 'Sprinkle Mexican seasoning and serve hot.']

title: Savoury Pastry
method: ['Preheat oven at 180oC. Line a baking tray with a silicon sheet.', 'Halve spring roll sheets and put them in batches of 3 on the baking tray. Brush in between and on top of them with butter. Put the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 5 minutes.', 'Heat 1 tbsp butter each in 2 non-stick pans. Add 1 tbsp chopped garlic each in both pans and saute till fragrant. Add 1 chopped onion each in both and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add mushrooms in pan 1, mix and saute for 1 minute.', 'Roughly chop spinach and add to pan 2. Mix and saute for 1 minute. Add salt and crushed peppercorns, mix well and cook for 1 minute.', 'Add salt and crushed peppercorns to the mushrooms, mix well and cook for 1 minute.', 'Place 5 baked spring roll sheet halves stacked on a serving plate. Spread cooked mushroom mixture on it and top with 2 tbsps grated cheese. Place another 5 sheets stacked on it, spread cooked spinach mixture on it and top with remaining cheese. Cover with the remaining sheets stacked on it.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Aloo Anardana
method: ['Grind dried pomegranate seeds with the water in which it was soaked into a smooth paste. Put the paste into a bowl.', 'Cut potatoes into cubes. Heat oil in a non-stick pan.', 'Add 1 cup water to pomegranate paste and mix well.', 'Add ginger, garlic and onion to the pan and saute for 1 minute.', 'Place a strainer over a bowl and put a muslin cloth in it. Pour the diluted pomegranate paste in it and strain.', 'Add potato cubes, salt and red chilli powder to the pan and mix well. Cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add strained pomegranate liquid, mix well and cook for 1 minute. Add jaggery, mix well and cook for 4-5 minutes.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot garnished with fresh pomegranate pearls.']

title: Kada Prashad - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat ghee in an iron kadai and when it melts, add whole wheat flour and mix well. Saute on medium, stirring continuously, till the flour turns brown.', 'Add 1 cup water and stir continuously for 4-5 minutes or till well combined. Cover and cook for 6-8 minutes.', 'Add sugar and mix well, cook for 3-4 minutes, or till the sugar dissolves. Switch the heat off.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve.']

title: Badam Doodh - SK Khazana
method: ['Blanch, drain, peel and blend almonds to a smooth paste with some water.', 'Heat milk in a thick-bottomed vessel and bring to a boil. Simmer on medium heat till the milk reduces and thickens slightly.', 'Add almond paste, sugar, nutmeg powder, cardamom powder and saffron, mix well and simmer on low heat for 15-20 minutes.', 'Pour into individual glasses, sprinkle cardamom powder, garnish with almond slivers and saffron and serve hot.']

title: Prawns Xacuti
method: ['Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan, add cinnamon, cloves, peppercorns, cardamoms and poppy seeds and saute for a minute. Add coconut and saute further for a minute. Cool and grind, with sufficient water, to a coarse paste.', 'Put prawns in a bowl, add salt and turmeric powder and mix well.', 'Heat remaining oil in another non-stick pan, add onions and saute till translucent. Add ginger-garlic paste and saute further for a minute. Add ground paste and saute for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add prawns and cook for 2-3 minutes. Add coriander-cumin powder and mix well.', 'Add  1/2  cup water and mix well. Cook for 5-7 minutes.', 'Add nutmeg and vinegar and mix well. Add coriander leaves and mix well.', 'Serve hot garnished with coriander leaves.']

title: Ratatouille
method: ['Preheat oven to 160degC.', 'Heat one and a half tablespoons of olive oil in a pan. Add onions and saute. Slice one eggplant into thin vertical slices. Quarter the other two eggplants and further cut into half inch thick slices horizontally.', 'Add the smaller slices to the onions and toss. Add salt and cook. Sprinkle a little salt on the vertical slices of eggplant and brush a little olive oil on them.', 'Roast these slices on both sides over a grill till lightly browned.', 'Halve the zucchini and further slice into half inch thick slices horizontally. Add it to the eggplants and toss. Add tomato concasse and one cup of water, fresh thyme, hand torn green and purple basil leaves and cook.', 'Adjust salt, add white pepper powder and mix.']

title: Kuzhi Uppu Paniyaram
method: ['Combine semolina, rice flour, sour yogurt, cumin seeds, green chillies, onions, coriander leaves and salt in a bowl and mix well.', 'Add water, little by little, and mix well to make a thick batter. Add baking soda and mix well. Rest the batter for 10 minutes. Heat a paniyaram tawa.', 'Drizzle a little oil into each cavity and spread it with a tissue paper.', 'Drizzle some more oil in each cavity and pour the batter into them filling upto  3/4  the depth. Drizzle a little oil all around and cook.', 'When the underside turns golden, turn them over with a wooden skewer. Drizzle some more oil all around and cook for 1- 1 1/2  minutes.', 'When the paniyarams become golden and crisp on both sides, serve them hot with coconut chutney or with tomato chutney or any other chutney of your choice.']

title: Tangy Thyme Chicken
method: ['Put  1/2  cup orange juice, salt, fennel seeds and pepper powder in a bowl. Add chicken, mix well and set aside to marinate for 1 hour.', 'Preheat oven to 180oC.', 'Heat butter and  1/2  tablespoon olive oil in a non-stick pan. Place the marinated chicken in it and serr till light brown from both the sides.', 'Put honey, pepper powder and fresh thyme in a bowl and mix well. Add red chilli powder and mix well. Add 1 teaspoon orange juice and 1 teaspoon olive oil and mix well.', 'Place seared chicken on a baking tray, pour the honey mixture on top, put tray in preheated oven and bake for 15 minutes or till the chicken is fully cooked.', 'Serve hot garnished with orange segments and thyme sprig.']

title: Green Sukka Chicken
method: ['Place coriander, mint and green chillies in a mixer jar.', 'Roughly chop the ginger and add to the mixer. Add half the garlic, salt, lemon juice and grind to a coarse paste.', 'Add to the chicken and mix well. Set aside to marinate for fifteen to twenty minutes.', 'Heat oil in a pan. Crush remaining garlic and add to the pan. Saute till golden brown.', 'Add curry leaves and onion. Fry till onions are golden brown.', 'Add the chicken and mix well.', 'Add salt and crushed black peppercorns and mix.', 'Cover and cook for twenty five to thirty minutes or till the chicken is cooked.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Egg Pulao-SK Khazana
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add chilli powder and turmeric powder and mix. Add eggs and salt and shallow-fry for a minute. Drain and set aside.', 'Add potatoes and salt to the same pan and saute for a minute. Add salt and mix. Remove the pan from heat and set aside.', 'Halve fried eggs vertically.', 'Heat ghee in a deep non-stick pan. Add cardamoms, cloves, cinnamon, peppercorns, bay leaves and onion, mix and saute till onions turn translucent.', 'Add rice and mix. Add salt, saffron water, mint leaves and 3 cups water, stir, cover and cook till the rice is fully done.', 'Add fried eggs and potatoes and mix with a light hand. Cover and let it cook for 2 minutes.', 'Garnish with mint sprig and serve hot.']

title: Chicken Kale and Ginger Stir Fry
method: ['Boil kale leaves for five minutes. Drain and set aside.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add chicken and stir-fry for five minutes.', 'Add ginger, carrot and red bell pepper, mix and stir-fry for three minutes.', 'Add kale, hoisin sauce, soy sauce, salt and two tablespoons water, mix and cook for two to three minutes.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Baby Potatoes In Spicy Yogurt Gravy
method: ['Mix together yogurt, asafoetida, garlic paste, ginger paste, red chilli powder, turmeric powder, coriander powder, cumin powder, garam masala powder and salt well.', 'Pierce baby potatoes with fork, add to the marinade and keep for about half an hour. Heat a non-stick pan and roast onions till lightly browned. Add baby potatoes along with the marinade and mix.', 'Once it comes to a boil, lower the heat and cook till the gravy thickens and coats the potatoes. Garnish with chopped coriander leaves and serve hot with rotis.']

title: Pot Mushroom Rice
method: ['Boil the rice in three cups of water with star anise until just cooked. Drain well, transfer rice to clay pot and keep warm. Soak the oyster mushrooms in sufficient hot water for fifteen minutes, drain, roughly chop.', 'Mix the cornflour in half a cup of water. Reserve some chopped spring onion greens for garnish. Preheat oven to 180degC. Heat the oil in a wok, add the ginger and garlic and stir-fry for one minute.', 'Add the spring onions and continue to stir fry for a minute. Add the soy sauce, oyster mushrooms, MSG, white pepper powder, salt and vegetable stock.', 'Bring to a boil, add mushrooms and the cornflour mixture. Cook for a minute or until the sauce thickens, stirring continuously.', 'Pour the sauce over the rice, cover with a lid and keep in the preheated oven for twelve to fifteen minutes.', 'Open the pot at the dining table, stir well, garnish with the reserved spring onion greens and serve hot.']

title: Mango Kulfi
method: ['Heat milk in a deep non-stick pan on medium heat, stirring frequently, till it boils. Reduce heat and cook, stirring frequently, till it reduces.', 'Add condensed milk and sugar, mix and cook for 1-2 minutes. Add green cardamom powder, mix and cook till the mixture thickens. Take the pan off the heat and let it cool down to room temperature.', 'Transfer the thickened milk into a bowl, add mango puree and blend, with an electric hand blender, into smooth mixture.', 'Pour the mixture into kulfi moulds till  3/4  full, insert ice cream stick in the center of each mould and freeze for 6-8 hours.', 'Spread pistachios on a plate.', 'Demould the kulfis, coat the top half of each kulfi with pistachios and serve immediately.']

title: Rassawala Khaman Dhokla
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add mustard seeds and cumin seeds and let the seeds crackle.', 'Add turmeric powder, chilli powder, little water, coriander-cumin powder, jaggery, lemon juice and salt, mix well and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add dhokla cubes and mix well. Add khaman and switch off heat. Mix lightly.', 'Add chopped coriander and mix well.', 'Transfer some of the cooked dhokla mixture in a serving bowl and top with 2 tablespoons scraped coconut. Spread remaining dhokla mixture on top and garnish with remaining coconut. Serve hot.']

title: Aviyal
ingredients: ['2 medium carrots, cut into 1 inch thick strips', '50 grams French beans, cut into 1 inch pieces', '100 grams white pumpkin (bhopla), peeled and cut into 1 inch thick strips', '50 grams broad beans (papdi), stringed and cut into 1 inch pieces', '100 grams raw banana, peeled and cut into 1 inch thick strips', '100 grams red pumpkin (kadu), peeled and cut into 1 inch thick strips', '50 grams cluster beans (gavar), stringed and cut into 1 inch pieces', '100 grams drum sticks, peeled and cut into 1 inch pieces', '50 grams yam (suran), peeled and cut into 1 inch thick pieces', 'Salt to taste', ' 1/4  teaspoon turmeric powder', '1 cup whisked yogurt', '2 tablespoons coconut oil', '10-15 curry leavesPaste', '1 cup scraped fresh coconut', '2-3 green chillies', '1 teaspoon cumin seeds']
method: ['Heat a non-stick deep pan, add carrot, French beans, white pumpkin, broad beans, raw banana, red pumpkin, cluster beans, drumsticks , yam, salt, turmeric powder and  1  1/2  cups water, mix and cover and cook for 10-12 minutes.', 'Put coconut in a blender jar, add green chillies, cumin seeds and  1/2  cup water and blend to a coarse paste.', 'Add ground paste into the vegetable mixture and mix. Reduce the heat to low and add yogurt and mix. Cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add coconut oil and curry leaves and mix and take the pan off the heat. Transfer into serving bowls and serve hot.']

title: Caesar's Salad
method: ['Heat oil in a pan and add garlic. Add the bread cubes and saute till bread pieces are a little crisp and browned at the edges. Remove and keep aside.', 'Heat sufficient water in a pan, bring it to boil, add eggs and boil them for two to three minutes only. Keep the lettuce leaves in a big bowl.', 'Add the basil leaves, bread pieces and garlic and toss lightly. Make cheese shavings using a peeler and add to the bowl or else grate the cheese and ad. Break the lightly boiled eggs into another bowl and whisk well.', 'Add mustard paste, Worcestershire sauce, olive oil, salt and freshly crushed peppercorns and whisk till well blended. Add dressing to the salad and toss lightly. Serve immediately.']

title: Andhra Styke Chicken - Cook Smart
method: ['Heat oil in a deep non-stick pan, add bay leaf, cinnamon, black cardamom, green cardamoms, cloves and black peppercorns and saute.', 'Add asafoetida, mustard seeds, curry leaves and  1/4  tsp turmeric powder and let the seeds splutter. Add onion and saute till fragrant.', 'Put sesame seeds, peanuts, dried red chillies, and poppy seeds in a mixer jar and grind with a little water to a fine paste.', 'Add ginger-garlic paste to the pan and saute for 1 minute. Add chicken and mix and saute on high heat for 2-3 minutes. Add salt and 1 cup water and mix. Cover and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add coriander powder, red chilli powder and  1/4  tsp turmeric powder and mix. Add the ground masala and mix. Cover and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add coconut milk and mix well. Add tamarind paste and mix well. Cover and simmer for 3-4 minutes or till the chicken is fully cooked.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with a fresh coriander sprig and serve hot.']

title: Black Forest Rasmalai Cake
method: ['Halve the sponge cake horizontally and place the lower layer in a baking bowl.', 'Cut the upper half into small pieces and place it along the sides of the bowl.', 'Drain the rasmalai from the rabdi and place it over the cake. Drizzle rabdi over it. Spread cherries and chocolate chips over it.', 'Top it with the whipped cream and make a design with the help of a knife.', 'Decorate with chocolate flakes and serve.']

title: Apricot Jam Nankhatai
method: ['Preheat oven to 180oC. Line a baking tray with a silicon mat.', 'Take gram flour in a mixing bowl, add refined flour, powdered sugar, green cardamom powder, baking powder, baking soda andpistachio powderand mix well.Add ghee, mix and knead into stiff dough.', 'Divide dough into small equal portions, flatten eachslightly, make a slight dent in the center and place them on the lined baking tray. Keep the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 6-8 minutes.', 'Remove from oven, pipe out jam into the dents and place the tray back in the oven. Bake for 4-5 minutes more.Take the tray out of the oven, garnish with pistachio slices and set aside to cool them down to room temperature.', 'Serve or store in air tight container.']

title: Chicken Basket
method: ['Heat butter in a non-stick pan. Add garlic and saute for 30 seconds. Add onion and saute till translucent.', 'Add flour and saute for 30 seconds. Add milk, whisk and cook till the sauce thickens. Add chicken and cheese, mix and cook for 1 minute. Add salt and mix well. Transfer into a bowl.', 'Put some chicken mixture in each canape.', 'Serve immediately garnished with capsicum curls.']

title: Cappuccino Mug Cakes
method: ['Preheat oven to 180oC.', 'Cream together butter and brown sugar in a bowl till light. Add eggs and whisk well. Add 2 tablespoons coffee decoction and mix well. Add refined flour and baking powder and fold in well.', 'Fill some ovenproof coffee mugs with the batter. Place the mugs on a deep baking tray and pour some hot water in to the baking tray. Place the baking tray in the preheated oven and bake for 30 minutes.', 'To prepare caramel sauce, put castor sugar and 75 ml water in a non-stick pan, mix and cook on low heat till sugar melts. Cook on high heat, swirling the pan for even cooking, till it caramelizes. Add cream, vanilla essence and coffee decoction and mix well.', 'Bring the mug cakes out of the oven and place them on the work top. Pour the hot caramel sauce into the mug cakes.', 'Take a little cream in a bowl, whisk lightly and put some over the caramel sauce.', 'Serve.']

title: Chinese Burger
method: ['To prepare tikki, mix together cabbage, mixed capsicums, salt, pepper powder, sugar, dried ginger powder, green chilli and coriander leaves in a bowl.', 'Add refined flour, corn starch and 2-3 tablespoons water and mix. Add 1 tablespoon schezwan sauce and mix well.', 'Heat some oil in a non-stick pan.', 'Divide the vegetable mixture and shape into tikkis.', 'Place the tikkis in hot oil and shallow-fry from both sides till golden brown and crisp.  Drain on absorbent paper.', 'To prepare sauce, put  1/2  cup water in a bowl. Add corn starch, soy sauce and chilli sauce and mix well.', 'Heat 1 teaspoon oil in another non-stick pan. Add green chilli and cabbage and saute for 2 minutes.', 'Add dried ginger powder, pepper powder, salt and sugar, mix and cook for 1 minute.  Add corn starch mixture, mix continuously and cook till the mixture slightly thickens.', 'Add vinegar and mix. Add coriander leaves, mix and cook for 1 minute. Transfer in a bowl.', 'Halve the buns horizontally.', 'Heat butter in a non-stick tawa.  Place the halved buns with cut side downwards and toast till slightly golden brown. Transfer on the worktop.', 'Mix together mayonnaise and schezwan sauce in a bowl.', 'To prepare one burger, apply some mayonnaise-schezwan sauce on the toasted side of the bas bun halve.', 'Place iceberg lettuce leaf and one tikki on top. Place on a serving plate.', 'Crush some noodles and put on top of the tikki, drizzle some prepared sauce and cover with the top bun with toasted side downwards.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Sooji Jamun Halwa
method: ['Heat ghee in a non-stick pan, add cashewnuts and saute till they turn light brown. Drain on absorbent paper. Add raisin to the same pan, and saute them till they swell up. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Add semolina to the same pan and saute till it becomes fragrant and light brown.', 'Boil together sugar and  3/4  cup water in another non-stick pan till the sugar melts.', 'Add boiling sugar syrup to semolina mixture and mix well. Cover and cook for 2-3 minutes or till all the water is absorbed.', 'Add milk, mix again and cook for a minute. Add jamun pulp, mix well and cook for a minute.', 'Add green cardamom powder, saffron, cashewnuts and raisins and mix well. Cover and cook on low heat for 2 minutes. Switch off heat and keep it covered for 5 minutes.', 'Slice the jamuns.', 'Serve warm garnished with sliced jamuns.']

title: Kairi ki Dal - SK Khazana
method: ['Take toor dal in a bowl, add sufficient water and soak for 3-4 hours. Drain, boil and transfer into another bowl.', 'Heat ghee in a deep non-stick pan, add mustard seeds, cumin seeds, green chillies, asafoetida and ginger, mix well and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add raw mango, mix and saute for 2-3 minutes. Add 1 tbsp coriander leaves, turmeric powder and red chilli powder, mix well and saute for 1 minute. Add burnt garlic and fried onions, mix well and saute till oil separates.', 'Add cooked dal and mix well. Add salt and churn with a churner. Add remaining coriander leaves, mix well and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with fried onions and coriander leaves and serve hot with steamed rice.']

title: Crispy Chicken Fingers
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a pan.', 'Combine yogurt and an egg in a bowl and whisk well. Add chicken and mix well. Add crushed peppercorns and salt and mix again.', 'Coat the marinated chicken strips with bread crumbs and cornstarch.', 'Deep-fry the coated chicken strips in hot oil till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Vegetable Tempura
method: ['Combine 1 cup flour and cornstarch in a bowl. Add baking soda and sufficient chilled water and mix well into a smooth batter.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a pan.', 'Slice squash, zucchini and brinjals. Cut baby corn into strips. Cut capsicum into 1 inch pieces.', 'Take remaining flour on a plate. Add salt and mix. Coat all the vegetables in this mixture.', 'Add salt to the batter and mix well.', 'Dip vegetables in the batter and deep-fry in hot oil till crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Pour Japanese soy and mirin in a small bowl and mix well. Transfer into a serving bowl.', 'Serve hot tempura with this sauce.']

title: Rassa Bhurji
Main ingredients: Eggs, Onions, Green chillies, Fresh tomato puree, Red chilli powder, Meat masala, Fresh coriander leaves

title: Chilli Garlic Lamb Chops
method: ['Combine lemon juice, salt and lamb chops in a bowl, mix well and set aside for 30 minutes.', 'Dry roast coriander seeds for a minute. Transfer in a mortar and crush coarsely with a pestle. Add green chillies and crush. Add turmeric powder, ginger-garlic paste, garam masala powder and chilli powder and mix.', 'Add the masala to the lamb chops and mix well. Set aside for 30 minutes.', 'Add garlic and chilli flakes and mix well. Add 1 tablespoon oil and mix well. Add yogurt and mix well. Set aside for 30 minutes.', 'Add flour to the lamb chops and mix well.', 'Heat some oil in a non-stick grill pan. Place the lamb chops in it, apply the marinade on top and grill till evenly done from all sides and the chops are fully cooked.', 'Garnish with coriander sprigs and serve hot with onion rings.']

title: Cajun Fish Burger
method: ['Grind together chilli flakes, stock cubes, Cajun spice, garlic powder and salt to a fine powder. Add flour and grind again. Transfer onto a plate.', 'Add lemon juice and adjust salt and mix well. Add fish and coat well.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Place fish pieces in it and, turning sides, till evenly done and golden from both sides.', 'Halve burger buns horizontally. Spread a tablespoon of mustard paste on the base half of each bun.', 'Place lettuce leaves, tomato roundels and two fish pieces on each. Top with some onion rings and cover with the remaining bun halves.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Pani Puri Sorbet - SK Khazana
method: ['Put coriander leaves, mint leaves, green chillies, salt, black salt, roasted cumin powder, chaat masala, lemon juice and  1/2  cup water in a blender jar and blend till smooth.', 'Strain the mixture into a large bowl, pressing the residue to extract all the flavors. Add a cup of water and mix well. Pour the mixture into ice cube mould and freeze till set.', 'To make the stuffing, heat oil in a non-stick pan, add red chilli powder and ragda and mix well.', 'Add roasted cumin powder and chaat masala and mix well.Add salt, mix and take the pan off the heat. Set aside to cool down to room temperature.', 'Once the flavored water has set completely, take the mould out of the freezer, de-mold the cubes into a blender jar and and blend.', 'Arrange tartlet shells on a serving plate, put small portions of stuffing into each and top it up with some sorbet.Garnish each shell with a coriander sprig and serve immediately.']

title: Benguni
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Combine gram flour, rice flour, turmeric powder, chilli powder, onion seeds, sugar and salt in a bowl. Add sufficient water and mix well into a batter of coating consistency. Add desiccated coconut, some water and mix well.', 'Diagonally slice brinjals, add to the batter and mix well. Deep-fry in hot oil till golden. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Put the fried brinjals in the hot oil and fry again till crisp. Drain on absorbent paper. These are beguni.', 'Place lettuce leaves in a serving glass and place the beguni in it. Serve hot garnished with slit fresh green chilli and fresh red chilli.']

title: Makai Pinni
method: ['Heat ghee in a non-stick pan, add almonds and saute for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add semolina and wheat flour and mix well. Add maize flour and saute for 8-10 minutes till golden.', 'Add sugar and khoya, mix and saute for 2-3 minutes.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve.']

title: Mango Kadhi - SK Khazana
method: ['To make kadhi, take yogurt in a large bowl, add Tata Sampann Fine Besan and whisk till the mixture is smooth.', 'Add mango puree, turmeric powder, red chilli powder and salt and whisk well. Add 3 cups of water and whisk well.', 'Heat oil in a deep non-stick pan, add mustard seeds and let them splutter. Add asafoetida, ginger and broken dried red chillies, mix and saute well.', 'Add the yogurt mixture. Rinse the bowl with  1/2  cup water and add to the pan and mix well. Cook on low heat, stirring occasionally, for 8-10 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, make the pakode heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Take fenugreek leaves in another bowl, add salt, turmeric powder, red chilli powder, coriander powder, cumin powder, asafoetida, Fine Besan and 2-3 tbsps water and mix well. Add 1-2 tbsps water more and baking soda and mix well', 'Drop small portions of this mixture with your fingers into hot oil and deep-fry till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Transfer the kadhi into a serving bowl, place the pakode on top and serve hot with steamed rice.']

title: Pear Stuffed Roast Chicken
method: ['Preheat oven at 200degC. Grease a baking tray with some oil.', 'Heat 1 tbsp oil in a non-stick pan. Add 1 tbsp chopped garlic and saute till golden. Add onion and saute till translucent. Switch off heat and cool.', 'Discard stem and bottom of both pears, halve and cut into small pieces.', 'Take chicken mince in a bowl. Add chopped pears and mix. Add sauteed garlic-onion mixture and mix well.', 'Add salt, crushed black peppercorns and  1/2  tsp dried mixed herbs and mix. Add almonds and mix well.', 'To prepare marinade, combine Worcestershire sauce, salt, crushed black peppercorns, remaining garlic, butter,  1/2  tbsp oil and lemon juice in another bowl and mix well.', 'Loosen the skin of whole chicken, put some marinade between the skin and flesh and spread well. Rub remaining marinade over the chicken.', 'Seal the head of marinated chicken using a toothpick to secure the stuffing. Stuff the chicken with prepared onion-pear mixture. Push the chicken legs inside and seal the tail using another toothpick. Place the stuffed chicken on the greased baking tray.', 'Place potato wedges and carrot pieces on the worktop. Add salt, remaining mixed dried herbs and crushed peppercorns on top of it and mix. Put the potato-carrot mixture around stuffed chicken and drizzle some oil on top.', 'Place the baking tray in preheated oven and roast for 10-15 minutes. Reduce temperature to 150degC and roast for 1 hour basting some butter after every 15 minutes.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Rajasthani Baati - SK Khazana
method: ['Preheat oven to 200o C.', 'Mix together flour, salt and baking powder and carom seeds in a parat. Add ghee and knead into a stiff dough using water as required.', 'Grease your palms with some ghee. Divide the dough into equal portions and shape into balls.', 'Grease a baking tray with ghee and place the baatis on it. Place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 30-35 minutes.', 'Take sufficient melted ghee in a bowl. Soak the baked baatis in it for 1 hour.', 'Arrange them on a serving platter and serve immediately with a bowl of hot dal.']

title: Sevaiyaan Fruit Custard
method: ['Heat ghee in a non- stick pan. Add almonds, pistachios, cashew nuts, raisins and saute. Break sevaiyaan, add to the pan and saute till light brown.', 'Transfer into a baking tray and spread. Whisk together milk and custard powder in a non-stick pan. Add sugar and whisk.', 'Cook on low heat, stirring continuously till custard thickens.', 'Remove from heat, add cardamom powder, apples and whisk. Add bananas and whisk. Spread the custard on the sevaiyaan.', 'Garnish with tutti frutti and serve hot or cold.']

title: Falooda
method: ['Heat the milk with the sugar and bring to a boil. Set aside to cool. Place in a refrigerator to chill.', 'Add the soaked subza to the milk, stir and chill it in the refrigerator.', 'Pour half a tablespoon of rose syrup into four wide-mouthed falooda glasses.', 'Pour the milk into each glass, top with two to three tablespoons of falooda, a scoop of vanilla ice cream and a sprinkling of chopped cashew nuts. Serve at once.']

title: Mandarin Chicken
method: ['Take chicken in a bowl. Add soy sauce and dill leaves and mix well. Set aside.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick wok. Add chicken, mix and cook for 2 minutes. Add water chestnuts and mix.', 'Add salt, crushed peppercorns and celery and mix well. Add  1/4  cup water, stir to mix and cook for 2 minutes.', 'Add cornflour to juice and mix well. Add this to the chicken and mix well. Cook for 2 minutes.', 'Add orange segments, mix and cook on low heat for a minute.', 'Garnish with dill leaves and serve hot.']

title: Potato Donuts
Main ingredients: Potatoes, Refined flour, Garlic powder, Onion powder, Crushed black peppercorns, Oil

title: Ros Omlette - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat 2 tbsps oil in a non-stick pan, add sliced onions, garlic cloves,ginger and saute well. Cook till golden brown, stirring occasionally.', 'Add cumin seeds, coriander seeds, cloves, cinnamon stick, mace, coconut and red chillies. Continue to saute on medium heat for 3-4 minutes.', 'Transfer the mixture into a blender jar and add tomato,  1/4  cup water and blend to a fine paste. Set aside.', 'Heat remaining oil in a non-stick pan, add onion and mix well. Cook till golden brown, stirring occasionally.', 'Add the prepared paste and mix well. Cook till the oil separates, mixing occasionally.', 'Add salt, 3 cups water and mix well. Cover and cook for 5-6 minutes', 'For omelette, break eggs in a bowl, add salt, chopped coriander, onion, green chillies and mix well.', 'For omelette, heat remaining oil in another non-stick pan. Add a portion of the egg mixture and cook till done from both sides. Take it off the heat and cut it in half.', 'For serving, pour a portion of the gravy in a serving bowl. Place the omelette on top and pour some more of the gravy on top.\nGarnish with chopped coriander and serve hot with pavs']

title: Rajgira Kheer
method: ['Heat ghee in a non-stick pan, add almonds, pistachios and raisins and saute for 2 minutes. Add amaranth seeds and saute on low heat for 2-3 minutes. Add dried coconut and saute for 3-4 minutes.', 'Add 3 cups milk and cook, stirring continuously, till milk thickens. Add remaining milk and mix well. Add castor sugar, cardamom powder and mix well.', 'Pour the kheer into serving bowls, drizzle honey and serve warm.']

title: Crispy Chicken Cutlets
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add garlic and saute for a minute. Add onion, mix and saute till translucent.', 'Add ginger-garlic paste, mix and saute well. Add chili powder, turmeric powder, salt and crushed peppercorns and mix well.', 'Add chicken mince, mix and cook till the chicken is fully done. Add coriander leaves and mix. Transfer in a bowl and cool.', 'Grate in the potatoes and mix well. Add breadcrumbs and mix again.', 'Divide the mixture into equal portions and shape them into cutlets.', 'Beat the egg with little salt in a bowl.', 'Dip the cutlets in the beaten egg and coat with the breadcrumbs.', 'Heat some oil in a non-stick pan. Place the cutlets in it and shallow-fry, turning sides, till golden and crisp from both sides.', 'Serve hot with tomato ketchup.']

title: Andhra Chilli Chicken - SK Khazana
method: ['Make some slits on all the chicken pieces and put them in a large bowl. Add 1 tablespoon lemon juice and salt and mix well. Set aside for 10-15 minutes.', 'Blend together ginger, garlic, curry leaves, dried red chillies, remaining lemon juice and sufficient water to a fine paste.', 'Add this paste to the chicken along with yogurt and salt and mix well. Keep the bowl in the refrigerator to marinate for 2-3 hours.', 'Dust the marinated chicken pieces with flour.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Place the chicken pieces in it and cook on high heat for 4-5 minutes. Flip, cover and cook till fully done.', 'Serve hot with onion rings and lemon slices.']

title: Eggless Donuts - SK Khazana
method: ['Take fresh yeast in a small bowl, add  1/2  tbsp powdered sugar and  1/4  cup warm water and mix well. Set aside to activate.', 'Heat milk in a non-stick pan, remaining powdered sugar and butter and let it melt. Take it off the heat.', 'Take refined flour in a large bowl, add activated yeast, baking powder, salt and milk-butter mixture, mix well and knead into soft dough.', 'Cover with a damp muslin cloth and set aside for 15-20 minutes.', 'Dust a little flour on the worktop, place the dough on it and sprinkle a little flour on top and roll it into  1/4  inch thick disc.', 'Cut out roundels with a medium sized cooker cutter. Cut out small roundels from the centre of each with a small cookie cutter to get donut shape. Cover with a damp muslin cloth and set aside for 15 minutes.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai, slide in the donuts, and deep fry till golden brown. Drain on absorbent paper and set aside to cool.', 'Dip half the donuts in melted white chocolate and the remaining in melted dark chocolate and, place them on a wire rack.', 'Once the chocolate sets, place them on a serving platter, garnish with colourful sprinkles and serve.']

title: Ambat Batata
method: ['Chop onions in a chopper. Chop green chillies.', 'Heat oil in a non stick pan, add mustard seeds and cumin seeds.', 'When they splutter, add curry leaves and onions and saute. Cut each potato into 8 cubes.', 'When onions become golden, add  1/4  cup water.', 'Add green chillies, potatoes, yogurt, kokum petals, salt and turmeric powder and mix well.', 'Chop coriander leaves. Add juice of lemon and mix well.', 'Add coconut and mix. Garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot.']

title: Crepes with Ricotta and Bacon
method: ['To make crepe batter, combine rice flour and refined flour into a bowl. Add sufficient water and mix well into a smooth and thick batter.', 'Roughly chop basil leaves.', 'Take ricotta cheese into another bowl. Add chopped basil, paprika, chilli flakes, crushed peppercorns and salt and mix well.', 'Heat a non-stick pan. Place the bacon strips on it and cook till done.', 'Add salt to the crepe batter and mix well.', 'Transfer the cooked bacon into a bowl and cool to room temperature. Cut them into smaller pieces with the help of a scissor.', 'Heat butter on a non-stick tawa. Pour a ladleful of batter on it and spread into a thin crepe with the help of a scraper. Cook till the underside is done.', 'Spread a spoonful of the cheese mixture on it, top with bacon pieces, fold into halves and then into quarter.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Sitaphal Kheerni
method: ['De-stone custard apple. Keep aside a little of the flesh and puree the rest.', 'Heat milk in a pan. Add rice and cook stirring from time to time. Add Sugar Free Natura and continue to cook till the rice is almost done. Add ground rice and cook stirring continuously.
