Heat 2 tbsps extra virgin olive oil in a non-stick wok, add onion and saute till they soften.', 'Roughly chop shiitake mushrooms.', 'Add refined flour to the wok and mix and saute for 2 minutes.', 'Add button mushrooms and shiitake mushrooms, mix and saute for 2 minutes. Add vegetable stock and mix and let the mushrooms cook.', 'When the macaroni is done, strain it and sprinkle cold water over it so that it stops cooking further.', 'When the mushrooms are cooked crush them coarsely with a hand blender. Add tomato puree and fresh thyme sprigs.', 'Add salt and crushed black peppercorns and mix. Add macaroni and mix.', 'Drizzle 2 tbsps extra virgin olive oil and mix.', 'Transfer into a serving dish, sprinkle parmesan cheese powder and serve hot.']

title: Eve'S Pudding With Mango
method: ['Preheat oven to 160degC.', 'Cream butter with castor sugar until pale and soft. Beat in the egg and mix. Add vanilla essence. Sieve refined flour and baking powder onto this mixture.', 'Mix with a palette knife in a cut and fold style. Take a pudding mould. Arrange the mango slices at the base. Sprinkle sugar over them. Put the pudding batter over and level the top.', 'Bake in the preheated oven at 160degC for about one hour.']

title: Chutney Cheese Sandwich
ingredients: ['8 pavs', '100 grams red cheddar cheese', '100 grams cheddar cheese', '75 grams Emmental cheese', 'Mayonnaise for spreading', 'Crushed black peppercorns to taste', 'Butter as required', 'Olive oil for brushing', 'Potato wedges for servingChutney', '2 fresh jalapenos', ' 1/4  bunch small fresh mint leaves', ' 1/4  bunch small fresh coriander sprigs', '5-6 fresh basil sprigs', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', 'Salt to taste']
method: ['To prepare chutney, slice jalapenos. Roughly chop mint leaves, coriander sprigs and basil sprigs.', 'Blend together sliced jalapenos, chopped leaves, lemon juice and salt into a smooth paste. Transfer in a bowl.', 'To prepare one portion, slit the 2 pavs with one side intact and open.', 'Spread some chutney on one side of the pavs, reserving remaining for serving and some mayonnaise on the other side.', 'Grate some red cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese and Emmental cheese on the mayonnaise side of the pavs. Sprinkle some crushed peppercorns on top and cover with the other side of the pavs.', 'Heat a non-stick grill pan and brush some olive oil and butter. Place the sandwiches and grill from sides till golden brown and cheese melts.', 'Serve hot with potato wedges and reserved chutney.']

title: Kanda Wadi - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add carom seeds, green chillies and onions, mix and saute, stirring occasionally, till onions are translucent.', 'Add turmeric powder, salt, red chilli powder and coriander powder, mix and saute for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add gram flour, rice flour and coriander leaves, mix well, and saute for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add  1/2  cup water and mix well. Cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add Kasuri Methi and mix well. Cook for 1 minute and take it off the heat.', 'Grease a barfi tray with oil, transfer this mixture into it and spread it evenly. Level the top and set aside to cool completely.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a non-stick shallow pan.', 'Cut the gram flour mixture into square wadis and gently remove them from the barfi tray and place on a plate.', 'Place these wadis in the pan and shallow-fry, turning sides, till golden and crisp on both sides. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Arrange them on a serving plate and serve hot with lasoon chutney.']

title: Pepper Bhindi Fry
method: ['Trim the two ends of the ladyfingers and cut them vertically into 4 pieces.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick wok, add green chillies and Madras onions, mix and saute on high heat for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add curry leaves, mix well and saute for 1-2 minutes. Add ladyfingers and toss well.', 'Add salt, mix, cover and cook for 8-10 minutes.', 'Add tamarind pulp and mix well. Add crushed black peppercorns and mix till well combined.', 'Add red chilli powder and mix. Add coconut oil, mix and take the pan off the heat.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander sprig and serve hot.']

title: Kolmi No Patio- Sk Khazana
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick wok, add onions and saute till golden brown. Add ginger-garlic paste and red chilli paste, mix well and saute for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add red chilli powder, coriander powder, cumin powder, turmeric powder, garam masala powder, mix well and saute for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add tomato and mix. Add salt, mix and saute till the tomato is soft and pulpy.', 'Add prawns, mix well, and saute for 1-2 minutes. Add prawn stock and mix well. Cover and cook for 5-6 minutes.', 'Add tamarind pulp, jaggery and coriander leaves and mix well. Take the pan off the heat.', 'Transfer the prawn mixture into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander sprig and serve hot with boiled red rice.']

title: Eggless Peach Mousse
method: ['Put 6 canned peaches in a grinder jar, grind to a smooth puree and transfer into a large mixing bowl.', 'Melt butter in a non-stick pan, add dark chocolate and stir, on low heat, till both melt together into a smooth mixture.', 'Add cream and mix well and transfer into a medium bowl and set aside to cool.', 'Add whipped cream to peach puree and mix well. Put into stemmed glasses till  3/4  full and tap the glasses gently to even the surface.', 'Pour the cooled chocolate sauce over the peach mousse. Sprinkle a few chopped peaches over chocolate in each glass.', 'Chill in the refrigerator and serve chilled.']

title: Chicken Tikka Masala Bunny Chow
method: ['Heat oil and 1 tablespoon butter in a non-stick pan, add onion and saute till golden brown.', 'Add ginger and garlic, mix and saute till the raw smells disappear. Add tomato, mix and saute till soft and pulpy.', 'Add tomato puree, mix and cook for 2-3 minutes. Add coriander powder, chilli powder and turmeric powder, mix well and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add  1/4  cup water, mix and cook for 2-3 minutes. Add cashewnut paste, mix and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add salt, dried fenugreek leaves powder and garam masala powder, mix and cook for 1 minute.', 'Add chopped tomato, chopped onion, chopped capsicum and chicken tikka, mix and cook for 1-2 minutes. Add khoya and cream and mix well.', 'Cut off a thin slice off the top of each burger bun and reserve them. Scoop out the flesh to make a cavity in the center. Put the chicken mixture in the center and place them on a serving platter. Cover with the cut top slice, garnish with a coriander sprig and serve hot.']

title: Nachani Puri
method: ['Mix together nachani flour, potato, red chilli powder, asafoetida, chaat masala and salt in a dough maker, add water as required and knead into a soft dough. Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Divide dough into equal portions and roll into balls. Dust each ball with a little dry flour and roll out into puris. Slide in the puris, one by one, into hot oil and deep fry till golden. Drain on absorbent paper. Sprinkle some chaat masala.', 'To make the ch!utney, heat oil in a small non stick pan. Add asafoetida, ginger-green chilli paste, red chilli paste, garlic, sugar, vinegar and salt and cook for 2 minutes. Transfer into a small bowl.', 'Arrange the puris on a serving plate and serve hot with garlic chutney.']

title: Jal Jeera
method: ['Pound the cumin seeds, black salt and amchur in a mortar with pestle. Grind the mint leaves and coriander leaves with sufficient water into a smooth paste.', 'Add the lemon juice and pounded masala and mix well. Put ice cubes in two tall glasses. Divide the concentrate equally and top up with soda.', 'Mix well. Serve immediately, garnished with a slice of lemon.']

title: Paneer Moti Pulao
method: ['Heat ghee in a deep non-stick pan, add cumin seeds, cloves, black cardamoms, black peppercorns, mix and saute till fragrant. Add green chillies and onion, mix and saute till translucent.', 'Add cashewnuts, mix and saute for 2 minutes. Add yogurt, mix and cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add basmati rice and salt and mix well. Add 3 cups water and mix well, cover and cook till the rice is cooked.', 'Meanwhile to make moti, heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Take cottage cheese in another bowl, add salt, green cardamom powder and cornflour and mix well. Divide the mixture into small equal portions and shape them into balls.', 'Slide these balls into hot oil and deep-fry, on medium heat, till golden. Drain on absorbent paper. Let them cool and cover them with silver warq.', 'Add mint leaves and fried onion to the cooked rice and mix gently. Add few of the cottage cheese balls and mix gently and the pan off the heat.', 'Transfer the pulao into a serving plate, garnish with the remaining cottage cheese balls and sprig of coriander leaves and serve hot.']

title: Basic Muesli
method: ['Dry roast porridge oats. Chop apricots and figs. Slice the almonds. Transfer the roasted oats in to a bowl. Add almonds, black currants, cornflakes, apricots and mix.', 'Store in an airtight container to use when required. You can also add dried pineapple, banana etc. While serving take a little of the mixture into a bowl. Add figs. You can now add fresh fruits like strawberries if you wish.', 'If you like it sweet, add honey. Add cold milk and serve. You can also add hot milk if you prefer it that way. You can also serve muesli with yogurt. For this take some muesli in a bowl. Add figs, strawberries, honey and yogurt.', 'Mix and let it stand for about five to ten minutes before serving.']

title: Kiwi Mango Shrikhand
method: ['Cut 2 kiwis into small cubes, put into a mixer jar and puree. Put this puree into a non-stick pan and cook with  1/4  cup powdered sugar.', 'Grind together mango pulp with the remaining powdered sugar. Add 1 cup hung yogurt and grind again. Transfer this mixture into a bowl.', 'Add  1/2  tsp green cardamom powder and  1/2  tbsp. pistachios and mix. Keep the bowl in the freezer to chill for atleast  1/2  hour.', 'When the kiwi mixture thickens put it into another bowl and chill in the refrigerator.', 'Cut the remaining two kiwis into thin wedges.', 'Take the kiwi mixture out of the refrigerator, add remaining hung yogurt, remaining green cardamom powder and remaining pistachios and mix well till smooth.', 'Take the mango mixture out of the refrigerator.', 'Put the mango mixture into a piping bag on one side and the kiwi mixture on other side, trim off the tip of the piping bag and pipe the two mixture into canape shells.', 'Garnish each canape with a kiwi wedge and a little pistachios and serve immediately.']

title: Chocolate Caramel Pot
method: ['To prepare custard, heat milk in a non-stick pan. Add  1/4  cup cream,  1/4  cup castor sugar and cinnamon powder, mix and bring the mixture to a boil.', 'Take egg yolks in a bowl and whisk. Add some milk mixture and whisk well. Add it to the rest of milk mixture in the pan, whisk and cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add chocolate, mix and cook till it melts. Transfer into another bowl and whisk.', 'To prepare caramel sauce, heat remaining castor sugar in another non-stick pan and cook till it caramelizes. Add remaining cream and mix. Add butter, mix and cook for 1 minute.', 'Pour the chocolate custard mixture into small individual glass jarsupto 3/4  full and refrigerate for 20-30 minutes or till set.', 'Put some caramel sauce and sprinkle some sea salt on top. Refrigerate for 20-30 minutes.', 'Serve.']

title: Amritsari Cheese Chicken Tikkis Chaap
method: ['Take chicken keema in a bowl, add ginger, garlic, green chillies, red chilli powder, crushed black peppercorns, cumin seeds, onion, lemon juice, garam masala powder and salt.', 'Peel the boiled eggs, grate and add to the mixture and mix everything well.', 'Add 1 1/2  tablespoons refined flour and 1 1/2  tablespoons breadcrumbs and mix well.', 'Finely chop coriander leaves and add and mix well.', 'Break 2 eggs into a plate and beat them well.', 'Spread remaining refined flour in another plate.', 'Take some water in a bowl. Dampen palms with water and shape chicken mixture into medium sized balls.', 'Tear the cheese slices into pieces. Dampen palms with water again, insert a soaked ice cream stick into each ball, dab some water on it and flatten. Add small portion of cheese in centre and cover with another layer of mixture and press lightly.', 'Spread the remaining breadcrumbs in another plate. Roll tikkis in refined flour, dip in beaten eggs and roll in breadcrumbs. Rub off excess breadcrumbs and place them on a plate. Keep the plate in the refrigerator for 15-20 minutes to set.', 'Heat ghee in a non-stick pan and melt it. Add the tikkis and shallow fry on low heat.  Spread the ghee on top of the tikkis with a ladle while frying.', 'Turnover and spread ghee over the other side too. Fry till they are golden by which time cheese will have melted and the tikkis will have become fluffy in the centre. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Halve 2 tikkis and arrange them on a serving platter with the rest of the tikkis. Garnish with mint sprig, micro greens, ginger strips and red chilli flowers.', 'Sprinkle chaat masala and red chilli powder on top and serve hot with green chutney.']

title: Malai Kebab Naan Roll - SK Khazana
method: ['Preheat the oven at 200@C. Grease a baking tray with butter.', 'Take chicken in a bowl, add yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, green chilli paste, nutmeg powder, garam masala powder, salt, green cardamom powder and chaat masala. Squeeze the juice of  1/2  lemon and add cornflour , fresh cream and malai, and mix well. Set aside to marinate for 1-2 hours.', 'Thread the chicken pieces onto skewers and place them on the greased baking tray and drizzle the leftover marinade over them. Drizzle 3 tsps butter on top, keep the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 10-15 minutes.', 'To make each roll, apply green chutney on each naan, place a few pickled onion rings on them, push the chicken cubes out of the skewer and place it on top, sprinkle chaat masala on top. Fold the sides and roll it rightly.', 'Heat 2 tsps butter in a non-stick grill pan and let it melt. Place the naan rolls in it and grill for 1 minute on each side.', 'Place the rolls on a serving platter, garnish with mint sprigs and serve hot with pickled onions and lemon wedges.']

title: Orange Mojito
method: ['Peel oranges and separate the segments. Cut lemon into small pieces and discard seeds.Place some orange segments into individual tall glasses.', 'Add brown sugar, lemon pieces and mint leaves. Muddle ingredients with a muddler.Add lots of ice cubes and orange juice. Mix with a spoon. Insert a straw and serve chilled.']

title: Black Currant Bash
method: ['Combine ice cream, milk and black currant crush in a blender jar. Blend well till smooth.', 'Pour into individual glasses and serve chilled garnished with chocolate chips.']

title: Falafel Waffle
method: ['Put chickpeas into a food processor jar, add garlic, onion, salt, cumin powder, crushed black peppercorns and parsley and process to a coarse paste.', 'Heat a non-stick waffle iron, grease it with oil and spread some chickpea mixture evenly.', 'Drizzle a little more oil, close the lid and cook for 8-10 minutes or till golden and crisp. Make more waffles similarly.', 'Transfer them onto individual serving plates, garnish with micro greens and serve hot with salad, pickled beetroot, French fries and garlic aioli.']

title: Dhansak Croquettes
ingredients: [' 1/2  cup split pigeon peas (tuvar dal), soaked for 30 minutes and drained', '3 tablespoons split red lentil (masoor dal), soaked for 30 minutes and drained', ' 1/4  cup split Bengal gram (chana dal), soaked for 30 minutes and drained', ' 1/2  cup grated red pumpkin', '1 small brinjal, cut into small pieces and put in water', ' 1/4  cup chopped fresh fenugreek (methi) leaves', '1 cup boneless chicken, boiled with salt and shredded', '1 1/2  teaspoons dhansak masala', '2 teaspoons ghee', '1 medium onion, finely chopped', 'Salt to taste', '1 tablespoon ginger-garlic paste', '2 medium tomatoes, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon red chilli powder', ' 1/2  teaspoon turmeric powder', '2 eggs, beaten with salt', '1 cup dried breadcrumbs', 'Oil to deep fry', 'Green chutney to serve']
method: ['Heat ghee in a pressure cooker. Add onion, salt and saute till the onions turn golden brown. Add ginger-garlic paste and saute on medium heat for a minute.', 'Add tomatoes and saute till they are pulpy. Add salt, red chilli powder, turmeric powder and dhansak masala. Mix well and saute till ghee separates.', 'Add soaked tuvar dal, masoor dal and chana dal. Mix well.', 'Add grated pumpkin and mix well. Drain and add brinjal pieces and methi leaves.', 'Add 1 1/2  cups water and mix well. Cover cooker with lid and cook on medium heat till 2-3 whistles are given out. Switch off heat.', 'Open the lid once the pressure settles completely. Blend the cooked dal to a fine paste and transfer into a bowl. Add chicken and mix well. Allow to cool down to room temperature. Refrigerate for 1 hour.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a deep pan', 'Divide the mixture into equal portions and shape each portion into a cylinder.', 'Take beaten eggs in a bowl. Spread breadcrumbs in a plate. Dip the cylinders in egg and roll in breadcrumbs. Shake off excess breadcrumbs.', 'Slide the croquettes into hot oil and deep fry on medium heat till crisp and golden brown. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot with green chutney.']

title: Poached Fried Eggs-Cook Smart
method: ['Heat 2 teaspoons oil in a non-stick pan, add onions and saute well.', 'Slice sausages.', 'Add capsicum strips and sausages to the pan and toss. Add chilli sauce and salt and toss well.', 'Heat sufficient water in a deep non-stick pan.', 'Transfer sausage mixture into a bowl and cool down to room temperature.', 'Break 1 egg into a bowl. When the water in the pan comes to a boil, add salt and vinegar. Whisk the boiling water slightly so that it moves in circular fashion. Slide the egg immediately into it.', 'Let it poach for 3-4 minutes. Gently remove the egg from the water with a slotted spoon and keep on a plate to cool. Remember not to cook the egg fully because the yolk should remain a little runny. Poach 3 more eggs similarly. Chill the eggs in the refrigerator.', 'Break remaining egg into a plate, add salt and mix well.', 'Heat sufficient oil in another non-stick pan.', 'Spread breadcrumbs on a plate. Add salt and mix.', 'Add crushed peppercorns to the egg and mix well. Dip poached eggs in it and coat with the breadcrumbs gently without pressing the egg.', 'Gently place the coated poached eggs on the pan and shallow-fry, turning sides gently, till golden and crisp on both the sides.', 'Tear lettuce leaves and place on a serving dish. Put some of the cooked sausage mixture on it, place the poached fried eggs on it and top with remaining sausage mixture.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Chana Dal - SK Khazana
method: ['Put tomatoes in a blender jar. Roughly chop garlic and add to the blender jar along with ginger. Roughly chop green chillies and add to the blender jar along with salt and blend to a coarse paste.', 'Heat oil in a pressure cooker, add onions and saute till golden brown. Add chana dal and mix well. Add salt and mix. Add turmeric powder, mix well and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add the tomato paste. Rinse the blender jar with a little water and add to the cooker.', 'Add coriander powder and red chilli powder and mix well. Add 2 cups water and mix.', 'Place the lid on the cooker and cook under pressure till 3-4 whistles are released. Reduce heat and simmer for about 15 minutes. Open the lid when the pressure is completely reduced.', 'Add coriander leaves and mix well.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot with steamed rice.']

title: Gur Mawa Roti
method: ['Place 2 rotis on a worktop. Spread some grated jaggery and some mawa evenly over rotis. Top with some cashewnuts, some pistachios and some almonds. Sprinkle some nutmeg powder and cardamom powder on top and cover with the remaining rotis.', 'Heat a non-stick pan. Place the prepared rotis and roast, basting with ghee, till evenly done from both the sides.', 'Cut roasted rotis into 4 pieces and serve hot.']

title: Sweet Rice Cake - SK Khazana
method: ['Add little water to the dosa batter and mix.', 'Melt 1 cup jaggery in a non-stick pan on low heat.', 'Add semolina, salt and cardamom powder to the batter and mix well.', 'Add coconut to the melted jaggery and mix well. Cool.', 'Preheat oven at 180o C. Grease a spring bottom baking tin with some ghee.', 'Add the jaggery-coconut mixture to the batter and mix well.', 'Add almonds, walnuts and halved raisins and mix well.', 'Add chopped jaggery and mix lightly. Add crushed peppercorns and mix well.', 'Pour the batter into the prepared tin, keep the tin in the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes. Switch off heat and let the tin remain in the oven for 5 minutes. Remove from oven, cool and demould.', 'Cut into wedges, drizzle honey on top and serve warm.']

title: Chutney and Egg Patties
method: ['To prepare chutney, combine coconut, broken green chilies, raw mango, cumin seeds, salt, castor sugar and garlic cloves in a blender.', 'Roughly chop coriander sprigs and mint sprigs, add to coconut mixture and blend to a smooth chutney.Transfer into a bowl. Add lemon juice and salt and mix well.', 'Take potatoes in another bowl and mash lightly. Add salt and 1 tablespoon semolina and mix well.', 'Halve the boiled eggs. Break eggs in another bowl, add salt and beat well.', 'Spread 1/4  cup semolina on a plate.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a pan.', 'Divide potato mixture into equal portions and flatten them. Put some chutney in the center, place one halved egg over it, bring in the edges and seal completely covering the egg.', 'Coat the egg patties with semolina and dip in beaten eggs.', 'Deep-fry egg patties in hot oil till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot garnished with coriander leaves.']

title: Chicken 65 Tikka
ingredients: ['400 grams boneless chicken breasts, cut into 1 inch pieces', '2 tablespoons oil', '1 teaspoon mustard seeds', '2 dried red chillies', '6-8 curry leaves + for garnishing', '1 tablespoon chopped garlic', '1 inch ginger, finely chopped', '1 cup yogurt', 'Salt to taste', ' 1/4  teaspoon turmeric powder', ' 1/2  teaspoon roasted cumin powder (jeera)', '1 teaspoon coriander powder', '1 teaspoon red chilli powder', '1 tablespoon red chilli paste', '1 tablespoon cornstarch', ' 1/4  teaspoon black pepper powder', '1 egg', 'Lemon wedges for serving']
method: ['Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan. Add mustard seeds and let it splutter. Add dried red chillies and 6-8 curry leaves and let curry leaves crackle.', 'Add garlic and ginger and saute for 1 minute. Switch off heat, cool and grind into a coarse powder.', 'Put yogurt in a bowl. Add the ground powder, salt, turmeric powder, cumin powder, coriander powder, red chilli powder, red chilli paste and mix well.', 'Add cornstarch, black pepper powder and egg and mix. Add chicken pieces, mix well and set aside to marinate for 30-40 minutes.', 'Insert marinated chicken pieces onto skewers, applying the marinade.', 'Heat remaining oil in a non-stick grill pan. Place the skewers and grill from all sides till golden brown and fully cooked.', 'Garnish with curry leaves and serve hot with lemon wedges.']

title: Spinach Fish Rolls
method: ['Preheat oven to 200o C.', 'Cut fish fillets into thin slices and place in a bowl. Add salt, half teaspoon pepper powder, mustard paste, garlic paste, lemon juice and mix well. Set aside to marinate for ten to fifteen minutes.', 'Put cottage cheese in another bowl, add remaining pepper powder, red chilli flakes and salt and mix well.', 'Place a marinated fish slice on the worktop. Halve spinach leaves and place them on top of the fish. Top with a generous amount of cottage cheese mixture and roll tightly. Similarly make the remaining rolls.', 'Place the rolls on a baking tray, put the tray in the preheated oven and bake for eight to ten minutes.', 'To prepare the sauce, heat butter in a non-stick pan. Add little water, chives and lemon juice and mix well. Remove from heat.', 'Place the baked fish rolls on a serving plate and pour hot chive sauce over them. Serve immediately garnished with a chive.']

title: Arbi Tuk- Sk Khazana
method: ['Heat sufficient water in a deep pan, add colocassia and boil them till they are soft. Allow to cool slightly and peel them.', 'Heat a non-stick shallow pan, add coriander seeds, cumin seeds, dried red chillies and dried mango pieces and dry roast till fragrant. Take the pan off the heat and let the spices cool down.', 'Transfer the, into a spice grinder and grind to a fine powder and set aside.', 'Prick peeled colocassia all over with a fork and place them in a bowl. Sprinkle salt and toss well.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai, take each piece of colocasia, flatten them between your palms and drop them into hot oil. Deep-fry till golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Sprinkle the prepared spice mix and toss well. Arrange them on a serving plate and serve hot.']

title: Orange Raisin Muffins
method: ['Preheat oven to 180degC.', 'Sift refined flour with soda bicarbonate into a bowl. Add raisins and mix well.', 'Cream butter, orange squash, orange rind and castor sugar in another bowl till smooth and creamy. Add condensed milk and cream and mix well.', 'Add flour mixture and fold lightly till well blended. Pour the mixture into greased cupcake moulds.', 'Place the moulds on a baking tray, place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for fifteen to twenty minutes.', 'Remove from oven, cool down to room temperature and remove the muffins from the moulds.', 'Arrange on a serving plate and serve.']

title: Aloor Dum
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add torn bay leaves and saute. Add onion paste and saute till golden.', 'Add ginger-garlic paste and saute on medium heat for 30 seconds. Add tomato puree and mix.', 'Add salt, turmeric powder, chilli powder, cumin powder and castor sugar, mix and cook for 7-8 minutes or till oil separates.', 'Add some water and mix. Add potatoes and mix well. Reduce heat and cook for 4-5 minutes.', 'Add green peas and mix.', 'Serve hot with luchi.']

title: Baked Beans On Toast
method: ['Preheat the oven to 180degC. Finely chop one onion and cut the other into rings. Separate the rings. Finely chop half a green capsicum and cut the rest into small triangles.', 'Cut the brown bread slices with a cutter into smaller pieces. Place them on a baking tray and toast in the oven till crisp.', 'Heat butter in a pan, add garlic and chopped onion and saute till transluscent. Add red chilli flakes and stir. Add chopped green capsicum and stir.', 'Add red chilli sauce and stir. Add baked beans and stir till well mixed. Turn the bread pieces and toast for two more minutes.', 'Take them out of the oven and place them on a serving plate. Add coriander leaves to the baked beans and stir. Place a little of the topping mixture on each of the bread piece.', 'Cut each onion ring into four pieces and place them on some of the toasts in a cross shape. Keep the green capsicum triangles on the remaining toasts.', 'Garnish them all with a parsley leaf and serve immediately.']

title: Batata cha Kachrya
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan.', 'Slit and chop green chillies. Slice potatoes.', 'Add mustard seeds, cumin seeds, asafoetida and chopped green chillies and saute for 30 seconds.', 'Add sliced potatoes, turmeric powder and salt and toss to mix. Add some water, cover and cook till potatoes are done.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Gajar Halwa Sugarfree
method: ['Heat pure ghee in a kadai. Add grated carrots and saute for about five minutes.', 'Add skimmed milk and cook.', 'Blanch pistachios, peel and slice.', 'Add green cardamom powder, sultanas, Sugar Free and mix. Cook for about ten to fifteen minutes.', 'Add khoya and mix. Cook till the mixture is almost dry.', 'Garnish with pistachios. Serve hot or cold.']

title: Chocolate Cookie Truffle
method: ['To prepare ganache, heat cream in a non-stick pan. Add chopped dark chocolate, mix and cook for a minute. Remove from heat and mix till chocolate melts and well incorporated.', 'Grind the cream cookies to make a fine mixture and transfer in a bowl.', 'Add ganache and mix well.', 'Divide the mixture into equal portion, shape them into balls and transfer onto a plate. Refrigerate for 1 hour.', 'Line a tray with a silicon mat.', 'Dip each ball in melted white chocolate and place on the silicon mat. Keep aside till set.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Peach and Plum Fudge
method: ['Grind together peaches and plums. Grease an aluminium tray with ghee and set aside. Heat 1 tbsp ghee in a non-stick pan, add almonds, pistachios and walnuts and saute lightly. Add the peach plum mixture and mix well.', 'Add sugar and cook on high heat for 8-10 minutes or till the mixture thickens. Add condensed milk and mix. Cook for 5-6 minutes. Add khoya, mix well and cook for 10-15 minutes, stirring continuously or till the mixture thickens and leaves the sides of the', 'Pour the mixture in the greased tray. Allow to cool down to room temperature, then set in the refrigerator overnight. Cut and serve.']

title: Paneer Frittata
method: ['Break the eggs into a bowl and beat well. Heat 2 tbsps olive oil in a non stick pan. Roughly chop spring onion bulbs and add to the pan. Add salt and crushed black peppercorns to the eggs and beat again.', 'Chop spring onion greens and add to the pan. Add the eggs and cook, stirring, till they scramble. Chop basil leaves and add to the pan. Mix well.', 'When the eggs are half done, roughly crumble cottage cheese and add. Sprinkle cheese. Drizzle the remaining olive oil along the sides of the pan, cover and cook till the eggs are set.', 'You can also cook them in an oven or grill too. Serve hot garnished with basil leaves and a few thin strips of red capsicum.']

title: Chicken with Mint Salad
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add chicken and salt, mix and saute, stirring continuously till cooked.', 'Add red and yellow bell peppers and capsicum. Toss to mix and cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Combine fish sauce, lemon juice, red chilli, lemon grass, brown sugar and salt in a bowl. Mix well.', 'Add mint leaves to the cooked chicken mixture. Toss to mix and cool.', 'Shred lettuce leaves and arrange on a serving plate.', 'Add the fish sauce mixture to chicken mixture and toss to mix.', 'Place the salad on the lettuce bed and serve immediately.']

title: Paneer Frankie
method: ['Mix the whole-wheat flour and salt, add sufficient water and knead into a firm dough. Cover with a damp cloth and keep for about fifteen minutes.', 'Heat the oil in a non-stick pan, add the onions, tomatoes, ginger paste, garlic paste, salt, chilli powder, turmeric powder, coriander powder and stir. Cook till everything blends well and the excess moisture has dried up.', 'Add the paneer and lemon juice, mix and take it off the heat. Divide the filling into four equal portions and set aside. Divide the dough into four equal balls and roll out into thin rotis.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa, place a roti on it, drizzle a little oil all around and cook till both the sides are evenly cooked.', 'Spread a teaspoon of green chutney all over the roti. Place a portion of paneer mixture on one side.', 'Sprinkle some onions and chaat masala over it and roll the roti. Similarly prepare the rest of the frankies.', 'Wrap in aluminum foil and serve.']

title: Khatta Meetha Mixture
ingredients: ['1 cup dried corn flakes', ' 1/2  cup dried potato straws (salli)', ' 1/4  cup nylon sabudana', ' 1/4  cup almonds, vertically halved', ' 1/4  cup cashew nuts, vertically halved', ' 1/2  raw peanuts', ' 1/2  cup thick pressed rice (jada poha)', '2 tablespoons Bengal gram, soaked for 2 hours and drained', '2-3 tablespoons split skinless green gram (dhuli moong dal), soaked for 2 hours and drained', ' 1/4  cup curry leaves', ' 1/4  cup mora sev', ' 1/4  cup chana jor garam', 'Oil for deep frying', '1 teaspoon roasted fennel seeds (saunf)', '1 teaspoon roasted coriander seedsSpice mix', '2-3 teaspoons powdered sugar', '1 teaspoon red chilli powder', ' 1/2  teaspoon black salt', ' 1/4  teaspoon citric acid', 'Salt to taste', ' 1/2  teaspoon dried mango powder (amchur)']
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Slide in the dried corn flakes in batches and deep fry till golden brown and crisp. Drain on an absorbent paper.', 'Similarly, individually deep fry dried potato straws, nylon sabudana, almonds, cashew nuts, raw peanuts, pressed rice, drained Bengal gram, drained split skinless green gram and curry leaves till they turn crisp. Drain on the same absorbent paper.', 'Finely pound the powdered sugar, red chilli powder, black salt, citric acid, salt and dried mango powder with a pestle in a mortar.', 'Transfer the fried mixture into a large parat, add sev, fennel seeds, coarsely crush the coriander seeds between your palms and add into the mixture and add the pounded mixture and gently toss till the mixture is well coated with spice mix.', 'Allow the mixture to cool to room temperature. Store in air tight container or serve as required.']

title: Dal Maharani
method: ['Pressure-cook urad dal and rajma in about 4-5 cups of water with a little salt till 8 whistles are given out. Drain and reserve the cooking liquid.', 'Chop onions and garlic. Cut the ginger into thin strips. Heat ghee and butter in a deep non-stick pan.', 'Add cumin seeds and saute for a few seconds. Add onions, garlic and ginger. Saute for 2 minutes or till lightly browned. Puree tomatoes.', 'Add red chilli powder and tomato puree to the onions. Mix well and cook till fat separates. Add cooked dals and 1 1/2  cups of cooking liquid. Mix well.', 'Add garam masala powder. Mix well and cook on low heat for 15-20 minutes, stirring frequently. Add cream and stir to mix. Serve hot garnished with a swirl of cream and a coriander sprig.']

title: Rajma Hummus
method: ['Put the boiled kidney beans in a food processor jar, add garlic cloves, black peppercorns, lemon juice, tahini, salt and extra-virgin olive oil and process to a smooth mixture. Add  1/4  cup water and process again to a fine and spreadable consistency.', 'To make the salad, take micro greens in a mixing bowl, add English cucumber, carrot, white radish, fresh pomegranate pearls, green olives, black olives, salt, crushed black peppercorns and extra-virgin olive oil and mix with light hand.', 'Transfer the rajma hummus into a serving bowl. Level the surface and drizzle some extra virgin olive oil. Garnish with the prepared salad and serve with grilled pita slices.']
Main ingredients: Red kidney beans (rajma), Garlic, Black peppercorns, Lemon juice, Tahini, Extra-virgin olive oil

title: Afghani Chicken - SK Khazana
method: ['Put onion, garlic, ginger, coriander, cashewnuts, chillies and  1/4  cup water in a grinder jar and grind to a fine paste.', 'Take chicken pieces in a bowl, add the ground paste, yogurt, dried fenugreek leaves powder, garam masala, lemon juice and salt and mix well. Set aside to marinate for  1/2  hour.', 'Heat ghee in a non-stick pan, add the marinated chicken pieces and sear for 4-5 minutes. Add the remaining marination and  1/2  cup water. Cover and cook for 10-15 minutes or till done. Add fresh cream and mix well.', 'Place a small katori in the middle of the chicken mixture, place a burning piece of coal in it, add cloves and  1/2  tbsp ghee and cover immediately. Let it remain thus for 4-5 minutes.', 'Mix the chicken well, transfer into a serving bowl. Garnish with ginger strips, coriander sprig and a lemon wedge.', 'Serve hot with lachcha paranthas.']

title: Thandai
method: ['Grind together almonds, cashewnuts, pistachios, melon seeds and poppy seeds with a little milk to a fine paste. Bring milk to a boil in a pan. Add saffron and mix.', 'When the milk begins to boil add sugar and simmer till the sugar melts. Grind green cardamoms, dried rose petals, cinnamon and black peppercorns to a fine powder.', 'Add the paste to the milk and mix well. Simmer for three to four minutes. Add the powdered masala to the milk and mix well. Chill the milk and serve.']

title: Veggie Burger
ingredients: [' 1/3  cup blanched green peas', '1-2 French beans, roughly chopped and blanched', '1 small carrot, roughly chopped and blanched', ' 1/3  cup blanched corn kernels', ' 1/2  small cauliflower, roughly chopped and blanched', '2 medium potatoes, boiled and peeled', '1 burger bun', '1 green chilli', '4-5 garlic cloves', '1 inch ginger, roughly chopped', 'Salt to taste', 'Black pepper powder to taste', '2 white bread slices', 'Breadcrumbs for coating', 'Oil for deep-frying', 'Butter for applying', '1-2 tablespoons mayonnaise', '1 tablespoon green chutney', '1 cheddar cheese slice', '1 Iceberg lettuce leaf, shredded', ' 1/2  medium onion', '2 tomato slices + for serving']
method: ['Mix together green peas, French beans, carrots, corn kernels and cauliflower in a chopper and finely chop the vegetables.', 'Add green chilli, garlic cloves and ginger and finely chop.', 'Transfer to a bowl. Grate in potatoes, add salt and pepper powder and mix well.', 'Crumble bread slices, add to the bowl and mix well.', 'Shape the mixture into a patty and coat with breadcrumbs.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Deep-fry the patty till golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Slice burger bun horizontally.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa, place the slices on it and toast till crisp. Apply some butter to the slices and toast for a few more seconds. Remove from heat and set aside.', 'To make chutney mayonnaise, mix together mayonnaise and green chutney in a bowl.', 'Place a cheese slice on the base half of the bun and top with some lettuce.', 'Slice an onion and sprinkle salt over the slices. Place them on the lettuce, top with chutney mayonnaise, patty, tomato slices, some more chutney mayonnaise and cover with the top half of the bun. Serve immediately with crisps, tomato slices and lettuce leaves.']

title: Chinese Dosa
method: ['To make the filling, heat 2 tbsps of oil in a non-stick wok, add spring onions, cabbage, green capsicum, carrot, salt and white pepper powder, mix well and saute for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add bean sprouts and Sichuan sauce, and saute for 30 seconds. Add light soy sauce and mix well. Remove from heat and set aside.', 'Add salt to the dosa batter and mix well.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa. Dip an onion in oil and rub it all over the tawa.', 'Spread a ladleful of dosa batter on the tawa evenly and cook for 1 minute and drizzle  1/2  teaspoon oil.', 'Place a generous amount of the filling on the dosa and spread it evenly. Sprinkle spring onion greens and cook till the underside turns golden.', 'Fold the dosa in half, remove from tawa and keep it on a serving plate. Make more dosa in the same manner. Serve hot.']

title: Missi Roti Recipe - SK Khazana
method: ['Take whole wheat flour in a parat, add gram flour , onion, crushed dried fenugreek leaves, salt and turmeric powder and mix well.', 'Add oil and mix well. Add sufficient water, a little at a time, and knead into soft dough. Cover with damp muslin cloth and set aside for 5-7 minutes.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa. Divide the dough into equal portions and shape them into balls. Roll each ball in whole wheat flour and flatten it. Further roll into a not-too-thin roti.', 'Dust off excess flour and place the roti on the hot tawa. Cook for 1 minute, flip and apply a little ghee over the roti. Flip again and apply a little ghee on the other side too. Continue to cook, flipping sides, the roti is cooked completely and brown specks appear on it. Cook the remaining rotis similarly.', 'Apply a little ghee on each roti, place them on a serving plate and serve hot with sabzi, quartered onions, lemon wedges and green chillies.']

title: Cheese and Coriander Parantha
method: ['Place whole wheat flour and salt in a bowl. Add coriander leaves and enough water and knead into a soft dough. Cover the dough with a damp cloth and rest it for twenty to twenty-five minutes.', 'Divide the dough into eight equal portions and shape into balls.Mix together the green chillies, onion, ginger, salt, chaat masala and cheese. Divide the mixture into eight equal portions.', 'Roll out each ball of dough into a medium-sized chapatti. Place one portion in the centre of each chapatti, gather the edges and roll into a ball. Roll out into a round parantha.', 'Heat a non stick tawa, place a parantha on it and cook for half a minute. Flip over, drizzle a little oil all around. Flip it once more and drizzle a little oil again. Cook till both sides are light golden and crisp.', 'Cut into four pieces and serve immediately.']

title: Chicken Triple Fried Rice-SK Khazana
method: ['For the gravy heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Mix together chicken, salt, crushed peppercorns and cornflour in a bowl. Deep-fry chicken pieces in hot oil for 2-3 minutes or till golden brown. Drain on absorbent paper and set aside.', 'For the fried rice, heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan. Break an egg and put in a bowl, add salt and crushed peppercorns and beat lightly. Add to the pan and cook stirring to make scrambled egg. Transfer into a plate and set aside.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon oil in another non-stick pan, add garlic, ginger, broken red chillies and 2 tablespoons schezwan sauce and mix well.', 'Add chicken cubes and mix. Add a little water and mix and cook till the chicken is done.', 'Add noodles and cooked rice and toss well.', 'Add  1/2  cup schezwan sauce and mix. Add scrambled egg and mix. Add some chopped spring onion greens and mix well. Keep it aside.', 'To make the gravy, heat 1 tablespoon oil in yet another non-stick pan, add garlic, ginger, onion, broken red chilli and mix well. Add schezwan sauce and some water and mix well.', 'Add soy sauce, cornflour slurry, mix and cook till the mixture thickens.', 'Add fried chicken cubes and mix well. Add salt, crushed black peppercorns, spring onion greens and mix. Set aside.', 'Heat 1 teaspoon oil in a clean non-stick pan, break the remaining egg into it and fry the egg on both sides.', 'Put some fried rice on one side of a serving plate and keep the fried egg over it. Put some gravy in a bowl and keep it beside the rice. Keep the fried noodles in another bowl and serve immediately.']

title: Tomato and Egg Stir Fry
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan.', 'Slice spring onion bulbs reserving the greens.', 'Add these onions to hot oil and saute till golden.', 'Diagonally slice green chillies, add to the pan, mix and cook for a minute.', 'Cut tomatoes, add to the pan and toss. Add salt and soy sauce, mix and cook for a minute.', 'Chop spring onion greens.', 'Break eggs into a bowl and beat well. Add sweet-chilli sauce, beat again, add to the pan and mix well.', 'Add spring onion greens and mix.', 'Serve hot garnished with bell pepper curls and a coriander sprig.']

title: Aloo Methi
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Cut potatoes into medium sized cubes.', 'Add cumin seeds to the pan and saute till it changes colour. Add asafoetida and potatoes and saute on high heat till the potatoes become golden in colour.', 'Add red chilli powder, chaat masala, dried mango powder and salt and toss well.', 'Add fenugreek leaves and mix well. Reduce heat, cover and cook for two to three minutes. Transfer into a serving dish and serve hot.']

title: Chocolate kulfi
method: ['Heat milk in a saucepan and bring it to boil. Let it boil, stirring continuously, till reduced to one-third the original quantity. Add khoya and mix. Then add condensed milk and reduce for five more minutes.', 'Take it off the heat and add grated chocolate, leaving aside some for the garnish, and mix well.', 'Transfer the mixture into kulfi moulds. Sprinkle the remaining grated chocolate on top and close the lid of the moulds. Keep the moulds in the deep freezer and allow to set.', 'When set unmould, slice and serve immediately.']

title: Baked Prawns With Honey Mustard
method: ['Preheat oven to the highest temperature. Grind mustard seeds, sea salt, garlic, ginger and  1/4  cup water to a fine paste.', 'Halve the prawns lengthways and put them in a bowl.', 'Add salt, squeeze juice of 1 lemon and some chilled water to cover them completely.', 'Let them soak for a few minutes and drain completely.', 'Pat them dry on a tissue and put them back into the bowl.', 'Add red chilli sauce, ground paste, honey and extra virgin olive oil and mix well.', 'Arrange them on a baking tray in single layer and cook in the preheated oven for 5-8 minutes.', 'Serve hot immediately.']

title: Panna And Rose Mocktail
method: ['Combine the aam panna mixture, rose syrup, sugar, ice cubes and cumin powder in a blender jar. Blend well.', 'Add one and a half cups water and stir to mix.', 'Strain and pour into individual tall glasses.', 'Garnish with lemon wedges and mint leaves and serve chilled.']

title: Chinese Popcorn Prawns-SK Khazana
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Put prawns in a bowl. Add egg white, cornflour and salt and mix well.', 'Deep-fry prawns in hot oil till golden brown. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan, add ginger and garlic and saute till fragrant.', 'Add tomato ketchup, chilli flakes, lemon zest and some water and mix well.', 'Add salt and vinegar, mix well and remove from heat. Transfer the sauce into a serving bowl.', 'Garnish prawn popcorns with spring onion greens and serve hot with the sauce.']

title: Laccha Namakpara- Sk Khazana
method: ['Take refined flour in a large bowl, add ghee, carom seeds and salt and mix well. Add sufficient water and knead into stiff dough. Cover and set aside for 10 minutes.', 'Divide the dough into 4 portions and roll each portion into a thin rectangle sheet. Brush ghee and sprinkle flour on top and spread it evenly. Make a fold from both ends, bring the edges in the centre and press it gently. Brush a little ghee on top and sprinkle flour and spread it evenly. Fold from bottom and the top end and bring the edges to the centre.', 'Flip and roll into a thick rectangle sheet, brush ghee on top and sprinkle flour and spread it evenly. Bring one vertical side of the sheet to the centre and fold the other side overlapping the first one. Roll into a long sheet and cut into strips.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai, slide in the strips into hot oil and deep-fry till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Cool down to room temperature and serve or store in an airtight container and serve as required.']

title: Creamy Honeyed Fruits
method: ['Cut kiwis into slices. Cut apricots into halves and cut apple into cubes. Transfer all these into a bowl.', 'Add pineapple, orange segments and honey and mix well. Refrigerate to chill.', 'Combine hung yogurt and cream cheese in another bowl and mix well.', 'Crush cookies coarsely with hands and place on a plate.', 'Place a layer of chilled honeyed fruits into four individual short glasses. Spread a layer of yogurt-cheese mixture on top of the fruits. Top with crushed cookies and refrigerate for an hour.', 'Serve chilled.']

title: Flourless Walnut Cookies
ingredients: [' 1/2  cup walnuts', ' 1/2  cup powdered sugar', ' 1/2  cup desiccated coconut', '1 egg white', 'Oil for greasing']
method: ['Preheat the oven to 180@C.', 'Put the walnuts in a blender and blend to a fine powder. Transfer into a bowl.', 'Add powdered sugar and desiccated coconut and mix well. Add egg white, mix well and knead to crumbly dough.', 'Grease a baking tray with oil and line it with a parchment sheet.', 'Divide the cookie mixture into small equal portions, shape each portion into a ball and flatten them slightly. Arrange them on the lined tray.', 'Put the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 10-12 minutes. Remove from oven and cool.', 'Serve.']

title: Puri Bhaji- SK Khazana
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add mustard seeds and cumin seeds and let the mustard seeds splutter. Add split black grams, torn curry leaves, asafetida, mix well and saute for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add onion, mix and saute for 1 minute. Cover and cook for 3-4 minutes.', 'Heat sufficient oil to deep-fry the puris.', 'Add green chillies to the onion mixture. Add potatoes, salt and sugar and toss well.', 'Add coconut and coriander leaves and toss well. Sprinkle some water, cover and cook for some time.', 'Divide the dough into small equal portions and shape into balls. Put some oil on the rolling board, keep each dough ball on it and roll out into slightly thick puris. .', 'Slide in the puris, one at a time, into hot oil and deep-fry till they puff up and turn light golden brown. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Transfer the bhaji into a serving bowl, garnish with coconut and coriander leaves. Transfer the puris on a serving plate and serve them hot with the bhaji.']

title: Caramelized Banana Sundae
method: ['Heat a non-stick pan, add cashewnuts, almonds and pistachios and dry roast on medium heat till light golden.', 'For each portion cook 4 tbsps sugar with 2 tbsps water in another non-stick pan till sugar melts and caramelizes.', 'Trim the two ends and peel a banana and slit it vertically.', 'Add 2 tbsps butter to the caramel and mix. Add the banana halves and roll them in the caramel sauce till they are completely covered.', 'Place the bananas in a serving plate and drizzle some of the caramel sauce over them. Place 2 scoops of vanilla ice cream and 1 scoop of chocolate ice cream over them. Drizzle 2 tbsps chocolate sauce. Sprinkle some of the roasted nuts. Put another scoop of chocolate ice cream on top.', 'Drizzle some of the remaining caramel sauce and 2 tbsps chocolate sauce over the icecream scoops. Sprinkle a few roasted nuts and drizzle remaining caramel sauce and 1 tbsp chocolate sauce over them. Sprinkle some more roasted nuts and serve immediately.']

title: Gud Kesar Imarti
method: ['Wash and soak split black gram in sufficient water for about 2-3 hours. Drain and transfer into a mixer jar. Add cornflour, orange food colour and  1/4  cup + 1 tbsp water and grind to a smooth and thick batter of cake batter consistency.', 'Heat  1/4  cup water in a non-stick pan, add jaggery and saffron, cook stirring, till jaggery dissolves and the mixture reaches a one-string consistency. Remove from heat, keep it warm.', 'Heat sufficient ghee in a shallow pan. Pour batter into a squeezy bottle, pipe out batter into hot ghee in 2 concentric circles in a clockwise direction, followed by scallops in anti-clockwise direction. Deep-fry till golden. Drain and soak in the warm jaggery syrup for 15 minutes.', 'Drain and serve hot.']

title: Diet Chaat - SK Khazana
method: ['Drain and put white peas in a pressure cooker, add turmeric powder, asafoetida and 3 cups water, mix well. Cover and cook under pressure till 4-5 whistles are released.', 'Finely chop onion and tomato.', 'Open the pressure cooker once the pressure has reduced completely. Mix well. Transfer into serving bowls.', 'Sprinkle onion, drizzle green chutney, date and tamarind chutney and red chilli-garlic chutney. Sprinkle tomato, raw mango and squeeze lemon on top.', 'Sprinkle black salt, chaat masala and roasted cumin powder. Drizzle chilled yogurt and garnish with coriander leaves. Serve immediately.']

title: Kasundi Machchi-SK Khazana
method: ['Put fish pieces in a bowl. Add salt, turmeric powder, chilli powder and 1 1/2  tablespoons kasundi mustard, mix well and set aside to marinate.', 'Blend together poppy seeds along with the water they were soaked, chopped green chillies and yogurt to a smooth paste.', 'Heat mustard oil in a non-stick pan till it reaches smoking point. Add onion and saute till translucent. Add marinated fish pieces and mix.', 'Add some water to remaining kasundi mustard, mix well and add this to the fish. Add prepared paste. Rinse the blender jar with 1 cup water and add to the fish, mix lightly and cook for a minute.', 'Add slit green chillies and salt, mix and simmer till the fish is fully cooked. Add coriander leaves and mix well.', 'Garnish with coriander sprig and serve hot.']

title: Missi Roti Palakwali
method: ['Heat a Gas Oven Tandoor (GOT) and brush with some oil.', 'Finely chop onion and put in a bowl. Add gram flour, wheat flour, green chillies, salt, chaat masala and turmeric powder and mix well. Add spinach puree and 2 tablespoons oil and mix. Add sufficient water and knead into a soft dough.', 'Divide the dough into equal portions and shape them into balls. Dust them with wheat flour.', 'Grease one palm with oil and another with water and spread the balls into medium sized rotis.', 'Place the rotis in the Gas Oven Tandoor (GOT), keeping the wet part facing down, cover and cook till the underside is done. Flip, and cook till the other side is similarly done.', 'Uncover, baste with butter and serve hot.']

title: Crispy Cheese Kebab
method: ['Take chicken mince in a bowl, add ginger, garlic, green chillies, mint leaves and onion, salt, red chilli powder, Tata Sampann Garam Masala powder. Break an egg, put the white in another bowl, add the yolk to the chicken mixture and mix well. Set aside for 10-15 minutes.', 'Crush the rice flour vermicelli and spread on a plate.', 'Heat sufficient water in the lower vessel of a steamer.', 'Insert a skewer vertically in the centre of each cheese stick, dip your hands in water and coat the cheese stick thickly with some chicken mixture. Roll these kebabs in the crushed vermicelli and keep them on a plate.', 'Place these kebabs on the perforated top half of the steamer, cover the steamer and steam for 5-10 minutes. Take the steamer off the heat and place the kebabs on a plate.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai, deep-fry the kebabs till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Arrange them on a serving platter and serve hot with green chutney, onion rings and lemon wedges.']

title: Cinnamon Waffle Sticks
method: ['Toast almond slivers till lightly browned.', 'Sift flour, baking powder, salt and  1/4  teaspoon cinnamon powder into a bowl and mix. Add 3 tablespoons castor sugar and mix well.', 'Make a well in the centre. Break eggs and put into the well. Whisk well. Add milk, gradually, and keep whisking till a smooth batter is formed.', 'Add 2 tablespoons butter and mix well. Add toasted almonds and mix well.', 'Heat a waffle iron. Grease with some butter, pour the batter into it, cover and cook for 2-3 minutes or till golden from both sides. Remove from heat and cool.', 'Heat remaining castor sugar in a non-stick pan and let it caramelize. Add 1 tablespoon butter and mix well. Switch off heat.', 'Cut waffles into sticks and add to the pan. Coat well. Place the pan back on heat, add remaining butter and mix well.', 'Place the waffle sticks on a serving plate.', 'Combine icing sugar and remaining cinnamon powder in a bowl and mix well.', 'Sprinkle the icing sugar mixture over the waffle sticks and serve immediately.']

title: Zucchini Tikki
method: ['Heat one tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan, add garlic and saute for ten to fifteen seconds.', 'Add green and yellow zucchini, mix well and saute for two minutes.', 'Add salt, mix well and saute on high heat till the vegetables are done.', 'Place mashed potatoes in a mixing bowl, add the sauteed vegetables and mix well.', 'Add red chilli powder, cumin powder, one-fourth teaspoon chaat masala, garam masala powder, coriander leaves and half cup breadcrumbs and mix well.', 'Divide the mixture into eight equal portions and shape them into tikkis. Coat the tikkis with breadcrumbs and dust off excess.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, place the tikkis in it and shallow-fry, turning sides, till evenly done on both sides.', 'Sprinkle chaat masala on top and serve hot.']

title: Eggless Gulab Jamun Custard
method: ['Heat milk in a small deep non-stick pan and bring to boil. Add castor sugar and mix well.', 'Take custard powder in a bowl. Add 3-4 tablespoons milk, mix well, add to boiling milk, whisk well and cook till it thickens. Remove from heat and keep warm.', 'Line individual short glasses with halved gulab jamuns, put some pistachios and pour some custard mixture on top. Repeat the process till all ingredients are used.', 'Insert a gulab jamun in a toothpick.', 'Top with some pistachios and place the toothpick.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Dal Keema
method: ['Heat 2 non stick pans and pour 2 tbsps oil in each of them. Finely slice onion.', 'Add cloves, green cardamoms, black cardamom, cinnamon, black peppercorns and caraway seeds to one pan and saute till fragrant. Add onion and saute.', 'Roughly chop green chillies and add and saute for  1/2  minute.', 'Add keema and salt and continue to saute, stirring occasionally, till almost dry.', 'Meanwhile drain the dal and add to other pan.', 'Add salt and  1/4  tsp turmeric powder and mix well and saute.', 'Add  1/4  tsp turmeric powder, red chilli powder and ginger-garlic paste to keema and mix well.', 'Add  1/4  cup water and cover and cook. Chop coriander leaves and add to keema.', 'Mix, cover and cook till almost done.', 'When dal turns reddish, add it to keema and mix.', 'Cover and cook on low heat for 10-15 minutes. Serve hot with chapatti.']

title: Adraki Murgh - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat oil and ghee in a non-stick pan, add bay leaf. Open the green cardamoms pods and add the seeds. Add cumin seeds and saute till fragrant.', 'Add onions, mix well and saute. Add a pinch of salt and saute till onion turns translucent.', 'Add chopped ginger, ginger strips and garlic paste, mix well and saute till the raw smells disappear.', 'Add red chilli powder, coriander powder and Tata Sampann Turmeric Powder and mix well. Add 2 tbsps water and mix.', 'Add tomato puree, mix well and saute for 5 minutes or till the oil separates. Add chicken, mix and saute for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add crushed coriander seeds, coriander leaves and  1/2  cup water and mix well. Cover and cook for 10-15 minutes on medium heat or till the chicken gets cooked completely.', 'Add fresh cream and mix, cook on low heat for 1 minute. Take the pan off the heat.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with ginger strips and coriander sprig and serve hot with naan or tandoori roti.']

title: Chicken Dahi Kebab - SK Khazana
method: ['Put ginger-garlic paste, salt, lemon juice, white pepper powder and chicken in a bowl, mix well and set aside to marinate for 15-20 minutes.', 'Mix together hung yogurt, cream, cheese, white pepper powder, cardamom powder, nutmeg powder and salt and mix well', 'Add the marinated chicken pieces and mix well. Keep the bowl in the refrigerator to marinate for 50-60 minutes.', 'Preheat an air fryer to 200deg C.', 'String the chicken pieces onto skewers, keep them in the air-fryer basket, fit it to the air-fryer and cook for 15-20 minutes. Remove from the fryer.', 'Arrange the skewers on a serving plate, sprinkle chaat masala over them and serve with green chutney, lemon wedges and onion rings.']

title: Chocolate Fudge Pudding
method: ['Preheat oven at 150o C.', 'Break eggs in a bowl. Add butter and corn syrup and beat with electric beater till smooth. Add flour gradually and cocoa powder and continue to beat.', 'Grease individual ramekin moulds with butter and dust with flour.', 'Pour  1/2  cup water on the baking tray. Pour the chocolate mixture in ramekin moulds, place the filled moulds on the tray and cover each mould with aluminum foil. Put the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 1-1 1/2  hours. Remove the tray and cool to room temperature.', 'To make sauce, melt chocolate in microwave in a bowl for 25-30 seconds. Transfer this into another bowl, add condensed milk and mix well. Add cream and mix till smooth.', 'Remove the aluminum foil, transfer the pudding on a serving plate, pour the prepared sauce on top and serve immediately.']

title: Duck Pepper Fry
method: ['Trim the fat from the U.S. Duck breasts and cut them into 1 inch cubes.', 'Heat 2 tsps oil in a pressure cooker, add the duck pieces, salt and 1 1/2  cups water and mix well. Cover the cooker with a lid and cook under pressure till 4-5 whistles are released.', 'Heat a non-stick pan, add black peppercorns, coriander seeds, green cardamoms, cloves, black cardamom, cinnamon stick and star anise, mix and dry roast till fragrant.', 'Take the pan off the heat and transfer the roasted spices into a blender jar, add 4-5 dried red chillies and blend to a fine powder.', 'Heat remaining oil in a non-stick kadai, add caraway seeds and let them change colour. Add curry leaves and onions, mix and saute for 1-2 minutes or till the onions turn translucent.', 'Break the remaining dried red chillies and add into the pan, mix and saute for 1 minute.', 'Open the lid of the cooker once the pressure has reduced completely and drain the duck pieces.', 'Add dried coconut and ginger-garlic paste into the pan and mix well. Cook for 1 minute.', 'Add the cooked duck pieces and toss well. Add the roasted spice mix and salt and mix till well combined. Cook for 1-2 minutes,', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot.']

title: Bohri Keema Samosa - SK Khazana
method: ['To make the stuffing, heat ghee in a non-stick pan. Add cumin seeds and let them change colour.', 'Add garlic and ginger, mix and saute till raw smells disappear. Add onion, mix and saute for 2-3 minutes. Add green chillies, mix and saute for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add mutton mince and saute on high heat for 3-4 minutes, breaking the lumps if any. Add salt, mix well and saute for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add turmeric powder, coriander powder and garam masala powder, mix and saute till the mince is done.', 'Finely chop spring onion bulb and greens and add to the mutton mixture and switch the heat off. Add coriander leaves and mint leaves and mix well.', 'Squeeze the juice of lemon into the mixture and mix well.', 'Make a well in the centre of the mixture and keep a small steel katori with a few hot charcoal pieces in it. Keep a few cloves over the coals and drizzle ghee over and cover immediately tolet the smoky flavour infuse for 1-2 minutes. Remove the cover, remove the katori and mix the mutton mixture well.', 'Transfer the prepared stuffing into a bowl and let it cool down to room temperature.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'To make samosas, take each samosa patti, fold one end to make a cone, stuff it with some mince mixture, and fold the other end over to close the open end. Apply a little slurry on the open edge and press to seal.', 'Slide in the samosas into hot oil and deep-fry till golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Arrange them on a serving bowl and serve hot with mint chutney, onion rings, lemon wedges and mint sprigs.']

title: Basi Roti Churi
method: ['Roughly chop onions and green chillies. Heat oil in a non stick pan, add cumin seeds and saute till they change colour.', 'Finely chop ginger and add to the pan and saute. Add green chillies and onions and saute.', 'Add peanuts and mix well. Tear the leftover rotis into small pieces.', 'Add turmeric powder, salt and sugar and mix well. Saute for a couple of minutes.', 'Add juice of one lemon and mix well. Add leftover roti pieces and toss lightly.', 'Cover and cook on low heat till crispy and crunchy. Serve hot.']

title: Pumpkin Pav Bhaji
ingredients: ['8 pav', '200 grams red pumpkin, peeled, cut into small cubes and pressure cooked', '3 tablespoons pav bhaji masala + to sprinkle', '3 tablespoons oil', ' 1/4  medium cauliflower, grated', 'Salt to taste', '2 teaspoons ginger paste', '3-4 green chillies, chopped', '4 medium tomatoes, chopped', ' 1/2  cup tomato puree', '1 medium green capsicum', 'Butter as required', 'A few sprigs of fresh coriander leaves', '1 lemon']
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add cauliflower and saute. Add pumpkin to the pan and mix. Add salt, ginger paste, green chillies, tomatoes and mix.  Cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add 2 tablespoons pav bhaji masala and mix.  Mash everything with a masher.', 'Add tomato puree,  1/2  cup water and mix well. Cover and cook.', 'Roughly chop green capsicum in a chopper and add to the pan and mix. Cook till water evaporates.', 'Slit the pavs without cutting through, apply butter to the inner sides and sprinkle a little pav bhaji masala, open them out and cook another non-stick pan. Turn them over, add 1 tablespoon butter and cook, turning sides, till slightly crisp.', 'Chop coriander leaves and add to the bhaji and mix well.', 'Adjust salt, add 1 tablespoon pav bhaji masala, juice of 1 lemon and mix.', 'Add 2 tablespoons butter and mix well.', 'Garnish with a fresh red chilli flower, thin strips of green capsicums and serve hot with pavs.']

title: Sattu ke Paranthe
method: ['To make the dough, take whole wheat flour in a mixing bowl, add salt, oil and sufficient water and knead into soft dough. Cover and set aside for 10 minutes.', 'To make the stuffing, take Tata Sampann Jeera Sattu in another bowl, add salt, red chilli powder, kitchen king masala and roasted cumin powder. Crush and add carom seeds. Add green chillies, coriander leaves, ginger and onion and mix well.', 'Add red chilli pickle along with its oil and mustard oil and mix well. Drizzle a little water and mix well till all the ingredients bind well.', 'Knead the dough again to make it softer. Divide it into equal portions and shape them into balls. Roll each ball in dry flour and roll it out into a roti. Place some sattu mixture in the centre, gather the edges together and press to seal. Break off excess dough.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa on medium heat.', 'Flatten each stuffed ball slightly, dust it with dry flour and roll into a parantha.', 'Drizzle a little oil on the tawa and spread it, place a parantha on it and cook for 1-2 minutes. Flip, drizzle a little oil and spread evenly, cook for 1-2 minutes, flip again and drizzle a little oil on the other side and spread evenly. Cook turning till both the sides become golden and brown specks appear on top.', 'To make raita, take yogurt in a small bowl, add grated cucumber, roasted cumin powder, black salt and salt and mix well.', 'Transfer the raita into a serving bowl and sprinkle a little red chilli powder on top. Drizzle a little ghee on each parantha, cut them into 4 triangles and arrange them on a serving plate. Serve hot with raita.']

title: Homemade Strawberry Jam-SK Khazana
method: ['Heat a non-stick pan. Add crushed strawberries, sugar, lemon juice and salt. Mix well and cook till the mixture turns pulpy and thick. Remove from heat and cool.', 'Serve or store in an airtight jar.']

title: Fresh Fruit Tart
method: ['Preheat oven at 180degC. Line a 7-inch tart mould by greasing with a little butter and dusting with little refined flour.', 'To make tart mould, combine refined flour, butter and castor sugar in a bowl. Rub well till the mixture resembles breadcrumbs.', 'Add little water and mix into a soft dough. Refrigerate for 15 minutes.', 'Dust dough with little flour and roll out into a large disc. Line the prepared tart mould and press from inside so that the dough set properly inside the mould. Discard the edges, press the sides with the thumb and prick the inside base with a knife. Fill', 'Remove mould from oven and demould.', 'Cut and deseed pear. Roughly chop pineapple. Peel, deseed and roughly chop mango. Slice kiwi. Deseed and roughly chop plums.', 'Spread whipped cream inside the tart mould and level it out. Place chopped fruits on it the way you want.', 'Deseed red grapes and halve them. Place them in the tart and serve immediately.']

title: Shrikhand with Caramelised Walnuts
method: ["Pour the yogurt into a large piece of muslin cloth, bring the edges together to form a potli. Keep the potli in a strainer kept over a large bowl and let the excess water drain off completely. Keep the bowl in the refrigerator so that the yogurt doesn't turn sour. This may take 3-4 hours.", 'Put the hung yogurt into a sieve kept over another bowl, add powdered sugar and mix till the sugar blends completely with the yogurt and the mixture passes through the sieve into the bowl.', 'Heat a non-stick pan, add walnuts and 2 tablespoons sugar and cook stirring continuously till the sugar caramelizes. Transfer the mixture onto a plate lined with butter paper and spread evenly.', 'Add green cardamom powder to the yogurt mixture. Take milk in a small bowl, add saffron and mix well. Add this to the yogurt mixture and mix everything well.', 'Add half the caramelized walnuts and mix well.', 'Transfer the shrikhand into serving bowl, garnish with the remaining caramelized walnuts and serve.']

title: Chhenar Payesh
method: ['Boil milk, reduce heat and let it simmer till reduced to half the original quantity.', 'Add sugar and cook till it dissolves.', 'Mash chenna in a bowl. Add it to the milk. Simmer for two minutes.', 'Garnish with nuts and serve cold.']

title: Ragi Pancakes - SK Khazana
method: ['Sieve ragi flour, refined flour and baking powder into a bowl, dd salt and castor sugar. Break in eggs and add vanilla essence, milk and melted butter and whisk till you get a smooth batter.', 'Heat a non-stick pan, Drizzle some melted butter and wipe it with a tissue. Pour a ladle of batter and cook on medium heat till the underside is cooked. Flip and cook the other side till done. Place it on a plate. Cook more pancakes similarly.', 'Stack the pancakes one on top of the other on a serving plate.', 'Dust icing sugar through a sieve on top and garnish with strawberries and blueberries. Drizzle maple syrup all over and around the pancake stack and serve.']

title: Paneer Sandwich Pakora
method: ['Cut cottage cheese into two inch by half inch by half inch batons. Slit each baton into half leaving one edge intact for filling.', 'Crush the boondi with your hand and set aside on a plate. To make garlic chutney, grind garlic with whole dry red chillies and salt to a smooth paste. Mix in lemon juice.', 'Apply the chutney into the slits of each paneer piece and set aside. Heat sufficient oil in a kadai on medium heat.', 'To prepare batter mix gram flour with ginger paste, garlic paste, turmeric powder, red chilli powder, soda bicarbonate and salt and mix.', 'Add three tablespoons of hot oil and mix well. Add sufficient water to make a thick batter. Whisk the batter well to ensure that there are no lumps.', 'Dip each paneer sandwich in the batter, roll in the crushed boondi and deep-fry, turning a few times so that they are evenly fried till golden and crisp.', 'Drain and place on an absorbent paper. Serve hot.']

title: Chicken Fajita Pasta
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add garlic and saute for 30 seconds.', 'Add onion and saute till translucent. Add salt and mix. Add chicken, mix and cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add cumin powder, oregano, red capsicum, yellow capsicum, chili sauce and crushed peppercorns, mix and cook for 1 minute.', 'Add coriander leaves and fajita spice mix and mix well. Add pasta, mix and cook for 1 minute. Reduce heat and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Batata Song
method: ['Lightly roast and grind red chillies with tamarind and a little water to a fine paste. Heat oil in a frying pan and saute the onions till light brown.', 'Add the ground paste and saute for two to three minutes. Add the potato pieces and mix well. Add one cup of water and salt and simmer on low heat till a thick gravy is formed. Serve hot with puris or chapattis.']

title: Laal Maas
method: ['Grind the soaked chillies to a fine paste in a blender.', 'In a large mixing bowl, combine the mutton, yogurt, cumin powder, coriander powder, turmeric powder, one tablespoon ginger garlic paste and the red chilli paste. Mix well and set aside to marinate in the refrigerator for an hour.', 'Heat ghee in a nonstick pressure cooker, to that add black cardamom, green cardamoms, cinnamon, cloves and bay leaf and saute till its fragrant.', 'Add the onions and saute till they turn light brown in colour. Then add the remaining ginger garlic paste and saute for a minute.', 'Add the marinated mutton to the onions and saute on high heat for two to three minutes.', 'Add salt and sufficient water to cover all the mutton pieces. Cover with a lid and let it cook under pressure for seven to eight whistles.', 'Once done, remove from heat and wait till the pressure is released.', 'Meanwhile light the piece of charcoal, place it in a small metal bowl and place the bowl in the centre of pressure cooker.', 'Add two to three cloves to the coal, pour some ghee and quickly cover with a lid and set aside for two to three minutes.', 'Put the curry back on heat, add garam masala and give a quick stir before removing from heat.', 'Transfer to a serving bowl, garnish with coriander sprigs and a lemon wedge. Serve hot.']

title: Soya Pops
method: ['Squeeze extra water from soya chunks and place in a bowl. Add 1 1/2  tspssoy sauce, 2 tsps red chilli sauce, 1 tsp vinegar and salt and mix well. Set aside to marinate for 10-15 minutes.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai', 'Put refined flour, cornstarch and soda in another bowl. Add 1 cup water and whisk well into a thick batter. Add salt and 1 tbsp oil and whisk again.', 'Dip marinated soya chunks in the batter, slide into hot oil and deep-fry for 2-3 minutes. Drain on absorbent paper', 'Reheat theoil in the kadai.', 'Heat 1 tbsp oil in a non-stick pan, add ginger and garlic and saute for 2-3 minutes.', 'Re-fry soya pops in hot oil till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Add green chillies to the pan, mix and saute for a minute. Add red chilli paste, remaining red chilli sauce, remaining soy sauce, remaining vinegar and salt, mix well and saute for a minute.', 'Add fried soya pops and toss. Let it get heated through.', 'Transfer the pops onto a serving plate, garnish with red and yellow capsicum strips and spring onion green flower and serve hot.']

title: Marble Bread
method: ['Preheat the oven at 180oC.', 'To make basic bread loaf, take yeast in a bowl. Add sugar and 1 tablespoon warm water, mix well and set aside for 5 minutes or till bubbles appear.', 'Take refined flour, milk powder and salt in a planetary mixture.', 'Add dissolved yeast and mix lightly. Add about 2 cups chilled water and knead well into a soft dough.', 'Add butter and knead again, dusting flour. Cover with a wet muslin cloth and set aside to ferment for 30 minutes in a warm and dry place.', 'After 15 minutes, knock back the dough.', 'To make whole wheat bread, combine yeast and sugar in a bowl. Add 1-2 tablespoons warm water, mix well and set aside for 5 minutes or till bubbles appear.', 'Combine whole wheat flour, 1 tablespoon oats, yeast mixture,salt and butter in a planetary mixer. Mix, adding 1 cup (250 ml) water, little by little to form a soft dough.', 'Dust the worktop with some flour, remove the dough on the worktop and knead well by stretching. Divide the dough into equal portions and shape them into small buns, dusting with flour.', 'Place the dough in another bowl, cover with wet muslin cloth and set aside.', 'Dust refined flour on a worktop, knock back both the dough separately.', 'Make a roll of both the dough and twist them together.', 'Grease a bread loaf tin with oil, place the prepared dough in it. Cover with wet muslin cloth and set aside for 15-20 minutes.', 'Brush with milk wash.', 'Put tin in preheated oven and bake for 20-25 minutes.', 'Remove from heat, cool, slice and serve.']

title: Arbi ki Kadhi
method: ['Cut arbi into  1/2  inch slices and set aside.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai, slide in the arbi slices and deep fry till golden brown and crisp. Drain on an absorbent paper.', 'Take yogurt in a large bowl, add water chestnut flour, salt, turmeric powder, red chilli powder and 1 cup water and whisk well.', 'Heat 1 tsp oil in a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds and dried red chillies and mix well.Add the yogurt mixture and mix well. Cook for 4-5 minutes.', 'Add  3/4  of the fried arbi and mix and cook for 5-6 minutes. Add coriander leaves and mix well. Take the pan off the heat.', 'Garnish with remaining fried arbi and serve hot with steamed rice.']

title: Honey And Fruit Smoothie
method: ['Place banana and mango pieces in the freezer for one hour. Place the frozen fruit, honey, lemon juice and yogurt in a blender and blend until smooth.', 'Add crushed ice cubes and blend again. Pour into individual glasses and serve, garnished with mint sprigs.']

title: Homemade Caramel Ice Cream
method: ['Heat milk and milk powder in a non-stick pan. Cook, stirring, till the mixture thickens.', "Pour the milk mixture into a bowl, add sugar and Hershey's Caramel Syrup and mix well till the sugar melts.", 'Add cream and whisk till well combined. Transfer into an airtight container with tight fitting lid and freeze overnight.', "Scoop into individual serving bowls, drizzle some Hershey's Caramel Syrup on top and serve immediately."]

title: Gulab Jamun Cheesecake
method: ['Preheat oven to 180deg C.', 'Take gelatin in a bowl, add some lukewarm water, mix and set aside to bloom.', 'Take cream cheese in a bowl and smoothen it with a wooden ladle. Add whipped cream, little by little, and fold in well.', 'Add rose syrup and mix well. Add castor sugar and mix again. Add bloomed gelatin and mix.', 'Crush the biscuits to a coarse powder and transfer into another bowl. Add melted butter and mix well. Spread this mixture in a spring form baking tin, press lightly and level the surface.', 'Keep the tin the preheated oven and bake for 6-8 minutes.', 'Spread half the gulab jamuns over the baked base and top with half the cream cheese mixture. Repeat the process with the remaining gulab jamuns and cream cheese mixture. Garnish with crushed rose petals and refrigerate till set.Spread half the gulab jamuns over the baked base and top with half the cream cheese mixture.', 'Repeat the process with the remaining gulab jamuns and cream cheese mixture. Garnish with crushed rose petals and refrigerate till set.', 'Loosen the sides with a knife and demould onto a plate, cut into wedges, place each wedge on a serving plate, garnish each wedge with gulab jamun and serve.']

title: Mango and Chilli Sorbet
method: ['To make the syrup, heat 180 ml water along with the castor sugar and glucose in a non-stick pan. Bring to a boil and simmer for three minutes. Remove from heat and cool.', 'Take 200 ml of the prepared syrup back in the pan and bring to a boil. Add the chilli, mix and remove from heat. Cool completely.', 'Add the lemon juice, mix well and refrigerate overnight. Use the remaining syrup to prepare more batches of the sorbet.', 'Pass the mixture through a fine sieve and churn in an ice cream maker. Freeze till set.', 'Serve.']

title: Samosa Pinwheel
method: ['Heat 2 tbsps oil in a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds and saute till they change colour. Add ginger and green chillies, mix and saute well.', 'Add red chilli powder, mix well and saute for 1 minute. Add potatoes and mix well. Add green peas, dried mango powder, garam masala powder, salt and coriander leaves and mix well. Cook for 1-2 minutes. Take them off the heat and set aside to cool down to room temperature.', 'Keep the dough on the worktop and roll into a thin sheet, place the stuffing mixture on it and spread it evenly leaving 1 inch space at the edges. Roll tightly, apply a little water on the edge at the end and seal. Fold in the two side edges. Cut into  1/2  inch thick slices.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai, slide in the pinwheels and deep-fry till golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Arrange them on a serving platter and serve hot with date and tamarind chutney.']

title: Herbed Chicken and Rice Casserole
