method: ['Preheat the oven to 200o C.', 'Mix together mustard paste, vinegar, salt, crushed black pepper and fresh oregano in a bowl and mix well. Add chicken cubes and mix and set aside to marinate.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick wok, add the marinated chicken and sear well. Add mushrooms and salt, mix well and cook for 5 minutes.', 'Add white sauce and milk and mix well. Add rice and toss well.', 'Put chicken rice in an ovenproof glass tiffin, add blanched spinach and mix well.', 'Spread the breadcrumbs and parmesan cheese powder on top. Keep the tiffin in the preheated oven and bake for 10-15 minutes.', 'Remove it from the oven and let it cool. Cover the tiffin.']

title: Biryani Arancini
method: ['Take leftover chicken biryani in a bowl, remove chicken pieces from biryani in a separate bowl. Shred the chicken meat and discard the bones.', 'Add the shredded chicken back to the biryani, add fried onions and mint leaves, mix and mash it well.', 'Divide the mixture into equal portions. Flatten each portion on hour palm and make a cavity in the centre, place 1 mozzarella cheese cube in it and shape them into balls.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a wok.', 'Take eggs in a bowl, add salt and beat it well. Spread the panko breadcrumbs on a plate. Dip each balls in egg mixture and roll in the breadcrumbs and place them on another plate.', 'Slide in the prepared balls into hot oil and deep-fry till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Place the fried balls on soup spoons, pipe out garlic mayo on top, garnish with micro greens and serve hot.']

title: Seviyaan
method: ['Boil 2 cups water in a deep non-stick. Add salt, oil and rice flour and mix well for a minute. Cover and cook for 5 minutes on low heat.', 'Transfer the mixture onto a parat and mash it with the back of the ladle till it cools down a bit and then knead it with your hand till it becomes pliable.', 'Grease a chakli press fitted with sev attachment. Shape the mixture into a thick long cylinder and stuff it in the chakli press.', 'Heat sufficient water in a deep non-stick pan, place a banana leaf lined steamer in it and grease the leaf with oil. Pipe out the mixture in roundels on the banana leaf, cover and steam for 5-10 minutes. Make more similarly.', 'Keep each seviyaan roundel on a serving plate, sprinkle jaggery powder over it and serve warm with coconut and jaggery milk.']

title: Bhein Aloo
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick wok, add cumin seeds and let them change colour. Add onions and saute till golden.', 'Add ginger-garlic paste, mix well and saute for a minute. Add tomatoes and mix well. Add salt, mix well, cover and cook for 4-5 minutes or till pulpy.', 'Add red chilli powder, coriander powder, turmeric powder and garam masala powder and mix well.', 'Add dried fenugreek leaves powder,  1/2  cup water and mix well. Add lotus stem and potatoes and mix well. Add coriander leaves, mix and cook for a minute. Take the pan off the heat.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with a coriander sprig and serve hot with rotis, pickles and green chillies.']

title: Tofu Chilli Garlic
method: ['Heat olive oil in a non-stick pan, add mixed capsicums and saute for 2-3 minutes. Drain them on a plate.', 'Add yellow and green zucchini to the oil remaining in the same pan and saute for 2-3 minutes.', "Roughly chop spring onions and bird's eye chillies. Add spring onions and garlic to the same pan and saute well.", 'Add red chilli sauce and soy sauce and mix well.', "Cut tofu into 1 inch cubes and add to the pan. Add bird's eye chillies and toss the mixture well.", 'Add red chilli flakes and cornflour slurry, mix well and add the sauteed capsicums. Toss gently and take the pan off the heat.', 'Transfer into a serving dish and serve hot.']

title: Capsicum and Pudina Chutney
method: ['Put capsicum in a grinder jar, add mint leaves, green chillies and peanuts and grindto a coarse paste.', 'Add cumin seeds, turmeric powder, lemon juice, sugar, salt and 1 tablespoon water and grind once again to a smooth paste.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve as required.']

title: Cucumber and Kokum Ice Candy
method: ['Put cucumber slices, mint leaves and sugar syrup into smooth mixture. Transfer in a jar. Add kokum syrup and mix well.', 'Pour the cucumber-kokum mixture into individual popsicle moulds, cover and freeze for 5-6 hours or till set.', 'Demould and serve immediately.']

title: Aloo Chaat
method: ['Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Meanwhile, finely chop the onion. Slide the potato wedges into the hot oil and deep-fry the potato wedges in the hot oil.', 'While the potatoes are frying, finely chop green chilli, fresh coriander leaves, and cut ginger into thin strips. Finely chop mint leaves. Halve the lemon', 'When the potatoes turn golden and crisp, drain them on absorbent paper.', 'Transfer the potatoes into a mixing bowl, add onion, green chilli, coriander leaves, mint leaves, roasted cumin powder, black salt, salt, chaat masala, yellow chilli powder, green chutney, sweet date and tamarind chutney, ginger strips, and squeeze the juice of  1/2  and mix well.', 'Add pomegranate peals and sev, mix well and transfer into a serving bowl. Garnish with pomegranate pearls, sev and a mint sprig and serve immediately.']

title: Chicken Shawarma
method: ['Preheat the oven to 180deg C.', 'Take chicken breast in a bowl, add salt, ginger-garlic paste, cumin powder, coriander powder, red chilli powder, chaat masala, lemon juice and oil and mix together well.', 'Place the chicken on a baking tray, keep the try in the preheated oven and roast till the chicken is done.', 'Take the tray out of the oven, place the chicken breast on a chopping board and slice thinly.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa, place each pita bread on it and let them get heated through.', 'Keep each pita bread on the chopping board, spread 1 tbsp mayonnaise and 1 tsp schezwan sauce and spread evenly all over the pita bread.', 'Spread some chicken mixture over this and top with some pickled beetroot and pickled cucumber strips.', 'Drizzle some mint mayonnaise over them and roll the pita bread. Wrap the rolls in aluminium foil, place them on a serving platter and serve immediately.']

title: Raw Banana and Sweet Potato Pav Bhaji
method: ['Heat ghee in a non-stick pan. Add cumin seeds and saute till the seeds change colour.', 'Add ginger and saute well. Add tomatoes, mix well and cook for 2-3 minutes. Add Tata Sampann Pav Bhaji Masala, mix well and saute for a minute.', 'Add tomato puree and mix well. Add raw bananas, sweet potatoes, salt and mix well.', 'Add 2 1/2  cups water, stir, cover and cook for 5-6 minutes. Add capsicum, 2 tablespoons butter, lemon juice and mix. Add coriander leaves and mix well.', 'Transfer in a serving bowl. Top with a dollop of butter, garnish with coriander sprig and serve hot with pav.']

title: Green Rice
method: ['Heat the oil in a deep non-stick pan. Add the garlic and cumin seeds and saute for a minute. Add the spinach, capsicums and green peas and continue to saute. Add the green chillies and saute for a minute. Add the onions.', 'Mix well and cook for another minute. Add the rice and salt. Toss well. Add the lemon juice and mix gently.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Kadai Gosht Hussainee
method: ['Place mutton in a bowl, add yogurt, salt, red chilli powder and mix. Add kasuri methi and mix. Keep the bowl in a refrigerator to marinate for 1 hour.Heat 4 tbsps oil in a deep non stick pan. Slice 2 onions and add. Cut ginger into thin strips and roughly chop garlic and add both to the pan and saute till lightly browned. Crush together coriander seeds, cumin seeds, red chillies and mustard seeds. Chop the remaining onion along with capsicum and tomato into  1/2  inch pieces.', 'Add the ground spices to the sauteing onions and mix. Add mutton and mix and saute on high heat for 4-5 minutes. Heat 2 tbsps oil in another non stick pan, add onion and capsicum and saute for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add almond paste and 1 cup water to the mutton and mix. Cover and cook on medium heat. Add tomato to sauteing onion-capsicum, mix and saute for a couple of minutes. Add garam masala powder to the mutton, mix, cover and cook till the mutton is completely cooked. Garnish with the sauteed onion-capsicum-tomato and serve hot.']

title: Masala Oats Crusted Chicken Nuggets
method: ['Take chicken cubes in a bowl. Add salt, 1 tsp pepper powder, green chillies and lemongrass. Mix well. Add ginger-garlic paste, 1 tsp soya sauce and oyster sauce and mix well. Set aside to marinate for 15-20 minutes.', 'Cut cucumber into flower shape slices and place in a bowl of cold water. Deseed bell pepper, cut into thin juliennes and place in same bowl. Finely slice spring onion with greens into thin juliennes and put in the same bowl. Mix.', 'Shred basil leaves and add in the same bowl. Mix again.', 'Spread Saffola Classic Masala Oats on a plate. Evenly coat the marinated chicken cubes in it.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Deep-fry chicken cubes till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Transfer the vegetables from the water to another bowl. Add remaining soya sauce, lemon juice, salt, remaining pepper powder and roasted peanuts. Toss gently.', 'Place the prepared salad on a serving dish and put the fried chicken cubes along it. Drizzle sweet chilli sauce on top and serve immediately.']

title: Kaju Aur Moti Pulao
method: ['Boil basmati rice in four cups of water in a saucepan for fifteen to twenty minutes. Once the rice is cooked drain out the water.', 'Make peanut sized balls from paneer and wrap them in silver warq and keep aside. Heat ghee in the kadai and deep-fry the cashewnuts.', 'Drain onto an absorbent paper and keep aside.', 'Heat three tablespoons of ghee in a kadai, add cumin seeds, black cardamoms, cloves, peppercorns and turmeric.', 'Saute for a minute, add rice and salt. Stir, cover and cook till the rice is heated through. Add fried cashewnuts and paneer pearls. Mix lightly.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Achari Gobhi
method: ['Chop onions. Heat mustard oil in a non-stick pan up to its smoking point. Cool slightly. Meanwhile, separate the cauliflower into big florets.', 'Heat oil again, add mustard seeds, cumin seeds, fenugreek seeds, fennel seeds, crushed cumin seeds, onion seeds and asafoetida and saute till the seeds splutter.', 'Add onion and saute till translucent. Add cauliflower florets, turmeric powder and salt. Chop green chillies and add. Sprinkle some water and toss to mix well.', 'Cover and cook on medium heat for a minute. Add ginger paste, garlic paste and yogurt. Mix well. Cover and cook till the cauliflower is done.', 'Serve hot, garnished with coriander sprigs.']

title: Peanut Chicken
method: ['Quarter onions and chop them in a chopper.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add curry leaves and onions, mix and saute till onions soften.', 'Crush garlic cloves into the pan, mix and saute for 1 minute. Add 2 tbsps water so that the mixture does not burn. Continue to saute till onions are lightly browned.', 'Add chicken and mix. Add turmeric powder, cumin powder, red chilli powder and green chillies, mix well and saute for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add peanut butter and coconut milk and mix well and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Cut each tomato into 12 pieces and add to the pan. Add salt, mix well and cook till tomatoes soften and chicken gets cooked.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot.']

title: Instant Coconut Laddoo
method: ['Heat a non-stick pan and roast the desiccated coconut on a low flame for two to three minutes.', 'Add condensed milk, dry fruits, and green cardamom powder and mix well.', 'Turn off the flame and let the mixture cool slightly, till it can be handled by hand.', 'Shape into laddoos, cool and serve.']

title: Bacon Wrapped Prawns
ingredients: ['8 medium prawns, shelled and deveined', '8 bacon rashers', '2 tablespoons Schezwan chutney', 'Juice of 1 lemon', '16 green garlic stalks only', 'A sprig of fresh parsley']
method: ['Put Schezwan chutney in a bowl, add prawns and mix well.  Add juice of  1/2  lemon and mix.', 'Place bacon rashers on the table top. Keep 2 stalks of green garlic on each rasher. Keep a prawn at one end of each rasher and roll tightly and secure with a toothpick.', 'Heat a non-stick pan, place the bacon wrapped prawns in it and cook on medium to high heat, rotating frequently for even cooking, till the prawns are just done.', 'Take care not to overcook them.', 'Sprinkle juice of  1/2  lemon and switch off the heat.', 'Remove the toothpicks, arrange them on a serving plate and serve hot garnished with a sprig of fresh parsley.']

title: Choco Chip Cookies
method: ['Preheat oven at 180oC. Line a baking tray with a silicon sheet.', 'Cream together butter and castor sugar in a bowl till light and fluffy.', 'Add eggs, one by one, and whisk till well combined. Add vanilla essence and whisk well.', 'Mix together flour and baking powder and add this to the butter mixture. Fold well.', 'Add chocolate chips and mix well.', 'Divide the mixture into equal portions and place them on the silicon sheet. Put the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes.', 'Remove from heat, cool and serve.']

title: Habanero and Sea Salt Chocolate Sparkles
method: ['In a bowl mix double cream and habanero chili powder and heat it in microwave for forty five seconds. Add white chocolate to the mixture and mix well. Allow it to cool.', 'In another bowl mix dark chocolate and heat it in a microwave for forty to forty five seconds or till the chocolate melts. Add oil and mix well keep aside.', 'In a piping bag pour the white chocolate mixture (ganache) and pipe it inside the straw sticks. Pierce in bread stick in each of the straw and freeze the sticks for ten minutes.', 'Dip the straw portion of the stick in lukewarm water for two-three seconds and remove the straw caps from the sticks. Freeze the sticks again for five minutes.', 'Pour the coloured sugar in shot glasses till top and keep them aside', 'Dip the sticks in dark chocolate and sprinkle chocolate sparkles or sea salt over them.', 'Place them in shot glasses and serve chilled.']

title: Luchi - SK Khazana
method: ['Mix together flour, salt and baking powder in a bowl, add sufficient water and knead into a semi-stiff dough.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Divide dough into equal portions and roll out into small puris or luchis.', 'Gently slide in the luchis into hot oil and deep-fry till puffed up and light golden. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Arrange them on a serving platter and serve hot with cholar dal.']

title: Goan Chicken Patties
method: ['Take chicken mince in a large mixing bowl, add carrot, potato, ginger-garlic paste, coriander leaves, red chilli powder, coriander powder, chaat masala, turmeric powder, green chillies and breadcrumbs. Break, 1 egg and add along with vinegar and mix well.', 'Break the remaining 2 eggs into a bowl and beat. Spread semolina on a plate.', 'Divide the mixture into equal portions and shape them into patties. Dip in beaten eggs and coat in semolina and place them on a plate', 'Heat some oil in a non-stick pan, place the patties in it and shallow-fry on medium heat, turning sides till the chicken is cooked and the patties evenly golden brown on both sides. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Arrange the patties on a serving plate and serve hot with tomato ketchup.']

title: Neer Dosa
method: ['Wash and soak rice in four cups of water overnight. Drain and grind to a fine paste along with scraped coconut using a little water. Add salt and enough water to get milk like consistency. Heat a non-stick pan/dosa tawa and pour just enough oil to grease it.', 'Sprinkle some water and wipe clean pan/tawa with a muslin cloth. Stir and pour a ladle full of batter, taking care that it spreads in a thin, even layer. Cover and cook in its own steam for two minutes. Remove carefully, fold into a triangle and serve immediately']

title: Asparagus Fish
method: ['Preheat oven to 170degC. Heat some water in a deep non-stick pan, add a little salt and blanch the asparagus sticks in it. Mix 2 tbsps orange juice, lemon juice, 2-3 tarragon sprigs and salt in a bowl. Add the fish fillets and let them marinate for a while.', 'Apply a little butter to butter paper pieces. Cut orange into thin slices. Place a fish fillet on each butter paper, arrange some orange slices on it and place another fillet over it.', 'Place some tarragon sprigs, asparagus, a little butter and sprinkle sea salt and fold the butter paper to make a parcel. Place the parcels on a baking tray and cook in the preheated oven for 15 minutes.', 'Heat remaining orange juice in a non-stick pan, add orange zest and lemon zest and cook on medium heat till it thickens slightly. Remove fish from oven and open the parcels.', 'Place fish on a serving platter, drizzle a little butter, a little orange sauce, garnish with a tarragon sprig and a few orange slices and serve hot.']

title: Maple Walnut Cookies - SK Khazana
method: ['Preheat oven to 180o C. Lightly grease a baking tray.', 'Take butter in a mixing bowl and beat with a hand blender till light. Add brown sugar and cream till fluffy.', 'Add maple syrup and beat well.', 'Sieve in refined flour and cornflour together into the butter mixture. Add walnuts and fold in with a spatula.', 'Shape into round cookies and place them at equal distance on the prepared baking tray. Keep the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 12-15 minutes.', 'Bring the tray out of the oven and cool. Arrange them on a serving platter and serve.']

title: Cheesy Macaroni
method: ['Preheat an oven to 200oC/400oF.', 'Heat 2 tbsps butter in a deep non-stick pan, add 2 tbsps olive oil. Add flour and saute lightly, making sure that it does not change colour.', 'Gradually add milk, stirring continuously, so that no lumps are formed.', 'Add salt and white pepper powder and mix well. Add half the grated cheese and continue to stir. Add the macaroni and mix well.', 'Transfer the mixture into a seven-inch square baking dish. Sprinkle breadcrumbs over the top and dot with the remaining butter. Sprinkle the remaining cheese and crushed peppercorns. Bake till the cheese melts and turns golden. Serve hot.']

title: Pav Bhaji Dosa
method: ['To prepare pav bhaji, heat oil and  1/2  tablespoon butter in a non-stick pan. Add onion and saute till translucent. Add ginger-garlic paste and saute for 30 seconds.', 'Add red chilli paste and saute for 30 seconds. Add tomatoes and saute for 1 minute. Add salt and saute till tomatoes turn soft and pulpy.', 'Add cauliflower florets, capsicum, green peas and potatoes, mix and cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add  1/2  cup water, mix and cook for 1-2 minutes. Add pav bhaji masala, salt and  1/4  cup water, mix and cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Mash the mixture and cook for 1-2 minutes. Add coriander leaves and mix well. Transfer in a bowl.', 'To prepare one pav bhaji dosa, heat a non-stick tawa.', 'Put batter in a bowl. Add salt and mix well.', 'Pour a ladleful of batter on hot tawa, spread to make a large thin disc and cook for 1 minute.', 'Spread some butter on top and the sides and cook till golden brown from downside. Spread some pav bhaji, grate some processed cheese and fold the dosa.', 'Serve hot with coriander coconut chutney.']

title: Mango and Crumbled Cheese Salad
method: ['Slice jalapenos and blend with lemon juice, salt and oil till smooth.', 'Tear romaine lettuce and add to the bowl, add Pico de Gallo, green and black olives, jalapenos, mangoes and dressing reserving some. Mix well.', 'Garnish with feta cheese, drizzle reserved dressing and serve immediately.']

title: Til Aur Kadi Patta Rice
ingredients: ['3 cups Cooked rice', '2 tablespoons White sesame seeds roasted', '2 tablespoons black sesame seeds (kale til) roasted', '1/2 cup Curry leaves', '2 medium Onions', '2 tablespoons Oil', '2 teaspoons Ghee', '1/4 teaspoon Asafoetida', '1/2 teaspoon Mustard seeds', '1 teaspoon Split Bengal gram (chana dal)', '3 Green chillies', '1/4 teaspoon Turmeric powder', 'Salt to taste', '2 teaspoons Lemon juice', '1/2 teaspoon Crushed black peppercorns']
method: ['Chop onions. Roughly chop most of the curry leaves. Heat oil in a non stick pan, add 1 tsp ghee and let it melt. Add asafoetida, mustard seeds and split Bengal gram and saute till gram is lightly browned. Add onions and saute till onions are golden.', 'Add remaining whole curry leaves and the chopped curry eaves and continue to saute for 2 minutes.Chop green chillies and add and mix. Add turmeric powder and rice and toss lightly.', 'Sprinkle  1/4  cup water and mix. Add salt, white and black sesame seeds and mix well.Add lemon juice and crushed black peppercorns and mix. Finally add remaining ghee and mix. Serve hot.']

title: Mutton Korma Pot Pie - SK Khazana
method:
['Heat a non-stick shallow pan, add desiccated coconut and dry roast on medium heat till golden brown. Transfer into a blender jar and set aside.', 'Place the same pan back on heat, add white sesame seeds, poppy seeds, fennel seeds and cashewnuts and dry roast on medium heat till fragrant. Transfer the roasted mixture into the same blender jar and allow to cool slightly.', 'Heat ghee in a pressure cooker, add green cardamoms, cloves, black peppercorns, bay leaf and cinnamon, mix and saute till fragrant.
Add onions, mix and saute till they turn golden brown .', 'Meanwhile, add a little water to the roasted mixture in the blender jar and blend to a fine paste.', 'Add ginger-garlic paste and green chilli paste to the onion mixture and saute till the raw smells disappears.', 'Add mutton and saute on high heat for 4-5 minutes. Add tomatoes and mix. Add yogurt, mix and saute well. Add the ground paste, mix and saute till the fat separates.
Add red chilli powder and meat masala and salt, mix well.', 'Put fried onions into a blender jar and blend to a coarse mixture. Add this to the mutton mixture and mix well.', 'Add potatoes and , mix well. Add 1 1/2  cups water, mix and cover the cooker. Cook under pressure till 3-4 whistles are released.', 'Allow the pressure to be released completely. Open the lid and place it back on heat and cook till the mixture thickens.', 'Preheat the oven to 180deg C.', 'Dust refined flour on the worktop, place the puff pastry dough on it and roll it into a thick sheet big enough to fit on the top of the baking dish.', 'Transfer the korma into a deep baking dish, place the puff pastry dough on top and press the edges. Trim and discard the extra dough hanging from the rim of the dish.', 'Press the edges with a fork to seal and and make a design. Brush egg wash on top and sprinkle a little kalonji.', 'Place the dish in the preheated oven and bake for 10-15 minutes.
Take it out of the oven and serve hot.']

title: Eggwhite and Vegetable Omelette Sandwich
method: ['Separate egg whites from the yolks', 'Add salt and crushed black pepper and whisk well.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add sliced mushrooms and salt and cook on high heat till the mushrooms are soft.', 'Add sweet corn kernels and green capsicum and toss.', 'Add the egg mixture.', 'Cover and cook on low heat for 1-2 minutes or till the underside is cooked.', 'To assemble the sandwich place a lettuce leaf on a slice of bread, place a portion of the omelette on top and cover with another slice of bread.', 'Serve.']

title: Kurkure Mushrooms-SK Khazana
method: ['Mix together gruyere cheese, spring onions, red chillies, crushed peppercorns, parsley and salt in a bowl.', 'Stuff this mixture into mushrooms. Dip them in the refined flour slurry and coat with panko. Repeat the process.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Deep-fry stuffed mushrooms till golden brown and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot with tomato ketchup.']

title: Kabuli Chana Pulao
method: ['Heat 3 tbsps ghee in a non-stick pan and add cumin seeds. When their colour changes, add garlic and saute till it turns golden.', 'Add green chillies and ginger and saute on medium heat for 1 minute. Add onions and saute till translucent. Add tomatoes and cook till soft and mushy.', 'Add red chilli powder, turmeric powder, coriander powder and garam masala powder and cook on medium heat for 1 minute.', 'Add chickpeas, salt and 2 cups cooking liquor and mix well. Add coriander leaves and mint leaves and cook for 5-7 minutes.', 'Add rice, remaining ghee and lemon juice and mix well. Cook for 4-5 minutes on medium heat.', 'Transfer into a serving platter and serve hot.']

title: Coconut and Lime Ice Cream
method: ['Put vanilla ice cream cubes, coconut, coconut milk powder and honey in a blender jar. Grate zest of  1/2  lemon into the jar, cover it and blend till smooth.', 'Transfer into an air-tight container, cover and freeze for 4-5 hours or till set.', 'Scoop out ice cream and put into individual stemmed bowl. Grate some lemon zest on top of the ice cream scoops and serve immediately garnished with mint sprig.']

title: Chocolate Popcorn
Main ingredients: Dark chocolate, Oil, Corn kernels, Butter

title: Chocolate Peanut Butter Banana Bread
method: ['Preheat oven to180degC. Line a large loaf tin with parchment paper.', 'Put peanut butter, sugar, mashed bananas, olive oil and eggs in a bowl and mix well. Add cocoa powder, baking powder, baking soda, salt and vanilla essence and mix.', 'Add flour and fold in lightly till well combined into a batter.', 'Pour batter into the prepared tin and tap lightly. Put the tin in the preheated oven and bake for fifty-five minutes. Remove from oven and cool.', 'Slice the bread, top them with banana slices and serve.']

title: Tofu Salad
method: ['To make marinade, quarter lemon and discard pips. Squeeze the lemon juice in a bowl. Add soya sauce, tamarind pulp, salt, ginger, red chilli sauce, tomato ketchup, crushed garlic cloves and mix well. Chop coriander stems and add. Mix well.', 'Cut tofu into triangles and add to marinade. Mix gently and set aside for 10 minutes.', 'Heat little oil in a non-stick grill pan. Place marinated tofu triangles on it and grill, applying some leftover marinade on them, till evenly golden from both the sides.', 'Crush peanuts and add in the leftover marinade alongwith torn Lollo rosso leaves and rocket leaves and toss to mix. Add 1 tbsp sweet chilli sauce and mix well.', 'Place the prepared marinade salad on a serving plate and put grilled tofu on it. garnish with a swirl of sweet chilli sauce and serve immediately.']

title: Samosa Rolls
method: ['Put flour, ghee, salt and carom seeds in a bowl, add sufficient water and knead into a stiff dough. Cover and set aside for fifteen minutes.', 'Crush coriander seeds and fennel seeds lightly with a rolling pin and put into a bowl.', 'To make the stuffing, heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add cumin seeds and saute till they change colour. Add ginger and green chillies and saute for a minute.', 'Add potatoes and green peas, mix well and cook on low heat for two to three minutes.', 'Add red chilli powder, turmeric powder, chaat masala, salt, crushed spices and garam masala powder. Mix well and cook for two to three minutes. Switch off heat and add lemon juice. Mix again and set aside to cool for ten to fifteen minutes.', 'Divide the dough into two equal portions and shape them into balls. Apply oil to each ball and roll out into thick chapatti. Spread a portion of the stuffing evenly and roll.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai.', 'Cut the prepared rolls into thick slices and press lightly.', 'Mix cornflour with a little water to make thin slurry.', 'Dip the roll slices in the cornflour slurry and deep-fry in hot oil till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Arrange on a serving plate and serve hot with your choice of chutney or sauce.']

title: Soya Parantha - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat ghee in non-stick pan, add green chillies, ginger, garlic and onion saute till onion get translucent.', 'Add turmeric powder, red chilli powder, garam masala powder, coriander powder and  1/2  cup water and mix well.', 'Add salt, soya mince and saute for 2-3 minutes or till the mixture dries up.', 'Switch off the heat, drizzle some lemon juice, mix well and set aside to cool.', 'Divide the dough into equal portion and shape them into balls, shape each ball into a small katori, place some of the soya mixture in it, gather the edges and press to seal.', 'Dust the worktop with some dry flour, and roll out each stuffed ball into a parantha.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa, place a parantha on it and cook for a minute. Turn it over, drizzle a little ghee all around, turn it over again and drizzle some more ghee again and cook, turning sides till evenly golden on both sides.', 'Serve hot with yogurt and pickle.']

title: Cornmeal Crust Pizza
method: ['Heat cooked polenta in a non-stick pan. Add vegetable stock, mix and cook for a minute. Add salt, crushed peppercorns and torn fresh oregano, mix and cook till it thickens. Add 1 tablespoon parmesan cheese, mix and switch off heat. Set aside to cool.', 'Preheat oven at 180oC. Grease a baking tin with some olive oil.', 'Pour some polenta mixture into greased tin and spread evenly. Keep aside till it sets.', 'Put the baking tin on a baking tray. Place the baking tray in preheated oven and bake for 20-25 minutes.', 'Demould and spread some pizza sauce over the baked crust. Top with some crumbled cheese cubes, baby corn, mushrooms, shimeji mushrooms, cherry tomatoes, torn basil leaves and some more crumbled cheese. Sprinkle some crushed peppercorns, salt and remaining parmesan cheese.', 'Put the prepared pizza on a baking tray. Place the baking tray in preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Punjabi Chicken
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add garlic and ginger, mix well and saute till raw smells disappear.', 'Add green chillies and onion, mix well and saute for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add salt, turmeric powder and red chilli powder, mix well and saute for 1 minute. Add tomato, mix well and saute till the tomato turn soft and pulpy.', 'Add chicken, mix and cook for 3-4 minutes. Add 1 cup water, mix, cover and cook for 10-12 minutes.', 'Add Punjabi garam masala powder and coriander leaves, mix well and cook for 1 minute.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with coriander sprigs and serve hot.']

title: Dahi Batata Puri
method: ['Add salt and sugar to yogurt and whisk till well mixed. Keep it in the refrigerator till use.', 'Mix boiled potatoes, sprouted moong, salt, half teaspoon of red chilli powder, chaat masala.', 'Put the yogurt in a muslin cloth kept over a bowl. Gather the edges and squeeze tight to get a smooth mixture.', 'Break the puris a little on one side, fill it up with the potato filling, dip them in the yogurt and place them on a plate.', 'Alternatively you can also keep the puris on the plate and then pour the yogurt over leaving aside some for topping at the end.', 'Put green chutney, sweet tamarind chutney, sev, remaining red chilli powder, roasted cumin powder, coriander leaves, pomegranate pearls over the puris and finally dribble the remaining yogurt on top.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Aloo Bharta
ingredients: ['3 medium potatoes, boiled and peeled', '1 1/2 tablespoons oil', '1 teaspoon cumin seeds', '1/2 tablespoon chopped garlic', '1 1/2 teaspoons chopped ginger', '1-2 green chillies, chopped', '3-4 Spring onions with greens, chopped', '1/4 teaspoon turmeric powder', '1/2 teaspoon red chilli powder', '1 1/2 teaspoons kitchen king masala', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh coriander leaves', 'Salt to taste', '1/2 teaspoon dried mango powder', 'Chopped spring onion greens for garnish']
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add cumin seeds and allow them to change colour.', 'Add garlic, ginger, green chillies and spring onions, mix well and saute for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add turmeric powder, red chilli powder and Kitchen King Masala, mix well and saute for 1-2 minutes.', 'Grate the potatoes and add to the pan. Add  1/2  cup water and mix well. Cook for 1 minute.', 'Add coriander leaves, salt and dried mango powder, mix well and cook for 1 minute. Take it off the heat.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with spring onion greens and serve hot.']

title: Green Tea
method: ['Set the temperature of the kettle at 80o C and heat 1 1/2  cups water in it.', 'Put dried green tea leaves in the strainer and place it in a glass kettle. Pour some of the hot water in it and mix well. Discard the water. Pour remaining hot water in it and set aside for 2-3 minutes till the flavor infuses.', 'Pour the green tea equally into 4 cups and serve hot.']

title: Braised Dakshin Style Chicken
method: ['Place chicken breasts on a plate. Add salt, crushed peppercorns and lemon juice, mix well and set aside.', 'Mix together 1 tablespoon ginger-garlic-green chilli paste, turmeric powder, 1 teaspoon chilli powder and curry leaves in a bowl. Add rice flour and mix. Add the chicken breasts and mix well. Set aside for 10-15 minutes to marinate.', 'Heat coconut oil in a non-stick pan. Add marinated chicken and cook for 2 minutes on each side. Drain and set aside on a plate.', 'Add mustard seeds and dried red chillies to the oil remaining in the same pan and let the seeds splutter. Add curry leaves and asafoetida and mix.', 'Add remaining ginger-garlic-green chilli paste and onions, mix and saute till onions turn translucent.', 'Add salt and remaining chilli powder, mix and saute for 15 seconds.', 'Add the chicken and mix well. Drizzle some water, cover and cook on low heat till fully done.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Chilli Garlic Spaghetti
ingredients: ['3 cups boiled spaghetti', '15-18 garlic cloves, sliced', '2-3 fresh red chillies, sliced', '3 tbsps extra virgin olive oil', ' 1/4  cup vegetable stock', 'Salt to taste', '4 tbsps freshly chopped flat parsley + garnish', '4 tbsps parmesan cheese powder + garnish']
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add garlic cloves, and saute for a few seconds. Add red chilli and saute for a few more seconds.', 'Add 4-5 tbsps vegetable stock , salt and boiled spaghetti, toss well. Add remaining vegetable stock, mix well and cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add chopped parsley, parmesan cheese powder, and mix well.', 'Garnish with parmesan cheese and chopped parsley, serve hot.']

title: Quick Chicken Pulao
method: ['Take the rice in a bowl, wash it thoroughly and soak in water for 15-20 minutes. And then drain.', 'Slice the onions. Halve the onions vertically and further cut into  1/2  inch cubes.', 'Heat ghee in a deep non-stick pan, add cloves, green cardamoms, black peppercorns, torn bay leaf and cumin seeds, mix and saute till fragrant.', 'Add onions, mix and saute on high heat for 2-3 minutes. Add ginger-garlic paste and yogurt, mix well and saute on high heat for 1 minute.', 'Add chicken, rice, garam masala powder, salt and powdered chicken stock cube and mix well.', 'Add 2 1/2  cups water, mix, cover and cook for 8-9 minutes or till both rice and chicken are done.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with a coriander sprig and serve hot with chilled yogurt.']

title: Veggie Enchiladas
method: ['Heat oil in a pan. Add onions and saute.', 'Add garlic and green capsicum and cook till the onions are softened.', 'Add baked beans, red chilli flakes and mixed dried herbs and mix and cook till almost dry.', 'Preheat the oven to 200degC.', 'To make the sauce, saute garlic in one tablespoon olive oil.', 'Add pureed tomatoes, sugar, red chilli flakes, oregano and half the mozzarella cheese and cook till the mixture reaches a sauce consistency.', 'Place a tortilla on the work top, spread some of the filling in the centre and top with paneer.', 'Roll the tortilla.Place it in a baking dish.', 'Similarly make more rolls and place in the dish.', 'Drizzle the tomato sauce over.', 'Grate mozzarella cheese on top.', 'Place the dish in the preheated oven and bake till the cheese melts.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Chicken Mushroom Dumplings
method: ['Put mushrooms, chicken mince, 1 tablespoon garlic, mint leaves, 1 teaspoon coriander leaves, 3-4 torn basil leaves, salt and  1/4  teaspoon pepper powder in a blender jar and blend to a smooth mixture.', 'Add egg yolk and blend again. Transfer mixture into a bowl.', 'Heat sufficient water in a steamer and grease the steamer plate with butter.', 'Divide mushroom mixture into equal portions and shape them into small balls or dumplings. Coat one side of the dumplings in the soaked rice and place on the steamer plate. Cover and steam for 10-12 minutes.', 'To make sauce, Put yogurt, 1 tablespoon butter, 1 teaspoon garlic, 1 teaspoon coriander leaves, remaining pepper powder, salt, remaining torn basil leaves and lemon juice in a blender jar and blend well. Transfer into a serving bowl.', 'Place lots of onion rings on one side of a serving dish and put the bowl with the sauce on another side. Place the dumplings over the onion rings and serve immediately.']

title: Cold Lemon Souffle
method: ['Take 6 tablespoons warm water in bowl, add gelatine little by little and set aside.', 'Take castor sugar in a big bowl, add egg yolks and mix. Add vanilla essence and mix. Boil water in a deep pan, keep the bowl over it and beat with an electric beater till the mixture is well blended and turns fluffy.', 'Add lemon rind, lemon juice and the melted gelatine ton the egg yolk mixture and mix well.', 'Add some whipped cream and fold in well. Add the remaining whipped cream and once again fold in to a smooth paste.', 'Line the rims of ramekin moulds with butter paper and fill them up with the mixture.', 'Refrigerate overnight. Take them out of the refrigerator and remove the butter paper and serve chilled immediately.']

title: Kesar Murgh
method: ['Heat olive oil in a deep non stick pan. Add bay leaves, green cardamom, cloves, ginger-garlic paste and saute for 1 minute. Add onion paste and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add coriander powder, white pepper powder, red chilli powder, mix well and saute for 1 minute. Add cashewnut paste and yogurt and mix well.', 'Add chicken and salt mix well. Cover and cook on low heat till the chicken is almost done.', 'Add saffron milk and mix. Cover and cook till chicken is completely cooked. Transfer into a serving bowl.', 'Garnish with fresh cream, halved cashewnuts and raisins and serve hot.']

title: Crisp Prawn Toast With Cucumber, Chilli And Sesame
method: ["Combine prawns, 1 stalk chopped spring onion greens, garlic, ginger and 2 finely chopped bird's eye chillies. Roughly chop all these together into a coarse mince.", 'Add soya sauce and 1 tsp fish sauce and mix well.', 'Toast bread slices in a toaster till lightly browned.', 'Finely chop 5-6 basil leaves and add to prawns mixture alongwith remaining chopped spring onion greens stalk and mix well.', 'Add egg white and mix well. Spread generous spoonful of prawns mixture on each toasted bread slice.', 'Heat oil in anon-stick pan. Place bread slices prawn mixture side down and shallow-fry till evenly done from both the sides and the prawn is cooked.', "Slice cucumber and place in a bowl. Add remaining finely chopped bird's eye chilli, 1 tsp chopped spring onion greens, remaining shredded basil leaves, sesame seeds, sea salt, pepper powder, remaining fish sauce, lemon juice and Lollo rosso leaves. Toss t", 'Remove prawn toasts from heat, discard the edges and cut into fingers.', 'Place fingers along the salad and serve immediately.']

title: Coconut Khara Kozhambu
method: ['Slit brinjals into four without cutting through and keeping the stem intact. Heat two tablespoons til oil in a non-stick kadai. Ad the brinjals and sambhar onions and saute till lightly browned. Add a little salt, cover and cook. Heat two tablespoons oil in a non-stick pan.', 'Add chana dal, red chillies, coriander seeds, green cardamoms, cloves, cinnamon, poppy seeds and saute till fragrant. Add coconut and saute till the coconut is lightly browned. Cool and grind to a smooth paste. Heat the remaining oil in another non-stick pan.', 'Add asafoetida, mustard seeds, urad dal and saute till the dal is lightly browned. Add curry leaves and onion and saute till fragrant. Add the masala paste and saute for two minutes. Add the brinjals and sambhar onions and salt. Add one cup of water and mix. Add tamarind pulp and mix. Cover and cook for fifteen minutes till the brinjals are cooked. Serve hot.']

title: Rajgire Ka Thepla
method: ['Place ragjira atta in a bowl. Mix in rock salt, ginger, sesame seeds and green chillies.', 'Add mashed potatoes, yogurt, 3 tablespoons of ghee and chopped coriander leaves. Knead into a semi soft dough using water as required. Cover and set dough aside for half an hour.', 'Divide into ten to twelve portions. Roll into balls. Dust with rajgira atta and pat into a diskette on a dusted surface.', 'Heat a tawa. Cook theplas on two sides and shallow fry using ghee as required.', 'Serve hot with yogurt.']

title: Suji and Cocobnut Barfi-Cook Smart
method: ['Cook sugar with 1 cup water in a non-stick pan till the sugar dissolves.', 'Put both coarse and fine semolina in a mixing bowl. Add baking powder and mix well. Add yogurt and mix well.', 'Add ghee and mix well. Add coconut and mix well. Add rose water and mix well. Refrigerate for some time.', 'Preheat oven to 180o C. Grease a barfi tray with ghee.', 'Add lemon juice to sugar syrup, mix well and cook till it thickens. Remove from heat and set aside.', 'Spread the semolina mixture evenly in the greased tray. Smoothen the surface with a spoon dipped in water. Cut into squares, place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 45 minutes or till the top becomes golden brown.', 'Remove tray from the oven. Pour hot sugar syrup on top and let the barfi pieces soak the syrup.', 'Separate the pieces and serve.']

title: Asian Chicken Glass Noodle Salad
method: ['Heat sufficient water in a deep non-stick pan. Place the glass noodles in a bowl, add hot water and let the noodles soak for five to ten minutes.', 'Combine the chicken breasts, salt, half teaspoon crushed peppercorns, garlic and one tablespoon lemon juice in a bowl and mix well. Set aside to marinate for five to ten minutes.', 'Heat oil in another non-stick pan. Add marinated chicken and cook on low heat for four minutes. Flip and cook the other side for four minutes.', 'To make the dressing, combine remaining lemon juice, sugar, salt, soy sauce and remaining crushed peppercorns in a bowl and mix well. Chop the coriander roots and add.', 'Add red chilli and whisk well till sugar dissolves. Slice cooked chicken breasts.', 'Drain the noodles and put into another bowl. Add spring onion bulbs, tomato, carrot, half the bean sprouts, half the spring onion greens, dressing, sliced chicken and toss to mix.', 'Transfer the salad on a serving plate. Garnish with crushed peanuts, remaining bean sprouts, remaining spring onion greens and serve immediately.']

title: Mysore Masala Dosa
method: ['Boil the red chillies in a little water. Roughly chop ginger and garlic and put into a mixer jar. Add chana dal and salt. Add red chillies and grind with a little water to a fine chutney.', 'Whisk the batter well. Heat a non stick dosa tawa, wipe with a damp cloth. Spread a ladle of batter to cover the entire tawa.', 'Spread the chutney over the dosa, sprinkle a little oil and cook on high heat for 2-3 minutes till the underside is golden crisp. Fold into a crescent shape and serve hot. If you wish you can stuff the dosa with potato bhaji.']

title: Fiery Pepper Chicken
method: ['Heat 1 tbsp sesame oil in a non-stick wok, add chicken, salt and crushed black peppercorns, mix and saute on high heat for 2-3 minutes. Transfer into a bowl.', 'Heat remaining sesame oil in the same non-stick pan, add garlic and ginger, mix and saute till the raw flavours disappear.', 'Add dried red chillies and spring onion with greens, mix and saute for 1 minute. Add the chicken, mix well and saute and cook for 2 minutes.', 'Add dark soy sauce, light soy sauce and sugar, mix well and cook for 1 minute.', 'Add cornflour slurry, mix well and cook till the sauce thickens and coats the chicken well. Add vinegar and mix well.', 'Transfer into a serving dish, garnish with spring onion greens and serve hot.']

title: Oats Thalipeeth
method: ['Take oats flour in a bowl. Add carrot, onion, coriander leaves, cumin powder, coriander powder, red chili powder, turmeric powder, garam masala powder, salt and green chillies and mix well.', 'Add 1 cup water, and knead into soft dough.', 'Take a non-stick tawa, add a portion of the dough, dip your fingers in water and spread it into a thick disc. Make a few holes in the center.', 'Place the non-stick tawa on heat and cook for 4-5 minutes on medium heat. Drizzle a little oil. Flip and cook the other side for 2-3 minutes or until golden and crisp.', 'Serve hot with green chutney.']

title: Banarsi Tamatar Chaat
method: ['Mash potatoes and put into a bowl. Add red chilli powder, black pepper powder, garam masala powder, cumin powder, coriander powder and salt and mix well.', 'Scoop out the flesh from 4 tomatoes and reserve the pulp. Stuff the tomatoes with the potato mixture.', 'Heat 4 tbsps ghee in an iron kadai and place the stuffed tomatoes, open end facing down. Cover and cook on low heat, turning sides every 5 minutes till soft.', 'Mash with the back of a spoon till tomatoes and potatoes get properly mixed.', 'Grind the remaining tomato with the scoop out flesh from the 4 tomatoes to make a puree.Heat remaining ghee in a non stick pan, add the puree, sugar, salt and tomato ketchup and cook for 2-3 minutes, ensuring that it does not get too thick.', 'To serve put the tomato-potato mixture in serving bowls, pour the tomato puree over it. garnish with ginger, coriander leaves and crushed namakpara.']

title: Atte ka Halwa
method: ['Heat ghee in a non-stick pan. Add wheat flour, mix and saute for 2-3 minutes, stirring continuously.', 'Add semolina, mix and cook till dark golden brown, stirring continuously. Add sugar, mix and cook till it melts and mixture thickens slightly.', 'Add 4 cups hot water, mix and cook till the mixture thickens, stirring occasionally.', 'Add mixed nuts and cardamom powder and mix well. Remove from heat and cool slightly.', 'Transfer into individual serving bowls and serve at room temperature.']

title: Lemony Creamy Popsicles
method: ['Cut sugarcane into sticks.', 'Combine condensed milk, cream, lemon juice, lime zest and salt in a bowl and whisk till well combined.', 'Pour the mixture into individual popsicle moulds and freeze for  1/2  hour. Insert sugarcane sticks and freeze again for 4-5 hours.', 'Demould the popsicles and freeze again for 30 minutes.', 'Spread crushed biscuits onto a plate. Coat both sides of the popsicles with it and serve immediately.']

title: Stuffed Moong Dal Laddoo
method: ['Put split green gram with skin into a mixer jar, grind into a coarse powder and transfer into a mixing bowl. Coarsely grind cashewnuts and almonds and transfer into another bowl.', 'Melt ghee in a non-stick kadai, add green gram powder and saute for 10-15 minutes or till fragrant. Addcondensed milkand cook,on low heat, stirring continuously,for 5-10 minutes. Add cardamom powder and cashewnut-almond powder, mix well, take the kadai off the heat and set aside to cool.', 'When the mixture cools slightly, add powdered sugar and mix well with your hands.', 'Mix gulkand and dried rose petals in a small bowl.', 'Divide thedal mixture into 16 equal portions and roll into balls. Flatten each ball in your palm, place a portion of gulkand mixture in the centre and shape it back into a ball ensuring that the stuffing is completely enclosed.', 'Serve or store in an airtight container when completely cooled.']

title: Sweet and Sour Cabbage
method: ['Heat 2 tablespoons butter in a non-stick pan. Add onion and saute till it turns soft.', 'Grate apple and put in a bowl.', 'Add cabbage to the pan, mix and cook for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add grated apple and mix well. Add brown sugar and mix well. Add wine and mix well.', 'Add salt, pepper powder and mix well. Add  1/4  cup water,  1/4  cup vinegar, mix well and braise for 20-30 minutes.', 'Switch off heat and add 1 teaspoon butter and splash of vinegar. Mix well.', 'Garnish with a dollop of butter and serve as an accompaniment.']

title: Rawa Cheese Cutlets - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat a non-stick pan, add semolina and dry roast till fragrant. Transfer in a bowl and set aside to cool to room temperature.', 'Heat butter in another non-stick pan, add flour, mixand saute for a few seconds.', 'Add milk and whisk till well combined. Cook till the sauce thickens slightly. .', 'Grate cheese and whisk.Add salt and mixed dried herbs and whisk. Add semolina, mix and cook till the mixture becomes thick and forms a dough. Take it off the heat.', 'Grease a burfi mould with oil, transfer the mixture into it and spread it evenly and level the top. Keep the tray in the refrigerator till set.', 'To make the spice mix, put crushed black peppercorns, onion powder, garlic powder, piripiri powder and sea salt in a mortar and pound into fine powder.', 'Cut the set semolina mixture into equal cutlets.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a non-stick shallow pan, shallow fry the cutlets, turning sides, till golden brown and crisp on both sides. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Sprinkle the spice mix and rub it on both sides till well coated.', 'Arrange them on a serving plate and serve hot with mayonnaise and tomato ketchup.']

title: Ada Pradhaman - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat 2 tablespoons ghee in a deep non-stick pan. Add cashewnuts and raisins and fry till light golden in colour. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Add ada the ghee remaining in the pan and saute till light golden brown in colour. Add 1 cup water and mix. Cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add thin coconut milk and mix well. Cover and cook for 8-10 minutes or till the ada is soft taking care not to mash it.', 'Add jaggery, mix well and continue cooking till the jaggery dissolves and the mixture thickens.', 'Add thick coconut milk and mix. Reserve a few cashewnuts and raisins for garnish and add the rest to the pan. Stir well and heat through without boiling the mixture.', 'Add cardamom powder and mix.', 'Transfer into a serving bowls. Garnish with remaining fried cashewnuts and raisins and serve hot.']

title: Stuffed Croissant
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add onion and garlic and saute. Add a little salt and saute till onion changes colour. Chop sausages.', 'Add tomato puree and sausages to the pan and mix well. Add parsley, salt and crushed black peppercorns and mix again.', 'Slit the croissants without cutting through and make a cavity in the centre. Stuff the croissants with the sausage mixture. Shave parmesan cheese and put over the mixture. Close the croissants.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Corn Bread Roll
method: ['Preheat oven to 180deg C.', 'Mix together corn kernels, potato, onion, green chillies, ginger-garlic paste, lemon juice, coriander leaves and salt in a bowl.', 'Trim the edges of bread slices.', 'Sprinkle some water on each bread slice and lightly flatten between your palms. Put a portion of corn mixture in the center, bring the ends together, press to seal and shape into an oval.', 'Line a baking tray with a silicon mat, place the rolls and brush some oil on top. Put the tray into the preheated oven and bake for 10-15 minutes. Remove from oven.', 'Serve hot topped with some tomato ketchup.']

title: Pineapple Sandesh
method: ['Strain the curdled milk (chenna) through a muslin cloth and squeeze out excess water completely.', 'Transfer the chenna onto a large plate and knead lightly. Add powdered sugar and green cardamom powder and knead again.', 'Transfer chenna into a piping bag.', 'Drain the pineapple slices on an absorbent paper till they are completely dry and place on a serving platter. Pipe out the chenna mixture on the edges of pineapple slices in floral shape.', 'Garnish each slice with almond slivers, pistachio slivers, few saffron strands and serve.']

title: Mango Bhapa Doi
method: ['Blend together yogurt, condensed milk and mango pulp till well mixed in a blender.', 'Transfer into a bowl, add milk and mix well. Boil sufficient water in the lower deck of a steamer.', 'Pour the mango mixture into a silicon mould and place it on the upper deck of the steamer.', 'Put the lid on and steam for 15-20 minutes. Cool and chill in a refrigerator.', 'Decorate with mango slices and serve chilled.']

title: Corn Palak Pulao - SK Khazana
method: ['Shred of the spinach leaves and set aside. Heat ghee in a deep non-stick pan, add mustard seeds and let them splutter. Add cumin seeds and let them change colour.', 'Add onions and mix well. Add a pinch of salt, mix and saute till onions turn golden brown. Add ginger paste and garlic paste, mix and saute for 2 minutes.', 'Drain and add rice and mix. Add coriander powder, adjust salt and add garam masala powder.', 'Add sweet corn and spinach and mix well. Add 3cups water and mix well. Cover and cook on low heat till the moisture is absorbed and the rice is cooked completely.', 'Take the pan off the heat and transfer the pulao into a doughnut shaped mould packing it tightly. Set it aside for 5 minutes.', 'Halve an orange and cut into half-moon shaped slices.', 'Place a plate upside down on the mould and turn it over and gently remove the mould. What you get is pulao in the shape of a doughnut. Arrange the orange slices all around the rice and sprinkle pomegranate pearls over them to make a nice pattern.', 'Place a small katori with pomegranate raita in the center cavity of the rice and serve.']

title: Black Eyed Bean Rice
method: ['Drain the lobia and boil in 2 cups of water until just cooked.', 'Roughly chop onion, garlic, red capsicum (pepper), green capsicum (pepper) and put in a chopper jar and chop.', 'Heat oil in a deep non stick pan, add the chopped ingredients and saute for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add green peas and black eyed beans and mix.', 'Chop tomato and add along with salt, red chilli powder, chilli sauce, lemon zest and rice and mix. Sprinkle a little water, cover and cook on medium heat for 3-4 minutes.', 'Chop parsley. Tear lettuce leaves and line a serving bowl. Put the rice on them, sprinkle parsley and serve. You can even serve this at room temperature. Keep aside along with the cooking liquor.', 'Heat 1 tbsp oil in a small non stick pan, add cumin seeds, fenugreek seeds and red chillies. Saute for 2 minutes on low heat, stirring constantly, till fragrant. Let cool and grind with ginger and garlic, using a little water, to a smooth paste.', 'Heat the remaining oil in a non stick kadai. Add cinnamon and when it begins to sizzle, add onions. Saute until lightly browned.', 'Add tomato, ground paste, turmeric powder, red chilli powder and salt. Cover and let it cook in its own juices for 5-7 minutes.', 'Add lobia with water. Cover and cook till lobia is tender and gravy almost dry. Add rice and mix gently and cook till the rice gets heated through. Garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot.']

title: Banana Leaf Seafood Kabab
method: ['Slice ginger and put it in a mixer.', 'Roughly chop coriander roots and add to the mixer along with dried red chillies, garlic, lemon juice, fish, onion and peanut butter and grind to a smooth paste. Transfer this into a bowl, add salt and prawns and mix well.', 'Brush banana leaf pieces with oil.', 'Dampen palms with water and divide the fish mixture into 8 equal portions, shape them into balls and flatten them to make tikkis.', 'Place one tikki on each banana leaf piece, fold the leaf to make packets.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, place the fish packets on it and cook till the fish and prawns are fully cooked.', 'Arrange the kababs on a serving plate and serve immediately.']

title: Amritsari Fish
method: ['Marinate the fish cubes in vinegar for twenty minutes. Remove from the vinegar and pat them dry.', 'Make a batter of gram flour, yogurt, egg, carom seeds, salt, lemon juice, red chilli powder, ginger paste and garlic paste.', 'Keep the fish cubes in this marinade for about twenty minutes. Heat sufficient oil in a kadai and deep-fry the fish till golden brown and crisp.', 'Drain on absorbent paper. Serve hot, sprinkled with chaat masala and lemon wedges.']

title: Khow Suey - SK Khazana
method: ['Put chicken pieces in bowl. Add salt, 1 tablespoon garlic,  1/2  tablespoon ginger, turmeric powder, coriander powder and cumin powder and mix well. Set aside.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add remaining garlic, remaining ginger and shallots, mix and saute till fragrant.', 'Add dried red chillies and fresh red chillies, mix and saute for a minute. Add chicken, mix and cook for 2 minutes.', 'Add gram flour, mix well and cook for a minute. Add salt and mix. Add coconut milk, stir and cook till the chicken is fully done.', 'Add basil and mix well. Switch off heat, add lemon juice and mix well.', 'For each portion, place  1/2  cup noodles in a serving bowl. Pour some chicken curry and top with  1/2  teaspoon spring onion greens, 1 tablespoon fried onions, 1-2 egg slices,  1/2  tablespoon peanuts,  1/2  tablespoon fried garlic, some coriander leaves, a lemon wedge and some red chillies. Serve immediately.']

title: Kiwi Panna
method: ['Chop kiwis into small pieces and put them into a mixer jar.', 'Add coriander leaves, mint leaves, ginger, black peppercorns, cumin seeds, black salt, sugar, salt, lemon juice and 3 cups water and grind into a puree.', 'Pour the panna in to 4 tall glasses and serve.']

title: Corn and Broccoli Quiche
method: ['Preheat oven to 180@ C.', 'Place one phyllo sheet on the worktop and brush some melted butter on top. Place another phyllo sheet on top and again brush some melted butter on top.', 'Cut the sheet into 4 equal rectangles.', 'Line a silicon cupcake mould tray with one layered phyllo sheet rectangle. Brush some melted butter in each cup and layer with another phyllo sheet rectangle.', 'Heat butter in a non-stick pan. Add pine nuts and roast for 1-2 minutes.', 'Add corn kernels, broccoli florets, dried mixed herbs, crushed peppercorns and salt, mix and cook for 1 minute. Add 1 tablespoon processed cheese and mix well. Transfer in a bowl.', 'Break eggs in a bowl. Add cream, salt and crushed peppercorns and beat well. Add to the corn-broccoli mixture and mix well.', 'Put the corn-broccoli mixture into the lined cupcake mould tray filling  3/4  of it and top with some processed cheese.', 'Put the tray into the preheated oven and bake for 5-10 minutes. Remove from oven.', 'Serve warm with tomato ketchup.']

title: Soya Chettinad
method: ['Heat 2 tbsps oil in a non-stick pan, add cinnamon, cardamoms, coriander seeds, cumin seeds, fennel seeds, black peppercorns and cloves and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add 4-5 curry leaves and poppy seeds, mix and saute for half a minute. Add onions, mix and saute for 2-3 minutes.', 'Add tomato and ginger-garlic paste, mix well and saute till tomato turns soft and pulpy.', 'Add red chilli powder, turmeric powder and cashewnuts and mix well. Add scraped coconut and salt, mix well and saute for 1 minute. Remove from heat, cool down to room temperature, grind with 3-4 tbsps water to a fine paste.', 'Heat remaining oil in another non-stick pan, add bay leaves and star anise and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add green chillies and remaining curry leaves and saute for half a minute. Add ground paste, mix and cook for 8-10 minutes.', 'Add 3-4 cups water, mix and bring to a boil. Add soya chunks, mix well and cook for 8-10 minutes', 'Finely chop coriander leaves.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with scraped coconut and coriander leaves and serve hot.']

title: Creole Fish Fingers
method: ['Take fish strips in a mixing bowl, add onion powder, garlic powder, dried basil, dried oregano, dried thyme, ginger paste, paprika powder, white pepper powder, salt and lemon juice and mix well.', 'Spread refined flour and breadcrumbs in different plate and take beaten egg mixture in a bowl.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a deep pan. Roll each fish strip in refined flour, dip in egg and roll in breadcrumbs and keep on a plate.', 'Slide in the fish strips into hot oil and deep-fry till golden brown. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Arrange them on a serving plate and serve hot with tomato ketchup.']

title: Dahi Vada
method: ['Blend split black gram along with some water into a smooth and thick batter. Transfer in a bowl.', 'Add asafoetida, cumin seeds and salt and mix well.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Put in portions of batter and deep-fry till golden brown and crisp. Drain in a bowl of water and soak for 5 minutes.', 'Squeeze out excess water from the soaked vadas and place in individual serving bowls. Pour some sweetened yogurt, drizzle some date-tamarind chutney and sprinkle some cumin powder, black salt and chilli powder.', 'Serve garnished with coriander leaves.']

title: Walnut Nankhatai - SK Khazana
method: ['Preheat oven to 180deg C. Line a baking tray with a silicon mat.', 'Take refined flour in a mixing bowl, add powdered sugar, gram flour, baking powder, baking soda, cardamom powder and crushed California Walnuts and mix well. Add ghee and mix till you get a breadcrumb consistency. Then knead with your hands into a semi soft dough.', 'Divide the dough into equal portions, shape into balls and flatten lightly between your palms.', 'Place them on the lined baking tray, place one California Walnut in the center of each nankhatai and press lightly.', 'Keep the tray into the preheated oven and bake for 20-25 minutes. Remove from oven and cool down to room temperature.', 'Serve or store in an air tight container to serve when required.']

title: Plum Paradise
method: ['Preheat oven to 170degC.', 'Place egg yolks in a bowl and blend with a hand blender. Add two tablespoons sugar and continue to blend till frothy.', 'Place the custard in a bowl. Sift refined flour and baking powder into it and blend with a hand blender. Add the egg-sugar mixture and blend some more. Add the remaining sugar to the plums and mix.', 'Pour the custard mixture into a baking dish. Arrange the plums in it to cover the entire surface. Place the baking dish in the preheated oven and bake for thirty to forty minutes.', 'Sprinkle icing sugar over the top and serve.']

title: Chicken Gold Coin
method: ['Grind chicken mince in a grinder to a very fine paste.', 'Transfer into a mixing bowl, add soy sauce, salt, white pepper powder, ginger, garlic, onion, green chillies, cornflour and one egg and mix well.', 'Break the other egg into another bowl, add little water and salt and beat.', 'Cut bread slices into roundels with a round cookie cutter. Brush them with beaten egg, spread some chicken mixture evenly on them. Brush again with egg.', 'Sprinkle sesame seeds generously on the prepared coins and press lightly. Shake off excess seeds and refrigerate for ten to fifteen minutes.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai and deep-fry the coins till crisp and golden. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Arrange them on a serving plate and serve hot with a sauce of your choice.']

title: Cashew Chicken
method: ['Cut onions into large chunks and separate layers. Chop red chillies and garlic coarsely in a chopper.', 'Heat 2 tsps oil in a non-stick wok, add onions and saute. Cut red capsicum into  1/2  inch pieces and add.', 'Add cashewnuts and toss. Transfer the mixture into a bowl and set aside.', 'Heat 2 tsps oil in the non-stick wok. Cut chicken into  1/2  inch pieces and add.', 'Saute on high heat for 2-3 minutes, tossing frequently so that they get cooked evenly all over.', 'Add chilli-garlic mixture and toss. Add oyster sauce, dark soy sauce, sugar and salt and mix.', 'Cook for 2 minutes. Mix cornflour in  1/4  cup water and add to the wok and mix well.', 'Add the onions-red capsicum-cashewnut mixture and mix. Serve hot.']

title: Rajma Bread Patties
method: ['Put rajma masala in a bowl, add onions, green chillies, ginger, red chilli powder and salt and mix well.', 'Soak bread slices in sufficient water, squeeze out excess water and discard the edges.', 'Put slices on a worktop.Place a portion of rajma mixture on one side of each bread slice and roll tightly.', 'Heat 4-5 tbsps oil in a non-stick pan, add the patties and shallow-fry till brown and crisp on all the sides.', 'Place red, green, yellow, ginger strips and onion slices on one side of the plate, halve one of the patties and place with other patties on the other side and serve hot.']

title: Uralai Chops
method: ['Slice potatoes into roundels. Parboil the potato roundels with a little turmeric powder and 2 cups water.', 'Mix together green chillies, garlic paste, ginger paste, coriander powder, turmeric powder, red chilli powder and 3 tbsps oil and mix well.', 'Add rice flour and mix well to make a paste.', 'Add salt and parboiled potatoes and mix well so that all the potato slices are well coated with the masala.', 'Keep the mixture aside for some time.Heat oil in a non-stick pan.', 'Add the potato slices and curry leaves and shallow fry, turning sides, till they become golden and crisp.', 'Drain on an absorbent paper and serve hot.']

title: Monterey Jack Cheese And Red Grape Bruschetta
method: ['Preheat oven to 180degC. Cut the French bread into half inch thick slices diagonally. Deseed the red grapes and cut each of them into four pieces. Cut the green grapes into four pieces. Place sliced bread on a baking tray.', 'Drizzle some olive oil over the slices and place in the preheated oven for two to three minutes. Remove from oven and place the cheese cubes on each of them.', 'Sprinkle a little of the crushed red chillies. Keep the tray back in the oven and bake till the cheese melts a bit. Remove the tray from the oven and place the chopped grapes on top and serve immediately.']

title: Atta Biscuits
method: ['Preheat the oven to 160degC. Take whole wheat flour in a bowl. Add bran, refined flour and mix.', 'Add chilled butter cut into small pieces and mix with fingertips till the mixture resembles breadcrumbs. Add powdered sugar and mix.', 'Add cold milk (or water or a mixture of the two) and knead lightly taking care not to overwork the dough.', 'Sprinkle some flour on the worktop and roll out the dough to one-fourth inch thickness.', 'With different shaped cookie cutters cut out biscuits. Place the biscuits on a baking tray keeping a little space between each. Bake in preheated oven at 160degC till done. Cool and store in airtight tins.']

title: Kootoo Ke Aate Ki Puri
method: ['Place the flour in a bowl. Add potatoes, coriander leaves, green chilli paste, rock salt and knead into a stiff dough.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Divide the dough into small pedas.', 'Place the pedas, one at a time, on a plastic sheet and pat them into small puris with your fingers.', 'Slide the puris into the oil and deep fry till golden. Drain on an absorbent paper. Serve them hot with vratwale alu.']

title: Healthy Chiwda - Diwali Special
method: ['Heat oil in a non-stick pan, add mustard seeds and let them splutter.', 'Crush garlic and add to the pan alongwith green chillies, curry leaves and saute till crisp.', 'Add turmeric powder, mix well and saute for fifteen seconds.', 'Add cornflakes, oats, pressedrice, flax seeds, chia seeds, pumpkin seeds and almonds and mix well. Remove from heat and cool.', 'Serve or store in an airtight container.']

title: Sevaiyan Kheer
method: ['Heat ghee in a non-stick pan, add vermicelli and saute on low heat till golden.', 'Add milk and mix well. Add khoya and saffron strands, mix and cook on low heat for 8-10 minutes or till vermicelli is fully cooked.', 'Add sugar, cardamom powder, pistachios and cashewnuts, mix and cook for 4-5 minutes on low heat.', 'Transfer the kheer into a serving bowl. Garnish with remaining pistachios and cashewnuts and serve hot or chilled.']

title: Noodle Crusted Chicken Bites
method: ['Take chicken pieces in a bowl. Add noodle seasoning, mixed herbs, salt, garlic powder, onion powder, chilli flakes, lemon juice and crushed peppercorns and mix well. Set aside to marinate for 10-15 minutes.', 'Break eggs into a bowl. Add salt and beat well. Spread flour on a plate.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a deep pan.', 'Roll the marinated chicken in flour, dip in the beaten eggs and coat them with noodles.', 'Deep-fry the chicken bites in hot oil till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.', 'Serve hot with tomato ketchup.']

title: Phuljari Kebab
method: ['Mix together potatoes, corn and spinach in a bowl.', 'Add salt, chaat masala and cornflour and mix well.', 'Take a bread stick and roll the mixture around it.', 'Coat it with rice flakes to make phuljaris.', 'Heat sufficient oil in a kadai and deep-fry the phuljharis till crisp and golden. Drain on absorbent paper. Serve hot.']

title: Bhuna Chicken Kathi Roll - SK Khazana
method: ['Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan. Add chopped onions and saute till golden brown.', 'Add ginger-garlic paste, mix and saute for a minute. Add some water and stir to mix.', 'Add tomatoes, mix and cook till they turn soft. Add chilli powder, turmeric powder and coriander powder, mix and cook till the oil separates.', 'Add some more water and mix. Add almond-cashewnut powder and mix.', 'Add chicken strips and salt, mix and cook for 1-2 minutes. Add garam masala powder, coriander leaves and 1 teaspoon lemon juice, mix and cook till the chicken is fully done.', 'Mix together sliced onions, green chillies and remaining lemon juice in a bowl.', 'Divide the dough into equal portions, place on a dusted worktop and roll out each portion into a large disc.', 'Brush some ghee, dust some flour, slit on one side, roll into cones and twist into roundels. Dust some flour and roll out into thick paranthas.', 'For each roll, heat some oil in a non-stick pan. Place a parantha and cook, turning sides, till browned from both the sides.', 'Pour a portion of beaten eggs on top, spread, flip and let it cook. Transfer on a piece of butter paper.', 'Place a portion of onion mixture on one side, sprinkle some chaat masala, top with a portion of cooked chicken mixture and add some more onion mixture. Roll tightly.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Perfect Phulka-SK Khazana
method: ['Mix together whole wheat flour, salt and oil in a parat, add sufficient water and knead into a soft dough.', 'Add 1 teaspoon oil and knead again till soft.', 'Cover with a moist muslin cloth and set aside for 10-15 minutes.', 'Divide the prepared dough into 12 equal portions and roll into thin discs.', 'Heat a non-stick tawa and place each roti on it. Roast lightly on both sides, take it off the tawa and place on direct flame till it puffs up. Turn-over and let the other side puff too.', 'Serve smeared with ghee.']

title: Charred Cinnamon and Sugar Rubbed Bananas
method: ['Halve bananas and peel.', 'Spread castor sugar on a plate. Add cinnamon powder and mix well.', 'Heat butter in a non-stick pan.', 'Coat the bananas with sugar-cinnamon mixture and place them in the pan and cook, turning sides, for a minute. Transfer onto a serving plate.', 'Serve with a scoop of vanilla ice cream and garnished with chocolate shavings and colourful sprinklers.']

title: Stir Fried Chinese Exotic
method: ['Heat oil in a wok, add ginger, garlic, green chilles and veggies and stir fry.', 'Add stock, salt, seasoning, and adjust the consistency with cornflour. Finish with wine.', 'Serve hot and garnish with fried garlic.']

title: Chicken Red Curry Pasta with Lemon Chilli Bread
method: ['Preheat oven to 180degC.', 'Heat 2 tbsps oil in a non-stick pan, add red curry paste and saute for 1 minute. Add chicken strips and mix well. Add a little water, mix and cook till chicken is done.', 'Add penne pasta and mix well. Add coconut milk and salt and let it cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Tear 15 torn basil leaves and add and mix well.', 'Slit the pavs vertically from the top without cutting through.', 'Take butter in a bowl, add salt, 1 tsp crushed red chillies, lemon zest and  1/2  tbsp lemon juice and mix well. Apply this into the slits made in the pavs and little bit on the top and keep them on a plate. Keep the plate in the preheated oven and bake for 5-10 minutes.', 'Add  1/2  tbsp lemon juice to the pasta with 1 tsp crushed red chillies and mix.', 'Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with remaining basil leaves. Serve hot with lemon chilli bread.']

title: Almond Ricotta Tart
method: ['To make crust, put refined flour, castor sugar, salt and cinnamon powder in a bowl and mix well. Add butter and mix till the mixture resembles breadcrumbs.', 'Add egg and milk, mix and knead into a stiff dough.', 'Grease a pie dish with some butter.', 'Roll the dough into a large enough disc to fit in the pie dish. Line the pie dish with the dough and refrigerate for thirty minutes.', 'Preheat oven to 180degC.', 'To make filling, putricotta cheese, cream cheese, egg, castor sugar, almond essence and slivered almonds into a bowl and mix well. Add chocolate chips and mix well. Spread the filling evenly in the prepared base.', 'Put the tart in the preheated oven and bake for twenty-five to thirty-five minutes. Remove from the oven and cool.', 'Cut into wedges and serve chilled.']

title: Zucchini Pasta
method: ['Heat olive oil in a non-stick pan. Add garlic and saute till golden. Add onion and saute till translucent. Add cherry tomatoes, mix and cook for a minute.', 'Add salt, pepper powder, mix and cook for a minute. Add zucchini strips and carrot strips, mix and cook for a minute.', 'Add cream and mix well. Switch off heat, add parmesan cheese powder and torn basil leaves and mix well.', 'Serve hot garnished with parmesan cheese shavings and basil leaves.']

title: Chhenar Payesh
method: ['Boil milk, reduce heat and let it simmer till reduced to half the original quantity. Add sugar and cook till it dissolves. Mash chenna in a bowl. Add it to the milk. Simmer for two minutes. Garnish with nuts and serve cold.']

title: Coconut Thins
method: ['Heat the butter, brown sugar and golden syrup in a non-stick pan till the butter has melted and the sugar has dissolved.', 'Remove from heat and cool.', 'Preheat the oven to 180deg C. Place a silicon sheet on the baking tray.', 'Sieve flour, add the lemon juice and one-fourth cup coconut into the pan and mix well.', 'Drop one-one tablespoon of the coconut mixture on the silicon sheet to make neat circles and sprinkle remaining coconut on top of each.', 'Place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for ten to fifteen minutes. Remove from heat and cool.', 'Serve.']

title: Panchranga Pulao
method: ['Soak rice in five cups of water for half an hour. Drain. Heat pure ghee in a thick-bottomed pan and add cinnamon, green cardamoms, cloves, peppercorns, bay leaves and cumin seeds.', 'Stir-fry briefly. Add onions and saute for two to three minutes or till translucent. Add carrot, French beans, cauliflower and green peas and cook for a minute. Add soaked rice and stir fry for a minute. Stir in four cups of water and salt to taste.', 'Bring to a boil and cook on medium heat for three to four minutes, stirring occasionally or until all the water is absorbed. Stir in capsicum, reduce heat and cook covered for six to eight minutes or till rice and vegetables are cooked. Remove from heat and allow standing time of five minutes before serving hot.']

title: Fish in Butter Paper
method: ['Spread each butter paper on table top and halve it. Cut them into squares and further cut them into rounds with one set being a little smaller than the other.', 'Halve each fish fillet and place in a large bowl. Add salt, crushed black peppercorns and lemon juice. Add the coloured capsicum squares and mix well and let them marinate for 10-15 minutes.', 'Preheat the oven to 190deg C.', 'For each parcel, place  1/2  cup cooked brown rice in the centre of each bigger round piece of butter paper sheet, sprinkle 4-5 garlic cloves and place 1 fish piece over it. Top with some capsicum squares and 2-3 sprigs of dill.', 'Mix cream cheese and cream in a small bowl and mix well. Put some this mixture over the vegetables. Place 3 lemon slices at some distance from each other.', 'Cover with the smaller round and fold the edges of the 2 paper rounds together all around so that there is no opening anywhere.', 'Place the parcels in a baking tray, place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 12-15 minutes.', 'The paper will get slightly burnt.', 'Bring the tray out of the oven and serve in the paper itself. It should be opened just before eating.']

title: Pepper Paneer Chettinad
method: ['Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan and saute red chillies, coconut, black peppercorns, coriander seeds, cumin seeds, cardamoms, cloves, cinnamon, star anise and fennel seeds till fragrant. Cool and grind to a fine paste using water as required.', 'Heat remaining oil in the same non-stick pan and add curry leaves and the ground paste and saute for 1-2 minutes. Add ginger paste and saute for a minute.', 'Add tomatoes, chilli powder, turmeric powder and cottage cheese and mix well. Cook for 5 minutes.', 'Add 2 cups water, lemon juice and salt. Cover and cook for 2 minutes.', 'Garnish with coriander sprig. Serve hot with boiled rice or paranthe.']

title: Tamatar Ki Kadhi
method: ['Roughly chop 2 tomatoes and put in a blender jar. Chop the remaining two finely.', 'Heat 2 tbsps oil in a deep non stick pan, add mustard seeds, asafoetida, cumin seeds, fenugreek seeds and saute. Add curry leaves, finely chopped tomatoes and mix.', 'Roughly chop ginger, crush garlic and add to the blender jar and hand blend to a puree. Add this puree to the pan. Add green chillies, turmeric powder and salt and mix.', 'Mix gram flour with  1/4  cup water and add to the pan and mix well. Cover and cook till thick.', 'Add coriander leaves and simmer, covered, for 10 minutes.', 'Serve hot with steamed rice.']

title: Ragi Cutlets
method: ['Combine sprouted ragi, potatoes, gram flour, salt, red chilli powder, coriander powder, garam masala powder and cumin powder in a bowl and mix well.', 'Finely chop coriander sprigs and mint sprigs and add. Chop fresh red chilli and add. Finely chop onion and add. Chop spring onion bulbs and add. Mix well. Reserve the spring onion greens.', 'Spread Saffola Masala Classic Oats on a plate. Add breadcrumbs and mix well.', 'Divide the ragi mixture into equal portions and shape them into cutlets. Coat the cutlets in the oats-breadcrumbs mixture.', 'Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Place the cutlets on it and shallow-fry till golden from both sides.', 'To make salad, place Lollorosso lettuce, Iceberg lettuce, halved spring onion greens and arugula leaves in a bowl.', 'Combine mayonnaise and red chilli sauce in another bowl and mix well.', 'Add 1 tbsp mayonnaise mixture to the salad and mix well.', 'Place salad on a serving dish. Spread the remaining mayonnaise mixture and place the cutlets on it.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Kaala Mutton
method: ['Put mutton in a bowl, add turmeric powder, salt, yogurt and green chutney, mix and set aside to marinate for 20 minutes.', 'Put mutton with the marinade in a pressure cooker. Add  1/2  the sliced onion and mix well. Add 1 cup water, mix, cover and cook on high heat for 1 whistle. Reduce heat and cook for 10 minutes.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a shallow non-stick pan. Add coriander seeds, poppy seeds, cardamoms, cinnamon, cloves, peppercorns, fennel seeds and dried red chillies and saute till fragrant.', 'Add remaining sliced onion and saute till onion turns a dark brown. Add dried coconut and saute till brown. Remove from heat and set aside to cool.', 'Grind the roasted mixture with some water to a coarse paste.', 'Heat remaining oil in a deep non-stick pan.
